GS24pmbhasuu:3_0: 1-4 atha śabdānuśāsanam . atha iti ayam śabdaḥ adhikārārthaḥ prayujyate . śabdānuśāsanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3_1: śāstram adhikṛtam veditavyam . keṣām śabdānām . laukikānām vaidikānām ca . tatra laukikāḥ tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4: gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī śakuniḥ mṛgaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . vaidikāḥ khalu api :
GS24pmbhasuu:5: śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye . iṣe tvā ūrje tvā . agnim īḷe purohitam . agne ayāhi vītaye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9_0: 5-7 atha gauḥ iti atra kaḥ śabdaḥ . kim yat tat sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇi artharūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:9_1: saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . dravyam nāma tat . yat tarhi tat iṅgitam ceṣṭitam nimiṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:9_2: saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . kriyā nāma sā . yat tarhi tat śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kapilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9_3: kapotaḥ iti saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . guṇaḥ nāma saḥ . yat tarhi tat bhinneṣu abhinnam
GS24pmbhasuu:9_4: chinneṣu acchinnam sāmānyabhūtam saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . ākṛtiḥ nāma sā . kaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9_5: śabdaḥ . yena uccāritena sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇinām sampratyayaḥ bhavati saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9_6: śabdaḥ . atha vā pratītapadārthakaḥ loke dhvaniḥ śabdaḥ iti ucyate . tat yathā śabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:9_7: kuru mā śabdam kārṣīḥ śabdakārī ayam māṇavakaḥ iti . dhvanim kurvan evam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13_0: 8-14 kāni punaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni . rakṣohāgamalaghvasandehāḥ proyojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13_1: . rakṣārtham vedānām adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . lopāgamavarṇavikārajñaḥ hi samyak vedān
GS24pmbhasuu:13_2: paripālayiṣyati . ūhaḥ khalu api. na sarvaiḥ liṅgaiḥ na ca sarvābhiḥ vibhaktibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13_3: vede mantrāḥ nigaditāḥ. te ca avaśyam yajñagatena yathāyatham vipariṇamayitavyāḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:13_4: tān na avaiyākaraṇaḥ śaknoti yathāyatham vipariṇamayitum. tasmāt adhyeyam vyākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13_5: . āgamaḥ khalu api . brāhmaṇena niṣkāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgaḥ vedaḥ adhyeyaḥ jñeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13_6: iti . pradhānam ca ṣaṭsu aṅgeṣu vyākaraṇam . pradhāne ca kṛtaḥ yatnaḥ phalavān bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13_7: . laghvartham ca adhyeyam vyākaraṇam. brāhmaṇena avaśyam śabdāḥ jñeyāḥ iti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13_8: antareṇa vyākaraṇam laghunā upāyena śabdāḥ śakyāḥ jñātum . asandehārtham ca adhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13_9: vyākaraṇam . yājñikāḥ paṭhanti . sthūlapṛṣatīm āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13_10: . tasyām sandehaḥ sthūlā ca asau pṛṣatī ca sthūlapṛṣatī sthūlāni pṛṣanti yasyāḥ sā
GS24pmbhasuu:13_11: sthūlapṛṣatī . tām na avaiyākaraṇaḥ svarataḥ adhyavasyati . yadi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13_12: tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ. atha antodāttatvam tataḥ tatpuruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:17: 11-12 imāni ca bhūyaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni . te asurāḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:29_1: babhūvuḥ . tasmāt brāhmaṇena na mlecchitavai na apabhāṣitavai . mlecchaḥ ha vai eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:29_2: yat apaśabdaḥ . mlecchāḥ mā bhūma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . te asurāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:33_0: 12-13 duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ . duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ svarataḥ varṇataḥ vā mithyā prayuktaḥ na tam
GS24pmbhasuu:33_1: artham āha . saḥ vāgvajraḥ yajamānam hinasti yathā indraśatruḥ svarataḥ aparādhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:33_2: . duṣṭān śabdān mā prayukṣmahi iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:37_0: 3 yat adhītam . yat adhītam avijñātam nigadena eva śabdyate anagnau iva śuṣkaidhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:37_1: na tat jvalati karhi cit . tasmāt anarthakam mā adhigīṣmahi iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam. yat adhītam .
GS24pmbhasuu:41_0: 13-15 yaḥ tu prayuṅkte . yaḥ tu prayuṅkte kuśalaḥ viśeṣe śabdān yathāvat vyavahārakāle
GS24pmbhasuu:41_1: saḥ anantam āpnoti jayam paratra vāgyogavit duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ . kaḥ . vāgyogavit
GS24pmbhasuu:41_2: eva . kutaḥ etat . yaḥ hi śabdān jānāti apaśabdān api asau jānāti . yathā eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:41_3: śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ . atha vā bhūyān adharmaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:41_4: . bhūyāṃsaḥ apaśabdāḥ alpīyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ . ekaikasya hi śabdasya bahavaḥ apaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:41_5: . tat yathā gauḥ iti asya śabdasya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā iti evamādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:41_6: . atha yaḥ avāgyogavit . ajñānam tasya śaraṇam . na atyantāya ajñānam śaraṇam bhavitum
GS24pmbhasuu:41_7: arhati . yaḥ hi ajānan vai brāhmaṇam hanyāt surām vā pibet saḥ api manye patitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:41_8: syāt. evam tarhi saḥ anantam āpnoti jayam paratra vāgyogavit duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:41_9: . kaḥ. avāgyogavit eva . atha yaḥ vāgyogavit . vijñānam tasya śaraṇam . kva punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:41_10: idam paṭhitam . bhrājāḥ nāma ślokāḥ . kim ca bhoḥ ślokāḥ api pramāṇam . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:41_11: . yadi pramāṇam ayam api ślokaḥ pramāṇam bhavitum arhati . yat udumbaravarṇānām ghaṭīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:41_12: maṇḍalam mahat pītam na svargam gamayet kim tat kratugatam nayet iti . pramattagītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:41_13: eṣaḥ tatrabhavataḥ . yaḥ tu apramattagītaḥ tat pramānam . yas tu prayuṅkte .
GS24pmbhasuu:45_0: 15 avidvāṃsaḥ . avidvāṃsaḥ pratyabhivāde nāmnaḥ ye plutim na viduḥ kāmam teṣu tu
GS24pmbhasuu:45_1: viproṣya strīṣu iva ayam aham vadet . abhivāde strīvat mā bhūma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . avidvāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:50: prayājāḥ savibhaktikāḥ kāryāḥ iti . na ca antareṇa vyākaraṇam prayājāḥ savibhaktikāḥ śakyāḥ kartum. vibhaktim kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:54: 16 yaḥ vai imām . yaḥ vai imām padaśaḥ svaraśaḥ akṣaraśaḥ vācam vidadhāti saḥ ārtvijīnaḥ . ārtvijīnāḥ syāma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . yaḥ vai imām .
GS24pmbhasuu:58_0: 16-18 catvāri . catvari śṛṅgā trayaḥ asya padā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya tridhā
GS24pmbhasuu:58_1: baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyān a viveśa . catvāri śṛṅgāni catvāri
GS24pmbhasuu:58_2: padajātāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ ca . trayaḥ asya pādāḥ trayaḥ kālāḥ bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_3: . dve śīrṣe dvau śabdātmānau nityaḥ kāryaḥ ca . sapta hastāsaḥ asya sapta vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_4: . tridhā baddhaḥ triṣu sthāneṣu baddhaḥ urasi kaṇṭhe śirasi iti . vṛṣabhaḥ varṣaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:58_5: . roravīti śabdam karoti . kutaḥ etat . rautiḥ śabdakarmā . mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśa
GS24pmbhasuu:58_6: iti . mahān devaḥ śabdaḥ . martyāḥ maraṇadharmāṇaḥ manuṣyāḥ . tān āviveśa . mahatā
GS24pmbhasuu:58_7: devena naḥ sāmyam yathā syāt iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:59_0: catvari vak parimitā padani tani viduḥ brāhmaṇa ye manīṣiṇaḥ guhā trīṇi nihitā na
GS24pmbhasuu:59_1: iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti . catvāri vāk parimitā padāni . catvāri
GS24pmbhasuu:59_2: padajātāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ ca . tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ . manasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:59_3: īṣiṇaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ . guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti . guhāyām trīṇi nihitāni na iṅgayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:59_4: . na ceṣṭante . na nimiṣanti iti arthaḥ . turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti . turīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:59_5: ha vai etat vācaḥ yat manuṣyeṣu vartate . caturtham iti arthaḥ . catvāri .
GS24pmbhasuu:63_0: 18-19 uta tvaḥ . uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vacam uta tvaḥ śrṇvan na śṛṇoti enām
GS24pmbhasuu:63_1: uto tvasmai tanvam visasre jāya iva patye uśatī suvasāḥ . api khalu ekaḥ paśyan api
GS24pmbhasuu:63_2: na paśyati vācam . api khalu ekaḥ śrṇvan api na śrṇoti enām . avidvāṃsam āha ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:63_3: . uto tvasmai tanvam visasre . tanum vivṛṇute . jāyā iva patye uśatī suvāsāḥ . tad
GS24pmbhasuu:63_4: yathā jāyā patye kāmayamānā suvāsāḥ svam ātmānam vivṛṇute evam vāk vāgvide svātmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:63_5: vivṛṇute . vāk naḥ vivṛṇuyāt ātmānam iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . uta tvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:67_0: 19-20 saktum iva . saktum iva titaunā punantaḥ yatra dhīrāḥ manasā vacam akrata atrā
GS24pmbhasuu:67_1: sakhāyaḥ sakhyani jānate bhadra eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci . saktuḥ sacateḥ durdhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:67_2: bhavati . kasateḥ vā viparītāt vikasito bhavati . titau paripavanam bhavati tatavat
GS24pmbhasuu:67_3: vā tunnavat vā . dhīrāḥ dhyānavantaḥ manasā prajñānena vācam akrata vācam akṛṣata
GS24pmbhasuu:67_4: . atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate . sāyujyāni jānate . kva . yaḥ eṣaḥ durghaḥ mārgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:67_5: ekagamyaḥ vāgviṣayaḥ . ke punaḥ te . vaiyākaraṇāḥ . kutaḥ etat . bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:67_6: nihitā adhi vāci . eṣām vāci bhadrā lakṣmīḥ nihitā bhavati . lakṣmīḥ lakṣaṇāt bhāsanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:72: āhitāgniḥ apaśabdam prayujya prāyaścittīyām sārasvatīm iṣṭim nirvapet iti . prāyaścittīyāḥ mā bhūma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . sārasvatīm .
GS24pmbhasuu:77_0: daśamyuttarakālam putrasya jātasya nāma vidadhyāt ghoṣavadādi antarantaḥstham avṛddham
GS24pmbhasuu:77_1: tripuruṣānūkam anaripratiṣṭhitam . tat hi pratiṣṭhitatamam bhavati . dvyakṣaram caturakṣaram
GS24pmbhasuu:77_2: vā nāma kṛtam kuryāt na taddhitam iti . na ca antareṇa vyākaraṇam kṛtaḥ taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:81_0: 21-22 sudevaḥ asi . sudevaḥ asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ anukṣaranti kākudam
GS24pmbhasuu:81_1: sūrmyam suṣiram iva . sudevaḥ asi varuṇa satyadevaḥ asi yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:81_2: sapta vibhaktayaḥ . anukṣaranti kākudam . kākudam tālu . kākuḥ jihvā sā asmin udyate
GS24pmbhasuu:81_3: iti kākudam . sūrmyam suṣirām iva . tad yathā śobhanām ūrmīm suṣirām agniḥ antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:81_4: praviśya dahati evam tava sapta sindhavaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ tālu anukṣaranti . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:81_5: asi satyadevaḥ . satyadevāḥ syāma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . sudevaḥ asi .
GS24pmbhasuu:85_0: 22-23 kim punaḥ idam vyākaranam eva adhijigāṃsamānebhyaḥ prayojanam anvākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:85_1: na punaḥ anyat api kim cit . om iti uktvā vṛttāntaśaḥ śam iti evamādīn śabdān paṭhanti
GS24pmbhasuu:86_0: saṃskārottarakālam brāhmaṇāḥ vyākaraṇam sma adhīyate . tebhyaḥ tatra sthānakaraṇānupradānajñebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:86_1: vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ upadiśyante . tat adyatve na tathā . vedam adhītya tvaritāḥ vaktāraḥ bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:87: vedāt naḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ siddhāḥ lokāt ca laukikāḥ . anarthakam vyākaraṇam iti . tebhyaḥ vipratipannabuddhibhyaḥ adhyetṛbhyaḥ ācāryaḥ idam śāstram anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:92_0: 23-24 uktaḥ śabdaḥ . svarūpam api uktam . prayojanāni api uktāni . śabdānuśāsanam
GS24pmbhasuu:92_1: idānīm kartavyam . tat katham kartavyam . kim śabdopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ āhosvit apaśabdopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:92_2: āhosvit ubhayopadeśaḥ iti . anyataropadeśena kṛtam syāt . tat yathā bhakṣyaniyamena
GS24pmbhasuu:92_3: abhakṣyapratiṣedho gamyate . pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ iti ukte gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:93: ataḥ anye abhakṣyāḥ iti . abhakṣyapratiṣedhena vā bhakṣyaniyamaḥ . tat yathā abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ukte gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:94: āraṇyaḥ bhakṣyaḥ iti . evam iha api :
GS24pmbhasuu:95: yadi tāvat śabdopadeśaḥ kriyate gauḥ iti etasmin upadiṣṭe gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:96: gāvyādayaḥ apaśabdāḥ iti . atha apaśabdopadeśaḥ kriyate gāvyādiṣu upadiṣṭeṣu gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:97_0: gauḥ iti eṣaḥ śabdaḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . laghutvāt śabdopadeśaḥ . laghīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:97_1: śabdopadeśaḥ garīyān apaśabdopadeśaḥ . ekaikasya śabdasya bahavaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:97_2: yathā . gauḥ iti asya śabdasya gāvīgoṇīgotāgopotalikādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . iṣṭānvākhyānam khalu api bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:101: 24-25 atha etasmin śabdopadeśe sati kim śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:102: gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī śakuniḥ mṛgaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ paṭhitavyāḥ . na iti āha . anabhyupāyaḥ eṣaḥ śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ . evam hi śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:103_0: bṛhaspatiḥ indrāya divyam varṣasahasram pratipadoktānām śabdānām śabdapārāyaṇam provāca
GS24pmbhasuu:103_1: na antam jagāma . bṛhaspatiḥ ca pravaktā indraḥ ca adhyetā divyam varṣasahasram adhyayanakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_2: na ca antam jagāma . kim punaḥ adyatve . yaḥ sarvathā ciram jīvati saḥ varṣaśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:103_3: jīvati . caturbhiḥ ca prakāraiḥ vidyā upayuktā bhavati āgamakālena svādhyāyakālena
GS24pmbhasuu:103_4: pravacanakālena vyavahārakālena iti . tatra ca āgamakālena eva āyuḥ paryupayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:103_5: syāt . tasmāt anabhyupāyaḥ śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ . katham tarhi ime
GS24pmbhasuu:103_6: śabdāḥ pratipattavyāḥ . kim cit sāmanyaviśeṣavat lakṣaṇam pravartyam yena alpena
GS24pmbhasuu:103_7: yatnena mahataḥ mahataḥ śabdaughān pratipadyeran . kim punaḥ tat . utsargāpavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:103_8: . kaḥ cit utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ kaḥ cit apavādaḥ . kathañjātīyakaḥ punaḥ utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_9: kathañjātīyakaḥ apavādaḥ . sāmanyena utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā karmaṇi aṇ .
GS24pmbhasuu:103_10: tasya viśeṣeṇa apavādaḥ . tat yathā . ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:107_0: 25-26 kim punaḥ ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ āhosvit dravyam . ubhayam iti āha . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:107_1: . ubhayathā hi ācāryeṇa sūtrāṇi paṭhitāni . ākṛtim padārtham matvā jātyākhyāyām ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:107_2: bahuvacanam anyatarasyām iti ucyate . dravyam padārtham matvā sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:111_0: 26-27 kim punaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvit kāryaḥ . saṅgrahe etat prādhānyena parīkṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:111_1: nityaḥ vā syāt kāryaḥ vā iti . tatra uktāḥ doṣāḥ prayojanāni api uktāni . tatra tu
GS24pmbhasuu:111_2: eṣaḥ nirṇayaḥ yadi eva nityaḥ atha api kāryaḥ ubhayathā api lakṣaṇam pravartyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:115_0: 27-30 katham punaḥ idam bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya lakṣaṇam pravṛttam . siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:115_1: śabdārthasambandhe . siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . atha siddhaśabdasya kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:115_2: padārthaḥ . nityaparyāyavācī siddhaśabdaḥ . katham jñāyate . yat kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:115_3: bhāveṣu vartate . tat yathā siddhā dyauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:116: siddhā pṛthivī siddham ākāśam iti . nanu ca bhoḥ kāryeṣu api vartate . tat yathā siddhaḥ odanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:117_0: siddhaḥ sūpaḥ siddhā yavāgūḥ iti . yāvatā kāryeṣu api vartate tatra kutaḥ etat nityaparyāyavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:117_1: grahaṇam na punaḥ kārye yaḥ siddhaśabdaḥ iti . saṅgrahe tāvat kāryapratidvandvibhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:117_2: manyāmahe nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti . iha api tat eva . atha vā santi ekapadāni
GS24pmbhasuu:118: abbhakṣaḥ vāyubhakṣaḥ iti . apaḥ eva bhakṣayati vāyum eva bhakṣayati iti gamyate . evam iha api siddhaḥ eva na sādhyaḥ iti . atha vā pūrvapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:119: atyantasiddhaḥ siddhaḥ iti . tat yathā devadattaḥ dattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:120_0: satyabhāmā bhāmā iti . atha vā vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:120_1: iti nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ anena varṇyena . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:120_2: na mahatā kaṇṭhena nityaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ yasmin upādīyamāne asandehaḥ syāt . maṅgalārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:120_3: . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham siddhaśabdam āditaḥ prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:120_4: . maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:120_5: ca . adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . ayam khalu api nityaśabdaḥ na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:120_6: kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu bhāveṣu vartate . kim tarhi . ābhīkṣṇye api vartate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:120_7: nityaprahasitaḥ nityaprajalpitaḥ iti . yāvatā ābhīkṣṇye api vartate tatra api anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:120_8: eva arthaḥ syāt vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:120_9: tu ācāryaḥ maṅgalārthaḥ ca eva siddhaśabdaḥ āditaḥ prayuktaḥ bhaviṣyati śakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:120_10: ca enam nityaparyāyavācinam varṇayitum iti . ataḥ siddhaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ na nityaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:124_0: 30-32 atha kam punaḥ padārtham matvā eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ kriyate siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:124_1: ca iti . ākṛtim iti āha . kutaḥ etat . ākṛtiḥ hi nityā . dravyam anityam . atha dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:124_2: padārthe katham vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ . siddhe śabde arthasambandhe ca iti . nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:124_3: hi arthavatām arthaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ . atha vā dravye eva padārthe eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:124_4: nyāyyaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti. dravyam hi nityam ākṛtiḥ anityā . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:124_5: jñāyate . evam hi dṛśyate loke . mṛt kayā cit ākṛtyā yuktā piṇḍaḥ bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:124_6: upamṛdya ghaṭikāḥ kiryante . ghaṭikākṛtim upamṛdya kuṇḍikāḥ kriyante . tathā suvarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:124_7: kayā cit ākṛtyā yuktam piṇḍaḥ bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim upamṛdya rucakāḥ kriyante . rucakākṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:124_8: upamṛdya kaṭakāḥ kriyante . kaṭakākṛtim upmṛdya svastikāḥ kriyante . punaḥ āvṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:124_9: suvarṇapiṇḍaḥ punaḥ aparayā ākṛtyā yuktaḥ khadirāgārasavarṇe kuṇḍale bhavataḥ . ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:124_10: anyā ca anyā ca bhavati dravyam punaḥ tad eva . ākṛtyupamardena dravyam eva avaśiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:124_11: . ākṛtau api padārthe eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:124_12: nanu ca uktam ākṛtiḥ anityā iti . na etat asti . nityā ākṛtiḥ . katham . na kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:124_13: uparatā iti kṛtvā sarvatra uparatā bhavati . dravyāntarasthā tu upalabhyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:124_14: vā na idam eva nityalakṣaṇam dhruvam kūṭastham avicāli anapāyopajanavikāri anutpatti
GS24pmbhasuu:124_15: avṛddhi avyayayogi iti tan nityam iti . tat api nityam yasmin tattvam na vihanyate
GS24pmbhasuu:124_16: . kim punaḥ tattvam . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . ākṛtau api tattvam na vihanyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:124_17: vā kim naḥ etena idam nityam idam anityam iti . yat nityam tam padārtham matvā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:124_18: vigrahaḥ kriyate siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:124_19: śabdaḥ arthaḥ sambandhaḥ ca iti . lokataḥ . yat loke artham upādāya śabdān prayuñjate
GS24pmbhasuu:124_20: . na eṣām nirvṛttau yatnam kurvanti . ye punaḥ kāryāḥ bhāvāḥ nirvṛttau tāvat teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:124_21: yatnaḥ kriyate . tat yathā . ghaṭena kāryam kariṣyan kumbhakārakulam gatvā āha kuru
GS24pmbhasuu:124_22: ghaṭam . kāryam anena kariṣyāmi iti . na tadvat śabdān prayokṣyamāṇaḥ vaiyākaraṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:124_23: gatvā āha . kuru śabdān . prayokṣye iti . tāvati eva artham upādāya śabdān prayuñjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:128_0: 32-35 yadi tarhi lokaḥ eṣu pramāṇam kim śāstreṇa kriyate . lokataḥ arthaprayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:128_1: śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ . lokataḥ arthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:128_2: dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . kim idam dharmaniyamaḥ iti . dharmāya niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:128_3: dharmārthaḥ vā niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ dharmaprayojanaḥ vā niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:128_4: yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . priyataddhitāḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ . yathā loke vede ca iti prayoktavye
GS24pmbhasuu:128_5: yathā laukikavaidikeṣu iti prayuñjate . atha vā yuktaḥ eva taddhitārthaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:128_6: laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:128_7: grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ucyate . bhakṣyam ca nāma kṣutpratīghātārtham upādīyate . śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:128_8: ca anena śvamāṃsādibhiḥ api kṣut pratihantum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . idam bhakṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:128_9: . idam abhakṣyam iti . tathā khedāt strīṣu pravṛttiḥ bhavati . samānaḥ ca khedavigamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:128_10: gamyāyām ca agamyāyām ca . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:129_0: iyam gamyā iyam agamyā iti . vede khalu api payovrataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yavāgūvrataḥ rājanyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:129_1: āmikṣāvrataḥ vaiśyaḥ iti ucyate . vratam ca nāma abhyavahārārtham upādīyate . śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:129_2: ca anena śālimāṃsādīni api vratayitum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . tathā bailvaḥ khādiraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:129_3: vā yūpaḥ syāt iti ucyate . yūpaḥ ca nāma paśvanubandhārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:129_4: anena kim cit eva kāṣṭham ucchritya anucchritya vā paśuḥ anubanddhum . tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:129_5: kriyate . tathā agnau kapālāni adhiśritya abhimantrayate . bhṛgūṇām aṅgirasām gharmasya
GS24pmbhasuu:129_6: tapasā tapyadhvam iti . antareṇa api mantram agniḥ dahanakarmā kapālāni santāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:129_7: . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . evam kriyamāṇam abhyudayakāri bhavati iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:129_8: samānāyām arthagatau śabdena ca apaśabdena ca dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . śabdena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:129_9: arthaḥ abhidheyaḥ na apaśabdena iti . evam kriyamāṇam abhyudayakāri bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:133_0: 35-39 asti aprayuktaḥ . santi vai śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ . tat yathā ūṣa tera cakra peca
GS24pmbhasuu:133_1: iti . kim ataḥ yat santi aprayuktāḥ . prayogāt hi bhavān śabdānām sādhutvam adhyavasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:133_2: . ye idānīm aprayuktāḥ na amī sādhavaḥ syuḥ . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate santi
GS24pmbhasuu:133_3: vai śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . yadi santi na aprayuktāḥ . atha aprayuktāḥ na santi .
GS24pmbhasuu:133_4: santi ca aprayuktāḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . prayuñjānaḥ eva khalu bhavān āha santi
GS24pmbhasuu:133_5: śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ śabdānām prayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:133_6: sādhuḥ syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . santi iti tāvat brūmaḥ yat etān śāstravidaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_7: śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . aprayuktāḥ iti brūmaḥ yat loke aprayuktāḥ iti . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:133_8: kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ śabdānām prayoge sādhuḥ syāt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:133_9: brūmaḥ asmābhiḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kim tarhi . loke aprayuktāḥ iti . nanu ca bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:133_10: api abhyantaraḥ loke . abhyantaraḥ aham loke na tu aham lokaḥ . asti aprayuktaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:133_11: cet na arthe śabdaprayogāt . asti aprayuktaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:133_12: śabdaprayogāt . arthe śabdāḥ prayujyante . santi ca eṣām śabdānām arthāḥ yeṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:133_13: prayujyante . aprayogaḥ prayogānyatvāt . aprayogaḥ khalu eṣāṃ śabdānām nyāyyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:133_14: kutaḥ . prayogānyatvāt . yat eteṣām śabdānām arthe anyān śabdān prayuñjate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:133_15: yathā . ūṣa iti etasya śabdasya arthe kva yūyam uṣitāḥ . tera iti asya arthe kim
GS24pmbhasuu:133_16: yūyam tīrṇāḥ . cakra iti asya arthe kim yūyam kṛtavantaḥ . peca iti asya arthe kim
GS24pmbhasuu:133_17: yūyam pakvavantaḥ iti . aprayukte dīrghasattravat . yadi api aprayuktāḥ avaśyam dīrghasattravat
GS24pmbhasuu:133_18: lakṣaṇena anuvidheyāḥ . tat yathā . dīrghasattrāṇi vārṣaśatikāni vārṣasahasrikāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:133_19: ca . na ca adyatve kaḥ cit api vyavaharati . kevalam ṛṣisampradāyaḥ dharmaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:133_20: yājñikāḥ śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . sarve deśāntare . sarve khalu api ete śabdāḥ deśāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:133_21: prayujyante . na ca ete upalabhyante . upalabdhau yatnaḥ kriyatām . mahān hi śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:133_22: prayogaviṣayaḥ . saptadvīpā vasumatī trayaḥ lokāḥ catvāraḥ vedāḥ sāṅgāḥ sarahasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_23: bahudhā vibhinnāḥ ekaśatam adhvaryuśākhāḥ sahasravartmā sāmavedaḥ ekaviṃsatidhā bāhvṛcyam
GS24pmbhasuu:133_24: navadhā ātharvaṇaḥ vedaḥ vākovākyam itihāsaḥ purāṇam vaidyakam iti etāvān śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:133_25: prayogaviṣayaḥ . etāvantam śabdasya prayogaviṣayam ananuniśamya santi aprayuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_26: iti vacanam kevalam sāhasamātram . etasmin atimahati śabdasya prayogaviṣaye te te
GS24pmbhasuu:133_27: śabdāḥ tatra tatra niyataviṣayāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā . śavatiḥ gatikarmā kambojeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:133_28: eva bhāṣitaḥ bhavati . vikāre enam āryāḥ bhāṣante śavaḥ iti . hammatiḥ surāṣṭreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:133_29: raṃhatiḥ prācyamadhyeṣu gamim eva tu āryāḥ prayuñjate . dātiḥ lavanārthe prācyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:133_30: dātram udīcyeṣu . ye ca api ete bhavataḥ aprayuktāḥ abhimatāḥ śabdāḥ eteṣām api prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_31: dṛśyate . kva . vede . yat vaḥ revatīḥ revatyam tat ūṣa . yat me naraḥ śrutyam brahma
GS24pmbhasuu:133_32: cakra . yatra naḥ cakra jarasam tanunām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:137_0: 39-42 kim punaḥ śabdasya jñāne dharmaḥ āhosvit prayoge . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . jñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:137_1: dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ . jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:137_2: yaḥ hi śabdān jānāti apaśabdān api asau jānāti . yathā eva śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:137_3: apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ . atha vā bhūyān adharmaḥ prāpnoti .bhūyāṃsaḥ apaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_4: alpīyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ . ekaikasya śabdasya bahavaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . tat yathā . gauḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:137_5: asya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā iti evamādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . ācāre niyamaḥ . ācāre
GS24pmbhasuu:137_6: punaḥ ṛṣiḥ niyamam vedayate . te asurāḥ helayaḥ helayaḥ iti kurvantaḥ parābabhūvuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_7: iti . astu tarhi prayoge . prayoge sarvalokasya . yadi prayoge dharmaḥ sarvaḥ lokaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_8: abhyudayena yujyeta . kaḥ ca idānīm bhavataḥ matsaraḥ yadi sarvaḥ lokaḥ abhyudayena
GS24pmbhasuu:137_9: yujyeta . na khalu kaḥ cit matsaraḥ . prayatnānarthakyam tu bhavati . phalavatā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:137_10: nāma prayatnena bhavitavyam na ca prayatnaḥ phalāt vyatirecyaḥ . nanu ca ye kṛtaprayatnāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_11: te sādhīyaḥ śabdān prayokṣyante . te eva sādhīyaḥ abhyudayena yokṣyante . vyatirekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_12: api vai lakṣyate . dṛśyante hi kṛtaprayatnāḥ ca apravīṇāḥ akṛtaprayatnāḥ ca pravīṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_13: . tatra phalavyatirekaḥ api syāt . evam tarhi na api jñāne eva dharmaḥ na api prayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:137_14: eva . kim tarhi śāstrapūrvake prayoge abhyudayaḥ tat tulyam vedaśabdena . śāstrapūrvakam
GS24pmbhasuu:137_15: yaḥ śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate . tat tulyam vedaśabdena . vedaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_16: api evam abhivadanti . yaḥ agniṣṭomena yajate yaḥ u ca enam evam veda . yaḥ agnim
GS24pmbhasuu:137_17: nāciketam cinute yaḥ u ca enam evam veda . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:138_0: tat tulyam vedaśabdena iti . yathā vedaśabdāḥ niyamapūrvam adhītāḥ phalavantaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:138_1: evam yaḥ śāstrapūrvakam śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate iti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_2: astu jñāne eva dharmaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:138_3: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabdapramāṇakāḥ vayam . yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam . śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_4: ca śabdajñāne dharmam āha na apaśabdajñāne adharmam . yat ca punaḥ aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:138_5: na eva tat doṣāya bhavati na abhyudayāya . tat yathā . hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:138_6: eva doṣāya bhavanti na api abhyudayāya . atha vā abhyupāyaḥ eva apaśabdajñānam śabdajñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:138_7: . yaḥ apaśabdān jānāti śabdān api asau jānāti . tat evam jñāne dharmaḥ iti bruvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_8: arthāt āpannam bhavati apaśabdajñānapūrvake śabdajñāne dharmaḥ iti . atha vā kūpakhānakavat
GS24pmbhasuu:138_9: etat bhavati . tat yathā kūpakhānakaḥ khanan yadi api mṛdā pāṃsubhiḥ ca avakīrṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_10: bhavati saḥ apsu sañjātāsu tataḥ eva tam guṇam āsādayati yena saḥ ca doṣaḥ nirhaṇyate
GS24pmbhasuu:138_11: bhūyasā ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhavati evam iha api yadi api apaśabdajñāne adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_12: tathā api yaḥ tu asau śabdajñāne dharmaḥ tena saḥ ca doṣaḥ nirghāniṣyate bhūyasā
GS24pmbhasuu:138_13: ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate ācāre niyamaḥ iti yājñe karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:138_14: saḥ niyamaḥ . evam hi śrūyate . yarvāṇaḥ tarvāṇaḥ nāma ṛṣayaḥ babhūvuḥ pratyakṣadharmāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_15: parāparajñāḥ viditaveditavyāḥ adhigatayāthātathyāḥ . te tatrabhavantaḥ yat vā naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_16: tat vā naḥ iti proyoktavye yar vā ṇaḥ tar vā ṇaḥ iti prayuñjate yājñe punaḥ karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:138_17: na apabhāṣante . taiḥ punaḥ asuraiḥ yājñe karmaṇi apabhāṣitam . tataḥ te parābabhūtāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:142_0: 42-47 atha vyākaraṇam iti asya śabdasya kaḥ padārthaḥ . sūtram . sūtre vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:142_1: ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ anupapannaḥ . sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate vyākaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:142_2: sūtram iti . kim hi tat anyat sūtrāt vyākaraṇam yasya adaḥ sūtram syāt . śabdāpratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:142_3: . śabdānām ca apratipattiḥ prāpnoti vyākaraṇāt śabdān pratipadyāmahe iti . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:142_4: sūtrataḥ eva śabdān pratipadyante . kim tarhi . vyākhyānataḥ ca . nanu ca tat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:142_5: sūtram vigṛhītam vyākhyānam bhavati . na kevalāni carcāpadāni vyākhyanam vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:142_6: āt aic iti . kim tarhi . udāharaṇam pratyudāharaṇam vākyādhyāhāraḥ iti etat samuditam
GS24pmbhasuu:142_7: vyākhyānam bhavati . evam tarhi śabdaḥ . śabde lyuḍarthaḥ . yadi śabdaḥ vyākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:142_8: lyuḍarthaḥ na upapadyate vyākriyate anena iti vyākaraṇam . na hi śabdena kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:142_9: vyākriyate . kena tarhi . sūtreṇa . bhave . bhave ca taddhitaḥ na upapadyate vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:142_10: bhavaḥ yogaḥ vaiyākaraṇaḥ iti . na hi śabde bhavaḥ yogaḥ . kva tarhi . sūtre . proktādayaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:174_5: iha api āvṛttitaḥ anekāctvam bhaviṣyati . bhaved āvṛttitaḥ kāryam parihṛtam . iha

GS24pmbhasuu:174_7: . katham . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke ṛṣisahasram ekām kapilām ekaikaśaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:174_8: dattvā tayā sarve te sahasradakṣiṇaḥ saṃpannāḥ evam iha api anekāctvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:174_9: . yat api ucyate dravyavat ca upacārāḥ prāpnuvanti iti . bhavet yat asambhavi kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:174_10: tat na anekaḥ yugapat kuryāt . yat tu khalu sambhavi kāryam anekaḥ api tat yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:174_11: karoti . tat yathā ghaṭasya darśanam sparśanam vā . sambhavi ca idam kāryam akārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:174_12: uccāraṇam nāma anekaḥ api tat yugapat kariṣyati . ānyabhāvyam tu kālaśabdavyavāyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:174_13: . ānyabhāvyam tu akārasya . kutaḥ . kālaśabdavyavāyāt . kālavyavāyāt śabdavyavāyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:176_0: daṇḍaḥ . na ca ekasya ātmanaḥ vyavāyena bhavitavyam . bhavati cet bhavati ānyabhāvyam
GS24pmbhasuu:176_1: akārasya . yugapat ca deśapṛthaktvadarśanāt . yugapat ca deśapṛthaktvadarśanāt manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:176_2: ānyabhāvyam akārasya iti . yat ayam yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu upalabhyate . aśvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:178_0: arthaḥ iti . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne ca bhavati mathurāyām ca . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:178_1: punaḥ ime varṇāḥ śakunivat syuḥ . tat yathā śakunayaḥ āśugamitvāt purastāt utpatitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:178_2: paścāt dṛśyante evam ayam akāraḥ da iti atra dṛṣṭaḥ ṇḍa iti atra dṛśyate . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:178_3: śakyam . anityatvam evam syāt . nityāḥ ca śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:178_4: avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ . yadi ca ayam da iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:178_5: dṛṣṭaḥ ṇḍa iti atra dṛśyeta na ayam kūṭasthaḥ syāt . yadi punaḥ ime varṇāḥ ādityavat
GS24pmbhasuu:178_6: syuḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇsthaḥ yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:178_7: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:179_0: akāram api na upalabhate . kim kāraṇam . śrotropalabdhiḥ buddhinirgrāhyaḥ prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:179_1: abhijvalitaḥ ākāśadeśaḥ śabdaḥ ekam ca ākāśam . ākāśadeśāḥ api bahavaḥ . yāvatā bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:179_2: tasmāt ānyabhāvyam akārasya . ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham . avarṇākṛtiḥ upadiṣṭā sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:179_3: avarṇakulam grahīṣyati . tathā ivarṇākṛtiḥ . tathā uvarṇākṛtiḥ . tadvat ca taparakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:179_4: . evam ca kṛtvā taparāḥ kriyante . ākṛtigrahaṇena atiprasaktam iti . nanu ca savarṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:179_5: atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā taparāḥ kriyeran . pratyākhyāyate tat :
GS24pmbhasuu:180: savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam ākṛtigrahaṇāt ananyatvāt ca iti . halgrahaṇeṣu ca . kim . ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham iti eva . jhalo jhali :
GS24pmbhasuu:181: avāttām avāttam avātta yatra etat na asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:182: aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . rūpasāmanyāt vā . rūpasāmānyāt vā siddham . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:183: tān eva śāṭakān ācchādayāmaḥ ye mathurāyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:184: tān eva śālīn bhuñjmahe ye magadheṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:185: tat eva idam bhavataḥ kārṣāpaṇam yat mathurāyām gṛhītam . anyasmin ca anyasmin ca rūpasāmānyāt tat eva idam iti bhavati . evam iha api rūpasāmānyāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:189_0: 70-79 ḷkāropadeśaḥ kimarthaḥ . kim viśeṣeṇa ḷkāropadeśaḥ codyate na punaḥ anyeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:189_1: api varṇānām upadeśaḥ codyate . yadi kim cit anyeṣām api varṇānām upadeśe prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:189_2: asti ḷkāropadeśasya api tat bhavitum arhati . kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:189_3: . asya hi ḷkārasya alpīyān ca eva prayogaviṣayaḥ yaḥ ca api prayogaviṣayaḥ saḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:189_4: kḷpisthasya . kḷpeḥ ca latvam asiddham . tasya asiddhatvāt ṛkārasya eva ackāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:189_5: bhaviṣyanti . na arthaḥ ḷkāropadeśena . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:190_1: aśaktijānukaraṇārthaḥ plutyādyarthaḥ ca . yadṛcchāśabdārthaḥ tāvat . yadṛcchayā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:190_2: cit ḷtakaḥ nāma tasmin ackāryāṇi yathā syuḥ . dadhi ḷtaka dehi . madhu ḷtaka dehi
GS24pmbhasuu:190_3: . udaṅ ḷtakaḥ agamat . pratyaṅ ḷtakaḥ agamat . catuṣṭayī śabdānām pravṛttiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:191: jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ kriyāśabdāḥ yadṛcchāśabdāḥ caturthāḥ . aśaktijānukaraṇārthaḥ . aśaktyā kayā cit brāhmaṇyā ṛtakaḥ iti prayoktavye ḷtakaḥ iti prayuktam . tasya anukaraṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:192: brāhmaṇī ḷtakaḥ iti āha . kumārī ḷtakaḥ iti āha iti . plutādyarthaḥ ca ḷkāropadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . ke punaḥ plutādayaḥ . plutidvirvacanasvaritāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:194_0: prakḷptaḥ . plutyādiṣu kāryeṣu kḷpeḥ latvam siddham . tasya siddhatvāt ackāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:194_1: na sidhyanti . tasmāt ḷkāropadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni . nyāyyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:194_2: kalpanam sañjñādiṣu . nyāyyasya ṛtakaśabdasya bhāvāt kalpanam sañjñādiṣu sādhu manyante
GS24pmbhasuu:194_3: . ṛtakaḥ eva asau na ḷtakaḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:195_0: nyāyyaḥ ṛtakaśabdaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ asti . saḥ kalpayitavyaḥ sādhuḥ sañjñādiṣu . ṛtakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:195_1: eva asau na ḷtakaḥ . ayam tarhi yadṛcchāśabdaḥ aparihāryaḥ . ḷphiḍaḥ ḷphiḍḍaḥ . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:195_2: api ṛphiḍaḥ ṛphiḍḍaḥ ca . katham . artipravṛttiḥ ca eva loke lakṣyate phiḍiphiḍḍau
GS24pmbhasuu:195_3: auṇādikau pratyayau . trayī ca śabdānām pravṛttiḥ . jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ kriyāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:195_4: iti . na santi yadṛcchāśabdāḥ . anyathā kṛtvā prayojanam uktam anyathā kṛtvā parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:195_5: . santi yadṛcchāśabdāḥ iti kṛtvā prayojanam uktam . na santi iti parihāraḥ . samāne
GS24pmbhasuu:195_6: ca arthe śāstrānvitaḥ aśāstrānvitasya nivartakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . devadattaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:195_7: devadiṇṇaśabdaṃ nivartayati na gāvyādīn . na eṣa doṣaḥ . pakṣāntaraiḥ api parihārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:195_8: bhavanti . anukaraṇam śiṣṭāśiṣṭāpratiṣiddheṣu yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . anukaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:195_9: hi śiṣṭasya sādhu bhavati . aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddhasya vā na eva tat doṣāya bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:195_10: abhyudayāya . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:196: yaḥ evam asau dadāti yaḥ evam asau yajate yaḥ evam asau adhīte iti tasya anukurvan dadyāt ca yajeta ca adhīyīta ca saḥ abhyudayena yujyate . vede api :
GS24pmbhasuu:197_0: ye evam viśvasṛjaḥ sattrāṇi adhyāsate iti teṣām anukurvan tadvat sattrāṇi adhyāsīta
GS24pmbhasuu:197_1: saḥ api abhyudayena yujyate . aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddham . yaḥ evam asau hikkati yaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:197_2: asau hasati yaḥ evam asau kaṇḍūyati iti tasya anukurvan hikket ca haset ca kaṇḍūyet
GS24pmbhasuu:197_3: ca na eva tat doṣāya syāt na abhyudayāya . yaḥ tu khalu evam asau brāhmaṇam hanti
GS24pmbhasuu:197_4: evam asau surām pibati iti tasya anukurvan brāhmaṇam hanyāt surām vā pibet saḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:197_5: manye patitaḥ syāt . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yaḥ ca evam hanti yaḥ ca anuhanti ubhau
GS24pmbhasuu:197_6: tau hataḥ . yaḥ ca pibati yaḥ ca anupibati ubhau tau pibataḥ . yaḥ tu khalu evam
GS24pmbhasuu:197_7: asau brāhmaṇam hanti evam asau surām pibati iti tasya anukurvan snātānuliptaḥ mālyaguṇakaṇṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:197_8: kadalīstambham chindyāt payaḥ vā pibet na sa manye patitaḥ . evam iha api yaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:197_9: asau apaśabdam prayuṅkte iti tasya anukurvan apaśabdam prayuñjīta saḥ api apaśabdabhāk
GS24pmbhasuu:197_10: syāt . ayam tu anyaḥ apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:197_11: ca apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ apaśabdaḥ bhavati . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:197_12: yaḥ hi manyeta apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ apaśabdaḥ bhavati iti apaśabdaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:197_13: tasya apaśabdaḥ syāt . na ca eṣaḥ apaśabdaḥ . ayam khalu api bhūyaḥ anukaraṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:197_14: aparihāryaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . sādhu ḷkāram adhīte . madhu ḷkāram adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:197_15: iti . kvasthasya punaḥ etat anukaraṇam . kḷpisthasya . yadi kḷpisthasya kḷpeḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:197_16: latvam asiddham tasya asiddhatvāt ṛkāre eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . bhavet tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:197_17: na arthaḥ syāt . ayam tu anyaḥ kḷpisthapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:197_18: . na kartavyaḥ . idam avaśyam vaktavyam . prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:198_0: āha . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt . agnī iti āha . īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:198_1: iti pragṛhyasañjñā yathā syāt . yadi prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti ucyate apaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:198_2: eva asau bhavati kumārīḷtakaḥ iti āha . brahmaṇī ḷtakaḥ iti āha . apaśabdaḥ hi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:198_3: prakṛtiḥ . na cāpaśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ . na hi apaśabdāḥ upadiśyante . na ca anupadiṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:198_4: prakṛtiḥ asti. ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt plutyādayaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:198_5: bhavati iti plutyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . yadi ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:198_6: rājñaḥ ka ca rājakīyam allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:198_7: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti vakṣyāmi . yadi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti ucyate kḷptaśikha iti
GS24pmbhasuu:198_8: plutaḥ na prāpnoti . na hi atra ṛkāraḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . rephaḥ . ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:198_9: api atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kṛpa uḥ raḥ laḥ kṛpo
GS24pmbhasuu:198_10: ro laḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam . rājñaḥ ka ca rājakīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:198_11: allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti iti . vakṣyati etat . śvādīnām prasāraṇe nakārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:198_12: anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham iti . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate . allopaḥ anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:198_13: nakārāntasya iti . iha tarhi kḷptaśikha iti anṛtaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ravatpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:198_14: ca . ravatpratiṣedhāt ca etat sidhyati . guroḥ aravataḥ iti vakṣyāmi . yadi aravataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:200: atra na prāpnoti . guroḥ aravataḥ hrasvasya iti vakṣyāmi . saḥ eṣaḥ sūtrabhedena ḷkāraḥ plutyādyarthaḥ san pratyākhyāyate . sā eṣā mahataḥ vaṃśastambāt laṭvā anukṛṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:204: 79-84 idam vicāryate . imāni sandhyakṣarāṇi taparāṇi vā upadiśyeran . et ,
GS24pmbhasuu:208_0: c iti . ataparāṇi vā yathānyāsam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:208_1: cet taparoccāraṇam . sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ cet taparoccāraṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:208_2: plutyādiṣu ajvidhiḥ . plutyādiṣu ajāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati . gotrāta nautrāta
GS24pmbhasuu:208_3: iti atra anaci ca iti acaḥ uttarasya yaraḥ dve bhavataḥ iti dvirvacanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:208_4: . iha ca pratyaṅ aitikayana udaṅ aupagava iti aci iti ṅamuṭ na prāpnoti . plutasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:208_5: ca . plutasañjñā ca na sidhyati . aitikayana aupagava . ūkalaḥ ac hrasvadīrghaplutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:208_6: iti plutasañjñā na prāpnoti . santu tarhi ataparāṇi . atapare ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:208_7: . yadi ataparāṇi ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ecaḥ hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:208_8: ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti . nanu ca yasya api taparāṇi tena api
GS24pmbhasuu:208_9: etat vaktavyam . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:208_10: tayoḥ hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau . mā kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:209: aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt iti . yadi pratyākhyānapakṣaḥ idam api pratyākhyāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:210_0: siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt iti . nanu ca eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:210_1: ca . na tau staḥ . yadi hi tau syātām tau eva ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām
GS24pmbhasuu:210_2: sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham okāram ca adhīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:213_0: śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:213_1: loke na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . ekādeśe dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:213_2: . ekādeśe dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . āt guṇaḥ dīrghaḥ . vṛddhiḥ eci dīrghaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:213_3: kim prayojanam . āntaryataḥ trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:228_0: aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ . tat tarhi dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . upariṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:228_1: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . akaḥ savarṇe ekaḥ bhavati . tataḥ dīrghaḥ . dīrghaḥ ca sa
GS24pmbhasuu:228_2: bhavati yaḥ saḥ ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ iti evam nirdiṣṭaḥ iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . paśum ,
GS24pmbhasuu:230_0: pacanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat paśum iti ami ekaḥ iti iyatā siddham . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:230_1: ayam evam siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yathājātīyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:230_2: pūrvaḥ tathājātīyakaḥ ubhayoḥ yathā syāt iti . viddham iti pūrvaḥ iti eva anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:230_3: . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:230_4: yat ayam halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya dīrghatvam śāsti . pacanti iti ataḥ guṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:230_5: paraḥ iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat rūpagrahaṇam karoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:230_6: etat prayojanam yathājātīyakam parasya rūpam tathājātīyakam ubhayoḥ yathā syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:230_7: . iha tarhi khaṭvarśyaḥ mālarśyaḥ iti dīrghavacanāt akāraḥ na ānantaryāt ekākaukārau
GS24pmbhasuu:230_8: na . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vigṛhītasya śravaṇam prasajyeta . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:230_9: doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:230_10: . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhīḥ āt aic dīrghaḥ . at eṅ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:230_11: dīrghaḥ iti . tat tarhi dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kasmāt eva āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:230_12: trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninam trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . tapare guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:230_13: . nanu ca bhoḥ taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:230_14: iti . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:231_0: yavaḥ stavaḥ . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:231_1: . kim dakāre prayojanam . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:231_2: dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:235_0: 84-93 idam vicāryate . ye ete varṇeṣu varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇāntarasamānākṛtayaḥ eteṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:235_1: avayavagrahaṇena grahaṇam syāt vā na vā iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . iha samudāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:235_2: api upadiśyante avayavāḥ api . abhyantaraḥ ca samudāye avayavaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:236_0: vṛkṣaḥ pracalan saha avayavaiḥ pracalati . tatra samudāyasthasya avayavasya avayavagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:236_1: grahaṇam syāt vā na vā iti jāyate vicāraṇā . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:236_2: varṇagrahaṇena cet sandhyakṣre samānākṣaravidhipratiṣedhaḥ . varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:236_3: iti cet sandhyakṣare samānākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . sa pratiṣedhyaḥ : agne ,
GS24pmbhasuu:238: udakam . akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . dīrghe hrasvavidhipratiṣedhaḥ . dīrghe hrasvākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . sa pratiṣedhyaḥ . grāmaṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:240_0: pralūya . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_1: jñāpayati na dīrghe hrasvāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam dīrghāt che tukam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:240_2: . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . padāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:240_3: vā iti vibhāṣām vakṣyāmi iti . yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti . itarathā hi dīrghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:240_4: padāntāt vā iti eva brūyāt . iha tarhi khaṭvābhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:243: iti aisbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi yātā vātā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:244_0: ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca atra api taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:244_1: eva na bhaviṣyati . asti hi anyat taparakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . sarvasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:244_2: mā bhūt iti . atha kriyamāṇe api tapare parasya lope kṛte pūrvasya kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:244_3: . paralopasya sthānivadbhāvāt asiddhatvāt ca . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:244_4: nākārasthasya akārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:244_5: anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . kitkaraṇe etat prayojanam kiti iti ākārlopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:244_6: yathā syāt iti . yadi ca ākārasthasya api akārlopaḥ syāt kitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:244_7: . parasya akārasya lope kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpe hi siddham rūpam syāt: godaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:245_0: kambaladaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ nākārasthasya akārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:245_1: kakāram anubandham karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . tundaśokayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:245_2: parimṛjāpanudoḥ iti . yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham kakāram anubandham karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:245_3: . ekavarṇavat ca . ekavarṇavat ca dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:245_4: . vācā tarati iti dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ṭhan mā bhūt iti . iha ca vācaḥ nimittam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:246: tasya nimittam saṃyogotpāttau iti dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ yat mā bhūt iti . atra api gonaugrahaṇam jñāpakam dīrghāt dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ na bhavati iti . ayam tu sarveṣām parihāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:247: na avyapavṛktasya avayave tadvidhiḥ yathā dravyeṣu . na avyapavṛktasya avayavsya avayavāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati yathā dravyeṣu . tat yathā dravyeṣu :
GS24pmbhasuu:248_0: saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ bhavanti iti na saptadaśāratnimātram kāṣṭham agnau abhyādhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:248_1: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . pratyṛcam ca eva hi tat karma codyate asambhavaḥ ca agnau vedyām
GS24pmbhasuu:248_2: ca . yathā tarhi saptadaśa prādeśamātrīḥ aśvatthīḥ samidhaḥ abhyādadhīta iti na saptadaśaprādeśamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:248_3: kāṣṭham abhyādhīyate . atra api pratipravaṇam ca etat karma codyate tulyaḥ ca asambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:248_4: agnau vedyām ca . yathā tarhi tailam na vikretavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:249: māṃsam na vikretavyam iti . vyapavṛtkam ca na vikrīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:250: avyapavṛktam ca gāvaḥ ca sarṣapāḥ ca vikriyante . tathā lomanakham spṛṣṭvā śaucam kartavyam iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:251_0: vyapavṛktam spṛṣṭvā niyogataḥ kartavyam avyapavṛkte kāmacāraḥ . yatra tarhi vyapavargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:251_1: asti . kva ca vyapavargaḥ asti . sandhyakṣareṣu . sandhyakṣareṣu vivṛtatvāt . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:251_2: atra avarṇam vivṛtataram tat anyasmāt avarṇāt . ye*api ivarṇovarṇe vivṛtatare te*anyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:251_3: ivarṇovarṇābhyām . athavā punaḥ na gṛhyante . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:251_4: ṛkāragrahaṇam . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu ṛkārasya grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:252: ṛkāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : ānṛdhatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:253: ānṛdhuḥ iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante dvihalaḥ iti eva tasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:254: . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . dvihalgrahaṇam na kariṣyate . tasmāt nuṭ bhavati iti eva . yadi na kriyate āṭatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:255: āṭuḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . aśnotigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aśnoteḥ eva avarṇopadhasya na anyasya avarṇopadhasya iti . lādeśe ca ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛpaḥ raḥ laḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:256: ṛkārasya ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : kḷptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:257: kḷptavān iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante raḥ iti eva tasya siddham . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . ṛkāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . katham . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kṛpa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:260: laḥ kṛpo ro laḥ iti . atha vā ubhayataḥ sphoṭamātram nirdiśyate . raśruteḥ laśrutiḥ bhavati iti . vināme ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade ,
GS24pmbhasuu:261: ṛkārāt ca iti vaktayvam iha api yathā syāt : mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:262_0: pitṝṇām iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante raṣābhyām iti eva tasya siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:262_1: . yat tat rephāt param bhakteḥ tena vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . aḍvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:262_2: iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . varṇaikadeśāḥ ke varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante . ye vyapavṛktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:262_3: api varṇāḥ bhavanti . yat ca api rephāt param bhakteḥ na tat kva cit api vyapavṛktam
GS24pmbhasuu:262_4: dṛśyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:262_5: vyavāye . vyavāye ca raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ aṭkupvāṅnumbhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:262_6: idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . etaiḥ eva ākṣarasamamnāyikaiḥ vyavāye na anyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:262_7: iti . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:262_8: ṛkārāt naḥ ṇatvam iti yat ayam kṣubhādiṣu nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:263_0: nārnamaniḥ . yat tarhi tṛpnotiśabdam paṭhati . yat ca api nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:263_1: . nanu ca uktam vṛddhyartham etat syāt iti . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:263_2: . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ṛto
GS24pmbhasuu:263_3: naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati . tataḥ chandasi avagrahāt . ṛtaḥ iti eva . plutau aicaḥ idutau .
GS24pmbhasuu:263_4: etat ca vaktavyam . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante guroḥ ṭeḥ iti eva plutyā tasya siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:263_5: yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva . tulyarūpe
GS24pmbhasuu:263_6: saṃyoge dvivyañjanavidhiḥ . tulyarūpe saṃyoge dvivyañjanāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati : kukkuṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:265_0: pittam iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante tasya dvau kakārau dvau pakārau dvau takārau .
GS24pmbhasuu:265_1: yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api dvau kakārau dvau pakārau dvau takārau . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:265_2: mātrākālaḥ atra gamyate . na ca mātrikam vyañjanam asti . anupadiṣṭam sat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:265_3: śakyam vijñātum . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra etat na asti aṇ savarṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:265_4: gṛhṇāti iti iha tu katham sayṃyantā savṃvatsaraḥ yalṃ lokam talṃ lokam iti yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:265_5: etat asti aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . atra api mātrākalaḥ gṛhyate na ca mātrikam vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:265_6: asti . anupadiṣṭam sat katham śakyam pratipattum .
GS24pmbhasuu:269_0: 93-94 sarve varṇāḥ sakṛt upadiṣṭāḥ . ayam hakāraḥ dviḥ upadiśyate pūrvaḥ ca paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:269_1: ca . yadi punaḥ pūrvaḥ eva upadiśyeta paraḥ eva vā . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . hakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:269_2: paropadeśe aḍgrahaṇeṣu hagrahaṇam . hakārasya paropadeśe aḍgrahaṇeṣu hagrahaṇam kartavyam . ātaḥ aṭi nityam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:271: dīrghāt aṭi samānapade . hakāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:272: mahāṃ hi saḥ . uttve ca . uttve ca hakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . ataḥ roḥ aplutāt aplute ,
GS24pmbhasuu:273: haśi ca . hakāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : puruṣaḥ hasati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:274_0: brāhmaṇaḥ hasati iti . astu tarhi pūrvopadeśaḥ . pūrvopadeśe kittvakseḍvidhayaḥ jhalgrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:274_1: ca . yadi pūrvopadeśaḥ kittvam vidheyam . snihitvā snehitvā sisnihiṣati sisnehiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:274_2: . ralaḥ vyupadhāt halādeḥ iti kittvam na prāpnoti . ksavidhiḥ . ksaḥ ca vidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:274_3: . adhukṣat alikṣat . śalaḥ igupadhāt aniṭaḥ ksaḥ iti ksaḥ na prāpnoti . iḍvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:274_4: . iṭ ca vidheyaḥ . rudihi svapihi . valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ na prāpnoti. jhalgrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:274_5: ca . kim . ahakārāṇi syuḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalaḥ jhali iti iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:275: adāgdhām adāgdham . tasmāt pūrvaḥ ca upadeṣṭavyaḥ paraḥ ca . yadi ca kim cit anyatra api upadeśe prayojanam asti tatra api upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:280_0: ayam rephaḥ yakāravakārābhyām pūrvaḥ eva upadiśyeta ha ra ya vaṭ iti paraḥ eva vā
GS24pmbhasuu:280_1: yathānyāsam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:280_2: . rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anunāsikasya : svaḥ nayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:281: prātaḥ nayati iti yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ vā iti anunāsikaḥ prāpnoti . dvirvacanasya : bhadrahradaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:282: madrahradaḥ iti yaraḥ iti dvirvacanam prāpnoti . parasavarṇasya : kuṇḍam rathena ,
GS24pmbhasuu:283_0: vanam rathena . anusvārasya yayi iti parasavarṇaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:283_1: . pūrvopadeśe kittvapratiṣedhaḥ vyalopavacanam ca . yadi pūrvopadeśaḥ kittvam pratiṣedhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:283_2: . devitvā dideviṣati . ralaḥ vyupadhāt iti kittvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:283_3: evam vijñāyate ralaḥ vyupadhāt iti . kim tarhi . ralaḥ avvyupadhāt iti . kim idam
GS24pmbhasuu:283_4: avvyupadhāt iti . avakārāntāt vyuvpadhāt avvyupadhāt iti . vyalopavacanam ca . vyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:285_0: jīradānuḥ . vali iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . rephaḥ api atra nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:285_1: . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti rephe ca vali ca iti . atha vā punaḥ astu paropadeśaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:285_2: ca uktam rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ iti . anunāsikaparasavarṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:285_3: tāvat pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ . rephoṣmaṇām savarṇāḥ na santi . dvirvacane api na
GS24pmbhasuu:285_4: imau rahau kāryiṇau dvirvacanasya . kim tarhi . nimittam imau rahau dvirvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:285_5: . tat yathā . brāhmaṇāḥ bhojyantām . māṭharakauṇḍinyau pariveviṣṭām iti. na idānīm tau bhuñjāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:289_0: 97-101 idam vicāryate . ime ayogavāhāḥ na kva cit upadiśyante śrūyante ca . teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:289_1: kāryārthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . ke punaḥ ayogavāhāḥ . visarjanīyajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyānusvārānunāsikyayamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:289_2: . katham punaḥ ayogavāhāḥ . yat ayuktāḥ vahanti anupadiṣṭāḥ ca śrūyante . kva punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:289_3: eṣām upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . ayogavāhānām aṭsu ṇatvam . ayogavāhānām aṭsu upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:291_0: aḍvyavāye iti ṇatvam siddham bhavati . śarṣu jaśbhāvaṣatve . śarṣu upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:291_1: . kim prayojanam . jaśbhāvaṣatve . ayam ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:291_2: jaśtve kṛte ubjitā ubjitum iti etat rūpam yathā syāt . yadi ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:291_3: paṭhyate ubjijiṣati iti upadhmānīyādeḥ eva dvirvacanam prāpnoti. dakāropadhe punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:291_4: nandrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti pratiṣedhasḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi dakāropadhaḥ paṭhyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:292_0: ubjitā ubjitum iti . asiddhe bhaḥ udjeḥ . idam asti stoḥ ścunā ścuḥ iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:292_1: bhaḥ udjeḥ . udjeḥ ścunā sannipāte bhaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:292_2: . nipātanāt eva siddham . kim nipātanam . bhujanyubjau paṇyupatapayoḥ iti . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:293_0: samudgaḥ iti . akutvaviṣaye tat nipātanam . atha vā na etat ubjeḥ rūpam . gameḥ dvyuparsargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:293_1: ḍaḥ vidhīyate . abhyudgataḥ abhyudgaḥ . samudgataḥ samudgaḥ iti . ṣatvam ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:293_2: . sarpiḥṣu dhanuḥṣu . śarvyavāye iti ṣatvam siddham bhavati . numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:293_3: api iti visarjanīyagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . numaḥ ca api tarhi grahaṇam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:293_4: akartum . katham sarpīṃṣi dhanūṃṣi . anusvāre kṛte śarvyavāye iti eva siddham . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:293_5: numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam anusvāraviśeṣaṇam numgrahaṇam numaḥ yaḥ anusvāraḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:294_0: puṃsu iti . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . aviśeṣeṇa saṃyogopadhāsañjñālontyadvirvacanasthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:294_1: . aviśeṣeṇa saṃyogasañjñā prayojanam . ūbjaka . halaḥ anantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ iti saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:294_2: saṃyoge guru iti gurusañjñā guroḥ iti plutaḥ bhavati . upadhāsañjñā ca prayojanam . duṣkṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:297_0: duṣpītam . idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya iti ṣatvam siddham bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:297_1: prayojanam . na idudupadhagrahaṇanena visarjanīyaḥ viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:297_2: viśeṣyate . idudupadhasya sakārasya yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . atha vā upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:297_3: na kariṣyate . idudbhyām tu visarjanīyam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . idudbhyām uttarasya visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:297_4: iti . alaḥ antyavidhiḥ prayojanam . vṛkṣaḥ tarati . plakṣaḥ tarati . alaḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:297_5: vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti alaḥ antyasya satvam siddham bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam

GS24pmbhasuu:355_8: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt . na hi padāntāḥ pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu

GS24pmbhasuu:355_10: pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .acaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:355_11: . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ eva hi pragṛhyāḥ bhavanti . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:355_12: sandehaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:355_13: . na hi uḥ sthāne pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti kartrartham hartrartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:355_14: . kim ca syāt . yadi atra raparatvam syāt dvayoḥ rephayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:355_15: yamām yami lopaḥ iti evam ekasya atra lopaḥ bhavati. vibhāṣā saḥ lopaḥ . vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:355_16: śravaṇam prasajyeta . ayam tarhi nityaḥ lopaḥ raḥ ri iti . padāntasya iti evam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:355_17: . na śakyaḥ padāntasya vijñātum . iha hi lopaḥ na syāt jargṛdheḥ laṅ ajarghāḥ pāspardheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:355_18: apāspāḥ iti . iha tarhi mātṝṇām pitṝṇām iti raparatvam prasajyeta . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:355_19: jñāpayati na atra raparatvam bhavati iti yat ayam ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:355_20: karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . dhātugrahaṇasya etat prayojanam . iha mā bhūt : mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:356_0: pitṝṇām iti . yadi ca atra raparatvam syāt dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . raparatve
GS24pmbhasuu:356_1: kṛte anantyatvāt ittvam na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na atra raparatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:356_2: iti tataḥ dhātugrahaṇam karoti . iha api tarhi ittvam na prāpnoti cikīrṣati jihīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:356_3: iti . mā bhūt evam . upadhāyāḥ ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:357_0: pitṝṇām iti . tasmāt tatra dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . evam tarhi aṇgrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:357_1: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . uḥ ac raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:357_2: eva brūyāt . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:358_0: aṇuditsavarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti . asandigdham pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti. kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:358_1: . savarṇe aṇ taparam hi uḥ ṛt . yat ayam uḥ ṛt iti ṛkāram taparam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:358_2: ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa . iṇgrahaṇeṣu tarhi sandehaḥ . asandigdham pareṇa na pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:358_3: iti. kutaḥ etat . yvoḥ anyatra pareṇa iṇ syāt . yatra icchati pūrveṇa sammṛdya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:358_4: tatra karoti yvoḥ iti . tat ca guru bhavati . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tatra vibhaktinirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:358_5: sammṛdya grahaṇe ardhacatasraḥ mātrāḥ . pratyāhāragrahaṇe punaḥ tisraḥ mātrāḥ . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:358_6: ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:358_7: ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti . kim punaḥ varṇotsattau iva ṇakāraḥ dviḥ anubadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:358_8: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:358_9: hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti. aṇuditsavarṇam parihāya pūrveṇa aṇgrahaṇam pareṇa iṇgrahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:362_2: ñakāreṇa halaḥ yañām yañi lopaḥ iti . na evam śakyam. jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:362_3: jhakārabhakāryoḥ lopaḥ prasajyeta . na jhakārabhakārau jhakārabhakārayoḥ staḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:362_4: pumaḥ khayyi ampare iti . etat api astu ñakāreṇa pumaḥ khayyi añpare iti . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:362_5: śakyam . jhakārabhakārapare hi khayyi ruḥ prasajyeta . na jhakārabhakāraparaḥ khay
GS24pmbhasuu:362_6: asti .katham ṅamaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅamuṭ nityam iti . etat api astu ñakāreṇa ṅañaḥ hrasvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:362_7: aci ṅañuṭ nityam iti . na evam śakyam . jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ api hi padāntayoḥ jhakārabhakārau
GS24pmbhasuu:362_8: āgamau syātām . na jhakārabhakārau padāntau staḥ . evam api pañca āgamāḥ trayaḥ āgaminau
GS24pmbhasuu:362_9: vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . santu tāvat yeṣām āgamānām āgaminaḥ santi
GS24pmbhasuu:362_10: . jhakārabhakārau padāntau na staḥ iti kṛtvā āgamau api na bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:366_0: 117 atha kim idam akṣaram iti . akṣaram na kṣaram vidyāt . na kṣīyate na kṣarati
GS24pmbhasuu:366_1: iti vā akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā saraḥ akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā punaḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ saranpratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:366_2: . varṇam vā āhuḥ pūrvasūtre . atha vā pūrvasūtre varṇasya akṣaram iti sañjñā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:370_0: 118-120 kimartham idam upadiśyate . atha kimartham idam upadiśyate . varṇajñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:370_1: vāgviṣayaḥ yatra brahma vartate . tadartham iṣṭadbuddhyartham laghvartham ca upadiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:370_2: . saḥ ayam akṣarasamāmnāyaḥ vāksamāmnāyaḥ puṣpitaḥ phalitaḥ candratārakavat pratimaṇḍitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:370_3: veditavyaḥ brahmarāśiḥ . sarvavedapuṇyaphalāvāptiḥ ca asya jñāne bhavati . mātāpitarau
GS24pmbhasuu:374_0: 121-123 kutvam kasmāt na bhavati coḥ kuḥ padasya iti . bhatvāt . katham bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:374_1: . ayasmayādīni chandasi iti . chandasi iti ucyate . na ca idam chandaḥ . chandovat
GS24pmbhasuu:374_2: sūtrāṇi bhavanti . yadi bhasañjñā vṛddhiḥ ād aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti jaśtvam api na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:374_3: . ubhayasañjñāni api chandāṃsi dṛśyante . tat yathā . saḥ suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:374_4: . padatvāt kutvam bhatvāt jaśvtam na bhavati . evam iha api bhatvāt kutvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:379_0: vṛddhiḥ iti evam ye ākāraikāraukārāḥ bhāvyante teṣām grahaṇam āhosvit ādaijmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:379_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tadbhāvitagrahaṇam śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ iti vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ chaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:379_2: prāpnoti . āmramayam śālamayam vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ mayaṭ na prāpnoti . āmraguptāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:379_3: śālaguptayaniḥ vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ phiñ na prāpnoti . atha aijmātrasya grahaṇam sarvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:379_4: bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:379_5: iha ca tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ yāvadbhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:379_6: prāpnoti . astu tarhi aijmātrasya . nanu ca uktam sarvaḥ bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:379_7: sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:379_8: vṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhau iti . katham tarhi . uttarapadasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:379_9: evam prakṛtya yā vṛddhiḥ tadvati uttarapade iti evam etat vijñāyate . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:379_10: etat evam vijñeyam . tadbhāvitagrahaṇe sati api iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:380_0: sarvaḥ kārakaḥ sarvakārakaḥ iti . yad api ucyate iha tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:380_1: yāvadbhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti iti na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:380_2: . na evam vijñāyate vṛddheḥ nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittasya iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:380_3: tarhi . vṛddheḥ nimittam yasmin saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:380_4: ca vṛddheḥ nimittam. yaḥ asau kakāraḥ ṇakāraḥ ñakāraḥ vā . atha vā yaḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:380_5: vṛddheḥ nimittam . kaḥ ca kṛtsnāyāḥ vṛddheḥ nimittam . yaḥ trayāṇām ākāraikāraukārāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:384_0: 125-133 sañjñādhikāraḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . atha sañjñā iti prakṛtya vṛddhyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:384_1: śabdāḥ paṭhitavyāḥ . kim prayojanam . sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . vṛddhyādīnām śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:384_2: sañjñā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā loke .
GS24pmbhasuu:384_3: akriyamāṇe hi sañjñādhikāre vṛddhyādīnām sañjñā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ na syāt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:384_4: idānīm bahusūtram anarthakam syāt . anarthakam iti āha . katham . yathā loke . loke
GS24pmbhasuu:384_5: hi arthavanti ca anarthakāni ca vākyāni dṛśyante . arthavanti tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:385_0: devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām daṇḍena . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . anarthakāni
GS24pmbhasuu:385_1: ca . daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:385_2: sphaiyakṛtasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ ca . kriyamāṇe api sañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:385_3: sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kutaḥ hi etat vṛddhiśabdaḥ sañjñā ādaicaḥ sañjñinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:385_4: iti . na punaḥ ādaicaḥ sañjñā vṛddhiśabdaḥ sañjñī iti . yat tāvat ucyate sañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:385_5: kartavyaḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ iti na kartavyaḥ . ācāryācārāt sañjñāsiddhiḥ . ācāryācārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:385_6: sañjñāsiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kim idam ācāryācārāt . ācāryāṇām upacārāt . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:385_7: . tat yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:386: mātāpitarau putrasya jātasya saṃvṛte avakāśe nāma kurvāte devadattaḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . tayoḥ upacārāt anye api jānanti iyam asya sañjñā iti . vede :
GS24pmbhasuu:387_0: yājñikāḥ sañjñām kurvanti sphyaḥ yūpaḥ caṣālaḥ iti . tatrabhavatām upacārāt anye
GS24pmbhasuu:387_1: api jānanti iyam asya sañjñā iti . apare punaḥ sici vṛddhiḥ iti uktvā ākāraikāraukārān
GS24pmbhasuu:388_0: yayā pratyāyyante sā sañjñā ye pratīyante te sañjñinaḥ iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:388_1: api sañjñādhikāre sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_2: . sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ siddhaḥ . kutaḥ . ācāryācārāt eva . uktaḥ ācāryācāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_3: . anākṛtiḥ . atha vā anākṛtiḥ sañjñā . ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke api hi ākrtimataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_4: māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . liṅgena vā . atha vā kim cit liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:388_5: āsajya vakṣyāmi itthaṃliṅgā sañjñā iti . vṛddhiśabde ca tat liṅgam kariṣyate na ādaicchabde
GS24pmbhasuu:388_6: . idam tāvat ayuktam yat ucyate ācāryācārāt iti . kim atra ayuktam . tam eva upālabhya
GS24pmbhasuu:388_7: agamakam te sūtram iti tasya eva punaḥ pramāṇīkaraṇam iti etat ayuktam . aparituṣyan
GS24pmbhasuu:388_8: khalu api bhavān anena parihāreṇa ākṛtiḥ liṅgena vā iti āha . tat ca api vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:388_9: . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi itsañjñā na vaktavyā lopaḥ ca na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_10: . sañjñāliṅgam anubandheṣu kariṣyate . na ca sañjñāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ ucyate . svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_11: sañjñāḥ sañjñinaḥ pratyāyya nivartante . tena anubandhānām api nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:388_12: . sidhyati evam . apāṇinīyam tu bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam sañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_13: sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā loke iti . na yathā loke tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:388_14: vyākaraṇe . pramāṇabhūtaḥ ācāryaḥ darbhapavitrapāṇiḥ śucau avakāśe prāṅmukhaḥ upaviśya
GS24pmbhasuu:388_15: mahatā yatnena sūtram praṇayati sma . tatra aśakyam varṇena api anarthakena bhavitum
GS24pmbhasuu:388_16: kim punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa . kim ataḥ yat aśakyam . ataḥ sañjñāsañjñinau eva . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_17: nu khalu etat sañjñāsañjñinau eva iti na punaḥ sādhvanuśāsane asmin śāstre sādhutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:388_18: anena kiryate . kṛtam anayoḥ sādhutvam . katham . vṛdhiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_19: prakṛtipāṭhe . tasmāt ktinpratyayaḥ . ādaicaḥ api akṣarasamāmnāye upadiṣṭāḥ . prayoganiyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:388_20: tarhi idam syāt . vṛddhiśabdāt paraḥ ādaicaḥ prayoktavyāḥ iti . na iha prayoganiyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:388_21: ārabhyate . kim tarhi . saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya padāni utsṛjyante . teṣām yatheṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:388_22: abhisambandhaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : āhara pātram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:389_0: pātram āhara iti . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya ādaicaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:389_1: ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . āgamāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:389_2: ādaicaḥ āgamāḥ . āgamāḥ api ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya eva ucyante liṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:390_0: ca . na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm na khalu api āgamaliṅgam paśyāmaḥ . idam khalu api bhūyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_1: sāmanādhikaraṇyam ekavibhaktikatvam ca . dvayoḥ ca etat bhavati . kayoḥ . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_2: vā sañjñāsañjñinoḥ vā . tatra etat syāt viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye iti . tat ca na . dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_3: hi pratītpadārthakayoḥ loke viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ bhavati . na ca ādaicchabdaḥ pratītapadārthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_4: . tasmāt sañjñāsañjñinau eva . tatra tu etāvān sandedhaḥ kaḥ sañjñī kā sañjñā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:390_5: . saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhe samānākṣare . yatra tu anyatarat laghu yat
GS24pmbhasuu:390_6: laghu sā sañjñā . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra api ayam na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:390_7: gurulaghutām eva upalakṣayitum arhati . kim tarhi . anākṛtitām api . anākṛtiḥ sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:390_8: . ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke hi ākṛtimataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:390_9: kriyate . atha vā āvartinyaḥ sañjñāḥ bhavanti . vṛddhiśabdaḥ ca āvartate na ādaicchabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_10: . tat yathā . itaratra api devadattaśabdaḥ āvartate na māṃsapiṇḍaḥ . atha vā pūrvoccāritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_11: sañjñī paroccāritā sañjñā . kutaḥ etat . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:390_12: tat yathā . itaratra api sataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:390_13: vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti . etat ekam ācāryasya maṅgalārtham mṛṣyatām . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_14: mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vṛddhiśabam āditaḥ prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni hi
GS24pmbhasuu:390_15: śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca . adhyetāraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:390_16: siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . sarvatra eva hi vyākaraṇe pūrvoccāritaḥ sañjñī paroccāritā
GS24pmbhasuu:390_17: sañjñā . at eṅ guṇaḥ iti yathā . doṣavān khalu api sañjñādhikāraḥ . aṣṭame api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:390_18: sañjñā kriyate tasya param āmreḍitam iti . tatra api idam anuvartyam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:390_19: vā asthāne ayam yatnaḥ kriyate . na hi idam lokāt bhidyate . yadi idam lokāt bhidyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:390_20: tataḥ yatnārham syāt . tat yathā agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:390_21: ayam gauḥ iti . na ca asmai ācaṣṭe iyam asya sañjñā iti . bhavati ca asya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_22: . tatra etat syāt kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ iti . iha api kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:390_23: . kaiḥ . ācāryaiḥ . tatra etat syāt . yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:390_24: . loke api yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ . atha tatra kṛtaḥ iha api kṛtaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:394_0: 133-134 sataḥ vṛddhyādiṣu sañjñābhāvāt tadāśraye itaretarāśrayatvāt asiddhiḥ . sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:394_1: sañjñinaḥ sañjñābhāvāt sañjñāśraye sañjñini vṛddhyādiṣu itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:394_2: . kā iteretarāśrayatā . satām ādaicām sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca ādaicaḥ bhāvyante
GS24pmbhasuu:395_0: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . tat yathā . nauḥ nāvi baddhā na itaratrāṇāya
GS24pmbhasuu:395_1: bhavati. nanu ca bhoḥ itaretarāśrayāṇi api kāryāṇi dṛśyante . tat yathā . nauḥ śakaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:395_2: vahati śakaṭam ca nāvam vahati . anyat api tatra kim cit bhavati jalam sthalam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:395_3: . sthale śakaṭam nāvam vahati . jale nauḥ śakaṭam vahati . yathā tari triviṣṭabdhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:395_4: . tatra api antataḥ sūtrakam bhavati . idam punaḥ itaretarāśrayam eva . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:395_5: nityaśabdatvāt . siddham etat . katham . nityaśabdatvāt . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:395_6: śabdeṣu satām ādaicām sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā ādaicaḥ bhāvyante . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:395_7: nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:395_8: . nivartakam śāstram . katham . mṛjiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:395_9: mṛjibuddhiḥ prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . mṛjeḥ akṅitsu pratyayeṣu mṛjiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:399_0: 134-136 pratyekam vṛddhiguṇasañjñe bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:399_1: mā bhūtām iti . anyatra sahavacanāt samudāye sañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . anyatra sahavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:399_2: samudāye vṛddhiguṇasañjñayoḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . yatra icchati sahabhūtānām kāryam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:399_3: tatra sahagrahaṇam . tat yathā . saha supā . ubhe abhyastam saha iti . pratyavayavam
GS24pmbhasuu:399_4: ca vākyaparisamāpteḥ . pratyavayavam ca vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:399_5: bhojyantām iti . na ca ucyate pratyekam iti . pratyekam ca bhujiḥ parisamāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:399_6: nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:399_7: śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:399_8: . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte yadi tatra sahagrahaṇam kriyate iha api pratyekam iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:399_9: . atha tatra antareṇa sahagrahaṇam sahabhūtānām kāryam bhavati iha api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:403_0: 136-140 atha kimartham ākāraḥ taparaḥ kriyate . ākārasya taparakaraṇam savarṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:403_1: . ākārasya taparakaraṇam kriyate . kim prayojanam . savarṇārtham . taparaḥ tatkālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:403_2: iti tatkālānām grahaṇam yathā syāt . keṣām . udāttānundāttasvaritānām . kim ca kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:403_3: na syāt . bhedakatvāt svarasya . bhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhedakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:403_4: udāttādayaḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . yaḥ udātte kartavye anudāttam karoti khaṇḍikopādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:403_5: tasmai capeṭām dadāti anyat tvam karoṣi iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:403_6: . bhedakatvāt guṇasya iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ānunāsikyam nāma guṇaḥ . tadbhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:403_7: api yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bhedakatvāt guṇasya . bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:403_8: katham punaḥ jñāyate bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . ekaḥ ayam ātmā udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:404_0: anyat idam śītam anyat idam ūṣṇam iti . nanu ca bhoḥ abhedakāḥ api guṇāḥ dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:404_1: . tat yathā . devadattaḥ muṇḍī api jaṭī api śikhī api svām ākhyām na jahāti . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:404_2: bālaḥ yuvā vṛddhaḥ vatsaḥ damyaḥ balīvardaḥ iti . ubhayam idam guṇeṣu uktam bhedakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:404_3: abhedakāḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . abhedakāḥ guṇāḥ iti eva nyāyyam . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:404_4: etat . yat ayam asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti udāttagrahaṇam karoti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:404_5: bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ syuḥ udāttam eva uccārayet . yadi tarhi abhedakāḥ guṇāḥ anudāttādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:404_6: antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat svaritādeḥ svaritāntāt ca prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:404_7: āśrīyamāṇaḥ guṇaḥ bhedakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . śuklam ālabheta . kṛṣṇam ālabheta
GS24pmbhasuu:404_8: . tatra yaḥ śukle ālabdhavye kṛṣṇam ālabheta na hi tena yathoktam kṛtam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:404_9: asandehārthaḥ tarhi takāraḥ . aic iti ucyamane sandehaḥ syāt . kim imau aicau eva
GS24pmbhasuu:404_10: āhosvit ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:404_11: ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:405: āntaryataḥ trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti :

GS24pmbhasuu:413_1: trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti niyamāt . nanu taḥ
