GS24pmbhasuu:413_3: api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt . yavaḥ stavaḥ . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:413_4: na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam . atha kim
GS24pmbhasuu:413_5: takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:416_2: ca. ākāranivṛttyartham tāvat . yātā vātā . ākārasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti . iggrahaṇāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:416_3: bhavati . sandhyakṣaranivṛttyartham . glāyati mlāyati . sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:417_0: umbhitum umbhitavyam . vyañjanasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti . iggrahaṇāt na bhavati . ākāranivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:417_1: tāvat nārthaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ākārasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:417_2: ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . kitkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:417_3: etat prayojanam kiti iti ākāralopaḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca ākārasya guṇaḥ syāt kitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:417_4: anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt godaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:418_0: kambaladaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na ākārasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ kakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:418_1: anubandham karoti . sandhyakṣarārthena api na arthaḥ . upadeśasāmarthyāt sandhyakṣarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:418_2: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . vyañjananivṛttyarthena api na arthaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:418_3: na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam janeḥ ḍam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:418_4: . ḍitkaraṇe etat prayojanam ḍiti iti ṭilopaḥ yathā syāt . yadi vyañjansya guṇaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:418_5: ḍitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte trayāṇām akārāṇām pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt : upasarajaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:419_0: mandurajaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ janeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:419_1: ḍam śāsti. na etāni santi prayojanāni . yat tāvat ucyate kitkaraṇam jñāpakam ākārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:419_2: guṇaḥ na bhavati iti . uttarārtham etat syāt . tundaśokayoḥ parimṛjāpanudoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:419_3: yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham kakāram anubandham karoti . yat api ucyate upadeśasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:419_4: sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ na bhavati iti . yadi yat yat sandhyakṣarasya prāpnoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:419_5: tat upadeśasāmarthyāt bādhyate āyādayaḥ api tarhi na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:419_6: . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ sa vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:419_7: eva na asau bādhyate . guṇam ca prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ āyādīnām punaḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:419_8: eva . yat api ucyate janeḥ ḍavacanam jñāpakam na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:419_9: siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati . na ca janeḥ guṇena sidhyati . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:419_10: hi etat janeḥ guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ akāraḥ bhavati na punaḥ ekāraḥ vā syāt okāraḥ vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:419_11: . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya mātrikaḥ akāraḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api anunāsikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:419_12: prāpnoti . pararūpeṇa śuddhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi gameḥ api ayam ḍaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:419_13: . gameḥ ca guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ āntaryataḥ okāraḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt iggrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:422_0: imam ite ete api ikaḥ prāpnuvanti . sañjñayā vidhāne niyamaḥ . sañjñayā ye vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:422_1: teṣu niyamaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . guṇavṛddhigrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:422_2: . katham punaḥ antareṇa guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī syātām . prakṛtam guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:422_3: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . vṛddhiḥ āt aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:422_4: at eṅ guṇaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca iti adeṅām api vṛddhisañjñā prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:422_5: . vṛddhiḥ āt aic . at eṅ guṇaḥ vṛddhiḥ āt aic . tataḥ ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī iti . guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:422_6: anuvartate ādaijgrahaṇam nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:422_7: utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:422_8: āt aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti . tataḥ iko guṇavṛddhī iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:422_9: . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtāpavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:422_10: apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . anyasyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ vacanāt cakārasya anukarṣaṇārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:422_11: akaraṇāt prakṛtāyāḥ vṛddhisañjñāyāḥ guṇasañjña bādhikā bhaviṣyati yathā utsargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:422_12: prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā vakṣyati etat . anuvartante ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:422_13: vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi yatnāt bhavanti . atha vā ubhayam

GS24pmbhasuu:429_7: . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ ca anigantasya . sarvādeśaḥ ca

GS24pmbhasuu:448_2: evam api sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ aniyataḥ . saḥ anantyasya api prāpnoti : īhitā ,

GS24pmbhasuu:453_0: paryaviviṣuḥ iti . evam tarhi na ayam taccheṣaḥ na api tadapavādaḥ . anyat eva idam

GS24pmbhasuu:454_1: tena eva tasya ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . atha api tadapavādaḥ utsargāpavādayoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:454_2: ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra niyamasya avakāśaḥ : rājñaḥ ka ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:455: rājakīyam . ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti asya avakāśaḥ : cayanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:459: medyati mārṣṭi iti . ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe hi param iti ucyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:460_0: pūrvaḥ ca ayam yogaḥ paraḥ niyamaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat
GS24pmbhasuu:460_1: iṣṭam tat bhavati . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:461_2: ādeśaḥ . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ syāt iti eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:672_3: . kim idam āvacanam iti . īṣadvacanam āvacanam . kim cit mukhavacanam kim cit nāsikāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:672_4: . mukhadvitīyā vā nāsikā vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . mukhopasaṃhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:672_5: vā nāsikā vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:676_0: 193-194 atha mukhagrahaṇam kimartham . nāsikāvacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:676_1: yamānusvārāṇām eva prasajyeta . mukhagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:676_2: nāsikāgrahaṇam kimartham . mukhavacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne kacaṭatapānām
GS24pmbhasuu:676_3: eva prasajyeta . nāsikāgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . mukhagrahaṇam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:676_4: akartum . kena idānīm ubhayavacanānām bhaviṣyati . prāsādavāsinyāyena . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:676_5: . ke cit prāsādavāsinaḥ ke cit bhūmivāsinaḥ ke cit ubhayavāsinaḥ . ye prāsādavāsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:676_6: gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena . ye bhūmivāsinaḥ gṛhyante te bhūmivāsinyāyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:676_7: ye ubhayavāsinaḥ gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena bhūmivāsinyāyena ca . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:676_8: api ke cit mukhavacanāḥ ke cit nāsikāvacanāḥ ke cit ubhayavacanāḥ . tatra ye mukhavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:676_9: gṛhyante te mukhagrahaṇena . ye nāsikāvacanāḥ gṛhyante te nāsikāgrahaṇena . ye ubhayavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:676_10: gṛhyante eva te mukhagrahaṇena nāsikāgrahaṇena ca. bhavet ubhayavacanānām siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:676_11: . yamānusvārāṇām api prāpnoti . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:680_0: 194-195 itaretarāśrayam tu bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sataḥ anunāsikasya sañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:680_1: bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca nāma anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:680_2: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . anunāsikasañjñāyām itaretarāśraye uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:680_3: . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu sataḥ anunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:680_4: sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . yadi tarhi nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:680_5: śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham . nivartakam śāstram .
GS24pmbhasuu:680_6: katham . āṅ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ ananunāsikaḥ . tasya sarvatra ananunāsikabuddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:680_7: prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . chandasi aci parataḥ āṅaḥ ananunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:684_0: 195-197 tulayā sammitam tulyam . āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam . tulyāsyam
GS24pmbhasuu:684_1: tulyaprayatnam ca savarṇasañjñam bhavati . kim punaḥ āsyam . laukikam āsyam oṣṭhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:684_2: prabhṛti prāk kākalakāt . katham punaḥ āsyam . asyanti anena varṇān iti āsyam . annam
GS24pmbhasuu:684_3: etat āsyandate iti vā āsyam . atha kaḥ prayatnaḥ . prayatanam prayatnaḥ . prapūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:684_4: yatateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ naṅpratyayaḥ . yadi laukikam āsyam kim āsyopādāne prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:684_5: . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam bhavati . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:689_1: bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati jabagaḍadaśām . kim kāraṇam . prayatnasāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:689_2: . eteṣām hi samānaḥ prayatnaḥ . siddham tu āsye tulyadeśaprayatnam savarṇam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:689_3: etat. katham . āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ yatnaḥ ca te savarṇasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:689_4: . evam api kim āsyopādāne prayojanam . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam . prayatnaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:689_5: āsyopādānam . santi hi āsyāt bāhyāḥ prayatnāḥ . te hāpitāḥ bhavanti . teṣu satsu
GS24pmbhasuu:689_6: asatsu api savarṇasañjñā sidhyati . ke punaḥ te . vivārasaṃvārau śvāsanādau ghoṣavadaghoṣatā
GS24pmbhasuu:689_7: alpaprāṇatā mahāprāṇatā iti . tatra vargāṇām prathamadvitīyāḥ vivṛtakaṇṭhāḥ śvāsānupradānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:689_8: aghoṣāḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . tṛtīyacaturthāḥ saṃvṛtakaṇṭhāḥ nādānupradānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:689_9: ghoṣavantaḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . yathā tṛtīyāḥ tathā pañcamāḥ ānunāsikyavarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:689_10: . ānunāsikyam teṣām adhikaḥ guṇaḥ . evam api avarṇasya savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:689_11: . kim kāraṇam . bāhyam hi āsyāt sthānam avarṇasya . sarvamukhasthānam avarṇam eke
GS24pmbhasuu:689_12: icchanti . evam api vyapadeśaḥ na prakalpate :
GS24pmbhasuu:690_0: āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ iti . vyapadeśivadbhāvena vyapadeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:690_1: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam savarṇasañjñayām bhinnadeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:690_2: atiprasaṅgaḥ prayatnasāmānyāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi laukikam āsyam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:691_0: āsye bhavam āsyam . śarīrāvayavāt yat . kim punaḥ āsye bhavam . sthānam karaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:691_1: . evam api prayatnaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . prayatnaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:691_2: prayatanam prayatnaḥ . kim tarhi . prārambhaḥ yatnasya prayatnaḥ . yadi prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:691_3: yatnasya prayatnaḥ evam api avarṇasya eṅoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . praśliṣṭavarṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:691_4: etau . avarṇasya tarhi aicoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . vivṛtatarāvarṇau etau .
GS24pmbhasuu:691_5: etayoḥ eva tarhi mithaḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . na etau tulyasthānau . udāttādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:691_6: tarhi savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti . abhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ . atha vā kim naḥ etena prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:691_7: yatnasya prayatnaḥ iti .prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ . tat eva ca taddhitāntam āsyam
GS24pmbhasuu:691_8: . yat samānam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . kim sati bhede . sati iti āha . sati eva hi bhede
GS24pmbhasuu:691_9: savarṇasañjñayā bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat . bhedādhiṣṭhānā hi savarṇasañjñā . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:691_10: hi yatra sarvam samānam tatra syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:691_11: sati bhede kim cit samānam iti kṛtva savarṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati śakārachakārayoḥ ṣakāraṭhakārahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:691_12: sakārathakārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . eteṣām hi sarvam anyat samānam karaṇavarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:691_13: . evam tarhi prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ tat eva taddhitāntam āsyam na tu ayam dvandvaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:692: āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam iti . kim tarhi . tripadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:693: tulyaḥ āsye prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā pūrvaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:695: tulyāsyaḥ prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā paraḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ : āsye yatnaḥ āsyayatnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:700_0: 202-203 tasya . tasya iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:700_1: saḥ tasya savarṇasañjñaḥ yathā syāt . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:700_2: mā bhūt . tasya avacanam vacanaprāmāṇyāt . tasya iti na vaktavyam . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:700_3: anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:701_0: savarṇasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt . yadi hi anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ saḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:701_1: syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:701_2: vā punaḥ tulyam etat . tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:703_0: pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:703_1: ca etat gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api tulyāsyaprayatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:703_2: savarṇam iti atra sambandiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:704: yat prati yat tulyāsyaprayatnam tat prati tat savarṇasañjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:708: 203-207 ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇavidhiḥ . ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā vidheyā . hotṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:710: hotṝḷkāraḥ . kim prayojanam . akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . savarṇadīrghatve ṛti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:712: lḷvāvacanam iti . tat savarṇe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : dadhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:715_0: ḷkāraḥ iti . yat etat savarṇadīrghatve ṛti iti etat ṛtaḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tataḥ ḷti
GS24pmbhasuu:715_1: . ḷti ca vā lḷ bhavati . ṛtaḥ iti eva . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam tat vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:715_2: . ūkālaḥ ac hrasvardīrghaplutasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca rṛkāraḥ lḷkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:716: lḷkārasya ca actvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam plutaḥ yathā syāt : hotṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:722_0: hotḷ3kāraḥ . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . savarṇasañjñāvacanam eva jyāyaḥ . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:722_1: ca eva hi siddham bhavati. api ca ṛkāragrahaṇe ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati . yathā iha bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:724: māla ṛśyaḥ idam api saṅgṛhītam bahavati : khaṭva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:727: ḷkāraḥ iti . vā supi āpiśaleḥ : uparkārīyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:730: upālkārīyati iti . yadi tarhi ṛkāragrahaṇe ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:731_0: ḷkārasya api raparatvam prāpnoti . ḷkārasya laparatvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:731_1: vaktavyam asatyām savarṇasañjñāyām vidhyartham . tat eva satyām rephabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:731_2: bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade iti ṛkāragrahaṇam coditam mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:732: pitṝṇām iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:733: kḷpyamānam paśya iti . atha asatyām api savarṇasañjñāyām iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:734: prakḷpyamānam paśya iti . cuṭutulaśarvyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:735_0: tribhiḥ ca madhyamaiḥ vargaiḥ laśasaiḥ ca vyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi iti . varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:735_1: ca varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ḷkāre lakāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:735_2: . yadi evam na arthaḥ raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇena . varṇaikadeśāḥ ca varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:735_3: gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam ṇatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:739_0: 207-211 ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajjhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:739_1: śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca
GS24pmbhasuu:739_2: eva hi śakāraḥ hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api
GS24pmbhasuu:739_3: gṛhṇāti iti actvam . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:739_4: doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:739_5: iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:739_6: anactvam . spṛṣṭam sparśānām karaṇam . īṣatspṛṣṭam antaḥsthānām . vivṛtam ūṣmaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:739_7: . īṣat iti anuvartate . svarāṇām vivṛtam . īṣat iti nivṛttam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:739_8: vā . vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā siddham etat . kim idam vākyāparisamāpteḥ iti . varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:739_9: upadeśaḥ tāvat . upadeśottarakālā itsañjñā . itsañjñottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:739_10: itā iti pratyāhāraḥ . pratyāhārottarakālā savarṇasañjñā . savarṇasañjñottarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:739_11: aṇ udit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti savarṇagrahaṇam . etena sarveṇa samuditena vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:739_12: anyatra savarṇānām grahaṇam bhavati . ca ca atra ikāraḥ śakāram gṛhṇāti . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:739_13: tarhi ikāraḥ śakāram na gṛhṇāti evam īkāram api na gṛhṇīyāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . kumārī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:740_0: īhate kumārīhate . akaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:740_1: akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti pratyāhāragrahaṇam tata ikāraḥ īkāram gṛhṇāti . śakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:741_0: ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya śakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:741_1: savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca eva śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:741_2: hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api gṛhṇāti iti actvam
GS24pmbhasuu:741_3: . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:741_4: doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:741_5: . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham anactvam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:741_6: vā . uktā vākyāparisamāptiḥ . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam bhavati . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:741_7: ca samarthitam . katham . astu vā śakārasya śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñā mā vā bhūt . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:742_0: paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti iti . mā bhūt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:742_1: . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati . sati lope dviśakāram asati lope triśakāram . na asti bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:742_2: . asati api lope dviśakāram eva . katham . vibhāṣā dvirvacanam . evam api bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:742_3: . asati lope kadā cit dviśakāram kadā cit triśakāram sati lope dviśakāram eva . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:742_4: eṣaḥ katham bhedaḥ na syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt . vibhāṣā tu saḥ lopaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:746_0: 213-217 kimartham īdādīnām taparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā ucyate . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:746_1: tatkālānām savarṇānām grahaṇam yathā syāt . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:746_2: prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . plutānām tu pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:746_3: . atatkālatvāt . na hi plutāḥ tatkālāḥ . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasyāsiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:746_4: eva bhavanti . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:746_5: iti . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ aci iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:746_6: jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:746_7: . aplutāt aplute iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim ataḥ yat siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:746_8: . sañjñāvidhau asiddhaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti . sañjñāvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:746_9: ca siddhaḥ . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam tatra upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:746_10: draṣṭavyam . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti upasthitam idam bhavati īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:746_11: iti . kim punaḥ plutasya pragṛhyasañjñāvacane prayojanam . pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:746_12: yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam . plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:746_13: . upasthite hi doṣaḥ syāt . aplutavat upasthithe iti atra paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :

GS24pmbhasuu:748_1: plutasya pragṛhyasañjñā eṣitavyā pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . yadi punaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:825_0: 235-238 īdūtau saptamī iti eva . īdūtau saptamī iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ arthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:825_1: . lupte arthagrahaṇāt bhavet . luptāyam saptamyām pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:825_2: . somo gaurī adhi śritaḥ . iṣyate ca atra api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na
GS24pmbhasuu:825_3: sidhyati iti evamartham arthagrahaṇam . na atra saptamī lupyate . kim tarhi . pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:825_4: atra bhavati . pūrvasya cet savarṇaḥ asau āḍāmbhāvaḥ prasajyate . yadi pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:825_5: āṭ āmbhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . evam tarhi āha ayam īdūtau saptamī iti na sa asti saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:825_6: īdūtau . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanāt yatra dīrghatvam . na idam vacanāt labhyam.
GS24pmbhasuu:825_7: asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . yatra saptamyāḥ dīrghatvam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:826_0: dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam iti . sati prayojane iha na prāpnoti somo gaurī adhi
GS24pmbhasuu:826_1: śritaḥ iti . tatra api sarasī yadi . tatra api siddham . katham . yadi sarasīśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:826_2: pravṛttiḥ asti . asti ca loke sarasīśabdasya pravṛttiḥ . katham . dakṣiṇāpathe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:826_3: mahānti sarāṃsi sarasyaḥ iti ucyante . jñāpakam syāt tadantatve . evam tarhi jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:826_4: ācāryaḥ na pragṛhyasañjñāyām pratyayalakṣaṇam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:827: vadhvoḥ agāram vadhvagāram . pratyayalakṣaṇena pragṛhyasañjñā na bhavati . mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt . atha vā pūrvapadasya mā bhūt iti evamartham arthagrahaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:829_0: nadyām ātiḥ nadyātiḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api arthagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:829_1: . jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ iti . atha ajahatsvārthāyām vṛttau doṣaḥ eva . ajahatsvārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:829_2: ca na doṣaḥ . samudāyārthaḥ abhidhīyate . īdutau saptamī iti eva lupte arthagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:829_3: bhavet pūrvasya cet savarṇaḥ asau āḍāmbhāvaḥ prasajyate vacanāt yatra dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:829_4: tatra api sarasī yadi jñāpakam syāt tadantatve mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:833_0: 239-241 ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam śidartham. ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:833_1: . dādhāprakṛtayaḥ ghusañjñā bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . āttvabhūtānām
GS24pmbhasuu:833_2: iyam sañjñā kriyate . sā āttvabhūtānām eva syāt anāttvabhūtānām na syāt . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:833_3: bhūyiṣthāni ghusañjñākāryāṇi ārdhadhātuke tatra ca ete āttvabhūtāḥ dṛśyante . śidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:833_4: . śidartham prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . śiti āttvam pratiṣidhyate tadartham :
GS24pmbhasuu:834_0: praṇidayate praṇidhayati iti . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:834_1: śidvikṛtārtham . ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam kriyate . kim prayojanam . śidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:834_2: vikṛtārtham ca . śiti udāhṛtam . vikṛtārtham khalu api :
GS24pmbhasuu:835_0: praṇidātā praṇidhātā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:835_1: eva iti pratipadam ye āttvabhūtāḥ teṣām eva syāt . lakṣaṇena ye āttvabhūtāḥ teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:835_2: na syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api prakṛtigrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:835_3: āhosvit dādhām prakṛtayaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:835_4: saḥ eva doṣaḥ . āttvabhūtānām eva syāt anāttvabhūtānām na syāt . atha vijñāyate dādhām
GS24pmbhasuu:835_5: prakṛtayaḥ iti anāttvabhūtānām eva syāt āttvabhūtānām na syāt . evam tarhi na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:835_6: vijñāyate dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti na api dādhām prakṛtayaḥ iti . katham tarhi . dādhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:835_7: ghusañjñāḥ bhavanti prakṛtayaḥ ca eṣām iti . tat tarhi prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:835_8: . na kartavyam . idam prakṛtam arthagrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . īdūtau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:835_9: saptamyarthe iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi dādhāḥ ghu adāp . arthe iti . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:835_10: dadātinā samānārthān rātirāsatidāśatimaṃhatiprīṇātiprabhṛtīn āhuḥ . eteṣām api ghusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:835_11: prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . śidarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:835_12: tāvat na arthaḥ prakṛtigrahaṇena . avaśyam tatra mārtham prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:835_13: praṇimayate praṇyamayata iti evamartham . tat purastāt apakrakṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:836: ghuprakṛtau māprakṛtau ca iti . yadi prakṛtigrahaṇam kriyate praniminoti pranimīnāti atra api prāpnoti . atha akriyamāṇe api prakṛtigrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:837_0: pranimātā pranimātum iti . ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:837_1: akriyamāṇe prakṛtigrahaṇe ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate evam kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:837_2: prakṛtigrahaṇe ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate . vikṛtārthena ca api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:837_3: . doṣaḥ eva etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti gāmādāgrahaṇeṣu aviśeṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:842_0: pranidārayati pranidhārayati . dādhāḥ ghusañjñāḥ bhavanti iti ghusañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:842_2: pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . ghusañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:842_3: dādhoḥ grahaṇam . na ca etau arthavantau . anupasargāt vā . atha vā yatkriyāyuktās
GS24pmbhasuu:842_4: prādayaḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ . na ca etau dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:842_5: . yadi evam iha api tarhi na prāpnoti praṇidāpayati praṇidhāpayati . atra api na
GS24pmbhasuu:842_6: etau dādhau arthavantau na api etau dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ . na vā arthavataḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:842_7: āgamaḥ tadguṇībhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:842_8: kāraṇam . arthavataḥ āgamaḥ tadguṇībhūtaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:842_9: . tat yathā . anyatra api arthavataḥ āgamaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . kva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:842_10: . lavitā cikīrṣitā iti . yuktam punaḥ yat nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu āgamaśāsanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:842_11: na nityeṣu śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:842_12: . āgamaḥ ca nāma apūrvaḥ śabdopajanaḥ . atha yuktam yat nityeṣu śabdeṣu ādeśāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:842_13: . bāḍham yuktam . śabdāntaraiḥ iha bhavitavyam . tatra śabdāntarāt śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:842_14: pratipattiḥ yuktā . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime bhaviṣyanti anāgamakānām sāgamakāḥ . tat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:842_15: . sarve sarvapadādeśāḥ dākṣīputrasya pāṇineḥ ekadeśavikāre hi nityatvam na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:846_0: 245-246 dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve . dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:846_1: . upādāsta asya svaraḥ śikṣakasya iti . mīnātiminoti iti āttve kṛte sthāghvoḥ it
GS24pmbhasuu:846_2: ca iti ittvam prāpnoti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam doṣaḥ jāyate . kim prakṛtigrahaṇāt āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:846_3: rūpagrahaṇāt . rūpagrahaṇāt iti āha . iha khalu prakṛtigrahaṇāt doṣaḥ jāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:847_0: upadidīṣate . sani mīmāghurabhalabha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dāprakṛtiḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:847_1: . na ca iyam dāprakṛtiḥ . ākārāntānām ejantāḥ prakṛtayaḥ ejantānām api īkārāntāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:847_2: . na ca prakṛtiprakṛtiḥ prakṛtigrahaṇena gṛhyate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:847_3: . na vaktavyaḥ . ghusañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:851: 246-247 dāppratiṣedhe na daipi anejantatvāt . dāppratiṣedhe daipi pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:852_0: avadātam mukham . nanu ca āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:852_1: kāraṇam . anejantatvāt . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:852_2: . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . pitpratiṣedhāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:852_3: dādhāḥ ghu apit iti vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam . adāp iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:853_0: praṇidāpayati iti . śakyam tāvat anena adāp iti bruvatā bāntasya pratiṣedhaḥ vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:853_1: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam dappratiṣedhe na daipi
GS24pmbhasuu:853_2: iti . parihṛtam etat siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt iti . atha ekānteṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:853_3: eva . ekānteṣu ca na doṣaḥ . āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam tat hi āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:853_4: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anejantatvāt iti . pakāralope kṛte bhaviṣyati . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:853_5: ayam tadā dāp bhavati . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . etat ca atra yuktam yat sarveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:853_6: eva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate . anaimittikaḥ hi anubandhalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:853_7: tāvati eva bhavati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:853_8: iti yat ayam udīcām māṅaḥ vyatīhāre iti meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:853_9: karoti . atha vā dāp eva ayam na daip asti . katham avadāyayati iti . śyan vikaraṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:857_0: 247-252 kimartham idam ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:857_1: . sati anyasmin yasmāt pūrvam na asti param asti saḥ ādiḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:857_2: yasmāt param na asti pūrvam asti saḥ antaḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:857_3: etasmāt kāraṇāt ekasmin ādyantāpadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti . iṣyante ca syuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:857_4: . tāni antareṇa yatnam na sidhyanti iti ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam . evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:857_5: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:857_6: vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:857_7: . kim prayojanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham . vakṣyati ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:857_8: bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:859_0: āra iti atra na syāt . vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:859_1: . ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . vakṣyati ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī eva
GS24pmbhasuu:859_2: iti . etasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:860: kariṣyati hariṣyati . iha na syāt : indraḥ mā vakṣat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:861_0: saḥ devan yakṣat . vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:861_1: . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:861_2: . antareṇa eva vacanam lokavijñānāt siddham etat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:862_0: loke śālāsamudāyaḥ grāmaḥ iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:862_1: iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . grāmaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva śālāsamudāye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:862_2: . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe vartate . tat yathā grāmam praviṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:862_3: . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā . grāmaḥ gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:863_0: grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti . asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:863_1: labdhaḥ iti . tat yaḥ sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate tam abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:864_0: ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ iti . yathā tarhi varṇasamudāyaḥ padam padasamudāyaḥ ṛk ṛksamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:864_1: sūktam iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekavarṇam padam ekapadā ṛk ekarcam
GS24pmbhasuu:864_2: sūktam iti . atra api arthena yuktaḥ vyapadeśaḥ . padam nāma arthaḥ sūktam nama arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:864_3: . yathā tarhi bahuṣu putreṣu etat upapannam :
GS24pmbhasuu:865_0: bhavati ayam me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam eva me madhyamaḥ ayam eva me kanīyān iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:865_1: ca etat ekasmin api ayam eva me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam me madhyamaḥ ayam me kanīyān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:865_2: tathā asūtāyām asoṣyamāṇāyām ca bhavati prathamagarbheṇa hatā iti . tathā anetya
GS24pmbhasuu:865_3: anājigamiṣuḥ āha idam me prathamam āgamanam iti . ādyantavadbhāvaḥ ca śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:865_4: . katham . apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt ādyantayoḥ siddham ekasmin . apūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:865_5: anuttaralakṣaṇaḥ antaḥ . etat ca ekasmin api bhavati . apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:865_6: kāraṇāt ekasmin api ādyantāpadiṣṭani kāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . na arthaḥ ādyantavadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:865_7: . gonardīyaḥ tu āha satyam etat sati tu anyasmin iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:869: 252-254 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . ādivattve prayojanam pratyayañnidādyudāttatve . pratyayasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt : kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:871: kāpaṭavaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti iha eva syāt : ahicumbakāyaniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:873: kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ prayojanam . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iha eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:875_0: manidṣat iti atra na syāt . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:875_1: . vakṣyati yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe aci śnudhātubhruvām
GS24pmbhasuu:875_2: yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iha eva syāt : śriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:876: bhruvaḥ . śriyau bhruvau iti atra na syāt . ajādyāṭtve . ajādyāṭtve prayojanam . āṭ ajādīnām iha eva syāt : aihiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:878_0: adhyaiṣṭa iti atra na syāt . atha antavattve kāni prayojanāni . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve
GS24pmbhasuu:878_1: . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve prayojanam . īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:879: pacete* iti pacethe* iti . khaṭve* iti māle* iti iti atra na syāt . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ prayojanam . iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:880: kuṇḍāni vanāni . tāni yāni iti atra na syāt . acaḥ antyādi ṭi . acaḥ antyādi ṭi prayojanam . ṭitaḥ ātmanepadānām ṭeḥ e iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:881: kurvāte kurvāthe . kurute kurve iti atra na syāt . alaḥ antyasya . alaḥ antyasya prayojanam . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iha eva syāt : ghaṭābhyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:882: paṭābhyām . ābhyām iti atra na syāt . yena vidiḥ tadantatve . yena vidiḥ tadantatve prayojanam . acaḥ yat iha eva syāt : ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:883: jeyam . eyam adhyeyam iti atra na syāt . ādyantavat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:887_0: 255-256 ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:887_1: . nadyāḥ taraḥ nadītaraḥ iti . ghasañjñāyām nadītare apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:887_2: apratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . tarabgrahaṇam hi aupadeśikam . aupadeśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:887_3: tarapaḥ grahaṇam . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe tarapśabdaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:887_4: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣu eva sānubandhakeṣu grahaṇeṣu rūpam āśrīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:888_0: yatra etat rūpam iti . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:888_1: laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:888_2: . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe tarapśabdaḥ . atha vā astu asya ghasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:888_3: . kaḥ doṣaḥ . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . samānādhikaraṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:888_4: ghādiṣu iti evam tat . yadā tarhi sā eva nadī saḥ eva taraḥ tadā prāpnoti . strīliṅgeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:888_5: eva ghādiṣu iti evam tat . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . samānādhikaraṇeṣu ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:888_6: iti ucyamāne iha prasajyeta mahiṣī rūpam iva brāhmaṇī rūpam iva .
GS24pmbhasuu:892_1: . bahugaṇvatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñāḥ bhavanti . saṅkhyā ca saṅkhyāsañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:892_2: vaktavvyam . kim prayojanam . saṅkhyāsampratyayārtham . ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:892_3: saṅkhyā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca ekādikā saṅkhyā loke saṅkhyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:892_4: pratītā . tena asyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:892_5: . itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke . akriyamāṇe hi saṅkhyāgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:892_6: ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyā iti sampratyayaḥ na syāt . kim kāraṇam . akṛtrimatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:892_7: . bahvādīnām kṛtrimā sañjñā . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime kāryasampratyayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:892_8: yathā loke . tat yathā loke gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti yasya eṣā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:892_9: bhavati saḥ ānīyate na yaḥ gāḥ pālayati yaḥ vā kaṭe jātaḥ . yadi tarhi kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:892_10: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati nadīpaurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇībhyaḥ iti atra api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:892_11: . paurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇīgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . tadviśeṣebhyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:893: gaṅgā yamunā iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tadviśeṣebhyaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam vipāṭśabdam śaratprabhṛtiṣu paṭhati . iha tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:894_0: nadībhiḥ ca iti . bahuvacananirdeśāt na bhaviṣyati . svarūpavidhiḥ tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:894_1: . bahuvacananirdeśāt eva na bhaviṣyati . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:894_2: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ . uttarārtham ca . uttarārtham ca saṅkhyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:894_3: kartavyam . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ . ṣakāranakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : pāmānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:895_0: vipruṣaḥ iti . ihārthena tāvat na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . nanu ca uktam itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:895_1: hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthāt prakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:895_2: vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . arthaḥ vā asya evaṃsaṅjñakena
GS24pmbhasuu:895_3: bhavati prakṛtam vā tatra bhavati idam evaṃsaṅjñakena kartavyam iti. ātaḥ ca arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:895_4: prakaraṇāt vā . aṅga hi bhavān grāmyam pāṃsurapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu
GS24pmbhasuu:895_5: gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti . ubhayagatiḥ tasya bhavati sādhīyaḥ vā yaṣṭihastam
GS24pmbhasuu:895_6: gamiṣyati . yathā eva tarhi arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:895_7: bhavati evam iha api prāpnoti . jānāti hi asau bahvādīnām iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:895_8: na yathā loke tathā vyākaraṇe . ubhayagatiḥ punaḥ iha bhavati . anyatra api na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:896_0: kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti kṛtrimā sañjñā . karmapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:896_1: . karmaṇi dvitīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam kartari karmavyatihāre iti akṛtrimasya
GS24pmbhasuu:896_2: . tathā sādhakatamam karaṇam iti kṛtrimā karaṇasañjñā . karaṇapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:896_3: bhavati . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ tṛtīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam śabdavairakalahābhrakaṇvameghebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:896_4: karaṇe iti akṛtrimasya . tathā ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti kṛtrimā adhikaraṇasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:896_5: adhikaraṇepradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati . saptamī adhikaraṇe ca iti kṛtrimasya
GS24pmbhasuu:896_6: grahaṇam vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti akṛtrimasya . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:897: bahugaṇavatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāvat bhavanti iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:898: eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:899_0: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api asaṅkhyām saṅkhyā iti āha . saṅkhyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:899_1: iti gamyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:899_2: saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ iti yat ayam saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti tiśadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:899_3: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kṛtrimā tyantā śadantā vā saṅkhyā asti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:899_4: ca iyam asti ḍatiḥ . yat tarhi śadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . yat ca api tyantāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:899_5: pratiṣedham śāsti . nanu ca uktam ḍatyartham etat syāt iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:899_6: iti arthavataḥ tiśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca ḍateḥ tiśabdaḥ arthavān. atha vā mahatī
GS24pmbhasuu:899_7: iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:900_0: hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:900_1: yatha vijñāyeta . saṅkhyāyate anayā saṅkhyā iti . ekādikayā ca api saṅkhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:900_2: uttarārthena ca api na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . idam prakṛtam anuvartiṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:900_3: vai sañjñārtham uttaratra ca sañjñiviśeṣaṇārthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:900_4: bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:900_5: sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:900_6: iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:901_0: śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:901_1: bhāvyante . yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:901_2: . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:901_3: . śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:901_4: . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te saṅkhyām eva apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:905_0: 263-265 adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:905_1: . kim prayojanam . samāsakanvidhyartham . samāsavidhyartham kandvidhyartham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:907: adhyardhakam . luki ca agrahaṇam . luki ca adhyardhagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:908_0: adhyardhapūrvadvigoḥ luk asañjñāyām iti . dvigoḥ iti eva siddham . ardhapūrvapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:908_1: ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ . ardhapūrvapadaḥ ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:908_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samāsakanvidhyartham . samāsavidhyartham kandvidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:910_0: ardhapañcamakam . adhikagrahaṇam ca aluki samāsottarapadavṛddhyartham . adhikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:910_1: ca aluki kartavyam . kim prayojanam . samāsottarapadavṛddhyartham . samāsavṛddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:912: adhikasāptatikaḥ . aluki iti kim artham . adhikaṣāṣṭhikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:913: adhikasāptatikaḥ . bahuvrīhau ca agrahaṇam . bahuvrīhau ca adhikaśabdasya grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:914_0: saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . saṅkhyā iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:914_1: bahvādīnām agrahaṇam . bahvādīnām grahaṇam śakyam akartum . kena idānīm saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:914_2: saṅkhyasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . jñāpakāt siddham . kim jñāpakam . yat ayam vatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:914_3: iṭ vā iti saṅkhyāyāḥ vihitasya kanaḥ vatvantāt iṭam śāsti . vatoḥ eva tat jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:914_4: syāt . na iti āha . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:918_0: 265-269 ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśavacanam . ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:918_1: ṣakāranakārāntā saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śatādyaṣṭanoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:918_2: numnuḍartham . śatāni sahasrāṇi . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:918_3: na bhavati . aṣṭānām iti atra ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:918_4: . uktam vā . kim uktam . iha tāvat śatāni sahasrāṇi iti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:918_5: animittam tadvighātasya iti . aṣṭanaḥ api uktam . kim uktam . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:918_6: ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam ākārāntasya nuḍartham iti . atha vā ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:918_7: . ṣakārāntā nakārāntā ākārāntā ca saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:919: sadhamadhaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ ekāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā : ekaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:921: bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā : ekāgnayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:923: ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asahāyaiḥ iti arthaḥ . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:924: prajam ekā rakṣati urjam ekā iti . anyā iti arthaḥ . sadhamadaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ . iha tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:925: dvabhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatya ca iti . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . tataḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:926: ṣaḍbhyaḥ ca yat uktam aṣṭābhyaḥ api tat bhavati . tataḥ luk :
GS24pmbhasuu:927: luk ca bhavati ṣaḍbhyaḥ iti . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭanaḥ ā vibhaktau . tataḥ rāyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:928: rāyaḥ ca vibhaktau ākārādeśaḥ bhavati . hali iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . yadi evam priyāṣṭau priyāṣṭāḥ iti na sidhyati priyāṣṭānau priyāṣṭānaḥ iti ca prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte .
GS24pmbhasuu:932_0: 269 idam ḍatigrahaṇam dviḥ kriyate saṅkhyāsañjñāyām ṣaṭsañjñāyām ca . ekam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:932_1: akartum . katham . yadi tāvat saṅkhyāsañjñāyām kriyate ṣaṭsañjñāyām na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:932_2: . katham . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti atra ḍati iti anuvartiṣyate . atha ṣaṭsañjñāyām kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:932_3: saṅkhyāsañjñāyām na kariṣyate . ḍati ca iti atra saṅkhyāsañjñā anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:936_1: kartavyaḥ . lotaḥ gartaḥ iti . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:936_2: samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñā kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:936_3: na bhavati . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ . anubandhaḥ kriyate . saḥ anyatvam kariṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:936_4: . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet na lopāt . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet tat
GS24pmbhasuu:936_5: na . kim kāraṇam . lopāt . lupyate atra anubandhaḥ . lupte atra anubandhe na anyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:937_0: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke naṣṭam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:937_1: gṛham bhavati . evam iha api lupte anubandhe naṣṭaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:937_2: lupyate jānāti tu asau sānubandhakasya iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti . tat yathā itaratra api :
GS24pmbhasuu:938_0: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:938_1: tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . siddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . siddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:938_2: . yadi api jānāti sandehaḥ tasya bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:939: ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lotaḥ gartaḥ iti ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lūnaḥ gīrṇaḥ iti . tat yathā itaratra api :
GS24pmbhasuu:940: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . sandehaḥ tu tasya bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:941_0: idam tat gṛham idam tat gṛham iti . evam tarhi . kārakakālaviśeṣāt siddham . kārakakālaviśeṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:941_1: upādeyau . bhūte yaḥ taśabdaḥ kartari karmaṇi bhāve ca iti . tat yathā itaratra api
GS24pmbhasuu:941_2: . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ adhruveṇa nimittena dhruvam nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:941_3: upādatte vedikām puṇḍarīkam vā . evam api prākīrṣṭa iti atra prāpnoti . luṅi sijādidarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:941_4: . luṅi sijādidarśanāt na bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sijādayaḥ na dṛśyante prābhitta
GS24pmbhasuu:941_5: iti . dṛśyante atra api sijādayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:941_6: gaṃsyate . yathā eva ayam anupadiṣṭān kārakakālaviśeṣān avagacchati evam etat api avagantum arhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:946_0: 273-274 sarvādīni iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:946_1: sarvaśabdaḥ ādiḥ yeṣām tāni imāni iti . yadi evam sarvaśabdasya sarvanāmasañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:946_2: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anyapadārthatvāt bahuvrīheḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ ayam anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:946_3: vartate . tena yat anyat sarvaśabdāt tasya sarvanāmasñjñā prāpnoti . tat yathā citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:946_4: ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ bhavanti sa ānīyate na gāvaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:946_5: bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:947: citravāsam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:951_0: 274-277 iha sarvanāmāni iti pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:951_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt ṇatvābhāvaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:951_2: nipātanāt ṇatvam na bhaviṣyati . kim etat nipātanam nāma . atha kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:951_3: . aviśeṣeṇa kim cit uktvā viśeṣeṇa na iti ucyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:952: idam na bhavati iti . nipātanam api evañjātīyakam eva . aviśeṣeṇa ṇatvam uktvā viśeṣeṇa nipātanam kriyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:953_0: idam na bhavati iti . nanu ca nipātanāt ca aṇatvam syāt yathāprāptam ca ṇatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:953_1: kim anye api evam vidhayaḥ bhavanti . iha ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti vacanāt ca yaṇ syāt yathāprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:953_2: ca ik śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyā atra nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:953_3: . ṣaṣṭhī ca punaḥ sthāninam nivartayati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:954_0: kartari śap divādibhyaḥ śyan iti vacanāt ca śyan syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca śap śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:954_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:954_2: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:954_3: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:955: tasmāt iti uttarasya . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:956_0: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti . vacanāt ca akac syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca kaḥ śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:956_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na aprāpte hi ke akac ārabhyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:956_2: api evañjātīyakam eva . na aprāpte ṇatve nipātanam ārabhyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:956_3: . yadi tarhi nipātanāni api evañjātīyakāni bhavanti samaḥ tate doṣaḥ bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:956_4: anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ samaḥ tate vibhāṣā lopam ārabhante :
GS24pmbhasuu:957: samaḥ hi tatayoḥ vā iti . satatam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:960_0: saṃhitam iti . iha punaḥ bhavān nipātanāt ca malopam icchati aparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye
GS24pmbhasuu:960_1: iti yathāprāptam ca alopam santatam iti . etat na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:964_1: vaktavyaḥ . sarvaḥ nāma kaḥ cit . tasmai sarvāya dehi . atisarvāya dehi . saḥ katham
GS24pmbhasuu:964_2: kartavyaḥ . pāṭhāt paryudāsaḥ paṭhitānām sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhāt eva paryudāsaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:964_3: . śuddhānām paṭhitānām sañjñā kartavyā . sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni bhavanti . sañjñopasarjanībhūtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:964_4: na sarvādīni . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . viśeṣeṇa ca . kim prayojanam . sarvādyānantaryakāryārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:964_5: . sarvādīnām ānantaryeṇa yat ucyate kāryam tat api sañjñopasarjanībhūtānām mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:964_6: iti . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ḍatarādīnām adbhāve . ḍatarādīnām adbhāve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:965_0: atikataram brāhmaṇakulam iti . tyadādividhau ca . tyadādividhau ca prayojanam . atikrāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:965_1: ayam brāhmaṇaḥ tam atitat brāhmaṇaḥ iti . sañjāpratiṣedhaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . upariṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:965_3: asañjñāyām iti . sarvādīni iti evam yāni anukrāntāni asañjñāyām tāni draṣṭavyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:965_4: . upasarjanapratiṣedhaḥ ca na kartavyaḥ . anupasarjanāt iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:966: anupasarjana* a* at iti . kim idam a* at iti . akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau . yadi evam atiyuṣmat atyasmat iti na sidhyati . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:967_0: anupasarjana* a* a* at iti . akārāntāt akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:967_1: . atha vā aṅgādhikāre yat ucyate gṛhyamāṇavibhakteḥ tat bhavati . yadi evam paramapañca
GS24pmbhasuu:967_2: paramasapta ṣaḍbhyaḥ luk iti luk na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ṣaṭpradhānaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:967_3: samāsaḥ . iha tarhi priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena anaṅ na prāpnoti . saptamīnirdiṣṭe yat
GS24pmbhasuu:967_4: ucyate prakṛtavibhaktau tat bhavati . yadi evam atitat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:969_0: atitadaḥ iti atvam prāpnoti . tat ca api vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adḍ
GS24pmbhasuu:969_1: ḍatarādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ iti pañcamī aṅgasya iti ṣaṣṭhī . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:969_2: ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum . tatra kim anyat śakyam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:969_3: anyat ataḥ vihitāt pratyayāt . ḍatarādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . iha idānīm asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:969_4: anaṅ udāttaḥ iti tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti asthyādīnām iti eṣā ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:969_5: api tyadādīnām iti api ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti api . tatra kāmacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:970: gṛhyamāṇena vā vibhaktim viśeṣayitum aṅgena vā . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti aṅgena vibhaktim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ asthyādibhiḥ anaṅam :
GS24pmbhasuu:971: aṅgasya vibhaktau anaṅ bhavati asthyādīnām iti . iha idānīm tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti gṛhyamāṇena vibhaktim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ aṅgena akāram :
GS24pmbhasuu:972: tyadādīnām vibhaktau aḥ bhavati aṅgasya iti . yadi evam atisaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:973: atvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tyadādipradhānaḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam idam :
GS24pmbhasuu:974: sarveṣām yāni nāmāni tāni sarvādīni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . yadi evam sañjñāśrayam yat kāryam tat na sidhyati : sarvanāmnaḥ smai ,
GS24pmbhasuu:975: āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ iti . anvarthagrahaṇam tatra vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:976: sarveṣām yat nāma tat sarvanāma . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai bhavati . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya āmaḥ suṭ bhavati . yadi evam sakalam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:978_0: jagat iti atra api prāpnoti . eteṣām ca api śabdānām ekaikasya saḥ saḥ viṣayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:978_1: tasmin tasmin viṣaye yaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ vartate tasya tasya tasmin tasmin vartamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:978_2: sarvanāmakāryam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . pāṭhaḥ ca eva viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:978_3: sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:979: sarvādīni ca sarvādīni ca sarvādīni . sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni bhavanti . sarveṣām yāni ca nāmāni tāni sarvādīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:980_0: sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . atha vā mahatī iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:980_1: ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:980_2: sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni
GS24pmbhasuu:980_3: bhavanti sarveṣām nāmāni iti ca ataḥ sarvanāmāni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete .
GS24pmbhasuu:984: 286-289 atha ubhasya sarvanāmatve kaḥ arthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:985_0: ubhakau . kim ucyate akajarthaḥ iti na punaḥ anyāni api sarvanāmakāryāṇi . anyābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:985_1: dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt . anyeṣām sarvanāmkāryāṇām abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:985_2: . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ . anyāni ca sarvanāmakāryāṇi ekavacanabahuvacaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:985_3: ucyante . yadā punaḥ ayam ubhaśabdaḥ dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ kaḥ idānīm asya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:985_4: bhavati . ubhayaḥ anyatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ asya anyatra bahvati . ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:986_0: ubhayaḥ maṇiḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra akac na syāt . kaḥ prasajyeta . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:986_1: idānīm kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ iti uktam . tatra akaci
GS24pmbhasuu:986_2: sati akacaḥ tanmadhyapatitatvāt śakyate etat vaktum :
GS24pmbhasuu:987_0: dvivacanaparaḥ ayam iti . ke punaḥ sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra dvivacanaparatā
GS24pmbhasuu:987_1: vaktavyā . yathā eva tarhi ke sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ evam āpi api sati na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:987_2: dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra api dvivacanaparatā vaktavyā . avacanāt api tatparavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:987_3: . antareṇa api vacanam āpi dvivacanaparaḥ ayam bhaviṣyati . kim vaktavyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:987_4: na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ekādeśe kṛte dvivacanaparaḥ ayam antādivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:987_5: . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam iti cet ke api tulyam . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:987_6: iti cet ke api antareṇa vacanam dvivacanaparaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham . svārthikāḥ pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:987_7: prakṛtitaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti iti prakṛtigrahaṇena svārthikānām api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:987_8: . atha bhavataḥ sarvanāmatve kāni projanāni . bhavataḥ akaccheṣātvāni . bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:989: saḥ ca bhavān ca bhavantau . ātvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:990: bhavādṛk iti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . udāharaṇamātram iti āha . tṛtīyādayaḥ api hi iṣyante . sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca : bhavatā hetunā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:995_0: 289-291 diggrahaṇam kimartham . na bahuvrīhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tatra na
GS24pmbhasuu:995_1: jñāyate kva vibhāṣā kva pratiṣedhaḥ iti . diggrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:995_2: . digupadiṣṭe vibhāṣā anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . atha samāsagrahaṇam kimartham. samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:995_3: eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:996_0: dakṣiṇadakṣiṇasyai dehi iti . atha bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kimartham . dvandve mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:996_1: dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dvandve ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:996_2: . na aprāpte pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . sā yathā eva bahuvrīhau iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:996_3: pratiṣedham bādhate evam dvandve ca iti etam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:996_4: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte na bahuvrīhau iti etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:996_5: pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . dvandve ca iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:996_6: ca . atha vā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā na
GS24pmbhasuu:996_7: bahuvrīhau iti etam pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate dvandve ca iti etam pratiṣedham na bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:996_8: . atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:997: yā pūrvā sā uttarā asya unmugdhasya saḥ ayam pūrvottaraḥ unmugdhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:998_0: tasmai pūrvottarāya dehi . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:998_1: evam na arthaḥ bahuvrīhigrahaṇena . dvandve kasmāt na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:998_2: pratipadoktasya eva iti . uttarārtham tarhi bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:998_3: . kriyate tatra eva bahuvrīhau iti . dvitīyam kartavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:998_4: tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:999: ekaikasmai dehi . etat api na asti prayojanam. samāse iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1000_0: samāsaḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . avayavabhūtasya api bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1000_1: pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt vastram antaram eṣām te ime vastrāntarāḥ vasanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1000_2: antaram eṣām te ime vasanāntarāḥ vastrāntarāḥ ca vasanāntarāḥ ca vastrāntaravasanāntarāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1004: 291-293 kim udāharaṇam . priyaviśvāya . na etat asti prayojanam . sarvādyantasya bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam . vakṣyati ca etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1005: bahuvrīhau sarvanāmasaṅkhyayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam iti . tatra viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1006: dvyanyāya tryanyāya . nanu ca atra api sarvanāmnaḥ eva pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1007_0: saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ paratvāt tatra saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1007_1: iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam priyaviśvāya . nanu ca uktam viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_0: vā priyasya iti . na khalu api avaśyam sarvādyantasya eva bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_1: bhavitavyam . kim tarhi . asarvādyantasya api bhavitavyam . kim prayojanam . akac
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_2: mā bhūt . kim ca syāt yadi akac syāt . kaḥ na syāt . kaḥ ca idānīm kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_3: . vyañjanānteṣu viśeṣaḥ . ahakam pitā asya makatpitṛkaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1009: tvakam pitā asya tvakatpitṛkaḥ iti prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_0: matkapitṛkaḥ tvatkapitṛkaḥ iti ca iṣyate . katham punaḥ icchatā api bhavatā bahiraṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_1: pratiṣedhena antaraṅgaḥ vidhiḥ śakhyaḥ bādhitum . antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_2: vidhiḥ bādhate gomatpriyaḥ iti yathā . kriyate tatra yatnaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1011: pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti . nanu ca iha api kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_0: na bahuvrīhau iti . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . priyaviśvāya . upasarjanapratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_1: api etat siddham . ayam khalu api bahuvrīhiḥ asti eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_2: aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1013_0: bahuvrīhyarthāni padāni bahuvrīhiḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1013_1: grahaṇam . gonardīyaḥ āha akacsvarau tu kartavyau pratyaṅgam muktasaṃśayau . tvakatpitṛkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1017: 293-294 pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ āḍhyapūrvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1018_0: āḍhyapūrvāya dehi iti . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānānarthakyam pūrvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:1018_1: vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam narthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1018_2: kāraṇam . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām sarvanāmasñjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1018_3: ucyate . na ca atra vyavasthā gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1022_0: 294 samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ samāsagrahaṇam kimartham . ayam tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1022_1: eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1023: tṛtīyāsamāsārthāni padāni tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā samase iti vartamāne punaḥ samāsagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1024_0: yogāṅgam yathā upajāyeta . sati yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tṛtīyā . tṛtīyāsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:1024_1: sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na bhavanti . māsapūrvāya dehi saṃvatsarapūrvāya dehi
GS24pmbhasuu:1024_2: . tataḥ asamāse . asamāse ca tṛtīyāyāḥ sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1025: (P_1,1.32) KA_I,92.16 Ro_I,295 jasaḥ kāryam prati vibhāṣā , akac hi na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1029_0: 295-297 avarādīnām ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇānarthakyam gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . avarādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:1029_1: ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . gaṇe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1029_2: etāni paṭhyante . katham punaḥ jñāyate saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1029_3: tāni hi pūrvādīni imāni avarādīni . imāni api pūrvādīni . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1029_4: jñāpayati saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti yat ayam pūrvādibhyaḥ navabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1029_5: vā iti navagrahaṇam karoti . nava eva pūrvādīni . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1030_0: vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . evaṃviśiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1030_1: eva etāni gaṇe paṭhyante . idam tarhi prayojanam dvyādiparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:1030_2: bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na eṣām dvyādiparyudāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:1030_3: paryudāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam pūrvatra asiddham iti nipātanam karoti . vārttikakāraḥ ca paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1031: jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra abhāvāt apavādaprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam jasi vibhāṣām vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1035: 297-298 ākhyāgrahaṇam kimartham . jñātidhanaparyāyavācī yaḥ svaśabdaḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1036: sve putrāḥ svāḥ putrāḥ sve gāvaḥ svāḥ gāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1040_1: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . bahiryogeṇa kṛtatvāt . bahiryoge iti eva siddham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1040_2: vā śāṭakayugādyartham . na vā anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . śāṭakayugādyartham . śāṭakayugādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1040_3: tarhi idam vaktavyam yatra etat na jñāyate kim antarīyam kim uttarīyam iti. atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1040_4: api yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati nirjñātam tasya bhavati idam antarīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1044: 299 apuri iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1045: antarāyām puri vasati iti . vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam . vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :

GS24pmbhasuu:1140_0: anuttarapadasthasya iti vartate . tatra mukhasvaraḥ ekaḥ prayojayati . na ca ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:1140_1: prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1144: 320-322 śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ . śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śeḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1145: kuṇḍāni tiṣṭhanti vanāni tiṣṭhanti . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ anapuṃsakasya iti . na hi nañaḥ napuṃsakena sāmarthyam. kena tarhi . bhavatinā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1146: na bhavati napuṃsakasya iti . yat tāvat ucyate śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ iti . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1147: napuṃsakasya na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_0: yat anyat napuṃsakāt iti . napuṃsake avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_1: . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_2: . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_3: . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_4: satī bādhitum . yat api ucyate . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ iti yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_5: vaktavyaḥ atha vā etarhi bahūni prayojanāni . kāni . asūryampaśyāni mukhāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_0: 322-323 na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasañjñākaraṇam . na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasya sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_1: kartavyā . navāśabdasya yaḥ arthaḥ tasya sañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_2: . śabdasañjñāyām hi arthāsampratyayaḥ yathā anyatra . śabdasañjñāyām hi satyām arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_3: asampratyayaḥ syāt yathā anyatra . anyatra api śabdasañjñāyām śabdasya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_4: bhavati na arthasya . kva anyatra . dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti ghugrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_5: ghagrahaṇeṣu ca śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_6: na vaktavyam . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ . itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . saḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_7: bhaviṣyati . kim gatam etat itinā āhosvit śabādhikyāt arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_8: . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke gauḥ ayam iti āha iti gośabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_9: prayujyamānaḥ gośabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_10: pracyutaḥ yā asau arthapadārthakatā tasyāḥ śabdapadārthakaḥ sampadyate . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_11: api navāśabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ navāśabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_12: . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau śabdapadārthakatā tasyāḥ laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:1154_13: artham sampratyāyayati . na vā iti yat gamyate na vā iti yat pratīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1159: navā kuṇḍikā navā ghaṭikā iti . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api vibhāṣāsañjñā syāt . vibhāṣā diksamāse bahuvrīhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:1160_0: dakṣiṇapūrvasyām śālāyām . acirakṛtāyām sampratyayaḥ syāt . na vā vidhipūrvakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1160_1: pratiṣedhasamapratyayaḥ yathā loke . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . vidhipūrvakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1160_2: . vidhāya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:1161_0: grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ na vā . na iti gamyate . asti kārṇam yena loke pratiṣedhavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1161_1: samapratyayaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . viliṅgam hi bhavān loke nirdeśam karoti . āṅga
GS24pmbhasuu:1161_2: hi samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyatām pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1162: grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ navaḥ . pratyagraḥ iti gamyate . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1163: kva cit vyākaraṇe samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate iti . api ca kāmacāraḥ prayoktuḥ śabdānām abhisambandhe . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1164: yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ bhujinā abhisambadhyate bhujiḥ navāśabdena tadā pratiṣedhavācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1165: yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . na iti gamyate . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ navāśabdena abhisambadhyate na bhujinā tadā pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1166: yavāgūḥ navā bhavatā bhoktavyā . pratyagrā iti gamyate . na ca iha vayam vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sarvādīni abhisambadhnīmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1167: diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni vibhāṣā bhavanti iti . kim tarhi . bhavatiḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1168: diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni bhavanti vibhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1172: 325-328 vidhyanityatvam anupapannam pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . vidhyanityatvam na upapadyate : śuśāva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_0: śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . pratiṣedhasya iyam sañjñā kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_1: . tena vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_2: . siddham etat . katham . prasajyapratiṣedhāt . prasajya kim cit na vā iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_3: . tena ubhayam bhaviṣyati . vipratiṣiddham tu . vipratiṣiddham tu bhavati . atra na jñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_0: kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . na vā prasaṅgasāmarthyāt anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_1: pratiṣedhaviṣayāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_2: ca vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_3: bhaviṣyati anyatra vidhiviṣayāt . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yā aprāpte vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_4: . yā hi prāpte kṛtasāmarthyaḥ tatra pūrveṇa vidhiḥ iti kṛtvā pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_5: syāt . etat api siddham . katham . vibhāṣā iti mahatīsañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_6: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_7: karaṇe etat prayojanam ubhayoḥ sañjñā yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1179: na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra yā tāvat aprāpte vibhāṣā tatra pratiṣedhyam na asti iti kṛtvā vā iti anena vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati . yā hi prāpte vibhāṣā tatra ubhayam upasthitam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_0: na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra na iti anena pratiṣiddhe vā iti anena vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_1: . evam api vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanānupapattiḥ . vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanam na upapadyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1181_0: śuśāva śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ śiśvāya śiśviyatuḥ śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1181_1: cet na pratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati iti cet pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na iti cet na vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1181_2: . na it cet vidhiḥ na sidhyati . siddham tu pūrvasya uttareṇa bādhitatvāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1181_3: etat. katham . pūrvavidhim uttarvidhiḥ bādhate . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśāṛthaḥ iti uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_0: 328-332 sādhvanuśāsane asmin yasya vibhāṣā tasya sādhutvam . sādhvanuśāsane asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_1: śāstre yasya vibhāṣā kriyate saḥ vibhāṣā sādhuḥ syāt . samāsaḥ ca eva hi vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_2: . tena samāsasya eva vibhāṣā sādhutvam syāt . astu . yaḥ sādhuḥ saḥ prayokṣyate.
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_3: asādhuḥ na prayokṣyate . na ca eva hi kadā cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti asyām avasthāyām asādhutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_4: iṣyate . api ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ . icchāmaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_5: punaḥ vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_6: . yasya punaḥ kāryāḥ śabdāḥ vibhāṣā asau samāsam nirvartayati . yasya api nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1185_7: śabdāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sādhutvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1186: samāsaḥ iti eṣā sañjñā vibhāṣā bhavati iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1187: medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . na etat vicāryate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1188_0: anaḍvān na anaḍvān iti . kim tarhi ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti . kārye yugapadanvācayayaugapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1188_1: . kāryeṣu śabdeṣu yugapat anvācayena ca yat ucyate tasya yugapadvacanatā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_0: ḍhak ca maṇḍūkāt iti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ prayuktānām asau sādhutvam anvācaṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_1: . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_2: iti ucyate . na ca ekasyāḥ prakṛteḥ anekasya pratyayasya yugapat paratvena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_3: asti . na api brūmaḥ pratyayamālā prāpnoti . kim tarhi . kartavyam iti prayoktavye
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_4: yugapat dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthagatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_5: śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_6: tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ācāryadeśaśīlane
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_7: ca tadviṣayatā . ācāryadeśaśīlanena yat ucyate tasya tadviṣayatā prāpnoti . ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_8: hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ gālavasya prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iti gālavāḥ eva hrasvān prayuñjīran
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_9: prākṣu ca eva hi phin syāt . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_0: jamadagniḥ vai etat pañcamam avadānam avādyat tasmāt na ajāmadagnyaḥ pañcāvattam
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_1: juhoti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ gālavagrahaṇam tasya pūjārtham deśagrahaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_2: kīrtyartham . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api pūjārtham gālavagrahaṇam syāt deśagraham
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_3: ca kīrtyartham . tatkīrtane ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . tatkīrtane ca dvaidham śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_4: apratipattiḥ syāt . icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ ācāryagrahaṇeṣu deśagrahaṇeṣu ca dvaidham śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_5: pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_0: 332-333 aśiṣyaḥ vā viditatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ vā punaḥ ayam yogaḥ . kim kāraṇam . viditatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_1: . yat anena yogena prārthyate tasya arthasya viditatvāt . ye api hi etām sañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_2: na ārabhante te api vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . yājñikāḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_3: sañjñām anārabhamāṇāḥ vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . tat yathā . medhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_4: paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_5: gamyate . ācāryaḥ khalu api sañjñām ārabhamāṇaḥ bhūyiṣṭham anyaiḥ api śabdaiḥ etam
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_6: artham sampratyāyayati bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1199: 333-339 aprāpte trisaṃśayāḥ . itaḥ uttaram yāḥ vibhāṣāḥ anukramiṣyāmaḥ aprāpte tāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ . trisaṃśayāḥ tu bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1200: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . dvandve ca vibhāṣā jasi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1201_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1201_1: vā ubhayatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ sarvādiṣu paṭhyate tayapaḥ ca ayajādeśaḥ kriyate . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:1201_2: vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . ayac pratyayāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:1201_3: . yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . mātracaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1201_4: evam bhaviṣyati . katham . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1201_5: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti ā āyacaḥ cakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1202: atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ iti vartate . evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . ūrṇoḥ vibhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1203_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1203_1: vā ubhayatra . asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1203_2: vā iti . aprāpte . anyat hi kittvam anyat ṅittvam . ekam cet ṅitkitau . yadi ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:1203_3: ṅitkitau tataḥ asti sandehaḥ . atha hi nānā na asti sandehaḥ . yadi api nānā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1203_4: api sandehaḥ . katham . praurṇuvi iti . sārvadhātukam apit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1203_5: vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . vibhāṣā upayamane :
GS24pmbhasuu:1204_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1204_1: vā ubhayatra . gandhane iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1204_2: aprāpte . gandhane iti nivṛttam . anupasargāt vā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1205_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1205_1: vā ubhayatra . vṛttisargatāyaneṣu kramaḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1205_2: vā iti . aprāpte . vṛttyādiṣu iti nivṛttam . vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛgādīnām :
GS24pmbhasuu:1206_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1206_1: vā ubhayatra . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1206_2: iti . aprāpte . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti nivṛttam . uṣavidajāgṛbhyaḥ anyatarasyām :
GS24pmbhasuu:1207_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1207_1: vā ubhayatra . pratyayāntāt iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1208_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1208_1: vā ubhayatra . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1208_2: iti . aprāpte . kartari iti vartate . evam api sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1209_0: nyāyye vā kartari karmakartari vā iti . na asti sandehaḥ . sakarmakasya kartā karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:1209_1: bhavati akarmakāḥ ca dīpādayaḥ . akarmakāḥ api vai sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1209_2: . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇām ca bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1210_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1210_1: vā ubhayatra . ābhīkṣṇye iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1210_2: . aprāpte . ābhīkṣṇye iti nivṛttam . tṛnādīnām vibhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1211_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1211_1: vā ubhayatra . ākrośe iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:1211_2: . ākrośe iti nivṛttam . ekahalādau pūrayitavye anyatarasyām . prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1211_3: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . udakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1211_4: udaḥ sañjñāyām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:1211_5: . sañjñāyām iti nivṛttam . śvādeḥ iñi padāntasya anyatarasyām . prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
