GS24pmbhasuu:1317_1: pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_2: pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ . atha ubhayam nivṛttam tataḥ abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_3: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhakte dīrghanalopasvaraṇatvānusvāraśībhāvāḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1318: kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrgha . nalopa :
GS24pmbhasuu:1320: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1321: ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . svara :
GS24pmbhasuu:1323: sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi . sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . svara . ṇatva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1325: māṣavāpāṇi vrīhivāpāṇi . pūrvānte prātipadikāntanakārasya iti siddham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1327: abhakte numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1330: parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ : vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1333_0: trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . napuṃsakāt uttarasya auṅaḥ śībhāvaḥ bhavati iti śībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1333_1: na prāpnoti . śībhāva . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate . parādau guṇavṛddhyauttvadīrghanalopānusvāraśībhāvenakārapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1334: trapuṇe jatune tumburuṇe . gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . vṛddhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1336: atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . sakhyuḥ asambuddhau iti ṇittve acaḥ ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . vṛddhi . auttva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1338: trapuṇi jatuni tumburuṇi . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti auttvam prāpnoti . auttva . dīrgha :
GS24pmbhasuu:1340: kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1341: asthīni dadhīni priyasakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . dīrgha . nalopa :
GS24pmbhasuu:1343: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1344: ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . anusvāra :
GS24pmbhasuu:1346: parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ : vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1349_0: trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . sanumkasya śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1349_1: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1349_2: kasmāt . numā vyavahitatvāt . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1349_3: dvigusvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvantaḥ kriyate napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1351_0: pañcāratninī daśāratninī . numi kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnunvanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1351_1: vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ num ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1354: saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā dvigusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1358: 357-359 kimartham idam ucyate . ecaḥ ik savarṇākāranivṛttyartham . ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ucyate savarṇanivṛttyartham akāranivṛttyartham ca . savarṇnivṛttyartham tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_0: eṅaḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti . akāranivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_1: ca . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau . mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . tayoḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_2: kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau . mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_3: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghāḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_4: ikaḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_5: iti ucyate . tena dīrghāḥ na bhaviṣyanti . viṣyārtham etat syāt . ecaḥ hrasvaprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_6: ik bhavati iti . dīrghāprasaṅgaḥ tu nivartakatvāt . dīrghāṇām tu ikām aprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_7: . kim kāraṇam . nivartakatvāt . na anena ikaḥ nirvartyante . kim tarhi . anikaḥ nivartyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_8: . siddhāḥ eva hrasvāḥ ikaḥ ca anikaḥ ca . tatra anena anikaḥ nivartyante . savarṇanivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_9: tāvat na arthaḥ . siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt . siddham etat . katham . eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_10: ikārokārau bhaviṣyataḥ . ardhaḥ ekāraḥ aradhaḥ okāraḥ vā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_11: eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraukārau . na tau staḥ . yadi hi tau syātām tau eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_12: ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:1362_0: śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva loke
GS24pmbhasuu:1362_1: na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . akāranivṛttyarthena api na
GS24pmbhasuu:1362_2: arthaḥ . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt avarṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1362_3: . bhūyasī mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ alpīyasī avarṇasya . bhūyasaḥ eva grahaṇāni bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1362_4: . tat yathā brāhmaṇagrāmaḥ ānīyatām iti ucyate tatra ca avarataḥ pañcakārukī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1366: 360 kim idam sthāneyogā iti . sthāne yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā . saptamyalopaḥ nipātanāt . tṛtiyāyā vā etvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1367: sthānena yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_0: 360-364 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_2: . iṣyate ca vyākaraṇe yā ṣaṣṭhī sā sthāneyogā eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_3: na sidhyati iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_4: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ śāsaḥ gohaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_5: iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tu na sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_6: śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti gohaḥ ca antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_7: syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprāptiḥ yogasya asandigdhatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_8: avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca niyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yogasya asandigdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_9: . sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_10: . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate. laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāṇtaḥ . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_0: grāmāntaram gamiṣyāmi panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . amuṣmin
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_1: avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ amuṣmin avakāśe hastavāmaḥ iti . yaḥ tu atra tiryakpathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_2: bhavati na tasmin sandehaḥ iti kṛtvā na asau upadiśyate . evam iha api sandehe niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_3: na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . atha vā sthāne ayogā sthāneyogā kim idam ayogā
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_4: iti . avyaktayogā ayogā . atha vā yogavatī yogā . kā punaḥ yogavatī . yasyāḥ bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_5: yogāḥ . kutaḥ etat . bhūmni hi matup bhavati . viśiṣṭā vā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_6: vā kim cid liṅgam āsajya vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_0: itthaṃliṅgā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā bhavati iti . na tat liṅgam avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_1: . yadi evam śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ śā hau śāsigrahaṇam kartavyam sthāneyogārtham liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_2: āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na kartavyam . yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_3: etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . adhikāraḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_4: triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ supravijvalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_5: sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_6: anukṛṣyate tadvat anukṛṣyate cakāreṇa . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_7: iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_8: iti tadā hi yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakaṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_9: sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . sampratyayamātram etat bhavati . na hi anuccārya
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_10: śabdam liṅgam śakyam āsaṅktum . evam tarhi ādeśe tat liṅgam kariṣyate tat prakṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:1374_11: āskantsyati . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate yatra ekā ṣaṣṭhī anekam ca viśeṣyam tatra na sidhyati : aṅgasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_0: samprasāraṇasya iti . hal api viśeṣyaḥ aṇ api viśeṣyaḥ samprasāraṇam api viśeṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_1: . asati punaḥ niyame kāmacāraḥ ekayā ṣaṣthyā anekam viśeṣayitum . tat yathā . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_2: putraḥ pāṇiḥ kambalaḥ iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ niyamena . nanu ca uktam ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_3: yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_4: api loke bahavaḥ abhisambandhāḥ ārthāḥ yaunāḥ maukhāḥ srauvāḥ ca śabdasya tu śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_5: kaḥ anyaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ sthānāt . śabdasya api śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_6: anantarādayaḥ abhisambandhāḥ . asteḥ bhūḥ bhavati iti sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1378: sthāne anantare samīpe iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1379_0: vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . sthāne iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1379_1: . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:1379_2: sthānena yathā yujyeta yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā . kim kṛtam bhavati . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1379_3: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1385: tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . saṅkhyātānudeśena api etat siddham . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1386: tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahuvarthaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca etat api saṅkhyātānudeśena eva siddham . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1391_0: kaṇṭhasthānayoḥ kaṇṭhasthānaḥ tālusthānayoḥ tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānayoḥ oṣṭhasthānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1391_1: yathā syāt iti . atha sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthānagrahaṇam kimartham . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1391_2: anekavidham āntaryam tatra sthānataḥ eva āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt . kim punaḥ tat . cetā stotā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1392_0: pramāṇataḥ akāraḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti sthānataḥ ekāraukārau . punaḥ sthānagrahaṇāt ekāraukārau
GS24pmbhasuu:1392_1: bhavataḥ . atha tamabgrahaṇam kimartham . jhayaḥ haḥ anyatarasyām iti atra soṣmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1392_2: soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ nādavataḥ nādavantaḥ iti tṛtīyāḥ . tamapgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:1392_3: soṣmāṇaḥ nādavantaḥ ca te bhavanti caturthāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1397: 366-370 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sthānentaratamavacanam . sthānī ekatvena nirdiśyate : akaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1399_0: dīrghaḥ iti . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:1399_1: sarvatra prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca antaratamāḥ eva syuḥ iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:1399_2: na sidhyati . tasmāt sthāne antaratamaḥ iti vacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1399_3: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathā punaḥ iyam antaratamanirvṛtttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1402: sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . ubhayathā api tulyā saṃhitā : sthānentaratama ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1403: uraṇ raparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prakṛtitaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1405: yaṇām ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1406: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1407: dadhi atra madhu atra . kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1408: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:1409: guṇavṛddhyoḥ ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1410: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1411: netā lavitā nāyakaḥ lāvakaḥ . cetā stotā cāyakaḥ stāvakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1412: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge guṇavṛddhyoḥ yat antaratamam ṛvarṇam tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1413: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt : kartā hartā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1416: hārakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1417: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . atha ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ayam doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1419: sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām vāntādeśasya yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1420_0: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa sthāninirdeśam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1420_1: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . katham . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1420_2: . yi pratyaye ecaḥ ayādayaḥ bhavanti iti eva. yadi na kriyate ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1421: jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1422: kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt anyatra api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1423: kṣeyam pāpam jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1424: kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ anayoḥ ca śakyāṛthe eva iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti : lavyam ,

GS24pmbhasuu:1497: mālarśyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1498_0: kartā hartā kirati girati . ṛvarṇāntasya iti ucyate . na ca etat ṛvarṇāntam . nanu

GS24pmbhasuu:1499: pituḥ iti . ubhayam na vaktavyam . katham . iha yaḥ dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau anyatarataḥ vyapadeśam . tat yathā devadattasya putraḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:1557_0: 391-392 kim idam algrahaṇam antyaviśeṣaṇam āhosvit ādeśaviśeṣaṇam . kim ca ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1557_1: yadi antyaviśeṣaṇam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . anekāl api ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1557_2: antyasya prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ al antyasya iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ anekāl
GS24pmbhasuu:1557_3: śit sarvasya iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1558_0: al eva antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti . evam api antyaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1558_1: kaḥ doṣaḥ . vākyasya api padasya api antyasya prasajyeta . yadi khalu api eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1558_2: tat na kriyeta iti antyaviśeṣaṇe api sati tat na kariṣyate . katham . ṅit ca alaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1559: ṅit eva anekāl antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1563_0: 392-394 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1563_1: . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ kriyate sthāne prasaktasya . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1563_2: hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1563_3: syuḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam yogaśeṣaḥ vijñāyeta . yogaśeṣe ca . kim . aniṣṭam prasajyete
GS24pmbhasuu:1563_4: . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya syuḥ . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate :

GS24pmbhasuu:1568_1: ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:1568_2: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1568_3: vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1568_4: syāt . yadi ca ayam niyogataḥ sarvādeśaḥ syāt tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:1568_7: karoti . itarathā hi loṭaḥ eruprakaraṇe eva brūyāt tihyoḥ tāt āśiṣi anyatarasyām iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:1572_1: . alaḥ antyasya iti utsargaḥ . tasya ādeḥ parasya anekālśit sarvasya iti apavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:1572_2: . apavādavipratiṣedhāt tu sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1573: dvīpam anvīpam . anekālśit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ asteḥ bhūḥ :

GS24pmbhasuu:1576: iha . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :

GS24pmbhasuu:1581: 396-397 śit sarvasya iti kim udāharaṇam . idamaḥ iś : itaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:1583: aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_0: jasaḥ śī jaśśasoḥ śiḥ . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_1: anyat śitkaraṇe prayojanam . kim . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . śi

GS24pmbhasuu:1584_4: na syāt . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na syāt . asati lope anekāl . yadā anekāl tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_5: sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tada pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā

GS24pmbhasuu:1589_0: 398-401 vatkaraṇam kimartham . sthānī ādeśaḥ analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne sañjñādhikaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1589_1: ayam tatra sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1589_2: bhavati iti vadheḥ eva syāt . hanteḥ na syāt . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1589_3: bhavati . sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā . atha ādeśagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1589_4: kimartham . sthānivat analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm sthānivat syāt . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1589_5: sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca sthāne bhavati . ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam ādeśamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:1589_6: sthānivat yathā syāt . ekadeśavikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1589_7: bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham. sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1593_0: alā vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prātipadikarnirdeśaḥ ayam . prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1593_1: ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit prādhānyena vibhaktim āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:1593_2: nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1596_0: alāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate tatra eva pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1596_1: syāt . yatra viśeṣaṇatvena al āśrīyate tatra pratiṣedhaḥ na syāt . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1596_2: . pradīvya prasīvya iti valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1600_0: 401-402 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt ādeśe sthānivadanudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1600_1: guruvat guruputre iti yathā . anyaḥ sthānī anyaḥ ādeśaḥ . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1600_2: kāraṇāt sthānikāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1600_3: bhavati iti hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . iṣyate ca vadheḥ api syāt iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1600_4: ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt . sthānivadanudeśaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1600_5: . guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā . tat yathā guruvat asmin guruputre vartitavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1600_6: gurau yat kāryam tat guruputre atidiśyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_0: evam iha api sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate . na etat asti prayojanam . lokataḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_1: siddham . tat yathā loke yaḥ yasya prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau tatkāryāṇi . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_2: yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ yājyakulāni gatvā agrāsanādīni labhate . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_3: loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya api tu puruṣārambhaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . asti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_4: iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ . asti iti āha . kaḥ . svarūpavidhiḥ . hanteḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_5: ucyamānam hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_6: ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe iti ādeśapratiṣedham śāsti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_7: kṛtvā jñāpakam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktau kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_8: syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ sthānivat ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ ādeśe pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:1605_0: saḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati alvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1605_1: na bhavati iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyap ti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1605_2: karoti . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1609_0: 403-406 ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge alvidhau pratiṣedhe aviśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1609_1: adarśanāt . alvidhau pratiṣedhe asati api viśeṣaṇe samāśrīyamaṇe asati tasmin viśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ vidheḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1610: pradīvya prasīvya . kim kāraṇam . tasya adarśanāt . valādeḥ iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca evamarthaḥ eva ayam yatnaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_0: anyasya kāryam ucyamānam anyasya yathā syāt iti . satyam evamarthaḥ na tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_1: . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyātideśe viśeṣānatideśaḥ . sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1612_0: brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat kṣatriye
GS24pmbhasuu:1612_1: atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam iha api sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1612_2: yat pratyayakāryam tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam valādeḥ iti na tat atidiśyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1612_3: evam agrahīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sicaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . analvidhau iti punaḥ ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1613: pradīvya prasīvya iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ alam āśrayate valam nāma . iha ca pratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1614: agrahīt iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ analam āśrayati iṭam nāma . yadi tarhi sāmānyam api atidiśyate viśeṣaḥ ca sati āśraye vidhiḥ iṣṭaḥ . sati ca valāditve iṭā bhavitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_0: aruditām aruditam arudita . kim ataḥ yat sati bhavitavyam . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_1: alvidhitvāt . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . alvidhitvāt . alvidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_2: bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na vā ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_3: itareṇa bhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_4: atra ānudeśikasya valāditvasya pratiṣedhaḥ . svāśrayam atra valāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_5: . na etat vivadāmahe valādiḥ na valādiḥ iti . kim tarhi . sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukatvam

GS24pmbhasuu:1628_1: . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu . tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśavikṛtasya

GS24pmbhasuu:1629_0: śvā karṇe vā pucche vā chinne śvā eva bhavati na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ iti . anityatvavijñānam

GS24pmbhasuu:1629_3: tatra saḥ eva ayam vikṛtaḥ ca etat nityeṣu na upapadyate . tasmāt upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1630: ekadeśavikṛteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ekadeśavikṛteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu :
GS24pmbhasuu:1631: tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . anādeśatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti ucyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1632_0: na ca ime ādeśāḥ . rūpānyatvāt ca . anyat khalu api rūpam pacati iti anyat pacatu
GS24pmbhasuu:1632_1: iti . ime api ādeśāḥ . katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . ime ca api ādiśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:1632_2: ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet na anāśritatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet tat na . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1632_3: kāraṇam . anāśritatvāt . yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:1633: samudāye āśrīyamāṇe avayavaḥ na āśrīyate iti . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāyasya avayavaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1634_0: vṛkṣaḥ pracalan saha avayavaiḥ pracalati . āśrayaḥ iti cet alvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . āśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1634_1: iti cet alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1634_2: doṣaḥ . na evam sati kaḥ cit api analvidhiḥ syāt . ucyate ca idam analvidhau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1635: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ alvidhiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ alvidhiḥ . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate . yatra nāntarīyakaḥ al āśrīyate na asau alvidhiḥ . atha vā uktam ādeśagrahaṇasya prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_0: 411-412 anupapannam sthānyādeśatvam nityatvāt . sthānī ādeśaḥ iti etat nityeṣu śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_1: na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . nityatvāt . sthānī hi nām yaḥ bhūtvā na bhavati . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_2: hi nāma yaḥ abhūtvā bhavati . etat ca nityeṣu śabdeṣu na upapadyate yat sataḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_3: vināśaḥ syāt asataḥ vā prādurbhāvaḥ iti . siddham tu yathā laukikavaidikeṣu abhūtapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_4: api sthānaśabdaprayogāt . siddham etat . katham . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_5: abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1641: upādhyāyasya sthāne śiṣyaḥ iti ucyate na ca tatra upādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati . vede api :
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_0: somasya sthāne pūtīkatṛṇāni abhiṣuṇuyāt iti ucyate na ca tatra somaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_1: bhavati . kāryavipariṇāmāt vā siddham . atha vā kāryavipariṇāmāt siddham etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_2: idam kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . kāryā buddhiḥ . sā vipariṇamyate . nanu ca kāryāvipariṇāmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_3: iti bhavitavyam . santi ca eva hi auttarpadikāni hrasvatvāni . api ca buddhiḥ sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_4: iti anarthāntaram . kāryā buddhiḥ kāryaḥ sampratyayaḥ kāryasya sampratyayasya vipariṇāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_5: kāryavipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . parihārantaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_6: katham ca idam parihārāntaram syāt . yadi bhūtapūrve sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . bhūtapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_7: ca api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . katham . buddhyā . tat yathā kaḥ cit kasmai cit upadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_8: prācīnam grāmāt āmrāḥ iti . tasya sarvatra āmrabuddhiḥ prasaktā . tataḥ paścāt aha
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_9: ye kṣīriṇaḥ avarohavantaḥ pṛthuparṇāḥ te nyagrodhāḥ iti. saḥ tatra āmrabuddhyāḥ nyagrodhabuddhim
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_10: pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati buddhyā āmrān ca apakṛṣyamāṇān nyagrodhān ca ādhīyamānān
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_11: . nityāḥ eva ca svasmin viṣaye āmrāḥ nityāḥ ca nyagrodhāḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_12: . evam iha api astiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra astibuddhiḥ prasaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_13: . saḥ asteḥ bhūḥ iti astibuddhyāḥ bhavatibuddhim pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_14: buddhyā astim ca apakṛṣyamāṇam bhavatim ca ādhīyamānam . nityaḥ eva svasmin viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:1642_15: astiḥ nityaḥ bhavatiḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:1654_4: ā āyacaḥ cakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1654_5: iti vartate . evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:1654_6: asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1654_7: . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vrīhibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1654_8: āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti it guṇaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1655: arthātideśāt siddham iti . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ ādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1656_0: atikhaṭvaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇena grahaṇāt sulopaḥ mā bhūt iti . nanu ca dīrghāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1656_1: . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . sthānivatpratiṣedhaḥ eva jyāyān
GS24pmbhasuu:1657_0: atikhaṭvāya atimālāya . yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ na bhavati . atha idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:1657_1: dīrghatve kṛte pit ca asau bhūtapūrvaḥ iti kṛtvā yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1657_2: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu ca idānīm sati api sthānivadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:1657_3: etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam iha upasthātum . na iti āha . na hi idānīm kva cit api sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1657_4: syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam. praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1658: ṅī* ī* īkārāntāt ā* āp ākārāntāt iti . āhibhuvoḥ īṭpratiṣedhaḥ . āhibhuvoḥ īṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1659_0: āttha abhūt . astibrūgrahaṇena grahaṇāt īṭ prāpnoti . āheḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1659_1: jñāpayati na āheḥ īṭ bhavati iti yat ayam āhaḥ thaḥ iti jhalādiprakaraṇe thatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1659_2: śāsti . na etat asti prayojanam. asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . bhūtapūrvagatiḥ yathā vijñāyeta :

GS24pmbhasuu:1661: bruvaḥ pañcānām āditaḥ āthaḥ bruvaḥ iti . bhavateḥ ca api na vaktavyaḥ . astisicaḥ apṛkte iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1662: asteḥ sakārāntāt iti . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1663: vadhakam puṣkaram iti . sthānivadbhāvāt vṛddhitatve prāpnutaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1664: na ayam ṇvul . anyaḥ ayam akaśabdaḥ kit auṇādikaḥ rucakaḥ iti yathā . iḍvidhiḥ ca . iḍvidheyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1665_0: āvadhiṣīṣṭa . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1665_1: ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . sa nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1665_2: . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:1666_0: āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1666_1: pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye vadhibhāve kṛte sati śiṣṭatvāt pratyayasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1666_2: bhaviṣyati . ākārāntāt nukṣukpratiṣedhaḥ . ākārāntāt nukṣukoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1667: vilāpayati bhāpayate . lībhīgrahaṇena grahaṇāt nukṣukau prāpnutaḥ . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1668: lī* ī* īkārāntasya bhī* ī* īkārāntasya ca iti . loḍādeśe śābhāvajabhāvadhitvahilopaittvapratiṣedhaḥ . loḍādeśe eṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1672: stāt . loḍādeśe kṛte śābhāvaḥ jabhāvaḥ dhitvam hilopaḥ ettvam iti ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1673_0: loḍādeśaḥ kriyatām ete vidhayaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt loḍādeśaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1673_1: idānīm loḍādeśe kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt kasmāt ete vidhayaḥ na bhavanti . sakṛdgatau

GS24pmbhasuu:1678_0: viduṣaḥ paśya . śatuḥ anumaḥ nadyajādī antodāttāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1678_1: doṣaḥ . anumaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . anumaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra numam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1678_2: . anumaḥ iti na idam āgamagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1678_3: pratyāhāraḥ . ukārāt prabhṛti ā numaḥ makārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam lunata punata
GS24pmbhasuu:1678_4: atra api prāpnoti . anumgrahaṇena na śatrantam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . śatā eva viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1679: śatā yaḥ anumkaḥ iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . āgamagrahaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1680: muñcatā muñcataḥ iti . goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu . goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : citragvagram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1681_0: śabalagvagram . sarvatra vibhāṣā goḥ iti vibhāṣā pūrvatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2406_1: tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:2407_0: eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe brahmadattavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2407_1: ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aṅitam ṅit iti āha . ṅidvat iti gamyate . akitam
GS24pmbhasuu:2407_2: kit iti āha . kidvat iti gamyate . tadvadatideśe akidvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tadvadatideśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2407_3: akidvidhiḥ api prāpnoti . sṛjidṛśoḥ jhali am akiti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2409: akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2410: kiti na iti . sarvatra sanantāt ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu sanantāt ātmanepadam prāpnoti . uccukuṭiṣati nicukuṭiṣati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2411_0: ṅiti iti ātmanepadam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2411_1: kāryātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvasya yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2411_2: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saptamyarthe api vatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2412: mathurāyām iva mathurāvat pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat evam ṅiti iva ṅidvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2416_0: 7-10 atha kimartham pṛthak ṅitkitau kriyete na sarvam kit eva vā syāt ṅit eva vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2416_2: . pṛthaganubandhatve prayojanam vacisvapiyajādīnām asamprasāraṇam sārvadhātuke caṅādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2420: atra api prāpnoti . caṅādiṣu prayojanam . ke punaḥ caṅādayaḥ . caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . caṅ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2422: śūnavān iti evam aśiśviyat : atra api prāpnoti . aṅ : yathā iha bhavati śūnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2426: yathā iha bhavati suptaḥ iti evam svapnak :
GS24pmbhasuu:2428: yathā iha bhavati iṣṭaḥ iti evam yajvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2430: yathā iha bhavati uṣitaḥ iti evam āvasathaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2432: yathā iha bhavati iṣṭam evam yajñaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2433: atra api prāpnoti . jāgraḥ aguṇavidhiḥ . jāgarteḥ aguṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgṛtaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2434: jāgṛthaḥ iti aṅiti iti paryudāsaḥ evam jāgaritaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2435: jāgaritavān iti atra api prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2436: jāgraḥ guṇavidhiḥ . jāgarteḥ guṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgaritaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_0: jāgaritavān evam jāgṛtaḥ jāgṛthaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_1: . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:2438_0: atra api prāpnoti . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2438_1: . kim ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . na iti āha . adeśe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām ca kitpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2438_2: iti . yathā iha bhavati devitvā sevitvā na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ evam kuṭitvā puṭitvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2439: atra api prāpnoti . atha vā deśe eva ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2440: yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ evam nuvitvā dhuvitvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2441_0: atra api prāpnoti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi atra niyogataḥ ātideśikena ṅittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2441_1: aupadeśikam kittvam bādhyeta . sati api tu ṅittve kit eva eṣaḥ . tasmāt nūtvā dhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2445: 10-11 sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kimartham . apit iti iyati ucyamāne ārdhadhātukasya api apitaḥ ṅittvam prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2446: kartā hartā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena ārdhadhātukasya ṅittvam bhavati iti yat ayam ārdhadhātukīyān kān cit ṅitaḥ karoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2447_0: caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . sārvadhātuke api etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha . tulyajātīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2447_1: jñāpakam . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakāḥ caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . kathañjātīyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2447_2: ca ete . ārdhadhātukāḥ . yadi etat asti tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam iti caṅaṅau luṅvikaraṇānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2447_3: jñāpakau syātām najiṅ vartamānakālānām ṅvanip bhūtakālānām athaṅśabdaḥ auṇādikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2451: 11-12 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ : yat anyat pitaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2453: pit na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśapratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2454: cyavante plavante . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ apitaḥ ādivat syāt . asti anyat pitaḥ iti kṛtvā ṅittvam prāpnoti . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2455: pit na iti . na pit ṅit iti cet uttamaikādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . pit na iti cet uttamaikādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2456_0: tudāni likhāni . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt eva . pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ pitaḥ ādivat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2456_1: . tatra pit na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2456_2: ubhayathā api doṣaḥ iti . ubhayathā api na doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:2460: 12-13 ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt vipratiṣedhena . ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:2461_0: vavṛte vavṛdhe . uktam vā . kim uktam . na vā ksasya anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2461_1: iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat anavakāśam kitkaraṇam guṇam bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2461_2: iha punaḥ ubhayam sāvakāśam . kitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ:
GS24pmbhasuu:2464: vavṛte vavṛdhe . paratvāt guṇaḥ prāpnoti . idam tarhi uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2465: iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati itI .
GS24pmbhasuu:2469_0: 14 kimartham idam ucyate . indheḥ samyogārtham vacanam bhavateḥ pidartham . ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2469_1: yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . indheḥ chandoviṣayatvāt bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt tābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2469_2: kidvacanānarthakyam . indheḥ chandoviṣayaḥ liṭ . na hi antareṇa chandaḥ indheḥ anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2469_3: liṭ labhyaḥ . āmā bhāṣāyām bhavitavyam . bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt . bhavateḥ api nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2469_4: vuk . kṛte api prāpnoti akṛte api . tābhyām kidvacanānarthakyam . tābhyām indhibhavitibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2473_0: 15 kimartham mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate . kit eva hi ktvā . na ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2473_1: seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti tadbādhanārtham . yadi tarhi mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2473_2: kittvam ucyate na arthaḥ na ktvā seṭ iti anena kittvapratiṣedhena . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2474: mṛḍādibhyaḥ eva parasya ktvaḥ kittvam bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate iha api tarhi niyamān na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2475_0: lūtvā pūtvā . atra api akittvam prāpnoti . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2475_1: . yathājātīyakaḥ mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā . kathañjātīyakaḥ mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2475_2: . seṭ . evam api asti atra kaḥ cit vibhāṣiteṭ . saḥ aniṭām niyāmakaḥ syāt . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2475_3: tāvat ye seṭaḥ teṣām grahaṇam niyamāṛtham . yaḥ idānīm vibhāṣiteṭ tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2476: (P_1,2.8) KA_I,195.14 Ro_II,16 svapipracchyoḥ sanartham grahaṇam kit eva hi ktvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2480: 16-21 kimartham ikaḥ parasya sanaḥ kittvam ucyate . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt . ikaḥ kittvam ucyate guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_0: cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati . na etat asti prayojanam . dīrghārambhāt . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_1: bhaviṣyati . kṛte bhavet . kṛte khalu dīrghatve guṇaḥ prāpnoti . anarthakam tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_2: anarthakam evam sati dīrghatvam syāt . na anarthakam . hrasvārtham . hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_3: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . bhavet hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na syāt . dīrghāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_4: tu prasajyate . dīrghāṇām tu khalu guṇaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_5: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na dīrghāṇām dīrghāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . na hi bhuktavān
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_6: punaḥ bhuṅkte na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . nanu ca punaḥ pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_7: api dṛṣṭā . bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_8: hi punaḥ bhāvyam . sāmarthyāt tatra punaḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_9: vā . dīrghāṇām punaḥ dīrghatvavacane na kim cit prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_10: api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ yad adagdham tat dahati . dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_11: etat prayojanam guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_12: yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣati . yathā eva tarhi dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_13: guṇaḥ na bhavati evam ṝdittvam api na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2482_0: cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti. ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam . na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2482_1: . kim kāraṇam . ṝtaḥ iti ucyate . bhavet hrasvānām na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2482_2: dīrghāṇām tu khalu akṛte api dīrghatve ṝdittvam prāpnoti . dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe
GS24pmbhasuu:2482_3: . dīrghāṇām api na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti . yadā dīrghatvena guṇaḥ bādhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2482_4: tataḥ uttarakālam ṝdittvam bhavati . ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_0: jñīpsati . kva astāḥ kva nipatitāḥ kva kittvam kva ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ vā abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_1: yat sati kittve ṇilopaḥ syāt asati na syāt . eṣaḥ abhisambandhaḥ yat sati kittve
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_2: sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate . asati punaḥ kittve anavakāśam dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_3: yathā eva guṇam bādhate evam ṇilopam api bādheta . tatra ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_0: jñīpsati . paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . asati api kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_1: . isbhāvaḥ . nimitsati pramitsati . mīnātiminotyoḥ dīrghatve kṛte mīgrahaṇena grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_2: yathā syāt . yathā eva tarhi asati kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_3: evam guṇaḥ api bādheta . tasmāt kittvam vaktavyam . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt dīrghārambhāt kṛte bhavet |
GS24pmbhasuu:2488: anarthakam tu hrasvārtham dīrghāṇām tu prasajyate ||
GS24pmbhasuu:2489: sāmarthyāt hi punaḥ bhāvyam ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2493_0: 22-23 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . katham hi ikaḥ nāma hal antaḥ syāt anyasya anyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2493_1: katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . igvataḥ halaḥ iti . yadi evam yiyakṣati atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:2493_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi igupadhāt halantāt iti vakṣyāmi . evam api dambheḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2493_3: . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2493_4: iti . na ayuktaḥ . antaśabdaḥ ayam asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā vastrāntaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_0: vasanāvayavaḥ iti gamyate . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā udakāntam gataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_1: . udakasamīpam gataḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_2: evam api dambheḥ na sidhyati . yaḥ atra iksamīpe hal na tasmāt uttaraḥ san . yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_3: uttaraḥ san na asau iksamīpe hal . evam tarhi dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_0: ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti āhosvit ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_1: ca ataḥ. yadi vijñāyate ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_2: . atha vijñāyate ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_3: . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_4: . liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ iti . sic ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadam sic
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_5: na asti iti kṛtvā ātmanepadapare sici kāryam vijñāsyate . atha vā punaḥ astu ātmanepadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_6: parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti . nanu ca uktam sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . liṅ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_7: viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ liṅ na asti iti kṛtvā ātmanepade liṅi kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_8: vijñāsyate . na eva vā punaḥ arthaḥ liṅviśeṣaṇena ātmanepadagrahaṇena . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_9: . jhal iti vartate . ātmanepadeṣu ca eva liṅ jhalādiḥ na parasmaipadeṣu . tat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_10: sijviśeṣaṇam ātmanepadagrahaṇam . atha sijviśeṣaṇe ātmanepadagrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2502: avātsīt . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api anaiṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2504: atra api prāpnoti . etat api na asti prayojanam . halantāt iti vartate . evam api akoṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2505: amoṣīt : atra api prāpnoti . na etat asti prayojanam . jhal iti vartate . evam api abhaitsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2507: atra api prāpnoti . na etat asti . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2509: asrākṣīt . kim ca syāt . akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2513: 25-27 it ca kasya takārettvam . kasya hetoḥ ikāraḥ taparaḥ kriyate . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt iti . ṛte api saḥ . antareṇa api ārambham siddhaḥ atra dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2514: ghumāsthāgāpājahāti iti . anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2515_0: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt iti . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantarārthe ārambhe hrasvaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2515_1: na punaḥ plutaḥ iti . plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . viṣaye khalu plutaḥ ucyate . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2515_2: ca saḥ viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam eva tadā plutena . it ca kasya takārettvam dīrghaḥ mā bhūt ṛte api saḥ |
GS24pmbhasuu:2516: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2520: 27-31 na seṭ iti kṛte akittve . na seṭ iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ ktvāgrahaṇena . niṣṭhāyam api tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2521_0: gudhitaḥ gudhitavān iti . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2521_1: . kim avadhāraṇam . niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhṛṣaḥ iti . parokṣāyām tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2522: kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt . mā bhūt evam . iṭi iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2523_0: jagmiva jaghniva . kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na syāt . jñāpakāt na parokṣāyām . jñāpakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2523_1: parokṣāyām na bhaviṣyati . kim jñāpakam . sani jhalgrahaṇam viduḥ . yat ayam ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2523_2: jhal iti jhalgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2523_3: na ātideśikasya iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . jhalgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :

GS24pmbhasuu:2546_5: iṭ seṭprakaraṇāt ca iṭi eva vibhāṣā kittvam prāpnoti . iḍvidhau hi agrahaṇam . iḍvidhau
