GS24pmbhasuu:2554_1: . yadi vidhīyate ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi ktvā . atha pratiṣidhyate sangrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2554_2: anarthakam . akit eva hi san . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2555: ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam . ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam vidhīyate . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2556: ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi ktvā iti . na anarthakam . na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_0: 34 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . ū iti anena kālaḥ pratinirdiśyate ū iti ayam ca varṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_1: . tatra ayuktam varṇasya kālena saha sāmanādhikaraṇyam . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_2: . ūkālakālasya iti . kim idam ūkālakālasya iti . ū iti etasya kālaḥ ūkālaḥ . ūkālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_3: kālaḥ asya ūkālakālaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_4: atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā uṣṭramukham mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2561: kharamukhaḥ evam ūkālakālaḥ ūkālaḥ iti . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kālasahacaritaḥ varṇaḥ api kālaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_1: aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . nirdeśavaiṣamyāt . tisraḥ sañjñāḥ ekā sañjñī . vaiṣamyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_2: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu samasṅkhyatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_3: . samasaṅkhyatvāt . katham samasaṅkhyatvam . trayāṇām hi vikāranirdeśaḥ . trayāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_4: ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_5: . tisṛṇām sañjñānām karaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi api tāvat tisṛṇām sañjñānām karaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_6: jñāyate trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_0: etena ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . ādau mātrikaḥ tataḥ dvimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_1: tataḥ trimātraḥ iti . na punaḥ mātrikaḥ madhye vā ante vā syāt tathā dvimātraḥ ādau
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_2: vā ante vā syāt tathā trimātraḥ ādau vā madhye vā syāt . ayam tāvat trimātraḥ aśakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_3: ādau vā madhye vā kartum . kutaḥ . plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_4: api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_5: ayam tāvat trimātraḥ aśakyaḥ ādau vā madhye vā kartum . plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_6: prasajyeta iti . plutāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ plutasañjñā ca anena eva . yadi ca trimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_7: ādau vā madhye vā syāt plutasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ pratkṛtibhāvaḥ . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_8: ucyate mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_9: bhaviṣyati iti . hrasvāśrayā hi ghisañjñā hrasvasañjñā ca anena eva. yadi ca mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_10: madhye vā ante vā syāt hrasvasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ ghisañjñā kutaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_11: . evam eṣā vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_12: ante bhavati iti yat ayam vibhāṣā pṛṣṭaprativacane heḥ iti mātrikasya plutam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_13: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ ante syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_14: plutasañjñā asya syāt. tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam anarthakam syāt . madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_15: tarhi syāt iti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ madhye bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_16: yat ayam ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca it dīrghatvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_17: yaḥ madhye saḥ dīrghasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ madhye syāt dīrghasañjñā asya syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_18: . tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam anarthakam syāt . dvimātraḥ tarhi ante syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_19: . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dvimātraḥ ante bhavati iti yat ayam om abhyādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_20: iti dvimātrikasya plutam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_21: . yadi ca dvimātrikaḥ ante syāt plutasañjñā asya syāt . tatra dvimātrakālasya dvimātrakālavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_22: anarthakam syāt . mātrikeṇa ca asya pūrvanipātaḥ bādhitaḥ iti kṛtvā kva anyatra utsahate
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_23: bhavitum anyat ataḥ madhyāt . evam eṣā vyavasthā prakḷptā . bhavet vyavasthā prakḷptā
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_24: . dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghaplutayoḥ api pūrvasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2566_25: . kā . hrasvasañjñā . kim kāraṇam . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . siddham tu taparanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2567_0: udūkālaḥ iti . yadi evam drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2567_1: kālabhedāt . drutādiṣu ca uktam . kim utktam . siddham tu . avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2567_2: cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante iti . saḥ tarhi taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2567_3: kartavyaḥ . iha kālagrahaṇam kriyate . yāvat ca taparakaraṇam tāvat kālagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_0: ukālaḥ ūkālaḥ ū3kālaḥ iti . atha vā ekasañjñādhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_1: ekā sañjñā bhavati yā parā anavakāśā ca iti evam hi dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_2: bhaviṣyati . atha vā svam rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā iti ayam yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_3: . tatra yat etat aśabdasañjñā iti etat yayā vibhaktyā nirdiśyamānam arthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2569: aṇudit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ aśabdasañjñāyām iti . atha vā hrasvasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idam prayojanam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2570_0: sañjñayā vidhāne niyamam vakṣyāmi iti . hrasvasañjñayā yat ucyate tat acaḥ sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2570_1: yathā syāt iti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi kiñcitkarāṇi hrasvaśāsanāni syuḥ . yataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2570_2: tu khalu yāvat ajgrahaṇam tāvat hrasvagrahaṇam ataḥ akiñcitkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_0: ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti vakṣyāmi iti . anucyamāne hi etasmin hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_1: ik bhavati iti vaktavyam syāt . hrasvaḥ napuṃsake prātipadikasya ecaḥ ik bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_2: iti . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ ecaḥ ik bhavati iti . hrasvaḥ halādiḥ śeṣaḥ ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_3: ik bhavati iti . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_4: . laghīyaḥ ca triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti na punaḥ sañjñākaraṇam . triḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_5: hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ṣaṭ grahaṇāni . sañjñākaraṇe punaḥ aṣṭau . hrasvasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_6: vaktavyā . triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_7: iti . ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti . saḥ ayam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_8: yatnam ārabhate tasya etat prayojanam dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2576: 40-41 kim ayam alontyaśeṣaḥ āhosvit alontyāpavādaḥ . katham ca ayam taccheṣaḥ syāt katham vā tadapavādaḥ . yadi ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:2577: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya iti tataḥ ayam taccheśaḥ . atha nānā vākyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2579_0: acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya anantyasya ca iti tataḥ ayam tadapavādaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2579_1: atra viśeṣaḥ . hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2579_2: ajgrahaṇam . hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2579_3: ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . vacipracchyoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:2579_4: prāpnoti . śamādīnām dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti . hanigamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2579_5: dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti . astu tarhi tadapavādaḥ . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2583: atinau evam suvāk brāhmaṇakulam iti atra api prāpnoti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2585: cīyate stūyate evam bhidyate atra api prāpnoti . nāmi dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2588: ṣaṇṇām . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nopadhyāyāḥ iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . prakṛtasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt. kim ca prakṛtam . nāmi iti . tena bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2589: ṣaṇṇām . anyate tanyate atra api prāpnoti . atha api evam niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2590: nopadhāyāḥ nāmi eva iti evam api bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2591: anyate tanyate . ṣaṇṇām iti atra prāpnoti . atha api ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_0: nopadhāyāḥ eva nāmi nāmi eva nopadadhyāyāḥ iti evam api bhidyate suvāk brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_1: ita atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_2: etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī prāduḥ bhāvyate . tatra kāmacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2593: gṛhyamāṇena vā acam viśeṣayitum acā vā gṛhyamāṇaḥ . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu gṛhyamāṇena acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2594: eṣām acaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . iha idānīm napuṃsakahrasvākṛtsārvadhātukanāmidīrgheṣu acā gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2595: napuṃsakasya hrasvaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ . ajantasya iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2601_0: saḥ iti . sañjñayā vidhāne niyamaḥ . sañjñayā ye vidhīyante teṣu niyamaḥ . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2601_1: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ac iti vartate . tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2602_0: acaḥ ac bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti evam bhāvyamanaḥ iti . atha pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2602_1: yoge ajgrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam . ajgrahaṇam saṃyogācsamudāyanivṛttyartham . ajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2602_2: kriyate saṃyognivṛttyartham acsamudāyanivṛttyartham ca . saṃyognivṛttyartham tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2603: pratakṣya prarakṣya . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk iti tuk mā bhūt iti . acsamudāyanivṛttyartham : titaucchatram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2604: titaucchāyā . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti vibhāṣā mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2608_0: 43-45 kim ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2608_1: halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti paribhāṣā na prakalpate . katham halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2608_2: nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . evam tarhi nivṛttam . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2608_3: . atha prathamānirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2608_4: . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi ete vyañjanasya api guṇāḥ lakṣyante . nanu ca pratyakṣam upalabhyante :
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_0: iṣe tvā ūrje tvā . na ete vyañjanasya guṇāḥ . acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_1: api tadguṇam upalabhyate . tat yathā . dvayoḥ raktayoḥ vastrayoḥ madhye śuklam vastram
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_2: tadguṇam upalabhyate badarapiṭake riktakaḥ lohakaṃsaḥ tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_3: nu khalu etat acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam api tadguṇam upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_4: iti . na punaḥ vyañjanasya ete guṇāḥ syuḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu ac api tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_5: iti . antareṇa api vyañjanam acaḥ eva ete guṇāḥ lakṣyante . na punaḥ antareṇa acam
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_6: vyañjanasya uccāraṇam api bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2610: svayam rājante svarāḥ . anvak bhavati vyañjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2614_0: 45-46 uccanīcasya anavasthitatvāt sañjñāprasiddhiḥ . idam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2614_1: . tat eva hi kam cit prati uccaiḥ bhavati kam cit prati nīcaiḥ . evam kam cit kaḥ cit adhīyānam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2615: kim uccaiḥ rorūyase . atha nīcaiḥ vartatām iti . tam eva tathā adhīyānam aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2616: kim antardantakena adhīṣe . uccaiḥ vartatām iti . evam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam . tasya anavasthānāt sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . evam tarhi lakṣaṇam kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_0: āyāmaḥ dāruṇyam aṇutā khasya iti uccaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . āyāmaḥ gātrāṇām nigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_1: . dāruṇyam svarasya dāruṇatā rūkṣatā . aṇutā khasya kaṇṭhasya saṃvṛtatā . uccaiḥkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_2: śabdasya . atha nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . anvavasargaḥ mārdavam urutā khasya iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_3: śabdasya . anvavasargaḥ gātrāṇām śithilatā . mārdavam svarasya mṛdutā snigdhatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_4: urutā khasya mahattā kaṇṭhasya . iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . etat api anaikāntikam
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_5: . yat alpaprāṇasya sarvoccaiḥ tat mahāprāṇasya sarvanīcaiḥ . siddham tu samānaprakramavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_6: . siddham etat . katham . samāne prakrame iti vaktavyam . kaḥ punaḥ prakramaḥ . uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_0: 46-48 samāhāraḥ svaritaḥ iti ucyate . kasya samāhāraḥ svaritasañjñaḥ bhavati . acoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_1: iti āha . samāhāraḥ acoḥ cet na abhāvāt . samāhāraḥ acoḥ cet tat na . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_2: . abhāvāt . na hi acoḥ samāhāraḥ asti . nanu ayam asti gāṅgenūpe iti . na eṣaḥ acoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_3: samāhāraḥ . anyaḥ ayam udāttānudāttayoḥ sthāne ekaḥ ādiśyate . evam tarhi guṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_4: . guṇayoḥ cet na acprakaraṇāt . guṇayoḥ samahāraḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_5: acprakaraṇāt . ac iti vartate . siddham tu acsamudāyasya abhāvāt tadguṇe sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_6: . siddham etat . katham . acsamudāyaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā tadguṇasya acaḥ samāhāraguṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_7: sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ samāhāraḥ iti anena ac śakyaḥ pratinirdeṣṭum
GS24pmbhasuu:2621_8: . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣpakāḥ eṣām te puṣpakāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2622: kālakāḥ eṣām te kālakāḥ iti evam samāhāravān samāhāraḥ . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_0: ghāṭaḥ iti . yadi evam traisvaryam na prakalpate . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . traisvaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_1: adhīmahe iti etat na upapadyate . na etat guṇāpekṣam . kim tarhi . ajapekṣam . traisvaryam adhīmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2624: triprakāraiḥ ajbhiḥ adhīmahe kaiḥ cit udāttaguṇaiḥ kaiḥ cit anudāttaguṇaiḥ kaiḥ cit ubhayaguṇaiḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_0: śuklaguṇaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaguṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ . yaḥ idānīm ubhayaguṇaḥ saḥ tṛtīyām ākhyām labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_1: kalmāṣaḥ iti vā sāraṅgaḥ iti vā . evam iha api udāttaguṇaḥ udāttaḥ anudāttaguṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_2: anudāttaḥ . yaḥ idānīm ubhayavān sa tṛtīyām ākhyām labhate svaritaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2629_0: 48-50 ardhahrasvam iti ucyate . tatra dīrghaplutayoḥ na prāpnoti . kanyā śaktike3
GS24pmbhasuu:2629_1: śaktike . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . mātracaḥ atra lopaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . ardhahrasvamātram ardhahrasvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2629_2: iti . kimartham idam ucyate . āmiśrībhūtam iva idam bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2631: kiyat kṣīram kiyat udakam kasmin avakāśe kṣīram kasmin avakāśe udakam iti . evam iha api āmiśrībhūtatvāt na jñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2632: kiyat udāttam kiyat anudāttam kasmin avakāśe udāttam kasmin avakāśe anudāttam iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2633_0: iyat udāttam iyat anudāttam asmin avakāśe udāttam asmin avakāśe anudāttam iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2633_1: ayam evam suhṛt kim anyāni api evañjātīyakāni na upadiśati . kāni punaḥ tāni . sthānakaraṇānupradānāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2633_2: . vyākaraṇam nāma iyam uttarā vidyā . saḥ asau chandaḥśāstreṣu abhivinītaḥ upalabdhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2633_3: avagantum utsahate . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . idam api upalabdhyā gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2634: tasya svaritasya āditaḥ ardhahrasvam udāttasañjñam iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu svaritagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2636_0: udāttasvaritayoḥ yaṇaḥ svaritaḥ anudāttasya na udāttasvaritodayam iti . sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2636_1: hi nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . laghīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2636_2: ca triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu svaritagrahaṇam na punaḥ sañjñākaraṇam . triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2636_3: svaritagrahaṇe nava akṣarāṇi sañjñākaraṇe punaḥ ekādaśa . evam tarhi ubhayam anena
GS24pmbhasuu:2636_4: kriyate anvākhyānam ca sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2637_0: tasya svaritasya āditaḥ ardhahrasvram udāttasañjñam bhavati iti . ūrdhvam āttam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2637_1: ca ataḥ udāttam . yadi tarhi sañjñākaraṇam udāttādeḥ yat ucyate tat svaritādeḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2637_2: prāpnoti . anvākhyānam eva tarhi idam mandabuddheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_1: kāryam svaritāt iti siddhyartham . svaritasyārdhahrasvodāttāt ā udāttasvaritaparasyasannataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_2: iti etasmāt sūtrāt idam sūtrakāṇḍam ūrdhvam udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_3: kāryam . kim prayojanam . svaritāt iti siddhyartham . svaritāt iti siddhiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2642: imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2643: kāryam devadattayajñadattau . svaritodāttārtham ca . svaritodāttārtham ca tatra eva kartavyam . na subrahmaṇyāyām svaritasya tu udāttaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2644: indra agaccha . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_0: subrahmaṇyom indra agaccha . svaritodāttāt ca asvaritārtham . svaritodāttāt ca asvaritārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_1: tatra eva kartavyam . indra agaccha harivaḥ agaccha . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_2: . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca tatra eva kartavyam . udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2646: maṇavaka jaṭilakādhyāpaka nyaṅ . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2647_0: maṇavaka jaṭilakābhirūpaka kva . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . devabrahmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2647_1: anudāttavacanam jñāpakam svaritāt iti siddhatvasya . devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2647_2: jñāpakam siddhaḥ iha svaritaḥ iti . yadi etat jñāpyate svaritodāttaparasya anudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2647_3: svaritatvam prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttavacanam jñāpakam siddhaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2647_4: svaritaḥ iti . kim tarhi . param etat kāṇḍam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2653: sambodhanam sambuddhiḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pāribhāṣikyāḥ devāḥ brahmāṇaḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . atha anvarthagrahaṇam na doṣaḥ . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_0: 53-54 kim punaḥ iyam ekaśrutiḥ udāttā āhosvit anudāttā . na udāttā . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_1: . yat ayam uccaistarām vā vaṣaṭkāraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . atantram taranirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_2: . yāvat uccaiḥ tāvat uccaistarām iti . yadi tarhi na udāttā anudāttā . anudāttā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_3: na . katham jñāyate . yat ayam udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_4: jñāpakam . atantram taranirdeśaḥ . yāvat sannaḥ tāvat sannataraḥ iti . sā eṣā jñāpakābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_5: udāttānudāttayoḥ madhyam ekaśrutiḥ antarālam hriyate . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2658_0: kim punaḥ iyam ekaśrutiḥ udāttā uta anudāttā . udāttā . katham jñāyate . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2658_1: uccaistarām vā vaṣaṭkāraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tantram taranirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2658_2: . uccaiḥ dṛṣṭvā uccaistarām iti etat bhavati . yadi tarhi udāttā na anudāttā . anudāttā
GS24pmbhasuu:2658_3: ca . katham jñāyate . yat ayam udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ iti āha . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2658_4: jñāpakam . tantram taranirdeśaḥ . sannam dṛṣṭvā sannataraḥ iti etat bhavati . te
GS24pmbhasuu:2658_5: ete tantre taranirdeśe sapta svarāḥ bhavanti : udāttaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2663: svarite yaḥ udāttaḥ saḥ anyena viśiṣtaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2668: 55-56 subrahmaṇyāyam okāraḥ udāttaḥ . subrahmaṇyāyam okāraḥ udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2669: subrahmaṇyom . ākāraḥ ākhyāte parādiḥ ca . ākāraḥ ākhyāte parādiḥ ca udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2670: indra agaccha . harivaḥ agaccha . vākyādau ca dve dve . vākyādau ca dve dve udātte bhavataḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2671: indra agaccha . harivaḥ agaccha . maghavanvarjam . agaccha maghavan . sutyāparāṇām antaḥ . sutyāparāṇām antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2672: dvyahe sutyam . tryahe sutyam . asau iti antaḥ . asau iti antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2673: gārgyaḥ yajate . vātsyaḥ yajate . amuṣya iti antaḥ . amuṣya iti antaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_0: dākṣeḥ pita yajate . syāntasya upottamam ca . syāntasya upottamam udāttam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_1: antaḥ ca . gārgyasya pita yajate . vātsyasya pita yajate . vā nāmadheyasya . vā nāmadheyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2675: devadattasya pita yajate . devadattasya pita yajate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2679: 56-57 devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttatvam eke . devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttatvam eke icchanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2684: 57-59 svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyavacanam . svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyam vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2685_0: agniveśyaḥ pacati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2685_1: . tena bahūnām aikaśrutyam syāt dvyekayoḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2685_2: tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2685_3: bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2686: avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2687_0: kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam sapalālam satuṣam āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2687_1: ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān sakaṇṭakān
GS24pmbhasuu:2687_2: saśakalān āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati
GS24pmbhasuu:2687_3: . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2687_4: . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam iti cet vyavahitānām aprasiddhiḥ . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2687_5: iti cet vyavahitānām aikaśrutyam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2688_0: imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri . anekam api iti tu vacanāt siddham . anekam
GS24pmbhasuu:2688_1: api ekam api svaritāt param saṃhitāyām ekaśruti bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2688_2: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2689_0: svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyavacanam . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2689_1: vyavahitānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam anudāttasya ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_0: anudāttayoḥ ca anudāttānām ca anudāttānām iti . evam api ṣaṭprabhṛtīnām eva prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_1: . ṣaṭprabhṛtiṣu ekaśeṣaḥ parisamāpyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti dvyekayoḥ api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2694_0: 59-62 apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . apṛktasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2694_1: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . ekahal pratyayaḥ apṛktasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2694_2: prayojanam . svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . svādilope halaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2695_0: halṅyābbhyaḥ dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti apṛktasya iti eva siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2695_1: algrahaṇam . aṇiñoḥ lugartham algrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . aṇiñoḥ luki
GS24pmbhasuu:2696: ṇyakṣatriyārṣañitaḥ yūni luk aṇiñoḥ iti apṛktasya iti eva siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ . aṇiñoḥ lugartham iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2697_0: phāṇṭāhṛteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ pḥāṇṭāhṛtaḥ iti . ṇavacanasāmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2697_1: . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham vacanam . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_0: phak ataḥ mā bhūt iti . pailādiṣu vacanāt siddham . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt pailādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_1: eva pāṭham kurvīta . tatra pāṭhāt anyeṣām api phakaḥ nivṛttiḥ bhavati . evam siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_2: sati yat ayam ṇam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na asya luk bhavati iti . tāni etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_3: trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam kartavyam . svādilope halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_4: grahaṇam na kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam kartavyam . algrahaṇe api vai kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_5: tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām algrahaṇam kartavyam . svādilope
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_6: halaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . apṛktagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2698_7: kartavyam . tatra na asti lāghavakṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2699: algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_0: jāgṛviḥ . al eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_1: gaṃsyate . algrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi yaḥ al ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt algrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_2: syāt . halgrahaṇe api kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati darviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_3: jāgṛviḥ . hal eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_4: gaṃsyate . halgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi yaḥ hal ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_5: anarthakam syāt . asti anyat halgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . halantasya yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_6: alantasya mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_7: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra varṇagrahaṇe jātigrahaṇam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_8: etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt siddham iti uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_0: 62-63 tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsaikārthatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_1: . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsasya ekārthatvāt sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_2: aprasiddhiḥ . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ nāma anekārthāśrayam ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_3: . siddham tu padasāmānādhikaraṇyāt . siddham etat . katham . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_4: karmadhārayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_5: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsaikārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_6: aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tatpuruṣaḥ asti prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_7: aikasvaryam ekavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam ;
GS24pmbhasuu:2705: tatpuruṣārthāni padāni tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tat yaḥ tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya iha grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_0: 63-64 prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_1: .prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_2: aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kaṣṭādīnām samāse prathamām paśyāmaḥ . siddham tu samāsavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_3: vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . samāsavidhāne prathamānirdiṣṭam upasarjanasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_4: bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā tādarthyāt tācchabdyam . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_5: vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhavati. samāsārtham śāstram samāsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2713: 64-67 yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ tataḥ anyatra api upasarjanasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ kriyate tataḥ anyatra api tasya upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_0: rajñaḥ kumārīm rājakumārīm śritaḥ . śritādisamāse dvitīyāntam prathamānirdiṣṭam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_1: tasya ṣaṣṭhīsamāse api upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti . siddham tu yasya vidhau tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_2: iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . yasya vidhau yat prathamānirdiṣṭam tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_3: tat upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_4: . upasarjanam iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_5: etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_6: anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . apradhānam upasarjanam iti . pradhānam upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_7: iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2715: yam prati yat apradhānam tam prati tat upasarjanasñjñam bhavati iti . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante kasmāt tatra pradhānasya upasarjanasañjñā na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2716_0: rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ upasarjanatve uktam . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2716_1: . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ iti . evam na ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2716_2: akṛtam bhavet upsarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2716_3: na bhaviṣyati . yadi api tāvat etat upasarjanakāryam parihṛtam idam aparam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2716_4: . rājñaḥ kumāryāḥ rājakumāryāḥ . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2716_5: . uktam vā . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2720: 67-68 dvitīyādīnām api anena upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra apūrvanipāte iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2721: pūrvanipāte na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2722_0: yat anyat pūrvanipātāt iti . pūrvanipāte avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:2722_1: bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . tena bhaviṣyati . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā
GS24pmbhasuu:2722_2: yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2726: 68 ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantavacanam . ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantānām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2727: ardham pippalyāḥ ardhapippalī iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśardārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam . ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2731: 68 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam dviguprāptāpannālampūrvopasargāḥ ktārthe . dviguḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2733: prāptaḥ jivikām prāptajīvikaḥ . āpannaḥ jīvikām āpannajīvikaḥ . alampūrva :
GS24pmbhasuu:2739: 69-71 arthavat iti vyapadeśāya : varṇānām ca mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . vanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2740_0: dhanam iti nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . adhātuḥ iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2740_1: . ahan vṛtram iti . adhātuḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati ahan vṛtram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2740_2: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dhātoḥ prātipadikasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam supaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2740_3: dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . pratiṣiddhārtham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2741: api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti . apratyayaḥ iti kimartham . kāṇḍe kuḍye . apratyayaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati kāṇḍe kuḍye* iti . kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2742: kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2746: 71-77 arthavati anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . arthavati prātipadikasañjñāyām anekasya api padasya prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2747_0: daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ sphaiyakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2747_1: pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavārthavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2747_2: samudāyārthavattvam yathā loke . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2747_3: samudāyāḥ api arthavantaḥ bhavanti yathā loke . tat yathā loke āḍhyam idam nagaram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_0: gomat idam nagaram iti ucyate na ca tatra sarve āḍhyāḥ bhavanti sarve vā gomantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_1: . yathā loke iti ucyate loke ca avayavāḥ eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ . ātaḥ ca avayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_2: eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ . yasya hi tat dravyam bhavati saḥ tena kāryam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_3: yasya ca gāvaḥ santi saḥ tāsām kṣīram ghṛtam ca upabhuṅkte . anyaiḥ etat draṣṭum
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_4: api aśakyam . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2750: gomat idam iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2751: iha tāvat āḍhyam idam nagaram iti akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2752_0: āḍhyāḥ asmin santi iti tat idam āḍhyam iti . gomat idam iti matvantāt matvarthīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2752_1: lupyate . evam api vākyapratiṣedhaḥ arthavattvāt . vākyasya prātipadikasñjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2753_0: devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . kim kāraṇam . arthavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2753_1: . arthavat hi etat vākyam bhavati . na vai padārthāt anyasya arthasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2753_2: bhavati vākye . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2753_3: . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet evam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2754_0: padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ bhavati vākye . iha devadatta iti ukte kartā nirdiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2754_1: karma kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau . gām iti ukte karma nirdiṣṭam kartā kriyāguṇau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2754_2: anirdiṣṭau . abhyāja iti ukte kriyā nirdiṣṭā kartṛkarmaṇī guṇaḥ ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . śuklām
GS24pmbhasuu:2754_3: iti ukte guṇaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ kartṛkarmaṇī kriyā ca anirdiṣṭā . iha idānīm devadatta gām
GS24pmbhasuu:2754_4: abhyāja śuklām iti ukte sarvam nirdiṣṭam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2755_0: devadattaḥ eva kartā na anyaḥ . gauḥ eva karma na anyat . abhyājiḥ eva kriyā na anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2755_1: . śuklām eva na kṛṣṇām iti . eteṣām padānām sāmānye vartamānānām yadviśeṣe avasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2755_2: saḥ vākyārthaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2756: samāsaḥ eva arthavatām samudāyāyānām prātipadikasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā na prāpnoti : bahupaṭavaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_0: uccakaiḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra prātipadikasañjñayā prārthyate . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_1: yathā syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_2: evam luk api na bhaviṣyati . tatra yā eva antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ eva śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_3: bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . bahupaṭavaḥ iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_4: bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2758_0: citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham iti . tasyām punaḥ luptāyam yā anyā vibhaktiḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2758_1: tasyāḥ prakṛtyanekadeśatvāt antodāttatvam na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2758_2: jñāpayati bhavati prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā iti yat ayam aprayayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2758_3: iti pratiṣedham śāsti . saḥ ca tadantapratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2758_4: vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca ayam prāptyarthaḥ api vaktavyaḥ . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena . kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_0: kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati na anyasya pratyayāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_1: iti . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_2: vā prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā . ubhayam na vaktavyam . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_3: ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām samāsaḥ . subantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_4: . suptiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2760: jahi karmaṇā bahulam ābhīkṣṇye kartāram ca abhidadhāti iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2762: etasya eva suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti . tiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . tiṅsamudāyasya api prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2763: ākhyātam ākhyātena kriyāsātatye iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2764: etasya eva tiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_0: 77-79 arthavattā na upapadyate kevalena avacanāt . arthavattā na upapadyate vṛkṣaśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_1: . kim kāraṇam . kevalena avacanāt . na kevalena vṛkṣaśabdena arthaḥ gamyate . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_2: tarhi . sapratyayakena . na vā pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_3: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratyayena nityasambandhāt . nityasambandhau etau arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_4: prakṛtiḥ pratyayaḥ iti . pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_5: . anyat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ anyat ācaṣṭe . āmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārān ācaṣṭe . arthavattā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_6: upapadyate kevalena avacanāt iti bhavān asmābhiḥ coditaḥ kevalasya aprayoge hetum
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_7: āha . evam ca kila nāma kṛtvā codyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2769_0: samudāyasya arthe prayogāt avayavānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2769_1: . siddham etat . katham . anvayāt vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2769_2: . iha vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2770: vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ sakārāntaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2771: mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān ekatvam ca . vṛkṣau iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : sakāraḥ hīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2772: aukāraḥ upajāyate vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ anvayī . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2773: ekatvam hīyate dvitvam upajāyate mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān anvayī . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2774_0: yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2774_1: asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2774_2: anvayī. viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2776: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2777: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2778_0: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2778_1: pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa viśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:2778_2: prakaraṇam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2778_3: kasmin cid arthe pratītiḥ upajāyate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2778_4: cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:2782_0: 79-80 kim punaḥ ime varṇāḥ arthavantaḥ āhosvit anarthakāḥ . varṇasya arthavadanarthakatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2782_1: uktam . kim uktam . arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2782_2: arthadarśanāt . varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt . varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2782_3: . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt subabhāvaḥ varṇāt . anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2782_4: tu prativarṇam arthānupalabdheḥ . varṇavyatyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣu arthadarśanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_0: saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti . tasya parihāraḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_1: hiatadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_2: hi punaḥ atadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ . tat yathā . ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_3: asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca kambalaḥ samarthaḥ . ekaḥ taṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte asamarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_4: tatsamudāyaḥ ca vardhatikam samarthaḥ . ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_5: ca rajjuḥ samarthā bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_6: arthamātrā . bhavati hi kim cit prati ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca taṇḍulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_7: kṣutpratighāte samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane samarthaḥ . ime punaḥ varṇāḥ atyantāya
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_8: eva anarthakāḥ . yathā tarhi rathāṅgāni vihṛtāni pratyekam vrajikriyām prati asamarthāni
