GS24pmbhasuu:2894_5: anyatra api jāteḥ yuktavadbhāvaḥ na bhavati . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_6: pravartate utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt na tat liṅgam jahāti . na tarhi idānīm ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_7: yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . idam tatra tatra ucyate guṇavacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_8: śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti . tat anena kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2898: 104-105 harītakyādiṣu vyaktiḥ . harītakyādiṣu vyaktiḥ bhavati yuktavadbhāvena :
GS24pmbhasuu:2899: harītakyāḥ phalāni harītakyaḥ phalāni . khalatikādiṣu vacanam . khalatikādiṣu vacanam bhavati yuktavadbhāvena :
GS24pmbhasuu:2900: khalatikasya parvatasya adūrabhavāni vanāni khalatikam vanāni . manuṣyalupi pratiṣedhaḥ . manuṣyalupi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : cañcā abhirūpaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2905: 106 kim yāḥ etāḥ kṛtrimāḥ ṭighubhādisañjñāḥ tatprāmāṇyāt aśiṣyam . na iti āha . sañjñānam sañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_0: 106-109 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_1: bahuvacanam . tat yat ekavacane śāsitavye bahuvacanam śiṣyate etat ayuktam . bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_2: ekavacanam iti nāma vaktavyam . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_0: jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam . jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_1: bhaviṣyati . yat tat vrīhau vrīhitvam yave yavatvam gārgye gārgyatvam tat ekam tac
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_2: ca vivakṣitam . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . iṣyate ca bahuvacanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_3: iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti jātyākhyāyam ekasmin bahuvacanam . evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_4: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra ekavacanādeśe uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_5: kim uktam . vrīhibhyaḥ āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_6: doṣaḥ . arthātideśāt siddham . arthātideśaḥ ayam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya vacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2911_0: ucyate vacanam . bahūnām arthānām vacanam bahuvacanam iti . yāvat brūyāt ekaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2911_1: bahuvat bhavati iti tāvat ekasmin bahuvacanam iti . saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2911_2: saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekaḥ vrīhiḥ sampannaḥ subhikṣam karoti . asmadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2911_3: nāmayuvapratyayayoḥ ca . asmadaḥ nāmaprayoge yuvapratyayaprayoge ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nāmaprayoge :
GS24pmbhasuu:2912: aham devadattaḥ bravīmi . aham yajñadattaḥ bravīmi . yuvapratyayaprayoge :
GS24pmbhasuu:2913: ahaṃ gārgyāyaṇaḥ bravīmi . aham vātsyāyanaḥ bravīmi . yuvagrahaṇena nārthaḥ . asmadaḥ nāmapratyayaprayoge na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2914: aham gārgyaḥ bravīmi . aham vātsyaḥ bravīmi . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2915: asmadaḥ saviśeṣaṇasya prayoge na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2916_0: aham paṭuḥ bravīmi . aham paṇḍitaḥ bravīmi . aśiṣyam vā bahuvat pṛthakttvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2916_1: . aśiṣyaḥ vā bahuvadbhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pṛthaktvābhidhānāt . pṛthaktvena hi dravyāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2916_2: abhidhīyante . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . kim ucyate pṛthaktvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_0: jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam iti . jātiśabdena hi dravyābhidhānam . jātiśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_1: hi dravyam api abhidhīyate jātiḥ api . katham punaḥ jñāyate jātiśabdena dravyam api
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_2: abhidhīyate iti . evam hi kaḥ cit mahati gomaṇḍale gopālakam āsīnam pṛcchati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2918: asti atra kām cid gām paśyasi iti . saḥ paśyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_0: paśyati ca ayam gāḥ pṛcchati ca kām cid atra gām paśyasi iti . nūnam asya dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_1: vivakṣitam iti . tat yadā dravyābhidhānam tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā sāmānyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2923: 109-110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham aham bravīmi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2925: vayam brūmaḥ . imāni indriyāṇi kadā cit svātantryeṇa vivakṣitāni bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2926_0: idam me akṣi suṣṭhu paśyati . ayam me karṇaḥ suṣṭhu śṛṇoti iti . kadā cit pāratantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2926_1: anena akṣṇā suṣṭhu paśyāmi . anena karṇena suṣṭhu śṛṇomi iti . tat yadā svātantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2926_2: vivakṣā tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā pāratantryeṇa tadā ekavacanadvivacane bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2930: 110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham udite pūrve phalgunyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_0: uditāḥ pūrvāḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ . phalgunīsampīpagate candramasi phalgunīśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_1: . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . yadā tayoḥ eva abhidhānam tadā dvivacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2937: 110 imau api yogau śakyau avaktum . katham . punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti siddham . punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2940_0: 231.14-232.7 Ro_110-113 tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ iti kimartham . kṛttikārohiṇyaḥ . nakṣatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2940_1: iti kimartham . tiṣyaḥ ca māṇavakaḥ punarvasū maṇavakau tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2940_2: nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇam kimartham . ayam tiṣyapunarvasuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2940_3: asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . asti ca kālavācī . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_0: bahavaḥ tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ atikrāntāḥ . katareṇa tiṣyeṇa gataḥ iti . tat yaḥ jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_1: vartate tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2942: videśastham api tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ kāryam tat api nakṣatrasya eva yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2943: tiṣyapuṣyayoḥ nakṣatrāṇi yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti nakṣatragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atha vā atha vā nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatra grahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_0: puṣyapunarvasū sidhyapunarvasū . atha dvandve iti kimartham . yaḥ tiṣyaḥ tau punarvasū
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_1: yeṣām te ime tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ unmugdhāḥ . bahuvacanasya iti kimartham . uditam tiṣyapunarvasū
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_2: . katham ca atra ekavacanam . jātidvandvaḥ ekavat bhavati iti . aprāṇinām iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_3: prāpnoti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat bahuvacanagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2946_0: sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā ekavat bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bābhravaśālaṅkāyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2946_1: bābhravaśālaṅkāyanāḥ iti etat siddham bhavati . atha vā na atra bhavantaḥ prāṇināḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2950: 114-116 rūpagrahaṇam kimartham . samānānām ekaśeṣa ekavibhaktau iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva sarvam samānam śabdaḥ arthaḥ ca tatra eva syāt : vṛkṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2951: plakṣāḥ iti . iha na syāt : akṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2953_0: māṣāḥ iti . rūpagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . rūpam nimittatvena āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2953_1: śrutau ca rūpagrahaṇam . atha ekagrahaṇam kimartham . sarūpāṇām śeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2953_2: iti iyati ucyamāne dvibahvoḥ api śeṣaḥ prasajyeta . ekagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:2953_3: doṣaḥ bhavati . atha śeṣagrahaṇam kimartham . sarūpāṇām ekaḥ ekavibhaktau iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2953_4: ucyamāne ādeśaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . aśvaḥ ca asvaḥ ca aśvau :
GS24pmbhasuu:2954: āntaryataḥ dvyudāttavataḥ sthāninaḥ dvyudāttavān ādeśaḥ prasajyeta . lopyalopitā ca na prakalpeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . gargāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_0: urvāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_1: . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt. :
GS24pmbhasuu:2958: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . ekavibhaktau iti kimartham . payaḥ payaḥ jarayati . vāsaḥ vāsaḥ chādayati . brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_0: 117-119 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_1: abhidhānam . pratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante . kim idam pratyartham iti . artham
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_2: artham prati pratyartham . pratyartham śābdaniveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt na ekena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_3: anekasya arthasya abhidhānam prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra anekārthābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_4: anekaśabdatvam . tatra anekārthābhidhāne anekaśabdatvam prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_5: api anekasya abhidhānam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_6: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . kim idam pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_7: śabdāḥ abhiniveśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_8: apratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya virūpāṇām anekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2963_0: laghīyasī sarūpanivṛttirḥ garīyasī virūpapratipattiḥ iti . tat ca na . laghīyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:2963_1: virūpapratipattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yatra hi bahūnām sarūpāṇām ekaḥ śiṣyate tatra avarataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2963_2: dvayoḥ sarūpayoḥ nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā syāt . evam api etasmin sati kim cit ācāryaḥ sukaratarakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_0: 119-133 kim punaḥ ayam ekavibhaktau ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati . ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_1: iti cet na abhāvād vibhakteḥ . ekavibhaktau iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_2: vibhakteḥ . na hi samudāyāt parā vibhaktiḥ asti . kim kāraṇam . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_3: . nanu ca arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . niyamāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_4: . arthavatsamudayānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_5: vibhaktiparāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_6: tadāśrayatvāt . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2967_7: . kim ucyate ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ iti yāvatā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2968_0: na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā na kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . tadāśrayatvāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2968_1: . yatra hi prakṛtinimittā pratyayanivṛttiḥ tatra apratyayikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2968_2: bhavati agnicit somasut iti yathā . yatra ca pratyayanimittā prakṛtinivṛttiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2969: iyān iti yathā . astu saṃyogāntalopena siddham . kutaḥ nu khalu etat parayoḥ vṛkṣaśabdayoḥ nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ pūrvayoḥ iti . tatra etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2970_0: pūrvanivṛttav api satyām saṃyogādilopena siddham iti . na sidhyati . tatra avarataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2970_1: dvayoḥ sakārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta. yatra ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na asti tatra ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:2970_2: sidhyati . kva ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na asti . dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ . yadi punaḥ samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2970_3: ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2970_4: tarhi samāsagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2970_5: . tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatradvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanam nityam iti . samāse iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2970_6: cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . samāse iti cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . svara :
GS24pmbhasuu:2971: aśvaḥ ca aśvaḥ ca aśvau. samāsāntodāttatve kṛte ekaśeṣaḥ prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2972: samāsāntodāttattvam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntodāttatvam . samāsāntodāttatve ca doṣaḥ bhavati . svara . samāsānta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2973: ṛk ca ṛk ca ṛcau . samāsānte kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2974_0: samāsāntaḥ kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntaḥ . samāsānte
GS24pmbhasuu:2974_1: ca doṣaḥ bhavati . aṅgāśraye ca ekaśeṣavacanam . aṅgāśraye ca kārye ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2974_2: . svasā ca svasārau ca svasāraḥ . aṅgāśraye kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_0: aṅgāśrayam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅgāśrayam . tiṅsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_1: tiṅsamāsavacanam . tiṅsamāse tiṅsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekam tiṅgrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_2: samāse tiṅsamāsaḥ iti eva siddham . na anarthakam . tiṅsamāse prakṛte tiṅsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_3: vaktavyaḥ . tiṅvidhipratiṣedhaḥ ca . tiṅ ca kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ kaḥ cit pratiṣedhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2976_0: taḥśabdaḥ vidheyaḥ tiśabdaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . yadi punaḥ asamāse ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . asamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2976_1: vacanalopaḥ . yadi asamāse vacanalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca utpatatā eva vacanalopam
GS24pmbhasuu:2976_2: coditāḥ smaḥ . dvivacanabahuvacanavidhim dvandvapratiṣedham ca vakṣyati tadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2978: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca . dvandvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2980_0: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . cārthe dvandvaḥ iti dvandvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2980_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2980_2: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2980_3: ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . vibhaktyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2980_4: ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām eva tu nivṛttiḥ bhavati . ekavibhaktyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2980_5: iti tu pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . ekavibhaktyantānām iti tu vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2981: brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2982_0: na vā arthavipratiṣedhāt yugapadvacanābhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2982_1: . vipratiṣiddhau etau arthau kartā saṃpradānam iti aśakyau yugapat nirdeṣṭum . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2982_2: vipratiṣiddhatvāt yugapadvacanam na bhaviṣyati . anekārthāśrayaḥ ca punaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2982_3: . anekam artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . tasmāt na ekaśabdatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2982_4: . tasmāt ekaśabdatvam na bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_0: kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_1: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_2: . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sarūpatvāt . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:2984_0: mātā ca janayitrī mātārau ca dhānyasya mātṛmātāraḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarūpatvāt . sarūpāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2984_1: hi etāni prātipadikāni . kim ucyate prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2984_2: vaktavyaḥ iti na punaḥ yasya api vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ tena api mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2984_3: vaktavyaḥ syāt . tasya api hi etāni kva cit vibhaktyantāni sarūpāṇi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_0: mātṛbhyām ca mātṛbhyāṃ ca iti . atha matam etat vibhaktyantānām sārūpye bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_1: eva ekaśeṣeṇa iti prātipadikānām eva ekaśeṣe doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā codyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_3: striyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . haritasya strī hariṇī hariṇasya api hariṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2986: hariṇī ca hariṇī ca hariṇyau . śyetasya strī śyenī śyenasya api śyenī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2987: śyenī ca śyenī ca śyenyau . rohitasya strī rohiṇī rohiṇasya api rohiṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2988_0: rohiṇī ca rohiṇī ca rohiṇyau . na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2988_1: kim kāraṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam ca padam
GS24pmbhasuu:2988_2: . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:2988_3: . tasmin ca laukike prayoge sarūpāṇi etāni . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_0: na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ eva asti prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_1: iti . kim kārāṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_2: ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_3: . tasmin ca laukike prayoge prātipadikānām prayogaḥ na asti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2990_0: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2990_1: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2990_2: iti . katham . vibhaktiḥ sārūpyeṇa āśrīyate . anaimittikaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2990_3: yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . kva . yatra vā tatra vā iti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2991_0: vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2991_1: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etat api etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2991_2: iti . katham . na idam pāribhāṣikyāḥ vibhakteḥ grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2992: vibhāgaḥ vibhaktiḥ iti . ekavibhāge yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktaṃ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_0: kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_1: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥiti . sahavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_2: ekaśeṣaḥ . yugapadvivakṣāyām ekaśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2995: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . na etat sahavivakṣāyām bhavati . atha api nidarśayitum buddhiḥ evam nidarśayitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_0: vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . yat api ucyate dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_1: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam sāvakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_2: ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ iti . na tiṅantāni ekaśeṣārambham prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_3: . kim kāṛaṇam . yathājātīyakānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti tathājātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_4: ekaśeṣaḥ . na ca tiṅantānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_5: . ekā hi kriyā . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2998: tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidhyanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2999_0: pacataḥ pacanti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi . sādhanāpekṣāṇi . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2999_1: astu ekavibhaktau iti . nanu ca uktam ekavibhaktau iti cet na abhāvāt vibhakteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3000_0: arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3000_1: na prāpnoti arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3000_2: tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3004: 133-136 sarvatra apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3005: bhikṣāṇām samūhaḥ bhaikṣam iti . sarvatra iti ucyate prātipadikāṇām ca ekaśeṣe siddham . apatyādiṣu iti ucyate bahavaḥ ca apatyādayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_0: gargasya apatyam bahavaḥ gargāḥ . ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_1: na prāpnoti . nanu ca yathā eva bahavaḥ yañaḥ evam prakṛtayaḥ api bahvyaḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_2: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : gargāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3009: urvāḥ iti . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3010: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_0: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_1: na ca etat laukikam gotram . atha vā punaḥ astu ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_0: asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti iti . siddham tu samānārthānām ekaśeṣavacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_1: etat . katham . samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi samānārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3014: māṣāḥ iti . nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām . nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekārthānām api virūpāṇām . ekārthānām api virūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3015_0: vakradaṇḍaḥ ca kuṭiladaṇḍaḥ ca vakradaṇḍau kuṭiladaṇḍāu iti vā . svarabhinnānām yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3015_1: uttarasvaravidhiḥ . svarabhinnānām yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ tasya ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3020: 136-139 iha kasmāt na bhavati : ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3021_0: dvau ca dvau ca iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca anekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3021_1: . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hi ekau iti anena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3021_2: gamyate . anyapadārthatvāt ca saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3021_3: iti asya dvau iti arthaḥ . dvau ca dvau ca iti asya catvāraḥ iti arthaḥ . na etau
GS24pmbhasuu:3021_4: staḥ parihārau . yat tāvat ucyate saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt iti . arthāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3021_5: api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . gārgyaḥ ca gārgyāyaṇaḥ ca gārgyau . na ca ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3021_6: vṛddhayuvānau iti bhavati ca ekaśeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3022: anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . anyapadārthe api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3023: viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatī iti . tayoḥ catvāriṃśat iti arthaḥ . evam tarhi na imau pṛthak parihārau . ekaparihāraḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_0: saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . yatra hi arthāsampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_1: eva vā anyapadārthatā eva vā bhavati tatra ekaśeṣaḥ gārgyau viṃśatī iti yathā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_2: vā na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . yadi tarhi na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ samudāyaśabdāḥ tarhi bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_3: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ekavacanam prāpnoti . ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā yūtham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_0: vanam iti . santu tarhi ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . kiṅkṛtam sārūpyam . anyonyakṛtam sārūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_1: . santi punaḥ ke cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ . santi iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_2: tad yathā mātā pitā bhrātā iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_3: api vartante . iha punaḥ ekena api apāye na bhavati catvāraḥ iti . anyat idānīm etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_4: ucyate sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti . yat tu bhavān asmān
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_5: codayati santi punaḥ ke cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtḥ bhāvaḥ iti tatra ete
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_6: asmābhiḥ upanyastāḥ . tatra etat bhavān āha sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_7: vartante iti . etat ca vārttam . ekaikaḥ na udyantum bhāram śaknoti yat katham tatra |
GS24pmbhasuu:3027: ekaikaḥ kartā syāt sarve vā syuḥ katham yuktam ||
GS24pmbhasuu:3028: kāraṇam udyamanam cet na udyacchati ca antareṇa tat tulyam |
GS24pmbhasuu:3029: tasmāt pṛthak pṛthak te kartāraḥ savyapekṣāḥ tu ||
GS24pmbhasuu:3033: 140 prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ sarūpatvāt . prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3036: pacati ca pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_1: aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate . tena anena tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_2: bhavitavyam . kimarthena . yadarthaḥ ekaḥ . kimarthaḥ ca ekaḥ . ekaḥ ekārthaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_3: aikārthyam . na ayam ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . na aikārthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_4: iti cet ārambhānarthakyam . na aikārthyam iti cet ekaśeṣārambhaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_5: . iha hi śabdasya svābhāvikī vā anekārthatā syāt vācanikī vā . tat yadi tāvat svābhāvikī
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_6: aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ ekena uktatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_7: tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3041_0: ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate saḥ ca dvyarthaḥ bhavati bahvarthaḥ ca iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3041_1: siddham ekaśeṣaḥ iti eva . katham punaḥ ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3041_2: bahvarthatā vā śakyā labdhum . tat ca ekaśeṣakṛtam . na hi antareṇa tadvācinaḥ śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3041_3: prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati . paśyāmaḥ ca punaḥ antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3041_4: śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati iti agnicit somasut iti yathā . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_0: lopakṛtam etat yena atra antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_1: gatiḥ bhavatiti . evam iha api ekaśeṣakṛtam etat yena atra ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_2: anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā bhavati . ucyeta tarhi na tu gamyeta . yaḥ hi gām
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_3: aśvaḥ iti brūyāt aśvam vā gauḥ iti na jātu cit sampratyayaḥ syāt . tena anekārthābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_4: yatnam kurvatā avaśyam lokaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ anugantavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_0: keṣu artheṣu laukikāḥ kān śabdān prayuñjate iti . loke ca ekasmin vṛkṣaḥ iti prayuñjate
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_1: dvayoḥ vṛkṣau iti bahuṣu vṛkṣāḥ iti . yadi tarhi lokaḥ avaśyam śabdeṣu pramāṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_2: ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . atha kimartham lopaḥ ārabhyate . pratyayalakṣaṇam ācāryaḥ prārthayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_3: lopam ārabhate . ekaśeṣārambhe punaḥ asya na kim cit prayojanam asti . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3044_0: pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya abhidhānam iti . yadi ca ekena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:3044_1: anekasya arthasya abhidhānam syāt na pratyartham śabdaniveśaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt . pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3044_2: śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasya abhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet tat api pratyartham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3044_3: . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasyābhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet evam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3045_0: yat api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:3045_1: arthau prati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthān arthān prati tat api pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3045_2: eva . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām arthānām abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3045_3: tāvatām śabdānām prayogaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3045_4: nyāyyaḥ iti cet ekena api anekasya abhidhānam . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3046: eṣaḥ api nyāyyaḥ eva yat api ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . yadi tarhi ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati plakṣanyagrodhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_0: ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_1: prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_2: aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_3: . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodhārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_4: iti kṛtvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_5: api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati iti . sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_6: na virūpāṇām . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_7: na punaḥ virūpāṇām . abhidhānam punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . ubhayadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3048: virūpāṇām api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3049: dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti . virūpāṇām kila nāma ekena anekasya abhidhānam syāt kim punaḥ sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:3053: 144-150 ākṛtyabhidhānāt vā ekam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ . ākṛtyabhidhānāt vā ekam śabdam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_0: ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_1: iti . prakhyāviśeṣāt . na hi gauḥ iti ukte viśeṣaḥ prakhyāyate śuklā nīlā kapilā
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_2: kapotikā iti . yadi api tāvat prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_3: sā abhidhīyate iti . avyapavargagateḥ ca . avyapavargagateḥ ca manyāmahe ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_4: iti . na hi gauḥ iti ukte vyapavargaḥ gamyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti . jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_5: ca ekopadiṣṭam . jñāyate khalu api ekopadiṣṭam . gauḥ asya kadā cit upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_6: . saḥ tam anyasmin deśe anyasmin kāle anyasyām ca vayovasthāyām dṛṣṭvā jānāti ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3054_7: gauḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ prakhyāviśeṣāt iti ataḥ . tasya eva upodbalakam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3055: prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam iti . dharmaśāstram ca tathā . evam ca kṛtvā dharmaśāstram pravṛttam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3056_0: brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:3056_1: ca na pīyate . yadi dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam brāhmaṇam ahatvā ekām ca surām apītvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3056_2: anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ avyapavargagateḥ ca iti ataḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_0: avyapavargagateḥ ca dharmaśāstram ca tathā iti . asti ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_1: yugapat . asti khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate . kim . ādityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_2: . tad yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_3: . na ekaḥ draṣṭā ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhate . evam tarhi itīndravat
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_4: viṣayaḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_5: evam ākṛtiḥ api yugapat sarvatra bhaviṣyati . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_6: anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate iti. na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_7: iti cet tathā ekaśeṣe . yaḥ hi manyate na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapad upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_8: iti ekaśeṣe tasya doṣaḥ syāt . ekaśeṣe api na ekaḥ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ anekam artham yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_9: abhidadhīta . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti . dravyābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_10: hi ākṛtyasampratyayaḥ . dravyābhidhāne sati ākṛteḥ asampratyayaḥ syāt . tatra kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_11: doṣaḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ prāpnoti . asarvadravyagatau
GS24pmbhasuu:3057_12: kaḥ doṣaḥ . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_0: ekaḥ śāstroktam kurvīta aparaḥ aśāstroktam . aśāstrokte ca kriyamāṇe viguṇam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_1: bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . nanu ca yasya api ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_2: api yadi anavayavena codyate na ca anubadhyate viguṇam karma bhavati . viguṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_3: karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . ekā ākṛtiḥ iti ca pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_4: upādāne prayojanam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_5: tarhi anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca parisamāpyate yathā ādityaḥ . nanu ca yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_6: api dravyam padārthaḥ tasya api anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca parisamāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_7: ekaśeṣaḥ tvayā vaktavyaḥ . tvayā api tarhi dvivacanabahuvacanāni sādhyāni . codanāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_8: ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ . codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ manyāmahe ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3059_0: ekam nirupya dvitīyas tṛtīyaḥ ca nirupyate . yadi ca dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:3059_1: nirupya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca nirvapaṇam na prakalpeta . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ jāticodanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3063: 150-152 dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ . dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3064: dravyam abhidhīyate iti . tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3066: brāhmaṇau brāhmaṇāḥ iti . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt manyāmahe dravyam abhidhīyate iti . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_0: ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni kriyante . na ca ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_1: anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_2: . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne bhavati mathurāyām ca . vināśe prādurbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_3: ca sarvam tathā syāt . kim . vinaśyet ca prāduḥ ṣyāt ca . śvā mṛtaḥ iti śvā nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_4: loke na pracaret . gauḥ jātaḥ iti sarvam gobhūtam anavakāśam syāt . asti ca vairūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3068: gauḥ ca gauḥ ca khaṇḍaḥ muṇḍaḥ iti . tathā ca vigrahaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā vigrahaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3069: gauḥ ca gauḥ ca iti . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam bhavati . ākṛtau api padārthe ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : akṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_0: 153-159 liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇasya anityatvāt . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_1: kutaḥ . guṇasya anityatvāt . anityāḥ guṇāḥ apāyinaḥ upāyinaḥ ca . kim ye ete śuklādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_2: . na iti āha . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni ca . kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_3: ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_4: cit puṃstvena kadācit napuṃsakatvena . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_5: tu na upapadyate . yadi hi kadā cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_6: cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_7: uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_8: guṇavivakṣānityatvāt . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti . kutaḥ . guṇavivakṣāyāḥ anityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_9: . anityā guṇavivakṣā . kadā cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_10: kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā cit puṃstvena kadā cit napuṃsakatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_11: . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . yadi kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_12: ākṛtiḥ ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_13: iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_14: iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . liṅgaparihāraḥ ca api na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_15: . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya pravartate utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt tat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_16: na jahāti . tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_17: cit svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam . saṃstyānaprasavau
GS24pmbhasuu:3074_18: liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau iti . saṃstyāne styāyateḥ ḍraṭ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3075: strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān . nanu ca loke api styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān . adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:3076: styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān :
GS24pmbhasuu:3077: sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_0: styānam pravṛttiḥ ca . kasya punaḥ styānam strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām . keṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_1: . śabdasparśarūparasagandhānām . sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_2: śabdasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3079_0: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rūpam iti . rasagandhau na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3079_1: na hi iha kaḥ cit api svasmin ātmani muhūrtam api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate yāvat anena
GS24pmbhasuu:3079_2: vardhitavyam apacayena vā yujyate . tat ca ubhayam sarvatra . yadi ubhayam sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3079_3: kutaḥ vyavasthā . vivakṣātaḥ. saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3079_4: api avivakṣāyām napuṃsakam . tatra liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt iti liṅgaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3079_5: upapannaḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . vacanaparihāraḥ ca api upapannaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3080: atha yasya dravyam padārthaḥ katham tasya ekavacanadvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti iti . evam saḥ vakṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3081: ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . yadi tasya api vācanikāni na svābhāvikāni aham api evam vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_0: ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . na hi ākṛtipadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_1: dravyam na padārthaḥ dvavyapadārthikasya vā ākṛtiḥ na padārthaḥ . ubhayoḥ ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_2: padārthaḥ . kasya cit tu kim cit pradhānabhūtam kim cit guṇabhūtam . ākṛtipadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_3: ākṛtiḥ pradhānabhūtā dravyam guṇabhūtam . dravyapadārthikasya dravyam pradhānabhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_4: ākṛtiḥ guṇabhūtā . guṇavacanavat vā . guṇavacanavat vā liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_5: . tat yathā guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti : śuklam vastram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3084_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3084_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritā
GS24pmbhasuu:3084_2: ākṛtiḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat ākṛteḥ api bhaviṣyati . adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3084_3: . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_0: ārambhaṇādīni bhaviṣyanti . na ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti ādityavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_1: viṣayaḥ . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate iti ādityavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_2: viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_3: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā anekādhikaraṇastham ādityam yugapat upalabhate
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_4: . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_5: yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākṛtiḥ yugapat sarvatra bhaviṣyati . avināśaḥ anāśritatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_6: . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ . anāśritatvāt . anāśritā ākṛtiḥ dravyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_7: kim ucyate anāśritatvāt iti yat idānīm eva uktam adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_8: evam tarhi avināśaḥ anaikātmyāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ . anaikātmyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_9: . anekaḥ ātmā ākṛteḥ dravyasya ca . tat yathā vṛkṣasthaḥ avatānaḥ vṛkṣe chinne api
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_10: na vinaśyati . vairūpyavigrahau dravyabhedāt . vairūpyavigrahau api dravyabhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_11: bhaviṣyataḥ . vyartheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham . vibhinnārtheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_12: sarvam . aśnoteḥ akṣaḥ . padyateḥ pādaḥ . mimīteḥ māṣaḥ . tatra kriyāsāmānyāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3085_13: . aparaḥ tu āha . purākalpe etat āsīt ṣoḍaśa māṣāḥ kārṣāpaṇam ṣoḍaśaphalāḥca māṣaśambaṭyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3089: 160 iha kasmāt na bhavati : ajaḥ ca barkaraḥ ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3091: uṣṭraḥ ca karabhaḥ ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3096: strīgrahaṇe strīpratyayagrahaṇam vā syāt stryarthagrahaṇam vā strīśabdagrahaṇam vā iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pratyayagrahaṇam vā śabdagrahaṇam vā gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3097: kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . iha ca gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargān paśya :
GS24pmbhasuu:3098: tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti natvam na prāpnoti . atha arthagrahaṇam na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:3102: 161 iha kasmāt na bhavati : ajā ca barkaraḥ ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3104: uṣṭrī ca karabhaḥ ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3108: 162 iha kasmāt na bhavati : haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca kacchapaḥ ca ḍulī ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3109: rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3113_0: 162 kimartham idam ucyate na pumān striyā iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3113_1: cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3113_2: viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat imam yogam
GS24pmbhasuu:3114: yatra ūrdhvam prakṛteḥ tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_0: rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti atra ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati . pūrvayoḥ yogayoḥ bhūyān parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_1: . yāvat brūyāt gotram yūnā iti tāvat vṛddhaḥ yūnā iti . pūrvasūtre gotrasya vṛddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_0: 163-165 asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_1: vivakṣitatvāt siddham . asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣaḥ ca avivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_2: sāmānyam ca vivakṣitam . viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya ca vivakṣitatvāt sarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_3: ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti eva siddham . pumān striyā iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_0: brāhmaṇavatsā ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti . brāhmaṇavatsābrāhmaṇīvatsayoḥ vibhaktiparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_2: viśeṣavācakatvāt ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_3: tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . na atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_4: yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iha na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3122: kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . na hi atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam . katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3123_0: śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti āhosvit arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3123_1: cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3123_2: eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . idam tu na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3124: gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . atha vijñāyate arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . idam tu na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_0: kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . ubhayathā api paṭuḥ ca paṭvī ca paṭū* iti etat na
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_1: sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_2: iti na api arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . katham tarhi . śabdārthau
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_3: yā strī tatsadbhāvena ca tallakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate . evam ca kṛtvā iha api prāptiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3126_0: brāhmaṇavatsā ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3126_1: na vyapadiśati . kim . tat iti anuvartate . tat iti anena prakṛtau strīpuṃsau pratinirdiśyete
GS24pmbhasuu:3126_2: . kau ca prakṛtau . pradhāne . pradhānam yā śabdastrī pradhānam yā arthastrī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3130: 166-167 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham śuklaḥ ca kambalaḥ śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3132: śuklaḥ ca kambalaḥ śuklā ca bṛhatikā śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam ,

GS24pmbhasuu:3139_6: bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ . na hi svasari bhrātṛśabdaḥ dṛśyate . darśanam hetuḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3145_2: . advandvatatpuruṣaviśeṣaṇānām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . saḥ ca kukkuṭaḥ sā ca

GS24pmbhasuu:3149_0: 170-171 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt . tyadādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3149_1: sāmānyam arthaḥ . ātaḥ ca sāmānyam . devadatte api hi saḥ iti etat bhavati yajñadatte
GS24pmbhasuu:3149_2: api . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3150: parasya śeṣam vakṣyāmi iti . parasya ca ubhayavācitvāt . ubhayavāci param . pūrvaśeṣadarśanāt ca . pūrvasya khalu api śeṣaḥ dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3151: saḥ ca yaḥ ca tau ānaya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3152: yau ānaya iti . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_0: dvandvaḥ mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_1: siddham . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_2: dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti ucyate śūdrābhīram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3155: tṛṇolapam iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat śūdrābhīram iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3157: gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . striyaḥ eva avaśiṣyante . tṛṇolapam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3158_0: apām ulapam iti nāmadheyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sāmānyena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3158_1: viśeṣasya prayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati . sāmānyena uktatvāt tasya arthasya viśeṣasya prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3158_2: na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_0: tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam iti . bhavati yadā niyogataḥ tasya eva ānayanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_1: . evam tarhi yena eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_2: iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ dvandvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3163: 172 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham gāvaḥ imāḥ caranti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3164: ajāḥ imāḥ caranti . gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . striyaḥ eva avaśiṣyante . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3165: grāmyeṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : nyaṅkavaḥ ime ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3166: śūkarāḥ ime iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati agrāmyāṇām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye grahītum aśakyāḥ . kutaḥ eva vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3167: paśuṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : brāhmaṇāḥ ime ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3168: vṛṣalāḥ ime . kaḥ punaḥ arhati apaśūnām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3169: saṅgheṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3170: etau gāvaḥ carataḥ . kaḥ punaḥ arhati nirjñāte arthe anyathā prayoktum . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3171: ataruṇeṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : uraṇakāḥ ime ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3172: barkarāḥ ime iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati taruṇānām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . anekaśapheṣu iti vaktavyam iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3177: 173-178 kutaḥ ayam vakāraḥ . yadi tāvat saṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kriyate bhvādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . atha asaṃhitayā bhū-ādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_0: bhūvādīnām vakāraḥ ayam maṅgalārthaḥ prayujyate . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_1: maṅgalārtham vakāram āgamam prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni maṅgalāntāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_2: hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣāṇi ca . adhyetāraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_3: siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . yadi tāvat paṭhyante na
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_4: arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena . anyatra api hi ayam paṭhan ādigrahaṇam na karoti . kva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_5: . mṛḍamṛdagudhakuṣakliśavadavasaḥ ktvā iti . atha na paṭhyante natarām arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_6: . na hi apaṭhitāḥ śakyāḥ ādigrahaṇena viśeṣayitum . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_7: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti ca pāṭhaḥ bāhyaḥ ca sūtrāt iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_8: prayojanam . pāṭhena dhātusañjñā iti etat upapannam bhavati . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_9: samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_10: . yā iti dhātuḥ yā iti ābantaḥ . vā iti dhātuḥ vā iti nipātaḥ . nu iti dhātuḥ nu
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_11: iti pratyayaḥ ca nipātaḥ ca . div iti dhātuḥ div iti prātipadikam . kim ca syāt yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_12: eteṣām api dhātusañjñā syāt . dhātoḥ iti tavyādīnām utpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_13: doṣaḥ . sādhane tavyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_14: . sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_0: ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anāpaḥ iti evam saḥ . asya tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_1: vāśabdasya nipātasya adhātuḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_2: svādyutpattiḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:3181: nipātaḥ prātipadikam iti eva . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_0: aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅādeśaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_1: jñāpayati na pratyayasya uvaṅādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tatra śnugrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_2: . asya tarhi divśabdasya adhātuḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_3: . aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_4: utpadyante divśabdāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam divaḥ sau auttvam śāsti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_5: jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . divśabdaḥ yat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3184_0: akṣadyūḥ iti . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na sidhyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3184_1: tarhi ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3184_2: api ananubandhakaḥ divśabdaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3184_3: . parimāṇagrahaṇam ca . parimāṇagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iyān avadhiḥ dhātusañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3184_4: bhavati iti vaktavyam kutaḥ hi etat bhūśabdaḥ dhātusañjñaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ bhvedhśabdaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3188_0: 179-185 yadi punaḥ kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . kā punaḥ kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3188_1: . īhā . kā punaḥ īhā . ceṣṭā . kā punaḥ ceṣṭā . vyāpāraḥ . sarvathā bhavān śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:3188_2: eva śabdān ācaṣṭe . na kim cid arthajātam nidarśayati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_0: evañjātīyikā kriyā iti . kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā . aśakyā kriyā piṇḍībhūtā
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_1: nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . sā asau anumānagamyā . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_2: . iha sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu kadā cit pacati iti etat bhavati kadācit na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_3: . yasmin sādhane sannihite pacati iti etat bhavati sā nūnam kriyā . atha vā yayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_4: devadattaḥ iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nūnam kriyā . katham punaḥ jñāyate kriyāvacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_5: pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām karotinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_0: kim karoti . pacati . kim kariṣyati . pakṣyati . kim akārṣīt . apākṣīt iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacati prapacati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam prāpnoti . saṅghātena
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_3: arthagateḥ . saṅghātena hi arthaḥ gamyate saprakṛtikena sapratyayakena sopasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_4: ca . astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam . astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_5: . yathā hi bhavatā karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā astyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_6: nidarśyate . na hi bhavati kim karoti asti iti . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_7: . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . pacati paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3191_0: prakṛtyarthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca . pratyayārthaḥ saḥ eva . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3191_1: . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . paktā pacanam pākaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_0: pratyayārthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca bhavati . prakṛtyarthaḥ saḥ eva. katham punaḥ jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_1: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām . anvayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_2: vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā . iha pacati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3193: pacśabdaḥ cakārāntaḥ atiśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3194: viklittiḥ kartṛtvam ekatvam ca . paṭhati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:3195: pacśabdaḥ hīyate paṭhśabdaḥ upajāyate atiśabdaḥ anvayī . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:3196: viklittiḥ hīyate paṭhikriyā upajāyate kartṛtvam ca ekatvam ca anvayī . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:3197_0: yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3197_1: asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3197_2: anvayī . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3199: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3200: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na api brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3201_0: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3201_1: pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa prakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3201_2: viśeṣam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ pacati iti ukte svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3201_3: kasmin cit viśeṣe pacatiśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3201_4: na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe . kriyāviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3201_5: upasargaḥ . pacati iti kriyā gamyate . tām praḥ viśinaṣṭi . yadi api tāvat atra etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3201_6: śakyate vaktum yatra dhātuḥ upasargam vyabhicarati yatra na khalu tam vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:3202: adhīte iti . yadi api atra dhātuḥ upasargam na vyabhicarati upasargaḥ tu dhātum vyabhicarati . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:3203: yaḥ eva asya adheḥ anyatra arthaḥ sa iha api iti . kaḥ punaḥ anyatra adheḥ arthaḥ . adhiḥ uparibhāve vartate . iha tarhi vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_0: tiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhate iti . tiṣṭhati iti vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ pratiṣṭhate iti vrajikriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_1: gamyate . te manyāmahe upasargakṛtam etat yena atra vrajikriyā gamyate . praḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_2: dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ ādikarmaṇi vartate . na ca idam na asti bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3205: vapiḥ prakiraṇe ḍṛṣṭaḥ chedane api vartate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3206: keśaśmaśru vapati iti . īḍiḥ stuticodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ preraṇe api vartate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3207: agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti iti . karotiḥ abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe api vartate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3209: kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api vartate : kaṭe kuru ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3211: aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . evam iha api tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyām āha tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttim . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3216: 185-192 yadi punaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti evam lakṣaṇam kriyeta . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhāvavacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām bhavatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam : bhavati pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3218: bhavati apākṣīt iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhāvaḥ . bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ iti . yadi bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : bhedaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3219_0: chedaḥ . anyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anyaḥ hi abhāvaḥ . ātaḥ ca anyaḥ bhāvaḥ anyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3219_1: . yaḥ hi yasya bhāvam icchati saḥ na tasya abhāvam yasya ca abhāvam na tasya bhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3219_2: . pacādīnām ca dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . yathā hi bhavatā kriyāvacane dhātau karotinā
GS24pmbhasuu:3219_3: pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā bhāvavacane dhātau nidarśyate . karotiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3219_4: pacācīnām sarvān kālān sarvān puruṣān sarvāṇi ca vacanāni anuvartate . bhavatiḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3219_5: vartamānakālam ca eva ekatvam ca . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ : bhavati pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3221: bhavati apākṣīt iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3222: pacādayaḥ kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā yatra khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham :
GS24pmbhasuu:3224_0: syāt api syāt iti . atra api anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3224_1: . ekasya atra bhavateḥ bhavatiḥ sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3224_2: sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yāvatā atra api anyatvam asti pacādayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3224_3: kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3225: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā bhavati . bhavet vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā syāt prātipadikānām api prāpnoti : vṛkṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3226: plakṣaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . etāni api hi bhavanti . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3227: bhāvyate yaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ iti . kriyā ca eva hi bhāvyate svabhāvasiddham tu dravyam . evam api bhavet keṣām cit na syāt yāni na bhāvyante . ye tu ete sambandhiśabdāḥ teṣām prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3228: mātā pitā bhrātā iti . sarvathā vayam prātipadikaparyudāsāt na mucyāmahe . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3229: bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ iti . yāvatā paṭhiṣyati pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_0: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_1: eva abhihitam sūtreṇa bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . katham . na idam ādigrahaṇam . vadeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3231: bhuvam vadanti iti bhūvādayaḥ iti . bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ . bhāvavacane dhātau tadarthasya pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_0: śiśye iti . kim ca syāt . aśiti iti āttvam prasajyeta . tat hi dhātoḥ vihitam . itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_1: ca pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_2: itaretarāśrayatā . pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ . utpanne hi pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_3: bhāvavacanatvam gamyate saḥ ca tāvat bhāvavacanāt utpannaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_4: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt anāśritya
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_5: bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_6: anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ utpadyate . prathamabhāvagrahaṇam ca . prathamabhāvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_7: ca kartavyam . prathamam yaḥ bhāvam āha iti . kutaḥ punaḥ prāthamyam . kim śabdataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_8: āhosvit arthataḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi śabdataḥ sanādīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3233: putrīyati vastrīyati iti . atha arthataḥ siddhā sanādīnām dhātusañjñā saḥ eva tu doṣaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3234: bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na eva arthataḥ na eva śabdataḥ . kim tarhi . abhidhānataḥ . sumadhyame abhidhāne yaḥ prathamam bhāvam āha.
GS24pmbhasuu:3238: 193-196 iha ye eva bhāvavacane dhātau doṣāḥ te eva kriyāvacane api . tatra te eva parihārāḥ . tatra idam aparihṛtam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3239_0: astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam iti . tasya parihāraḥ . kām punaḥ kriyām bhavān matvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3239_1: āha astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti iti . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām
GS24pmbhasuu:3239_2: pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na brūmaḥ kārakāṇi kriyā iti . kim tarhi . kārakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3239_3: pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . anyathā ca kārakāṇi śuṣkaudane pravartante anyathā ca māṃsaudane
GS24pmbhasuu:3239_4: . yadi evam siddhā astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā . anyathā hi kārakāṇi astau
GS24pmbhasuu:3239_5: pravartante anyathā hi mriyatau . ṣaṭ bhāvavikārāḥ iti ha sma āha bhagavān vārṣyāyaṇiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_0: jāyate asti vipariṇamate vardhate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti . sarvathā sthitaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_1: atra dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . bāhyaḥ hi ebhyaḥ tiṣṭhatiḥ . evam tarhi kriyāyāḥ kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_2: nivartikā bhavati dravyam dravyasya nivartakam . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_3: . kimavasthaḥ devadattasya vyādhiḥ iti . saḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3243_0: sthitaḥ iti . sthitaḥ iti ukte vardhateḥ ca apakṣīyateḥ ca nivṛttiḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3243_1: vā na antareṇa kriyām bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . astyādibhiḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:3243_2: bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . atha vā na anyat prṣṭena anyat ākhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3243_3: . tena na bhaviṣyati kim karoti asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3247_0: 196-198 atha yadi eva kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ atha api bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3247_1: kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3247_2: gatam iti āha . katham . ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva vyavasthāyām vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3249: devadattādayaḥ ānīyantām iti . te utthāpya ānīyante . asti prakāre vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_0: devadattādayaḥ āḍhyāḥ abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ pakṣavantaḥ . devadattaprakārāḥ iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_1: . pratyekam ca ādiśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . bhvādayaḥ iti ca vādayaḥ iti ca . tat yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_2: tāvat kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_3: vartate vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre . bhū iti evamādayaḥ vā iti evamprakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_4: iti . yadā tu bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_5: saḥ vyavasthāyām bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre . vā iti evamādayaḥ bhū iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_6: evamprakārāḥ iti . yadi tarhi lakṣaṇam kriyate na idānīm pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_7: ca . kim prayojanam . bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ . bhūvādipāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_9: āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ ca . ke punaḥ āṇapayatyādayaḥ . āṇapayati vaṭṭati vaḍḍhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3250_10: iti . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3251_0: svarān anubandhān ca jñāsyāmi iti . na hi antareṇa pātham svarāḥ anubandhāḥ vā śakyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3251_1: vijñātum . ye tu ete nyāyyavikaraṇāḥ udāttāḥ ananubandhakāḥ paṭhyante eteṣām pāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3251_2: śakyaḥ akartum . eteṣām api avaśyam āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3251_3: na kartavyaḥ . śiṣṭaprayogāt āṇapayatyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3251_4: śiṣṭaprayogaḥ upāsyaḥ ye api paṭhyante teṣām api viparyāsanivṛttyarthaḥ . loke hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3251_5: kṛṣyarthe kasim prayuñjate dṛśyarthe ca diśim .
GS24pmbhasuu:3255: 198-199 upadeśe iti kimartham . abhre āṃ apaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3256: uddeśe yaḥ anunāsikaḥ tasya mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ uddeśopadeśayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . pratyakṣam ākhyānam upadeśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3257: guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3258: agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakhthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3259: ayam gauḥ iti . saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3260: upadiṣṭaḥ me gauḥ iti . guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3262: devadattam me bhavān uddiśatu iti . saḥ ihasthaḥ pāṭaliputrastham devadattam uddiśati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3263: aṅgadī kuṇḍalī kirīṭī vyūḍhoraskaḥ vṛttabāhuḥ lohitākṣaḥ tuṅganāsaḥ citrābharaṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ devadattaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3268: 199-202 itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3269: abhre āṃ apaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3270_0: upādīyate evañjātīyakasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:3270_1: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . kim ucyate anupādīyamāne viśeṣe iti . katham na nāma upādīyate yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3270_2: upadeśe iti ucyate . lakṣaṇena hi upadeśaḥ . saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . pratyakṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3270_3: ākhyānam uddeśaḥ guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam uddeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3272: anuvākam me bhavān uddiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:3273: iṣetvakam adhīṣva . śannodevīyam adhīṣva iti . saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3274: uddiṣṭaḥ me anuvākaḥ . tam adhyeṣye iti . guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3276: grāmantaram gamiṣyāmi . panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:3278: amuṣmin hastavāmaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3279_0: upadiṣṭaḥ me panthāḥ iti . evam etau saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . evam tarhi itkāryābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3279_1: itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam syāt . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3279_2: śabdasya dvyarthaḥ upadeśaḥ . kāryārthaḥ vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā . kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3279_3: ca iha na asti . kārye ca asati yadi śravaṇam api na syāt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_0: anantaralakṣaṇāyām itsañjñāyām satyām āditaḥ ca iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_1: tu upadeśane anunāsikavacanāt . siddham etat katham . upadeśane yaḥ anunāsikaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_2: itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ upadeśanam . śāstram . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_3: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_4: aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśaḥ iti ghañ ayam karaṇasādhanaḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_5: . paratvāt lyuṭ prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_6: . halaḥ ca iti . tatra api sañjñāyām iti vartate . na ca eṣā sañjñā . prāyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_7: asañjñāyām api bhaviṣyati . prāyavacanāt sañjñāyām eva syāt vā na vā . na hi upādheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_8: upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam . yadi na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_9: vā viśeṣaṇam kalyāṇyādīnām inaṅ kulaṭāyāḥ vā inaṅ vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . inaṅ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_10: atra pradhānam . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3282_0: vākinādīnām kuk ca putrāt anyatarasyām iti kuk vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . atra api kuk
GS24pmbhasuu:3282_1: eva pradhānam . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . evam na ca idam akṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3282_2: bhavati na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3282_3: bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā ghañ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi kṛtyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_0: 202-203 halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt . halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_1: halaḥ itsañjñā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sarvāntyatvāt . sarvaḥ hi hal tam tam avadhim
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_2: prati antyaḥ bhavati . siddham tu vyavasitāntyatvāt . siddham etat . katham . vyavasitāntyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_3: . vyavasitāntyaḥ hal itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ vyavasitāḥ . dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātāgamādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_4: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam halantye
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_5: sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āha ayam hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_6: iti . sarvaḥ ca hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3287: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ antyaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ vyavasitāntyaḥ . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te vyavasitam eva apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_1: ajñāpitatvāt halgrahaṇāprasiddhiḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati iti ucyate . lakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_2: eva tāvat itsañjñā na prāpnoti . siddham tu lakāranirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_3: . lakāranirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati lakāraḥ ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_4: . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā . atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . hal ca hal ca hal . hal antyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_5: itsañjñam bhavati iti . atha vā ḷkārasya eva idam guṇabhūtasya grahaṇam . tatra upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_6: ac anunāsika it iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_7: lakārasya itsañjñā iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_1: vaktavyaḥ . udaśvit śakrṭ iti . akṛttaddhitāntasya iti kimartham . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_2: aupagavaḥ kāpaṭavaḥ . idarthābhāvāt siddham . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjña na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_3: . idam asti itkāryam titsvaritam iti svaritatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti . pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3296_0: rājā takṣā . ñniti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . ñniti iti ucyate . tatra vyapavargābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3296_1: na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi svaḥ . upottamam riti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . svaritakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3296_2: na bhaviṣyati . nyaṅsvarau svritau iti . iha tarhi antaḥ . uttamaśabdaḥ triprabhṛtiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3296_3: vartate . na ca atra triprabhṛtayaḥ santi . iha tarhi sanutaḥ . upottamam riti iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3329_1: yathāsaṅkhyavacanam niyamārtham . sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyante . sañjñayā

GS24pmbhasuu:3329_3: ḍhakchaṇḍhañyakaḥ iti . sañjñāsamāsanirdeśāt sarvaprasaṅgaḥ anudeśasya yathāsaṅkhyavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3329_4: niyamārtham . sarvasya uddeśasya sarvaḥ anudeśaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca samasaṅkhyam
