GS24pmbhasuu:3333_0: 220-227 kim punaḥ śabdataḥ sāmye saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ bhavati āhosvit arthataḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_1: ca atra viśeṣaḥ . saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām ḍāraurasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_2: prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . parasmaipadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_3: ṇalatususthalathusaṇalvamāḥ iti ṇalādayaḥ bahavaḥ parasmaipadānām iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_4: . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya . ḍāraurasaḥ bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_5: prathamasya iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_6: . ayavāyāvaḥ bahavaḥ ecaḥ iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_7: . astu tarhi arthataḥ . arthataḥ cet lṛluṭornandyarīhaṇasindhutakṣaśilādiṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_9: dvau lṛluṭoḥ iti asya trayaḥ arthāḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . nandigrahipacādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_10: lyuṇinyacaḥ . nandyādayaḥ bahavaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ trayaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_11: na prāpnoti . arīhaṇādayaḥ bahavaḥ vuñādayaḥ saptadaśa . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_12: na prāpnoti . sindhutakṣaśilādibhyaḥ aṇañau . sindhutakṣaśilādayaḥ bahavaḥ aṇañau
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_15: ca na sidhyati . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . anudāttaṅitau dvau ātmanepadam iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_16: dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . niṣṭhā . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_17: pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . rephadakārau dvau niṣṭhā iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_18: prāpnoti . sārvadhātukadvigrahaṇeṣu ca doṣaḥ bhavati . śnasoḥ allopaḥ śnamastī dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_19: sārvadhātukam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . eṅaḥ pūrvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_20: pratiṣedhaḥ . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . eṅaḥ padāntāt ati ṅasiṅasoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_21: . ṅasiṅasau dvau eṅ iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_22: tarhi śabdataḥ . nanu ca uktam saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_23: ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_24: antaratamaḥ iti anena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_25: dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ . saṃvṛtāvarṇasya saṃvṛtāvarṇaḥ vivṛtāvarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_26: vivṛtāvarṇaḥ . atiprasaṅgaḥ guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe kṅiti . atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_27: kṅiti . guṇavṛddhī dve kṅitau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_28: . gakāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . tat gakāragrahaṇam api kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_29: kriyate nyāse eva . kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . giti kiti ṅiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_30: udi kūle rujivahoḥ . udikūle dve rujivahau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_31: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam rujivahoḥ . utpūrvābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_32: rujivahibhyām kūle upapade iti . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_33: doṣaḥ bhavati . vidibhidicchideḥ kurac . vidibhidicchidayaḥ trayaḥ tacchīlādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_34: trayaḥ . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_35: doṣaḥ bhavati . nirabhyoḥ pūlvoḥ . nirabhī dvau pūlvau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_36: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iṣyate ca atra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ : niṣpāvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_0: abhilāvaḥ iti . evam tarhi akartari ca kārake bhāve ca iti dvau pūlvau ca dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_1: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ave tṝstroḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ . tṝstrau dvau karaṇādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_2: dve . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ca bhūkṛñoḥ . kartṛkarmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_3: dve bhūkṛñau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . anavakḷptyamarṣayoḥ akiṃvṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_4: api . anavakḷptyamarṣau dvau kiṃvṛttākiṃvṛtte dve . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_5: . kṛbhvoḥ ktvāṇamulau . kṛbhvau dvau ktvāṇamulau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_6: . adhīyānaviduṣoḥ chandobrāhmaṇāni . chandobrāhmaṇāni iti dve adhīte veda iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_0: ca dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ropadhetoḥ pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_1: prācām tat gacchati pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetau dvau pathidūtau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_2: prāpnoti . tatra bhavataḥ tasya vyākhyānaḥ kratuyajñebhyaḥ . tatra bhavatastasyavyākhyānau
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_3: dvau kratuyajñau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . saṅghādiṣu añprabhṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_4: ṣaṅghādiṣu añprabhṛtayaḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ghoṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_5: atra kartavyam . veśoyaśāadeḥ bhagāt yalkhau . veśoyaśāadī dvau yalkhau dvau . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_6: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ṅasiṅasoḥ khyatyāt parasya . ṅasiṅasau dvau khyatyau
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_7: dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na vā samānayogavacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_8: . kim kāraṇam . samānayogavacanāt . samānayoge saṅkhyātānudeśam vakṣyāmi . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_9: doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā iti saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_10: na prāpnoti . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_11: na prāpnoti . khalagorathāt initrakaṭyacaḥ ca . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhvapakarābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_12: kan aṇañau ca . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ . yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_13: ca ādeśāḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . tasmāt yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tām
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_14: āsthāya pratividheyam doṣeṣu . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . yathāsaṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_15: svaritena . tataḥ adhikāraḥ . adhikāraḥ ca bhavati svaritena iti . evam api svaritam
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_16: dṛṣṭvā sandehaḥ syāt . na jñāyate kim ayam samasaṅkhyārthaḥ āhosvit adhikārārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_17: iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_18: viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti samasaṅkhyārthaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_0: 228-229 kimartham idam ucyate . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ . adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_1: kriyate pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti . kim idam pratiyogam iti . yogam yogam
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_2: prati pratiyogam . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . kim gatam etat iyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_3: sūtreṇa . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikṛtaḥ asau grāme adhikṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_4: asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra vyāpāram gacchati . śabdena ca api adhikṛtena kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_5: anyaḥ vyāpāraḥ śakyaḥ avagantum anyat ataḥ yoge yoge upasthānāt . na vā nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_6: yathā loke . na vā etat prayojanam . kim kāraṇam . nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_7: loke . nirdiśyamānam adhikṛtam gamyate . tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām yajñadattāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_8: viṣṇumitrāya iti . gauḥ iti gamyate . evam iha api padarujaviśaspṛśaḥ ghañ sṛ sthire
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_9: bhāve . ghañ iti gamyate . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . anyanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_10: tu loke nivartakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām yajñadattāya kambalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_11: viṣṇumitrāya ca iti . kambalaḥ gonivartakaḥ bhavati . evam iha api abhividhau bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_12: inuṇ ghañaḥ nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_0: 229-230 adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu . adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu bhavati . na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_1: kiyantam avadhim adhikāraḥ anuvartate iti . adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham tu . adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_2: eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . adhikāraparimāṇam jñāsyāmi iti . katham punaḥ svaritena
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_3: adhikāraḥ iti anena adhikāraparimāṇam śakyam vijñātum . evam vakṣyāmi svarite na
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_4: adhikāraḥ iti . svaritam dṛṣṭvā adhikāraḥ na bhavati iti . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_5: bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . na adhikāraḥ iti cet uktam . kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_6: tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā iti . adhikārārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_7: . nanu ca uktam adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu iti . yāvatithaḥ al anubandhaḥ tāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_8: yogān iti vacanāt siddham . yāvatithaḥ al anubadhyate tāvataḥ yogān adhikāraḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_9: iti vaktavyam . atha idānīm yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ alaḥ bhūyasaḥ ca yogān adhikāraḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_10: katham tatra kartavyam . bhūyasi prāgvacanam . bhūyasi prāgvacanam kartavyam . prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_11: amutaḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sandehamātram etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_12: . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_13: alakṣaṇam iti . prāk amutaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_14: idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . nanu ca uktam na adhikāraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_15: cet uktam . kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . sandehamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_16: etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_17: na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . inuṇ ghañ iti sandehe ghañ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3347: 230-232 na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ yathā vijñāyeta ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3350_0: gostriyoḥ upasarjanam iti atra goṭāṅgrahaṇam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3350_1: strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti striyām iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3350_2: prakṛtya ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām grahaṇam vijñāsyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3350_3: bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . adhikam kāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3351: apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra prāpya nivṛttiḥ . tena iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3352_0: grāmāt āgacchati . nagarāt āgacchati . sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3352_1: iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3352_2: . tathā adhikaraṇam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā vyāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3353_0: tileṣu tailam . dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ . kūpe gargakulam iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:3353_1: syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati . adhikam kāryam . adhikaḥ kāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3354_0: pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti . guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num
GS24pmbhasuu:3354_1: pūrvavipratiṣiddham numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ iti . numnuṭau svarayiṣyete . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3354_2: svaritena adhikaḥ kāraḥ bhavati iti numnuṭau bhaviṣyataḥ . katham punaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3354_3: iti anena pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ śakya na paṭhitum . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3354_4: ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam durbalaḥ san balavadbhiḥ saha bhāram vahati
GS24pmbhasuu:3354_5: . evam iha api adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam pūrvaḥ san param bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:3354_6: . adhikāragatiḥ stryarthā viśeṣāya adhikam kāryam . atha yaḥ anyaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_0: 233 vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ sunutaḥ lunītaḥ punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_1: iti ātmanepadam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_2: ayam ṅit ṅitaḥ iti . katham tarhi . ṅakāraḥ eva it ṅit ṅitaḥ . atha vā upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_3: vartate . atha vā uktam etat siddham tu pūrvasya kāryātideśāt iti . sarvathā caṅaṅbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_4: prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_5: . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_6: bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_7: iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_8: iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_9: ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_0: 233-237 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . ātmanepadavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate niyamārthaḥ ayam iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api syāt . lavidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_2: vihitam . lavidhānāt hi ātmanepadam parasmaipadam ca vihitam . asti prayojanam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_3: . kim tarhi iti . vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_4: . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām niyamaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vikaraṇāḥ . nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_5: khalu api vikaraṇāḥ . kṛte api niyame prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_6: paratvāt ca vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_7: doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ niyamaḥ . sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_8: liṅliṭau ca . yadi punaḥ iyam paribhāṣā vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kāryakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_9: sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . lasya tibādayaḥ bhavanti iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_10: idam bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_11: itaretarāśrayam bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . abhinirvṛttānām lasya sthāne tibādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_12: ātmanepadaparasmaipadasañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca tibādayaḥ bhāvyante . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_13: itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi ca na prakalpante . parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_14: tāvat na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . parasmaipadānukramaṇam na kariṣyate . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_15: kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . nanu ca etat api ātmanepadānukramaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_16: eva kariṣye . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhipraye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_17: . anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ na iti . ātmanepadeṣu ca api na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_18: . bhāvinī sañjñā vijñāsyate sūtraśāṭakavat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3363: kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_0: asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_1: na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham. bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_2: . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api saḥ lasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_3: sthāne kartavyaḥ lyasya abhinirvṛttasya ātmanepadam iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_4: vā punaḥ astu niyamaḥ . nanu ca utkam vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_5: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_6: ayam vikaraṇavidhau ātmanepadaparasmaipadāni āśrayati . puṣādidyutādḷrditaḥ parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_7: ātmanepadeṣu anyatarasyām iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . abhinirvṛttāni hi lasya sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3364_8: ātmanepadāni parasmaipadāni ca . yat tarhi anupasargāt vā iti vibhāṣām śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3368: 237-244 kim punaḥ ayam pratyayaniyamaḥ : anudāttaṅitaḥ eva ātmanepadam bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3369: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ eva ātmanepadam bhavati iti . āhosvit prakṛtyarthaniyamaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_0: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame śeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_1: parasmaipadasya anivṛttatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam parasmaipadaniyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_2: . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . kim kāraṇam . parasmaipadasya anivṛttatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_3: pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ prakṛtyarthau aniyatau . tatra parasmaipadam prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_4: kartavyam parasmaipadaniyamārtham . śeṣāt eva parasmaipadam bhavati na anyataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_5: . kyaṣaḥ ātmanepadavacanam tasya anyatra niyamāt . kyaṣaḥ ātmanepadam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_6: lohitāyati lohitāyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tasya anyatra niyamāt . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_7: hi anyatra niyamyate . ucyate ca na ca prāpnoti . tat vacanāt bhaviṣyati . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_9: pratyayānām abhāvaḥ . anudāttaṅitaḥ tṛjādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_10: tṛjādayaḥ ucyante ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . sāvakāśāḥ tṛjādayaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_11: . parasmaipadinaḥ avakāśaḥ . tatra api niyamāt na prāpnuvanti . tavyādayaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_12: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt na prāpnuvanti . tavyādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_13: . ciṇ tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt na prāpnoti . ciṇ api vacanāt bhaviṣyati . ghañ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_14: tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt na prāpnoti . tatra api prakṛtam karmagrahaṇam . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_15: prakṛtam . aṇ karmaṇi ca iti . tat vai tatra upapadaviśeṣaṇam abhidheyaviśeṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_16: ca iha arthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_17: anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat

GS24pmbhasuu:3371_19: bhavati ṭat yathā . śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_20: ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante . yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_21: anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_22: etat evam syāt . śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_23: bhavati . śeṣavacanam ca . śeṣagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_24: iti . kim prayojanam . śeṣaniyamārtham . prakṛtarthau niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_25: . te śeṣe api prāpnuvanti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_26: eva na anyat iti . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣaye parasmaipadapratiṣedhārtham . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_27: ca ātmanepadaviṣaye parasmaipadapratiṣedhārtham dvitīyam śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_28: śeṣāt śeṣe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . katarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_29: pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame . prakṛtyarthaniyame tāvat na doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthau
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_30: niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tatra na arthaḥ kartṛgrahaṇena kartṛgrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_31: . pratyayaniyame tarhi ayam doṣaḥ . pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ . prakṛtyarthau aniyatau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_32: tatra kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam bhāvakarmaṇoḥ nivṛttyartham . kartṛgrahaṇāt ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_33: doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . prakṛtayarthau
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_34: niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi parasmaipadam bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_35: bhaviṣyati . yatra parasmaipadam ca anyat ca prāpnoti tatra parasmaipadam eva bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_36: iti . tat tarhi pratyayaniyame dvitīyam śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_37: kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_38: ca ātmanepadam bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ karkmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_39: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti nivṛttam . yathā eva tarhi karmaṇi kartari bhavati evam bhāve api
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_40: kartari prāpnoti . eti jīvantam ānandaḥ . na asya kim cit rujati iti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_41: kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . tataḥ bhāve . tataḥ karmaṇi . karmaṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_42: ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam bhavati . karmaṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3371_43: anuvartate . bhāve iti nivṛttam . tataḥ karmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva . karmaṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_0: nivṛttam . evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_1: mā bhūt anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam eva . nanu ca etat api yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_2: eva siddham . na sidhyati . anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā yogavibhāgena śakyā bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_3: kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . parā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_4: . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_5: satī bādhitum . evam tarhi kartari karmavyatihāre iti atra kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_6: . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate . śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kimartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_7: kartari kartari iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_8: kartā tatra mā bhūt iti . tataḥ anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ . kartari kartari iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_0: 244-245 kriyāvyatirhāre iti vaktavyam . karmavyatirhāre iti ucyamāne iha prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_1: devadattasya dhānyam vyatilunanti iti iha ca na syāt vyatilunate vyatipunate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_2: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_3: kriyām kariṣyasi . kim karma kariṣyasi iti . evam api kartavyam . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_4: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_5: karma iti ucyate . katham ca kriyā nāma kriyepsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyepsitatamā
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_6: bhavati . kayā kriyayā . sampaśyatikriyayā prārthayatikriyayā adhyavasyatikriyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_7: vā . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati salḥ buddhyā tāvat kam cit artham
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_8: sampaśyati . sandṛṣṭe prārthanā prārthite adhyavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_9: nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttau phalāvaptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_10: kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ ubhayagatiḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt kriyāvyatihāre iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_11: na vaktavyam . iha kartari vyatihāre iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_12: yat karmagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam kriyāvyatihāre yathā syāt karmavyatihāre mā bhūt iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:3380_1: . karmavyatihārādiṣu kartṛgrahaṇam kriyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ anena ātmanepadam mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_2: iti . itarathā hi tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . akriyamāṇe kartṛgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_3: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api ātmanepadam prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_4: pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api anena ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_5: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . vyatigamyante grāmāḥ vyatihanyante dasyavaḥ iti . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_6: anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_7: . anantaram yat ātmanepadavidhānam tasya pratiṣedhāt . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_8: vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_9: ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_10: uttarārtham tarhi kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate tatra eva śeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_11: kartari parasmaipadam iti . dvitīyam kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . kartā

GS24pmbhasuu:3415_0: 255-256 akarmakāt iti eva . ut tapati suvarṇam suvarṇakāraḥ . svāṅgakarmakāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_1: svāṅgakarmakāt ca iti vaktavyam . uttapate pāṇī . vitapate pāṇī . uttapate pṛṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_2: . vitapate pṛṣṭham . atha udbhibhyām iti atra kim pratyudāhriyate . niṣṭapyate iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3415_4: . tapiḥ ayam akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ ca api sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti . na ca

GS24pmbhasuu:3415_6: karmakartāram sakarmakāḥ akarmakāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa api karmakartāram sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_7: akarmakāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā . nadīvahati iti akarmakaḥ . bhāram vahati iti sakarmakaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3431_1: iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . ete api hi vyaktavācaḥ . ātaḥ ca vyaktavācaḥ kukkuṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:3431_2: udite ucyate kukkuṭaḥ vadati iti . evam tarhi vyaktavācām iti ucyate . sarve eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3431_3: hi vyaktavācaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate . sādhīyaḥ ye vyaktavācaḥ iti . ke
GS24pmbhasuu:3431_4: ca sādhīyaḥ . yeṣām vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . na ca eteṣām vāci akārādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3431_5: varṇāḥ vyajyante . eteṣām api vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . ātaḥ ca vyajyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3431_6: evam hi āhuḥ kukkuṭāḥ kukkuṭ iti . na evam te āhuḥ . anukaraṇam etat teṣām . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3431_7: vā na evam vijñāyate vyaktā vāk yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti . katham tarhi . vyaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:3431_8: vāci varṇāḥ yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:3448_0: 260 iha kasmāt na bhavati . svam śāṭakāntam upayacchati iti . asvam yadā svam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_1: tadā bhavitavyam . yadi evam svīkaraṇe iti prāpnoti . vicitrāḥ taddhitavṛttayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_0: 260-261 anoḥ jñaḥ pratiṣedhe sakarmakavacanam . anoḥ jñaḥ pratiṣedhe sakarmakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_1: kartavyam . iha ma bhūt . auṣadhasya anujijñāsate iti . na vā akarmakasya uttareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_2: vidhānāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . akarmakasya uttareṇa vidhānāt . akarmakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_3: janāteḥ uttareṇa yogena ātmanepadam vidhīyate pūrvavat sanaḥ iti . pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_4: ca . pūrvasya ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ ca sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . katham punaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3452_6: vā iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ iti . akarmakāt jānāteḥ sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_7: ātmanepadavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sakarmakārthaḥ vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_0: 261-263 śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_1: ātmanepadasya abhāvaḥ . śīyate śīyete śīyante . kim ca bhoḥ śadeḥ śit parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_2: iti ucyate . na khalu parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate parasmaipadeṣu tu vijñāyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_3: anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam iti etau dvau yogau uktvā śeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_4: kartari parasmaipadam ucyate . evam na ca parasmaipadeṣu ucyate parasmaipadeṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_5: vijñāyate . kaḥ punaḥ arhati etau dvau yogau uktvā śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_6: . kim tarhi . aviśeṣeṇa sarvam ātmanepadaprakaraṇam anukramya śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_7: iti ucyate . evam api parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati . katham . idam tāvad ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_8: . yadi idam na ucyeta kim iha syāt iti . parasmaipadam iti āha . parasmaipadam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_9: cet parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati . siddham tu laḍādīnām ātmanepadavacanam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_10: etat . katham . śadeḥ laḍādīnām ātmanepadam bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_11: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_12: ātmanepadābhāvaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śitaḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_13: . śitaḥ yaḥ śadiḥ . kaḥ ca śitaḥ śadiḥ . prakṛtiḥ . śadeḥ śitprakṛteḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_14: vā āha ayam śadeḥ śitaḥ iti na ca śadiḥ śit asti . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ śadeḥ śidviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_15: iti . atha vā yadi api tāvat etat anyatra bhavati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_16: iha etat na asti . vikaraṇaḥ hi iha āśrīyate śitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3460_0: 263-268 upasargapūrvaniyame aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . upasargapūrvasya niyame aḍvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:3460_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nyaviśata vyakrīṇīta . kim punaḥ kāraṇāt na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3460_2: aṭā vyavahitatvāt . nanu ca ayam aṭ dhātubhaktaḥ dhātugrahaṇena grahīṣyate . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3460_3: . aṅgasya hi aṭ ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ na śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3460_4: dhātugrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_0: aṭ kriyatām vikaraṇaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_1: . kṛte api aṭi prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . aṭ api nityaḥ . kṛteṣu api vikaraṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_2: prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityaḥ aṭ . anyasya kṛteṣu vikaraṇeṣu prāpnoti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_3: akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_4: sampradhāryam . aṭ kriyatām lādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_5: . nityaḥ lādeśaḥ . kṛte api aṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt lādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_6: ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ bhaviṣyati . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade aṭ āgamaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_7: cet aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_8: iti cet evam ucyate . aṭ api nityanimittaḥ . kṛte api ladeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_9: . aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_10: kartavyam . na kartavyam . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi lādeśaḥ . na etat vivadāmahe antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_11: na antaraṅgaḥ iti . astu ayam nityaḥ antaraṅgaḥ ca . atra khalu lādeśe kṛte trīṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3462_0: vikaraṇāḥ aṭ āgamaḥ niyamaḥ iti . tat yadi sarvataḥ niyamaḥ labhyeta kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3462_1: tat tu na labhyam . atha api vikaraṇāt aṭ iti aṭ labhyeta evam api kṛtam syāt . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3462_2: tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ eṣitavyāḥ tarataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_0: taranti iti evamartham . aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam eṣitavyam upārcchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_1: evamartham . tatra hi āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca ṛcchibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_2: kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . punaḥ ṛcchibhāvaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_3: āṭ iti cakrakam avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate āṅgāt pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_4: vikaraṇāḥ eṣitavyāḥ tarataḥ taranti iti evamartham iti . bhavet siddham yatra vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_5: nityāḥ āṅgam anityam tatra āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ syuḥ . yatra tu khalu ubhayam nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_6: paratvāt tatra āṅgam tāvat bhavati . yat api ucyate aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_7: eṣitavyam upārcchati iti evamartham iti . astu atra āṭ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_8: kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_9: ṛcchibhāvaḥ punaḥ āṭ iti cakrakam avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . cakrakeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_10: iṣṭataḥ vyavasthā . atha vā neḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_11: neḥ yaḥ viśiḥ . kaḥ ca neḥ viśiḥ . viśeṣyaḥ . vyavahitaḥ ca api śakyate viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:3463_12: . atha vā niḥ api padam viśiḥ api padam .padavidhiḥ ca samarthāmām . vyavahite api
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_0: 268-269 kim idam pūrvagrahaṇam sanapekṣam . prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadm uktam tebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_1: sanantebhyaḥ api bhavati iti . āhosvit yogāpekṣam . prāk etasmāt yogāt yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_2: uktam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi sanapekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_3: nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati . pūrvavat sanaḥ na jñāyate kimantāt bhavitavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_4: yogāpekṣam uttaratra vidhiḥ na prakalpate . bubhukṣate upayuyukṣate iti . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_5: tathā astu . astu tāvat sanapekṣam . nanu ca uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_6: nimittam ca viśeṣitam . katham . sanam eva atra nimittatvena apekṣiṣyāmahe . pūrvavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_7: sanaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati . kutaḥ sanaḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogāpekṣam . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_8: ca uktam uttaratra vidhiḥ na prakalpate . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:3467_9: api pūrvavat sanaḥ iti eva anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_0: 269-271 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti śadimriyatyartham . śadimriyatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadam mā bhūt iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_2: hi tābhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . itarathā hi anucyamāne asmin tābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_3: sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . śiśitsati mumūrṣati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_4: punaḥ pūrvavat sanaḥ iti anena śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_5: śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_0: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_1: . evam iha api pūrvavat bhavati na bhavati iti . na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_2: . yathā pūrvayogayoḥ sanantābhyām ātmanepadam na bhavati evam iha api śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_3: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam na bhavati iti . yadi tarhi śadimriyatyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_4: vidhiḥ na prakalpate . āsisiṣate śiśayiṣate . atha vidhyarthaḥ śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_5: ātmanepadam prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat pratiṣedhārthaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_6: ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_7: sanantāt ātmanepadam bhavati iti yat ayam śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_8: pratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu vidhyarthaḥ . nanu ca uktam śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_9: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtam sanaḥ na iti anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_10: . kva prakṛtam . jñāśrusmṛdṛśām sanaḥ na anoḥ jñaḥ . sakarmakāt sanaḥ na . pratyāṅbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_11: śruvaḥ sanaḥ na . śadeḥ śitaḥ sanaḥ na . mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca sanaḥ na iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_12: idānīm pūrvavat sanaḥ iti sanaḥ iti vartate na iti nivṛttam . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_13: adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati iti . na eva vā punaḥ atra śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_14: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . śadeḥ śitaḥ iti ucyate na ca śadiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_15: eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim tarhi . śit api nimittam . atha api śadiḥ eva śitparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_16: tu nimittam . na ca ayam sanparaḥ śitparaḥ bhavati . yatra tarhi śit na āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_17: mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca iti . atra api na mriyatiḥ eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_18: tarhi . luṅliṅau api nimittam . atha api mriyatiḥ eva luṅliṅparaḥ tu nimittam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_0: 271-272 kim punaḥ pūrvasya yat ātmanepadadarśanam tat sanantasya api atidiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_1: evam bhavitum arhati . pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_2: cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ . pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_3: iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ . gupādīnām na prāpnoti . jugupsate mīmāṃsate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_4: na hi etebhyaḥ prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_5: pūrvasya liṅgātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvasya yat ātmanepadaliṅgam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_6: sanantasya api atidiśyate . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_7: vaktavyaḥ . anucikīrṣati parācikīrṣati iti . astu tarhi prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_8: dṛṣṭam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ api bahvati iti . nanu ca uktam pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_9: sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_10: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_11: goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_12: liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsāyati iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_13: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayave kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_14: samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati . sanam ca na vyabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:3476_15: . tat yathā goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .

GS24pmbhasuu:3480_2: vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate iti. tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_3: . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āsayati śāyayati . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_4: . yathānyāsam eva astu . katham ākusmayate vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate iti. anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_5: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_6: goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_7: liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati hṛṇīyayati mahīyayati atra api prāpnoti . avayave
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_8: kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_9: vyabhicarati . yakam ca na vyabhicarati . ṇicam tu vyabhicarati . tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_10: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_0: 274 kṛñgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . īhāmāsa īhāmāsatuḥ īhāmāsuḥ . katham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_1: atra asteḥ anuprayogaḥ bhavati . pratyāhāragrahaṇam tatra vijñāyate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_2: jñāyate tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇam iti . iha kṛñgrahaṇāt . iha kasmāt pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_3: na bhavati . iha eva kṛñgrahaṇāt . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . udumbhām cakāra udubjām
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_4: cakāra . nanu ca āmpratyayavat iti ucyate na ca atra āmpratyayāt ātmanepadam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_5: . na brūmaḥ anena iti . kim tarhi . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_6: bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . āmpratyayavat eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_7: . yadi niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate . īhām cakre ūhām cakre iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_8: . katham pūrvavat iti vartate . āmpratyayavat pūrvavat ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3488: 275 svarādyupasṛṣṭāt iti vaktavyam . udyuṅkte anuyuṅkte . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3489: svarādyantopasṛṣṭāt iti vaktayam . prayuṅkte niyuṅkte niniyuṅkte .
GS24pmbhasuu:3493: 275 kimartham videśasthasya grahaṇam kriyate na samaḥ gamādiṣu eva ucyeta . samaḥ kṣṇuvaḥ sakarmakārtham . sakarmakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . akarmakāt iti hi tatra anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3497_0: 275 anavanakauṭilyayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . prabhujati vāsasī nibhujati
GS24pmbhasuu:3497_1: jānuśirasī iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yasya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3497_2: ca arthaḥ tasya grahaṇam . na ca asya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam ca arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3501_0: 276-284 ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne aṇyantasya karmaṇaḥ tatra upalabdhiḥ .ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3501_1: aṇyantasya yat karma yadā ṇyante tat eva karma bhavati tadā ātmanepadam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3501_2: vaktavyam . itarathā hi sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ syāt . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3502: ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ . ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_0: ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ . ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_1: vakṣyāmi . ṇeḥ ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ aṇau yat karma ṇau cet . aṇyante yat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_2: ṇau yadi tat eva karma bhavati . tataḥ saḥ kartā . kartā cet saḥ bhavati ṇau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_3: . yadi evam karmakāryam bhavati . tatra karmakartṛtvāt siddham . karmakartṛtvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_4: iti cet yakciṇoḥ nivṛttyartham vacanam . karmakartṛtvāt siddham iti cet yakciṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_5: nivṛttyartham idam vaktavyam . karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti . na vā yakciṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_6: pratiṣedhāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyete
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_7: atra yakciṇau . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam iti . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3503_8: na hetumaṇṇic tadartham idam vaktavyam . tasya karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3504: utpucchayate puccham svayam eva . udapuppucchata puccham svayam eva . atra api yathā bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti tathā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:3505_0: yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñātmanepadākarmakāṇām upsaṅkhyānam iti . saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3505_1: avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi yatra niyamaḥ tataḥ anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3505_2: . anucyamāne hi etasmin yatra niyamaḥ tataḥ anyatra tena yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3505_3: syāt . gaṇayati gaṇam gopālakaḥ . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadasya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3506_0: gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham tu . ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3506_1: idam vaktavyam . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . iṣyate eva atra ātmanepadam . kim iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3506_2: eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca . katham . aṇau it kasya idam ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3506_3: grahaṇam . yamāt ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate . na ca etasmāt ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:3507_0: anādhyāne iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . smarati vanagulmasya kokilaḥ . smarayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3507_1: enam vanagulmaḥ svayam eva . etat api na asti prayojanam . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3507_2: karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇām bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3507_3: siddhe sati yat anādhyāne iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3507_4: ātmanepadam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . paśyanti bhṛtyāḥ rājānam . darśayate
GS24pmbhasuu:3507_5: bhṛtyān rājā . darśayate bhṛtyaiḥ rājā . atra ātmanepadam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3511_0: 285 ātmanaḥ karmatve pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanaḥ karmatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3511_1: ātmānam . ghātayati ātmā iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vā ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3511_2: . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt . anyat atra aṇyante karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3511_3: anyaḥ ṇyantasya kartā . katham . dvau ātmanau antarātmā śarīrātmā ca . antarātmā
GS24pmbhasuu:3511_4: tat karma karoti yena śarīrātmā sukhaduḥkhe anubhavati . śarīrātmā tat karma karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_0: 286-290 svaritañitaḥ iti kimartham . yāti vāti drāti psāti . svaritañitaḥ iti śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_1: akartum . kasmāt na bhavati yāti vāti drāti psāti iti . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_2: iti ucyate sarveṣām ca kartrabhiprāyam kriyāphalam asti . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_3: kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam asti tebhyaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_4: iti . na ca eteṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam asti . tathājātīyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_5: khalu ācāryeṇa svaritañitaḥ paṭhitāḥ yeṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_6: asti . atha abhiprāyagrahaṇam kimartham . svaritañitaḥ kartrāye kriyāphale iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_7: ucyamāne yam eva samprati eti kriyāphalam tatra eva syāt . lūñ lunīte pūñ punīte
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_8: . iha na syāt . yaj yajate vap vapate . abhiprayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_9: bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate pra ādikarmaṇi . tena yam ca abhipraiti yam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_10: abhipraiṣyati yam ca abhiprāgāt tatra sarvatra ābhimukhyamātre siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_11: kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti kimartham . pacanti bhaktakārāḥ . kurvanti karmakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_12: . yajanti yājakāḥ . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_13: api hi kriyāphalam kartāram abhipraiti . yājakāḥ yajanti gāḥ lapsyāmahe iti . karmakarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_14: kurvanti pādikam ahaḥ lapsyāmahe iti . evam tarhi kartrabhipraye kriyāphale iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_15: sarvatra ca kartāram kriyāphalam abhipraiti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate . sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_16: yatra kartāram kriyāphalam abhipraiti iti . na ca antareṇa yajim yajiphalam vapim
GS24pmbhasuu:3515_17: va vapiphalam labhante . yājakāḥ punaḥ antareṇa api yajim gāḥ labhante bhṛtakāḥ ca pādikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_0: 291-292 śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe pratiṣedhaḥ . śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva . chidyate rajjuḥ svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_2: . evam tarhi śeṣe iti vakṣyāmi . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_3: vaktavyaḥ . āste śete cyavante plavante . siddham tu ubhayanirdeśāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_4: . katham . ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . śeṣāt śeṣe iti vaktavyam . kartṛgrahaṇam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_5: kimartham syāt . kartṛgrahaṇam anuparādyartham . anuparādyartham etat syāt . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_6: mā bhūt . anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam eva iti . sidhyati . sutram
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_7: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_8: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kartari karmavyatihāre iti atra kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_9: . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate . śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kim idam kartari kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3519_10: iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ kartā tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_0: 292-293 kimartham idam ucyate . parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt kṛñādiṣu vidhānam . parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_1: kṛñādiṣu parasmaipadam vidhīyate . pratiṣidhyate tatra parasmaipadam svaritañitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_2: kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_3: iti . tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣiddhatvāt . tatra ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_4: vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apratiṣiddhatvāt . na hi ātmanepadam pratiṣidhyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_5: tarhi . parasmaipadam anena vidhīyate . na vā dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_6: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . yat ayam dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_7: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na parasmaipadaviṣaye ātmanepadam bhavati iti . ātmanepadaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_8: vā pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanepadaniyame vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_9: kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari . anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ na iti . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_10: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_11: apratiṣiddhatvāt iti . parihṛtam etat na vā dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . atha vā idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_12: tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_13: iti parasmaipadam kasmāt na bhavati . ātmanepadena bādhyate . yathā eva tarhi ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:3523_14: parasmaipadam bādhyate evam parasmaipadena ātmanepadam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3527: 294 budhādiṣu ye akarmakāḥ teṣām grahaṇam kimartham . sakarmakārtham acittavatkartṛkārtham vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3531: 294-295 aṇau akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam . aṇau akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadam vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3532_0: cetayamāṇam prayojayati cetayati iti . yadi tarhi atra api iṣyate aṇigrahaṇam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3532_1: kimartham syāt . akarmakagrahaṇam aṇyantaviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . atha akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3532_2: aṇigrahaṇam kasya akarmakgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . ṇeḥ iti vartate . ṇyantaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3532_3: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3533: cetayamānam prayojayati cetayati iti . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3534_0: āsayati śāyayati iti . siddham tu atasmin ṇau iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3534_1: . atasmin ṇau yaḥ akarmakaḥ tatra iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3534_2: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam aṇav akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3534_3: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṇau iti kasya idam ṇeḥ grahaṇam . yasmāṇ ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:3534_4: vā vidyate . na ca etasmāṇ ṇeaḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3538: 295-296 pādiṣu dheṭaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . pādiṣu dheṭaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dhāpayate śiśumeka samīcī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3542_0: 296. kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . syasanoḥ iti etat anukṛṣyate . yadi tarhi na antareṇa cakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:3542_1: anuṅrttiḥ bhavati dyudbhyaḥ luṅi iti atra api cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ vibhāṣā iti anukarṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3542_2: . atha idānīm antareṇa api cakāram anuvṛttiḥ bhavati iha api na arthaḥ cakāreṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_0: 297-298 kimartham idam ucyate . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśānniyamārtham vacanam . anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_1: sañjñāsamāveśaḥ bhavati . kvānyatra . loke vyākaraṇe ca . loke tāvat . indraḥ śakraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_2: puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekasya dravyasya bahvyaḥ sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_3: bhavanti . vyākaraṇe api kartavyam hartavyam iti atra pratyayakṛtkṛtyasañjñānām samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_4: bhavati . pāñcālaḥ vaidehaḥ vaidarbhaḥ iti atra pratyayataddhitatadrājasañjñānāṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_5: samāveśaḥ bhavati . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt ā kaḍārāt api sañjñānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_6: samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekā eva sañjñā syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3546_7: sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3550_0: 298-308 katham tvetatsūtram paṭhitavyam . kim ā kaḍārāt ekā sañjñā iti āhosvit prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3550_1: kaḍārāt param kāryam iti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ . ubhayathā hi ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3551: kecit ā kaḍārāt ekā sañjñā iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_0: kecit prāk kaḍārāt param kāryam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_1: tadvacanam . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre tat vaktavyam . kim . ekā sañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_2: . nanu ca yasya api paraṅkāryatvam tena api paragrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_3: bhaviṣyati . vipratiṣedhe ca iti . mama api tarhi ekagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_4: . sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti . sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_5: śakyam vijñātum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . tatra etāvat vācyam . ā kaḍārāt ekā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_6: . ekā sañjñā bhavati iti . aṅgasañjñayā bhapadasañjñayoḥ asamāveśaḥ . aṇgasañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_7: bhapadasañjñayoḥ samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . sārpiṣkaḥ bārhiṣkaḥ yājuṣkaḥ dhānuṣkaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_8: bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavya iti . anavakāśe bhapadasañjñe aṅgasañjñāṃ bādheyātām . paravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_9: hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_10: tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrve tasya bhapadasañjñe parā
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_11: aṅgasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . yasmātpratyayavidhiḥ tadādi suptiṅantaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_12: padam naḥ kye siti ca . svādiṣu asarvanāmasthāne yaci bham . tasya ante pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_13: aṅgamiti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāc ca bhapadasañjñe paraṅkāryatvāt ca aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_14: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api aṅgasañjñāpūrvike bhapadasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_15: . katham .anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta. ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_16: yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam . karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_17: kartavyam . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti . ekasañjñādhikāraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_18: coditam . akriyamāṇe hi anavakāśā karmadhārayasañjñā tatpuruṣasañjñām bādheta . paravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_19: hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_20: tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_21: parā tatpuruṣasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . pūrvakālaikasarvajaratpurāṇanavakevalāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_22: samānādhikaraṇena karmadhārayaḥ iti . evam sarvam karmadhārayaprakaraṇam anukramya
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_23: tasya ante śritādiḥ tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_24: paraṅkāryatvāt ca tatpuruṣasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_25: tasya api tatpuruṣasañjñāpūrvikā karmadhārayasañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3552_26: . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . tatpuruṣatve

GS24pmbhasuu:3557_0: 308-313 paravacane siti padaṃ bham . paravacane siti padam bhasañjñamapi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_1: . ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ . prajam vindāma ṛtvijayām . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca padasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_2: paraṅkāryatvāt ca bhasañjñā prāpnoti . gatibuddhyādīnām ṇyantānām karma kartṛsañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_3: . gatibuddhyādīāṃ ṇyantānām karma kartṛsañjñam api prāpnoti . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_4: karmasañjñā padasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca kartṛsañjñā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_5: jñāpayati na karmasañjñāyām kartṛsañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam hṛkroḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_6: iti antarasyāṅgrahaṇam karoti . śeṣavacanam ca ghisañjñānivṛttyartham . śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_7: ca kartavyam . śeṣaḥ ghi asakhi iti . kim prayojanam . ghisāñjñānivṛttyartham . nadīsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_8: ghisañjñā mā bhūt iti . śakaṭyai paddhatyai buddhayai dhenvai . itarathā hi paraṅkāryatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_9: ca ghisañjñā ārambhasāmarthyāt ca ṅiti hrasvaḥ ca iti nadīsañjñā . na vā asambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_10: . na vā asambhavāt . na vā kartavyam . nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_11: . asambhavāt . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā ghisañjñāyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_12: guṇaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā ghisañjñāyām ca guṇena bhavitavyam . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_13: nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñābhāvaḥ . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_14: bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam . āśrayābhāvāt . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_15: iti cet yaṇādeśābhāvaḥ . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ iti cet evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_16: ucyate yaṇādeśaḥ api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nadyāśrayatvāt yaṇādeśasya hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_17: nadīsañjñābhāvaḥ . nadyāśrayaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ . yadā nadīsañjñayā ghisañjñā bādhitā tata
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_18: uttarakālam yaṇādeśena bhavitavyam . nadyāśrayatvāt yaṇādeśasya hrasvasya nadīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_19: bhaviṣyati . bahuvrīhyartham tu . bahvrīhipratiṣedhārtham tu śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_20: . śeṣaḥ bavuvrīhiḥ iti . kiṃ prayojanam . prayojanamavyayībhāvopamānadvigukṛllopeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_21: . avyayībhāve . unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam . upamāne . śastrīśyāmā kumudaśyenī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_22: dvigu . pañcagavam daśagavam . kṛllope . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . tatra śeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_23: doṣaḥ saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīhipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra śeṣavacanāt doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_24: bhavati . saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_25: . dvīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ trīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ . samānādhikaraṇa . vīrpuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_26: nañsamāse . abrāhmaṇakaḥ deśaḥ avṛṣalakaḥ deśaḥ . kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_27: na bahuvrīhiḥ . kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ na prāpnoti . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_28: prapatitapalāśaḥ prapalāśakaḥ iti . atha ekasañjñādhikāre katham sidhyati . ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_29: vipratiṣedhād bahuvrīhiḥ . ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_30: ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ . ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_31: vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_32: . tatpuruṣaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatpuruṣaḥ iti cet anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_33: . tatpuruṣaḥ iti cet anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3561_0: 313-317 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutau
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_1: . hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutasañjñe bādhete . tiṅsārvadhātukam liṅliṭoḥ ārdhadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_2: . tiṅaḥ sārvadhātukasañjñām liṅliṭoḥārdhadhātusañjñā bādhate . apatyam vṛddham yuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_3: . apatyam vṛddham yavusañjñā bādhate . ghim nadī . ghisañjñām nadīsañjñā bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_4: . laghu guru . laghusañjñām gurusañjñā bādhate . padam bham . padasañjñām bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_5: bādhate . apādādnam uttarāṇi dhanuṣā vidhyati kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte gām dogdhi dhanuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_6: vidhyati iti . apādānasañjñām uttarāṇi kārakāṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuṣā vidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_7: . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte . gām dogdhi . dhanuḥ vidhyati . dhanuṣā vidhyati iti apāyayuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_8: ca dhruvamapāye apādānam iti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti sādhakatamam karaṇam iti ca karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_9: . karaṇasañjñā parā sā bhavati . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte iti atra apāyuktatvāt ca dhruvamapāye
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_10: apādānamiti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti ca adhikaraṇasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_11: adhikaraṇasañjñā parā sā bhavati . gām dogdhi iti atra apāyuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_12: prāpnoti karturīpsitatamam karma . iti ca karmasañjñā . karmasañjñā parā sā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_13: . dhanuḥ vidhyati iti atra apāyayuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā prāpnoti svatantraḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_14: iti ca . kartṛsañjñā parā sā bhavati . krudhadruhoḥ upsṛṣṭayoḥ karma saṃpradānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_15: . krudhadruhoḥ upsṛṣṭayoḥ karmasañjñā saṃpradānasañjñām bādhate . karaṇam parāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_16: sādhu asiḥ chinatti . karaṇasañjñām parāṇi āṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuḥ vidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_17: asiḥ chinatti iti . adhikaraṇam karma geham praviśati . adhikaraṇasañjñām karmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_18: bādhate . kva . geham praviśati iti . adhikaraṇam kartā sthālī pacati . adhikaraṇasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_19: karmasañjñā bādhate . kva . sthālī pacati iti . adhyupasṛṣṭam karma . adhyupasṛṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_20: karma adhikaraṇasañjñām bādhate . gatyupasargasañjñe karmapravacanīyasañjñā . gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_22: ātmanepadasañjñā bādhate . samāsasañjñāḥ ca . samāsasañjñāḥ ca yāḥ yāḥ parāḥ anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3561_23: ca tāḥ tāḥ pūrvāḥ sāvakāśāḥ ca bādhante .

GS24pmbhasuu:3571_0: 319-325 vipratiṣedhaḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . vipratipūrvāt siddheḥ karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3571_1: karmavyatihāre ghañ . itaretarapratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . anyonyapratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3571_2: . kaḥ punaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvau prasaṅgau anyārthau ekasmin saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3571_3: dvau prasaṇgau yadā anyārthau bhavataḥ ekasmin ca yugapat prāptnutaḥ saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3571_4: . kva punaḥ anyārthau kva ca ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ . vṛkṣābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_0: vṛkṣeṣu iti anyārthau vṛkṣebhyaḥ iti atra yugapat prāpnutaḥ . kim ca syāt . ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_2: ca parasyāḥ ca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate ekasmin yugapadasambhavātpūrvaparaprāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_3: ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ iti . katham hi ekasmin ca nāma yugapadasambhavaḥ syāt pūrvasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_4: ca parasyāḥca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ ca syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . yat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_5: ekasmin yugapadasambhavāt iti kāryayoḥ yugapadasambhavaḥ śāstrayoḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_6: . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . tat yathā tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_7: bhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa bhavanti . anavayaprasaṅgāt pratipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_8: vidheḥ ca . anavayavena prasajyante pratipadam ca vidhīyante . apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_9: tulyabalatvāt . apratipattiḥ vā punaḥ ubhayoḥ śāstrayoḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . tulyabalatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_10: . tulyabale hi ubhe śāstre . tat yathā . dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ ekaḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_11: . saḥ tayoḥ paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_12: ca kārye bhavataḥ tadā yadi asau avirodhārthī bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_13: punaḥ kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti . yaugapadyāsambhavāt . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_14: . tatra pratipattyartham vacanam . tatra pratipattyartham idam vaktavyam . tavyadādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_15: tu aprasiddhiḥ . tavyadādīnām tu kāryasya aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kim cit tavyadādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_16: niyamakāri śāstram ārabhyate yena tavyadādayaḥ syuḥ . yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_17: apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_18: anavakāśāḥ tavyadādayaḥ ucyante ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_19: vyapadiṣṭaḥ tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . etāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_20: iha sūtram vipratiṣedhe param iti . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ sakṛdgatau virpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_21: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . punaḥ ca paṭhiṣyati punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_22: iti . kim punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . iha bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_23: dvau hetū vyapadiṣṭau . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti ca apratipattiḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_24: ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti ca . tat yadā tāvat eṣaḥ hetuḥ tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_25: prāpnoti iti tadā vipratiṣeḍhe param iti anena kim kriyate . niyamaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_26: param eva bhavati iti . tadā etat upapannam bhavati sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_27: tat bādhitam eva iti . yadā tu eṣaḥ hetuḥ apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_28: tadā vipratiṣedhe param iti anena kim kriyate . dvāram . vipratiṣedhe param tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_29: bhavati tasmin krṭe yadi pūrvam api prāpnoti tat api bhavati . tadā etat upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_30: bhavati punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt siddham iti . vipratiṣedhe param iti uktvā aṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_31: pūrvam iti vaktavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_33: nuṭ iti . katham ye paravipratiṣedhāḥ . ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_34: iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . katham ye pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_35: vipratiṣedhe param iti eva siddham . katham . paraśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_36: vyavasthāyām vartate . tat yathā pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . paraputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_37: parabhāryā . anyaputraḥ anyabhāryā iti gamyate . asti prādhānye vartate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3572_38: param iyaṃ brāhmāṇī asmin kuṭumbe . pradhānam iti gamyate . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3573: iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . tat yathā . param dhāma gataḥ iti . iṣṭam dhāma iti gamyate . tat yaḥ iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3577_0: 325-335 antaraṅgam ca . antaraṅgam ca balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3577_1: . prayojanam yaṇekādeśettvottvāni guṇavṛddhidvirvacanāllopasvarebhyaḥ . guṇāt yaṇādeśaḥ : syonaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_0: syonā . guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavatyantaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_1: . vṛddheḥ yaṇādeśaḥ . dyaukāmiḥ syaukāmiḥ . vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_2: vṛddhiḥ syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . dvirvacanāt yaṇādeśaḥ . dudyūṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_3: susyūṣati . dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . nityatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_4: bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . allopasya ca yaṇādeśasya ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . svarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_5: yaṇādeśaḥ . dyaukāmiḥ syaukāmiḥ . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_6: syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . guṇāt ekādeśaḥ . kādraveyaḥ mantram apaśyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_7: . guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_8: . vṛddheḥ ekādeśaḥ . vaikṣmāṇiḥ sausthitiḥ . vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_9: vṛddhiḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . dvirvacanāt ekādeśaḥ . jñāyā odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_10: jñaudanaḥ . jñaudanam icchati jñaudanīyati . jñaudanīyateḥ san jujñaudanīyiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_11: dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . nityatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_12: antaraṅgataḥ . allopāt ekādeśaḥ . śunā śune . allopaḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_13: allopaḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_14: atra viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_15: nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_16: . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_17: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_18: . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na lākṣaṇikasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_19: kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_20: na asti . bahhuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_21: . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_0: kumārī iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati nodāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_1: iti yat ayam śvanśabdam gaurādiṣu paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_2: hi syān ṅīpā eva . svarāt ekādekādeśaḥ . sautthitiḥ vaikṣmāṇiḥ . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_3: ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvātsvaraḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . guṇasya ca ittvottvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_4: ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . vṛddheḥ ittvottve . staurṇiḥ paurtiḥ . vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_5: ittvottve ca . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ syāt . ittvottve bhavataḥ antaraṅgataḥ . dvirvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_6: ittvottve . ātestīryate āpopūryate . dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti ittvottve ca . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_7: dvirvacanam syāt . ittvottve bhavataḥ antaraṅgataḥ . allopasya ca ittvottvayoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_8: na asti sampradhāraṇā . svare nāsti viśeṣaḥ . iṇṅiśīnām āt guṇaḥ savarṇadīrghatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_9: . iṇṅiśīnām āt guṇaḥ savarṇadīrghatvāt prayojanam . ayaje indram avape indram . vṛkṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_10: indram plakṣe indram . ye indram te indram . āt guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_11: ca . paratvāt savaraṇadīrghatvam syāt . āt guṇaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na vā savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_12: anavakāśatvāt . na vā etat antaraṅgeṇa api sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_13: anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśam savarṇadīrghatvam āt guṇam bādheta . na etat antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:3579_14: asti anavakāśam param iti . iha api syonaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3580_0: syonā iti śakyam vaktum na vā paratvāt guṇasya iti . ūṅāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ ītvalopābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3580_1: . ūṅāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ ītvalopābhyām bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . ītvāt ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3580_2: . khaṭvīyati mālīyati . ītvam ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt ītvam syāt . ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3580_3: bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . lopāt ekādeśaḥ . kāmaṇḍaleyaḥ bhādrabāheyaḥ . lopaḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3580_4: ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt lopaḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3580_5: ītvalopābhyām iti ucyate na lopetvābhyāmiti eva ucyeta . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3580_6: iti . āpaḥ api ekādeśaḥ lope prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_2: . veñ vānīyam śo śānīyam glai glānīyam mlai mlānīyam glācchattram clācchatram . āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_3: ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . āttvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_4: . napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam ca prayojanam . atiri atra atinu atra atiricchattram
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_5: atinucchatram ārāśastri idam dhānāśaṣkuli idam niṣkauśāmbi idam nirvārāṇasi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_7: ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_10: . yaṇādeśāt . agnicit atra somasut atra . ekādeśāt . agnicit idam somasut udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_11: . guṇāt . agnicite somasute . vṛddheḥ . praṛcchakaḥ prārcchakaḥ . auttvāt . agniciti
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_12: somasuti . dīrghatvāt . jagadbhyām janagadbhyām . ītvāt . jagatyati janagatyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_13: mumaḥ . agnicinmanyaḥ somasunmanyaḥ . etvāt . jagadbhyaḥ janagadbhyaḥ . rīvidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_14: . sukṛtyati pāpakrṭyati . anaṅānaṅbhyām ca iti vaktavyam . sukṛt sukṛtdduṣkrṭau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_15: tuk ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . tuk bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_16: . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . dhiyati riyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_17: . iyaṅādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti guṇaḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṇgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_18: . uvaṅādeśaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . prādudruvat prāsusruvat . śveḥ samprasāraṇapūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_19: yaṇādeśāt . śveḥ samprasāraṇapūrvatvam yaṇādeśāt bhavati antaraṇgataḥ prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_20: . śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ . pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt yaṇādeśaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_21: . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṇgataḥ . hvaḥ ākāralopāt . hvaḥ ākāralopāt pūrvatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_22: antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . juhuvatuḥ juhuvuḥ . pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti ākāralopaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_23: paratvāt ākāralopaḥ syāt . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . svaraḥ lopāt . svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_24: lopāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . aupagavī saudāmanī . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_25: ca . paratvāt lopaḥ syāt . svaraḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . pratyayavidhiḥ ekādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_26: . pratyayavidhiḥ ekādeśāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . agniḥ indraḥ vāyuḥ udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_27: . pratyayavidhiḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ syāt . |
GS24pmbhasuu:3582_0: pratyayavidhiḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . yaṇādeśāt ca iti vaktavyam . agniḥ atra vāyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3582_1: atra . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3582_2: . pacatu atra paṭhtu atra . lādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca .paratvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3582_3: syāt . lādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3582_5: pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ aparaśālāpriyaḥ ṭatpuruṣāntodāttatvam ca prāpnoti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3582_6: ca . paratvāt pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam syāt . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3582_7: . etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_0: 335-339 yadi santi prayojanāni iti eṣā paribhāṣā kriyate nanu ca iyam api kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_1: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . kim prayojanam . pacāvedam pacāmedam
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_2: . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya antaraṇgalakṣaṇam aitvam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_3: ubhe tarhi kartavye . na iti āha . anayā eva siddham . iha api syonaḥ syonā iti asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_4: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśo bhaviṣyati . yadi asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_5: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti ucyate akṣadyūḥ hiraṇyadyūḥ asiddhatvāt asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_6: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya ūṭhaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_7: . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi na ajānantarye
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_8: bahiṣṭvaprakḷptiḥ iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_9: jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhaḥ iti āha . iyam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_10: paribhāṣā kartavyā asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇamantaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . eṣā ca na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_11: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam vāhaḥ ūṭh iti ūṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_12: śāsti . tasya doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_13: doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt antaraṅgataḥ abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_14: . pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ aparaiṣukāmaśamaḥ guḍodakam tilodakam . udake akevale iti pūrvottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_15: vyapavargābhāvāt na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_16: tāvat kāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_17: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . indre dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya īti ca iti lopena
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_18: hriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena . tataḥ anackaḥ indraḥ sampannaḥ . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vṛddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_19: . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ pūrvapadottarapadyoḥ tāvatkāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_20: na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yaṇādeśāt iyuvau . yaṇādeśāt iyuvau antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3586_21: abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ sauvaśvaḥ iti . lakṣaṇam hi bhavati yvoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3610_1: tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne strī iyatī strīyati iti atra api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_2: . pratyayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_3: . yasmāt pratyayaḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne dadhi adhunā madhu adhunā
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_4: atrāpi prasajyeta . vidhigrahaṇeṇa punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . tat etat pratyayagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_5: vidhigrahaṇena ca samuditena kriyate sanniyogaḥ . yasmāt yaḥ pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_6: tadādi tasmin aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti . atha tadādigrahaṇam kimartham . aṅgasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_7: tadādivacanam syādinumartham . aṅgasañjñāyām tadādigrahaṇam kriyate syādyartham numartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_8: ca . syādyartham tāvat . kariṣyāvaḥ kariṣyāmaḥ . numartham . kuṇḍāni vanāni . mitsuṭoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3610_11: na sidhyati . suṭaḥ bahiraṅgatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ suṭ . antaraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ . asiddham

GS24pmbhasuu:3610_13: kṛñartham . yadi saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kriyate na arthaḥ saṃyogādigrahaṇena . iha

GS24pmbhasuu:3610_15: na arthaḥ . idam tu na sidhyati sañcakaratuḥ sañcaskaruḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati

GS24pmbhasuu:3610_17: tadādyādivacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tadādyādi aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3610_18: . kim idam tadādyādi iti . tasya ādiḥ tadādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3611: tadādiḥ ādiḥ yasya tadidam tadādyādi iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3614_0: evam tadādyādi tadādi iti . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā siddham . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3614_1: siddham etat . tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate. tad yathā . gaṅgā yamunā devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:3614_2: iti . anekā nadī gaṅgām yamunām ca praviṣṭā gaṅgāyamunāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3614_3: devadattāsthaḥ garbhaḥ devadattāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . iha ke cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3614_4: śabdāḥ aktaparimāṇānām arthānām vācakāḥ bhavanti ye ete saṅkhyāśabdāḥ parimāṇaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3615: ekena api apāye na bhavanti . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3616: naivā adhike bhavanti na ca nyūne . ke cit yāvat eva tat bhavati tāvat eva āhuḥ ye ete jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ ca . tailam ghṛtam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3617: khāryām api bhavanti droṇe api . śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3618_0: himavati api bhavati vaṭakaṇikāmātre api dravye . aṅgasañjñā ca api aktaparimāṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3618_1: kriyate . sā kena adhikasya syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tadekadeśabhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3618_2: tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti yat ayam na idamadasoḥ akoḥ iti sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:3618_3: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . idamadasoḥ kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgo yat sakakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3618_4: syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti tataḥ sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
