GS24pmbhasuu:3625_3: . pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhyeṣye . pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhīṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_4: prākarot upaihiṣṭa upasargāt pūrvau aḍāṭau prāpnutaḥ . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_5: yasmāt saḥ tadāditadantavijñānāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_6: saḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_7: . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā paribhāṣā kriyeta pratyayagrahaṇam vā . avaśyam eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_8: paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam dhātuprātipadikapratyayasamāsataddhitavidhisvarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_9: . dhātu . devadattaḥ cikīrṣati . saṅghātasya dhātusañjñā prāpnoti . prātipadika .
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_10: devadattḥ gārgyaḥ . saṅghātasya prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyaya . mahāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_11: putram icchati . samghātāt pratyayotpattiḥ prāpnoti . samāsa . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_12: . samghātasya samāsasañjñā prāpnoti . taddhitavidhi . devadattaḥ gārgyāyaṇaḥ . samghātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_13: taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti . svara . devadattaḥ gārgyaḥ . samghātsya ñnityādiḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_14: iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt sa tadādeḥ tadantasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_15: bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . evam vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3626: yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyate . tataḥ aṅgam . aṅgasañjñam ca bhavati yasmā tpratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye .
GS24pmbhasuu:3630_0: 359-360 yadi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti ucyate avatapenakulasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3630_1: te etat udakeviśīrṇam te etat sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3630_2: tarhi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_0: kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_1: ti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam samāsataddhitavidhisvarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_2: . samāsa . avatapenakulasthitam te etat udakeviśīrṇam te etat sagatikena sanakulena
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_3: ca samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . samāsa . taddhitavidhi . sāṅkūṭinam vyāvakrośī . samghātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_4: taddhitopattiḥ siddhā bhavati . taddhitavidhi . svara . dūrāt āgataḥ dūrādāgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_5: iti . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_6: gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_7: kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣa iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3631_8: ayam gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti anantaragrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_0: 361-362 antagrahaṇam kimartham na suptiṅ padam iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_1: bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . padasañjñāyām antavacanam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_3: kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra sañjñāvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_4: pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . taraptamau
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_5: ghaḥ . taraptamabantasya ghasañjñā na bhavati . kim ca syāt . kumārī gauritarā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_6: ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi etat jñāpyate sanādyantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_7: dhātavaḥ iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ ca iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_8: . idam tṛtīyam jñāpakārtham . dve tāvat kriyete nyāse eva . yat api ucyate kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_9: ca iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . arthavat iti vartate kṛttaddhāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_10: ca eva arthavat na kevalāḥ kṛtaḥ taddhitāḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3639: 363 kimartham idam ucyate na subantam padam iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayamārambhaḥ . nāntameva kye padasañjñam bhavati na anyat . kva mā bhūt . vācyati srucyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_0: 363-364 asarvanāmasthāne iti ucyate . tatra te rājā takṣā asarvanāmasthāne iti padasañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_1: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_2: na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam yat anyat sarvanāmasthānāt iti . sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_3: avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena citprāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_4: vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . antarasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_5: vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_6: ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_7: atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . svādiṣu pūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tataḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_8: ayacipūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tato bham . bhasañjñam ca bhavati yajādau asarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_9: iti . yadi tarhi sau api padam bhavati ecaḥ plutavikāre padāntagrahaṇam coditam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_10: mā bhūt bhadram karoṣi gauḥ iti tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti . vākyapadayoḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3643_11: iti evam tat . bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadbhyaḥ etayoḥ padasañjñā vaktavyā . bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadvadbhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_0: 365-366 bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_1: ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anukampitaḥ ṣaḍaḍguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ . siddham acaḥ sthānivattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_2: . siddham etat . katham . acaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt bhasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_3: tarhi prāpnoti . vāgāśīrdattaḥ vācikaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3648: siddham ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadalopavacanāt iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti ṣaḍaḍguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3649_0: ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham iti . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām vati upasamkhyānam . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3649_1: vati upasamkhyānam kartavyam . nabhasvat aṅgirasvat manuṣvat . vṛṣaṇ vasvaśvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3649_2: . vṛṣaṇ iti etasya vasvaśayoḥ bhasañjñā vaktavyā . vṛṣaṇvasuḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya yat śiraḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya mene .
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_0: 366-367 arthagrahaṇam kimartham na tasau matau iti eva ucyeta . tasau matau iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_1: ucyamāne ihaiva syāt payasvān yaśasvān . iha na syāt payasvī yaśasvī . arthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_2: punaḥ kriyamāṇe matupi ca siddham bhavati yaḥ ca nyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ tasmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_3: . yadi arthagrahaṇam kriyate payasvān yaśasvān atra na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_4: hi matup matvarthe vartate . matup api matvarthe vartate . tat yathā devadattaśālāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_5: brāhmaṇā ānīyantām iti ukte yadi devadattaḥ pi brāhmaṇaḥ bhavati saḥ api ānīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3654: (P_1,4.20) KA_I,320.23 Ro_II,367 ubhayasañjñānyapi iti vaktavyam . saḥ suṣṭhubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_0: 368-372 bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti ucyate . keṣu bahuṣu . artheṣu . yadi evam vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_1: plakṣaḥ atra api prāpnoti . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ mūlam skandhaḥ phalam palāśam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_2: evam tarhi ekavacanam dvivacanam bahuvacanamiti śabdasañjñāḥ etāḥ . yeṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_3: svādayaḥ vidhīyante teṣu bahuṣu . keṣu ca artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . karmādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_4: . na vai karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . ke tarhi . ekatvādayaḥ . ekatvādiṣu api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_5: vibhakyartheṣu avaśyam karmādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ . karmaṇaḥ ekatve karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_6: dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_7: bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . iha ca : iti eke manyante ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3659: tat eke manyante iti paratvāt ekavacanam prāpnoti . bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ paraḥ kariṣyate . sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . iha ca : bahuḥ odanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_0: bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_1: na hi antareṇa bhāvaprayayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ iti tan na . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_2: api bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . katham . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_3: bhavati . tat yathā paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti . kadā cit ca guṇinā guṇaḥ vypadiśyate . paṭhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_4: śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_5: guṇaguṇinoḥ . tadā na antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_6: tu guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate paṭasya śuklaḥ iti svapradhānaḥ tadā guṇaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_7: tadā dravye ṣaṣṭhī . tadā antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guaṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_8: . na ca iha vayam ekatvādibhiḥ karmādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . kim tarhi . karmādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_9: ekatvādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . ekasmin ekavacanam . kasyaikasmin . karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_10: . dvayoḥ dvivacanam . kayoḥ dvayoḥ . karmaṇoḥ . bahuṣu bahuvacanam . keṣām bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_11: . karmaṇām iti . katham bahuṣu bahuvacanamiti . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ nānādhikaraṇavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_12: yaḥ bahuśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam na vaipulyavācinaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_13: . yat uktam bahuḥ odanaḥ bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti iti sa doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_14: na bhavati . yat apyucyate iti eke manyante tat eke manyanta iti paratvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_15: prāpnoti iti na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva samkhyāvācī . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_16: yathā ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā ekāgnayaḥ ekahalāni ekākibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_17: kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3660_18: tāḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3664_0: 372-375 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . suptiṅām aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣtaviprayogatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3664_1: ca niyamārtham vacanam . supaḥ aviśeṣeṇa prātipadikamātrāt vidhīyante . tiṅaḥ aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3664_2: dhātumātrāt vidhīyante . tatra etat syāt yadi apyaviśeṣeṇa vidhīyante na eva viprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3664_3: lakṣyate iti . dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca . dṛśyate khalu api viprayogaḥ . tadyathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3666_0: pādāḥ me sukumārāḥ iti . suptiṅoḥ aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca vyatikaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3666_1: prāpnoti . iṣyate ca avyatikaraḥ syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3666_2: niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . atha etasmin niyamārthe sati kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3669: bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam iti . āhosvit arthaniyamaḥ : ekasmin ekavacanam eva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3671_0: bahuṣu bahuvacanam eva iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3671_1: padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3671_2: . uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . asubantatvāt . arthaniyame siddham . arthaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3671_3: siddham bhavati . astu arthaniyamaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu pratyayaniyamaḥ . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3672_0: tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3672_1: . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3672_2: karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3672_3: . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3672_4: . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3672_5: naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na dvayoḥ na ekasmin iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3672_6: jñāpayati utpadyante avyayebhyaḥ svādayaḥ iti yat ayam avyayāt āpsupaḥ iti avyayāt lukam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_0: 376-379 kim idam kārake iti . sañjñānirdeśaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_1: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha hi vyākaraṇe ye vā ete loke pratītapadārthakāḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_2: taiḥ nirdeśāḥ kriyante paśuḥ apatyam devatā iti yāḥ vā etāḥ kṛtrimāḥ ṭighughabhasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_3: tābhiḥ . na ca ayam loke dhruvādīnām pratītapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ na khalu api kṛtrimā
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_4: sañjñā anyatra avidhānāt . sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_5: anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . kārake iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ . kārake
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_6: iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . sādhakam nirvartakam kārakasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_7: bhavati iti vaktavyam . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_8: akārakasya . itarathā hi aniṣṭam prasajyeta . akārakasya api apādādanasañjñā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_9: . kva . grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_10: . kim tarhi . samīpam . yadā ca grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ bhavati bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_11: . tat yathā grāmāt āgacchati iti . karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_12: panthānam pṛcchati iti . karmasañjñā ca prāpnoti akathitasya. kva . brāhmaṇasya putram
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_13: panthānam pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam akathitaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkīrtite
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_14: vartate . tat yathā kaḥ cit kam cit sañcakṣya āha asau atra akathitaḥ . asaṃkīrtitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_15: iti gamyate . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā akathitaḥ asau grāme akathitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_16: asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra apradhānaḥ bhavati . tat yadā aprādhānye akathitśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_17: vartate tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_18: pṛcchati iti . apādānam ca vṛkṣasya parṇam patati iti . apādānasañjñā ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_19: . kva . vṛkṣasya parṇam patati . kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patati iti . nā vā apāyasyāvivakṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_20: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apāyasya avivakṣitatvāt . na atra apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_21: . kim tarhi . sambandhaḥ . yadā ca apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ bhavati bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_22: . tat yathā . vṛkṣāt parṇam patati iti . sambandhastu tadā na vivakṣitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3676_23: . na jñāyate kaṅkasya vā kurarasya vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_0: 379-386 ayam tarhi doṣaḥ karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ ca akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_1: pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kārakaḥ iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_2: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākāraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_3: karaṇe etatprayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . karoti iti kārakam iti . anvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_4: iti cet akartari kartṛśabdānupapattiḥ . anvartham iti cet akartari kartṛśabdaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_5: upapadyate . karaṇam kārakam adhikaraṇam kārakam iti . siddham tu pratikārakam kriyābhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_6: pacādīnām karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛbhāvaḥ . siddhaḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_7: . kutaḥ . pratikārakam kriyābhedāt pacādīnām . pacādīnām hi pratikārakam kriyā bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_8: . kim idam pratikārakam iti . kārakam kārakam prati pratikārakam . kaḥ asau pratikārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_11: devadattaḥ pacati iti ucyate . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ pākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_12: . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati ti sambhavanakriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_13: dhāraṇakriyā ca adhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati iti sambhavanakriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_14: dhāraṇakriyām ca kurvatī sthālī pacati iti ucatye . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_15: dhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . etat adhikaraṇasya kartṛtvam . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_16: iti jvalvanakriyā karaṇasya pākaḥ . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti iti kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_17: kāṣṭhāni pacanti iti ucyante . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ karaṇasya pākaḥ .etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_18: karaṇasya kartṛtvam . udyamananipātanāni kartuḥ chidikriyā . udyamananipātanāni kurvan
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_19: devadattaḥ chinatti iti ucyate . tatra tadā chidiḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_20: chedaḥ . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . yat tat na tṛṇena tatparaśoḥ chedanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_21: yat tat samāne udyamane nipātane ca paraśunā chidyate na tṛṇena tat paraśoḥ chedanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_22: . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . itarathā hi asitṛṇayoḥ chedane aviśeṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_23: yaḥ hi manyata udyamananipātanāt eva etat bhavati chinatti iti asitṛṇayoḥ chedane
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_24: na tasya viśeṣaḥ syāt . yat asinā chidyate tṛṇena api tat chidyeta . apādānādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_25: tu aprasiddhiḥ . apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ . yathā hi bhavatā karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_26: kartṛtvam nirdarśitam na tathā apādānādīnām kartṛtvam nidarśyate . na vā svatantraparatantratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_27: tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_28: svatantraparatantratvāt . sarvatra eva atra svātantryam pāratantryam ca vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_29: . tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam . tayoḥ svātantryapāratantryayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_30: . vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . balāhakāt vidyotate . balāhake vidyotate
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_31: . balāhakaḥ vidyotate iti . kim tarhi ucyate apādānādīnām tu aprasiddhiḥ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_32: tarhi na brūmaḥ apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ iti . paryāptam karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_33: kartṛtvam nidarśitam apādānīnām kartṛtvanirdarśanāya . paryāptaḥ hyekaḥ pulākaḥ sthālyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_34: nirdarśanāya . kim tarhi . sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . yāvatā sarvatra eva atra svātantryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_35: vidyate pāratantryam ca tatra paratvāt kartṛsañjñā eva prāpnoti . atra api na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_36: svatantryaparatantratvāt tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_37: yathā punaḥ idam sthālyāḥ svātantryam nidarśitam sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_38: kurvatī sthālī svatantrā iti kva idānīm paratantrā syāt . yat tat prakṣālanam parivartanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_39: vā . na vai evamartham sthālī upādiyate prakṣālanam parivartanam ca kariṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_40: . katham tarhi . sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca kariṣyati iti . tatra ca sau svatantrā
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_41: . kva idānīm paratantrā . evam tarhi sthālīsthe yatne kathyamāne sthālī svatantrā
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_42: kartṛsthe yatne kathyamāne paratantrā . nanu ca bhoḥ kartṛsthe api vai yatne kathyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_43: sthālī sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca karoti . tatra asau svatantrā . kva idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_44: paratantrā . evam tarhi pradhānena samavāye sthālī paratantrā vyavāye svatantrā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_45: tat yathā amātyādīnām rājñā saha samavāye pāratantryam vyavāye svātantryam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_46: punaḥ pradhānam . kartā .katham punaḥ jñāyate kartā pradhānam iti . yat sarveṣu sādhaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3680_47: samnihiteṣu kartā pravartayitā bhavati . nanu ca bhoḥ pradhānena api vai samavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_0: . na hi kārakam iti anena adhikaraṇatvam uktam adhikaraṇamiti vā kārakatvam . ubhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_1: ca anyonyaviśeṣakau bhavataḥ . katham . ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . tat yathā gārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_2: devadattaḥ iti . na hi gārgyaḥ iti anena devadattatvam uktam devadattaḥ iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_3: vā gārgyatvam . ubhau ca anyonyaviśeṣakau bhavataḥ ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_4: sāmānyabhūtā kriyā vartate tasyāḥ nirvartakam kārakam . atha vā yāvat brūyāt kriyāyāmiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_5: tāvat kārake iti . evam ca kṛtvā nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati kārake iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_0: 387-392 dhruvam iti kimartham . grāmāt āgacchati śakaṭena . na etat asti . karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_1: atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi grāmāt āgacchan kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_2: iti . atra api adhikaraṇasañjñā bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi vṛkṣasya parṇam patati
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_3: . kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patiti iti . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasamkhyānam . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_4: upasamkhyānam kartavyam . jugupsā . adharmāt jugupsate. adharmāt bībhatsate . virāma |
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_0: dharmāt viramati. dharmāt nivartate . pramāda . dharmāt pramādyati . dharmāt muhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_1: . iha ca upasamkhyānam kartavyam . sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_2: . tat tarhi idam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adharmāt jugupsate adharmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_3: bībhatsate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati duḥkhaḥ adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_4: na anena kṛtyam asti iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvamapāye apādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_5: iti eva siddham . iha ca dharmāt viramati dharmāt nivartate iti dharmāt pramādyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_6: dharmāt muhyati iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ sambhinnabuddhiḥ bhavati saḥ paśyati na idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_7: kim cit dharmaḥ nāma na enam kariṣyāmi iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_8: dhruvamapāye apādānam iti eva siddham . iha ca sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_9: iti . yaḥ taiḥ sāmyam gatavān bhavati saḥ etatprayuṅkte . gatiyukteṣu apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_10: na papadyate adhruvatvāt . gatiyukteṣu apādānasañjñā na upapadyate . aśvāt trastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_11: patitaḥ . rathāt pravītāt patitaḥ . sārthāt gacchataḥ hīnaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . adhruvatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_12: . na vā adhrauvyasya avivikṣitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . adhrauvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_13: avivakṣitatvāt . na atra adhrauvyam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . dhrauvyam . iha tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_14: aśvāt trastāt patitaḥ iti . yat tadaśve aśvatvam āśugāmitvam tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_15: . rathāt pravītāt patitaḥ iti yat tat rathe rathatvam ramante asmin rathaḥ iti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_16: dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam . sārthāt gacchataḥ hīnaḥ iti yat tatsārthe sārthatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_17: sahārthībhāvaḥ tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣiktam . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_18: vaktum ye tu ete atyantagatiyuktāḥ tatra katham . dhāvataḥ patitaḥ . tvaramāṇāt patitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_19: iti . atra api na vā adhrauvyasya avivakṣitatvāt iti eva siddham . katham punaḥ sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_20: nāma avivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā alomikā eḍakā . anudarā
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_21: kanya iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_0: 392-393 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti caurebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_1: trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . iha tāvat vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_2: . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi mām vṛkāḥ paśyanti dhruvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_3: me mṛtyuḥ iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_4: eva siddham . iha caurebhyaḥ trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_5: bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi imam paśyanti dhruvam asya vadhabandhaparikleśāḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_6: buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3694_0: 393 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham adhyayanāt parājayate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3694_1: prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati duḥkham adhyayanam durdharam ca guravaḥ ca durupacārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3694_2: iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_0: 393-395 kim udāharaṇam . māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati . bhaved yasya māṣāḥ na gāvaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_1: māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ . yasya tu khalu gāvaḥ na māṣāḥ katham tasya māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_2: . tasya api māṣāḥ eva īpsitāḥ . ātaḥ ca īpsitāḥ yavebhyḥ gāḥ vārayati . iha kūpāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_3: andham vārayati iti kūpe apādānasañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi tasya kūpaḥ īpsitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_4: kaḥ tarhi . andhaḥ . tasya api kūpaḥ eva īpsitaḥ . paśyati ayam andhaḥ kūpam mā prāpat
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_5: iti . atha vā yathā eva asya anyatra apaśyataḥ īpsā evam kūpe api . iha agneḥ māṇavakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_6: vārayati iti māṇavake apādānasañjñā prāpnoti . karmasañjñātra bādhikā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_7: . agnau api tarhi bādhikā syāt . tasmāt vaktavyam karmaṇaḥ yat īpsitam iti īpsitepsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_8: iti vā . vāraṇartheṣu karmagrahaṇānarthakyam kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_9: . vāraṇārtheṣu karmagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_10: iti vacanāt . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti eva siddham . ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_11: . katham māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati iti . paśyati ayam yadi imāḥ gāvaḥ tatra gacchanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_12: dhruvam sasyavināśaḥ sasyavināśe adharmaḥ ca eva rājabhayam ca . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:3698_13: nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3702_0: 396 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham upādhyāyāt antardhatte iti . paśyati ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3702_1: yadi mām upādhyāyaḥ paśyati dhruvam preṣaṇam upālambhaḥ vā iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:3702_2: nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_0: 396-398 upayoge iti kimartham . naṭasya śṛṇoti . granthikasya śṛṇoti . upayoge iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_1: ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi upayogaḥ . ātaḥ ca upayogaḥ yat ārambhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3707: granthikasya śroṣyāmaḥ iti . evam tarhi upayoge iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca upayogaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_0: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ upayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ granthārthayoḥ . atha vā upayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_1: kaḥ bhavitum arhati . yaḥ niyamapūrvakaḥ . tat yathā upayuktāḥ māṇavakāḥ iti ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_2: ye ete niyamapūrvakam adhītavantaḥ bhavanti . kim punaḥ ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_3: āhosvit akārakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_4: karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitvāt karmasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_5: . astu tarhi akārakam . akārakam iti cet upayogavacanānarthakyam . yadi akārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_6: upayogavacanam anarthakam . astu tarhi kārakam . nanu ca uktam ākhyātā anupayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_7: kārakam iti cet akathitatvāt karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_8: tatra kriyate . duhiyācirudhipracchibhikṣiciñām iti . ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_9: . katham upādhyāyāt adhīte iti . apakrāmati tasmāt tadadhyayanam . yadi apakrāmati
GS24pmbhasuu:3708_10: kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . sattatatvāt . atha vā jyotirvat jñānāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3712_0: 399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham gomayāt vṛścikaḥ jāyate . golomāvilomabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3712_1: durvāḥ jāyante iti . apakrāmanti tāḥ tebhyaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati
GS24pmbhasuu:3712_2: . santatatvāt . atha vā anyāḥ canyāḥ ca prādurbhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3716_0: 399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham himavataḥ gaṅgā prabhavati iti . apakrāmanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3716_1: tāḥ tasmāt āpaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . santatatvāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_0: 400-401 karmagrahaṇam kimartham . yam abhipraiti saḥ sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_1: karmaṇaḥ eva sampradānasañjñā prasajyeta . karmagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_2: bhavati . karma nimittatvena āśrīyate . atha yamsagrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇā abhipraiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_3: sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne abhiprayataḥ eva sampradānasañjñā prasajyeta . yamsagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_4: punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . yamsagrahaṇāt abhiprayataḥ sampradānasañjñā nirbhajyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_5: . atha abhipragrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇā yam eti sa sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_6: yam eva sampratyeti tatra eva syāt . upādhyāyāya gām dadāti iti . iha na syāt . upādhyāyāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_7: gām adāt . upādhyāyāya gām dāsyati iti . abhipragrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_8: bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate praśabdaḥ ādikarmaṇi . tena yam ca abhipraiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_9: yam ca abhipraiṣyati yam ca abhiprāgād ābhimukhyamātre sarvatra siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_0: 401-403 kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam . iha api yathā syāt . śrāddhāya nigarhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_1: yuddhāya sannahyate . patye śete iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_2: . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām kriyām kariṣyasi . kim karma kariṣyasi

GS24pmbhasuu:3724_4: api kṛtrimam karma . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate katham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_5: nāma kriyayā kriyā īpsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyayā īpsitatamā bhavati . kayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_6: kriyayā . sandarśanakriyayā vā prārthayatikriyayā vā adhyavasyatikriyayā vā . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_7: yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ buddhyā tāvat kamcidartham sampaśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_8: sandṛṣṭe prārthanā prārthanāyām adhavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe nirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_9: nirvṛttau phalāvāptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api karmaṇaḥ karaṇasañjñā

GS24pmbhasuu:3724_11: iti arthaḥ . agnau kila paśuḥ prakṣipyate tat rudrāya pahriyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_0: 403-404 kimete ekārthāḥ āhosvit nānārthāḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekārthāḥ kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_1: pṛthak nirdiśyante . atha nānārthāḥ katham kupinā śakyante viśeṣayitum . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_2: nānārthāḥ kupau tu eṣām sāmānyam asti . na hi akupitaḥ krudhyate na vā akupitaḥ druhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_3: na vā akupitaḥ īrṣyati na vā akupitaḥ asūyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_0: 404-406 tamagrahaṇam kimartham na sādhakam karaṇam iti eva ucyeta ṣādhakam karaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_1: iti iyati ucyamāne sarveṣām kārakāṇām karaṇasañjñā prasajyeta . sarvāṇi hi kārakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_2: sādhakāni . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_3: . pūrvāḥ tāvat sañjñāḥ apavādatvāt bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti parāḥ paratvāt ca anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_4: ca . iha tarhi dhanuṣā vidhyati apāyayuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā sādhakatvāt ca karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_5: prāpnoti . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi lokataḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_6: siddham . tat yathā . loke abhirūpāya udakamāneyam abhirūpāya kanyā deyā iti na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_7: anabhirūpe pravṛttiḥ asti . tatra abhirūpatamāya iti gamyate . evam iha api sādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_8: karaṇam iti ucyate sarvāṇi ca kārakāṇi sādhakāni na ca asādhake pravṛttiḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_9: tatra sādhakatamam iti vijñāsyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tamagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_10: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_11: prayojanam . apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra samprāpya nivṛttiḥ . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_12: iha eva syāt grāmāt āgacchati nagarāt āgacchati iti . sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3732_14: api siddham bhavati . tathā ādhāram ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_15: vyāptaḥ bhavati . tena iha eva syāt tileṣu tailam dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3732_16: kūpe gargarkulam iti atra na syāt . kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3740: 407 tamagrahaṇam kimartham . kartuḥ īpsitam karma iti iyati ucyamāne iha:
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_0: agneḥ māṇavakam vārayati iti māṇavake apādānasañjñā prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_1: karmasañjñā tatra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . agnau api tarhi bādhikā syāt . iha punaḥ tamagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_2: kriyamāṇe tat upapannam bhavati yat uktam vāraṇārtheṣu karmagrahaṇānarthakyam kartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_0: 408-409 iha ucyate odanam pacati iti . yadi odanaḥ pacyeta dravyāntarama bhinirvarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . odanārthāḥ taṇḍulāḥ odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_2: iti . atha iha katham bhavitavyam taṇḍulān odanam pacati iti āhosvit taṇḍulānām odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_3: pacati iti . ubhyathā api bhavitavyam . katham . iha hi taṇḍulān odanam pacati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_4: dvyarthaḥ paciḥ . taṇḍulān pacan odanam nirvartayati iti . iha idanīm taṇḍulānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_5: odanam pacati iti dvyarthaḥ ca eva paciḥ vikārayoge ca ṣaṣṭhī . taṇḍulavikāram odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_6: nirvartayati iti . iha kaḥ cit kam cidāmantrayate siddham bhujyatām iti . saḥ āmantrayamāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_7: āha prabhūtam bhuktam asmābhiḥ iti . āmantrayamāṇaḥ āha dadhi khalu bhaviṣyati payaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_8: khalu bhaviṣyati . āmantryamāṇaḥ āha dadhnā khalu bhuñjīya payasā khalu bhuñjīya
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_9: iti . atra karmasañjñā prāpnoti . tat hi tasya īpsitatamam bhavati . tasya api odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_10: eva eva īpsitatamaḥ na tu guṇeṣu asya anurodhaḥ . tat yathā bhuñjīya aham odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_11: yadi mṛduviśadaḥ syāt iti evam iha api dadhiguṇam odanam bhuñjīya payoguṇamodanam bhuñjīya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_0: 410-411 īpsitasya karmasañjñāyām nirvṛttasya kārakatve karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ kriyepsitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_1: . īpsitasya karmasañjñāyām nirvṛttasya kārakatve karmasañjñā na prāpnoti . guḍam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_2: bhakṣayati iti . kim kāraṇam . kriyepsitatvāt . kriyā tasya īpsitā . na vā ubhayepsitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_3: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ubhayepsitatvāt . ubhayam tasya īpsitam . ātaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3749_5: kṛtī bhavati . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum ye tu ete rājakarmiṇaḥ manuṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_6: teṣām kaḥ cit kam cit āha kaṭam kuru iti . sa āha na aham kaṭam kariṣyāmi ghaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_7: mayā āhṛtaḥ iti . tasya kriyāmātram īpsitam . yadi api tasya kriyāmātram īpsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_8: yaḥ tu asau preṣayati tasya ubhayam īpsitam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3753_0: 411-412 kim udāharaṇam . viṣam bhakṣayati iti . na etat asti . pūrveṇa api etat sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3753_1: . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate kasya ca nāma viṣabhakṣaṇam īpsitam

GS24pmbhasuu:3753_9: . anīpsitam iti na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ īpsitam na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3753_10: ayam yat anyat īpsitāt tat anīpsitam iti . anyat ca etat īpsitāt yat na eva īpsitam

GS24pmbhasuu:3767_0: 418-424 atha ye dhātūnām dvikarmakāḥ teṣām kim kathite lādayaḥ bhavanti āhosvit akathite
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_1: . kathite lādayaḥ . kathite lādibhiḥ abhihite guṇamkarmaṇi kā kartavyā . kathite
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_2: lādayaḥ cet syuḥ ṣaṣṭḥīm kuryāt tadā guṇe . kathite lādayaḥ cet syuḥ ṣaṣṭhī guṇakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_3: tadā kartavyā . duhyate goḥ payaḥ . yācyate pauravasya kambalaḥ iti . katham . akārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_4: hyakathitatvāt . akārakam hi etat bhavati . kim kāraṇam . akathitatvāt . kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_5: cet tu na akathā . atha kārakam na akathitam . atha kārake sati kā kartavyā . kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_6: cet vijānīyāt yām yām manyeta sā bhavet . kārakam cet vijānātīyāt yā yā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_7: sā kartavyā . duhyate goḥ payaḥ . yācyate pauravāt kambalaḥ iti . kathite abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_8: tvavidhiḥ tvamatiḥ guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiḥ sapare . kathite lādibhiḥ abhihite tvavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_9: eṣaḥ bhavati . kim idam tvavidhiḥ iti . tava vidhiḥ tvavidhiḥ . tvamatiḥ . kimidam
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_10: tvamatiḥ iti . tava matiḥ tvamatiḥ . na evam anye manyante . katham tarhi anye manyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3767_11: . guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiḥ sapare . guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiyaḥ bhavanti saha pareṇa yogena

GS24pmbhasuu:3767_14: aguṇe karmaṇi lādayaḥ bhavanti . tat analpmateḥ ācāryasya vacanam smaryatām . aparaḥ āha :

GS24pmbhasuu:3768_1: dhātūnām karmaṇi lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . ajām nayati grāmam . ajā nīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_2: grāmam . ajā nītā grāmam iti . apradhāne duhādīnām . apradhāne duhādīnām karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_3: lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . duhyate gauḥ payaḥ . ṇyante kartuḥ ca karmaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_4: lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . gamyate devadattaḥ grāmam yajñadattena . ke punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_5: dhātūnām dvikarmakāḥ . nīvahyoḥ harateḥ ca api gatyarthānām tathā eva ca dvikarmakeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_6: grahaṇam draṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥ . ajām nayati grāmam . bhāram vahati grāmam . bhāram
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_7: harati grāmam . gatyarthānām . gamayati devadattam grāmam . yāpayati devadattam grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_8: . siddham vā apo anyakarmaṇaḥ . siddham vā punaḥ etat bhavati . kutaḥ . anyakarmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_9: . anyasya atra ajā karma anyasya grāmaḥ . ajām asau gṛhītvā grāmam nayati . anyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_10: iti cet brūyāt lādīnām avidhiḥ bhavet . anyakarma iti cet brūyāt lādīnām avidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_11: ayam bhavet . ajā nīyate grāmam iti . parasādhane utpadyamānena lena ajāyāḥ abhidhānam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_1: akarmakāṇām dhātūnām karmasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kāla . māsam āste . māsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_2: svapiti . bhāva . godoham āste . godoham svapiti . adhvagantavya . krośam āste .
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_3: krośam svapiti . deśaḥ ca akarmaṇām karmasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kurūn svapiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_4: . pañcālān svapiti . viparītam tu yat karma tat kalma kavayaḥ viduḥ . kimidam kalma
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_5: iti . aparisamāptam karma kalma . na vā asmin sarvāṇi karmakāryāṇi kriyante . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_6: tarhi . dvitīyā eva . yasmin tu karmaṇi upajāyate anyat dhātvarthayogā api ca yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_7: ṣaṣṭhī tat karma kalma iti ca kalma na uktam dhātoḥ hi vṛttiḥ na ralatvataḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_8: . etena karmasañjñā sarvā siddhā bhavati kathitena . tatra īpsitasya kim syāt prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_9: karmasañjñāyāḥ . yat tu kathitam purastāt īpsitatayuktam ca tasya siddhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_10: īpsitam eva tu yat syāt tasya bhaviṣyati kathitena . atha iha katham bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_11: . netā aśvasya srughnam iti āhosvit netā aśvasya srughnasya iti . ubhayathā goṇikāputraḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:3784_0: idam eṣām jagdham . khādi . khādati devadattaḥ . khādayati devadattena . nī . nayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3784_1: devadattaḥ . nāyayati devadattena . vaheraniyantṛkartṛkasya . vaheḥ aniyantṛkartṛkasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3784_2: iti vaktavyam . vahati bhāram devadattaḥ . vāhayati bhāram devadattena . aniyantṛkartṛkasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3784_3: iti kimartham . vahanti yavān balīvardāḥ . vāhayanti balīvardān yavān . bhakṣeḥ ahiṃsārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3784_4: . bhakṣeḥ ahimsārthasya iti vaktavyam . bhakṣayati piṇḍīm devadattaḥ . bhakṣayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3784_5: piṇḍīm devadattena . ahimsārthasya iti kimartham . bhakṣayanti yavān balīvardāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māsam āste devadattaḥ . māsam āsayati devadattam . māsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_2: śete devadattaḥ . māsam śāyayati devadattam . siddham tu kālakarmakāṇām akarmakavadvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_3: . siddham etat . katham . kālakarmakāḥ akarmakavat bhavanti iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_4: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām iti ucyate na ca ke cit kadā cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_5: akarmakāḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kva cit ye akarmakāḥ iti . atha vā yena karmaṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_6: sakarmkāḥ ca akarmakāḥ ca bhavanti tena akarmakāṇām . na ca etena karmaṇā kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_7: api akarmakaḥ . atha vā yat karma bhavati na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_8: karma kva cit api na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3792_0: 435 hṛkroḥ vāvacane abhivādidṛśyoḥ ātmanepade upasaṅkhyānam . hṛkrorvāvacane abhivādidṛśoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3796: 435-436 kim yasya svam tantram saḥ svatantraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . tantuvāye prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tantraśabdaḥ asti eva vitāne vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3797_0: āstīrṇam tantram . pretam tantram . vitānaḥ iti gamyate . asti prādhānye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3797_1: . tat yathā svatantraḥ asau brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate . svapradhānaḥ iti gamyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3797_2: yaḥ prādhānye vartate tantraśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_0: 436-438 svatantrasya kartṛsañjñāyām hetumati upasaṅkhyānam asvatrantvāt . svatantrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_1: kartṛsañjñāyām hetumati upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_2: iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asvatantratvāt . na vā svātrantryāt itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_3: hi akurvati api kārayati iti syāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . svātantryāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_4: svatantraḥ asau bhavati . itarathā hi akurvati api kārayati iti syāt . yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_5: na asau svatantraḥ akurvati api tasya kārayati iti etat syāt . na akurvat i iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_6: svatantraḥ . na cet akurvati tasmin kārayati iti etat bhavati svatantraḥ asau bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_7: . śakyam tāvat anena upasamkhyānam kurvatā vaktum kurvan svatantraḥ akurvan na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_8: . sādhīyaḥ jñāpakam bhavati . preṣite ca kila ayam kriyām ca akriyām ca dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3801_9: kurvan svatantraḥ akurvan na iti . yadi ca preṣitaḥ asau na karoti svatantraḥ asau bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_1: hetusañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . svatantraprayojakaḥ hetusañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_2: na ca asau svatantram prayojayati . svatantratvāt siddham . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_3: . svatantratvāt . svatantram asau prayojayati . svatantratvāt siddham iti cet svatantraparatantratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_4: vipratiṣiddam . yadi svatantraḥ na prayojyaḥ atha prayojyaḥ na svatantraḥ prayojyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_5: svatantraḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_6: svātrantryāt itarathā hi akurvati api kārayati iti syāt iti . aparam uktam . na vā

GS24pmbhasuu:3809_0: 440-442 kimartham rephādhikaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ gṛhyate . rīśvarāt vīśvarāt mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_1: rīśvarāt iti ucyate vīśvarāt mā bhūt . śaki ṇamulkamulau īśvare tosunkasunau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_2: . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati anantaraḥ yaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_3: tasya grahaṇam iti yat ayam kṛt mejantaḥ iti kṛtaḥ māntasya ejantasya ca avyayasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_4: śāsti . kṛt mejantaḥ paraḥ api saḥ . paraḥ api etasmāt kṛt māntaḥ ejantaḥ ca asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_5: . tadartham etat syāt . yat tarhi avyayībhāvasya avyayasañjñām śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_6: ācāryaḥ nantaraḥ yaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam iti . samāseṣu avyayībhāvaḥ . samāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_7: etat jñāpakam syāt . avyayībhāvaḥ eva samāsaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_8: . evam tarhi lokataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā loke ā vanāntāt ā udakāntāt priyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_9: pānthaman uvrajet iti yaḥ eva prathamaḥ vanāntaḥ udakāntaḥ ca tataḥ nuvrajati . laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_10: ca ativartate . dvitīyam ca tṛtīyam ca vanāntam udakāntam vā anuvrajati . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_11: rephādikaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ grahītavyaḥ . atha prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sañjñānivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_12: . prāgvacanam kriyate nipātasañjñāyāḥ anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_13: anavakāśāḥ gatyupasargakarmapravacanīyasañjñāḥ nipātasañjñām bādheran . tāḥ mā bādhiṣata
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_14: iti prāgvacanam kriyate . atha kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane yāvatā anavakāśāḥ etāḥ sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_15: kasmāt eva na bādhante . kriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane satyām nipātasañjñāyām etāḥ avayavasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3813_0: 442-444 ayam sattvaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā sattvam ayam brāhmaṇaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3813_3: bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca . kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ . yat anyat sattvavacanāt iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3813_5: vipraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . kriyādravyavacanaḥ ayam samghāto dravyāt anyaśca vidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:3813_6: āśrīyate . asti ca prādibhiḥ sāmānyam iti kṛtvā tadantavidhinā nipātasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3813_7: . atha prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .

GS24pmbhasuu:3838_0: 449-450 katham idam vijñāyate . iteḥ param itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_1: itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_2: vijñāyata iteḥ param itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti khāṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_3: iti atra prāpnoti . atha itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_4: śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti . astu tāvat itiḥ paro yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_5: tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti . nanu ca uktam śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_6: niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_7: atha iha te prāk dhātoḥ iti katham gatimātrasya pūrvaprayogḥ bhavati . upoddharati
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_8: iti . gatyākṛtiḥ pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi anukaraṇākṛtiḥ nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_0: 450 kimartham idam ucyate . anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparatvapratiṣedhaḥ aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_1: . anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparatvapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . kim prayojanam . aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_2: . aniṣṭhaśabdatā mā bhūt iti . idam vicārayiṣyati teprāgdhātuvacanam prayoganiyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_3: vā syāt sañjñāniyamārtham vā iti . tat yadā prayoganiyamārtham tadā aniṣṭhaśabdanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_4: idam vaktavyam . yadā hi sañjñāniyamārtham tadā na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_0: 450-451 idam atibahu kriyate ādare anādare sat asat iti . ādāre sat iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_1: . katham asatkṛtya iti . tadantividhinā bhaviṣyati . kena idānīm anādare bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_2: . nañā ādarapratiṣedham vijñāsyāmaḥ . nādare anādare iti . na evam śakyam . ādaraprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_3: eva hi syāt . anādaraprasaṅge na syāt . anādaragrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_4: ayam vijñāyate . avidyamānādare anādare iti . tasmāt anādaragrahaṇam kartavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:3854_2: iti . makārāntatvam ca gatisañjñāsanniyuktam . makārāntatvam ca gatisañjñāsanniyogena

GS24pmbhasuu:3854_5: . astu anena vibhāṣā . pūrveṇa nityaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . makārāntatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_6: ca gatisañjñāsanniyuktam iti uktam . tat cvyantasya mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti

GS24pmbhasuu:3862_0: prāk prayujyamānānām gatisañjñā bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . prāgdhātuvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_1: prayoganiyamārtham iti cet anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparapratiṣedhaḥ aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3862_5: . sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame siddham etat bhavati . astu tarhi sañjñāniyamaḥ
