GS24pmbhasuu:3862_11: yathā syāt . yadi upasarjanasannipāte pūrvaparavyavasthārtham idam ucyate sukaṭamkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_12: vīraṇān i iti atra gateḥ prāk dhātoḥ prayogaḥ prāpnoti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_13: na atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam īṣadduḥsuṣu kṛcchrākṛcchārtheṣu khal
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_14: iti khakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . khitkaraṇe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_15: khiti iti mum yathā syāt iti . yadi ca atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt khitkaraṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_16: syāt . astu atra mum . anavyayasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_17: na atra gateḥ prāk dhatoḥ prayogaḥ bhavati iti tataḥ khakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_18: na etat asti jñāpakam . yadi api atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt syātevātra mumāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_19: . katham . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_20: evamarthena prāgdhātuvacanena . katham ṛṣabham kūlamudrujam ṛṣabham kūlamudvaham
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_21: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na eṣaḥ udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam . udi kūle rujivahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_0: 456-457 kimartham mahatī sañjñā kriyate . anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_1: proktavantaḥ karmapravacanīyāḥ iti . ke punaḥ karma proktavantaḥ . ye samprati kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_2: na āhuḥ . ke ca samprati kriyām na āhuḥ . ye aprayujyamānasya kriyām āhuḥ te karmapravacanīyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3870: 458-460 kimartham idam ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt . śākalyasya samhitām anu prāvarṣat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3871: gatiḥ gatau iti nighātaḥ prasajyeta . yadi evam veḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñā vaktavyā . veḥ api nighātaḥ na iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_0: prādeśam prādeśam viparilikhati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . na atra veḥ likhim prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_1: . kim tarhi . aprayujyamānam . prādeśam prādeśam vimāya parilikhati iti . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_2: anoḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñayā na arthaḥ . anoḥ api hi na vṛṣim prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_3: . kim tarhi aprayujyamānam . śākalyena sukṛtām samhitām anuviśamya devaḥ prāvarṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_4: . idam tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_6: . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyakṛtatvāt . sāmānyena eva atra karmapravacanīyasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_7: lakṣaṇetthambhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu pratiparyanavaḥ iti . hetvartham tu vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_8: hetvartham idam vaktavyam . hetuḥ śākalyasya samhitā varṣasya na lakṣaṇam . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_9: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . lakṣaṇam hi nāma saḥ bhavati yena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_10: punaḥ lakṣyate na yaḥ sakṛdapi nimittatvāya kalpate . sakṛt ca asau śākalyena sukṛtām
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_11: samhitām anuśimya devaḥ prāvarṣat . saḥ tarhi tathā . nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ anuḥ hetau
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_12: iti . atha idānīm lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api vyāptaḥ na arthaḥ anena . lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_13: vyāptaḥ . na hi avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_14: tarhi . yat sakṛt api nimittvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat yathā api
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_15: bhavān kamaṇḍulapāṇim chātram adrakṣīt iti . sakṛt āsau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ chātraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_16: tasya tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat eva tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_17: dvitīyā iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . siddhā atra dvitīyā karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_18: iti eva . na sidhyati . paratvāt hetutvāśrayā tṛtīyā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_0: 461 āṅ maryādābhividhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt ākumāram yaśaḥ pāṇineḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_1: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . maryādāvacane iti eva siddham . eṣā asya yaśasaḥ maryādā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3880_0: 461-462 kasya lakṣaṇadayaḥ arthāḥ nirdiśyante . vṛkṣādīnām . kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3880_1: ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3880_2: etat asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3880_3: vṛkṣādīn prati kriyāyogaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3880_4: dvitīyā iti . vṛkṣam prati vidyotate . vṛkṣamanu vidyotate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_0: 462-464 kimartham adhiparyoḥ anarthakayoḥ karmapravacanīyasañjñā ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_1: yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_2: tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ anarthakau ca imau . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_3: pañcamī yathā syāt pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti . kutaḥ paryāgamyata iti . siddhā atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_4: pañcamī apādāne iti eva . ātaḥ ca apādānapañcamī eṣā . yatra api adhiśabdena yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_5: pañcamī na vidhīyate tatra api śrūyate . kutaḥ adhyāgamyata iti . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_6: sati yat anarthakayoḥ gatyupasargasañjñābādhikām karmapravacanīyasañjñām śāsti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_7: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anarthakānām api eṣām bhavati arthavatkṛtam iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_8: prayojanam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_9: . atha vā na eva imau anarthakau . kim tarhi anarthakau iti ucyate . anarthāntarvācinau
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_10: anarthakau . dhātunā uktām kriyām āhatuḥ . tad aviśiṣṭam bhavati yathā śaṅkhe payaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_11: . yadi evam dhātunā uktatvāt tasyārthasya upasargaprayogo na prāpnoti uktārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3884_12: aprayogaḥ iti . uktārthānāmapi prayogaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā apūpau dvau ānaya . brāhmaṇau dvau anaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3888_0: 464-465 iha kasmāt na bhavati . sarpiṣaḥ api syāt . gomūtrasya api syāt . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3888_1: syāt . dvitīyā api prasajyeta karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3888_2: na ime apyarthāḥ nirdiśyante . kim tarhi . parapadārthāḥ ime nirdiśyante . eteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3888_3: artheṣu yat padam vartate tat prati apiḥ karmapravacanīyasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3888_4: vā yat atra karmapravacanīyayuktam na adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . binduḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3888_5: bindoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī iti prathamā bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3892_0: 466 adhirīśvaravacane uktam . kim uktam . yasya ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3892_1: cet avacanāt siddham . prathamānupapattiḥ tu . svavacanāt siddham iti . adhiḥ svam
GS24pmbhasuu:3896_1: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . puruṣabādhitatvāt . iha vacane hi sañjñābādhanam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3896_2: hi kriyamāṇe anavakāśā puruṣasañjñā parasmaipadasañjñām bādheta . parasmaipadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3896_3: api anavakāśā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . sāvakāśā parasamaipadasañjñā . kaḥ vakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3896_4: . śatṛkkvasū avakāśaḥ . sici vṛddhau tu parasmaipadagrahaṇam jñāpakam puruṣābādhakatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3896_5: . yat ayam sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti parasmaipadagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3896_6: ācāryaḥ na puruṣasañjñā parasmaipadasañjñām bādhate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_1: ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam . ātmanepadānām ca prathamamadhyamottamasañjñāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_3: akriyamāṇe hi ātmanepadagrahaṇe tisraḥ sañjñāḥ ṣaṭ sañjñinaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_4: na prāpnoti . kriyamāṇe api ca ātmanepadagrahaṇe ānupūrvyavacanam ca . ānupūrvyavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_5: ca kartavyam . akriyamaṇe hi kasya cit eva trikasya prathamasañjñā syāt kasya cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_6: eva madhyamasañjñā kasya cit eva uttamasañjñā . na vaikaśeṣanirdeśāt . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_7: ucyate ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam samasaṅkhyārtham iti . tat na kartavyam . sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_8: api ṣat eva nirdiśyante . katham . ekaśeṣanirdesāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_9: etasmin ekaśeṣanirdeśe sati kim ayam kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ . prathamaḥ ca prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_10: ca prathamau madhyamaḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca madhyamau uttamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca uttamau prathamau
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_11: ca madhyamau ca uttamau ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ iti . āhosvit kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_12: . prathamau ca madhyamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ . prathamamadhyamotttamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_13: ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi kṛtaikeśeṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_14: dvandvaḥ prathamamadhyamayoḥ prathamasañjñā prāpnoti . uttamaprathamayoḥ madhyamasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_15: prāpnoti . madhyamottamayoḥ uttamasañjñā prāpnoti . atha kṛtadvandvānāmekaśeṣo na
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_16: doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . ubhayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_17: āha . ubhayam hi dṛśyate . tat yathā . bahu śaktikiṭakam bahūni śaktikiṭakāni bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_18: sthālīpiṭharam bahūni sthālīpiṭharāṇi . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe api ātmanepadagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_19: ānurpūrvyavacanam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . lokataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3900_20: loke vihavyasya dvābhyām dvābhyām agniḥ upstheyaḥ iti . na ca ucyate ānupūrvyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_0: 470-471 trīṇi trīṇi iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate aṣṭhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_1: ā vibhaktau iti ātvam na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_2: pratyayayoḥ eva grahaṇam prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_3: iti . nanu ca uktam aṣṭhana ā vibhaktau iti ātvam na prāpnoti iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_4: . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam . nanu ca uktam prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_5: pratyayayoḥ eva grahaṇam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aci iti anuvartate . na cājādī
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_6: prathamau pratyayau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate ajādī yau prathamau ajādīnām vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_7: yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ pumsi iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇadīrgham
GS24pmbhasuu:3904_8: pratinirdiśati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti . atha vā vacanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_0: 471-476 kimartham idam ucyate . yuṣmadasmaccheṣavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . atha etasmin niyamārthe vijñāyamāne kim ayam upapadaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_2: madhyamaḥ eva asmadi uttamaḥ eva āhosvit puruṣaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi eva madhyamaḥ asmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_3: eva uttamaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi puruṣaniyamaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣe prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_4: iti . kim kāraṇam . madhyamottamau niyatau yuṣmadasmadī aniyate . tatra prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_5: api prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam prathamaniyamārtham . śeṣe eva prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_6: bhavati na anyatra iti . atha api upapadaniyamaḥ evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_7: śeṣe prathamaḥ iti . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_8: . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣaniyamārtham . śeṣe prathamaḥ eva bhavati na anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_9: iti . upapadaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_10: aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi prathamaḥ bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_11: bhaviṣyati . yatra prathamaḥ ca anyaḥ ca prāpnoti tatra prathamaḥ bhavati iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_12: yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt . tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_13: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacathaḥ . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_14: . kim kāraṇam . śeṣatvāt . śeṣe prathamaḥ iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_15: pratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt . śeṣe prathamḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_16: na iti vaktavyam . yuṣmadi madhyamāt asmadi uttamaḥ pratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_17: asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_18: tvam pacasi . asmadi uttamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ aham pacāmi . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_19: tvam ca aham ca pacāvaḥ . asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati virpratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_20: vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktvayaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tyadādīnām yat yat param tat tat śiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_21: iti evam asmadaḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_22: tu . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham tu saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yadā ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_23: ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . sahavivakṣāyām ekaśeṣaḥ . yadā na sahavivakṣā tada ekaśeṣaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_24: . na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_25: . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_26: api yuṣmadasmadadhikaraṇānām api ekaśeṣena na bhavitavyam . tvam ca aham ca pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_27: pacāmi ca iti . kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_28: . kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvam dṛśyate . tat yathā pacasi pacāmi ca tvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_29: aham ca iti . tat anumānam uttarayoḥ api kriyayoḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_30: ca kṛtvā saḥ pi adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_31: śeṣatvāt iti . tatra api hi evam bhavitavyam tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacasi pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_32: ca . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāmi pacati ca iti . yat tāvat ucyate na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_33: anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ iti . dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_34: hi yuṣmadasmadoḥ cānekaśeṣaḥ tadadhikaraṇānām ca ekaśeṣaḥ . tat yathā tvam ca aham
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_35: ca vṛttrahan ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . yat api ucyate kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_36: anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya iti . kriyāpṛthaktve khalu api dravyaikaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_37: bhavati iti dṛśyate . tat yathā akṣāḥ bhajyantām bhakṣyantām dīvyantām iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_38: ca kṛtvā saḥ api doṣo bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_39: śeṣatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat siddham tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_40: iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . śeṣe prathamaḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_41: na hi śeṣaḥ ca anyaḥ ca śeṣagrahaṇena gṛhyate . bhavet prathamaḥ na syān . madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_42: api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau ucyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_43: na ca yuṣmadasmadī anyaḥ ca yuṣmadasmadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . yat atra yuṣmat yat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_44: asmat tattadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . yathā eva tarhi yat atra yuṣmat
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_45: yat ca smat tadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhavataḥ evam yaḥ atra śeṣaḥ tadāśrayaḥ prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_46: prāpnoti . evam tarhi śeṣe upapade prathamaḥ vidhīyate . upoccāri padam upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_47: . yat ca atra upoccāri na saḥ śeṣaḥ yaḥ ca śeṣaḥ na tat upoccāri . bhavet prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_48: na syāt . madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_49: madhyamottamau ucyete . upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na te yuṣmadasmadī
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_50: ye ca yuṣmadasmadī na tat upoccāri . evam tarhi śeṣeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇye prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_51: vidhīyate . na ca atra śeṣeṇa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . bhavet prathamaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_52: madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadbhyām sāmānādhikaraṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_53: madhyamottamau ucyete na ca atra yuṣmadasmadbhyām eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_54: tyadādīni sarvaiḥ nityam iti evam atra yuṣmadasmadoḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra yuṣmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_55: madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3909: . sthānini api iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . tyadādīnām khalu api yat yat param tat tat śiṣyate iti yadā bhavataḥ śeṣaḥ tadā prathamaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3913: 477-478 yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva ucyate. tau iha na prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3914: paramatvam pacasi . paramāham pacāmi iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi tadantavidhinā prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3915: atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca madhyamottamau na prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3916_0: tvattaraḥ pacasi mattaraḥ pacāmi iti . tvadrūpaḥ pacasi madrūpaḥ pacāmi iti . tvatkalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3916_1: pacasi . matkalpaḥ pacāmi iti. evam tarhi yuṣmadvati asmadvati iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_0: atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . evam tarhi yuṣmadi sādhane asmadi sādhane iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_1: evam bhaviṣyati . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_2: prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt iti . atha vā prathamaḥ utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_3: upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau apavādau bhaviṣyataḥ . tatra yuṣmadgandhaḥ ca asmadgandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_4: ca asti iti kṛtvā madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . atha iha katham bhavitavyam . atvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_5: tvam sampadyate tvadbhavati madbhavati iti . āhosvit tvadbhavasi madbhavāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_6: tvadbhavati madbhavati iti evam bhavitavyam . madhyamottamau kasmāt na bhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_7: gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye sampratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣhomīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_8: iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3917_9: . gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_0: 478-484 paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ samhitā cet adrutāyām asaṃhitam . paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_1: cet adrutāyām vṛttau saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . drutāyām eva hi paraḥ sannikarṣo
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_2: varṇānām na adrutāyām . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ varṇānām drutamadhyamavilimbitāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_3: vṛttiṣu . kiṅkṛtaḥ tarthi viśeṣaḥ . varṇakālabhūyastvam tu . varṇānām tu kālabhūyastvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_4: . tat yathā . hastimaśakayoḥ tulyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ prāṇibhūyastvam tu . yadi evam drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_5: taparakaraṇe madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutāyām taparakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_6: madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . kālabhedāt . ye drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_7: vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te madhyamāyām ye madhyamāyām vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāste
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_8: vilimbitāyām . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_9: vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante iti . atha vā śabdāvirāmaḥ saṃhitā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_10: . śabdāvirāme prativarṇam avasānam . śabdāvirāme prativarṇam avasānasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_11: . kim idam prativarṇam iti . varṇam varṇam prati prativarṇam . yena eva yatnena ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_12: varṇaḥ uccyāryate vicchinne varṇe upasaṃhṛtya tam anyam upādāya dvitīyaḥ prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_13: tathā tṛtīyaḥ tathā caturthaḥ . evam tarhi anavakāśā saṃhitāsañjñā avasānasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_14: bādhiṣyate . atha vā avasānasañjñāyām prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_0: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ virāmaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ virāmaḥ . atha vā hrādāvirāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_1: saṃhā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate . hrādāvirāme sparśāghoṣasaṃyoge asannidhānāt asaṃhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_2: . hrādāvirāme sparśānām aghoṣāṇām saṃyoge asamnidhānāt saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_3: . kukkuṭaḥ pippakā pittam iti . kim ucyate saṃyoge iti . atha yatra ekaḥ pacati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_4: ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ hrādena pracchādyate . tad yathā . dvayoḥ raktayoḥ vastrayoḥ madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_5: śuklam vastram tadguṇam upalabhyate . badarapiṭake riktakaḥ lohakaṃsaḥ tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_6: . ekena tulyaḥ sannidhiḥ . yathā ekaḥ varṇaḥ hrādena pracchādyate evam anekaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_7: . atha vā paurvāparyam akālavyapetam saṃhitā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate. paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_8: akālavyapetam saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt asaṃhitam . paurvāparyam akālavyapetam
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_9: saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi varṇānām paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_10: asti . kim kāraṇam . ekaikavarṇavartitvāt vācaḥ uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_11: . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau yugapat uccārayati . gauḥ iti yāvat gakāre vāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_12: vartate na aukāre na visarjanīye . yāvat aukāre na gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_13: visarjanīye na gakāre na aukāre . uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt . uccaritapradhvaṃsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_14: khalu api varṇāḥ . uccaritaḥ pradhvastaḥ . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_15: sahāyaḥ . evam tarhi buddhau kṛtvā sarvāḥ ceṣṭhāḥ kartā dhīraḥ tatvannītiḥ śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_16: arthān vācyān dṛṣṭvā buddhau kuryāt paurvāparyam . buddhiviṣayam eva śabdānām paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_17: . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati asamin arthe ayam śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_18: prayoktvayaḥ smin tāvat śabde ayam tāvat varṇaḥ tataḥ ayam tataḥ ayam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_0: 484-488 idam vicāryate abhāvaḥ avasānalakṣaṇam syād virāmaḥ vā iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_1: viśeṣaḥ . abhāve avasānalakṣaṇe uparyabhāvavacanam . abhāveāvasānalakṣaṇe uparyabhāvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_2: kartavyam . upari yaḥ abhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam . purastāt api hi śabdasya abhāvaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_3: mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ rathaḥ . kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_4: prasajyeta . astu tarhi virāmaḥ . virāme virāmavacanam . yasya virāmaḥ virāmagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_5: tena kartavyam . nanu ca yasya api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_6: mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi virāmagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_7: parārtham bhaviṣyati . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_8: . purastāt api śabdasya virāmaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ rathaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_9: kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prasajyeta . ārambhapūrvakaḥ mama virāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_10: . atha vā na idam avasānalakṣaṇam vicāryate . kim tarhi . sañjñī . abhāvaḥ vasānasañjñī
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_11: syāt virāmaḥ vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhāve avasānasañjñini uparyabhāvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_12: . abhāve avasānasañjñin yuparyabhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . upari yaḥ bhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_13: . purastāt api hi śabdasya abhāvaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ rathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_14: . kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prasajyeta . astu tarhi virāmaḥ avāsanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_15: . virāme virāmavacanam . yasya virāmaḥ tena virāmagrahaṇam kartavyam . nanu ca yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_16: api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_17: lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi virāmagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_18: . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam . nanu ca yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_19: api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_20: lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi virāmagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_21: . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_22: ārambhapūrvakaḥ iti . na avaśyam ayam ramiḥ pravṛttau eva vartate . kim tarhi . apravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_23: api . tat yathā . uparatāni asmin kule vratāni . uparataḥ svādhyāyaḥ iti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_24: tatra svādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati na api vratāni . bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_25: vasānalakṣaṇam na . bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt śabdasya avasānalakṣaṇam na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_26: kim idam bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt iti . bhāvasya avirāmaḥ bhāvāvirāmaḥ bhāvāvirāmeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_27: bhavati iti bhāvāvirāmabhāvī bhāvāvirāmabhāvinaḥ bhāvo bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvam . aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_28: āha . bhāvabhāvitvādavirāmabhāvitvāt ca śabdasya avasānalakṣaṇam na upapadyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_29: . tatparaḥ iti vā varṇasya avasānam . virāmaparaḥ varṇaḥ vasānasañjñaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_30: vaktavyam . varṇaḥ antyaḥ vā avasānam . atha vā vyaktam eva paṭhitavyam antyaḥ varṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_31: vasānasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . saṃhitāvasānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_32: lokaviditatvāt siddham . samhitā avasānam iti lokaviditau etau arthau . evam hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3927: śannodevīyam samhitayā adhīṣva iti . saḥ tatra paramasannikarṣam adhīte . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3929: akāreṇa ikāreṇa ukāreṇa iti . evam etau lokaviditatau arthau . tayoḥ lokaviditatvāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_0: 491-496 vidhiḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . vipūrvāt dhāñaḥ karmasādhanaḥ ikāraḥ . vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_1: vidhiḥ iti . kim punaḥ vidhīyate . samāsaḥ vibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_2: kim punaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ āhosvit paribhāṣā . kaḥ punaḥ adhikāraparibhāṣayoḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_3: . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_4: punaḥ ekadeśasthā satī sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati pradīpavat . tat yathā pradīpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_5: suprajvalitaḥ ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . kaḥ punaḥ atra prayatnaviśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_6: . adhikāre sati svarayitavyam paribhāṣāyām punaḥ satyām sarvam apekṣyam . tathā idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_7: aparam dvaitam bhavati . ekārthībhāvaḥ vā sāmarthyam syāt vyapekṣā vā iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_8: ekārthībhāve sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati samāsaḥ ekaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati bibhaktividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_9: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca asaṅgṛhītaḥ . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati bibhaktividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_10: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . anyatra khalu api samarthagrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_11: yuktagrahaṇāni ca kartavyāni bhavanti . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye na cavāhāhaivayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_12: iti . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye paribhāṣāyām ca satyām yāvān vyākaraṇe padagandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_13: asti saḥ sarvaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . tatra ekārthībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_14: sāmarthyam paribhāṣā ca iti evam sūtram abhinnatarakam bhavati . evam api kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_15: akartavyam samarthagrahaṇam kriyate kva cit ca kartavyam na kriyate . akartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_16: tāvat kriyate samarthānām prathamāt vā iti . kartavyam ca na kriyate karmaṇi aṇ samarthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_17: iti . nanu ca gamyate tatra sāmarthyam . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ iti . satyam gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3933_18: utpanne tu pratyaye . saḥ eva tāvat samarthāt utpādyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3937_0: 496-504 atha samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . vakṣyati dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3937_1: . kaṣṭaśritaḥ narakaśritaḥ iti . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . paśya devadatta kaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3937_2: . śritaḥ viṣṇumitraḥ gurukulam . tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇavacanena . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3937_3: kirikāṇaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . tiṣṭha tvam śaṅkulayā . khaṇḍaḥ dhāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:3937_4: musalena . caturthī tadarthārthabalihitasukharakṣitaiḥ . gohitam aśrahitam . samarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3937_5: kimartham . sukham gobhyaḥ . hitam devadattāya . pañcamī bhayena . vṛkabhayam dasyubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3937_6: corabhayam . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . gaccha tvam mā vṛkebhyaḥ . bhayam devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3938: brāhmaṇakambalaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . bhāryā rājñaḥ . puruṣaḥ devadattasya . saptamī śauṇḍaiḥ : akṣaśauṇḍaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3939_0: strīśauṇḍaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . kuśalaḥ devadattaḥ akṣeṣu . śauṇḍaḥ pibati
GS24pmbhasuu:3939_1: pānāgāre . atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3939_2: śritaḥ iti . na vā bhavati mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3941: mahākaṣṭam śritaḥ mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_0: mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prapnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_1: . kasya kasmāt na bhavati . kim dvayoḥ āhosvit bahūnām . bahūnām kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_2: . sup supā iti vartate . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_3: iti vartamāne anyasmāt ca anyasmāt ca prātipadikāt utpattiḥ bhavati . satyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_4: . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate . yāvati etat parisamāpyate prātipadikāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_5: tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . pratyekam ca etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_6: iha api yāvati etat parisamāpyate sup supā iti tāvataḥ samāsena bhavitavyam . dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_7: dvayoḥ ca etat parisamāpyate na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_8: . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yadi sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_9: bhavati iti ucyate rājapuruṣaḥ abhirūpaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_10: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānam atra sāpekṣam . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_11: samāsaḥ . yatra tarhi apradhānam sāpekṣam bhavati tatra te vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3945: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyapekṣā atra ṣaṣṭḥī sarvam gurukulam apekṣate . yatra tarhi na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī tatra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3946: kim odanaḥ śālīnām . saktvāḍhakam āpaṇīyānām . kutaḥ bhavān pāṭaliputrakaḥ . iha ca api :
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_0: yadi eṣā samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī syāt na etat niyogataḥ gamyeta devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_1: tasya yaḥ putraḥ iti . kim tarhi . anyasya api guruputraḥ devadattasya kim cit iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_2: eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyeta . yataḥ tu niyogataḥ devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ tasya yaḥ putraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_3: iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyate ataḥ manyāmahe na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī iti . anyatra khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_4: api samarthagrahaṇe sāpekṣasya api kāryam bhavati . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_5: . brāhamaṇasya sarpiḥ karoti iti . tasmāt na aeta śakyak vaktum sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_6: bhavati iti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_7: vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_8: vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_9: guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . agurukulaputrādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_10: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_11: na prayujyate agurukulaputrādīnām iti . na vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_12: . agamakatvāt . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_13: vākyena gamyate mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti na jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate mahat kaṣṭaśritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_14: iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_15: gamakaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_0: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . yadi agamakatvam hetuḥ na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_1: . iha api bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti yaḥ arthaḥ vākyena gamyate na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_2: jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate bhārya rājapuruṣaḥ devadattasya iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3954_0: tarhi prayojanam . asti asamarthasamāsaḥ nañsamāsaḥ gamakaḥ . tasya sādhutvam mā
GS24pmbhasuu:3954_1: bhūt . akiñcit kurvāṇam amāṣam haramāṇam agādhāt utsṛṣṭam iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3954_2: prayojanam . avaśyam kasya cit nañsamāsasya gamakasya sādhutvam vaktavyam . asūryampaśyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3954_3: mukhāni apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ aśrāddhabhojī alavaṇabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ . suṭ anapuṃsakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3954_4: etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva asamarthasamāsasya nañsamāsasya gamakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3954_5: sādhutvam bhavati na anyasya iti . tasmān na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_0: 505-516 atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe samartham iti ucyate kim samartham nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_1: . pṛthagarthānām ekārthībhāvaḥ samarthavacanam . pṛthagarthānām padānam ekārthībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_2: samartham iti ucyate . vākye pṛthagarthāni rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ ekārthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_3: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . kim ucyate pṛthagarthāni iti yāvatā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ ānīyatām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_4: ukte rājapuruṣaḥ iti ca saḥ eva . na api brūmaḥ anyasya ānayanam bhavati iti . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_5: tarhi ekārthībhāvakṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . subalopaḥ vyavadhānam yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_6: svaraḥ . supaḥ alopaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_7: . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . vyavadhānam ca bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ ṛddhasya puruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_8: samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_9: vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_10: dvau svarau bhavataḥ vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ . samāse punaḥ ekaḥ eva . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_11: iti . na ete ekārthībhāvakṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . kim tarhi . vācanikāni etāni . āha hi bhagavān
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_12: supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ upasarjanam pūrvam samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_13: . ime tarhi ekārthībhāvkṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ vyaktābhidānam lkupasarjanaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_14: cayogaḥ iti . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñoḥ puruṣaḥ rājñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_15: puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_16: . kim kāraṇam . yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt . aṅga hi bhavān tam uccārayatu
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_17: gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_18: arthena bhavitavyam . arthakṛtena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_19: . artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_20: etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_21: viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti iha tasya viśeṣaḥ gamyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_0: apsucaraḥ goṣucaraḥ varṣāsujaḥ iti . vyaktābhidhānam bhavati vākye . brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_1: kambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . samāse punaḥ avyaktam . brāhmaṇakambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . sandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_2: bhavati sambuddhiḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ vā iti . eṣaḥ api aviśeṣaḥ . bhavati hi kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_3: cit vākye avyaktam tat ca samāse vyaktam . vākye tāvat avyaktam . ardham paśoḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_4: iti . sandehaḥ bhavati paśuguṇasya vā devadattasya yat ardham artha vā yaḥ asau sañjñībhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_5: paśuḥ nāma tasya yat ardham iti . tat ca samāse vyaktam bhavati . ardhhapaśuḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_6: iti . upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati vākye . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_7: bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api adoṣaḥ . samāse api upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_8: . tat yathā devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_9: iti . cayogaḥ bhavati vākye . svacayogaḥ svāmicayogaḥ ca . svacayogaḥ rājñaḥ gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_10: ca aśvaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca iti . samāse na bhavati . rājñaḥ gavāśvapuruṣāḥ iti . svāmicayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_11: devadattasya ca yajñadattasya ca viṣṇumitrasya ca gauḥ iti . samāse na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_12: devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāṇām gauḥ iti . atha etasmin ekārthībhāvkṛte viśeṣe kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_13: svābhāvikam śabdaiḥ arthābhidhānam āhosvit vācanikam . svābhāvikam iti āha . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_14: etat . arthānādeśāt . na hi arthāḥ ādiśyante . katham punaḥ arthān ādiśan evam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_15: na arthāḥ ādiśyante it . yat āha bhavān anekam anyapadārthe cārthe dvandvaḥ apatye
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_16: rakte nirvṛtte iti . na etāni arthādeśanāni . svabhāvataḥ eteṣām śabdānām eteṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_17: abhiniviṣṭānām nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . tat yathā . kūpe hastadakṣiṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_18: panthāḥ . abhre candramasam paśya iti . svabhāvataḥ tatrasthasya pathaḥ candramasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_19: ca nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . evam iha api cārthe yaḥ saḥ dvandvasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_20: anyapadārthaḥ yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . kim puna kāraṇam na ādiśyante . tat ca laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_21: . laghvartham hi arthāḥ na ādiśyante . avaśyam hi anena arthān ādiśatā kena cit śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_22: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt . tasya ca tāvat kena kṛtaḥ yena asau kriyate . atha tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_23: kena cit kṛtaḥ tasya kena kṛtaḥ iti anavasthā . asambhavaḥ khalu api ādeśaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_24: . kaḥ hi nāma samarthaḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām arthān ādeṣṭum . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_25: etat mantavyam pratyayārthe nirdiṣṭe prakṛtyarthaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . bhavati hi guṇābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_26: guṇinaḥ sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_0: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmanyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_1: viśeṣam prakaraṇam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_2: ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit eva viśeṣe vṛkṣaśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_3: sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_4: pratyayārthe vartate . apravṛttiḥ khalu api arthādeśanasya . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_5: arthāḥ na vijñāyante . jarbharī turpharītū . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_6: arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ pāṇivihāraiḥ ca . na khalu api nirjñātasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_7: anvyākhyane kim cit prayojanam asti . yaḥ hi brūyāt purastāt ādityaḥ udeti paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3960_8: astam eti madhuraḥ guḍaḥ kaṭukam śṛṅgaveram iti kim tena kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_0: 516 vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanānarthakyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_1: svabhāvasiddhatvāt . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvataḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_2: etat bhavati vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye samāse prapte
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_3: vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_4: bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . tasmāt na arthaḥ vā vacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_0: 517-525 atha ye vṛttim vartayanti kim te āhuḥ . parārthābhidhānam vṛttiḥ iti āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_1: . atha teṣām evam bruvatām kim jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ āhosvit ajahatsvārthā . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_2: ataḥ . yadi jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_3: prāpnoti aupagavam ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya . atha ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_4: vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . kā punaḥ vṛttiḥ nyāyyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_5: . jahatsvārthā . yuktam punaḥ yat jahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_6: evam hi dṛśyate loke . puruṣaḥ ayam parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_7: tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti . evam yuktam yat rājā puruṣārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_8: vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt upaguḥ ca apartyārthe vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_9: . nanu ca uktam rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti aupagavam
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_10: ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jahat api asau svārtham na atyantāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_11: jahāti . yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthaḥ tam jahāti . tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_12: svam takṣakarma jahāti na hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni . na ca ayam arthaḥ parārthavirodhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_13: viśeṣaṇam nāma . tasmāt na hāsyati . atha vā anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_14: . ghṛtaghaṭaḥ tailaghaṭaḥ iti niṣikte ghṛte taile vā anvyayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_15: ghṛtaghaṭaḥ ayam tailaghaṭaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_16: ca arthamātrā . aṅga hi bhavān agnau niṣṭapya ghṛtaghaṭam tṛṇakūrcena prakṣālayatu
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_17: . na gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . yathā tarhi mallikāpuṭaḥ campakaputaḥ iti niṣkīrṇāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_18: api sumanaḥsu anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam mallikapuṭaḥ ayam campakapuṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3968_19: atha vā samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vṛttau kriyate . sāmartham nama bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_0: bhedasaṃsargau vā sāmarthyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā . iha rājñaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_1: ukte sarvam svam prasaktam puruṣaḥ iti ukte sarvaḥ svāmi prasaktaḥ . iha idānīm rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_2: iti ukte rājā puruṣam nivartayati anyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ api rājānam anyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_3: svebhyaḥ . evam etasmin ubhayataḥ vyavacchinne yadi jahāti kāmam jahātu . na jātu
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_4: cit puruṣamātrasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_5: . yuktam punaḥ yat ajahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam . evam hi dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_6: loke . bhikṣukaḥ ayam dvitīyām bhikṣām āsādya pūrvām na jahāti sañcayāya pravartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_7: . nanu ca uktam ubhayoḥ vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_8: iti . kasyāḥ punaḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . prathāmāyāḥ . na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_9: . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tarhi . na ṣaṣṭhīsamarthaḥ puruṣaḥ . prathamāyāḥ eva tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_10: nanu ca uktam na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā iti . abhinihitaḥ saḥ saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_11: prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamāyāḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_12: prāpnoti . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt na avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ . saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_13: ekatvam arthaḥ . tena avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . parasparavyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_14: sāmarthyem eke . parasparavyapekṣā sāmarthyem eke icchanti . kā punaḥ śabdayoḥ vyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_15: . na brūmaḥ śabdayoḥ iti . kim tarhi . arthayoḥ . iha rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ukte rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_16: puruṣam apekṣate mama ayam iti . puruṣaḥ api rājānam apekṣate aham asya iti . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_17: abhisambandhasya ṣaṣṭhī vācikā bhavati . tathā kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti kriyākārakayoḥ abhisambandhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_0: 525-531 atha yadi eva ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam atha api vyapekṣā sāmarthyam kim gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_1: etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_2: āha . katham . samaḥ ayam arthaśabdena saha samāsaḥ . sam ca upasargaḥ . upasargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_3: ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ yatra kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra kriyāviśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_4: āhuḥ . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate yena samaḥ sāmarthyam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_5: tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam nūnam atra kaḥ cit prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ na prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_6: yena samaḥ sāmarthyam iti . tat yathā . dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_7: ca dṛṣṭvā parivrājakaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ . ucyate . saṅgatārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_8: samartham saṃsṛṣṭārtham samartham samprekṣitam artham samartham sambaddhārtham samartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_9: iti . tat yadā tāvat ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate saṅgatārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_10: saṃsṛṣṭārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . tat yathā saṅgatam ghṛtam saṅgatam tailam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_11: . ekībhūtam iti gamyate . yadā vyapekṣā sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate samprekṣitārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_12: samarthaḥ sambaddhārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ iha badhnātyarthaḥ . sambaddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_13: iti ucyate yaḥ rajjvā ayasā vā kīle vyatiṣiktaḥ bhavati . na avaśyam badhnātiḥ vyatiṣaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_14: eva vartate . kim tarhi . ahānau api vartate . tat yathā sambaddhau imau damyau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_15: ucyete yau anyonyam na jahītaḥ . atha vā bhavati ca evañjātīyakeṣu badhnātiḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_16: . tat yathā . asti naḥ gargaiḥ sambandhaḥ . asti naḥ vatsaiḥ sambandhaḥ . saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_17: iti arthaḥ . atha etasmin vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye yaḥ asau ekārthībhāvkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_18: sa vaktavyaḥ . tatra nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśepratiṣedhaḥ . tatra etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_19: vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_20: vaktavyaḥ . nighātaḥ . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . asti daṇḍasya harateḥ ca vyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_21: iti kṛtvā nighātaḥ prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ . odanam paca . tava bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_22: odanam paca mama bhaviṣyati . asti odanasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca vyapekṣā iti kṛtvā vāmnāvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_23: prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim ucyate nānākārakāt iti yadā tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_24: eva āsajya hriyate . na api brūmaḥ anyena āsajya hriyate iti . kim tarhi . śabdapramāṇakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_25: vayam . yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam . śabdaḥ ca iha sattām āha . ayam daṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_26: . asti iti gamyate . saḥ daṇḍaḥ kartā bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ karaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_27: sampadyate . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva devadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_28: ācaṣṭe . asau vṛkṣe iti . katarasmin . yaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . saḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_29: bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ kartā sampadyate . pracaye samāsapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_30: . pracaye samāsapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ gauḥ ca aśvaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca rājagavāśvapuruṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_31: iti . samarthatarāṇām vā . samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . kāni punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_32: samarthatarāṇi . yāni dvandvabhāvīni . kutaḥ etat . eṣām hi āśutarā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_33: . tat yathā samarthataraḥ ayam māṇavakaḥ adhyayanāya iti ucyate . āśrutaragranthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_0: samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . kāni punaḥ samarthatarāṇi . yāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_1: dvandvabhāvīni . kutaḥ etat . etāni samānavibhaktīni anyavibhaktiḥ rājā . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_2: viśeṣaḥ svasmin bhrātari pitṛvyaputre ca . samudāyasāmarthyāt vā siddham ṣamudāyasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_3: vā punaḥ siddham etat . samudāyena rājñaḥ sāmarthyam bhavati na avayavena . aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_4: āha . samarthatarāṇām vā samudāyasāmarthyāt . samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_5: bhavati . kutaḥ etat . samudāyasāmarthyāt eva . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_6: bhavati . etat ca samarthitam . katham . na eva vā punaḥ atra rājñaḥ aśvapuruṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_7: apekṣamāṇasya gavā saha samāsaḥ bhavati . kim tarhi . goḥ rājānam apekṣamāṇasya āsvapuruṣābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3974_8: samāsaḥ samāsaḥ bhavati . pradhānam atra tada gauḥ bhavati . bhavati ca pradhānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3978_0: 532-537 ākhyātam sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇam vākyam . ākhyātam sāvyayam sakārakam sakārakaviśeṣaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:3979_1: vākyasañjñam bhavati vaktavyam . brūhi brūhi . samānavākye nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3979_2: . samānavākye iti prakṛtya nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ vaktavyāḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3979_3: nānāvākye mā bhūvan nighātādayaḥ iti . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . odanam paca . tava
GS24pmbhasuu:3979_4: bhaviṣyati . odanam paca . mama bhaviṣyati . yoge pratiṣedhaḥ cādibhiḥ . cādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3979_5: yoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāmaḥ tava ca svam mama ca svam . kimartham icam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3979_6: . yathānyāsam eva cādibhiḥ yoge pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . idam adya apūrvam kriyate vākyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_0: sarvam etat vikalpate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe cādibhiḥ yoge yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_1: eva bhavati iti . samarthanighāte hi samānādhikaraṇayuktayukteṣu upasaṅkhyānam asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_2: . samarthanighāte hi samānādhikaraṇayuktayukteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam syāt . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_3: . paṭave te dāsyāmi . mrdave te dāsyāmi . samānādhikaraṇe . yuktayukte . nadyāḥ tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_4: kūle . vṛkṣasya lambate śākhā . śālīnām te odanam dadāmi . śālīnām me odanam dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_5: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_6: dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_7: . dve hi atra ṣaṣṭhyau . rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram iti . kim ucyate dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_8: yāvatā sup saha supā iti vartate . dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_9: subantayoḥ samāsaprasaṅgaḥ dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . katham tarhi . dviprakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_10: samāsasya prasaṅgaḥ dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . rājagokṣīram iti api prāpnoti na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_11: evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā etat vākyam bhavati goḥ kṣīram gokṣīram rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_12: gokṣīram rājagokṣīram iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram iti tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_13: na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati . siddham tu rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_14: goḥ kṣīreṇa sāmarthyāt . siddham etat . katham . rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ goḥ kṣīreṇa saha
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_15: samāsaḥ bhavati na kevalāyāḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_16: . yathā eva ayam gavi yatate na kṣīramātreṇa santoṣam karoti evam rājani api yatate
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_17: . rājñaḥ yā gauḥ tasyāḥ yat kṣīram iti . na eva vā punaḥ atra goḥ rājānam apekṣamāṇāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_18: kṣīreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_19: sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . katham tarhi goḥ kṣīram apekṣamāṇāyāḥ rājñā saha
GS24pmbhasuu:3980_20: samāsaḥ bhavati . pradhānam atra tada gauḥ bhavati . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_0: 537-540 atha kimartham padavidhau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate . padavidhau samarthavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_1: varṇāśraye śāstre ānantaryavijñānāt. padavidhau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate varṇāśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_2: śāstre ānantaryamātre kāryam yathā vijñāyeta . tiṣṭhatu dadhi aśāna tvam śākena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_3: tiṣṭhatu kumārī chatram hara devadatta iti . samarthādhikārasya vidheyasāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_4: nirdeśānarthakyam . samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vidheyena samānādhikaraṇaḥ . kim ca vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_5: . samāsaḥ . yāvat brūyāt samarthaḥ samāsaḥ iti tāvat samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_6: rājapuruṣaḥ iti etasyām avasthāyām samarthādhikāreṇa kim cit api śakyam pravartayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_7: nivartayitum vā . samarthādhikārasya vidheyasāmānādhikaraṇyāt nirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_8: . siddham tu samarthānām iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . samarthānām padānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_9: vidhiḥ iti vaktavyam . evam api dvyekayoḥ na prāpnoti . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_10: vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam. samarthasya ca samarthayoḥ ca samarthānām ca samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_11: iti . evam api ṣaṭprabhṛtīnām eva prāpnoti . ṣaṭprabhṛtiṣu hi ekaśeṣaḥ parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_12: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti dvyekayoḥ api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_13: . evam api vivibhaktīnām na prāpnoti . samarthāt samarthe padāt pade iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3988: samarthe vidhiḥ samarthvidhiḥ . padasya vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3992_0: pade vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ . samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3992_1: ca samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ . padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3992_2: ca padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ . samarthavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ ca samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_1: kartavyam . vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_2: . katham asamarthatvam . dravyam padārthaḥ iti cet. yadi dravyam padārthaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_3: tadā sāmarthyam . atha hi guṇaḥ padārthaḥ bhavati tadā sāmarthyam . anyaḥ hi vīratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_4: guṇaḥ anyaḥ hi puruṣatvam . na anyatvam asti iti iyatā sāmarthyam bhavati . anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_5: hi devadattaḥ gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ ca na ca tasya etāvatā sāmartham bhavati . kaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_6: viśeṣaḥ yat guṇe padārthe sāmarthyam syāt dravye ca na syāt . eṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_7: tayoḥ adhikaraṇam anyaḥ ca vīratvam guṇaḥ anyaḥ puruṣatvam . dravyapadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_8: api tarhi guṇabhedāt sāmarthyam bhaviṣyati . aśakyaḥ dravyapadārthikena dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_9: guṇakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . nanu ca abhyantaraḥ asau bhavati . yadi api abhyantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_10: na tu gamyate . na hi guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuratvam gamyate śṛṅgaveram iti vā kaṭukatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_11: . guṇapadārthikena api tarhi aśakyaḥ guṇasya dravyakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_12: guṇapadārthikaḥ pratijānīte dravyapadārthikaḥ api kasmāt na pratijānīte . evam anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3996_13: sāmarthyam syāt vā na vā . kva ca tāvat idam syāt samānādhikaraṇena iti . yatra sarvam samāman :
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_0: indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . na evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_1: samāsena bhavitavyam pratyayena vā utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_2: . artham pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_3: dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_4: tarhi idānīm idam bhavati bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ iti . na etau samānārthau . ekaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3998_0: śakyaḥ bhartum bhṛtyaḥ . arhati bhṛtim bharaṇīyaḥ . bhṛtyaḥ bharaṇīyaḥ bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3998_1: iti . yadi tarhi yatra kim cit samānam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra bhavitavyam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3998_2: tarhi prāpnoti . darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyamātā iti . atra api kim cit samānam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3998_3: cit viśeṣaḥ . kim punaḥ tat . sadbhāvānyabhāvau . na kva cit sadbhāvānyabhāvau na
GS24pmbhasuu:3998_4: staḥ ucyate ca samānādhikaraṇena iti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_0: yatra sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam . kva ca sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam . yatra sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_1: samānam sadbhāvānyabhāvau dravyam ca. atha vā samānādhikaraṇena iti tat samānam āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_2: yat samānam bhavati na ca bhavati . na ca etat samānam kva cit api na bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_3: vā yāvat brūyāt samānadravyeṇa iti tāvat samānādhikaraṇena iti . dravyam hi loke
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_4: adhikaraṇam iti ucyate . tat yathā . ekasmin dravye vyuditam . ekasmin adhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_5: vyuditam iti . tathā vyākaraṇe vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti adravyavāci
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_6: iti gamyate . evam api idam avaśyam kartavyam samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_7: iti . kim prayojanam . sarpiḥ kālakam yajuḥ pītakam iti evamartham . yadi samānādhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_8: asamarthavat bhavati iti ucyate sarpiḥ pīyate yajuḥ kriyate iti atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_9: . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat . evam ca kṛtvā samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_10: . vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam asamarthatvāt . na vā vacanaprāmāṇyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_11: na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . vacanaprāmāṇyāt . vacanaprāmāṇyāt atra samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_12: . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam . samānamadhyamadhyamavīrāḥ ca iti . luptākhyāteṣu ca . luptākhyāteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_13: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . luptākhyāteṣu ca . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_14: vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam . kugatiprādayaḥ ca iti . asti anyat etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_15: vacane prayojanam . kim . surājā atirājā iti . na brūmaḥ vṛttisūtravacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_16: iti . kim tarhi . vārttikavacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . siddham tu kvāṅksvatidurgativacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_17: prādayaḥ ktārthe iti . tadarthagateḥ vā . tadarthagateḥ vā punaḥ siddham etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_18: idam tadarthagateḥ iti . tasya arthaḥ tadarthaḥ tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_19: iti . yasya arthasya kauśāmbyā sāmarthyam saḥ nisā ucyate . atha vā saḥ arthaḥ tadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3999_20: tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ iti . yaḥ arthaḥ kauśāmbyā samarthaḥ saḥ nisā ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4003_0: 547-554 atha yatra bahūnām samāsaprasaṅgaḥ kim tatra dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4003_1: āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4003_2: . samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam kartavyam . carthe dvandvaḥ . anekam
GS24pmbhasuu:4003_3: iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4003_4: . atra api dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ iti cet na bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4003_5: dvitvābhāvāt . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . bahuṣu dvitvābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4003_6: . na bahuṣu dvitvam asti . na avaśyam evam vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4004: plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ ca iti . kim tarhi evam vighrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_0: plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca plakṣanyagrodhau khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_1: ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_2: na sidhyanti . hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti prāpnoti . na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_3: ca yadā evam vigrahaḥ kriyate hotā ca potā ca hotāpotārau neṣṭā ca udgātā ca neṣṭodgātārau
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_4: hotāpotārau ca neṣṭodgātārau ca hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti . hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_5: tu na sidhyanti . samāsāntapratiṣedhaḥ ca . samāsāntasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_6: . vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam iti . vāktvacasrugdṛṣadam iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_7: api pareṇa pareṇa saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . sruk ca dṛṣadam ca srugdṛṣadam tvak ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_8: srugdṛṣadam ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam vāk ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam ca vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_9: hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ evam tarhi sidhyanti . iha ca susukṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājivāsanā
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_10: samantaśitirandhreṇa dvayoḥ vṛttau na sidhyati . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_11: bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_12: kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_13: doṣaḥ bhavati . svara . pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ aparaśālāpriyaḥ . svara . samāsānta . pañcagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_14: . samāsānta . puṃvadbhāva . khādiretaraśamyam rauravetarśamyam . na vā avayavatatpuruṣatvāt.
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_15: na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . avayavatatpuruṣatvāt . avayavaḥ atra tatpuruṣasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_16: tadāśrayau samāsāntapuṃvadbhāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . svaraḥ katham . tasya antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_17: vipratiṣedhāt . antodāttatvam kriyatām pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaraḥ iti antodāttatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_18: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_19: ca antodāttatvam param pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam . na paravipratiṣedham brūmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_20: kim tarhi . antaraṅgavipratiṣedham . nimittisvarabalīyastvāt vā . atha vā nimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_21: nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_22: nimittam tatpuruṣaḥ nimittī . tat tarhi vaktavyam nimittasvarāt nimittisvaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_23: iti . na vaktavyam . ekaśitipātsvaravacanam tu jñāpakam nimittisvarabalīyastvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_24: . yat ayam yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ nimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_25: nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam paṭhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_26: . evam kila nāma paṭhyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya iti . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_27: na . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ekaḥ śitiḥ eṣu te ime ekaśitayaḥ ekaśitayaḥ pādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_28: yasya iti . atha api evam vigrahaḥ kriyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_29: iti evam api na arthaḥ pāṭhena . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_30: . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣañjñā prāpnoti susukṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājivāsanā
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_31: samantaśitirandhreṇa iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_32: antodāttatvam syāt vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na idam bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_33: lakṣaṇam ārabhyate . kim tarhi . yasya bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya tat lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_34: asti tasya antodāttatvam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca asya api asti kim viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4005_35: viśeṣyeṇa bahulam iti. bahulavacanāt na bhaviṣyati . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_0: iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt iti antodāttatvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_1: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_2: na igantaḥ adhikaśatavarṣaḥ iti . iha ca api adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ iti samāsantaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_3: . ḍacprakaraṇe saṅkhyāyāḥ tatpuruṣasya upasaṅkhyānam nistriṃśādyartham iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_4: doṣaḥ . avyayādeḥ iti evam tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam avyayādeḥ iti evam tat . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_5: bhūt gotriṃśat gocatvāriṃśat iti . bahuvrīhisañjñā tarhi prāpnoti. saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_6: saṅkhyeye iti . na saṅkhyām saṅkhyeye vartayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_7: adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇām asya iti . yathā tarhi saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate tathā pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_8: prāpnoti . katham ca saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_9: iva abhidhāyitvāt iti . pratyākhyāte tasmin yoge saṅkhyām saṅkhyeye vartayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_10: . tatra evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . sarvatha vayam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_11: na mucyāmahe . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_12: adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇām asya iti . yat tu tat uktam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_13: iti saḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4006_14: asti adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . adhikaśatavarṣaḥ tu na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_0: 555-561 sup iti kimartham . karoṣi aṭan . na etat asti . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_1: . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . idam tarhi . pīḍye
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_2: pīḍyamāna . idam ca api udāharaṇam karoṣi aṭan . nanu ca uktam asāmarthyāt atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_3: bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_4: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat . āmantritasya parāṅgvadbhāve ṣaṣṭhyāmantritakārakavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_5: . āmantritasya parāṅgvadbhāve ṣaṣṭhyantam āmantritakārakam ca parasya aṅgavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_6: iti vaktavyam . ṣaṣthyantam tāvat . madrāṇām rājan magadhānām rājan . āmantritakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_7: . kuṇḍena aṭan . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ parāṅgavadbhāve sati asati vā . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_8: . paraśunā vṛścan . tannimittagrahaṇam vā . tannimittagrahaṇam vā kartavyam. āmantritanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_9: parasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyam anyatarat vaktavyam . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_10: hi subantamātraprasaṅgaḥ . anucyamāne hi etasmin subantramātrasya parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_11: prāpnoti . asya api prasajyeta . kṣtreṇa agne svāyuḥ saṃrabhasya mitreṇa agne mitradheye
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_12: yatasva . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . tannimittagrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_13: bhavati . goṣu svāmin aśveṣu svāmin . etat hi na eva ṣaṣthyantam na api āmantritakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_14: . subantasya parāṅgavadbhāve samānādhikaraṇasya upasaṅkhyanam ananantaratvāt . subantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_15: parāṅgavadbhāve samānādhikaraṇasya upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . tīkṣṇayā sūcyā sīvyan
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_16: tīkṣṇena paraśunā vṛścan . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananantaratvāt . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_17: ca parasya parāṅgavadbhāve kṛte pūrvasya api bhaviṣyati . svare avadhāraṇāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_18: svare avadhāraṇāt ca na sidhyati . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate na ānantarye . param
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_19: api chandasi . param api chandasi pūrvasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ā te pitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_20: marutām sumnam etu . prati tvā duhitaḥ divaḥ . vṛṇīṣva duhitaḥ divaḥ . avyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_21: ca . avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccaiḥ adhīyāna nīcaiḥ adhīyāna . anavyayībhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_22: . anavyayībhāvasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . upāgni adhīyāna pratyagni adhīyāna
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_23: . atha kimartham svare avadhāraṇam kriyate . svare avadhāraṇam subalopārtham . svare
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_24: avadhāraṇam kriyate sublaḥ mā bhūt iti . paraśunā vṛścan . na vā subantaikāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_25: . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . subantaikāntatvāt . subantaikāntaḥ parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_26: bhavati . prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu sublope . prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu bhavati sublope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_27: . pratyayalakṣaṇena subantaikāntatā syāt . tasmāt svare avadhāraṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_28: subalopārtham . prātipadikasthāyāḥ supaḥ luk ucyate . tasmāt svaragrahaṇena na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_29: . idam tarhi prayojanam ṣatvaṇatve mā bhūtām iti . kūpe siñcan carma naman iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_30: etat api na asti prayojanam . iha tāvat kūpe siñcan iti svāśrayam padāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_31: . carma naman iti pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_32: ca samāse etat bhavati pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti . na iti āha . aviśeṣeṇa etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_33: . pūrvam padam pūrvapadam uttaram padam uttarapadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_0: 561-565 prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sañjñānivṛttyartham . prāgvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_1: samāsasañjñāyāḥ anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane anavakāśāḥ avyayībhāvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_2: sañjñāḥ samāsasañjñām bādheran . tāḥ mā bādhiṣata iti prāgvacanam kriyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_3: kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane yāvatā anavakāśāḥ avyayībhāvādayaḥ sañjñāḥ kasmāt eva na
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_4: bādhante . kriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane satyām samāsasañjñāyām etāḥ avayavasañjñāḥ ārabhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_5: . tatra vacanasamāveśaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsasañjñā api anavakāśā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_6: . sāvakāśā samāsasañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭādīni avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭam paṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_7: vispaṣṭapaṭuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ asti avakāśaḥ . eṣā hi ācāryasya śailī lakṣyate yena
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_8: eva avayavakāryam bhavati tena eva samudāyakāryam api bhavati . yena eva avayavakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_9: svaraḥ tena eva samudākāryam api samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . vispaṣṭādīni guṇavacaneṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_10: . idam tarhi kākatālīyam ajākṛpāṇīyam . atra api yena eva avayavakāryam pratyayotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_11: kriyate tena eva samudākāryam samāsasañjñā bhaviṣyati . samāsāt ca tadviṣayāt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_12: tarhi punārājaḥ punargavaḥ . atra api avaśyam tatpuruṣasañjñā vaktavya tatpuruṣāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_13: samāsāntaḥ yathā syāt . idam tarhi . punarādheyam . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_14: gatikārakopapadāt kṛt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . idam tarhi punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_15: deyam . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā gatiḥ gatau iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_16: . yadi tat na asti punaścanasau chandasi iti. sati tasmin tena eva siddham . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_17: api ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_0: 565-569 sahavacanam kimartham . sahavacanam pṛthak asamāsārtham . sahagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_1: sahabhūtayoḥ samāsañjñā yathā syāt ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . yadi ekaikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_2: samāsañjñā syāt iha ṛkpādaḥ iti samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca rājāśvaḥ iti dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_3: svarau syātām . katham ca kṛtvā ekaikasya sañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_4: dṛṣṭā . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_5: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_6: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_7: yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_8: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇavṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_9: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat sahagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_10: vijñāyeta . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . saha sup samasyate . kena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_11: . samarthena. anuvyācalat anuprāviśat . tataḥ supā . supā ca saha sup samasyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_12: adhikāraḥ ca lakṣaṇam ca . yasya samāsasya anyat lakṣaṇam na asti idam tasya lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_13: bhaviṣyati . punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ deyam punarniṣkṛtaḥ rathaḥ iti . ivena vibhaktyalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4018_14: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam ca . ivena saha samāsaḥ vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4022_0: 569 kimartham mahatī sañjñā kriyate . anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñayeta . anavyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4022_1: avyayam bhavati iti avyayībhāvaḥ . avyayībhāvaḥ ca samāsaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4026: 569-570 iha kasmāt na bhavati . sumadrāḥ sumagadhāḥ saputraḥ sacchātraḥ iti . samṛddhau sākalye iti ca prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4031_0: anyapadārthapradhānaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ . na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4031_1: gamyate . atha vā na ime samāsārthāḥ nirdiśyante . kim tarhi . avyayārthāḥ nirdiśyante

GS24pmbhasuu:4075_1: ca yat yena ucyate saḥ tasya arthaḥ bhavati . atra ca vayam etābhyām padābhyām etam
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_2: artham ucyamānam paśyāmaḥ . etat eva ca jānīmaḥ yat yena ucyate saḥ tasya arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_3: iti . api ca anyapadārthatā na prakalpeta . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_4: . atra api hi vayam etābhyām śabdābhyām etam artham ucyamānam paśyāmaḥ . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_5: atra etābhyām śabdābhyām eṣaḥ arthaḥ ucyate anyapadārthaḥ api tu gamyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_6: anyapadārthāśrayaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi anyapadārthaḥ gamyate svapadārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_7: api tu gamyate . tatra svapadārthāśrayaḥ avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_8: iha sampradhāryam . avyayībhāvaḥ kriyatām bahuvrīhiḥ iti . bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:4075_10: avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti paraṅkāryatvāt ca bahuvrīhiḥ . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4075_11: nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ samāhāre avyayībhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ ca avaśyam vaktavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:4084_12: . tatra tatpuruṣe sati dvau samāsau dvau svarau . bahuvrīhau sati ekaḥ samāsaḥ dvisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_13: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tatpuruṣam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samāne arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_14: kevalam vigrahabhedāt yatra tatpuruṣaḥ prāpnoti bahuvrīhiḥ ca tatra tatpuruṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_15: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . rājñaḥ sakhā rājasakhaḥ . rājā sakhā asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_16: bahuvrīhiḥ na bhavati . na etat jñāpakasādhyam apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyante iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:4084_20: śabdakṛtaḥ tāvat . bahuvrīhau sati kapā bhavitavyam . tatpuruṣe sati na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_21: . arthakṛtaḥ . tatpuruṣe sati ruhādīnām ktaḥ kartari bhavati dhātvarthasya anapavarge
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_22: . ārūḍhaḥ vṛkṣam devadattaḥ iti . bahuvrīhau vyapavṛkte karmaṇi bhavati . ārūḍhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4097_0: 589-592 tatkṛtārthena iti kimartham . dadhnā paṭuḥ ghṛtena paṭuḥ . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_1: asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_2: iti . na hi dadhnaḥ paṭunā sāmarthyam . kena tarhi . bhujinā . dadhnā bhuṅkte paṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_3: iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ kirikāṇaḥ iti . atra api na śaṅkulāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_4: khaṇḍena sāmarthyam . kena tarhi . karotinā . śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍaḥ iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_5: bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt bhaviṣyati dadhnā paṭuḥ ghṛtena paṭuḥ iti . tasmāt tatkṛtārthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_6: kartavyam . guṇavacanena iti kimartham . gobhiḥ vapāvān dhānyena dhanavān . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_7: iha udāharaṇam . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ devadattaḥ iti . katham punaḥ guṇavacanena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_8: ucyamānaḥ dravyavacanena syāt . iha tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇena iti iyatā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_9: . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_10: yathā vijñāyeta guṇam uktavatā guṇavacanena iti . katham punaḥ ayam guṇavacanaḥ san
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_11: dravyavacanaḥ sampadyate . ārabhyate tatra matublopaḥ guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_12: iti . tat yathā śuklaguṇaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaguṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ evam khaṇḍaguṇaḥ khaṇḍaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_13: evam na arthaḥ kṛtārthagrahaṇena . bhavati hi śaṅkulāyāḥ khaṇḍena sāmarthyam . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_14: ca atra na bhaviṣyati dadhnā paṭuḥ ghṛtena paṭuḥ iti . tasmat na arthaḥ tatkṛtārthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_15: . tṛtīyāsamāse arthagrahaṇam anarthakam arthagatiḥ hi avacanāt . tṛtīyāsamāse arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_16: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatiḥ hi avacanāt . antareṇa api vacanam arthagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_17: bhaviṣyati . nirdeśyam iti cet tṛtīyārthanirdeśaḥ api . atha evam api nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_18: iti cet tṛtīyārthanirdeśaḥ api kartavyaḥ syāt . tṛtīyā tadarthakṛtārthena iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_19: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na ayam arthanirdeśaḥ . kim tarhi . yogāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4097_20: idam nirdiśyate . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tṛtīyā tatkṛtena guṇavacanena
