GS24pmbhasuu:4113_5: vacanāt samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet nānākārakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4113_6: vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet nānākārakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tiṣṭhatu dadhnā odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4113_7: bhujyate devadattena . siddham tu samānādhikaraṇādhikāre ktaḥ tṛtīyāpūrvapadaḥ uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4113_8: ca ṣiddham etat . katham . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre vaktavyam ktaḥ tṛtīyāpūrvapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4113_9: samasyatesupā uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ bhavati iti . dadhnā upasiktaḥ dadhyupasiktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4113_10: dadhyupasiktaḥ odanaḥ dadhyodanaḥ guḍena saṃsṛṣṭāḥ guḍasaṃsṛṣṭāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_0: guḍasaṃsṛṣṭāḥ dhānāḥ guḍadhānāḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ ca yuktapūrṇāntaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_1: ca yuktapūrṇāntaḥ samasyate uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . aśvānām yuktaḥ aśvayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_2: aśvayuktaḥ rathaḥ aśvarathaḥ . dadhnaḥ pūrṇaḥ dadipūrṇaḥ dadhipūrṇaḥ ghaṭaḥ dadhighaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_3: . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā asamāse adarśanāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_4: . asamāse adarśanāt . yat hi asamāse dṛśyate samāse ca na dṛśyate tat lopārambham
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_5: prayojayati . na ca asamāse upasiktaśabdaḥ saṃsṛṣṭaśabdaḥ pūrṇaśabdaḥ vā dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_6: . katham tarhi sāmarthyam gamyate . yuktārthasampratyayāt ca sāmarthyam . dadhnā
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_7: yuktārthatā sampratīyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate dadhnā yuktārthatā sampratīyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_8: . sampratyayāt ca tadarthādhyavasānam . sampratyayāt ca tadarthaḥ adhyavasīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_9: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . sampratīyamānārthalope hi anavasthā .yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_10: sampratīyamānārthānām śabdānām lopaḥ bhavati iti anavasthā tasya lopasya syāt . dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_11: iti ukte bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante mandakam uttarakam nilīnakam iti tadvācinām śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_12: lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . tathā guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuraśabdasya śṛṅgaveram iti ukte ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_13: kaṭuśabdasya . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4114_14: pāṇivihāraiḥ ca . tadvācinām śabdānām lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_0: 598-603 kim caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa samāsaḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_1: . caturthī tadarthamātreṇa cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . caturthī tadarthamātreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_2: cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ sarvasya caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_3: . anena api prāpnoti . randhanāya sthālī avahananāya ulūkhalam iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_4: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya caturthyantasya tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_5: saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamane viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . balirakṣitābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_6: ca anarthakam vacanam . balirakṣitābhyām ca samāsavacanam anarthakam . yaḥ hi mahārājāya
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_7: baliḥ mahārājārthaḥ saḥ bhavati . tatra tadarthaḥ iti eva siddham . yadi punaḥ vikṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_8: caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_9: iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_10: kartavyam . aśvaghāsaḥ śvaśrūsuram hastividhā iti . arthena nityasamāsavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_11: arthśabdena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brāhmaṇārtham kṣatriyārtham . kim vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_12: prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti ataḥ arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha sarvathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_13: arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ vigrahaḥ mā bhūt iti . sarvaliṅgatā ca . sarvaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_14: ca vaktavyā . brāhmaṇārtham payaḥ brāhmaṇārthaḥ sūpaḥ brāhmaṇārthā yavāgūḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_15: kim arthena nityasamāsaḥ ucyate iti ataḥ sarvaliṅgatā vaktavyā . na iti āha . sarvathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_16: sarvaliṅgatā vaktavyā . kim kāraṇam . arthaśabdaḥ ayam puṃliṅgaḥ uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_17: ca tatpuruṣaḥ . tena puṃliṅgasya eva samāsasya abhidhānam syāt strīnapuṃsakaliṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_18: na syāt . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . aśvaghāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_19: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_20: . na vaktavyam . yat tāvat ucyate vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_21: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāyapati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_22: balirakiṣitagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_23: arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_24: na tadarthamātreṇa tataḥ balirakiṣitagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . yat api ucyate aśvaghāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_25: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . aśvaghāsādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_26: . yat hi yadartham bhavati ayam api tatra abhisambandhaḥ bhavati asya idam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_27: tat yathā guroḥ idam gurvartham iti . nanu ca svarabhedaḥ bhavati . caturthīsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_28: sati pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena bhavitavyam ṣaṣṭhīsamāse punaḥ antodāttatvena ṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_29: asti bhedaḥ . caturthīsamāse api sati antodāttatvena eva bhavitavyam . katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_30: jñāpayati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtisvarā bhavati na caturthīmātram iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_31: caturthī tadarthe arthe kte ca iti arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca karoti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_32: jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām arthagrahaṇena ktagrahaṇena ca arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_33: prakṛtisvaratvam . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā bhavati na caturthīmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_34: tataḥ arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca arthavat bhavati .yat api ucyate arthena nityasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_35: vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . sarthappratyayaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_36: ca eva hi kadā cit vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati . yadi sarthappratayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_37: kriyate itsañjñā na prāpnoti . atha api katham cit itsañjñā syāt evam api śryartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_38: bhvartham iti aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhavaiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_39: kim kṛtam bhavati . bhavati vai kaḥ cit asvapadavigrahaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā śobhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_40: mukham asyāḥ sumukhī iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi mahadartham iti āttvakapau prasajyetām
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_41: . evam tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_42: . na ca eva kadā cit ādeśena vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_43: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . caturthī subantena
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_44: saha samasyate . tataḥ tadarthārtha . tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_45: bhavati . iha api tarhi samāsaḥ prāpnoti chātrāya rucitam chātrāya svaditam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_46: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tādarthye ya caturthī sā samasyate na caturthīmātram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_47: yat ayam hitasukhagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_48: hitasukhagrahaṇena arthaḥ tathājātīyakānam samāsaḥ . yadi ca tādarthye yā caturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:4118_49: sā samasyate na caturthīmātram tataḥ hitasukhagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_0: iha api tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . yūpāya dāru
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_1: yūpadāru rathadāru . vāvacanam vidhāsyate . iha api tarhi vibhāṣā prāprnoti . brāhmaṇāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_2: kṣatriyārtham iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ yaḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_3: tatra tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati anyatra nityaḥ iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_4: ayam balihitagrahaṇam karoti . evam tarhi udakārthaḥ vīvadhaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt udabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_5: prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ sarvaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_6: ca . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti kā eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_7: caturthī . tādarthye iti āha . yadi tādarthye caturthī arthaśabdasya prayogeṇa na
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_8: bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . samāsaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti . vacanāt samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4119_9: bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā iti . na vaktavyā . liṅgam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4123_0: 604 atyalpam idam ucyate bhayena iti . bhayabhītabhītibhībhiḥ iti vaktavyam . vṛkāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4123_1: bhayam vṛkabhayam vṛkāt bhītaḥ vṛkabhītaḥ vṛkāt bhītiḥ vṛkabhītiḥ vṛkāt bhīḥ vṛkabhīḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4129_0: 604 śauṇḍādibhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . akṣadhūrtaḥ strīdhūrtaḥ akṣakitavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4129_1: strīkitavaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt śauṇḍādibhiḥ iti vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4133_0: 605 dhvāṅkṣeṇa iti arthagrahaṇam . dhvāṅkṣeṇa iti arthagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:4133_1: yathā syāt . tīrthakākaḥ iti . kṣepe iti ucyate . kaḥ iha kṣepaḥ nāma . yathā tīrthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4133_2: kākāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti evam yaḥ gurukulāni gatvā na ciram tiṣṭhati sa
GS24pmbhasuu:4137_0: 605 kṛtyaiḥ niyoge yadgrahaṇam . kṛtyaiḥ niyoge iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4137_1: . pūrvāḥṇegeyam sāma prātaḥ adhyeyaḥ anuvākaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4137_2: . ṛṇe iti eva siddham . iha yat yasya niyogataḥ kāryam ṛṇam tasya tat bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4137_3: ṛṇe iti eva siddham . yagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pūrvāhṇe dātavyā bhikṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4141_0: 605 kim udāharaṇam . avataptenakulasthitam te etat . kṣepe iti ucyate . kaḥ iha kṣepaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4141_1: nāma . yathā avatapte nakulāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti evam kāryāṇi ārabhya yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4141_2: na ciram tiṣṭhati sa ucyate avataptenakulasthitam te etat iti . kṣepe saptamyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:4141_3: ktāntena saha samasyate iti ucyate . tatra sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4141_4: . kṣepe gatikārakapūrve uktam . kim uktam . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4145: 606 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . evakārārthaḥ . pātresamitādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramam pātresamitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4149: 606-607 iha kasmāt avyayībhāvaḥ na bhavati . ekā nadī ekanadī . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyā iti prāpnoti . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4155_0: ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ. na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam gamyate . athavā
GS24pmbhasuu:4155_1: avyayībhāvaḥ kriyatām bahuvrīhiḥ iti . bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:4155_2: ekasañjñādhikāre siddham paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca avyayībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4155_3: prāpnoti paraṅkāryatvāt ca bahuvrīhiḥ . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4155_4: samāhāre avyayībhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ ca avaśyam vaktavyaḥ . sarvam ekanadītare .
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_0: 607-609 samāhāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samāṅpūrvāt harateḥ sarmasādhane ghañ . samāhriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_1: samāhāraḥ iti . yadi karmasādhanaḥ pañca kumāryaḥ samahṛtāḥ pañcakumāri daśakumāri
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_2: gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti dviguḥ ekavacanam iti etat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_3: vaktavyam . evam tarhi bhāvasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāharaṇam samāhāraḥ . atha bhāvasādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_4: sati kim abhidhīyate . yat tat auttarādharyam . kaḥ punaḥ gavām samāhāraḥ . yat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_5: arjanam krayaṇam bhiṣaṇam aparaharaṇam vā . yadi evam vikṣipteṣu pūleṣu goṣu carantīṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_6: na sidhyati . evam tarhi samabhyāśīkaraṇam samāhāraḥ . evam api pañcagrāmī ṣaṇṇagarī
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_7: tripurī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . sam ekatvavācī āṅ ābhimukhye vartate haratiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_8: deśāntaraprāpaṇe . na avaśyam haratiḥ deśāntaraprāpaṇe eva vartate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_9: sādṛśye api vartate . tat yathā mātuḥ anuharati pituḥ anuharati . atha vā pañcagrāmī
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_10: ṣaṇṇagarī tripurī iti na eva idam iyati eva avatiṣṭhate . avaśyam asau tataḥ kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_11: cit ākāṅkṣati kriyām vā guṇam vā . yat ākāṅkṣata tat ekam sa ca samāhāraḥ . ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_12: tarhi bhāvasādhane sati doṣaḥ . pañcapūlī ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_13: na prāpoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_14: ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_15: kriyante . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_16: dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_17: dravyānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā avyatirekāt dravyākṛtyoḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:4163_1: . dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . dvigusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_2: pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā etaretarāśrayatā . dvigunimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_3: pratyayottarapade pratyayottarapadanimittā ca dvigusañjñā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_4: . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi arthe it vakṣyāmi . arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_5: bahuvrīhivat . arthe cet taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . pāñcanāpitiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4165_0: traimāturaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvigunā uktatvāt bahuvrīhivat . tat yathā citraguḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4165_1: bahuvrīhiṇoktatvāt matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . evam tarhi samāsataddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4165_2: iti vakṣyāmi . samāsataddhitavidhau iti cet anyatra samāsasañjñābhāvaḥ . samāsataddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4165_3: iti cet anyatra samāsasañjñā na prāpnoti . kva anyatra . svare . pañcāratniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4166_0: daśāratniḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4166_1: ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4166_2: dvigusañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4166_3: cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . itaretarāśrayamātram etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4166_4: coditam sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4166_5: iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi sañjñā nityā . evam tarhi bhāvinī
GS24pmbhasuu:4167: kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_0: asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_1: na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_2: . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_3: dviguḥ bhavati yasya abhinirvṛttasya pratyaya uttarapadam iti ca ete sañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_4: . atha vā punaḥ astu arthe iti . nanu ca uktam arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ bahuvrīhivat
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_5: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam arthaśabdaḥ abhidheye eva vartate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_6: syādarthe api vartate . tat yathā . dārārtham ghaṭāmahe . dhanārtham bhikṣāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_7: dārāḥ naḥ syuḥ . dhanāni naḥ syuḥ iti . evam iha api taddhitārthe dviguḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_8: taddhitaḥ syāt iti . dvigoḥ vā lugvacanam jñāpakam taddhitotpatteḥ . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4168_9: ayam dvigoḥ luk anapatye iti dvigoḥ uttarasya taddhitasya lukam śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_1: . samāhāraḥ samūhaḥ iti aviśiṣtau etau arthau . samāhārasamūhayoḥ aviśeṣāt samāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_2: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . taddhitārthe kṛtatvāt . taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_3: dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra dviguḥ bhavati taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_4: prāpnoti . utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . kāni . pañcapūlī
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_5: daśapūlī . aparimāṇabistācitakambalebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_6: . pañcagavam daśagavam . goḥ ataddhitaluki it ṭac na prapnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_7: dvigoḥ ṅīp bhavati iti uktvā samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_8: samāhāre eva na anyatra iti . goḥ akāraḥ dvigoḥ samāhāre . aviśeṣeṇa goḥ ṭac bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_9: iti uktvā dvigoḥ samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . samāhāre eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_10: na anyatra iti . abhidhānārtham tu . abhidhānārtham tu samāhāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_11: . samāhāreṇa abhidhānam yathā syāt taddhitārthena mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_12: prasajyeta . utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . sarvāṇi parihṛtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_13: . na sarvāṇi parihṛtāni . pañcakumāri daśakumāri . lik taddhitaluki iti ṅīpaḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_15: uttarapade nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāgdṛṣadapriyaḥ chatropānahapriyaḥ pañcagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_16: daśagavapriyaḥ . kim prayojanam . samudāyavṛttau avayavānām mā kadā cit avṛttiḥ bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_17: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_18: ca . yadā vṛttipakṣaḥ tadā sarveṣām eva vṛttiḥ . yadā tu avṛttiḥ tadā sarveṣām avṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_19: . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_20: vaktavyaḥ . dvimāsajātaḥ trimāsajātaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . sup supā
GS24pmbhasuu:4172_21: iti vartate . evam tarhi idam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_0: dvimāsam jātasya iti . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . dvimāsajātaḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_1: dvimāsajātaḥ iti ca iṣyate . dvyāhnajātaḥ ca na sidhyati . dvyahajāta iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_2: na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā samāhāre dviguḥ . dvyahnajātaḥ tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_3: sidhyati . kim ucyate parimāṇinā iti na punaḥ anyatra api . pañcagavapriyaḥ daśagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_4: . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . anyatra samudāyabaḥ huvrīhisañjñḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_5: . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt uttarapadam prasiddham . uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_6: iti dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu dvigusañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_7: matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . pañcakhaṭvā daśakhaṭvā . dvigoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_8: iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt . pañcaguḥ daśaguḥ . goḥ ataddhitaluki iti ṭac mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_0: 617-618 kim anantare yoge saṅkhyāpūrvaḥ saḥ dvigusañjñaḥ āhosvit pūrvamātre . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_1: ca ataḥ . yadi anantare yoge ekaśāṭī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . atha pūrvamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_2: akabhikṣā atra api prāpnoti . astu anantare . kamam ekaśāṭī . īkārāntena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_3: bhaviṣyati . ekā śāṭī ekaśāṭī . iha tarhi ekāpūpī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_4: astu tarhi pūrvamātre. katham ekabhikṣā . ṭābantena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ekā bhikṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_5: ekabhikṣā . iha tarhi saptarṣayaḥ igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_6: anantare . katham ekāpūpī . samāhāre iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ atra samāhāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_7: yat taddānam sambhramaḥ vā . iha tarhi pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ igante dvigau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_8: eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prapnoti . astu tarhi pūrvamātre . katham saptarṣayaḥ . antodāttaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_9: tricakrādīnām chandasi iti evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu anantare . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_10: pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ . ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4182: 619 kim udāharaṇm . vaiyākaraṇakhasūciḥ . kim vyākaraṇam kutsitam āhosvit vaiyākaraṇaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ kutsitaḥ . tasmin kutsite tatstham api kutsitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_0: 619-627 upamānāni iti ucyate . kāni punaḥ upamānāni . kim yat eva upamānam tat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_1: upameyam āhosvit anyat upamānam anyat upameyam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi yat eva upamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_2: tat eva upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva gauḥ iti . atha anyat eva upamānam anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_3: upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva aśvaḥ iti . evam tarhi yatra kim cit sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_4: kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra upamānopameye bhavataḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_5: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . mānam hi nāma anirjñātajñānārtham upādīyate anirjñātam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_6: jñāsyāmi iti . tat samīpe yat na atyantāya mimīte tat upamānam . gauḥ iva gavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_7: iti . gauḥ nirjñātaḥ gavayaḥ anirjñātaḥ . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yasya gavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_8: nirjñātaḥ syāt gauḥ anirjñātaḥ tena kartavyam syāt gavayaḥ iva gauḥ iti. bāḍham kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_9: . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . śastrīśyāmā . kva punaḥ ayam śyāmāśabdaḥ vartate . śatryām
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_10: iti āha . kena idānīm devadattā abhidhīyate . samāsena. yadi evam śastrīśyāmo devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_11: iti na sidhyati . upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi upasarjanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_12: api evañjātīyakāni bhavanti tittirikalmāṣī kumbhakapālalohinī anupasarjanalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_13: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi śastryām eva śastrīśabdaḥ vartate devadattāyām śyāmāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_14: . evam api guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_15: iti . anirdiśyamānasya api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_16: devadattā iti . bahavaḥ candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_17: api samānādhikaraṇena iti vartate . vyadhikaraṇatvāt samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . kim hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_18: vacanāt na bhavati . yadi api tāvat vacanāt samāsaḥ syāt iha tu khalu mṛgī iva capalā
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_19: mṛgacapalā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi tasyām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_20: ubhayam vartate . etat ca atra yuktam yat tasyām eva ubhayam vartate iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_21: hi bahu apekṣyam syāt . yadi tāvat evam vigrahaḥ kriyate śastrī iva śyāmā devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_22: iti śastryām śyāmā iti etat apekṣyam . atha api evam vigrahaḥ kriyate yathā sāstrīśyāmā
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_23: tadvat iyam devadattā iti evam api devadattāyām śyāmā iti apekṣyam syāt . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_24: guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ iti . anirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_25: api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī devadattā iti . bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_26: candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . upamānasamāse guṇavacanasya viśeṣabhāktvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_28: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . śastrīśyāmā . śyāmāśabdaḥ ayam śastrīśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_29: viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . tatra sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_30: śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_31: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt . ubhayatra eva śyāmatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_32: asti śastryām devadattāyām ca . tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya . sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_33: tadvācakaḥ ca atra śyāmāśabdaḥ prayujyate . kimvācakaḥ . ubhayavācakaḥ . śyāmatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_34: ubhayatra bhāvāt tadvācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyavacanam prasiddham . sāmānyavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_35: prasiddhe sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . na ca avaśyam saḥ eva sāmānyavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_36: yaḥ bahūnām sāmānyam āha. dvayoḥ api sāmānyam āha saḥ api sāmānyavacanaḥ eva . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_37: vā sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti ucyate . sarvaḥ ca śabdaḥ anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_38: viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ prāk abhisambandhāt sāmānyavacanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4190_0: 627-628 sāmānyāprayoge iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4190_1: . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān . sāmānyāprayoge iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4190_2: na bhavati puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4190_3: . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4190_4: siddhe sati yat sāmānyāprayoge iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4190_5: vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4190_6: abhirūpaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_0: 628-632 viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjanāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_1: . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_2: . kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ ayam tilaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_3: sampadyate . tathā tilaśabdaḥ kṛṣṇaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ sampadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_4: . tat ubhayam viśeṣaṇam bhavati ubhayam ca viśeṣyam . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_5: ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ . na vā anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_6: tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya upasarjanaprasiddhiḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_7: . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt . anyatarat atra pradhānam . tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_8: . tadviśeṣakam ca aparam . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_9: upasarjanasañjñā bhaviṣyati . yadā asya tilāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti kṛṣṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_10: viśeṣaṇatvena tadā tilāḥ pradhānam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_11: yasya kṛṣṇāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti tilāḥ viśeṣaṇatvena tena kartavyam tilakṛṣṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_12: iti . na kartavyam . na hi ayam dvandvaḥ tilāḥ ca kṛṣṇāḥ ca iti . na khalu api ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_13: tilānām kṛṣṇāḥ iti . kim tarhi . dvau imau pradhānaśabdau ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyete
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_14: . na ca dvayoḥ pradhānaśabdayoḥ ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyamānayoḥ kim cit api
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_15: prayojanam asti . tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam . nūnam atra anyatarat pradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_16: tadviśeṣakam ca aparam iti . tatra tu etāvān sandehaḥ kim pradhānam kim viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_17: iti . saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhau guṇaśabdau . tat yathā kuñjakhañjakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_18: khañjakubjakaḥ iti . yatra hi anyatarat dravyam anyataraḥ guṇaḥ tatra yat dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_19: tat pradhānam . tat yathā śuklam ālabheta kṛṣṇam ālabheta iti na piṣṭapiṇḍīm ālabhya
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_20: kṛtī bhavati . avaśyam tadguṇam dravyam ākāṅkṣati . katham tarhi imau dvau pradhānaśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:4194_21: ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyete vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśipā iti . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_0: 633-634 atha kimartham uttaratra evamādi anukramaṇam kriyate na viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_1: bahulam iti eva siddham . bahulavacanasya akṛtsnatvāt uttaratrānukramaṇasāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_2: . akṛtsnam bahulavacanam iti uttaratra anukramaṇam kriyate . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_3: kṛtam akṛtam tat . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti . kṛtsnam ca kārakam ca sādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_4: ca nirvartakam ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat . kimartham tarhi evamādi anukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_5: kriyate . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_6: lakṣaṇam prapañcaḥ ca . kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_7: . avaśyam khalu asmābhiḥ idam vaktavyam bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_8: iti . sarvavedapāṛiṣadam hi idam śāstram . tatra na ekaḥ panthāḥ śakyaḥ āsthātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4202_0: 635 śreṇyādayaḥ paṭhyante . kṛtādiḥ ākṛtigaṇaḥ . śreṇyādiṣu cvyarthavacanam . śreṇyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4202_1: cvyarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . aśreṇayaḥ śreṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ śreṇikṛtāḥ . yadā hi śreṇayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4202_2: eva kim cit kriyante tadā mā bhūt . anyatra ayam cvyarthagrahaṇeṣu cvyantasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:4202_3: śāsti . tat iha na tathā . kim kāraṇam . anyatra pūrvam cvyantakāryam param cvyarthakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:4202_4: . iha punaḥ pūrvam cyvarthakāryam param cvyantakāryam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_1: . iha mā būt . siddham ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_2: mā bhūt . kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena ca . nuḍiḍadhikena ca samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_3: . iha api yathā syāt . aśitānaśitena jīvati . kliṣṭākliśitena jīvati . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_4: samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam iti yadā nañviśiṣṭena iti ucyate . na ca atra nañkṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_5: eva viśeṣaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtikṛtaḥ api . ayam viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ asti eva avadhāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_6: vartate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_7: devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ . svādhyāyena eva iti gamyate . anye
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_8: guṇāḥ samāḥ bhavanti . asti ādhikye vartate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_9: abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_10: svādhyāyena adhikaḥ anye guṇāḥ avivakṣitāḥ bhavanti . tat yadā tāvat avadhāraṇe viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_11: tadā na eva arthaḥ samānaprakṛtigrahaṇena . na iha bhaviṣyati . siddham ca abhuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_12: ca iti . na api anañ iti pratiṣedhena . na iha bhaviṣyati kartavyam akṛtam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_13: nuḍiḍadhikena api tu tadā samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . yadā ādhikye viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ tadā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_14: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt ṣiddham ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_15: . iha mā bhūt . kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena api tu samāsadḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_16: . tatra ādhikye viśiṣṭagrahaṇam matvā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam codyate . avadhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_17: nañā cet nuḍiḍviśiṣṭena na prakalpeta . atha cet adhikavivakṣā kāryam tulyaprakṛtikena
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_18: iti . kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtāpakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_19: bhuktavibhuktam pītavipītam . siddham tu ktena visamāptau anañ . siddham etat . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_20: ktāntena kriyāvisamāptau anañ ktāntam samasyate iti vaktavyam . gatapratyāgatādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_21: ca upasaṅkhyānam . gatapratyāgatādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gatapratyāgatam
GS24pmbhasuu:4210_0: 639 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . samānādhikaraṇena iti vartate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yad vyadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4210_1: samāsaḥ syāt . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yathājātīyakam uktam uttarapadam tathājātīyakena
GS24pmbhasuu:4210_2: pūrvapadena samasyate iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4210_3: api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4217_0: kṛṣṇaḥ sāraṅgaḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4217_1: varṇagrahaṇam . varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4217_2: pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati . anete varṇaḥ iti vaktavyam . atha dvitīyena varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4217_3: etaviśeṣaṇena arthaḥ . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi avarṇa etaśabdaḥ asti . nanu ca ayam asti : ā* itaḥ etaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_0: lohitetaḥ iti . na arthaḥ evamarthena varṇagrahaṇena . yadi tāvat ayam kartari ktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_1: tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . atha api kartari paratvāt kṛtsvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_2: bhavitavyam . atha samānādhikaraṇaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe dviḥ varṇagrahaṇam . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_3: dviḥ varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . varṇaḥ varṇeṣu anete iti vaktavyam . ekam varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_4: kartavyam iha mā bhūt . paramaśuklaḥ paramakṛṣṇaḥ iti . dvitīyam varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_5: iha mā bhūt . kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti . ekam varṇagrahaṇam anakrthakam . anyataratra kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_6: na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadikoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . evam sati . tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_7: etāni trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_8: api tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ tasya api tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_9: svaravidhau ca ekam . sāmānyena mama tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_10: guṇavacanena iti . avaśyam varṇena pratipadam samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ yatra tena na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_11: tadartham . kva ca tena na sidhyati . śukababhruḥ haritababhruḥ iti . tathā ca sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_12: tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_13: samānādhikaraṇaḥ sāmānyena siddhaḥ syāt . bāḍham siddhaḥ . katham . viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_14: bahulam iti . evam api dve varṇagrahaṇe kartavye svaravidhau eva pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_15: abhāvāt . tasmāt samānādhikaraṇaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_1: samānādhikaraṇādhikāre pradhānopasarjanānām param param bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_2: pradhānānām pradhānam upasarjanānām upasarjanam . pradhānānām tāvat pradhānam . vṛdārakanāgakuñjaraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_3: pūjyamānam iti asya avakāśaḥ govṛndārakaḥ aśvavṛndārakaḥ . poṭāyuvatīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_4: ibhyayuvatiḥ āḍhyayuvatiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāgayuvatiḥ vṛndārakayuvatiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_5: pradhānānām param bhavati vipratiṣedhena . upasarjanānām param upasarjanam . sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_6: iti asya avakāśaḥ sadgavaḥ sadaśvaḥ . kṛtyatulyākhyā ajātyā iti asya avakāśaḥ tulyaśvetaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4224_0: tulyasat tulyamahān . upasarjanānām param upasarjanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4224_1: bahuvrīhiḥ . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇasamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4224_2: avakāśaḥ vīraḥ puruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ kaṇṭhekālaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_0: vīrapuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_1: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati bahuvrīheḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_2: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . sarvadhanī sarvabījī sarvakeśī naṭaḥ gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_3: vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . kim prayojanam . karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_4: matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_5: matvarthasya . yadi uktatvam hetuḥ karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na prāpnoti . na khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_6: api sañjñāśrayaḥ matvarthīyaḥ . kim tarhi . arthāśrayaḥ . saḥ yathā eva bahuvrīhiṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_7: uktatvāt na bhavati evam karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi idam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_0: sarvāṇi dhanāni sarvadhanāni sarvadhanāni asya saniti sarvadhanī . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_1: . nityam evam sati karmadhārayaḥ syāt . tatra yat uktam kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_2: etat ayuktam . evam tarhi bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kāryavat buddhim kṛtvā paṭhanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_3: kāryāḥ śabdāḥ iti . tadvat idam paṭhitam samānādhikaraṇasamādāt bahuvrīhiḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_4: kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ iti . yad ucyate samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_5: bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena iti na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ karmadhārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_6: . kā antaraṅgatā . svapadārthe karmadhārayaḥ anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ . astu . vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_7: karmadhārayaḥ . yadā na karmadhārayaḥ tadā bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_8: atra kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_9: prāpnoti . sarvaḥ ca ayam evamarthaḥ yatnaḥ karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_10: abhidhānam mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi na idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_11: param iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ iṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_12: kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_13: . iha hi sarve manuṣyāḥ alpena yatnena mahataḥ arthān ākāṅkṣanti . ekena māṣeṇa śatasahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_14: . ekena kuddālakena khārīsahasram . tatra karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_15: astu bahuvrīhiṇā iti bahuvrīhiṇā bhaviṣyati laghutvāt . katham sarvadhanī sarvabījī
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_16: sarvakeśī naṭaḥ iti . iniprakaraṇe sarvādeḥ inim vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_17: ṭhanaḥ bādhanārtham . katham gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_18: valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . jātyā atra abhisambandhaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_19: . kṛṣṇasarpaḥ nāma sarpajātiḥ sā asmin valmīke asti . yadā hi antareṇa jātim tadvatām
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_20: abhisambandhaḥ kriyate kṛṣṇasarpaḥ valmīkaḥ iti evam tadā bhaviṣyati . pūrvapadātiśaye
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_21: ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_22: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . ātiśāyikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_23: avakāśaḥ paṭutaraḥ paṭutamaḥ . bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_24: prāpnoti sūkṣmavastrataraḥ tīkṣṇśṛṅgataraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_25: na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . virpatiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_26: paraḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4226_27: . evam api ayuktaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ ātiśāiyikaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . ṅyāpprātipadikāt ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_0: subantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . ātiśāyikaḥ api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_1: utpadyate sāmarthyam ca subantenta . evam api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . svapadārthe ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_2: anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ . evam api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . spardhāyām ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_3: bhavati . na ca antareṇa pratiyoginam spardhā bhavati . na eva vā atra ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_4: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam. sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_5: iti . yāvatā vastrāṇi tadvantam apekṣante tadvantam ca apekṣya vastrāṇām vastraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_6: yugapat spardhā bhavati . nanu ca ayam ātiśāyikaḥ evamātmakaḥ satyām vyapekṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_7: vidhīyate . satyam evamātmakaḥ yām ca na anatareṇa vyapekṣām pravṛttiḥ tasyam satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_8: bhavitavyam . kām ca na antareṇa vyapekṣām ātiśāyikasya pravṛttiḥ . yā hi pratiyoginam
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_9: prati vyapekṣā . yā hi tadvantam prati na tasyām bhavitavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_10: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_11: bhavati iti . yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_12: evam tarhi na idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe param iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_13: iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ iṣṭaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4228: sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena . katham yā eṣā yuktiḥ uktā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4229_0: yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ iti . yadā hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4229_1: vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat spardhām tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ kriyate niṣpratidvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4229_2: tadā bahuvrīhiḥ . bahuvrīheḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_0: sūkṣmataravastraḥ iti . bhavati . yadā antareṇa tadvantam vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_1: spardhā niṣpratidvandvaḥ tadā ātiśāyikaḥ . katham punaḥ anyasya prakarṣeṇa anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_2: prakarṣaḥ syāt . na eva anyasya prakarṣeṇa anyasya prakarṣeṇa bhavitavyam . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_3: eva ayam dravyeṣu yatate vastrāṇi me syuḥ iti evam guṇeṣu api yatate sūkṣmatarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_4: me syuḥ iti . na atra ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . guṇavacanāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_5: . na ca samāsaḥ guṇavacanaḥ . samāsaḥ api guṇavacanaḥ . katham . ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_6: . atha jahatsvārthāyām tu doṣaḥ eva . jahatsvāṛthāyām api na doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_7: tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_8: iti . tatguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_9: bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_10: . kim prayojanam . bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . bahvāḍhyataraḥ bahusukumārataraḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_11: punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ bahuvrīheḥ vā ātiśāyikaḥ syāt ātiśāyikāntena vā bahuvrīhiḥ . svarakapoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_12: viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ syāt bahvāḍyataraḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_13: bahvāḍhyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . bahvāḍhyakataraḥ iti ca prāpnoti bahvāḍhyatarakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_14: iti ca iṣyate . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_15: ca . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_16: ca vaktavyaḥ . śākabhojī pārthivaḥ śākapārthivaḥ . kutapavāsaḥ sauśrutaḥ kutapasauśrutraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4230_17: . ajāpaṇyaḥ taulvaliḥ ajātaulvaliḥ . yaṣṭipradhānaḥ maudgalyaḥ yaṣṭimaudgalyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4234: 653 catuṣpāt jātiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kālākṣīgarbhiṇī svastimatī garbhiṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4238: 654 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . evakārārthaḥ . mayūravyaṃsakādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramaḥ mayūravyaṃsakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4243: nagarārdhaḥ iti . ardhaśabdasya napuṃsakaliṅgasya idam grahaṇam puṃliṅgaḥ ca ayam ardhaśabdaḥ . kva punaḥ ayam napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ kva puṃliṅgaḥ . samapravibhāge napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4244: avayavavācī puṃliṅgaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4245: ardham pippalīnām iti . na vā bhavati ardhapippalyaḥ iti . bhavati yadā khaṇḍasamuccayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4246_0: ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalyaḥ iti . yada tu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4246_1: vākyam bhavati ardham pippalīnām iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4246_2: . ekādkhikaraṇe iti vartate . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4247: ardharāśiḥ iti . bhavati . ekam etat adhikaraṇam yaḥ asau rāśiḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_0: 657-660 anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . anyatarasyām samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_1: mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . dvitīyam bhikṣāyāḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_2: prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekadeśisamāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_3: mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api yathā syāt . bhikṣādvitīyam iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_4: . ayam api vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_5: paṭhati . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam jñāpakam avayavavidhāne sāmānyavidhānābhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_6: . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam kriyate jñāpārtham . kim jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_7: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . avayavavidhau sāmānyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_8: jñāpane prayojanam . bhinatti chinatti . śnami kṛte śap na bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_9: prayojanam . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_10: . na kartavyam .prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_11: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . rudhādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_12: ṣaṣthīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_13: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_14: ca anuvartate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yatra utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā tatra apavādena
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_15: mukte utsargaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīp
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_16: . prāṅmukhī prāṅmukhā pratyaṅmukhī pratyaṅmukhā . ṅīpa mukte ṅīṣ na bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_17: etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam ṅībvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_18: hi anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayāt ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . ardhapippalī
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_19: ardhakośātakī . ekadeśisamāsena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na bhavati . unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_20: . avyayībhāvena mukte bahuvrīhiḥ na bhavati . dākṣiḥ plākṣiḥ . iñā mukte aṇ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_21: . yadi etat jñāpyate upagoḥ apatyam aupagavaḥ . taddhitena mukte upagvapatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_22: na sidhyati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra vibhāṣā . daivayajñiśaucivṛkṣisātyamugrikāṇṭheviddhibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_23: anyatarasyām iti samarthānām prathamāt vā iti ca . tatra ekaya vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_24: aparaya vṛttiviṣaye vibhāṣapavādaḥ . kriyamāṇe api vai anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_25: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pūraṇena iti pratiṣedhāt . na etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_26: paryavapannam . etat api pūraṇāntam eva . katha. pūraṇam nāma arthaḥ tam āha tīyaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4251_27: . ataḥ pūraṇam . yaḥ asau pūraṇāntāt svārthe bhāge an saḥ api pūraṇam eva . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_0: 660 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . anukaraṣaṇārthaḥ . anyatarasyām iti etat anukṛṣyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_1: prayojanam . anyatarasyām samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena mukte vākyam api yatha syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_2: . jīvikām prāptaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_3: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api yatha syāt . jīvikāprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_4: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam. ayam api ucyate dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api . tat ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_5: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi na ayam anukarṣaṇārthaḥ cakāraḥ . kim tarhi . atvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_6: anena vidhīyate . prāptāpanne dvitīyāntena saha samasyete atvam ca bhavati prāptapannayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_7: iti . prāptā jīvikām prāptajīvikā āpannā jīvikām āpannajivikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_0: 661-662 kimpradhānaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_1: sadharmaṇā anena anyaiḥ uttarapadārthapradhānaiḥ bhavitavyam . anyeṣu ca uttarapadārthapradhāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_2: yā eva asau antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ samāse api śravaṇam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_0: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ iti . iha punaḥ vākye ṣaṣṭhī samāse prathamā . kena etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_1: evam bhavati . yaḥ asau māsajātayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ saḥ samāse nivartate . abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_2: saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_3: iti prathamā bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4261: māsajātasya iti . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_0: 662-666 kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ . kālasya yena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_1: saḥ aparimāṇī . tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_2: hi jātasya māsaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . triṃśadrātrasya . tat yathā . droṇaḥ badarāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_3: devadattasya iti . na devadattasya droṇaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . badarāṇām . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_4: tu kālaparimāṇam yasya sa kālaḥ tena . siddham etat . katham . kālaparimāṇam yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_5: sa kālaḥ tena samasyate iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_6: eva astu . nanu ca uktam kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_7: kam punaḥ kālam matvā bhavān āha kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_8: iti . yena mūrtīnām upacayāḥ ca apacayāḥ ca lakṣyante tam kālam āhuḥ . tasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_9: kayā cit kriyayā yuktasya ahaḥ iti ca bhavati rātriḥ iti ca . kayā kriyayā . ādityagatyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_10: . tayā eva asakṛt āvṛttayā māsaḥ iti bhavati saṃvatsaraḥ iti ca . yadi evam jātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_11: māsaḥ parimāṇam . ekavacanadvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . ekavacanāntānām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_12: . iha mā bhūt . māsau jātasya māsāḥ jātasya iti . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:4266: trimāsajātaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekavacane tāvat uktam anabhidhānāt iti . dvigoḥ kim uktam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4270_0: 666-677 kimpradhānaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4270_1: abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti . anyapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4271: avarṣā hemantaḥ iti hemantasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api prāpnoti . pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . yadi pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ avyayasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_0: avyayam hi asya pūrvapadam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_1: ca nañsamāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . yadi api nañsamāsaḥ na paṭhyate nañ tu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_2: pāṭhena api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . yaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_3: iha arthaḥ abhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_4: aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā va . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā:
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_0: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_1: kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_2: iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat nañaḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_3: samāsāt liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca bhavati svābhāvikam etat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_4: vā āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṅavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4275_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4275_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4275_2: bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4275_3: punaḥ astu uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . nanu ca uktam abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4275_4: ānayanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_0: atha iha rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam kasmāt na bhavati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_1: atra viśeṣaḥ . rājā viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena viśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_2: api tarhi nañ viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena nañviśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_3: punaḥ asau . nivṛttapadārthakaḥ . yadā punaḥ asya padārthaḥ nivartate kim svābhāvikī
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_4: nivṛttiḥ āhosvit vācanikī . kim ca ataḥ . yadi svābhāvikī kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_0: nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati iti . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_1: ca uktam kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti iti . nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_2: katham . kīlapratikīlavat . tat yathā kīlaḥ āhanyamānaḥ pratikīlam nirhanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_3: etat nañaḥ māhātmyam syāt na jātu cit rājānaḥ hastyaśvam bibhṛyuḥ . na iti eva rājānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_4: brūyuḥ . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ . nanu ca uktam kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_5: iti . nañnimittā tu upalabdhiḥ . tat yathā samandhakāre dravyāṇām samavasthitānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_6: pradīpnimittam darśanam na ca teṣām pradīpaḥ nirvartakaḥ bhavati . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_7: nivṛttapadārthakaḥ kimartham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate . evam yathā vijñayeta asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_8: padārthaḥ nivartate iti . na iti hi ukte sandehaḥ syāt kasya padārthaḥ nivartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_9: iti . tatra asandehārtham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate . evam vā etat . atha vā sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_10: ete śabdāḥ guṇasamudāyeṣu vartante brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti . tapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_11: śrutam ca yoniḥ ca iti etad brāhmaṇakārakam . tapaḥśtrutābhyām yaḥ hīnaḥ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_12: eva saḥ . tathā gauraḥ śucyācāraḥ piṅgalaḥ kapilakeśaḥ iti etān api abhyantarān brāhmaṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_13: guṇān kurvanti . samudāyeṣu ca vṛttāḥ śabdāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante. tad yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_14: pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kapilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_15: kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartate jātihīne
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_16: guṇahīne ca . guṇahīne tāvat. abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam yaḥ tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . abrāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_17: ayaṃ yaḥ gacchan bhakṣayati . jātihīne sandehāt durupadeśāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate . sandehāt tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_0: gauram śucyācāraṃ piṅgalam kapilakeśam dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_1: paścāt upalabhate na ayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tatra sandehāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_2: vartate jātikṛtā ca arthasya nivṛttiḥ . durupadeśāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4279_0: durupadiṣṭam asya bhavati amuṣmin avakāśe brāhmaṇaḥ tam ānaya iti . sa tatra gatvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4279_1: yam paśyati tam adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tataḥ paścāt upalabhate na ayaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:4280_0: . tatra durupadeśāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate jātikṛtā ca arthasya nivṛttiḥ . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4280_1: ca sandehāt durupadeśāt vā . na hi ayam kālam māṣarāśivarṇam āpaṇe āsīnam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4280_2: adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . nirjñātam tasya bhavati . idam khalu api bhūyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4280_3: uttarapadārthaprādhānye sati saṅgṛhītam bhavati . kim . anekam iti . kim atra saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:4280_4: . ekavacanam . katham punaḥ ekasya pratiṣedhena anekasya sampratyayaḥ syāt . prasajya
GS24pmbhasuu:4280_5: ayam kriyāguṇau tataḥ paścāt nivṛttim karoti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4281: āsaya śāyaya bhojaya anekam iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra kriyāguṇau prasajyete yatra khalu na prasajyete tatra katham :
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_0: anekaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . bhavati ca evañjātīyakānām api ekasya pratiṣedhena bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_1: sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā na naḥ ekam priyam na naḥ ekam sukham iti . iha abrāhmaṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_2: abrāhmaṇatā paratvāt tvatalau prāpnutaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_3: abrāhmaṇatvam iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . abrāhmaṇatvam iti ca iṣyate . nañsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_4: bhāvavacane uktam . kim uktam . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ pūrvapratiṣiddham svarsiddhyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4286: 677 īṣat guṇavacanena .īṣat guṇavacanena iti vaktavyam . akṛtā iti ucyamāne iha ca prasajyeta . īṣat gārgyaḥ iti . iha ca na syāt . īṣatkaḍāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_0: 678-680 kṛdyogā ca . kṛdyogā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam . idhmapravraścanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_1: palāśaśātanaḥ . kimartham idam ucyate . pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_2: vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . kā punaḥ ṣaṣṭhīpratipadavidhānā kā kṛdyogā
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_3: . sarvā ṣaṣṭhī pratipadavidhānā śeṣalakṣaṇām varjayitvā . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_4: yā ṣaṣṭhī sā kṛdyogā . tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ . tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣthīguṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_5: samasyate iti vaktavyam . brāhmaṇavarṇaḥ candanagandhaḥ paṭahaśabdaḥ nadhīghoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_6: . na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ . na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ghṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_7: tīvraḥ candanasya mṛduḥ iti . kimartham idam ucyate . guṇena iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4290_8: . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam guṇena na iti ucyate na punaḥ guṇavacanena
