GS24pmbhasuu:4328_0: 699-704 padagrahaṇam kimartham. anekam anyārthe iti iyati ucyamāne vakyārthe api
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_1: bahuvrīhiḥ syāt . yathā me mātā tathā me pitā susnātam bhoḥ iti . padagrahaṇe punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_2: kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha anyagrahaṇam kimartham . anekam padārthe iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_3: ucyamāne svapadārthe api bahurvīhiḥ syāt . rājapuruṣaḥ takṣapuruṣaḥ iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_4: asti prayojanam . tatpuruṣaḥ svapadārthe bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . bhavet ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_5: siddham . paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca tatpuruṣaḥ paraṅkāryatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_6: ca bahuvrīhiḥ prāpnoti . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ . śeṣaḥ iti vartate . śeṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_7: na bhaviṣyati . śeṣavacane uktam . kim uktam . tatra śeṣavacanāt doṣaḥ saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇanañsamāseṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_8: bahuvrīhipratiṣedhaḥ iti . atha ekasaṅjñādhikāre na arthaḥ anyagrahaṇena . ekasaṅjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_9: ca kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi anyagrahaṇe yathā eva tatpuruṣaḥ svapadārthe bahuvrīhim
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_10: bādhate evam anyapadārthe api bādheta . atha anekagrahaṇam kimartham. anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_11: iti iyati ucyamāne ekasya api padasya bahuvrīhiḥ syāt . sarpiṣaḥ api syāt . madhunaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_12: api syāt . gomūtrasya api syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . sup supā iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_13: idam tarhi prayojanam . bahūnām api samāsaḥ yathā syāt . susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājinavāsasā
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_14: . uttarārtham ca anekagrahaṇam kartavyam cārthe dvandvaḥ anekam iti . iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_15: syāt . plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_16: jñāpayati bahūnām api samāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam uttarapade dvigum śāsti . tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_17: api tarhi bahūnām prāpnoti . grahaṇena tatpuruṣaḥ ucyate . tena bahūnām na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_18: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . anekavacanam upasarjanārtham . anekagrahaṇam kriyate upasarjanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_19: . prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasarjanam iti anekasya supaḥ upasarjanasañjñā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_20: syāt . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . na vā ekavibhaktitvāt . na vā etat api prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_21: asti . kim kāraṇam . ekavibhaktitvāt . ekavibhakti ca apūrvnipāte iti upasarjanasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_22: bhaviṣyati . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citraguḥ tiṣṭhati . citrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_23: yasya gāvaḥ citragum paśya . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citraguṇā kṛtam . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_24: citragave dehi . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragoḥ ānaya . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_25: svam . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragau nidhehi . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ he citrago iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_26: yadi tarhi yataḥ kutaḥ cit eva kim cit padam adhyāhṛtya ekavibhaktyā yogaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_27: etat api ekavibhaktiyuktam bhavati iha api prāpnoti . rājakumārī takṣakumārī . rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_28: yā kumārī rājakumārī tiṣṭhati . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumārīm paśya . rājñaḥ yā kumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_29: rājakumāryā kṛtam . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryai dehi . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_30: ānaya . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryāḥ svam . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryām nidhehi
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_31: . rājñaḥ yā kumārī he rājakumāri iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_32: gaṃsyate . ekagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat ekavibhaktiyuktam ca anekavibhaktiyuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_33: ca tatra syāt ekagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . vibhaktiyuktam ca apūrvanipāte iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_1: anuprayogasya anupapattiḥ . citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . abhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_2: . citraguśabdena abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā anabhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_3: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anabhihitatvāt . citraguśabdena anabhihitaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_4: arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham anabhihitaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_5: padārthābhidhāne anuprayogānupapattiḥ abhihitatvāt iti . sāmānyābhidhāne hi viśeṣānabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_6: . sāmānye hi abhidhīyamāne viśeṣaḥ anabhhitaḥ bhavati . tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_7: viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . citraguḥ . kaḥ . devadattaḥ iti. bhavet siddham yadā sāmānye
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_8: vṛttiḥ . yadā tu khalu viśeṣe vṛttiḥ tadā na sidhyati . citrā gāvaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_9: citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti . tat api siddham . katham . na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_10: vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . yadā vākyam tadā na samāsaḥ . yadā samāsaḥ tadā na vakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_11: . yadā samāsaḥ tadā sāmānye vṛttiḥ . tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_12: . citraguḥ . kaḥ . devadattaḥ iti. sāmānyasya eva tarhi anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_13: citragu tat . citragu kim cit . citragu sarvam iti . sāmānyam api yathā viśeṣaḥ tadvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_14: . citragu iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt . sarvam vā viśvam vā iti . tatra avaśyam sandehanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_15: viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . atha vā vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidīyate . etat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_16: atra yuktam yat vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidhīyate . tatra hi sarvapaścāt padam vartate asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4332_18: adravyasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām upacāraḥ anupapannaḥ . bahuyavam bahuyavā bahuyavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4333_1: dravyasya ye liṅgasaṅkhye tābhyām vibhaktyarthasya upacāraḥ anupapannaḥ . bahuyavam
GS24pmbhasuu:4333_2: bahuyavāḥ bahuyavaḥ bahuyavau bahuhavāḥ iti . katham hi anyasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4333_3: anyasya upacāraḥ syāt . siddham tu yathā guṇavacaneṣu . siddham etat. katham . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_0: guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti . tat yathā śuklam vastram
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_1: śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_2: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_3: api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_4: api bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidhīyate kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ katham abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_5: bhavati sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ ca . arthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . iha anekam anyapade
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_6: iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ pade nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_7: arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_8: etat prayojanam kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ yathā abhidhīyeta sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_9: ca iti . yadi tarhi kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ abhidhīyate laiṅgāḥ sāṅkhyāḥ ca vidhayaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_10: sidhyanti . uktam vā . kim uktam . liṅgeṣu tāvat . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_11: svārthe ṭābādayaḥ iti . sāṅkhyeṣu api uktam karmādīnām anuktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_12: sāṅkhyāḥ bhaviṣyanti . prathamā tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayikī
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_13: na niyogataḥ anyāḥ kasmāt na bhavanti . karmādīnām abhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_14: . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . evam api vyatikaraḥ . ekasmin api
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_15: dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ dvayoḥ api ekavacanabahuvacane bahuṣu api ekavacanadvivacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_16: . arthataḥ vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā . saṅkhyeam
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_17: anyā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam syāt . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_18: vakṣyati etat . tatra vacanagrahaṇasya prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:4334_19: yathā syāt iti . evam api ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . vyabhicarati eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4335_0: ayam samāsaḥ liṅgasaṅkhye . ṣaṣthyartham punaḥ na vyabhicarati . abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4335_1: antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:4335_2: bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4336: citragoḥ devadattasya . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_1: bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . vyadhikaraṇānām mā bhūt iti . pañcabhiḥ bhuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_2: asya iti . avyayānām ca . avyayānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccairmukhaḥ nīcairmukhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_4: ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kaṇṭhesthaḥ kālaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_5: kaṇṭhekālaḥ uṣṭramukham iva mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ kharamukhaḥ . samudāyavikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_6: ca . samudāyaṣaṣṭhyāḥ vikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_7: vaktavyaḥ . keśānām samāhāraḥ cūḍā asya keśacūḍaḥ suvarṇasya vikāraḥ alaṅkāraḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_8: suvarṇālaṅkāraḥ . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya vā . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_9: uttarapadasya ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇaḥ prapatitapalāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_10: prapalāśaḥ . nañaḥ astyarthānām . nañaḥ astyarthānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_11: ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avidyamānaputraḥ aputraḥ avidyamānabhāryaḥ abhāryaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_12: tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā anabhidhānāt asamānādhikaraṇe sañjñābhāvaḥ . na vā vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4341_0: pañcabhiḥ bhuktam asya iti . anabhidhānāt . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4341_1: . kriyamāṇe api vai parigaṇane yatra abhidhānam na asti na bhavati tatra bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4341_2: . tat yathā pañca bhuktavantaḥ asya iti . atha etasmin sati anabhidhāne yadi vṛttiparigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4341_3: kriyate vartiparigaṇanam api kartavyam . tat katham kartavyam . arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4341_4: . arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . matvarthe yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4342: kaṣṭam śritam anena iti . tathā ca uttarasya vacanārthaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā uttarasya yogasya vacanārthaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4343: yat vṛttisūtre iti . saṅkhyāvyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_0: yat vārttike iti . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_1: vaktavyaḥ . ūḍhaḥ rathaḥ anena ūḍharathaḥ anaḍvān upahṛtaḥ paśuḥ rudrāya upahṛtapaśuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_2: rudraḥ uddhṛtaḥ odanaḥ sthālyāḥ uddhṛtaudanā sthālī . yadi karmavacanena iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_3: kartṛvacanena katham . prāptam udakam grāmam prāptodakaḥ grāmaḥ āgatāḥ atithayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_4: grāmam āgatātithiḥ grāmaḥ . kartṛvacanena api . kartṛvacanena api iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_5: aprathamāyāḥ iti kimartham . vṛṣṭe deve gataḥ . aprathamāyāḥ iti ucyamāne iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_6: na bhavati . vṛṣṭe deve gatam paśya iti . bahiraṅgā atra aprathamā . subadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_7: astikṣīrādivacanam . subadhikāre astikṣīrādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astikṣīrā
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_8: brāhmaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā avyayatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_9: . avyayatvāt . avyayaḥ ayam astiśabdaḥ . na eṣaḥ asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4344_10: upasargavibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasñjñā . nipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4348_0: 714-719 atha kiṃsabrahmacārī iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti aha . kaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4348_1: vigrahaḥ . ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . yadi evam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4348_2: . na hi anyat pṛṣṭena anyat ākhyāyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4349_0: keṣām sabrahmacārī kiṃsbrahmacārī iti . prativacanam ca eva na upapadyate svare ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4349_1: doṣaḥ bhavati . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4349_2: ca iṣyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī kiṃsabrahmacārī
GS24pmbhasuu:4349_3: iti . bhavet prativacanam upapannam svare tu doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4349_4: kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī tava kiṃsabrahmacārī tvam iti . atha vā punaḥ astu evam vigrahaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4350_0: ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . nanu ca uktam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4350_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . agnaukaravāṇinyāyena bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit āha
GS24pmbhasuu:4350_2: . agnau karavāṇi iti . kuru iti kartari anujñāte karma api anujñātam bhavati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_0: agnau kariṣyate iti . kriyatām iti karmaṇi anujñāte kartā api anujñātaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_1: yathā eva khalu api ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti kaṭhāḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_2: . nūnam saḥ api kaṭha iti . evam kaṭhaḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat gantavyam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_3: nūnam te api kaṭhāḥ iti . na khalu api te śakyāḥ samāsena pratinirdeṣṭum . upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_4: he te bhavanti . atha arthatṛtīyāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_5: asya vigrahaḥ . ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . kaḥ samāsārthaḥ . samāsārthaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_6: . anyapadārthaḥ hi nāma saḥ bhavati . yeṣām padānām samāsaḥ tataḥ anyasya padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_7: arthaḥ anyapadārthaḥ . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_8: iti . evam api kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate . kim hi tayoḥ ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_9: bhavati . astu tari evam vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam samāsārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_10: na upapadyate iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_11: avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ asidvitīyaḥ anusasāra pāṇḍavam . saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_12: balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti. dvayoḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_13: ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ . nanu ca uktam . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_14: doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha devadattasya bhrātā iti kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_15: . tatra etat syāt . ekasmāt prādurbhāvaḥ iti . etat ca vārtam . tat yathā . sārthikanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_16: ekapratiśraye uṣitānām prātaḥ utthāya pratiṣṭhamānānām na kaḥ cit parasparam sambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_17: bhavati . evañjātīyakam bhrātṛtvam nāma . atra cet yuktaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ dṛśyate iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_18: api yuktaḥ dṛśyatām . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_19: na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_20: anusasāra pāṇḍavam . saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti. dvayoḥ dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_21: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tīyantaḥ śabdaḥ asti eva pūraṇam . asti sahāyavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_22: . tat yaḥ sahāyavācī tasya idam grahaṇam . asidvitīyaḥ asisahāyaḥ iti gamyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_23: api ardhatṛtīyāḥ iti ekasmin ekavacanam iti ekavacanam prāpnoti . ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_24: bhavanti . tat yathā śatam yūtham vanam iti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_25: tṛtīyam anayoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_26: na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_27: yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_28: tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . atha vā punaḥ astu ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_29: iti . nanu ca uktam ekavacanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_30: . saṅkhyeyam anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra ekavacanam syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_31: syāt . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti ayam droṇaśabdaḥ samudāye pravṛttaḥ avayave
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_32: na upapadyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyeṣu api śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante.
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_33: tad yathā . pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_34: kapilaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye droṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartati
GS24pmbhasuu:4351_35: . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yadā dvau droṇau ardhārḍhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4352_0: ca kartavyam ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti . na kartavyam . samudāyeṣu api hi śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4352_1: avayaveṣu api vartante. keṣu avayaveṣu . yaḥ avayavaḥ tam samudāyam na vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:4352_2: . kam ca samudāyam na vyabhicarati . ardhdroṇaḥ droṇam . ardhāḍhakam punaḥ vyabhicarati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4356_0: 719-724 dvitrāḥ tricaturāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4356_1: . dvau vā trayaḥ vā iti . bhavet yadā bahūnām ānayanam tadā bahuvacanam upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:4356_2: yadā tu khalu dvau ānīyete tadā na sidhyati . tadā api sidhyati . katham . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4357: anirjñāte arthe bahuvacanam prayoktavyam iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4358: kati bhavataḥ putrāḥ . kati bhavataḥ bhāryāḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_0: dvau vā iti ukte trayaḥ vā iti gamyate . trayaḥ vā iti ukte dvau vā iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_1: sā eṣā pañcādhiṣṭhānā vāk . atra yuktam bahuvacanam . atha dvidaśāḥ tridaśāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_2: kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_3: . saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyāprasiddhiḥ . saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_4: iti aprasiddhiḥ . na hi sujantā saṅkhyā asti . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_5: . dvau daśatau dvidaśāḥ iti . evam api atkārāntatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_6: hi atkārāntā saṅkhyā asti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_7: nanu ca uktam saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ iti . na vā asujantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_8: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . asujantatvāt . sujantā iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_9: sujantam paśyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vākye suc dṛśyate samāse tu na dṛśyate . sujabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_10: ahihitārthatvāt samāse . samāse sucaḥ abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ahihitārthatvāt . abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_11: sujarthaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā samāse suc na bhaviṣyati .kim ca bhoḥ sujarthe iti samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_12: ucyate . na khalu sujarthe iti ucyate gamyate tu sujarthaḥ . katham . yāvatā saṅkhyeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_13: yaḥ saṅkhyayā saṅkhyāyate saḥ ca kriyābhyāvṛttyarthaḥ . saḥ ca uktaḥ samāsena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_14: kṛtvā samāse suc na bhaviṣyati . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_15: . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_16: saṅkhyeyam vārthaḥ ca abhidīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham . bhavet siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_17: adhikaviṃśāḥ adhikatriṃśāḥ iti yatra etat vicāryate . viśatyādayaḥ daśadarthe vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_18: syuḥ parimāṇini vā iti . idam tu na sidhyati adhikadaśāḥ iti yatra niyogataḥ saṅkhyeye
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_19: eva vartate . atha upadaśāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_20: vigrahaḥ . daśānām samīpe upadaśāḥ iti . kasya punaḥ sāmīpyam arthaḥ . upasya . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_21: evam na anyapadārthaḥ bhavati . tatra prathānirdiṣṭam saṅkhyāgrahaṇam śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_22: . matvarthe vā pūrvasya vidhānāt . atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4359_23: ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_1: ca aśiṣyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . antarālapradhānābhidhānāt . diksamāse sahayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_2: ca antarālam pradhānam ca abhidhīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_3: evam dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . adya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_4: iyam sā eva dakṣiṇā sā eva pūrvā iti kṛtvā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_5: bhavati . na sidhyati . bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_6: . nanu ca bhoḥ dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ pūrvaśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_7: bhāṣitapuṃskam . ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā pūrvā iti dikśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_8: . dakṣiṇaḥ pūrvaḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_9: syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi . yadā diśaḥ vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_10: tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_11: dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_12: diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati . puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_13: tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_14: iti evamartham . evam ca kṛtvā dik diksamāsasahayogayoḥ ca antarālapradhānābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_15: iti eva . nanu ca uktam dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_16: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvena parihṛtam . matvarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_17: vā pūrvasya vidhānāt . atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_18: . kababhāvārtham vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_0: 727-728 tṛtīyāsaptamyanteṣu ca kriyābhidhānāt . tṛtīyāsaptamyanteṣu ca kriyābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_1: aśiṣyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . kriyābhidhānāt . kriyā abhidhīyate . tatra anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_2: iti eva siddham . na vā ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham . na vā aśiṣyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_3: idam vaktavyam . pūrvadīrghārtham ca . pūrvadīrghārtham ca idam vaktavyam . keśākeśi
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_4: . syāt etat prayojanam yadi niyogataḥ asya anena eva dīrghatvam syāt . atha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_5: anyeṣām api dṛśyate iti dīrghatvam na prayojanam bhavati . matvarthe vā pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_6: vidhānāt . atha va matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4367_7: vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_0: 729-730 cārthe iti ucyate caḥ ca avyayam . tena samāsasya avyayasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_1: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate . na ca samāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . pāṭhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_2: api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_3: abhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_4: va . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_0: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_1: kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_2: iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat prāk samāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_3: cārthasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca bhavati svābhāvikam etat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_4: vā āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_2: bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . atha iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_3: kasmāt na bhavati . yājñikaḥ ca ayam vaiyākaraṇaḥ ca . kaṭhaḥ ca ayam bahvṛcaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_4: . aukthikaḥ ca ayam mīmāṃsakaḥ ca iti . śeṣaḥ iti vartate . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_5: . yadi śeṣaḥ iti vartate upāsnātam sthūlasiktam tūṣṇīṅgaṅgam mahāhradam droṇam cet
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_6: aśakaḥ gantum mā tvā tāptām kṛtākṛte iti etat na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_0: 731-741 cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . cārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_1: dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭam prāpnoti . ahaḥ ahaḥ nayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_2: gām aśvam puruṣam paśum vaivasvataḥ na tṛpyati surāyāḥ iva durmadī indraḥ tvaṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_3: varuṇaḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ iti . siddham tu yugapadadhikaraṇavacane dvandvavacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_4: etat . katham . yugapadadhikaraṇavacane dvandvaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_5: . tatra etasmin lakṣaṇe puṃvadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paṭvīmṛdvyau . samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_6: puṃvadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ . vipratiṣiddheṣu yugapadadhikaraṇavacatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_7: anupapattiḥ . śītoṣṇe sukhaduḥkhe jananamaraṇe . kim kāraṇam . sukhapratighātena
GS24pmbhasuu:4378_8: hi duḥkham duḥkapratighātena ca sukham . yat tāvat ucyate tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_0: atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyāmātā iti . atha matam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_1: prāk samāsāt yatra sāmānādhikaraṇyam tatra puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti iha api na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_2: bhavati . yad api ucyate vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ iti . sarve eva hi śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_3: vipratiṣiddhāḥ . iha api plakṣanyagrodhau iti plakṣaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ plakṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_4: sampratyāyayati nyagrodhārtham nivartayati . nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ nyagrodhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_5: sampratyāyayati plakṣārtham nivartayati . atra cet yuktā yugapat adhikaraṇvacanatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_6: dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . evam api śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_7: . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam prāpnoti . ataḥ kim . yugapatadhikaraṇavacanatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_8: anupapattiḥ . plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhāḥ iti . yatha eva hi śabdānām paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_9: tadvat arthānām api bhavitavyam . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_0: plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhāḥ iti . plakṣaśabdaḥ sārthakaḥ nivṛttaḥ nyagrodhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_1: upasthitaḥ ekārthaḥ tasya ekārthatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . vigrahe tu yugapadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_2: jñāpakam yugapadvacanasya . vigrahe khalu api yugapadvacanatā dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_0: dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti . kim etat . yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_1: upodbalakam . vigrahe kila nāma yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā syāt kim punaḥ samāse .
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_2: samudāyāt siddham . samudāyāt siddham etat . kim etat samudāyāt siddham iti . dvivacanabahuvacanaprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_3: iti coditam . tasya ayam parihāraḥ . samudāyāt siddham iti cet na ekārthatvāt samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_4: . samudāyāt siddham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt samudāyasya . ekārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_5: hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā śatam yūtham vanam iti . na aikārthyam . na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_6: ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_7: api dvyarthaḥ . yadi tarhi plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ tayoḥ anekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_8: bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_9: . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet na bahutvābhāvāt . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_10: bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . bahutvābhāvāt . na atra bahutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_11: asti . kim ucyate bahutvābhāvāt iti yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_12: nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ iti . yābhyām eva atra ekaḥ dvyarthaḥ tābhyām eva aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_13: api . yadi evam anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ . anyavācakena śabdena anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_14: vacanam na upapadyate . anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ iti cet plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_15: nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt svaśabdena abhidhānam . anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_16: iti cet ucyate tat na . kim kāraṇam . plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_17: svaśabdena abhidhānam . plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_18: plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ syāt yāvatā kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4381_19: . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4382_0: tat na tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . tulyam hi kāraṇam . yadi tāvat prakṣarati iti plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4382_1: syān nyagrodhe api etat bhavati . tathā yadi nyak rohati iti nyagrodhaḥ plakṣe api
GS24pmbhasuu:4382_2: etat bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ na ca nyagrodhe plakṣaśabdaḥ dṛśyate . darśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4382_3: hetuḥ iti cet tulyam . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam etat bhavati . plakṣe api nyagrodhaśabdaḥ dṛśyatām . tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_0: hi kāraṇam . na vai loke eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati . na hi plakṣaḥ ānīyatām iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_1: nyragrodhaḥ ānīyate . tadviṣayam ca . tadviṣayam ca etat draṣṭavyam plakṣasya nyagrodhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_2: . kiṃviṣayam . dvandvaviṣayam . yuktam punaḥ yat niyataviṣayāḥ nāma śabdāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_3: bāḍham yuktam . anyatra api tadviṣayadarśanāt . anyatra api hi niyataviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_0: samāne rakte varṇe gauḥ lohitaḥ iti bhavati āsvaḥ śoṇaḥ iti . samāne ca kāle varṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_1: gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ hemaḥ iti . samāne ca śukle varṇe gauḥ śvetaḥ iti bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_2: aśvaḥ karkaḥ iti . yadi tarhi plakṣaḥ api nyagraodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_3: uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_4: na upapadyate . plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_5: prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_6: ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . anuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_7: plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_8: nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_9: nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ iti . sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na pṛthagbhūtau
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_10: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na pṛthagbhūtau . abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_11: punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . atha vā iha kau cit prāthamakalpikau
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_12: plakṣanyagrodhau kau cit kriyayā vā guṇena va plakṣaḥ iva ayam plakṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4385: nyagrodhaḥ iva ayam nyagrodhaḥ iti . tatra plakṣau iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_0: kim imau plakṣau āhosvit plakṣanyagrodhau iti . tatra asandehārtham nyagrodhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_1: prayujyate . iyam yugapadadhikaraṇavacanata nāma duḥkhā ca durupapādā ca . yat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_2: api asyā nibandhanam uktam dyāvā ha kṣāmā iti tat api chāndasam . tatra supām supaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_3: bhavanti iti eva siddham . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_4: cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_5: doṣaḥ . iha ce dvandve iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ ce nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_6: hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_7: arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam evam yathā vijñāyeta cena kṛtaḥ artaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_8: cārthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ cena kṛtaḥ arthaḥ . samuccayaḥ anvācayaḥ itaretarayogaḥ samāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_9: iti . samuccayaḥ . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat nyagrodhaḥ ca iti . anvācayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_10: . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat sāpaekṣaḥ ayam prayujyate iti . itaretarayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_11: . plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhasahāyaḥ nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_12: api plakṣasahāyaḥ iti . samāhāre api kriyate plakṣanyagrodham iti . tatra ayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4386_13: arthaḥ dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . samāhārasya ekatvāt eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_0: 742-743 ekādaśa dvādaśa iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ . ekādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_1: daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_2: . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanam prāpnoti . ekaviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_3: dvāviṃśatiḥ . siddham tu adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā samānādhikaraṇādhikāre adhikalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_4: ca . siddham etat . katham . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre vaktavyam adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_5: saha samasyate adhikaśabdasya ca lopaḥ bhavati iti . ekādhikā viṃśatiḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_6: dvyadhikā viṃśatiḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ . yadi samānādhikaraṇaḥ svaraḥ na sidhyati . yat hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_7: tat saṅkhyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti dvandve iti tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_8: dvandve iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt śatasahasram iti . astu tarhi dvandvaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_9: ca uktam ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti. na
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_10: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā ekavat bhavati . yadā tarhi ekavacanam tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_11: napuṃsakaliṅgam prāpnoti . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_0: 743-744 kimartham idam ucyate . upasarjanasya pūrvavacanam paraprayoganivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_1: . upasarjanasya pūrvavacanam kriyate paraprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . na vā aniṣṭadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_2: . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭadarśanāt . na hi kim cit aniṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_3: dṛśyate . na hi kaḥ cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti prayoktavye puruṣarājaḥ iti prayuṅkte . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_4: ca aniṣṭam drśyete tataḥ yatnārtham syāt . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante bhavataḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_5: tatra pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhavati . rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_6: ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_7: arthābhedāt pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4394_8: upasarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_0: 744-746 kim ayam tantram taranirdeśaḥ āhosvit atantram . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tantram
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_1: dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_2: . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ prāpnoti . atha atantram mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_3: pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi. prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat na sidhyati . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_4: icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat tantram . nanu ca uktam dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_5: iti . tatra śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_6: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat alpāctaram iti tat alpāc iti vakṣyāmi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_7: vā punaḥ astu atantram . nanu ca uktam mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi.
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_8: prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat na sidhyati iti . atantre taranirdeśe śaṅkhatūṇavayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_9: mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ . atantre taranirdeśe śaṅkhatūṇavayoḥ mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_10: . śaṅkhaḥ ca tūṇavaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau . mṛdaṅgaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau ca mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_11: . rāmaḥ ca keśavaḥ ca rāmakeśavau dhanapatiḥ ca rāmakeśavau ca dhanapatirāmakeśavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_12: teṣām dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti . atha yatra bahūnām pūrvanipātaprasaṅgaḥ kim tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_13: ekasya niyamaḥ bhavati ahosvit aviśeṣeṇa . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ aniyamaḥ śeṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4398_14: . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ aniyamaḥ śeṣeṣu . paṭumṛduśuklāḥ paṭuśuklamṛdavaḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:4420_0: 751-762 anabhihite iti ucyate . kim idam anabhihitam nāma . uktam nirdiṣṭam abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_1: iti anarthāntaram . yāvat brūyāt anukte anirdiṣṭe iti tāvat anabhihite iti . anabhihitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_2: anarthakam anyatra api vihitasya abhāvāt abhihite . anabhihitavacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_3: . kim kāraṇam . anyatra api vihitasya abhāvāt abhihite . anyatra api abhihite vihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_4: na bhavati . kva anyatra . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt matvarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_5: matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ . yañañbhyām uktatvāt apatyārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_6: nyāyyotpattiḥ na bhavati . saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadamiti . samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_7: dvirvacanam na bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate citraguḥ śabalguḥ bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_8: matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati iti . astinā sāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_9: . na ca atra astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam . yat api ucyate gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_10: yañañbhyām uktatvāt apatyārthasya nyāyyotpattiḥ na bhavati iti . samarthānām prathamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_11: vā iti vartate . na ca etat samarthānām prathamam . kiṃ tarhi . dvitīyam arthamupasaṃkrāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_12: . yat api ucyate saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadam iti samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_13: na bhavati iti . yat atra vīpsāyuktam na adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_14: parvaṇi sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau aṣṭau padāni iti . śnambahujakakṣu tarhi . śnam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4421: bhinatti chinatti . śnamā uktatvāt kartṛtvasya kartari śap na bhavati . bahuc : bahukṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4422: bahubhinnam iti . bahucā uktatvāt īṣadasmāpteḥ kalpabādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . akac : uccakaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_0: nīcakaiḥ iti . akacā uktatvāt kutsādīnām kādayaḥ na bhavanti . nanu ca śnambahujakacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_1: apavādāḥ te apavādatvāt bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargāpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_2: . samānadeśaiḥ apavādaiḥ utsargāṇām bādhanam bhavati . nānādeśatvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_3: kim punaḥ iha akartavyaḥ anabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_4: kriyate . iha akartavyaḥ kriyate . eṣaḥ eva hi nyāyyaḥ pakṣaḥ yat abhihite vihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_5: na syāt . anabhitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ tasmāt anabhihitavacanam . anabhihitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_6: . kaḥ punaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ . ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu anabhihiteṣu karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_7: bhihitāḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau nimittatvāya mā bhūvan iti . tasmāt anabhihitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_8: . tasmāt anabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_9: iti . abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ . yaḥ hi manyate karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu abhihiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_10: sāmarthyāt me vibhaktīnām utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati iti prathamā tasya na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_11: kva . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ .kiṃ kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_12: kva cit prātipadikena anuktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_13: . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_14: iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti . kva . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_15: . tiṅā uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti . anabhihitādhikāram ca tvam karoṣi parigaṇanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_16: na kva cit tiṅā ekatvādīnām anabhidhānam ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_17: . nanu ca iha anabhidhānam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . atra api abhidhānam asti . katham . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_0: astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_1: . asti iti gamyate . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te karmādayaḥ vibhaktyārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_2: abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te prāpnoti . kva . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_3: śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_4: kṛtvā bhīṣādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi prāpnoti . prathamā . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_5: . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti . karoteḥ utpadyamānena ktena abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_0: karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na bhavati . kā tarhi . prathamā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_1: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi mama anabhihitādhikāraḥ asti na api parigaṇanam . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_2: me vibhaktīnām utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca sāmarthyam . kim . karmaviśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_3: . atha vā kaṭaḥ api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi iti eva siddham . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_4: vā kaṭaḥ eva karma tat sāmānādhikaraṇyāt bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_5: khalvapi viśeṣaḥ kaṭaṃ karoti bhīṣmamudāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti ca kṛtaḥ kaṭo
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_6: bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti ca . karoteḥ utpadyamānaḥ ktaḥ anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_7: sarvam karma abhidhatte . kaṭaśabdāt punaḥ utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā yat kaṭastham
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_8: karma tat śakyamabhidhātum na hi karmaviśeṣaḥ . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_9: te ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_10: . kva . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_11: . karmādiṣu api vai vibhaktyartheṣu avaśyam ekatvādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ . karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_12: evatve karmaṇaḥ dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . na ca ekatvādīnām ekatvādayaḥ santi
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_13: . atha santi mama api santi . teṣu anabhihiteṣu prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ubhayavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_14: hyete . dravyam ca āhuḥ guṇam ca . yatsthaḥ asau guṇaḥ tasya anuktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_15: iti kṛtvā prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā . saṃkhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_16: anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_17: vā vakṣyati tatra vacanagrahaṇasya prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_18: syāt iti . atha vā samayāt bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayakī na niyogataḥ anyāḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_19: bhavanti . karmādīnām abhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_20: na bhaviṣyati . evam api vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti . ekasmin api dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_21: . dvayoḥ api ekavavacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ . bahuṣu api ekavacanadvivacane prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_1: parisaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tiṅ . kriyate kaṭaḥ . kṛt . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ . taddhita . aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_2: kāpaṭavaḥ . samāsa . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_3: vibhaktivacanam . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye vibhaktiḥ vaktavyā . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_4: . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_5: dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_6: syāt . ṣaṣṭhī . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . anyāḥ api na prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_7: . kim kāraṇam . karmādīn āmabhāvāt . samayaśca kṛtaḥ ne kevalā prakṛtiḥ proktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_8: na kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . na cānyā utpadyamānā etam abhisambandham utsahante vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_9: iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . atha vā kaṭaḥ api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_10: iti eva siddham . atha vā kaṭaḥ eva karma . tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4433: 764-767 dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ kārake anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ kārake anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktiḥ na prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_0: śayane āste iti . kim kāraṇam . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam iti kṛtvā saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_1: na prāpnoti . na vā anyatareṇa anabhidhānāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyatareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_2: anabhidhānāt . anyatareṇa atra anabhidhānam . sadipratyayena bhidhānam āsipratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_3: anabhidhānam . yataḥ anabhidhānam tadāśrayā saptamī bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ na khalu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_4: sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca anabhihitāśrayā saptamī bhaviṣyati na punaḥ abhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_5: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . anabhihite hi vidhānam . anabhihite hi saptamī vidhīyate na abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_6: pratiṣedhaḥ . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_7: yatra tu khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham . āsane āste . śayane śete iti . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_8: anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca . ekasya atra āseḥ āsiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_9: sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_10: kim punaḥ dravyam sādhanam āhosvit guṇaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi dravyam sādhanam na
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_11: etat anyat bhavati abhihitāt . atha hi guṇaḥ sādhanam bhavati etat anyat abhihitāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_12: . anyaḥ hi sadiguṇaḥ anyaḥ ca āsiguṇaḥ . kiṃ punaḥ sādhanam nyāyyam . guṇaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_13: . katham jñāyate . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva devadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_14: ācaṣṭe . asau vṛkṣe iti . katarasmin . yaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . saḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_15: bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ kartā sampadyate . dravye punaḥ sādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:4434_16: sati yat karma karma eva syāt yat karaṇam karaṇam eva yat adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_1: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prathamāvidhānasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśā prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_2: . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati. sāvakāśā prathamā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . akārakam . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_3: iti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet na astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_4: api asti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_5: aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti gamyate . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate. vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_6: vā prathamābhāvaḥ. atha vā dvitīyādayaḥ kriyantām prathamā vā iti prathamā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_7: vipratiṣedhena . dvitīyādīnām avakāśaḥ kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanamdarśanīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_8: iti . prathamāyāḥ avakāśaḥ akārakam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_9: kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti . prathamā bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_10: . na sidhyati . paratvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_11: . kṛtprayoge tu param vidhānam ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpratiṣedhārtham . kṛtprayoge tu paratvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_12: tṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatpratiṣedhārtham anabhihitādhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ kaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4438_13: iti . saḥ katham kartavyaḥ . yadi ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . atha hi karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4442: 769-770 samayānikaṣāhāyogeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . samayānikaṣāhāyogeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . samayā grāmam nikaṣā grāmam . hāyoge . hā devadattam . hā yajñadattam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_2: paritaḥ grāmam . samayā grāmam . nikaṣā grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . dhik jālmam dhik
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_3: vṛṣalam . aparaḥ āha . ubhasarvatasoḥ kāryā dhiguparyādiṣu triṣu dvitīyā āmreḍitānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_4: tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate . ubhaya sarva iti etābhyām tasantābhyām dvitīyā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_5: . ubhayataḥ grāmam sarvataḥ grāmam . dhigyoge . dhik jālmam dhik vṛṣalam . uparyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_6: triṣu āmreḍitānteṣu dvitīyā vaktavyā . upari upari grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . adhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_7: adhaḥ grāmam . tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate . na devadattam pratibhāti kim cit . bubhukṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_0: 771-772 kimartham idam ucyate . tṛtīyā yathā syāt . atha dvitīyā siddhā . siddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_1: karmaṇi iti eva . tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . supām supaḥ bhavanti iti eva . asati
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_2: etasmin supām supaḥ bhavanti iti tṛtīyārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yavāgvā agnihotraṃ juhoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_3: . evam tarhi tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ iti eva . ayam agnihotraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_4: asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . tadyathā . agnihotram prajvalayati iti . asti haviṣi vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_5: . tat yathā . agnihotram juhoti iti . juhotiḥ ca asti eva prakṣepaṇe vartate asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_6: prīṇātyarthe vartate . tat yathā tāvat yavāgūśabdāt tṛtīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_7: vartate juhotiḥ ca prīṇātyarthe . tat yathā . yavāgvā agnihotram juhoti . agniṃ prīṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_8: . yadā yavāgūśabdāt dvitīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ haviṣi vartate juhotiḥ ca prakṣepaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_9: . tat yathā . yavāgūm agnihotram juhoti . yavāgūm haviḥ agnau prakṣipati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_0: 772-774 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kim te bābhravaśālaṅkāyanānām antareṇa gatena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_1: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . atha vā yadi api tāvat ayam antareṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_2: dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ ca anipātaḥ ca ayaṃ tu khalu antarāśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_3: eva . tasya asya kaḥ anyaḥ dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ nipātāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_4: tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ iti gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_6: vaktavyam . apradhāne dvīiyā bhavati iti vaktavyam . antarā tvām ca mām ca kamaṇḍaluḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_7: iti . kamaṇḍaloḥ dvitīyā mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ etābhyām kamaṇḍaloḥ yogaḥ . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_8: tat tvām ca mām ca antarā tat kamaṇḍaloḥ sthānam . tatt arhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_9: . kamaṇḍaloḥ dvitīyā kasmāt na bhavati . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_0: 774-777 atyantasaṃyoge karmavat lādyartham . atyantasaṃyoge kālādhvānau karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_1: bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . lādyartham . lādibhiḥ abhidhānam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_2: syāt . āsyate māsaḥ . śayyate krośaḥ . atha vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_3: yathā syāt . āsyate māsam . śayyate krośam . akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_4: laḥ yathā syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prākṛtameva etat karma yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_5: kaṭam karoti śakaṭam karoti iti . evam manyate . yatra kaḥ citkriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_6: upajāyate tat nyāyyam karma iti . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ upajāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_7: . na evam śakyam . iha api na syāt . ādityam paśyati . himavantam śṛṇoti . grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_8: gacchati . tasmāt prākṛtameva etat karma yathā kaṭam karoti śakaṭam karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_9: yadi tarhi prākṛtam eva etat karma akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve laḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_10: prāpnoti. āsyate māsam devadattena iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_11: iti ucyate na ca ke cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ akarmakāḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_12: ye akarmakāḥ iti . atha vā yena karmaṇā sakarmakāḥ ca akarmakāḥ ca bhavanti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_13: akarmakāṇām . na ca etena karmaṇā kaḥ cid api akarmakaḥ . atha vā yat karma bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_14: na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat karma kva cit api na bhavati . na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_15: idānīm idam sūtram vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yatra akriyayā atyantasaṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_16: tadartham . krośam kuṭilā nadī . krośam ramaṇīyā vanarājiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4459: 777 kriyāparvarge iti vaktavyam . sādhanāpavarge mā bhūt . māsam adhītaḥ anuvāko na ca anena gṛhītaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4463: 777-778 kriyāmadhye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . adya devadattaḥ bhuktvā dvyahāt bhoktā dvyahe bhoktā . kārakamadhye iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4464_0: ihasthaḥ ayam iṣvāsaḥ krośāt lakṣyam vidhyati krośe lakṣyam vidhyati . yam ca vidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4464_1: yataḥ ca vidhyati ubhayoḥ tanmadhyam bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4464_2: . na antareṇa sādhanam kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati . kriyāmadhyam cet kārakamadhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4464_3: api bhavati tatra kārakamadhye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_0: 778-779 karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam saptamīpañcamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_1: pratiṣedhārtham . karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_2: kartavyam . vṛkṣam prati vidyotate vidyut . vṛkṣam pari . vṛkṣamanu . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_3: mātaram prati . mātaram pari . mātaram anu . kim prayojanam . saptamīpañcamyoḥ pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_4: . saptamīpañcamyau mā bhūtām iti . sādhunipuṇābhyām arcāyām saptamī iti saptamī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_5: pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti pañcamī . tatra ayam api arthaḥ aprateḥ iti na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_6: bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . uktaṃ vā . kim uktam . ekatra tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_7: uktam aprateḥ iti . itaratra api yadi api tāvat ayam pariḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjane ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_8: avarjane ca ayaṃ khalu apaśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjanārthaḥ eva . tasya kaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_9: dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ varjanārthāt . tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_10: arthaḥ iti gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_0: 779-782 katham idam vijñāyate . yasya ca aiśvaryam īśvaratā īśvarabhāvaḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_1: iti . āhosvit yasya svasya īśvaraḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_2: viśeṣaḥ . yasya ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet avacanāt siddham . yasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_3: īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet antareṇa vacanam siddham . adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_4: . ādhṛtāḥ te tasmin bhavanti . satyam evam etat . nityam parigrahītavyam parigrahītradhīnam
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_5: bhavati . prathamānupapattiḥ tu . prathamā na upapadyate . kutaḥ . pañcālebhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_6: kā tarhi syāt . ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyau . svāmīśvarādhipati iti . na tatra adhiśabdaḥ paṭhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_7: . yadi api na paṭhyate adhiḥ īśvaravācī . na tatra paryāyavacanānām grahaṇam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4472_8: jñāyate . yat ayam kasya cit paryāyavacanasya grahaṇam karoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4473_0: adhipatidāyāda iti . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4473_1: . dvitīyā tarhi prāpnoti karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . saptamyā uktatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4473_2: abhisambandhasya dvitīyā na bhaviṣyati . bhavet yaḥ adheḥ brahamadattasya ca abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4473_3: saḥ saptamyā uktaḥ syāt . yaḥ tu khalu adheḥ pañcālānām ca abhisambandhaḥ tatra dvitīyā

GS24pmbhasuu:4533_0: 801 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . ṣaṣṭhī ataspratyayena iti ucyamāne iha eva syāt . dakṣiṇato
GS24pmbhasuu:4533_1: grāmasya uttarato grāmasya iti . iha na syāt . upari grāmasya upariṣṭāt grāmasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4533_2: iti . arthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe ataspratyayena ca siddham bhavati yaḥ ca anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4533_3: tena samānārthaḥ . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . prāk grāmāt pratyak
GS24pmbhasuu:4533_4: grāmāt . añcūttarapadasya api etat prayojanam uktam . tatra anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4537_0: 801-803 pṛthagādiṣu pañcamīvidhānam . pṛthagādiṣu pañcamīvidheyā . pṛthak devadattāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4537_1: . kimartham na prakṛtam pañcamīgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . apādāne pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:4537_2: iti. anadhikārāt . anadhikāraḥ saḥ . adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4537_3: . adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . dakṣiṇena grāmam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_0: dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . evam tarhi anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasāmarthyāt pañcamī bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_1: . asti anyat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . yasyām na aprāptāyām tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_2: ārabhyate sā yathā syāt . kasyām ca na aprāptāyām . antataḥ ṣaṣṭhyām . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_3: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . apādāne pañcamī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_4: . nanu ca uktam anadhikāraḥ saḥ adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_5: evam tarhi sambandham anuvartiṣyate . apādāne pañcamī . anyārāditarartedikśabdāñcūttarapadājāhiyukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_6: pañcamī . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena anyārādibhiḥ yoge pañcamī . enapā dvitīyā anyārādibhiryoge
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_7: pañcamī . pṛthagvinānānābhiḥ tṛtīyā anyatarasyām . pañcamīgrahaṇam anuvartate anyārādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_8: yoge iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . tat. yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_9: utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_10: apavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya . anyasyā vibhakteḥ vacanāt cakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_11: anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtāyaḥ pañcamyāḥ dvitīyāṣaṣṭhyau bādhike bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_12: yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā vakṣyati etat . anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_13: ca nāma vidhayaḥ . na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi . yatnāt bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4542_1: pañcamīvidhāne tadyuktātpañcamyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dūrād grāmasya . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4542_2: tatra api darśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . na vā tatra api darśanāt pañcamyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4542_3: anarthakaḥ . tatra api pañcamī dṛśyate . dūrāt āvasathāt mūtram dūrāt pādāvasecanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4542_4: dūrāt ca bhāvyam dasyubhyaḥ dūrāt ca kupitāt guroḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_0: 804-806 saptamīvidhāne ktasya inviṣayasya karmaṇi upsaṅkhyānam . saptamīvidhāne ktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_1: inviṣayasya karmaṇi upsaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . adhītī vyākaraṇe . parigaṇitī yājñikye
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_2: . āmnātī cchandasi . sādhvasādhuprayoge ca . sādhvasādhuprayoge ca saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_3: . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātari . asādhuḥ pitari . kārakārhāṇām ca kārakatve . kārakārhāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_4: ca kārakatve saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu bhuñjāneṣu daridrāḥ āsate . brāhmaṇeṣu taratsu
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_5: vṛṣalāḥ āsate . akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve . akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_6: . mūrkheṣu āsīneṣu vṛddhāḥ bhuñjate . vṛṣaleṣu āsīneṣu brāhmaṇāḥ taranti . tadviparyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_7: ca . tadviparyāse ca saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu āsīneṣu mūrkhāḥ bhuñjate . brāhmaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_8: āsīneṣu vṛṣalāḥ taranti . nimittāt karmasaṃyoge . nimittātkarmasaṃyoge saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_9: . carmaṇi dvīpinam hanti . dantayoḥ hanti kuñjaram . keṣeṣu camarīm hanti . sīmni puṣkalakaḥ hataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_0: 806-807 bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam . bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_1: abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . agniṣu hūyamāneṣu prasthitaḥ huteṣu āgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_2: . goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_3: hi nāma tat bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt ca asau katham cit agniṣu hūyamāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_4: prasthitaḥ huteṣu āgataḥ goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_5: bhāvapravṛttau yasya bhāvārambhavacanāt . siddhametat . katham . yasya bhāvapravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_6: dvitīyaḥ bhāvaḥ ārabhyate tatra saptamī vaktavyā . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_7: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_8: upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na khalu avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_9: punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt api yat nimittatvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_10: . tat yathā . api bhavān kamaṇḍalupāṇim chātram adrākṣīt iti . sakṛt asau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_11: dṛṣṭaḥ chātraḥ . tasya tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4554_0: 807 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kṛṣṇā gavām sampannakṣīratamā iti . vibhakte iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4554_1: . na ca etat vibhaktam . vibhaktametat . gobhyaḥ kṛṣṇā vibhajyate . vibhaktam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4554_2: yat nityam tatra bhavitavyam . na ca etat nityam vibhaktam . kim vaktavyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4554_3: na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . vibhaktagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat vibhaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4554_4: ca avibhaktam ca tatra syāt vibhāktagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4558: 808 apratyādibhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātaram pari . mātaram anu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4562: 808 prasitaḥ iti ucyate kaḥ prasitaḥ nāma . yaḥ tatra nityam pratibaddhaḥ . kutaḥ etat . sinotiḥ ayam badhnātyarthe vartate . baddhaḥ iva asau tatra bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4564: KA_I,460.2 Ro_II,808 iha kasmāt na bhavati . adya puṣyaḥ . adya maghā iti . adhikaraṇe iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_0: 809-814 prātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti āpi yathā syāt . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_1: atra prathamayā prārthyate . padatvam . na etat asti .ṣaṣṭhyā atra padatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam . grāmaḥ ucaiḥ te svam . grāmaḥ uccaiḥ tava svam . sapūrvāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_3: prathamāyāḥ vibhāṣā iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ yathā syāt . atha liṅgagrahaṇam kimartham . strī
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_4: pumān napuṃsakam iti ata api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . eṣaḥ eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_5: prātipadikārthaḥ . idam tarhi . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti . atha parimāṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_6: kimartham . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti atra api yathā syāt . atha vacanagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_7: . iha samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_8: . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_9: dṛṣṭānte yatra etāni samuditāni bhavanti tatra eva syāt . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_10: . iha na syāt . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . pratyekam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_11: vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_12: tarhi prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_13: . atha mātragrahaṇam kimartham . etanmātre eva prathamā yathā syāt karmādiviśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_14: mā bhūt iti . kaṭam karoti . na etat asti prayojanam . karmādiṣu dvitīyādyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_15: tāḥ karmādiviśiṣṭe bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na karmādiviśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_16: prathamā bhavati iti yat ayam sambodhane prathamām śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_17: . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . sā āmantritam iti vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_18: yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti . itarathā hi sambodhane āmantritam iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_19: . idam tarhi ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_20: vacanagrahaṇasya api etat prayojanam uktam . anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_2: padasāmānādhikaraṇye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vīraḥ puruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_3: na sidhyati . adhikatvāt . vyatiriktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_4: . katham vyatiriktiḥ . puruṣe vīratvam . na vā vākyārthatvāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_5: kim kāraṇam . vākyārthatvāt . yat atra ādhikyam vākyārthaḥ saḥ . atha vā abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_6: prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariyṣyate . abhihitalakṣaṇāyām anabhihite prathamāvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_7: . abhihitalakṣaṇāyāmanabhihite prathamā vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . uktam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_8: kim uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_9: plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . abhihitānabhihite prathamābhāvaḥ . abhihitānabhhite
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_10: prathamā prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste . śayane āste . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_11: iti kṛtvā prathamā prāpnoti . evam tarhi tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_12: kariṣyate . tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamāvidhiḥ . tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_13: iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamā vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣa iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_14: uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_15: plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ tayoḥ apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_16: . śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ . kva . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_17: . kim kāraṇam . tayoḥ apavādatvāt . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau . tau ca atra bādhakau
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_18: . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_19: utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_20: atra kadā cit tiṅādeśo bhavati . apavādau tāvat śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate . pākṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_21: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe . śatṛśānacoḥ dvaitam bhavati . aprathamā vā vidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_22: āśrīyate prathamā vā pratiṣedhena iti . vibhaktiniyame ca api dvaitam bhavati . vibhaktiniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_23: vā syāt arthaniyamaḥ vā iti . tat yadā tāvat arthaniyamaḥ aprathamā ca vidhinā āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_24: tadā eṣa doṣaḥ bhavati . yadā hi vibhaktiniyamaḥ yadi eva aprathamā vidhinā āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4572_25: atha api prathamā pratiṣedhena na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_0: 819-825 śeṣe iti ucyate. kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . karmādibhyaḥ ye anye arthāḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_1: yadi evam śeṣaḥ na prakalpate . na hi karmādibhyaḥ anye arthāḥ santi . iha tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_2: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti rājā kartā puruṣaḥ sampradānam . vṛkṣasya śākhā iti vṛkṣaḥ śākhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_3: adhikaraṇam . tathā yat etat svam nāma caturbhiḥ etat prakāraiḥ bhavati krayaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_4: apaharaṇāt yāñcāyāḥ vinimayāt iti . atra ca sarvatra karmādayaḥ santi. evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_5: karmādīnām avivakṣā śeṣaḥ . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_6: bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_7: . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam . pratyayāvadhāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_8: śeṣavacanam . pratyayāvadhāraṇāt śeṣavacanam kartavyam . pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_9: aniyatāḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam ṣaṣṭhīniyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_10: śeṣe eva ṣaṣṭhī bhavati na anyatra iti . arthāvadhāraṇāt vā . atha vā arthāḥ niyatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_11: pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ te śeṣe api prāpnuvanti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣaniyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_12: . śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī eva bhavati na anyā iti . arthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_13: katham . arthāḥ niyatāḥ pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhī bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_14: tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . yatra ṣaṣṭhī ca anyā ca prāpnoti ṣaṣṭhī eva tatra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_15: iti . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti cet viśeṣyasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti cet viśeṣyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_16: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti atra rājā viśeṣaṇam puruṣaḥ viśeṣyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_17: tatra prātipadikārthaḥ vyatiriktaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti . tatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_18: syāt . tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tatra prathamāvidhiḥ . tatra ṣaṣṭhīm pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_19: prathamā vidheyā . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kimuktam . na vā vākyārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_20: iti . yadatrādikhyam vākyārthaḥ saḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat puruṣe yat ādikhyam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_21: vākyārthaḥ iti na punaḥ rājani yat ādhikyam saḥ vākyārthaḥ syāt . antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_22: rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . na punaḥ antareṇa rājaśabdaprayogam puruṣe saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_23: gamyate . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . rājaśabdāt hi bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_24: ṣaṣṭhīm uccārayati. aṅga hi bhavān puruṣaśabdāt api uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_25: . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma arthena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_26: . arthakṛtena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām :
GS24pmbhasuu:4577: artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . kim punaḥ tat . svāmitvam . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ tat . svakṛtam . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4578_0: prātipadikārthānām kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ upajāyante tatkṛtāḥ ca ākhyāḥ prādurbhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4578_1: karma karaṇam apādānaṃ sampradānam adhikaraṇam iti . tāḥ ca punaḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau

GS24pmbhasuu:4578_3: upādīyante . yadā vyabhicaranti prātipadikārtham . yadā hi na vyabhicaranti ākhyābhūtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4578_4: eva tadā bhavanti karma karaṇam apādānam sampradānam adhikaraṇam iti . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4578_5: tarhi rājani svakṛtam svāmitvam tatra ṣaṣṭhī evam puruṣe api svāmikṛtam svatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4578_6: tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . rājaśabdāt utpadyamānayā ṣaṣṭhyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti

GS24pmbhasuu:4578_8: rājā iti . bhavati . rājaśabdāt tu tadā prathamā . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4579: rājñaḥ puruṣasya iti . bhavati . bāhyam artham abhisamīkṣya .

GS24pmbhasuu:4584_1: karma iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . avivakṣite

GS24pmbhasuu:4604_0: 831-836 kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_1: ṣaṣṭhīvidhāne kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam lapratiṣedhāt . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīvidhāne kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_2: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . lapratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate tatra ṣaṣthī laprayoge na
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_3: iti . tasya karmakartrartham tarhi kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_4: tatra yathā syāt . anyasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_5: . dhātoḥ hi dvaye pratyayāḥ vidhīyante tiṅaḥ ca kṛtaḥ ca . tatra kṛtprayoge iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_6: tiṅprayoge pratiṣidhyate . na brūmaḥ ihārtham tasya karmakartrartham kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_7: kartavyam iti . kim tarhi . uttarārtham . avyayaprayoge na iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_8: vakṣyati . saḥ kṛtaḥ avyayasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . akṛtaḥ avyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_9: ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . uccaiḥ kaṭānām sraṣṭā iti . tasya karmakartrartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_10: iti cet pratiṣedhe api tadantakarmakartṛtvāt siddham . kṛtaḥ ete kartṛkarmaṇī na
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_11: avyayasya . adhikaraṇam atra avyayam . idam tarhi prayojanam . ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_12: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . kṛtoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_13: ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . āścaryam idam vṛttam odanasya ca nāma pākaḥ brāhmaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_14: ca prādurbhāvaḥ iti . atha kriyamāṇe api kṛdgrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_15: ubhayaprāptau iti na evam vijñāyate ubhayoḥ prāptiḥ ubhayaprāptiḥ ubhayaprāptau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_16: . katham tarhi . ubhayoḥ prāptiḥ yasmin kṛti saḥ ayam ubhayaprāptiḥ kṛt ubhayaprāptau
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_17: iti . atha vā kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . taddhitasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_18: tatra mā bhūt iti . kṛtapūrvī kaṭam . bhuktapūrvī odanam iti . nanu ca vākyena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_19: anena na bhavitavyam . dvitīyayā tāvat na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . ktena abhihitam

GS24pmbhasuu:4604_21: . katham asamārthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yat tāvat ucyate dvitīyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_22: tāvat na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . ktena abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā iti . yaḥ asau
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_23: kṛtakaṭayoḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ saḥ utpanne pratyaye nivartate . asti ca karoteḥ kaṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_24: sāmarthyam iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate inipratyayena ca api na
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_25: utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asamārthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_26: bhavati iti . na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca pratyayaḥ ca . yadā vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_27: na tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ . tatra avaśyaṃ viśeṣārthinā
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_28: viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . kṛtapūrvī . kim . kaṭam . bhuktapūrvī . kim . odanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_29: . atha vā idam prayojanam kartṛbhūtapūrvamātrāt api ṣaṣṭhīyathā syāt . bhedikā devadattasya

GS24pmbhasuu:4621: anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti . yadi evam uttaratra cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti . idam aheḥ sṛptam ,

GS24pmbhasuu:4631_0: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aliṭam liṭ iti āha . liḍvat iti vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_1: . ukāraprayoge na iti vaktavyam . kaṭam cikīrṣuḥ . odanam bubhukṣuḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_2: . na vaktavyam . ukāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . katham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . u
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_3: uka ūka la ūka loka iti . ukapratiṣedhe kameḥ bhāṣāyām apratiṣedhaḥ . ukapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_4: kameḥ bhāṣāyām pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . dasyāḥ kāmukaḥ . vṛṣalyāḥ kāmukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_5: . avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_6: na bhavati iti vaktavyam . purā sūryasya udetoḥ ādheyaḥ . purā vatsānām apākartoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_7: . purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ virapśin . śānaṃścānaśśatṝṛṇām upasaṅkhyānam . śānaṃścānaśśatṝṛṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_8: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . somam pavamānaḥ . naḍam āghnānaḥ . adhīyan pārāyaṇam .

GS24pmbhasuu:4631_10: . katham . tṛn iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_11: saṃniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛ iti ataḥ prabhṛti ā tṛnaḥ nakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_12: caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya dviṣan atra api prāpnoti . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam . dviṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_13: śatuḥ vā iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyaṃ vaktavyam pratyayagrhaṇe sati pratiṣedhārtham

GS24pmbhasuu:4635_0: 840-841 akasya bhaviṣyati . akasya bhaviṣyati iti vaktavyam . yavān lāvakaḥ vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_1: . odanam bhojakaḥ vrajati . saktūnpāyakaḥ vrajati . inaḥ ādhamarṇye ca . tataḥ inaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_2: ādhamarṇye ca bhaviṣyati ca iti vaktavyam . śatam dāyī . sahasram dāyī . grāmam gāmī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_0: 841-842 kartṛgrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇi mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_1: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante ṭatra kṛtyaiḥ abhihitatvāt karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_2: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bhavyādīnām karmaṇaḥ anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_3: . bhavyādīnām karma kṛtyaiḥ anabhitam . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . bhavyādīnam karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_4: anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam kriyate . kim ucyate bhavyādīnām karma kṛtyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_5: anabhitam iti . na iha api anabhihitaṃ bhavati . ākraṣṭavyā grāṃam śākhā iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_6: tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . kṛtyānām . kṛtyānām prayoge ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_7: . kim udāharaṇam . grāmam ākraṣṭavyā śākhā . tataḥ kartari vā iti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_8: prāpnoti . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti . ubhayaprāptau iti vartate . nanu ca ubhayaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_9: eṣā . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti ca geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti ca bhavati . ubhayaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_10: nāma sā bhavati yatra ubhayasya yugapatprasaṅgaḥ atra ca yadā karmaṇi na tadā kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_11: yadā kartari na tadā karmaṇi iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_0: 843 - 846 kimartham idam ucyate . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_1: ca dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpattiḥ bhavati . kim idam pratyadhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_2: iti . adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇam prati pratyadhikaraṇam . saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_3: . saṅkhyayā bahvarthayā ca asya sāmānādhikaraṇyam . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_4: saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_5: ca ekavacanam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_6: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra anuprayogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_7: ekavacanābhāvaḥ advigutvāt . tatra anuprayogasya ekavacanam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4644_0: pañcapūlī iyam iti . kim kāraṇam . advigutvāt . dvigoḥ ekavacanm iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4644_1: ca atra anuprayogaḥ dvigusañjñaḥ . siddham tu dvigvarthasya ekavadvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4644_2: etat . katham . dvigvarthaḥ ekavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4644_3: na vaktavyam . na idam pāṛibhāṣikasya vacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4644_4: . ucyate vacanam . ekasya arthasya vacanam ekavacanam . ekaśeṣapratiṣedhaḥ ca . ekaśeṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4644_5: ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4644_6: vā anyasya anekatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyasya anekatvāt . na etat
