GS24pmbhasuu:4780_15: ucyate astriyām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : āṅgyaḥ striyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_0: vāṅgyaḥ striyaḥ iti . yasya punaḥ bahuvacane parataḥ luk ucyate tasya īkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_1: na bhaviṣyati . yasya api bahuvacane parataḥ luk ucyate tena api astriyām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_2: āmbaṣṭhyāḥ striyaḥ sauvīryāḥ striyaḥ iti evamartham . atra api cāpā vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_3: ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavhadānam . ekādeśaḥ pūvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_4: vyavadhānam eva . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam . dvandve abahuṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . gargavatsavājāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_5: iti . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_6: bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_7: māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_8: . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_9: . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_10: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_11: baidayoḥ vā bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_12: mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_13: śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na vā sarveṣām dvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_14: bahvarthatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarveṣām dvandve bahvarthatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_15: sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni . katham . yugapat adhikaraṇavivakṣāyām dvandvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_16: . tataḥ ayam āha yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk . yadi sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_17: aham api idam acodyam codye . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam iti . mama api sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_18: bahuvacanam param bhavati . luke kṛte na prāpnoti . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_19: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na lumatā āṅgasya iti vakṣyāmi . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_20: ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . pañcabhiḥ gārgībhiḥ krītaḥ paṭaḥ pañcagārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_21: daśagārgyaḥ iti . iṣtam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . pañcagargaḥ daśagargaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_22: . tathā idam aparam acodyam codye . gargarūpyam gargamayam . atra api bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_23: iti eva siddham katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate . sāmarthyam ca subantena
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_24: . tataḥ ayam āha yasya prtayayārthabahutve luk . yadi samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_25: aham api idam acodyam codye . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_26: dvyekayoḥ aluk iti . katham . yasya api bahuvacane parataḥ luk tena api atra aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_27: vaktavyaḥ . tasya api hi atra bahuvacanam param bhavati . na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_28: evam aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca uktam pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_29: . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_0: vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā idam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_1: . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_2: hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ atra api aluk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_3: . astu . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk bhaviṣyati . punaḥ aluk kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_4: bhavati . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya aluk ucyate na ca tat samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_5: prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_6: ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharadvājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā bhṛgvaṅgirasikā kutsakuśikā
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_7: iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā kriyate . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_8: . etasya eva dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati na anyasya iti . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_9: ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ iti . mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_10: evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yatbahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_11: evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_12: kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca etat laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_13: gotram . yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk samāsabahutve tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_14: eva cet kṛtam bahutvam iti vā vaktavyam . yasya pratyayārthabahutve luk tena astriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_15: iti vaktavyam . yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk tasya ayam adhikaḥ doṣaḥ atraḥ iti udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_16: prāpnoti . tasmāt pratyayārthabahutve luk iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān . atha iha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_17: bhavitavyam . gārgī ca bātsyaḥ ca iti . yadi tāvat astri vidhinā āśrīyate asti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_18: astrī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam lukā . atha strī pratiṣedhena āśrīyate asti atra strī
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_19: iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena . kim punaḥ atra arthasatattvam . devāḥ etat jñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_20: arhanti . atha yaḥ lopyalopinām samāsaḥ tatra katham bhavitavyam . ubhayam hi dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_21: . śaradvat śunakadarbhāt bhruguvat sāgrāyaṇeṣu na udāttasvaritodayam agārgyakāśyapagālavānām iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:4834_2: yogavibhāgaḥ . pañcamyāḥ ampratiṣedhārtham . pañcamyāḥ amaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4834_3: . ekayoge hi ubhayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ekayoge hi sati ubhayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt amaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4834_4: alukaḥ ca . saḥ tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . tuḥ niyāmakaḥ . tuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4834_5: kriyate . sa niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati . am eva apañcamyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4838_0: 903-904 ami pañcamīpratiṣedhe apādānagrahaṇam . ami pañcamīpratiṣedhe apādānagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4838_1: kartavyam . apādānapañcamyāḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4838_2: apratiṣedhārtham . karmapravacanīyayukte mā bhūt . āpāṭaliputram vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4838_3: vā uttarapadasya karmapravacanīyayogāt samāsāt pañcamyabhāvaḥ . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4838_4: kim kāraṇam . uttarapadam atra karmapravacanīyayuktam . uttarapadasya karmapravacanīyayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4838_5: samāsāt pañcamī na bhaviṣyati . yadā ca samāsaḥ karmapravacanīyayuktaḥ bhavati tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4838_6: pratiṣedhaḥ . tat yathā . ā upakumbhāt ā upamaṇikāt iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:4846_0: 905-907 ṭitām ṭeḥ evidheḥ luṭaḥ ḍāraurasaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . ṭitām ṭeḥ evidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_1: luṭaḥ ḍāraurasaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṭeḥ etvasya avakāśaḥ pacate pacete
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_2: pacante . ḍāraurasām avakāśaḥ śvaḥ kartā śvaḥ kartārau śvaḥ kartāraḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_3: prāpnoti . śvaḥ adhetā śvaḥ adhyetārau śvaḥ adhyetāraḥ . ḍāraurasaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_4: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ātmanepadānām ca iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_5: siddham . ātmanepadānām ca ḍāraurasaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . tat ca samasaṅkhyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_6: . tat ca avaśyam ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātanudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_7: yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi ātmanepadagrahaṇe śaṭ sthāninaḥ trayaḥ ādeśāḥ . vaiṣamyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_8: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . pūrvavipratiṣedhārthena tāvat na arthaḥ ātmanepadagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_9: . idam iha sampradhāryam . ḍāraurasaḥ kriyantām ṭeḥ etvam iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_10: . paratvāt etvam . nityāḥ ḍāraurasaḥ . kṛte api etve prapnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_11: . ṭeḥ etvam api nityam . kṛteṣu api ḍāraurassu prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityam
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_12: etvam . anyasya kṛteṣu ḍāraurassu prāpnoti anyasya akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_13: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ḍāraurasaḥ api anityāḥ . anyasya kṛte etve prāpnuvanti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_14: akṛte . śabdāntarasya prāpnuvantaḥ anityā bhavanti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt etvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_15: . etve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt ḍāraurasaḥ bhaviṣyanti . samasaṅkhyārthena ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_16: na arthaḥ ātmanepadagrahaṇena . sthāne antaramena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_17: . arthataḥ . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_18: atha vā ādeśāḥ api ṣaṭ eva nirdiśyante . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_19: ayam . atha etasmin ekaśeṣanirdeśe sati kim ayam kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ . ḍā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_20: ḍā ca ḍā rau ca rau ca rau raḥ ca raḥ ca raḥ. ḍā ca rau ca raḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_21: . āhosvit kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ . ḍā ca rau ca raḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ . ḍāraurasaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_22: ḍāraurasaḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ aniṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_23: samasaṅkhyaḥ prāpnoti ekavacanadvivacanayoḥ ḍā prāpnoti . bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_24: rau prāpnoti dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ ca raḥ prāpnoti . atha kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_25: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ubhayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_26: āha . ubhayam hi dṛśyate . bahu śaktikiṭakam bahūni śaktikiṭakāni bahu sthālīpiṭharam
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_27: bahūni sthālīpiṭharāni . ḍāraurasaḥ kṛte ṭeḥ e yathāt dvitvam prasāraṇe samasṅkhyena
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_28: na artha asti . siddham sthāne arthataḥ antarāḥ . āntaryataḥ vyavasthā . trayaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4846_29: ime bhavantu sarveṣām . ṭeḥ etvam ca paratvāt kṛte api tasmin ime santu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4850_0: 907-911 ḍāvikārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . ḍāvikāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4850_1: . sarvādeśārtham . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4850_2: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antasya prasajyeta . nighātaprasaṅgaḥ tu . nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4850_3: tu prapnoti . śvaḥ kartā . tāseḥ param lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4850_4: svaraḥ prāpnoti . yat tāvat ucyate ḍāvikārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4850_5: alaḥ antyavikārāt . siddham etat . katham .alaḥ antyavikārāt . astu ayam alaḥ antyasya . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_0: kartā . ḍiti ṭeḥ lopāt lopaḥ . ḍiti ṭeḥ lopena lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . abhatvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_1: . ḍitkaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati . anittvāt vā . atha vā anittvāt etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_2: kim idam anittvāt iti . antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyām pratyayasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_3: itsañjñā na . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na . asati lope anekāl . yada anekāl tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_4: sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_5: itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . praśliṣṭanirdeśāt vā . atha vā praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . ḍā
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_6: ā ḍā . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadā tarhi ayam antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_7: sthāne bhavati tadā tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam na prāpnoti . tiṅgrahaṇam ekadeśavikṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_8: ananyatvāt . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_9: svaraḥ katham . svare vipratiṣedhāt siddham . ḍāraurasaḥ kriyantām anudāttatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_10: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt anudāttatvam . nityāḥ ḍāraurasaḥ . kṛte api anudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_11: prapnuvanti akṛte api prapnuvanti . anudāttatvam api nityam . kṛteṣu kṛteṣu api ḍāraurassu
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_12: prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityam anudāttatvam . anyasya kṛteṣu ḍāraurassu
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_13: prāpnoti anyasya akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ḍāraurasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_14: api anityāḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte anudāttatve prāpnuvanti anyathāsvarasya akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_15: . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvantaḥ anityāḥ bhavanti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_16: . anudāttatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñātāt ḍāraurasaḥ . ṭilope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_17: siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgatvāt ḍāraurasaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_18: ḍāraurassu kṛteṣu anudāttatvam kriyatām ṭilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_19: ṭilopena bhavitavyam . evam tarhi svare vipratiṣedhāt siddham . nyāyyaḥ eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_20: svare vipratiṣedhaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam . anudāttatvam kriyatām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_21: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt anudāttatvam . anudāttatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_22: udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ bhaviṣyati . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yat pit vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_23: yat apit vacanam tatra na sidhyati . tatra api siddham . katham idam adya lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_24: pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_25: apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_26: abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat kadā cit pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādam lasārvadhātukanudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_27: pratīkṣate . tatra anudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_28: asau avidyamānodāttatve anudātte udāttaḥ lupyate . pratyayasvarāpavādaḥ lasārvadhātukānudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_29: . tena tatra na prasaktaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ kadā cit . pratyayasvaraḥ tu tāseḥ vṛttisanniyogaśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4851_30: . tena ca api asau udāttaḥ lopsyate . tathā na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_0: 3-12 adhikāreṇa iyam pratyayasañjñā kriyate . sā prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_1: . tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakṛti . guptijkibhyaḥ san . upapada . stambakarṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_2: ramajapoḥ . upādhi . harateḥ dṛtināthayoḥ paśau . eteṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_3: kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api pratyayasañjñā syāt . paratvam ādyudāttatvam aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_4: iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratyayādhikāre prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_5: apratiṣedhaḥ . adhikāreṇa api pratyayasañjñāyām satyām prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_6: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . pratyayasañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . nimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_7: nimittikāryārthatvāt anyatra api . nimittāni hi nimittikāryārthāni bhavanti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_8: punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . prakṛtyupapaopādhayaḥ nimittam pratyayaḥ nimittī
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_9: . anyatra api ca eṣaḥ nyāyaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ . kva anyatra . loke . tat yathā . bahuṣu āsīneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_10: kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . katamaḥ devadattaḥ . kataraḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_11: ācaṣṭe . yaḥ aśve yaḥ pīṭhe iti ukte nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt adhyavasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_12: ayam devadattaḥ ayam yajñdatta iti . na idānīm aśvasya pīṭhasya vā devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_13: sañjñā bhavati . kim punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . nirjñātaḥ arthaḥ nimittam anirjñātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_14: nimittī . iha ca pratyayaḥ anirjñātaḥ prakṛtyupapadopādhayaḥ nirjñātāḥ . kva . dhātūpadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_15: prātipadikopadeśe ca . te nirjñātāḥ nimittatvena upādīyante . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_16: vā siddham . atha vā pradhāne kāryasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim ca pradhānam . pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_17: . tat yathā . bahuṣu yātsu kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kaḥ yāti iti . saḥ āha rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_18: iti . rājā iti ukte pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt yaḥ pṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_19: sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ prādhānyam . arthakṛtam . yathā punaḥ loke
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_20: arthakṛtam prādhānyam śabdasya idānīm kiṅkṛtam prādhānyam . śabdasya apūrvopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_21: prādhānyam . yasya apūrvopadeśaḥ saḥ pradhānam . prakṛtyupapadopādhayaḥ ca upadiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_22: . kva . dhātūpadeśe prātipadikopadeśe ca . yadi eva nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_23: atha api pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām na bhavati vikārāgamānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_24: tu prāpnoti . hanaḥ ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . eteṣām hi apūrvopadeśāt prādhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_25: . nimittinaḥ ca ete . vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt . vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_26: pratyayasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bahvati iti ucyate . na ca vikārāgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_27: pare sambhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samāne apūrvopadeśe pratyayaḥ paraḥ vikārāgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_28: na pare . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ca tadyuktatvāt . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣtam vikārāgamayuktam pañcamīnirdṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_29: ca pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ tu . pratyayavidhiḥ tu na upapapdyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_30: . kva . yatra vikārāgamāḥ vidhīyante . hanaḥ ta ca . tarpujatunoḥ ṣuk . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_31: kāraṇam na sidhyati . vikārāgamayuktatvāt apañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt ca . tasmāt tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_32: pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_33: iha tāvat hanaḥ te iti . dhātoḥ iti vartate. iha trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_34: iti vartate . yadi evam hanaḥ ta ca dhātoḥ kyap bhavati iti dhātumātrāt kyap prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_35: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dhātumātrāt kyap bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_36: etistuśasvṛdṛjuṣaḥ kyap iti parigaṇanam karoti . atha vā hantim eva atra dhātugrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_37: abhisambhantsyāmaḥ . hanaḥ taḥ bhavati . dhātoḥ kyap bhavati . kasmāt . hanteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_38: . arthāśrayatvāt vā . atha vā arthāśrayaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ . yaḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_39: saḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_40: iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_41: hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_42: yathā vijñāyeta . pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ . yadi pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ avikādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_43: pratyayasañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi te kim cit pratyāyayanti . evam tarhi pratyāyyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_44: pratyayaḥ iti . evam api sanādīnām na prāpnoti . evam tari ubhayasādhanaḥ ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4856_0: karmasādhanaḥ ca . evam api kutaḥ etat samāne apūrvopadeśe trāpuṣam jātuṣam iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4856_1: akāraḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati na punaḥ ṣakāraḥ iti . anyatra api akāreṇa tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4856_2: arthasya vacanāt manyāmahe akāraḥ tam artham sampratyāyayatina ṣakāraḥ iti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:4860: 12-19 kimartham idam ucyate . paraḥ yathā syāt . pūrvaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati pūrvam āha tam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4861: vibhāṣā supaḥ bahuc purastāt tu iti . madhye tarhi mā bhūt iti . madhye api yam icchati āha tam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_0: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_1: vacanam paraḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti nā arthaḥ paravacanena . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_2: deśaḥ niyamyate te eva niyatadeśāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ idānīm aniyatadeśaḥ saḥ kadā cit pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_3: kadā cit paraḥ kadā cit madhye syāt . tat yathā mātuḥ vatsaḥ kadā cit agrataḥ kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_4: cit pṛṣṭhataḥ kadā cit pārśvataḥ bhavati . paraḥ eva yathā syāt iti evamartham paravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_5: . paravacanam anarthakam pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya . paragrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_6: kim kāraṇam . pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_7: apaḥ īt . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sataḥ tatra parasya kāryam ucyate . iha idānīm kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_8: sataḥ parasya kāryam bhavitum arhati . iha api sataḥ eva. katham . paratvam svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_9: . atha vācanike paratve sati arthaḥ syāt paragrahaṇena . vācanike ca na arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_10: etat hi tasya parasya kāryam yat asau paraḥ syāt . atha vā yat asya parasya sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_11: sañjñā syāt . yatra tarhi pañcamī na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kva ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_12: pañcamī na asti . yatra vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante . kva ca vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante . hanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_13: ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . vikārāgameṣu ca uktam . kim uktam . pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_14: tu . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham iti . atyantāparadṛṣṭānām vā parabhūtalopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_15: . atyantāparadṛṣṭānām tarhi parabhūtalopārtham paragrahaṇam kartavyam . ye ete atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_16: kvibādayaḥ lupyante teṣām parabhūtānām lopaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_17: kim punaḥ atyantāparadṛṣṭānām parabhūtalopavacane prayojanam . kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_18: yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_19: parabhūtāḥ lupyante iti yat ayam teṣu kādīn anubandhān āsajati . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_20: . anubandhāsañjane etat prayojanam kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi yathā syuḥ iti . yadi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_21: atra atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ parabhūtāḥ lupyantetataḥ anubandhāsañjanam arthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_22: . prayoganiyamārtham vā . prayoganiyamārtham tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam . parabhūtānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_23: prayogaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt iti . asti punaḥ kim cit aniṣṭam yadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_24: niyamaḥ syāt . asti iti āha . prakṛteḥ arthābhidhāne pratyayādarśanāt . prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_25: arthābhidhāne apratyayikāḥ dṛśyante . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ babhruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_26: maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavyaḥ lāmakāyanaḥ iti prayoktavye babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_27: lamakaḥ iti prayujyate . dvayasajādīnām ca kevaladṛṣṭatvāt . dvayasajādīnām ca kevalānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_28: prayogaḥ dṛśyate . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . dvayasajādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_29: vai vṛttijasadṛśāḥ avṛttijāḥ yathā bahuḥ tathā . vāvacane ca anutpattyartham . vāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_30: ca anutpattyartham paragrahaṇam kartavyam . vā vacanena anutpattiḥ yathā syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_31: kriyamāṇe api vai paragrahaṇe katham iva vāvacanena anutpattiḥ labhyā . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_32: paragrahaṇe vāvacanena vā paraḥ iti etat abhisambadhyate . akriyamāṇe punaḥ paragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_33: vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_34: bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . vāvacane ca uktam . kim uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_35: nityatvāt sanaḥ iti . prayoganiyamārtham eva tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_36: etasmin prayoganiyame sati kim ayam pratyayahiyamaḥ . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_37: prayoktavyaḥ aprakṛtiparaḥ na iti . āhosvit prakṛtiniyamaḥ . pratyayaparā eva prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_38: prayoktavyā apratyayā na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame prkṛtiniyamābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_39: . tatra pratyayaniyame sati prkṛtiniyamaḥ na prāpnoti . apratyayikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_40: prāpnoti . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_41: tarhi prakṛtiniyamaḥ . prakṛtiniyame pratyayāniyamaḥ . prakṛtiniyame sati pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_42: niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . aprakṛtikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_43: pratyayasya prayogaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu ubhayaniyamāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_44: . ubhayaniyamāt . ubhayaniyamaḥ ayam . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ pratyayaparā
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_45: eva ca prakṛtiḥ iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4862_46: paragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . antareṇa api paragrahaṇam syāt ayam paraḥ . paraḥ eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_0: 20-21 kimartham idam ucyate . ādyudāttaḥ yathā syāt . antodāttaḥ mā bhūt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_1: etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati antodāttam karoti tatra cakāram anubandham āha
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_2: ca citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ iti . madhyodāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . madyodāttam yam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_3: tatra repham anubandham karoti āha ca upottamam riti iti . anudāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_4: iti . anudāttam api yam icchati tatra pakāram anubandham karoti āha ca anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_5: suppitau iti . svaritaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . svaritam api yam icchati karoti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_6: takāram anubandham āha ca tit svaritam iti . yaḥ idānīm ataḥ anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_7: saḥ antareṇa api vacanam ādyudāttaḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti na arthaḥ ādyudāttavacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_8: . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām svaraḥ niyamyate te eva niyatasvarāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_9: idānīm aniyatasvaraḥ saḥ kadā cit ādyudāttaḥ kadā cit antodāttaḥ kadā cit madhyodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4867_10: kadā cit anudāttaḥ kacā cit svaritaḥ syāt . ādyudāttaḥ eva yathā syāt iti evam artham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_0: 21-27 atha kimartham pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatvam ucyate anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_1: ca na yatra eva anyaḥ svaraḥ tatra eva ayam ucyeta . ñniti ādiḥ nityam pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_2: ca . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam suppitau ca iti . tatra ayam api arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_3: dviḥ ādyudāttagrahaṇam dviḥ ca anudāttagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_0: ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyoge prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam tasya ādyudāttārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_1: . ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogakaraṇe etat prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_2: tasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . asanniyoge hi yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_3: ca anudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe hi pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_4: yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_5: ca anudāttatvam . atha kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve anudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_6: ca kasmāt eva tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam na bhavati tadantasya ca anudāttatvam . utpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_7: pratyayaḥ pratyayāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na utpadyamānaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_8: ghaṭaḥ kṛtaḥ ghaṭāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na kriyamāṇaḥ . na vā prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_9: ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam tadādeḥ agrahaṇasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_10: yat ayam ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti prakṛteḥ ādyudāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_11: na tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam bhavati iti . tadantasya tarhi anudāttatvam prāpnoti . prakṛtisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_12: ca vidhānasāmarthyāt pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . yat ayam dhātoḥ antaḥ prātipadikasya antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_13: iti prakṛteḥ antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na tadantasya anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_14: bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yatra hi anudāttaḥpratyayaḥ prakṛtisvaraḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_15: prayojayati . āgamānudāttārtham vā . āgamānudāttārtham tarhi pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_16: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_17: yathā syuḥ iti . na vā āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . na vā etat api prayojanam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_18: . kim kāraṇam . āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_19: . ke punaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttatvam prayojayanti . iṭ . lavitā . iṭ tāvat na prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_20: . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādyudāttatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_21: iḍāgamaḥ . nityam ādyudāttatvam . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . iṭ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_22: nityaḥ . kṛte api ādyudāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ iṭ . anyathāsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_23: kṛte ādyudāttatve prapnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_24: anityaḥ bhavati . ādyudāttatvam api anityam . anyasya kṛte iṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_25: . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_26: iḍāgamaḥ . antaraṅgam tarhi ādyudāttatvam . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_27: ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya iḍāgamaḥ . ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_28: api na antaraṅgam yāvatā pratyaye āśrīyamāṇe prakṛtiḥ api āśritā bhavati . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_29: eva ādyudāttatvam . katham . idānīm eva hi uktam na pratyayasvaravidhau tadādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_30: bhavati iti . sīyuṭ tarhi prayojayati . avacane hi sīyuḍādeḥ ādyudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_31: hi āgamānudāttatve kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve sīyuḍādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_32: liṅaḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta . laviṣīya paviṣīya . tat tarhi vaktavyam āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_33: bhavanti iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_34: iti yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4872_35: vakṣyati etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum :
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_0: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_1: siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_2: bhavanti iti . śakyam idam labdhum . yadi eva vacanāt atha api jñāpakāt āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_3: bhavanti . āgamaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_4: bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi . yadi āgamāḥ avidyamānavat bhavanti iti ucyate lavitā avādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_5: na prāpnoti . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . evam api lavitā udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_6: iti svaritaḥ na prāpnoti . ṣāṣṭhike svare iti vakṣyāmi . evam api śikṣitaḥ niṣṭhā
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_7: ca dvyac anāt it eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . pratyayasvaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4873_8: vaktavyam avidyamānavat bhavanti iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_0: yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_1: etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_2: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_3: siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_4: bhavanti iti . ādyudāttasya vā lopārtham . ādyudāttasya tarhi lopārtham pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_5: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_0: sraughnī māthurī . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ pratyaysvaram bādheta . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_1: . na vā etat prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_2: lopaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . avaśyam ca eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_3: āśrayitavyā . avacane hi ñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ . anāśrīyamāṇāyām asyām paribhāṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_4: kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatveñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_5: . autsī kaṃsikī ātreyī iti . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ ñinnitkitsvarān bādheta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_6: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ñinnitkitsvarāḥ pratyaysvarāpavādāḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ bhiniviśate
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_7: . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_8: tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . na tāvat atra kadā cit pratyayādyudāttatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_9: . apavādān ñinnitkitsvarān pratīkṣate . kaṃsikyām bhūyān apahāraḥ . anyasya atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_10: udāttatvam anyasya lopaḥ . ādeḥ udāttatvam antyasya lopaḥ . idam tarhi ātreyī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_11: . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ kitsvaram bādheta . tasmāt eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā . etasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4875_12: ca satyām śakyam pratyayasanniyogena ādyudāttatvam avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_0: 27-30 pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ . pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_1: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . pratyayādyudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_2: . samatvam simatvam . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttaḥ pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_3: pacati paṭhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gopāyati dhapāyati . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_4: bhavati vipratiṣedhena. pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi . pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_5: vipratiṣedhena . pitsvarasya avakāśaḥ . pacati paṭhati . titsvarasya avakāśaḥ . kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_6: hāryam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kāryā hāryā . titsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_7: citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt . citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_8: avakāśaḥ . calanaḥ copanaḥ . pitsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āmbaṣṭhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_9: sauvīryā . citsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā ādyutāttasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_10: . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . ādyutāttasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_11: . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte satiśiṣṭatvāt dhātusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_12: . ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ pitsvarasya titsvarasya ca . kim kāraṇam . ṭāpi
GS24pmbhasuu:4879_13: svaritenaikādeśaḥ . ṭāpi svaritena ekādeśaḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . svaritatvam

GS24pmbhasuu:4883_0: 30-31 gupādiṣu anubandhakaraṇam kimartham . gupādiṣu anubandhakaraṇam ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_1: . gupādiṣu anubandhāḥ kriyante ātmanepadam yathā syāt . kriyamāṇeṣu api anubandheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_2: ātmanepadam na eva prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sanā vyavahitatvāt . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_3: evam bhaviṣyati . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti ucyate . na ce etebhyaḥ prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_4: na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . evam tarhi anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_5: atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_6: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_7: viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsayati iti atra api prāpnoti . avayave kṛtam liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_8: kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_9: . sanam ca na vhabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati . tat yathā tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:4883_10: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_0: 31-32 abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_1: prāpnoti . mīmāṃsate . nanu ce ittve kṛte dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ utpattisanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_2: dīrghatvam ucyamānam ittvam pratīkṣate . atha katham abhyāsam pratīkṣate . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_3: abhyāsam pratīkṣate . ittvam punaḥ na pratīkṣate . na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_4: utsargābādhakatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_5: utsargābādhakatvāt . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādāḥ utsargān na bādhante iti evam dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_6: ucyamānam ittvam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ ī ca abhyāsasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_7: vakṣyāmi . evam api halādiśeṣāpavādaḥ īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ī ca acaḥ iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_8: atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ dīrghaḥ ca itaḥ abhyāsasya iti vakṣyāmi . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_9: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_10: dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_11: iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate dīrghaḥ ca abhyāsasya iti . katham tarhi . dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4887_12: ca ābhyāsasya iti . kim idam ābhyāsasya iti . abhyāsavikāraḥ ābhyāsaḥ tasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_0: 33-39 dhātoḥ iti kimartham . prakartum aicchat prācikīrṣat . sopasargāt mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_1: karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_2: anarthakam . karmaṇaḥ samānakartṛkāt icchāyām vā sambhavati iti eva dhātoḥ utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_3: bhaviṣyati . soparsargam vai karma . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . sopasargam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_4: cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam karma . sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_5: upasargaḥ . anupasargam hi karma . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam anupasargam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_6: iti . sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_7: hi manyate sopasargam karma iti kriyamāṇe api tasya dhātugrahaṇe sanaḥ avidhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_8: . kim kāraṇam . akarmatvāt . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_9: subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt ca sanaḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_10: kāraṇam . kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt kyajādayaḥ vidhīyante . te apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_11: bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anabhidhānāt vā . atha vā anabhidhānāt subantāt utpattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_12: bhaviṣyati . na hi subantāt utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_13: tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . iyam tāvat agatikā gatiḥ yat ucyate anabhidhānāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_14: . yat api ucyate subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt iti . bhavet kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4891_15: cit aprasaṅgaḥ syāt ātmecchāyām . parecchāyām tu prāpnoti :

GS24pmbhasuu:4892_1: . kim . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate . na ca subantasya samānaḥ kartā asti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4892_2: bhavet kasmāt cit aprasaṅgaḥ yasya kartā na asti . iha tu prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4893: āsitum icchati śayitum icchati . icchāyām arthe san vidhīyate icchārtheṣu ca tumun . tatra tumunā uktatatvāt tasya arthasya san na bhaviṣyati . evam api iha prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4894_0: āsanam icchati śayanam icchati iti . iha yaḥ viśeṣaḥ upādhiḥ vā upādīyate dyotye
GS24pmbhasuu:4894_1: tasmin tena bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ gamyate āsitum icchati śayitum icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:4894_2: svayam tām kriyām kartum icchati iti na asau iha gamyate āsanam icchati śayanam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:4894_3: iti . anyasya api āsanam icchati iti eṣaḥ api arthaḥ gamyate . avaśyam ca etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4894_4: vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate adyotye tasmin tena bhavitavyam iti kriyamāṇe api tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_0: saṅgatam icchati devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_1: ca icchābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_2: kāraṇam . icchābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_3: akarmaṇaḥ hi asamānakartṛkāt vā anabhidhānam . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_4: . na ca akarmaṇaḥ asamānakartṛkāt vā utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_5: anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . aṅgaparimāṇārtham tu . aṅgaparimāṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_6: tarhi anyatarat kartavyam karmagrahaṇam dhātugrahaṇam vā . aṅgaparimāṇam jñāsyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_7: iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . dhātugrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . aṅgaparimāṇam ca eva vijñātam
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_8: bhavati . api ca dhātoḥ vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñaḥ bhavati iti sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_9: ārdhadhātukasañjñā siddhā bhavati . yat ca api etat uktam karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_10: dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_11: karma sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti svapakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_12: anena varṇitaḥ . yuktam iha draṣṭavyam kim nyāyyam karma iti . etat ca atra yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_13: yat sopasargam karma syāt . nanu ca uktam sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_14: api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karmaṇaḥ iti na eṣā dhātusamānādhikaraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_15: pañcamī . karmaṇaḥ dhātoḥ iti . kim tarhi . avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . karmaṇaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_16: dhātuḥ avayavaḥ . yadi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhīkevalāt utpattiḥ na prāpnoti . cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_17: jihīrṣati iti . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ dhātuḥ avayaḥ bhavati . kāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_18: tarhi anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ . mahāntam putram icchati . karmaṇaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_19: subantam avayayaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_20: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4895_21: vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ . iha

GS24pmbhasuu:4900_0: 39-42 tumunantāt vā tasya ca lugvacanam . tumunantāt vā san vaktavyaḥ tasya ca tumunaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_1: luk vaktavyaḥ . kartum icchati cikīrṣati . liṅuttamāt vā . liṅuttamāt vā san vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_2: tasya ca liṅaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . kuryām iti icchati cikīrṣati . āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_3: upasaṅkhyānam . āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aśmā luluṭhiṣate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_4: kūlam pipatiṣati iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . evam manyate . cetanāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_5: etat bhavati icchā iti . kūlam ca acetanam . acetanagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . āśaṅkāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_6: iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . śvā mumūrṣati . na vā tulyakāraṇatvāt icchayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_7: hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tulyakāraṇatvāt . tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_8: hi kāraṇam cetanāvati devadatte kūle ca acetane . kim kāraṇam . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_9: upalabdhiḥ . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ bhavati . yaḥ api asu kaṭam cikīrṣuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_10: bhavati na asau āghoṣayati . kaṭam kariṣyāmi iti . kim tarhi . sannaddham rajjukīlakpūlapāṇim
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_11: dṛṣṭvā tataḥ icchā gamyate . kūlasya api pipatiṣataḥ loṣṭāḥ śīryante bhidā jāyante

GS24pmbhasuu:4900_13: ca bhavanti . upamānāt vā siddham . upamānāt vā siddham etat . katham . luluṭhiṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_14: iva luluṭhiṣate . pipatiṣati iva pipatiṣati . na tiṅantena upamānam asti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4900_15: icchā iva icchā . sarvasya vā cetanāvattvāt . atha vā sarvam cetanāvat . evam hi

GS24pmbhasuu:4904_0: 42-45 ime iṣavaḥ bahavaḥ paṭhyante . tatra na jñāyate kasya ayam arthe san vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4904_1: iti . iṣeḥ chatvabhāvinaḥ . yadi evam kartum anvicchati kartum anveṣaṇā atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:4904_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi yasya striyām icchā iti etat rūpam nipātyate . kasya ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4904_3: nipātyate . kāntikarmaṇaḥ . atha iha grāmam gantum icchati iti kasya kim karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:4904_4: iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . yadi evam grāmam gantum icchati grāmāya gantum icchati iti gatyarthakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4904_5: dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ gamiḥ karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:4904_6: evam api iṣyate grāmaḥ gantum iti parasādhane utpadyamānena lena grāmasya abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4904_7: na prāpnoti . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . atha sanantāt sanā bhavitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4905_0: cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4905_1: śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4905_2: tasya arthasya aparasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_0: eṣitum icchati eṣiṣiṣati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ekasya atra iṣeḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_1: vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_2: iha api tarhi ekasya iṣeḥ karotiviṣiṣṭaḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_3: . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yena eva khalu api hetunā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_4: vākyam bhavati cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_5: prāpnoti . tasmāt sanantāt sanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tam ca api bruvatā iṣisanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_6: iti vaktavyam . bhavati hi jugupsiṣate mīmāṃsiṣate iti . śaiṣikāt matubarthīyāt śaiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_7: matubarthikaḥ sarūpaḥ pratyayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ . sanantāt na san iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_0: 45-48 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_1: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_2: anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_3: arthaḥ . asya cvau kyaci ca iti . kye ca iti ucyamāne api kākaḥ śyenāyate atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_4: prasayjeta . na etat asti . tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_5: iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ tarhi . kva ca sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_6: arthaḥ . naḥ kye iti . atha ātmangrahaṇam kimartham . ātmecchāyām yathā syāt . parecchāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_7: mā bhūt iti . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . kriyamāṇe api ātmagrahaṇe parecchāyām prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_8: . kim kāraṇam . ātmanaḥ iti iyam kartari ṣaṣṭhī . icchā iti akāraḥ bhāve . saḥ yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_9: eva ātmanaḥ icchā atha api parasya ātmecchā eva asau bhavati . na ātmagrahaṇena icchā
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_10: abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . subantam abhisambadhyate . ātmanaḥ yat subantam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_11: . yadi ātmagrahaṇam kriyate chandasi parecchāyām na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ aghāyavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4910_12: vidan . tasmāt na arthaḥ ātmagrahaṇena . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_0: rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_1: bhavati iti . chandasi api tarhi na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ aghāyavaḥ vidan . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_2: atra viśeṣaḥ . antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_3: punaḥ antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . te ca eva vṛkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_4: evamātmakaḥ hiṃsrāḥ . kaḥ ca ātmanaḥ agham eṣitum arhati . ataḥ antareṇa api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_5: tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . yathā eva tarhi chandasi aghaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_6: parecchāyām khyac bhavati evam bhāṣāyām api prāpnoti . agham icchati iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_7: ātmagrahaṇam kartavyam . chandasi katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_8: aghaśabdāt parecchāyām kyac iti yat ayam aśvāghasyāt iti kyaci pratkṛte ītvabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_9: ākāram śāsti . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt utpattiḥ yatha syāt . prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_10: mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_11: prātipadikāt vā ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_12: . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti . nanu ca prātipadikāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_13: satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham . ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_14: subantāt utpattau satyām niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_15: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yatha syāt . dhātoḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_16: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ san vidhīyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_17: . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca san . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . parecchā
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_18: . na parecchāyām sanā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_19: ca iha ātmagrahaṇam tāvat tatra samānakartṛkagrahaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_20: utpattiḥ yatha syāt . vākyāt māt bhūt iti . mahāntam putram icchati iti . na vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_21: mahāputrīyati iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati . mahān putraḥ mahāputraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_22: mahāputram icchati mahāputrīyati iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam putram
GS24pmbhasuu:4911_23: icchati iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_0: 48-50 atha kriyamāṇe api subgrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . subantam hi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_1: vākyam . na etat subantam . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_2: iti . atha yat atra subantam tasmāt utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati . samānādhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_3: sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena . samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra eva vṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_4: . kva sarvatra . samāsavidhau pratyayavidhau . samāsavidhau tāvat . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_5: puruṣaḥ . mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . pratyayavidhau . ṛddhasya upagoḥ apatyam . mahāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_6: putram icchati . iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra vṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_7: . ayogāt ekena . na hi ekena padena yogaḥ bhavati . iha tāvat ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_8: iti ṣaṣṭhyantena subantena sāmarthye sati samāsaḥ vidhīyate . yat ca atra ṣaṣthyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_9: na tasya subantena sāmarthyam . yasya ca sāmarthyam na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam . vākyam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_10: . ṛddhasya upagoḥ apatyam iti ca . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyena yoge pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_11: . yat ca atra ṣaṣṭḥīsamartham na tasya apatatyena yogaḥ yasya ca aptatyena yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_12: na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam . vākyam tat . samānādhikaraṇānām iti ucyate . atha vyadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_13: katham . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . evam tarhi idam paṭhitavyam . saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_14: sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena . dvitīyānupapattiḥ tu . dvitīyā tu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_15: mahāntam putram icchati iti . kim kāraṇam . na putraḥ iṣikarma . yadi putraḥ na iṣikarma
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_16: na ca avaśyam dvitīyā eva . kim tarhi . sarvāḥ dvitīyādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . mahatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_17: putreṇa kṛtam . mahate putrāya dehi . mahaḥ putrāt ānaya . mahataḥ putrasya svam
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_18: . mahati putre nidhehi . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum na putraḥ iṣikarma iti . putra
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_19: eva iṣikarma . tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt dvitīyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_20: na bhavati . saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_21: . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate muṇḍayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_22: māṇavakam iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . amuṇḍādīnām iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_23: saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate amuṇḍādīnām iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_24: vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ kasmāt na bhavati mahāntam putram icchati iti . agamakatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_25: iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_26: gamyate mahāntam putram icchati iti na asau jātu cit pratyayāntena gamyate mahāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_27: putrīyati iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4915_28: . yatra ca gamakatvam bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_0: 50-55 atha asya kyajantasya kāni sādhanāni bhavanti . bhāvaḥ kartā ca . atha karma
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_1: . na asti karma . nanu ca ayam iṣiḥ sakarmakaḥ yasya ayam arthe kyac vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_2: abhihitam tat karma antarbhūtam dhātvarthaḥ sampannaḥ . na ca idānīm anyat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_3: asti yena sakarmakaḥ syāt . katham tarhi ayam sakarmakaḥ bhavati aputram putram iva
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_4: ācarati putrīyati māṇavakam iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra karmaṇī upamānakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_5: upameyakarma ca . upamānakarma antarbhūtam . upameyena karmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_6: . tat yathā . api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti atra dvau kartārau upamānakartā ca upameyakartā
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_7: ca. upamānakartā antarbhūtaḥ . upemeyakartrā sakrtṛkaḥ bhavati . ayam tarhi katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_8: sakarmakaḥ bhavati . muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atra api dve karmaṇī sāmānyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_9: viśeṣakarma ca . sāmānyakarma antarbhūtam . viśeṣakarmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_10: ca vṛttyā eva atra na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_11: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra ubhau karotiyuktau muṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_12: māṇavakaḥ ca . na hi māṇavakaḥ kriyate . yadā ca ubhau karotiyuktau bhavataḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_13: tadā vṛttiḥ . tat yathā balīvardam karoti muṇḍam ca enam karoti iti . kāmam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_14: anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ māṇavakam muṇḍam icchati iti . na ubhau iṣiyuktau
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_15: iti . na kartavyaḥ . ubhau atra iṣiyuktau muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ ca . katham . na hi asau
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_16: mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti . māṇavakastham asau mauṇḍyam icchati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_17: na prāpnoti muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atra api hi ubhau karotiyukta muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_18: ca . na hi asau mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti . māṇavakastham asu mauṇḍyam nirvartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_19: . evam tarhi muṇḍādayaḥ guaṇavacanāḥ . guṇavacanāḥ ca sāpekṣāḥ . vacanāt sāpekṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_20: api vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā dhātavaḥ eva muṇḍādayaḥ . na na eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_21: kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . atha vā na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_22: ca . yadā vākyam na tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_23: avśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . muṇḍayati . kam . māṇavakam iti . muṇḍaviśiṣṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_24: vā karotina tam āptum icchati . atha vā uktam etat . na atra vyāpāraḥ anugantavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_25: iti . gamaktvāt iha vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atha iha kyacā
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_26: bhavitavyam . iṣṭaḥ putraḥ . iṣyate putraḥ iti . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4919_27: it . kim kāraṇam . svaśabdena uktatvāt iti . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4920_0: bhavitavyam iti . kim kāraṇam . dhātvarthe ayam kyac vidhīyate . saḥ ca dhātvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4920_1: kena cit eva śabdena nirdeṣṭavyaḥ iti . ihabhavantaḥ tu āhuḥ na bhavitavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4920_2: kim kāraṇam . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4920_3: arthaḥ vākyena gamyate iṣṭaḥ putraḥ iṣyate putraḥ iti na asau jātu cit pratyayāntena gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_0: 55-56 kyaci māntāvyayapratiṣedhaḥ . kyaci māntāvyayānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_1: māt bhūt . idam icchati . kim icchati . uccaiḥ icchati . nīcaiḥ icchati . gosamānākṣaranāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_2: iti eke . gām icchati gavyati . samānākṣarāt . dadhīyati madhati kartrīyati hartrīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_0: 56-57 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_1: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātusvareṇa api etat siddham . kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_2: tarhi itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ āditaḥ cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . kāmyacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_3: citkaraṇānarthakyam kasya idarthābhāvāt . kāmyacaḥ citkaraṇam anarthakam . kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_4: tarhi itsañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . idarthābhāvāt . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_5: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi śabdasya kāryārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_6: vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā . karyam ca iha na asti . kārye asati yadi śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_7: api na syāt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt . idam tarhi itkāryam . agnicitkamyati . kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_8: iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_9: aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_10: . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . idam tarhi . upayaṭkāmyati . kiti iti samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_11: yathā syāt .. etat api na asti prayojanam . yajādibhiḥ atra kitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_12: . yajādīnām yaḥ kit iti . kaḥ ca yajādīnām kit . yajādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_13: api katham cit itkāryam syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva dvicakārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_14: nirdeśaḥ . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac ckāmyat ca iti . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4928_15: chandasi bhavati . na ca atra samprasāraṇam dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4931: 20.17-19 Ro_III.57 adhikaraṇāt ca . adhikaraṇāt ca iti vaktavyam . prāsādayati kuṭyām kuṭīyati prāsāde iti atra api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_0: 58 salopasanniyogena ayam kyaṅ vidhīyate . tena yatra eva salopaḥ tatra eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_1: . payāyate . iha na syāt . api kākaḥ śyenāyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_2: . anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ salopaḥ . yatra ca sakāram paśyasi iti . tat yatha . kaḥ cit uktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_3: grāme bhikṣām cara devadattam ca ānaya iti . saḥ grāme bhikṣām carati . yadi devadattam
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_4: paśyati tam api ānayati . salopaḥ vā . salopaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . payāyate payasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_5: . ojopsarasoḥ nityam . ojopsarasoḥ nityam salopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_6: jaghāna . apsarāyate . apraḥ āha salopaḥ apsarasaḥ eva . payasyate iti eva bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4935_7: iti . katham ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghana iti . chāndasaḥ prayogaḥ . chandasi ca dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4939_0: 58-59 ācāre galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā . ācāre galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4939_1: . avagalbhate avagalbhāyate . klība . viklībate viklībāyate . klība . hoḍa . vihoḍate
GS24pmbhasuu:4939_2: vihoḍāyate . kim prayojanam . kriyāvacanatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4939_3: . dhātavaḥ eva galbhādayaḥ . na ca eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4939_4: . idam tarhi prayojanam . avagalbhā viklībā vihoḍā . a pratyayāt iti akāraḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4939_5: syāt . mā bhūt evam . guroḥ ca halaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . avagalbhām
GS24pmbhasuu:4939_6: cakre . viklībām cakre . vihoḍām cakre . kāspratyayāt ām amantre iti ām yathā syāt . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4940_0: sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ ācāre kvip vaktavyaḥ aśvati gardabhati iti evamartham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4940_1: tarhi idānīm galbhādyanukramaṇam kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam . ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4940_2: anubandhān āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . galbha klība hoḍa .
GS24pmbhasuu:4944_0: 60 halaḥ lopasanniyogena ayam kyaṅ vidhīyate . tena yatra eva halaḥ lopaḥ tatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4944_1: prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānaśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ . anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ halaḥ lopaḥ . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_1: . iha mā bhūt . kva divā bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . cvipratiṣedhānarthakyam ca bhavatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_2: kyaṅvacanāt . cvipratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavatyarthe kyaṅvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_3: . bhavatyarthe hi kyaṅ vidhīyate . bhavatiyoge cvividhānam . bhavatinā yoge cviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_4: vidhīyate . tatra cvinā uktatvāt tasya arthasya kyaṅ na bhaviṣyati . ḍājantāt api
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_5: tarhi na prāpnoti . paṭapaṭāyate . ḍāc api hi bhavatinā yoge vidhīyate . bhavatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_6: kyaṣ . ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt . ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_7: . lohitādiḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣ iti . iha kim cit akriyamāṇam codyate kim cit kriyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_8: pratyākhyāyate . saḥ sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_9: iha kasmāt na bhavati kva divā bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_10: tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam va yat kim cit iha dṛśyate tatra anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_11: tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_12: brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api acveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4948_13: iti cvipratiṣedhāt anyasmin acvyante cvisadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca ataḥ anyat
