GS24pmbhasuu:5230_19: bhavati iti vaktavyam . parivārayanti kaṇṭakaiḥ vṛkṣam . parivārayante kaṇṭakāḥ vṛkṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_20: iti . sravatyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . sravatyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sravati kuṇḍikā
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_21: udakam . sravati kuṇḍikāyāḥ udakam . sravanti valīkāni udakam . sravati valīkebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_22: udakam iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tulyakriyaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_23: . kriyāntaram ca atra gamyate . iha tāvat sravati kuṇḍikā udakam iti . visṛjati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_24: gamyate . sravati kuṇḍikāyāḥ udakam iti . niṣkrāmati iti gamyate . sravanti valīkāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_25: udakam iti . visṛjanti iti gamyate . sravati valīkebhyaḥ udakam iti . patati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_26: gamyate . bhūṣākarmakiratisanām ca anyatra ātmanepadāt . bhūṣākarmakiratisanām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_27: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ anyatra ātmanepadāt . bhūṣayate kanyā svayam eva . abubhūṣata
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_28: kanyā svayam eva . maṇḍayate kanyā svayam eva . amamaṇḍata kanyā svayam eva . kirati
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_29: . avakirate hastī svayam eva . avākīrṣṭa hastī svayam eva . san . cikīrṣate kaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_30: svayam eva . acikīrṣiṣṭa kaṭaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5234_0: 176-177 yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5234_1: hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṇi . kārayate kaṭaḥ svayam eva . acīkarata
GS24pmbhasuu:5234_2: kaṭaḥ svayam eva . ṇi . śri . ucchrayate daṇḍaḥ svayam eva . udaśiśriyata daṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5234_3: svayam eva . śri . brūñ . brūte kathā svayam eva . avocata kathā svayam eva . bhāradvājīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5234_4: paṭhanti . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñātmanepadākarmakāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_1: kartavyam . avacane hi liṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi sārvadhātukagrahaṇe liṅliṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . cukuṣe pādaḥ svayam eva . rarañje vastram svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_3: . koṣiṣīṣṭa pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣīṣṭa vastram svayam eva . kriyamāṇe api sārvadhātukagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_4: iha prāpnoti . kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ pādāḥ . śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . koṣiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_5: pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣyate vastram svayam eva . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_6: vastram svayam eva . yat tāvat ucyate sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_7: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . sārvadhātuke yak iti . yadi tat anuvartate pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_8: yoge kim samuccayaḥ . le ca sārvadhātuke ca iti . āhosvit lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_9: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ kati iha bhindānāḥ kuśūlāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_10: . atha lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati . bibhide kuśūlaḥ svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_11: eva . bhitsīṣṭa kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . astu lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_12: nanu ca uktam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati iti . liṅliḍgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_13: kva prakṛtam . kās pratyayāt ām amantre liṭi liṅi āśiṣi āṅ iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_14: api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ pādāḥ iti prāpnoti . atra api laviśiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_15: sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate . yat api ucyate śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_16: . yakpratiṣedhasambandhena śyanaṃ vakṣyāmi . na duhasnunamām yakciṇau . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_17: prācām yakciṇau na bhavataḥ . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca iti . yathā eva tarhi yakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_18: viṣaye śyan bhavati evam ciṇaḥ api viṣaye prāpnoti . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_19: vastram svayam eva iti . evam tarhi dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . na duhasnunamām
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_20: ciṇ bhavati . tataḥ yak . yak ca na bhavati duhasnunamām . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ prācām
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_21: yak na bhavati . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate . syatāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_22: lṛluṭoḥ . cli luṅi . cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari śap syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_23: sic bhavati . kuṣirajoḥ prācām śyan parasmaipadam ca syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5238_24: sic bhavati iti . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lakārāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_0: 179-183 ā kutaḥ ayam dhātvadhikāraḥ . kim prāk lādeśāt āhosvit ā tṛtīyādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_1: . dhātuvadhikāraḥ prāk lādeśāt . prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . lādeśe hi vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_2: aprasiddhiḥ . anuvartamāne hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāre vyavahitavtā aprasiddhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_3: . kim ca syāt . ādye yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ . ādye yoge vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_4: tiṅaḥ na syuḥ . pacati paṭhati . idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām āḍeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_5: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ādeśāḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ . kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_6: akṛteṣu api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_7: na prāpnuvanti . anavakāśaḥ tarhi ādeśāḥ . sāvakāśāḥ ādeśāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_8: lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ ca liṅliṭau ca . na syāt etvam ṭeḥ ṭitām yat vidhatte .
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_9: yat ca ṭitsañjñānām etvam vidhatte tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na syāt . eśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_10: śittvam . ekāraḥ ca śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_11: yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti takārasya etve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_12: dvayoḥ ekārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . nivṛtte punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre alaḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_13: vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ekārasya ekārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_14: api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat ca loṭaḥ vidhatte . tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_15: na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . loṭaḥ laṅvat eḥ uḥ seḥ hi apit ca vā chandasi iti . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_16: ca api uktam laṅliṅoḥ tat ca na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . nityam ṅitaḥ itaḥ ca tasthasthamipām
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_17: tāmtamtāmaḥ liṅaḥ sīyuṭ yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti . tasmāt prāk lādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_18: dhātvadhikāraḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ akāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_19: . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . anuvartamāne punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_20: tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti thakārasya atve kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_21: rūpam syāt . peca yūyam . cakra yūyam iti . nanu ca nivṛtte api lādeśe dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_22: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya akārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_23: kṛtvā antareṇa api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_24: prayojanam . kim . vakṣyati etat tat akārasya akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_25: ārdhadhātukasañjñāyām dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam dhātoḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasañjñā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_0: vṛkṣtvam vṛkṣatā iti . tasmāt lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartyaḥ . nanu ca uktam ādye
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_1: yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyāt siddham etat . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_2: akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu vikaraṇāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātuke vikaraṇāḥ ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_3: . na ca akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu sārvadhātukatvam bhavati . ye tarhi na etasmin viśeṣe vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_4: . ke punaḥ te . syādayaḥ . tatra api vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ vihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_5: lasya iti . yadi evam vindati iti ṇalādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . dhātunā atra vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_6: vidinā ca ānataryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya lasya videḥ anantarasya iti . iha tarhi ajakṣiṣyan
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_7: ajāgairṣyan iti abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . atra api dhātunā
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_8: vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ abhyastena ānantaryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya abhastāt anantarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_9: iti . ātaḥ iti atra katham viśeṣayiṣyasi . yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_10: ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam alunan iti atra api prāpnoti . atha ākāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_11: vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam apiban iti atra api prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_12: tarhi dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_13: alunan iti atra api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5244_0: kāraṇam . ītvena bādhyate . na atra ītvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antibhāvena bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5244_1: . na atra antibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5244_2: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . lopena bādhyate . lopaḥ ītvena ītvam antibhāvena antibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5244_3: jusbhāvena jusbhāvaḥ lopena iti cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5244_4: . na hi avyavasthākāriṇā śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstreṇa nāma vyavasthākāriṇā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5244_5: . na ca atra halādinā muhūrtam api śakyam avasthātum . tāvati eva antibhāvena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5244_6: . antibhāve kṛte lopaḥ . lopena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate eśaḥ śittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_0: 183-185 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_1: prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . dhātoḥ tavyādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . prātipadikāt mā
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_2: bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_3: kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt asati api dhātvadhikāre prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_4: tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . svapādiṣu . svapādiṣu tarhi prayojanam . svapiti . supati
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_5: iti mā bhūt . aṅgasañjñā ca . aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_6: pratyaye aṅgam iti dhātoḥ aṅgasañjñā siddhā bhavati . kṛtsañjñā ca . kṛtsañjñā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_7: prayojanam . dhātuvihitasya pratyayasya kṛtsañjñā siddhā bhavati . upapadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_8: ca. upapadasañjñā ca prayojanam . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre saptamīnirdiṣṭam upapadasñjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_9: bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati . kṛdupapadasañjñe tāvan na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_10: adhikārāt api ete siddhe . svapādiṣu tarhi aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_11: anarthakam yaṅvidhau dhātvadhikārāt . dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . yaṅvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_12: dhātvadhikārāt . yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam anuvartyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_13: . anadhikāre hi aṅgasañjñābhāvaḥ . anadhikāre hi sati aṅgasañjñāyāḥ abhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_14: . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti . yad tat anuvartate cūrṇacurādibhyaḥ ṇic bhavati dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_15: ca iti dhātumātrāt ṇic prāpnoti . hetumadvacanam tu jñāpakam anyatrābhāvasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_16: ayam hetumati ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt ṇic bhavati iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_17: tarhi kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati dhātoḥ ca iti dhātumātrāt yak prāpnoti . kaṇḍvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_18: ca vyapadeśivadvacanāt . yat ayam kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati iti āha tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_19: ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt yak bhavati iti . atha vā kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ dhātugrahaṇena abhisambhantsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5252: 185-186 sthagrahaṇam kimartham . tatra upapadam saptamī iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva saptamī śrūyate tatra eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_0: stamberamaḥ karṇejapaḥ . yatra vā etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saptamyām janeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_1: ḍaḥ iti . iha na syāt . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ . sthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_2: ca saptamī śrūyate ya ca na śrūyate yatra ca etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_3: ca anyena saptamīsthamātre siddham bhavati . atha tatragrahaṇam kimartham . tatragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_4: viṣayārtham . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre yat saptamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_5: tat upapadasañjñam bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_1: . samartham upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . āhara kumbham . karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_2: kaṭam iti . kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_3: prāpnoti . na vā bhavitavyam mahākumbhakāraḥ iti . bhavaitavyam yadā etat vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_4: bhavati . mahān kumbhaḥ mahākumbhaḥ mahākumbham karoti iti mahākumbhakāraḥ . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_5: tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam kumbham karoti iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_6: prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti . yat tāvat ucyate samarthagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_7: kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ karmaṇi aṇ bhavati . tatra sambandhāt etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_8: gantavyam . yasya dhātoḥ yat karma iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_9: mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api prāpnoti iti . upapadam iti mahatīiham sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_10: kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5257_11: . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_0: upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na tat padam yat ca padam na tat upoccāri
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_1: . yāvatā ca idānīm padagandhaḥ asti padavidhiḥ ayam bhavati . padavidhiḥ ca samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_2: bhavati . tatra asāmārthyān na bhaviṣyati . atha cvyante upapade kim aṇā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_3: . akumbham kumbham karoti kumbhīkaroti mṛdam iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_4: prakṛtivivakṣāyām cviḥ vidhīyate . tat sāpekṣam . sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_0: icchāmi aham kāśakaṭīkāram iti . iṣṭam eva etat gonardīyasya . nimittopādanam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_1: . nimittopādanam ca kartavyam . nimittam upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . anupādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_2: hi anupapade pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi nimittopādāne anupapade api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_3: . nirdeśaḥ idānīm kimarthaḥ syāt . nirdeśaḥ sañjñākaraṇārthaḥ . yadā upapade pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_4: tadā upapadasañjñām vakṣyāmi iti . tat tarhi nimittopādanam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_5: . tatravacanam upapadasanniyogārtham . tatravacanam kriyate . tat upapadasanniyogārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_6: bhaviṣyati . karmaṇi aṇ vidhīyate tatra cet pratyayaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:5259_7: tatragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam . kim . tatragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_0: 190-192 atiṅ iti kimartham . pacati karoti . atiṅ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_1: bhavati pacati karoti iti . dhātoḥ parasya kṛtsañjñā . prāk ca lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_2: . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt kṛtsañjña prāpnoti . yathā atiṅ iti ucyamāne yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_3: katham eva etat sidhyati . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt . atha vā tiṅbhāvinaḥ lakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_4: kṛtsañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ . kim ca syāt yati atra kṛtsañjñā syāt . kṛtprātipadikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_5: prātipadikasañjñā syāt . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_6: . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅoktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_7: uktārthatvāt na bhaviṣyanti . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_8: vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_9: iti . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_10: asti . atha api katham cit yogaḥ syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_11: na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_12: . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . iha tarhi pacati paṭhati iti . hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_13: piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_14: iti atra prāpnoti . atra api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5263_15: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5267_0: 192-193 katham idam vijñāyate . striyām abhidheyāyām vā asrūpaḥ na bhavati iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:5267_1: strīpratyayeṣu iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi striyām abhidheyāyām iti lavyā lavitavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5267_2: atra vā asarūpaḥ na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate strīpratyayeṣu iti vyāvakrośī vayatikruṣṭiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5267_3: iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate striyām abhidheyāyām na api strīpratyayeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5267_4: iti . katham tarhi strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5267_5: iti striyām iti adhikṛtya ye pratayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5271_0: 193-198 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . asarūpasya vāvacanam utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:5271_1: anivṛttyartham . asarūpasya vāvacanam kriyate utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5271_2: yathā syāt . tavyattavyānīyaraḥ utsargāḥ . teṣām ajantāt yat apavādaḥ . ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_0: cetavyam iti api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ajantāt yat vidhīyate . halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_1: ṇyat vidhīyate . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ ca . ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_2: . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛcau utsargau . tayoḥ pacādibhyaḥ ac apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_3: . pacati iti pacaḥ . paktā pācakaḥ iti api yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_4: . vakṣyati etat . ac api sarvadhātubhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛjacaḥ utsargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_5: teṣām igupadhāt kaḥ apavādaḥ . vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ . vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_6: syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_7: . tatra utpattiḥ vibhāṣā prāpnoti yathā taddhite . astu . yadā vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_8: iti etat na tadā vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyati . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_9: syāt . tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . yathā taddhite iti ucyate . tadditeṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_10: sarvam eva utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā . utpadyate vā na vā . siddham tu asarūpasya bādhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_11: vāvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . asarūpasya bādhakasya vāvacanāt . asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_12: vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_13: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_14: . asti kāraṇam yena taddhite vibhāṣā utpattiḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_15: prakṛtyarthe vartate . anyena śabdena pratyayārthaḥ abhidhīyate . iha punaḥ na kevalā
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_16: prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate na ca anyaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tam artham abhidadhīta
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_17: iti kṛtvā anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ . na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_18: na ca kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . etasmāt samayāt anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_19: yaḥ eva tasya samayasya kartā saḥ eva idam api āha . yadi asau tatra pramāṇam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_20: api pramāṇam bhavitum arhati . pramāṇam asau tatra ca iha ca . sāmarthyam tu iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_21: draṣṭavyam prayoge . na ca anutpattau sāmarthyam asti . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_22: . katham tarhi taddhiteṣu anutpattau sāmarthyam bhavati . anyena pratyayena sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_23: . kena . ṣaṣṭhyā . atha vā rūpavattām āśritya vāvidhiḥ ucyate . na ca anutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_24: rūpavatī . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_25: na punaḥ utsargaḥ iti . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ yat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā syāt utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_26: vā . api ca sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate vā asarūpaḥ iti . na ca utsargavelāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_27: kim cit apekṣyam asti . apavādavelāyām punaḥ utsargaḥ apekṣyate . tena yaḥ rūpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_28: anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ punaḥ asau . apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_29: . yadi yaḥ rūpavān anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_30: kvibādiṣu samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . grāmaṇīḥ grāmaṇāyaḥ iti . na hi ete rūpavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_31: . ete api rūpavantaḥ . kasyām avasthāyām . upadeśāvasthāyām . yadi evam anubandhabhinneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_32: vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ . anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣā prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_33: kaḥ iti kaviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_34: . katham . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_35: vāvidhiḥ nyāyyaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_36: vaktavyaḥ . hyaḥ apacat iti atra luṅ api prāpnoti . śvaḥ paktā iti atra lṛṭ api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_37: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na lādeśeṣu vā asarūpaḥ bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_38: ayam haśaśvatoḥ laṅ ca iti āha . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām vāvidhau na sarvam iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_39: saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_40: ca ete sarūpāḥ . nanu ca uktam anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_41: etat . katham . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . atha ekānte doṣaḥ eva . ekānte
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_42: ca na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_0: vibhāṣā śam śāsti . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_1: nāma anubandhabhinnaḥ vā bhavati rūpānyatvena vā . tena anena avaśyam kim cit tyājyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_2: kim cit tu saṅgrahītavyam . tat yat anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam tat na āśrayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_3: yat tu rūpānyatvena asārūpyam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_4: bhavati iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca asarūpaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5274_0: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ asarūpaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ prayoge ca prāk ca prayogāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5274_1: vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca evam kaḥ cit api sarūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5275: kvat cit ye asarūpāḥ . anubandhabhinnāḥ ca prayoge sarūpāḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5302_0: janyam . hanaḥ vā vadha ca . hanaḥ vā yat vaktavyaḥ vadha iti ayam ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_1: . vadhyaḥ ghātyaḥ . taddhitaḥ vā . taddhitaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . vadham arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_2: vadhyaḥ . yadi taddhitaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti : asivadhyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5303_0: musalavadhyaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ sati sādhanam kṛtā iti vā pādahārakādyartham iti samāsaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5303_2: . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . asivadhyaḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . asivadhyaḥ iti ca iṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:5592_0: 256-257 niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5592_1: . kā itaretarāśrayatā . satoḥ ktaktavatvoḥ sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca ktaktavatū
GS24pmbhasuu:5592_2: bhāvyete . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:5592_3: . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam kartavyam . ktaktavtū bhūte
GS24pmbhasuu:5592_4: . ktaktavatū niṣṭhā iti . yadi punaḥ iha eva niṣṭhāsañjñā api ucyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_0: ktaktavtū bhūte . tataḥ niṣṭhā . niṣṭhāsañjñau ca ktaktavtū bhavataḥ iti . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_1: bhavati . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . evam api tau iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_2: syāt . vakṣyati hi etat . tau sat iti vacanam asaṃsargārtham iti . asaṃsaktayoḥ bhūtena
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_3: kālena niṣṭhāsañjñā yathā syāt . ñimidā minnaḥ ñikṣvidā kṣvinnaḥ . yadi punaḥ adṛṣṭaśrutau
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_4: eva ktaktavatū gṛhītvā niṣṭhāsañjñā ucyeta . na evam śakyam . dṛṣṭaśrutayoḥ na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_5: . ñimidā minnaḥ . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_6: itaretarāśrayam vā bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . itaretarāśrayamātram etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_7: sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5593_8: idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi sañjñā nityā . evam tarhi bhāvinī sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5594: kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5595_0: asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5595_1: na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham. bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā
GS24pmbhasuu:5595_2: . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api tau bhūte
GS24pmbhasuu:5595_3: kāle bhavataḥ yayoḥ abhinirvṛtayoḥ niṣṭhā iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_0: 258-259 ādikarmaṇi niṣṭhā . ādikarmaṇi niṣṭhā vaktavyā . prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_1: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . yat vā bhavantyarthe . yat vā bhavantyarthe bhāṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_2: . prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ . prakaroti kaṭam devadattaḥ iti . nyāyyā tu ādyapavargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_3: . nyāyyā tu eṣā bhūtakālatā . kutaḥ . ādyapavargāt . ādiḥ atra apavṛktaḥ . eṣaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_4: nāma nyāyyaḥ bhūtakālaḥ yatra kim cit apavṛktam dṛśyate . vā ca adyatanyām . vā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_5: adyatanyām bhāṣyate . prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ . prākārṣīt kaṭam devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_6: . kim śakyante ete śabdāḥ prayoktum iti ataḥ nyāyyā eṣā bhūtakālatā . na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_7: prayogāt eva . kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā anumānagamyā aśakyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_8: yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . sā asau yena yena śabdena abhisambadhyate tāvati tāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_9: parisampāpyate . tat yathā . kaḥ cit pāṭaliputram jigamiṣuḥ ekam ahaḥ gatvā āha idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_10: adya gatam iti . na ca tāvatā asya vrajikriyā parisamāptā bhavati . yat tu gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_11: tat abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate idam adya gatam iti . evam iha api yat kṛtam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_12: abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ iti . yadā hi veṇikāntaḥ kaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_13: abhisamīkṣitaḥ bhavati prakaroti kaṭam iti eva tadā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5603_0: 260 kimartham kānackvasoḥ vāvacanam kriyate . kānackvasoḥ vāvacanam chandasi tiṅaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5603_2: dṛśyate . aham sūram ubhayataḥ dadarśa . aham dyāvāpṛthivī ātatāna . na vā anena
GS24pmbhasuu:5603_3: vihitasya ādeśavacanāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . anena vihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5603_4: ādeśavacanāt . astu anena vihitasya ādeśaḥ . kena idānīm chandasi vihitasya liṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5603_5: śravaṇam bhaviṣyati . chandasi luṅlaṅliṭaḥ iti anena . tat etat vāvacanam tiṣṭhatu tāvat sānnyāsikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5607_0: 260-261 atha kitkaraṇam kimartham na asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti eva siddham . kitkararaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5607_1: saṃyogārtham . kitkararaṇam kriyate saṃyogārtham . saṃyogāntāḥ prayojayanti . vṛtrasya

GS24pmbhasuu:5607_3: chāndasau kānackvasū . liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati . tatra sārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:5607_4: apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅittvāt lupadhālopaḥ bhaviṣyati . ṝkārāntaguṇapratiṣedhārtham

GS24pmbhasuu:5607_7: teratuḥ teruḥ evam iha api syāt titīrvān tirirāṇaḥ . punaḥ kitkaraṇā pratiṣidhyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:5615_0: 263-266 kim upeyivān iti nipātanam kriyate . upeyuṣi nipātanam iḍartham . upeyuṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_1: nipātanam kriyate iḍartham . iṭ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_2: iṭ vasvekākādghasām iti . dvirvacane kṛte anekāctvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_3: . dvirvacanam kriyatām iṭ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_4: . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_5: ekādeśe ca prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . na atra ekādeśaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_6: . dīrghaḥ iṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghatvena bādhate . tat etat upeyuṣi nipātanam iḍartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_7: kriyate . upeyuṣi nipātanam iḍartham iti cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ . upeyuṣi nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_8: iḍartham iti cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . upeyuṣā upeyuṣe upeyuṣaḥ upeyuṣi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_9: . ekādiṣṭasya īybhāvārtham tu . ekādiṣṭasya īybhāvārtham tu nipātanam kriyate . ekādiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_10: īy iti etat rūpam nipātyate . nanu ca uktam na atra ekādeśaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_11: . dīrghaḥ iṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghatvena bādhate iti . tat hi na suṣṭhu ucyate . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_12: dīrghatvam ekādeśam bādhate . kaḥ tarhi bādhate . yaṇādeśaḥ . saḥ ca kva bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_13: . yatra asya nimittam asti . yatra hi nimittam na asti niṣpratidvandvaḥ tatra ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_14: . vyañjane yaṇādeśārtham vā . atha vā vyañjane eva yaṇādeśaḥ nipātyate . yaṇādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_15: kṛte ekācaḥ iti iṭ siddhaḥ bhavati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_0: na upeyivān nipātyaḥ . dvirvacanād iṭ bhaviṣyati paratvāt . dvirvacanam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_1: iṭ iti iṭ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . iha api tarhi dvirvacanāt iṭ syāt bibhidvān
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_2: cicchidvān . anyeṣām ekācām dvirvacanam nityam iti āhuḥ . anyeṣām ekācām nityam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_3: . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . asya punaḥ iṭ ca nityaḥ dvivracanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_4: ca . asya punaḥ iṭ ca eva nityaḥ dvivracanam ca . dvirvacane ca kṛte ekāc bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_5: . katham . ekādeśe kṛte . tasmāt iṭ bādhate dvitvam . tasmāt iṭ dvirvacanam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_6: . anūcānaḥ kartari . anūcānaḥ kartarīti vaktavyam . anūktavān anūcānaḥ . anūktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_7: iti eva anyatra . na upeyivān nipātyaḥ . dvirvacanād iṭ bhaviṣyati paratvāt . anyeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_8: ekācām dvirvacanam nityam iti āhuḥ . asya punaḥ iṭ ca nityaḥ dvivracanam ca . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5616_9: vihanyate hi asya . dvirvacane ca ekāctvāt . tasmāt iṭ bādhate dvitvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_0: 266-267 luṅlṛṭoḥ apavādaprasaṅgaḥ bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣavacanāt . luṅlṛṭoḥ apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_1: prāpnoti . agāma ghoṣān . apāma payaḥ . aśayiṣmahi pūtīkatṛṇeṣu . gamiṣyāmaḥ ghoṣān
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_2: . pāsyāmaḥ payaḥ . śayiṣyāmahe pūtīkatṛṇeṣu . kim kāraṇam . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_3: . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣeṇa vidhīyete luṅlṛṭau . tayoḥ viśeṣavihitau lanluṭau apavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_4: prāpnutaḥ . na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_5: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apavādasya nimittābhāvāt . na atra apavādasya nimittam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_6: . kim kāraṇam . anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . anadyatane hi tau vidhīyete laṅluṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_7: . na ca atra anadyatanaḥ kālaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kim tarhi . bhūtakālasāmānyam bhaviṣyatkālasāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_8: ca . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum gamiṣyāmaḥ ghoṣān pāsyāmaḥ payaḥ śayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_9: pūtīkatṛṇeṣu iti yatra etat na jñāyate kim kadā iti . iha tu katham agāma ghoṣān
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_10: apāma payaḥ aśayiṣmahi pūtīkatṛṇeṣu yatra etat nirjñātam bhavati amuṣmin ahani gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_11: iti . atra api na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_12: . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_13: . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . samudraḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5640_4: hyaḥ apacat iti atra api liṭ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_5: anumānagamyā aśakyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_6: sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu . sādhaneṣu ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ . yadi sāvad guṇasamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_7: sādhanam sādhanam api anumānagamyam . atha anyat guṇebhyaḥ sādhanam bhavati prtayakṣaparokṣatāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_8: sambhavaḥ . atha yadā anena rathyāyām taṇḍulodakam dṛṣṭam katham tatra bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_9: . yadi tāvat sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu papāca iti bhavitavyam . bhavanti hi tasya sādhanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_10: parokṣāṇi . atha ye ete kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ cītkārāḥ phūtkārāḥ ca teṣu parokṣeṣu evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_11: api papāca iti bhavitavyam . kathañjātīyakam punaḥ parokṣam nāma . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_12: . varṣaśatavṛttam parokṣam iti . apare āhuḥ . kaṭāntaritam parokṣam iti . apare āhūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_13: . dvyahavṛttam tryahvṛttam ca iti . sarvathā uttamaḥ na sidhyati . suptamattoyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_14: iti vaktavyam . suptaḥ aham kila vilalāpa . mattaḥ aham kila vilalāpa . suptaḥ nu
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_15: aham kila vilalāpa . mattaḥ nu aham kila vilalāpa . atha vā bhavati vai kaḥ cit jāgarat
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_16: api vartamānakālam na upalabhate . tat yathā vaiyākaraṇānām śākaṭāyanaḥ rathamārge
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_17: āsīnaḥ śakaṭasāṛtham yāntam na upalabhate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jāgarat api vartamānakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:5640_18: na upalabhate . manasā saṃyuktāni indriyāṇi upalabdhau kāraṇāni bhavanti . manasaḥ asānnidhyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5644_0: 274 parokṣe liṭ atyantāapahnave ca . parokṣe liṭ iti atra atyantāapahnave ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5644_1: vaktavyam . no khaṇḍikān jagāma no kaliṅgān jagāma . na kārisomam prapau . na dārvajasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5644_2: pratijagrāha . kaḥ me manuṣyaḥ praharet vadhāya . parobhāvaḥ parasya akṣe parokṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5644_3: liṭi dṛśyatām . utvam vā ādeḥ parāt akṣṇaḥ . siddham vā asmāt nipātanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_0: 275-278 sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā adyatane . sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_1: adyatane iti vaktavyam . kim ayam smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_2: . tatra vaktavyam smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca adyatane na bhavataḥ iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_3: smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavataḥ iti . tatra smādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_4: na sma purā adyatane iti vaktavyam . kim ca ataḥ . smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_5: kim kṛtam bhavati na sma purā adyatane iti bruvatā kātyāyanena iha . smādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_6: purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa bhavati kim vārttikakāraḥ pratiṣedhena karoti na sma purā
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_7: adyatane iti . anuvṛttiḥ anadyatanasya lāt sme iti tatra na asti nañkāryam . laṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_8: sme iti atra anadyatane iti etat anuvartiṣyate . aparokṣānadyatanaḥ nanau ca nanvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_9: ca nivṛttau na purā adyatane iti bhavet etat vācyam . tatra etāvat vaktavyam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_10: na purā adyatane iti . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam jñapakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_11: na purālakṣaṇaḥ adyatane bhavati iti . atha buddhiḥ aviśeṣād sma purā hetū . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_12: buddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa sma purā hetū iti . tatra ca api śrṇu bhūyaḥ . aparokṣe ce iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_13: eṣaḥ prāk purisaṃśabdanāt avinivṛttaḥ sarvatra anadyatanaḥ . tathā sati nañā kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_14: iha kāryam . smādau aparokṣe ca iti akāryam iti śakyam etat api viddhi . śakyam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_15: nivartayitum parokṣe iti lāt sme iti atra . syāt eṣā tava buddhiḥ . smalakṣaṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_16: evam eva siddham iti . laṭ sme iti bhavet na arthaḥ . tasmāt kāryam parārtham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:5648_17: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca anadyatane bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5652_0: 278 nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane iti aśiṣyam kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5652_1: iti aśiṣyaḥ laṭ . kim kāraṇam . kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5652_2: vivakṣitā . eṣaḥ nāma nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyāyāḥ asamāptiḥ bhavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5652_3: tatra vartamāne laṭ iti eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti eva laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:5653: nanu mām kurvantam paśya . nanu mām kurvāṇam paśya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_0: 278-279 haśaśvadbhyām purā . haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_1: . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_2: cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_3: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . rathena ha śaśvat purā yāti . rathena ha śaśvat purā ayāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_4: . purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . smaḥ sarvebhyaḥ vipratiṣedhena . smalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_5: sarvebhyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇāt ca . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_6: avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_7: avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt . smalakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_8: . dharmeṇa sma kuravaḥ yudhyante . iha sarvam prāpnoti . na ha sma vai purā śaśvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5657_9: aparaśuvṛkṇam dahati . smalakṣaṇaḥ laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_0: 279-285 pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā bhavantī avartamānatvāt . pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_1: bhavantī . iha adhīmahe . iha vasāmaḥ . iha puṣyamitram yājayāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_2: na sidhyati . avartamānatvāt . nityapravṛtte ca kālāvibhāgāt . nityapravṛtte ca śāsitavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_3: bhavantī . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sravanti nadyaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_4: . kālāvibhāgāt . iha bhūtabhaviṣyatpratidvandvaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ . na ca atra bhūtabhaviṣyantau
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_5: kālau staḥ . nyāyyā tu ārambhānapavargāt . nyāyyā tu eṣā vartamānakālatā . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_6: . ārambhānapavargāt . ārambhaḥ atra anapavṛktaḥ . eṣaḥ nām nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_7: yatra ārambhaḥ anapavṛktaḥ . asti ca muktasaṃśaye virāmaḥ . yam khalu api bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_8: muktasaṃśayam vartamānam kālam nyāyyam manyate bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti tena etat tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_9: . saḥ api hi avaśyam bhuñjānaḥ hasati vā jalpati vā pānīyam vā pibati . yadi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_10: yuktā vartamānakālatā dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . santi ca kālavibhāgāḥ . santi
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_11: khalu api kālavibhāgāḥ . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_12: . kim śakyante ete śabdāḥ prayoktum iti ataḥ santi kālavibhāgāḥ . na avaśyam prayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_13: eva . iha bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānām rājñām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāḥ tiṣṭhateḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_14: . iha tāvat tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ iti . samprati ye rājānaḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu vartamānāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_15: . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ iti . itaḥ uttaram ye rājānaḥ bhaviṣyanti teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5661_16: tāsu bhaviṣyantīṣu . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ iti . ye rājānaḥ babhūvuḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5662: na asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . api ca atra ślokān udāharanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5663_0: na vartate cakram . iṣuḥ na pātyate . na syandante saritaḥ sāgarāya . kūṭasthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5663_1: lokaḥ na viceṣṭā asti . yaḥ hi evam paśyati saḥ api anandhaḥ . mīmāṃsakaḥ manyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5663_2: yuvā medhāvisammataḥ kākam sma iha anupṛcchati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5664_0: kim te patitalakṣaṇam . anāgate na patasi atikrānte ca kāka na . yadi samprati patasi
GS24pmbhasuu:5664_1: sarvaḥ lokaḥ patati ayam . himavān api gacchati . anāgatam atikrāntam vartamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5664_2: iti trayam . sarvatra gatiḥ na asti . gacchati iti kim ucyate . kriyāpravṛttau yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5664_3: hetuḥ tadartham yat viceṣṭitam tat samīkṣya prayuñjīta gacchati iti avicārayan .
GS24pmbhasuu:5664_4: apraḥ āha . asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . ādityagativat na upalabhyate . api ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5664_5: ślokam udāharanti . bisasya vālāḥ iva dahyamānāḥ na lakṣyate vikṛtiḥ sannipāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:5664_6: asti iti tām vedayante tribhabhāvāḥ . sūkṣmaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anumitena gamyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_0: 286-288 lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśānupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . lasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_1: aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśayoḥ nupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . tat yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_2: api lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena yogaḥ na bhavati . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_3: odanam devadattaḥ iti . yogaḥ iti cet anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . atha matam etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_4: yogaḥ iti anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat odanam devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_5: iti . na kva cit yogaḥ iti kṛtvā ataḥ sarvatra yogena bhavitavyam kva cit ayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_6: iti kṛtvā sarvatra ayogena . tat yathā . samānam īhamānānām ca adhīyānānām ca ke
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_7: cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti ataḥ sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_8: śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_9: kartum . yat loṭaḥ aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena yogaḥ bhavati laṅaḥ na svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_10: etat . atha vā ādeśe sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛṣṭvā anumānāt gantavyam prakṛteḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_11: bhavati iti . tat yathā dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_12: parivrājakaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . pratyakṣaḥ tena agnidhūmayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_13: kṛtaḥ bhavati triviṣṭabdhakaparivrājakayoḥ ca . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_14: agniḥ atra parivrājakaḥ atra iti . bhavati vai pratyakṣāt api anumānabalīyastvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_15: . tat yathā alātacakram pratyakṣam dṛśyate anumānāt ca gamyate na etat asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_16: kasya cit khalu api sakṛt kṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ atyantāya kṛtaḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5668_17: vṛkṣaparṇayoḥ ayam vṛkṣaḥ idam parṇam iti . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:5672: 292 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ : yat anyat prathamāsamānādhikaraṇāt iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_0: prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_1: iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_2: iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kaurvataḥ pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_3: pacadbhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ .prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_5: ādeśayoḥ anupapattiḥ . kurvatī ca asau bhaktiḥ ca kurvadbhaktiḥ pacabhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_6: pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_7: na prāpnutaḥ . kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ kurvāṇataraḥ pacamānataraḥ kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_8: kurvāṇarūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ kurvāṇakalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_9: iti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_10: ca śatṛśānacau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_11: . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . ādeśanimittaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyayanimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_12: ca ādeśaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_13: . uttarapadasya ca subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . uttarapadasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_14: subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . uttarapadanimittaḥ sup subantanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_15: ca uttarapadam . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_16: . na vā lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_17: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam . lakāraḥ kṛt kṛt prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_18: iti prātipadikasañjñā . tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . prātipadikāśrayā svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_19: bhaviṣyati . tiṅādeśāt subutpattiḥ . tiṅādeśaḥ kriyatām subutpattiḥ iti paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_20: subutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . tasmāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . tasmāt uttarapadam prasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_21: . uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade iti śatṛśānacau bhaviṣyataḥ . iha api tarhi tiṅādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_22: subutpattiḥ syāt pacati paṭhati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . nityaḥ atra tiṅādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_23: utpanne api supi prāpnoti anutpanne api prāpnoti . nityatvāt tiṅādeśe kṛte subutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_24: na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi nityatvāt tiṅādeśaḥ syāt kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_25: pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau tau ca nimittavantau
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_26: . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_27: utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . na tāvat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_28: kadā cit tiṅ bhavati . apavādau śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate . tat etat kva siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_29: . yatra sāmānyāt utpattiḥ . yatra hi viśeṣāt ataḥ iñ iti itaretarāśrayam eva tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_30: bhavati . vīkṣamāṇasya apatyam vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti . iha ca śatṛśānacau prāpnutaḥ . pacatitarām
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_31: jalpatitarām pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_32: . tat etat katham kṛtvā siddham bhavati . śatṛśānacau yadi laṭaḥ vā . yadi śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_33: yadi laṭaḥ vā bhavataḥ vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca . tena iha ca bhaviṣyataḥ kaurvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_34: pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ pacamānataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_35: kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ pacan
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_36: paṭhan iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau . iha ca na bhaviṣyataḥ pacatitarām jalpatitarām
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_37: pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_38: . tat tarhi vāvacanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5674_39: . nanvoḥ vibhāṣā iti . yadi tat anuvartate vartamāne laṭa iti laṭ api vibhāṣā prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:5679_7: vidyamānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . iṅjuhotyoḥ vāvacanam . iṅjuhotyoḥ vā iti vaktavyam . adhīte

GS24pmbhasuu:5683_6: eva śatṛśānacoḥ satsñjñā syāt . bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ na syāt . kim punaḥ bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_7: satsñjñāvacane prayojanam . pūraṇaguṇasuhitasat iti . brāhmaṇasya pakṣyan . brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_8: pakṣyamāṇaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api taugrahaṇe katham eva asaṃsaktayoḥ etaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_9: sañjñā labhyā . labhyā iti āha . katham . tau iti śabdataḥ sat iti yoge kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_10: tau grahaṇam yogāṅgam jāyate . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tau . tau
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_11: etau śatṛśānacau dhātumātrāt parasya pratyayasya bhavataḥ . tataḥ sat . satsñjñau
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_12: bhavatau śatṛśānacau . iha api tarhi prāpnutaḥ . kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . avadhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_13: lṛṭi vidhānam . lṛtaḥ sat vā iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_14: parasya na anyasya iti . kaimarthyakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_15: . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . nityau śatṛśānacau prāptau . tau vibhāṣā vidheyau
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_16: . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_17: . yogavibhāgataḥ ca vihitam sat . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭaḥ sat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_18: lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau bhavataḥ . kimartham idam . niyamārtham . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_19: parasya na anyasya iti . tataḥ vā . vā ca lṛṭaḥ śatṛśānacau satsañjñau bhavataḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5724_0: 305-306 kimartham idam ucyate na kvip anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti eva siddham . kvibvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_1: anupapadārthaḥ . anupapadārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . paceḥ pak . bhideḥ bhit . chideḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_2: chit . atha yaḥ atra sopasargaḥ tasya grahaṇam kimartham na tena eva siddham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_3: sidhyati . iha ke cit ā kveḥ iti sūtram paṭhanti ke cit prāk kveḥ iti . tatra ye
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_4: ā kveḥ iti paṭhanti taiḥ kvip api ākṣiptaḥ bhavati . tatra tacchīlādiṣu artheṣu kivp
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_5: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ tacchīlādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_6: bhaviṣyati anyatra ca . na sidhyati . ayam tacchīlādiṣu tṛn vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_7: sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . vāsarūpanyāyena ṇvul api bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5724_8: . idānīm eva hi uktam tacchīlādiṣu vartheṣu vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti

GS24pmbhasuu:5729_0: vacipracchyoḥ asamprasāraṇam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_1: . dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt samprasāraṇam na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_2: kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samprasāraṇam . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_3: dīrghatvam . kā antaraṅgatā . pratyayotpattisanniyogena dīrghatvam ucyate utpanne
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_4: pratyaye samprasāraṇam . tatra antaraṅgatvāt dīrghatve kṛte samprasāraṇam . prasāraṇaparapūrvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_5: kṛte kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ dīrghatvam na syāt . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_6: samprasāraṇam na bhaviṣyati iti . dyutigamijuhotīnām dve ca . dyutigamijuhotīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_7: dve ca iti vaktavyam . didyut. dyuti . gami . jagat . gami . juhoti . juhoteḥ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_8: ca . juhūḥ . dṛṇāteḥ hrasvaḥ ca dve ca kvip ca iti vaktavyam . dadṛt . juhūḥ juhoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_9: hvayateḥ vā . dadṛt dṛṇāteḥ dīryateḥ vā . jūḥ jvarateḥ jīryateḥ vā . dhāyateḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5729_10: ca . dhāyateḥ samprasāraṇam ca kvip ca vaktavyaḥ . dhīḥ dhyāyateḥ vā dadhāteḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5733_1: ḍuprakaraṇe mitadrvādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5733_2: . dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . mitradruḥ mitadrū mitadravaḥ . aci
GS24pmbhasuu:5733_3: śnudhātubhruvām iti uvaṅādeśaḥ mā bhūt . iha ca mitadrvā mitadrve na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5733_4: pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt . tugvidhiḥ . mitadruḥ . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5737_0: 308 śīlitaḥ rakṣitaḥ kṣāntaḥ ākruṣṭaḥ juṣṭaḥ iti api ruṣṭaḥ ca ruṣitaḥ ca ubhau abhivyāhṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5737_1: iti api hṛṣṭatuṣṭau tathā kāntaḥ tathā ubhau saṃyotodyatau . kaṣṭam bhaviṣyati iti

GS24pmbhasuu:5739_0: 138.2 - 22 Ro_III.309-312 bahulavacanam kimartham . bāhulakam prakṛteḥ tanudṛṣṭeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_1: . tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante . na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante . prāyasamuccayād
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_2: api teṣām . prāyeṇa khalu api te samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kāryasaśeṣavidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_3: ca tat uktam . kāryāṇi khalu api saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_4: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_5: . kim ca kāraṇam prāyeṇa samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kim ca kāraṇam kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_6: saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni . naigamarūḍibhavam hi susādhu
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_7: . naigamāḥ ca rūḍhibhavāḥ ca auṇādikāḥ susādhavaḥ katham syuḥ . nāma ca dhātujam
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_8: āha nirukte . nāma khalu api dhātujam . evam āhuḥ nairuktāḥ . vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_9: ca tokam . vaiyākaraṇānām ca śākaṭāyanaḥ āha dhātujam nāma iti . atha yasya viśeṣapadārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_10: na samuttitaḥ katham tatra bhavitavyam . yat na viśeṣapadārthasamuttam pratyayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_11: prakṛteḥ ca tat ūhyam . prakṛtim dṛṣṭvā pratyayaḥ ūhitavyaḥ pratyayam ca dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_12: ūhitavyā . sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāḥ ca tataḥ pare kāryāt vidyāt anubandham
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_0: 312-313 bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam . bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_1: kartavyam . śvaḥ grāmam gamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lṛṭā ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_2: kṛiyate . lṛṭ ca anadyatane luṭā bādhyate . tena lṛṭaḥ eva viṣaye ete pratyayāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_3: . luṭaḥ viṣaye na syuḥ . itaretarāśrayam ca . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_4: . bhaviṣyatkālena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . nirdeśottarakālam ca bhbhaviṣyatkālatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_5: . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_6: . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_7: vidhānam iti . aparam api uktam avyayanirdeśāt siddham iti. avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_8: kariṣyate . avartamāne abhūte iti . saḥ tarhi avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_9: . na kartavyaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatiśabdaḥ na eṣā bhavateḥ lṛṭ . katham avyayatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_10: . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_11: iti avayayasañjñā . atha api bhavateḥ lṛṭ evam api avayayam eva . katham na vyeti
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_12: iti avyayam . kva punaḥ na vyeti . etau kālaviśeṣau bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_13: bhaviṣyati eva vartate . yadi tatri na vyeti iti avyayam . na vā tadvidhānasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_14: abhāvāt . na vā bhaviṣyadādhikāreṇa arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tadvidhānasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_15: abhāvāt . ye api ete itaḥ uttaram pratyayāḥ śiṣyante ete api etau kālaviśeṣau na
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_16: viyanti bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ eva te bhaviṣyati eva vartante . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_17: paṭhati . bhaviṣyadadhikārasya prayojanam yāvat pacati purā pacati iti anapaśabdatvāya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5747_0: 314 yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5747_1: luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . yāvatpurānipātayoḥ laṭ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5747_2: bhuṅkte . purā bhuṅkte . luṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ adhyetā . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5747_3: prāpnoti . yāvat śvaḥ bhuṅkte . purā śvaḥ bhuṅkte . laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5747_4: saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . anadyatane luṭ iti atra yāvatpurānipātayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5751_0: 314 kimartham idam ucyate na lipsyamānasiddhiḥ api lipsā eva tatra kiṃvṛtte lipsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5751_1: iti eva siddham . akiṃvṛttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dadāti saḥ svargam
GS24pmbhasuu:5751_2: lokam gacchati . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dāsyati saḥ svargam lokam gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_0: 314-316 kimartham kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām ṇvul vidhīyate na aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_1: ṇvul saḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . ṇvuli sakarmakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_2: coditam . akaramakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . āsakaḥ vrajati . śāyakaḥ vrajati . pratyākhyātam
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_3: tat na vā dhātumātrāt darśanāt ṇvulaḥ iti . evam tarhi tṛjādiṣu vartamānakālopādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_4: coditam . avartamānakālārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . tat api pratyākhyātam na vā kālamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_5: darśanāt anyeṣām iti . idam tarhi prayojanam. akenoḥ bhaviṣyadādhamrṇyayoḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_6: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ uktaḥ . saḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_7: asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ yadā bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyati tadā asya pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_8: . evam tarhi bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_0: aṅga yajatām . lapsyante asya yājakāḥ . ye enam yājayayiṣyanti iti . na eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatkālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_1: . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālaḥ . katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . dhātusambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_2: pratyayāḥ iti . yaḥ tarhi na dhātusambandhaḥ . ime asya yājakāḥ . ime asya lāvakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_3: iti . eṣaḥ api bhūtakālaḥ . katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . sambandhāt . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_4: ca tāvat taiḥ ayājitaḥ bhavati . tasya ca tāvat taiḥ yavāḥ alūnāḥ bhavanti . ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_5: ca . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām tumun vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_6: saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . etat api na asti prayojanam . bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_7: tumun vidhīyate kartari ṇvul . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāve vihitaḥ tumun kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_8: vihitam ṇvulam bādheta . lṛṭ tarhi bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_9: paṭhati . ṇvulaḥ kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam tṛjādipratiṣedhārtham . ṇvulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_10: kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5756_11: ācāryaḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . ṇvul api tṛjādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_0: 316-317 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ ye vihitāḥ te kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_1: upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_2: . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . idānīm eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_3: uktam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . bhāvavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_4: ca api tṛjādayaḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathāvihitāḥ iti tu vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_5: . kim prayojanam . iha yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_6: tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām yathā syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_7: vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha bhāve pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_8: bhavanti iti iyaṭa siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_9: tasya etat prayojanam vācakāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_10: viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_11: upapde kriyārthāyām bhavanti tataḥ amī vācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_12: vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_0: 317-318 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa karmaṇi aṇ vihitaḥ saḥ kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_1: kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . aṇaḥ punarvacanam apavādaviṣaye anivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_2: . aṇaḥ punarvacanam kriyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . godāyaḥ vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_3: . kambaladāyaḥ vrajati iti . kim ucyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_4: punaḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhyartham syāt . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapde
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_5: kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . aṇ ca api tṛjādiḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_6: ubhayam anena kriyate . apavādaviṣaye cānivṛttiḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_7: . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . karmagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_8: . katham punaḥ antareṇa karmagrahaṇam karmaṇi aṇ labhyaḥ . vacanagrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_9: anuvartate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . aparyāyeṇa iti tu vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_10: kadā cit hi karmaṇi syāt kadā cit kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_11: . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . aṇ karmaṇi ca . kim ca anyat . kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_12: upapade kriyārthāyām iti . evam api pratyekam upapadasañjñā na prāpnoti . cena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5764_13: sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti pratyekam upapadasañjña bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_0: 318-319 śeṣavacanam kimartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_1: lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . pratipadavidhiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_2: . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ abhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_3: syāt . kariṣyāmi iti vrajati . hariṣyāmi iti vrajati iti . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_4: . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_5: iti . lṛṭ ca api tṛjādiḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . sādhīyaḥ tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_6: śeṣagrahaṇena kriyārthopapadāt lṛṭ nirbhajyate . kim kāraṇam . akriyārthopapadatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_7: . śeṣe iti ucyate . śeṣaḥ ca kaḥ . yat anyat kriyāyāḥ kriyārthāyāḥ . evam tarhi lṛṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_8: śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate kriyāyām pratipadavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_9: yathā syāt . lṛṭ śeṣe ca . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti . kva ca . kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_10: iti . saḥ tarhi cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha lṛṭ bhavati iti iyatā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_11: . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat śeṣagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_12: yathā upajāyeta . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭ bhavati kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:5768_13: kriyārthāyām iti . tataḥ śeṣe . śeṣe ca lṛṭ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_1: nityam iti vaktavyam . pakṣyantam paśya . pakṣyamāṇam paśya . kva tarhi idānīm vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5776_0: 320 yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau bhavataḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhyāsyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:5776_1: . śvaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇena . tataḥ luṭ . luṭ bhavati anadyatane . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5776_3: bhavati anadyatane lṛṭ iti yat ayam anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau śāsti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5776_4: saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5780_1: iti vaktavyam . iyam nu kadā gantā yā evam pādau nidadhāti . ayam nu kadā adhyetā
GS24pmbhasuu:5780_2: yaḥ evam anabhiyuktaḥ iti . kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam . kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5780_3: . gantā iva iyam gantā . na iyam gamiṣyati . adhyetā iva ayam adhyetā . na vai tiṅantena

GS24pmbhasuu:5792_0: 323-324 bhāve sarvaliṅganirdeśaḥ . bhāve sarvaliṅganirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . bhūtau bhavane
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_1: bhāve iti . kim prayojanam . sarvaliṅge bhāṅe ete pratyayāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_2: punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . puṃliṅgena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanena ca . ten
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_3: puṃliṅge eva ekavacane ca ete prratyayāḥ syuḥ . strīnapuṃsakayoḥ dvivacanabahuvacnayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_4: ca na syuḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva ca nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_5: tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra puṃliṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_6: nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanena ca . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit ca liṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_7: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam satuṣam sapalālam āharati
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_8: nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_9: cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_10: tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_11: kriyate ekavacanāntena ca . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . kayā cit vibhaktyā kena
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_12: cit ca liṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . atha vā kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_13: pacādayaḥ . yat ca atra pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati na tat bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_14: . yat ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati na tat pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati . kim ca pacateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_15: bhavatiḥ bhavati . sāmānyam . kim ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati . viśeṣaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_16: upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ mātulasya bhāgineyam gatvā āha . upādhyāyam bhavān abhivādayatām
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_17: iti . saḥ gatvā mātulam abhivādayate . tathā mātulasya bhāgineyaḥ upādhyāyasya śiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_18: gatvā āha . mātulam bhavān abhivādayatām iti . saḥ gatvā upādhyāyam abhivādayate
GS24pmbhasuu:5792_19: . evam iha api pacateḥ bhavatau yat tat nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5796_0: 325-327 kārakagrahaṇam kimartham . kārakagrahaṇam anādeśe svārthavijñānāt . kārakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5796_1: anādeśe svārthavijñānāt . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti . tat yathā

GS24pmbhasuu:5796_3: svārthe mā bhūvan kārake yathā syuḥ iti evamartham idam ucyate . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5796_4: . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti . tena atriprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5796_5: ayam vijñāyeta . akartari sañjñāyām eva iti . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit sañjñābhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5796_6: bhāvaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha : āvāhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_0: vivāhaḥ iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_1: asti vidheyam . akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ghañ vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_2: astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . tat eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_3: svārthe mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_4: . anyaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena idānīm ābhyantare bhāve syāt . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_5: punaḥ etayoḥ bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ bhāṣye . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_6: . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_7: asnyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñayate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_8: ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam puruṣam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_9: . evam iha api akartari iti kartṛpratiṣedhāt anyasmin akartari kartṛsadṛśe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_10: vijñasyate . kim ca anyat akartṛ kartṛsadṛśam . kārakam . uttarārtham tarhi kārakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_11: kartavyam . parimāṇākhyāyām sarvebhyaḥ kārake yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_12: . deve sṛtī iti . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye avacane hi strīpratyayānām api avādavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_13: iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_14: akartari iti eva anuvartiṣyate . sañjñāgrahaṇānarthakyam ca sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_15: . sañjñāgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt . asañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_16: api hi ghañ dṛśyate . kaḥ bhavatā dāyaḥ dattaḥ . kaḥ bhavatā lābhaḥ labdhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_17: yadi sañjñāgrahaṇam na kriyate atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ iti atra kāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_18: kaṭa iti prāpnoti . atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5797_19: . atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_0: 327-329 sarvagrahaṇam kimartham . sarvebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ yathā syāt ajapoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_1: viṣaye . ekaḥ taṇḍulaniścāyaḥ . dvau śūrpaniṣpāvau . sarvagrahaṇam anarthakam parimāṇākhyāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_2: iti siddhatvāt . sarvagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . parimāṇākhyāyam iti siddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_3: . parimāṇākhyāyam iti eva ghañ siddhaḥ ajapoḥ api viṣaye . na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_4: . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ekaḥ pākaḥ dvau pākau trayaḥ pākāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_5: iti . pūrveṇa api etat siddham . na sidhyati . sañjñāyām iti pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_6: eṣā sañjñā . pratyākhyāyate sañjñāgrahaṇam . atha api kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_7: ajau api sañjñāyām eva . yathājātīyakaḥ utsargaḥ tathājātīyakena apavādena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_8: . uttarārtham tarhi . iṅaḥ ca sarvebhyaḥ api yathā syāt . nanu ca ayam iṅ ekaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_9: vaṇṭaraṇḍākalpaḥ . sarveṣu sādhaneṣu yathā syāt . upetya adhīyate tasmāt adhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_10: . adhīyate tasmin adhyāyaḥ . adhyāyanyāyāyodyāvasaṃhārāvāyāḥ ca iti etat nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_11: na kartavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . uttarāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_12: eva tarhi vaktavyam . karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām iti sarvebhyaḥ yathā syāt . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_13: api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_14: . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham . vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_15: doṣaḥ . siddham tu prakṛte strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca iti . uttarārtham

GS24pmbhasuu:5801_17: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_18: . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham . na tu lyuṭ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . prakṛtyāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_19: yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam yathā syāt . arthāśrayaḥ yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5801_20: mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī iti . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye . avacane hi

GS24pmbhasuu:5805_2: apavādaḥ ayam vijñayeta . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī iti . dārajārau kartari ṇiluk

GS24pmbhasuu:5817_0: 331-332 strīgrahaṇam kimartham . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham . karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:5817_1: strīgrahaṇam kriyate vyatipākārtham . iha mā bhūt . vyatipākaḥ vartate iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5817_2: kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham . pṛthak grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5817_3: kriyate bādhakabādhanārtham . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5817_4: . vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham . vyāvacorī vartate . vyāvacarcī vartate . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5817_5: doṣaḥ . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . vyatīkṣā vartate . vyatīhā vartate . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5817_6: tu prakṛte strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca . siddham etat . katham . prakṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5817_7: eva strīgrahaṇe ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . striyām ktin . tataḥ karmavyatihāre ṇac . tataḥ ṇicaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5821_2: ktādayaḥ mā bhūvan iti . atha kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5822: ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . na tu lyuṭaḥ . lyuṭaḥ tu bādhanam na iṣyate . saṅkūṭanam iti eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5826: 333-334 ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam . ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bhayam . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5827: bhayasya iti . bhayādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5828_0: bhayam varṣam . kim prayojanam . napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . napuṃsakaliṅge ktādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5828_1: mā bhūvan iti . kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ . kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5828_2: . kalpaḥ arthaḥ mantraḥ . javasavau chandasi . javasavau chandasi vaktavyau . ūrvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5828_3: astu me javaḥ . ayam me pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_0: 334-335 kimartham niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ ap vidhīyate na acā eva siddham . na hi asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_1: viśeṣaḥ niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ apaḥ vā acaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_2: . hastādāne ceḥ ghañ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . abvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_3: niścigrahaṇam anarthakam steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt . abvidhau niścigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_4: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt . steyasya ghañvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_5: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . niṣpūrvaḥ cinotiḥ steye vartate . asteyārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_6: . niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye yathā syāt . asteyārtham iti cet na aniṣṭatvāt . asteyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_7: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭatvāt . na niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye ap iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_8: . kim tarhi ghañ eva iṣyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ apam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_9: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yat tat antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitṛkāṇām iti tat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5832_10: na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . niścayaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:5836_1: . dhanañjayaḥ raṇe raṇe . ghañarthe kavidhānam sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . ghañarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5836_2: kaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . sthā . pratiṣṭhante
GS24pmbhasuu:5836_3: asmin dhānyāni iti prasthaḥ . prasthe himavataḥ śrṅge . sthā . snā . prasnānti tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5836_4: iti prasnaḥ . snā . pā . prapibanti asyām iti prapā . pā . vyadhi . āvidhyanti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:5836_5: āvidham . vyadhi . hani . vighnanti tasmin manāṃsi vighnaḥ . hani . yudhi . āyudhyante tena āyudham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5840_0: 336 kasmāt ayam kaḥ vidhīyate . hanteḥ iti āha . tat hantigrahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5840_1: kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . hanaḥ ca vadhaḥ . tat vai anekena
GS24pmbhasuu:5840_2: nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . na etāni nipātanāni . hanteḥ ete
GS24pmbhasuu:5840_3: ādeśāḥ . yadi ādeśāḥ ghanasvaraḥ na sidhyati . ghanaḥ . santu tarhi nipātanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:5840_4: nanu ca uktam tat vai anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum iti

GS24pmbhasuu:5918_0: 346-348 vatkaraṇam kimartham . vartamānasāmīpye vartmānāḥ vā iti iyati ucyamāne vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_1: ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ vartamānasāmīpye dhātumātrāt syuḥ . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_2: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa vartamāne pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_3: vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa vartamānasāmīpye bhavanti tataḥ amīvartamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_4: kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvartamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_5: kṛtāḥ syuḥ . iha vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavat vā iti uktvā loṭ eva udāhriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_6: yadi punaḥ vā laṭ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . vartamānasāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_8: śatrādyartham . śatrādyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi pacan . eṣaḥ asmi pacamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_9: iti . na etat asti prayojanam . laḍādeśau śatṛśānacau . tatra vā laṭ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_10: eva siddham . yau tarhi alaḍādeśau . eṣaḥ asmi pavamānaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi yajamānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_11: yau ca api laḍādeśau tau api prayojayataḥ . vartamānavihitasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_12: ucyete . aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ ca ayam yogaḥ . śatrādyartham iti khalu api ucyate . bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_13: ca śatrādayaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi alaṅkariṣṇuḥ . eṣaḥ asmi prajaniṣṇuḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5926_3: te āśaṃsāyām api prāpnuvanti . kim tarhi ucyate aprāptiḥ iti . na sādhīyaḥ prāptiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5926_6: āśaṃsā . āśaṃsā nāma pradhāritaḥ arthaḥ abhinītaḥ ca anabhinītaḥ ca . sambhāvanam

GS24pmbhasuu:5934_0: 350-351 aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ śiṣyaḥ aniṣpannatvāt . aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_1: śiṣyaḥ śāsitavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aniṣpannatvāt . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ niṣpannāḥ śālayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_2: . tatra bhavitavyam sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . siddham tu bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_3: siddham etat . katham . bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt . yat lokaḥ bhaviṣyadvācinaḥ śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_4: prayogam na mṛṣyati . kaḥ cit āha . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_5: ucyate . mā evam vocaḥ . sampannāḥ śālayaḥ iti evam brūhi . hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_6: vā . hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt vā punaḥ siddham etat . hetubhūtakālam varṣam varṣākālā
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_7: ca kriyā . yadi tarhi niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante . kāni . bhojanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_8: . anyat idānīm etat ucyate kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante iti . yat tu tat niṣpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_9: arthaḥ na niṣpannaḥ iti . saḥ niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam khalu api koṣṭhagateṣu api
GS24pmbhasuu:5934_10: śāliṣu avahananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi . evam iha api niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam tu jananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi .

GS24pmbhasuu:5938_1: sarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ . kūpaḥ asti . kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . kūpaḥ bhavitā . kūpaḥ abhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_2: . kūpaḥ āsīt . kūpaḥ babhūva iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhavantyāḥ eṣaḥ arthaḥ iti
