GS24pmbhasuu:5938_5: tatra buddhyā nityām sattām adhyavasyati . kūpaḥ asti iti . siddham tu yathāsvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_6: kālasamuccāraṇāt . siddham etat . katham . yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_7: kāleṣu prayujyante iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_8: kāleṣu prayujyante iti . avātvāt . yat na vā bhāṣyante . asiddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_9: ca viparyāsaḥ . na hi kaḥ cit kūpaḥ asti iti prayoktavye kūpaḥ abhūt iti prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_10: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam . na vā bhāṣyante asiddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ . iha kim cit indriyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_11: kim cit buddhikarma . indriyakarma samāsādanam buddhikarmavyavasāyaḥ . evam hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_12: cit pāṭaliputram jigamiṣuḥ āha . yaḥ ayam adhvā gantavyaḥ ā pāṭaliputrāt etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_13: kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsādya atikramya uṣitvā kūpaḥ āsīt iti . samāsādya atikramya
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_14: uṣitvā vismṛtya kūpaḥ babhūva iti . tat yadā indriyakarma tadā etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5938_15: yadā hi buddhikarma tadā vartamānā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5942_0: 353-354 kimartham imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete na adyatanavat iti eva ucyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5942_1: anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . na anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5942_2: pratiṣedhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . adyatanavadvacane hi vidhānam . adyatanavadvacane hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5942_3: vidhiḥ iyam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra laḍvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tatra laḍvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5942_4: prasajyeta . luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam . luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam prayogaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5942_5: . luṅaḥ api viṣaye lṛṭ syāt lṛṭaḥ ca viṣaye luṅ syāt . adya punaḥ ayam dvau pratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5942_6: uktvā tūṣṇīm āste . yathāprāptem eva adyatane bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_0: 354-355 kimartham idam ucyate na na anadyatanavat iti eva siddham . bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_1: avarasmin iti akriyāprabandhārtham . akriyāprabandhārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_2: akriyāprabandhaḥ . na punaḥ kriyāprabandhārthaḥ api syāt . kriyāprabandhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_3: cet vacanānarthakyam . kriyāprabandhārtham iti cet vacanam anarthakam . siddham kriyāprabandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_4: pūrveṇa eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . anahorātrāṇām iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_5: . yaḥ ayam triṃśadrātraḥ āgāmī tasya yaḥ avaraḥ pañcadaśarātraḥ iti . ahorātrapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_6: iti cet na aniṣṭatvāt . ahorātrapratiṣedhārtham iti cet tat na aniṣṭatvāt . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_7: . aniṣṭatvāt . atra api na anadyatanavat iti eva iṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_0: bhaviṣyati iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha ma bhūt . yaḥ ayam adhvā gataḥ ā pāṭaliputrāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_1: yat avaram sāketāt iti . na aniṣṭatvāt . atra api na anadyatanavat iti eva iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam maryādāvacane iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . yaḥ ayam adhvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_3: aparimāṇaḥ gantavyaḥ tasya yat avaram sāketāt iti . atra api na anadyatanavat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_4: eva iṣyate . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane avarasmin iti akriyāprabandhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_0: 356 anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ . anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_1: vaktavyaḥ . yaḥ ayam triṃśadrātraḥ āgāmītasya yaḥ avaraḥ ardhamāsaḥ . taiḥ ca vibhāge
GS24pmbhasuu:5952: yaḥ ayam māsaḥ āgāmītasya yaḥ avaraḥ pañcadaśarātraḥ iti . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5953: ahorātrāṇām eva ahorātraiḥ vibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5954: anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ . taiḥ ca vibhāge iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5957: kasmin parasmin . kālavibhāge . kutaḥ etat . yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_0: 357 sādhanātipattau iti api vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . abhokṣyata bhavān māṃsena
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_1: yadi matsamīpe āsiṣyata iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na antareṇa sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_2: kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ asti iti sādhanātipattiḥ cet kriyātipattiḥ api bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5965: 357 bhūte lṛṅ utāpyādiṣu . bhūte lṛṅ utāpyādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ . uta adhyāiṣyata . api adhyaiṣyata .
GS24pmbhasuu:5969: 357-358 vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām . vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām iti vaktavyam . vā ā utāpyoḥ iti hi ucyamāne sandehaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5970: prāk vā utāpibhyām saha vā iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5974_1: narthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kriyāsamāptivivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5974_2: . eṣaḥ ca nāma nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyā aparisamāptā bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5974_3: vartamāne laṭ iti eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti evam atra laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:5975: api mām yājayantam paśya . api mām yājayamānam paśya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_1: anadhikārāt uttaratra akiṃvṛttagrahaṇam anarthakam . nivṛttam kiṃvṛtte iti . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_2: nivṛtte aviśeṣeṇa kiṃvṛtte akiṃvṛtte ca bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam upapadasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_3: vakṣyāmi iti . upapadasañjñāvacane kim prayojanam . upapadam atiṅ iti samāsaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_4: syāt . atiṅ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yadā tarhi lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau tadā upapadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_5: bhaviṣyati . bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau ucyete aviśeṣavihitaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5983_0: 359 jātuyadoḥ liṅvidhāne yadāyadyoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . jātuyadoḥ liṅvidhāne yadāyadyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5983_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yadā bhavadvidhaḥ kṣatriyam yājayet . yadi bhavadvidhaḥ kṣatriyam yājayet .
GS24pmbhasuu:5987_1: anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthānyatvāt . na hi yadau upapade citrīkaraṇam gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5991_0: 360 hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ vā . hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ vā iti vaktavyam . anena cet yāyāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:5991_1: śakaṭam paryābhavet . anena cet yāsyati na śakaṭam paryābhaviṣyati . bhaviṣyadadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:5991_2: . bhaviṣyadadhikāre iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . varṣati iti dhāvati . hanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5991_3: palayate . atha idānīm śatṛśānacau atra kasmāt na bhavataḥ . devatrātaḥ galaḥ grāhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5991_4: itiyoge ca sadvidhiḥ . mithaḥ te na vibhāṣyante . gavākṣaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5995: 361 kāmapravedanam cet . kāmapravedanam cet gamyate iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . icchan kaṭam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5999_0: 361 vidhyadhīṣṭayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . vidhiḥ nāma preṣaṇam . adhīṣṭam nām satkārpūrvikā
GS24pmbhasuu:5999_1: vyāpāraṇā . atha nimantraṇāmantraṇayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . sannihitena nimantraṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5999_2: asannihitena ca āmantraṇam . na eṣaḥ asti viśeṣaḥ . asannihitena api nimantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5999_3: bhavati sannihitena ca āmantraṇam . evam tarhi yat niyogataḥ kartavyam tat nimantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5999_4: . kim punaḥ tat . havyam kavyam vā . brāhmaṇena siddham bhujyatām iti ukte adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_0: 362-365 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti āhosvit nimantraṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_1: gamyamāneṣu iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti cet āmantrayai
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_2: nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt . nimantraṇādīīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_3: arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_4: . prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt . prakṛtyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_5: . dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt . dvivacanabahuvanayoḥ ca a prasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_6: . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ nimantraṇam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_7: eva prāpnoti . astu tarhi nimantraṇādiṣu gamyamāneṣu . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_8: bhavantam āmantrayate . devadattaḥ bhavantam nimantrayate iti . siddham tu dvitīyākāṅkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_9: prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayavidhānāt . siddham etat . katham . dvitīyākāṅkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_10: dhātoḥ prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke ca prakṛtāḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_11: . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ . bhavet siddham prāpnotu bhavān āmantraṇam anubhavatu bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_12: amantraṇam iti yatra dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkyate . idam tu na sidhyati āmantrayai nimantrayai
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_13: iti . atra api dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkyate . kaḥ . nimantriḥ eva . āmantrayai āmantraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_14: nimantrayai nimantraṇam . katham punaḥ nimnatriḥ nimantraṇam ākāṅkṣet . dṛṣṭaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_15: bhāvena bhāvayogaḥ . tat yathā iṣiḥ iṣiṇā yujyate strītvam ca strītvena . yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_16: atra dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate asti tarhi nimantraṇādīnām arthe iti . nanu ca uktam nimantraṇādīīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_17: arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_18: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ asau dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate saḥ eva mama pratyayārthaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_19: . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_20: . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_21: karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_22: . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_23: . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6003_24: naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na ekasmin na dvayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_0: 365-366 kimartham praiṣādiṣu artheṣu kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante na aviśeṣeṇa vihitāḥ kṛtyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_1: te praiṣādiṣu bhaviṣyanti anyatra ca . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vidhānam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_2: niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_3: vacanam niyamārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_4: iti cet tat aniṣṭam prāpnoti . na hi praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ iṣyante . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_5: aviśeṣeṇa iṣyante . busopendhyam tṛṇopendhyam ghanghātyam . vidhyartham tu striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_6: prāk iti vacanāt . vidhyartham tu praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam . ayam praiṣādiṣu loṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_7: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitān kṛtyān bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa kṛtyāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:6007_8: bhaviṣyanti . na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . striyāḥ prāk iti vacanāt . prāk striyāḥ vā asarūpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6011_0: 366 prathamānteṣu iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . kāle bhuṅkte . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6011_1: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . praiṣādiṣu iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam praiṣādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6011_2: anuvartyam . prathamānteṣu iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta . kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_1: kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_2: . lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . lādeśau hisvau mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt yadi lādeśau
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_3: hisvau syātām . tiṅantam padam iti padasañjñā na syāt . māt bhūt evam . subantam
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_4: padam iti padasañjñā bhaviṣyati . katham svādyutpattiḥ . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_5: tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . lakāraḥ kṛt . tasya kṛttvāt kṛt prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_6: . prātipadikāśrayā svādyutpattiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yadi svādyutpattiḥ supām śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_7: prāpnoti . avyayāt iti subluk bhaviṣyati . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_8: ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam iti avyayasañjñā . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_9: saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_10: . samasaṅkhyārtham ca . samasaṅkhyārtham ca hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_11: kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām . vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_12: iti . na vā tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam jñāpakam padādeśasya . na vā hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_13: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam jñāpakam padādeśasya . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_14: vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ padādeśau hisvau iti . tatra padādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_15: pittvāṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra padādeśe pittvasya āṭaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_16: pittvasya tāvat . saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . āṭaḥ khalu api .
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_17: saḥ aham lunīhi lunīhi iti evam lunāni . pittvasya tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . pitpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_18: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . iha seḥ hi bhavati . tataḥ apit ca . apit ca bhavati yāvān
GS24pmbhasuu:6015_19: hiḥ nāma . āṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_0: āṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_1: kṛte api āṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . āṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_2: akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ āṭ . anyasya kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_3: prāpnoti . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ api anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_4: . anyasya kṛte āṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_5: bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_6: . idam tarhi saḥ aham bhuṅkṣva bhuṅkṣva iti evam bhunajai iti śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_7: akāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . samasaṅkhyārthatvam ca api aparihṛtam eva. siddham tu loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_8: kriyāsamabhihāre dvirvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_9: kriyāsamabhihāre dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kena vihitasya kriyāsamabhihāre loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_10: dvirvacanam ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_11: yat ayam kriyāsamabhihāre loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya dvirvacanam śāsti . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_12: nu khalu etat jñāpakāt atra loṭ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_13: saḥ yadā kriyāsamabhihāre bhavati tadā asya dvirvacanam bhavati iti . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_14: eva khalu api siddham syāt . imau ca anyau hisvau sarveṣām puruṣāṇām sarveṣām vacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_15: iṣyete . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_16: lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . samasaṅkhyārtham ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6017: . tataḥ loṭaḥ hisvau bhavataḥ . loṭ iti eva anuvartate . loṭaḥ yau hisvau iti . katham vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti . vā ca tadhvambhāvinaḥ loṭaḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_0: 373 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . hisvāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_1: avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_2: idam tarhi prayojanam . yathāvidhi iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_3: . samuccaye sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyati . tatra antareṇa vacanam yathāvidhi anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_0: 373-374 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_1: . hisvāntam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_2: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_3: na asti prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya anuprayogaḥ astu viśeṣavacanasya iti sāmānyavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6029_1: narthakam . kim kāraṇam . liṅarthatvāt . liṅarthe leṭ iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6029_2: liṅarthaḥ . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ . hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ iti . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6030: vaktavyaḥ eva etasmin viśeṣe liṅ . prayujyate hi loke yadi me bhavān idam kuryāt aham api te idam dadyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_0: 375 tumarthe iti ucyate . kaḥ tumarthaḥ . kartā . yadi evam na arthaḥ tumarthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_1: . yena eva khalu api hetunā kartari tumun bhavati tena eva hetunā sayādayaḥ api bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_2: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tumarthagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_3: kartuḥ tumunaḥ arthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau . bhāvaḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat bhāve tumun
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_4: bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ karmādiṣu kārakeṣu iti . jñāpakāt ayam kartuḥ apakṛṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_5: na ca anyasmin arthe ādiśyate . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_6: bhaviṣyati tat yathā guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . saḥ asau svārthe bhavan
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_7: bhāve bhaviṣyati . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . avyayakṛtaḥ bhāve bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_0: 375-376 kimartham meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam kriyate na udīcām
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_1: meṅaḥ iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . udīcām meṅaḥ iti vyatihāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_2: na kartavyam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . tadviṣayaḥ hi saḥ . vaytihāraviṣayaḥ eva mayatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_3: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_4: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam bhavati iti .kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_6: iti uktam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate na samānakartṛkayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_7: pūrvakāle iti eva siddham . apūrvakālārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . pūrvam hi asau yācate paścāt apamayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6042: pūrvam bhuṅkte paścāt vrajati . svaśabdena uktatvāt na bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:6043_0: pūrvam bhuktvā tataḥ vrajati iti . na etat kriyāpaurvakālyam . kim tarhi . kartṛpaurvakālyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6043_1: . pūrvam hi asau bhuktvā anyebhyaḥ bhoktṛbhyaḥ tataḥ paścāt vrajati anyebhyaḥ vrajitṛbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6044_0: āsyate bhoktum iti . kutaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . kim āseḥ āhosvit bhujeḥ . bhujeḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6044_1: na bhavati . apūrvakālatvāt . āseḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . yasmāt atra laṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6044_2: . etat atra praṣṭavyam . laṭ atra katham bhavati iti . laṭ ca atra vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_0: 377-378 samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ . samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu ktvā na
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_1: prāpnoti . snātvā bhuktvā pītvā vrajati iti . kim puna kāraṇam na sidhyati . dvivacananirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_2: . dvivacanena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . tena dvayoḥ eva paurvakālye syāt . bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_3: na syāt . siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt . siddham etat . katham . kriyāpradhanatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_4: . kriyāpradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_5: nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_6: atra dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_7: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam satuṣam sapalālam āharati
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_8: nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_9: cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_10: tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_11: kriyate . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_12: . loke brāhmaṇānām pūrvam ānīyatām iti ukte sarvapūrvaḥ ānīyate . evam iha api sarvapūrvāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_13: kriyāyāḥ prāpnoti . anantyavacanāt tu siddham . samānakartṛkayoḥ anantyasya iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_14: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam samānakartṛkayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_15: iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_16: ca uktam evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ sarveṣām atra vrajikriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_17: prati paurvakālyam . snātvā vrajati bhuktvā vrajati pītvā vrajati iti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_18: prayogaḥ aniyataḥ bhavati . snātvā bhuktva pītvā vrajati . pītvā snātvā bhutvā vrajati iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6070_0: 385 ūlopaścāsyānyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham goṣpadam vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6070_1: iti . prātiḥ pūraṇakarmā . tasmāt eṣaḥ kaḥ . yadi kaḥ vibhatīnām śravaṇam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6070_2: . śrūyante eva atra vibhaktayaḥ . tat yathā ekena goṣpadapreṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_0: 386 hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam vacanam hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhānāt . hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_1: vacanam . kim kāraṇam . hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhānāt . hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_2: . tena eva siddham . arthavat tu ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . arthavat tu hanteḥ ṇamulvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_3: . kaḥ arthaḥ . ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . ahiṃsārthānām ṇamul yathā syāt . asti punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_4: ayam kva cit hantiḥ ahiṃsārthaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha . pāṇyupaghātam
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_5: vedim hanti . nityasamāsārtham ca . nityasamāsārtham ca hiṃsārthāt api hanteḥ anena
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_6: vidhiḥ eṣitavyaḥ . katham punaḥ icchatā api hiṃsārthāt hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ labhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_7: . anena astu tena vā iti tena syāt vipratiṣedhena . hanteḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vārttikena
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_8: eva jñāpitaḥ . yat ayam nityasamāsārtham ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ hiṃsārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6074_9: api hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ bhavati iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6078_1: sañjñāyām . tataḥ kartroḥ jīvapuruṣayoḥ naśivahoḥ iti . katham aṭṭālikābandham baddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6078_2: caṇḍālikābanadham baddhaḥ . upamāne karmaṇi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:6084_2: siddham bhavati yaḥ ca anyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham iha

GS24pmbhasuu:6090_0: 388-393 kimartham idam ucyate . kartari kṛdvacanam anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_1: kṛtaḥ bhavanti iti ucyate anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_2: bhavanti . tat yathā . guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . evam ime api pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_3: svārthe syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan kartari yathā syuḥ iti evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_4: na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati svārthe āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_5: karmaṇi tarhi mā bhūvan iti . karmaṇi api yam icchati āha tam . dhaḥ karmaṇi ṣṭran
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_6: iti . karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ tarhi mā bhūvan iti . karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ api yam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_7: āha tam . lyuṭ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ bhavati iti . sampradānāpādānayoḥ tarhi mā bhūvan
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_8: iti . sampradānāpādānayoḥ api yam icchati āha tam . dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_9: apādāne iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa vacanam kartari eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_10: . tat eva tarhi prayojanam svārthe mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam yam icchati svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_11: āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati iti . anyaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_12: idānīm ābhyantare bhāve syuḥ . tatra mā bhūvan iti kartṛgrahaṇam . kaḥ punaḥ anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_13: bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ bhāṣye . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_14: . tatra khyunādipratiṣedhaḥ nānāvākyatvāt . tatra khyunādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_15: . khyunādayaḥ kartari mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca karaṇe khunādayaḥ vidhīyante . te kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_16: na bhaviṣyanti . tena ca karaṇe syuḥ anena ca kartari . nanu ca apavādatvāt khyunādayḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_17: bādhakāḥ syuḥ . na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . nānāvākyatvāt . nānāvākyam tat ca idam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_18: . samānavākye apavādaiḥ utsargāhḥ bādhyante . nānāvākyatvāt bādhanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_19: . tadvat ca kṛtyeṣu evakārakaraṇam . evam ca kṛtvā kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ kriyate . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_20: eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ iti bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . kim prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_21: . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_22: sāmāni iti . ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_23: ayam kartari ca ṛṣidevatayoḥ iti siddhe sati samāveśe samāveśārtham cakāram śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_24: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na bhavati samāveśaḥ iti . kimartham tarhi kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_25: kriyate . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe draṣṭavyam . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_26: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyā bhavanti bhavyādīnām kartari ca iti . kim prayojanam . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_27: bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām .
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_28: geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti . yat tāvat ucyate ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_29: jñāpakam asamāveśasya iti . na etat jñāpakasādhyam apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ apavādaiḥ bādhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_30: iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyeran . nanu ca uktam nānāvākyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_31: bādhanam na prāpnoti iti . na videśastham iti kṛtvā nānāvākyam bhavati . videśastham
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_32: api sat ekavākyam bhavati . tat yathā dvitīye adhyāye luk ucyate . tasya caturthaṣaṣṭhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_33: aluk ucyate apavādaḥ . yat api ucyate evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe iti . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_34: anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . katham evakāraḥ cārthe vartate . saḥ eṣaḥ evakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_35: svārthe vartate . kim prayojanam . jñāpakārtham . etat jñāpayati acāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_36: samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_37: samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_38: . yadi etat jñapyate iha api samāveśaḥ prāpnoti dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_39: apādāne iti . atra api siddham bhavati . yat ayam ādikarmaṇi ktaḥ kartari ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6090_40: siddhe samāveśe samāveśam śāsti tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ prāk amutaḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6095: dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ vā niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca bhavati pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . āhosvit sañjñāniyamaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6096_0: dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ vā svabhāvataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6096_1: pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6096_2: . tatra pratyayaniyame sati aniṣṭam prāpnoti . kāṣṭhabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_0: balabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ . eṣaḥ api niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca syāt pratyayasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_1: ca . sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame sati siddham bhavati . yadi sañjñāniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_2: vibhaktādiṣu doṣaḥ . vibhaktāḥ bhrātaraḥ pītāḥ gāvaḥ iti na sidhyati . pratyayaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_3: punaḥ sati parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ ktaḥ niyogataḥ kartāram āha . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_4: imāḥ tatra parigaṇyante prakṛtayaḥ . vibhaktādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_5: . vibhaktādiṣu ca pratyayaniyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_6: . parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ ktaḥ svabhāvataḥ kartāram āha . na ca imāḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_7: parigaṇyante . na tarhi idānīm ayam sādhuḥ bhavati . bhavati sādhuḥ na tu kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_8: . katham tarhi idānīm atra kartṛtvam gamyate . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6098: vibhaktam eṣām asti vibhaktāḥ . pītam eṣām asti pitāḥ iti . atha vā uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . vibhaktadhanāḥ vibhaktāḥ . pītodakāḥ pitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_0: 396-400 kimartham idam ucyate . laḥ eṣu sādhaneṣu yathā syāt kartari ca karmaṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_1: bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_2: vidhīyate śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam . etāvān ca laḥ yat uta parasmaipadam ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_3: ca . saḥ ca ayam evam vihitaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . lagrahaṇam sakarmakanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_4: . lagrahaṇam kriyate sakarmakanivṛttyartham . sakarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ mā bhūte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_5: . yadi punaḥ tatra eva akarmakagrahaṇam kriyeta . tatra akarmakagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_6: . nanu ca iha api kriyate bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . parārtham etat bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_7: . tayoḥ eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ . yāvat iha lagrahaṇam tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_8: tatra akarmakagrahaṇam . iha vā lagrahaṇam kriyeta tatra vā akarmakagrahaṇam . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_9: nu atra viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . iha lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_10: bhavati . tatra punaḥ akarmakagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari na prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_11: api akarmakagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari siddhaḥ bhavati . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_12: iti ataḥ anyat yat ātmanepadānukramaṇam sarvam tat kartrartham . vipratiṣedhāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_13: ānaḥ kartari . vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari bhaviṣyati . tatra bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_14: etat astu kartari kṛt iti . kartari kṛt iti etat bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_15: tu . sarvebhyaḥ tu dhātubhyaḥ ānaḥ kartari prāpnoti . parasmaipadibhyaḥ api . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_16: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anudāttaṅitaḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_17: niyamārthaḥ vidhiḥ na prakalpate . āste śete iti . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_18: na prāpnoti . āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ . tathā neḥ viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_19: vidhiḥ na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_20: . nanu ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_21: iti atra anudāttaṅitaḥ iti etat anuvartiṣyate . yadi anuvartate evam api anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_22: eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam prāpnoti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_23: ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_24: bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ iti eva . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti nivṛttam . tataḥ karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_25: . kartari iti eva anuvartate . anudāttaṅitaḥ iti api nivṛttam . yat api ucyate neḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_26: viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_27: ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti iti . astu vidhyartham . nanu ca uktam ānasya niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_28: na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprāptāḥ taṅaḥ bhavanti evam ānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_29: api bhaviṣyati . sarvatra aprasaṅgaḥ tu . sarveṣu tu sādhaneṣu ānaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_30: vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari iti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ na syāt . kartari eva syāt . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_31: punaḥ lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe kartari kṛt iti etat astu laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_32: iti laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyat vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_33: tu . lādeśaḥ sarveṣu sādhaneṣu prāpnoti . śatṛkvasūca bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6102_34: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śeṣāt parasmaipadam kartari iti evam tau kartāram hriyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:6106: 400-402 lādeśe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt ḷādeśe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya lakārasya ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:6107: lunāti labhate . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_0: evañjātīyakasya lakārasya ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_1: . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ lakārasya grahaṇam na ca eṣaḥ artahvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_2: arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet na varṇagrahaṇeṣu . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_3: cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . varṇagrahaṇam idam . na ca etat varṇagrahaṇeṣu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_4: arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti . tasmāt viśiṣtagrahaṇam . tasmāt viśiṣtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_5: lakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api śālā
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_6: mālā mallaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . evam api nandanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_7: atra prāpnoti . itsañjñā atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi bādheta . pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_8: paṭhati iti . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam liti
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_9: pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . liti iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_10: ca atra litam paśyāmaḥ . atha api katham cit vacanāt vā anuvartanāt vā itsañjñkānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_11: ādeśaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na lādeśe litkāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6108_12: iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti . atha api uṇādayaḥ vyutpādyante evam api no doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6112_0: 402 lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6112_1: . lādeśasya avakāśaḥ pacatu paṭhatu . varṇavidheḥ avakāśaḥ dadhyatra madhvatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:6112_2: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pacatu atra . paṭhatu atra . lādeśaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6112_3: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_0: 403-404 ṭitaḥ etve ātmanepadeṣu ānapratiṣedhaḥ . ṭitaḥ etve ātmanepadeṣu ānapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_1: vaktavyaḥ . pacamānaḥ yajamānaḥ . ṭitaḥ iti etvam prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_2: . jñāpakam vā sānubandhakasya ādeśavacane itkāryābhāvasya iti . na etat asti uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_3: . evam kila tat uktam syāt yadi evam vijñāyeta . ṭit ātmanepadam ṭidātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_4: ṭidātmanepadānām iti . tat ca na . ṭitaḥ lakārasya yāni ātmanepadāni iti evam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_5: vijñāyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . ṭit ātmanepadam ṭidātmanepadam . ṭidātmanepadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_6: iti vijñāyamāne akurvi atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ ṭit . kaḥ tarhi . ṭhit . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_7: ca avaśyam ṭhit kartavyaḥ ādiḥ mā bhūt iti . katham iṭaḥ at iti . iṭhaḥ at iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_8: iti . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam paryavapādyasya mā bhūt . laviṣīṣṭa . iha tarhi iṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_9: ūrjam aham itaḥ ādi ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt ṭit eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_10: . ādiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . saptadaśa ādeśāḥ sthāneyogatvam prayojayanti . tān
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_11: ekaḥ na utsahate vihantum iti kṛtvā ādiḥ na bhaviṣyati . paryavapādyasya kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_12: bhavati . laviṣīṣṭa iti . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_13: tarhi uktam prākṛtānām ātmanepadānām etvam bhavati iti . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . tādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_14: . āne muk jñāpakam tu etve ṭittaṅām . iśisīricaḥ ḍārauraḥsu . ṭit aṭitaḥ . prakṛte tat . guṇe katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_0: 405-407 ṇalaḥ śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . ṇal śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sarvādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_1: . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_2: bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . uktam vā . kim uktam . anittvāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_3: ṇakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_4: coditaḥ . ṇakāram kariṣyāmi śakāram na kariṣyāmi iti . ṇakāraḥ atra kriyeta śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_5: vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . avaśyam atra ṇakāraḥ vṛddhyarthaḥ kartavyaḥ ṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_6: yathā syāt . na arthaḥ vṛddhyarthena ṇakāreṇa . ṇittve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_7: asti gotaḥ ṇit . tataḥ al . al ca ṇit bhavati . tataḥ uttamaḥ vā iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_8: lakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi

GS24pmbhasuu:6146_2: eva . āgamānudāttārtham vā . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti

GS24pmbhasuu:6150_12: ca kartavyam . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva iti . niyamārthe punaḥ sati na arthaḥ laṅgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6150_13: . ātaḥ ṅitaḥ iti vartate . na ca anyaḥ ākārāt anantaraḥ ṅit asti anyat ataḥ laṅaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6158_0: 419-428 ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . ṅyāpprātipadikāt yathā syuḥ . dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_1: mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ tavyādayaḥ vidhīyante . te apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_2: bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . tiṅantāt tarhi mā bhūvan iti . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_3: vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅā uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā uktārthatvān na bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_4: . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_5: strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . apatyādiṣv artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_6: aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ asti . atha api katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_7: cit yogaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_8: bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_9: tiṅaḥ ca iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam aṅgabhapadasañjñārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_11: yathā syuḥ iti . kva punaḥ iha aṅgabhapadasañjñārthena ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_12: . ṭābādiṣu . na etat asti prayojanam . grahaṇavadbhyaḥ ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . ugitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_13: ṅīp bhavati ataḥ ṭāp bhavati iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_14: . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha api kaḥ cit agrahaṇaḥ evam api adoṣaḥ . striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_15: ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . yat tat śabdasvarūpam striyām vartate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_16: tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . aṇādiṣu tarhi . aṇādayaḥ api grahaṇavadbhyaḥ ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_17: vidhīyante . gargādibhyaḥ yañ naḍādibhyaḥ phak iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_18: tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha api kaḥ cit agrahaṇaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6158_20: apatyādiṣu artheṣu vartate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_21: svārthikeṣu tarhi . svārthikāḥ api grahaṇavadbhyaḥ vidhīyante . yāvādibhyaḥ kan prajñāidbhyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6159_4: samartham udāttādi . svara . dvyajlakṣaṇa dvjacaḥ ṭhan iti iha ca prasajyeta vācā
GS24pmbhasuu:6159_5: tarati tvacā tarati iti . etat hi samartham dvyac . iha ca na syāt ghaṭena tarati
GS24pmbhasuu:6159_6: iti . etat hi samartham samartham advyac . asti punaḥ samarthaviśeṣaṇe sati kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:6159_7: iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha . kim . sāmnā tarati
GS24pmbhasuu:6159_8: vemnā tarati iti . etat hi samartham api ṅyāpprātipadikam api .
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_0: 428-438 atha ṅyābgrahaṇam kimartham na prātipadikāt iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_1: . apratyayaḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yadi eṣaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_2: hetuḥ tyūgrahaṇam api kartavyam . tau api hi pratyayau . tigrahaṇe tāvat vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_3: . taddhitaḥ prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . ūgrahaṇe ca api vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_4: . uvarṇāntāt ūṅ vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_5: bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ ūṅaḥ agrahaṇe hetuḥ ābgrahaṇam api na kartavyam . āp api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_6: akārāntāt vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_7: bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi anakārāntāt . kruñcā uṣṇihā devaviśā iti . atra api akārāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_8: vṛttiḥ lakṣyate . kruñcān ālabheta . uṣṇihakakubhau . devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_9: iti . iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat auttarapadikam hrasvatvam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_10: khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_11: vyañjanāntāt vā iti . yat tāvat ucyate iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_12: auttarapadikam hrasvatvam iti . sañjñācchandasoḥ iti evam tat . na ca eṣā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_13: na api idam chandaḥ . yat api ucyate iha khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_14: . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau satyām vyañjanāntāt vā iti . svare viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_15: yadi atra vyañjanāntāt utpattiḥ syāt devaviśam iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . devaviśam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_16: iti ca iṣyate . tasmāt kaḥ eṣaḥ evamviṣayaḥ . idam tarhi pādaḥ anyatarasyām ṭāp ṛci
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_17: iti . ṛci iti ucyate . tatra chāndasatvāt bhaviṣyati . ṛci iti na idam chandaḥ vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_18: kāṭhakam kāpālakam amudakam paippalādakam vā . kim tarhi . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_19: etat . ṛk cet pratyayārthaḥ bhavati iti . etat api na asti prayojanam padaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_20: pādaśabdasamānārthaḥ akārāntaḥ chandasi dṛśyate . tasyāḥ saptākṣaram ekam padam eakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_21: pādaḥ iti arthaḥ . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi ḍāp ubhābhyām anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_22: iti . bahurājā bahurāje bahurājāḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_23: api grahaṇāt . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_24: api grahaṇāt . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_25: kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyate ābgrahaṇam vā . avaśyam eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_26: paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_28: suṭ iha eva syāt teṣām yeṣām . tāsām yāsām iti atra na syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_29: . avarṇāntāt ṭāp vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt suṭ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_30: . idam tarhi prayojanam . sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca iha eva syāt bhavatā hetunā bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_31: hetoḥ iti . bhavatyā hetunā bhavatyāḥ hetoḥ iti atra na syāt . sarvanāma . svara
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_32: . kuśūlakūpakumbhaśālam bile iha eva syāt kuśūlabilam . kuśūlībilam iti atra na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_33: . svara . samāsa . dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ saha samasyate iha eva syāt kaṣṭam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_34: kaṣṭaśritaḥ . kaṣṭam śritā kaṣṭaśritā iti atra na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_35: . śritaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_36: . idam tarhi . pūrvasadṛśa iti iha eva syāt pitrā sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ . pitrā sadṛśī
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_37: pitṛsadṛśī iti atra na syāt . samāsaḥ . taddhitavidhi . acittahiastidhenoḥ ṭhak iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_38: eva syāt hastinām samūhaḥ hāstikam . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_0: atra na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena etat siddham . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_1: . pramāṇe dvayasac yathā iha bhavati hastidvayasam hastimātram evam hastinīdvayasam
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_2: hastinīmātram iti api yathā syāt . taddhitavidhi . luk . na indsiddhabadhnātiṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_3: iha eva syāt sthaṇḍilaśāyī . sthaṇḍilaśāyinī iti atra na syāt . luk . aluk . śayavāsavāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_4: akālāt iha eva syāt grāmevāsī . grāmevāsinī iti atra na syāt . mānini ca vidhipratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_5: . mānini ca vidhipratiṣedhāṛtham prayojanam . vidhyartham tāvat . kyaṅmāninoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_6: iha eva syāt darśanīyamānī . darśanīyamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratiṣedhārtham api
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_7: . vakyāti śvāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt dīrghamukhamānī
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_8: . dīrghamukhamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu ca . pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_9: ca prayojanam . tṛjakābhyām kartari iha eva syāt apām sraṣṭā . apām sraṣṭrī iti atra na syāt . upacāra :
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_0: ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbha itha eva syāt ayaskumbhaḥ . ayaskumbhī iti atra na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_1: etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . etasyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_2: satyām na arthaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇena . atiprasaṅgaḥ upapadavidhau . upapadavidhau atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_3: bhavati . dviṣatparayoḥ tāpeḥ yathā iha bhavati dviṣantapaḥ iti evam dviṣatītapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_4: iti atra api syāt . yañiñoḥ phaki . yañiñoḥ phaki atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_5: bhavati gārgyāyaṇaḥ dākṣāyaṇaḥ evam gārgeyaḥ dākṣeyaḥ iti atra api syāt . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_6: doṣaḥ . ḍhak atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsānteṣu ca . samāsānteṣu ca atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_7: bhavati . rājāhasakhibhyaḥ ṭat yathā iha bhavati madrarājaḥ kaśmīrarājaḥ evam madrarājñī
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_8: kaśmīrarājñī iti atra api syāt . na vā bhavati madrarājī iti . bhavati yadā samāsāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_9: īkāraḥ . liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇe tu īkārāntāt samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_10: . puṃvadbhāvaḥ ṭilopaḥ ca . tatra madrajī iti etat rūpam syāt . madrarājñī iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_11: iṣyate . mahadāttve priyādiṣu . mahadāttve priyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . āt mahataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_12: samānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ iti yathā iha bhavati mahān priyaḥ asya mahāpriyaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_13: mahatī priyā asya mahatīpriyaḥ iti atra api syāt . kim ucyate priyādiṣu iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_14: puṃvadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tu na pratiṣidhyate bhavitavyam eva tatra āttvena
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_15: . ñnitsvare . ñnitsvare atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ñniti ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_16: bhavati dākṣiḥ ahicumbukāyaniḥ evam dākṣī ahicumbukāyanī iti atra api syāt . rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_17: svare brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ . rājñaḥ svare brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_18: ca brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ iti yathā iha bhavati rājakumāraḥ rājabrāhmaṇaḥ evam rājakumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_19: rājabrāhmaṇī iti atra api syāt . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu ca . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_20: ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadabhūmni yathā iha bhavati bahugomān
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_21: bahuyavamān evam bahugomatī bahuyavamatī iti atra api syāt . kim ucyate samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_22: iti . yat avayavagrahaṇam prayojanam eva tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ . kumbhaśālam bile kuśūlībilam
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_23: iti yathā . vibhaktau ca uktam . kim uktam . na vā vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_24: iti . ete asyāḥ paribhāṣāḥ doṣāḥ etāni ca prayojanāni syuḥ . ete doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_25: vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣāḥ santi iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_26: lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na āśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_27: santi iti yavā na upyante . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti iti . tasmāt yāni etasyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_28: paribhāṣayāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā kartavyā pratividheyam ca doṣeṣu . taddhitavidhānāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_29: tu . taddhitavidhānāṛtham tu ṅyābgrahaṇam kartavyam . ṅyābantāt taddhitotpattiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_30: syāt . kālitarā hariṇitarā khaṭvātarā mālātarā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_31: vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitabalīyastvam . vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_0: tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . bahugomatkā bahuyavamatkā
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_1: . samāsāntāḥ api ṅyābantāt syuḥ . tyūṅoḥ ca grahaṇam . tyūṅoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_2: . yuvatikā brahmabandhukā iti . ūṅgrahaṇena tāvat na arthaḥ . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_3: ukārāntāt utpattau satyām ūṅantāt vā . idam tarhi yuvatitarā brahmabandhutarā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_4: . tadantasya ca pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitānutpattiḥ . tadantasya ca ṅyābantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_5: pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . kālitarā hariṅitarā khaṭvātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_6: mālātarā . kim kāraṇam . ṅyāpantam etat strīpradhānam . na ca strītvasya prakarṣāpakarṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_7: staḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi kim cit ucyate evañjātīyakāt utpattavyam evañjātīyakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_8: na iti . etāvat ucyate atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . yasya ca prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_9: asti tasya prakarṣe pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca apradhānasya guṇasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_10: . iha khalu api śuklataraḥ kṛṣṇataraḥ iti dravyam pradhānam guṇasya ca prakarṣe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_11: utpadyate . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_12: ṭābādayaḥ iti . prātipadikaviśeṣaṇam strīgrahaṇam . svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_13: vijñayate striyām abhidheyāyām iti na api strīsamānādhikaraṇāt prātipadikāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_14: tarhi . yat striyām prātipadikam vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_15: . svārthe iti . nanu ca uktam tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ iti . samāsāntāḥ api svārthikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_16: . ubhayoḥ svārthikayoḥ paratvāt samāsāntāḥ bhaviṣyanti . katham kālikā iti . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_17: kāt pūrvsasya iti ittvam bhaviṣyati . katham hariṇikā iti . hariṇaśabdaḥ prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6166_18: asti . katham lohinikā iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_0: 439-452 striyām iti ucyate . kā strī nāma . lokatataḥ ete śabdāḥ prasiddhāḥ strīpumān
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_1: napuṃsakam iti . yat loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_2: iti sā strīsaḥ pumān tat napuṃsakam iti . kim punaḥ loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_3: strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam iti . liṅgam . kim punaḥ tat . stanakeśavatī strī
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_4: syāt . lomaśaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ . ubhayoḥ antaram yat ca tadabhāve napuṃsakam . liṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_5: strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse ṭāP prasajyate . liṅgāt strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_6: ṭāp prāpnoti . yat hi loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī iti asti tat bhrūkuṃse
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_7: . natvam kharakuṭīḥ paśya . iha cañcāḥ paśya vadhrikāḥ paśya kharakuṭīḥ paśya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_8: tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti natvam prāpnoti . yat hi dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate ayam pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_9: iti asti tat vadhrikādiṣu . khaṭvāvṛkṣau na sidhyataḥ . khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ ca liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_10: na sidhyati . yat hi loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī ayam pumān iti na tat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_11: asti . kim tarhi tayoḥ liṅgam nyāyyam . nāpuṃsakam bhavet tasmin . napuṃsakam khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_12: liṅgam nyāyyam . kim idam nāpuṃsakam iti . napuṃsake bhavam nāpuṃsakam . tadabhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_13: napuṃsakam . tadabhāve strīpuṃsaliṅgābhāve napuṃsakaliṅgam nyāyyam . asat tu mṛgatṛṣṇāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_14: . asat tu khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . katham punaḥ asat nāma liṅgam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_15: draṣṭum . mṛgatṛṣṇāvat . tat yathā mṛgāḥ tṛṣitāḥ apām dhārāḥ paśyanti . na ca tāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_16: santi . gandharvnagaram yathā . yathā gandharvanagarāṇi dūrataḥ dṛśyante upasṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_17: ca na upalabhyante tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . ādityagativat sat na
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_18: . atha va yathā ādityasya gatiḥ satī na upalabhyate tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_19: na upalabhyate . vastrāntarhitavat ca tat . yathā vastrāntarhitāni dravyāṇi na upalabhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_20: tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . vastrāntarhitāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_21: dravyāṇi vastrāpāye upalabhyante . khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ punaḥ ye api ete rathkārāḥ vāśīvṛkṣādanahastāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_22: mūlāt prabhṛti ā agrāt vṛkṣān takṣṇuvanti te api tayoḥ liṅgam na upalabhante . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_23: etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . ṣaḍbhiḥ prakāraiḥ satām
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_24: bhāvānām anupalabdhiḥ bhavati . sannikarṣāt ativiprakarṣāt mūrtyantaravyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_25: tamasā āvṛtatvāt indriyadaurbalyāt atipramādāt iti . ataḥ atra kaḥ cit hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_26: yena khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . kena etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_27: sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . tayoḥ tu tatkṛtam dṛṣṭvā . strīkṛtam śabdam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_28: strī iti avasīyate puṃskṛtam dṛṣṭvā pumān iti . yathā ākāśena jyotiṣaḥ . tat yathā

GS24pmbhasuu:6171_30: tu etat . anyonysaṃśrayam tu etat bhavati . strīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ śabdakṛtam ca strītvam

GS24pmbhasuu:6175_0: styānam strī pravṛttiḥ ca pumān . kasya punaḥ styānam strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6175_1: . keṣām . śabsasparśarūparasagandhānām . sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6175_2: śabsasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ śabdaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6180_17: ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pañca brāhmaṇyaḥ daśa brāhmaṇyaḥ . stryarthābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:6180_18: punaḥ ṭābādiṣu satsu na atra strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi bhedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ saṅkhyā . iha ca strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:6181_0: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . na hi tena eva tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam asti . siddham tu striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6181_1: prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe ṭābādayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6181_2: . prātipadikaviśeṣaṇam strīgrahaṇam . svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate striyām

GS24pmbhasuu:6181_4: vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . atha vā punaḥ astu

GS24pmbhasuu:6181_7: iti liṅgānupapattiḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6181_8: iti . guṇavacanasya ca āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanabhāvāt . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6182_0: śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam

GS24pmbhasuu:6182_2: api yat adaḥ dravyam śritam bhavati strītvam tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat strītvasya

GS24pmbhasuu:6182_6: bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ aparasya ābhyantaram sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6182_7: ca pratyayaḥ iti . iha punaḥ ekam strītvam . atha ekam upalabhyate . kim ca ataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6182_10: . dravyasya . dravye ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ . yadi tāvat guaṇasamudāyaḥ dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6182_11: kā gatiḥ ye ete bhāvāḥ kṛdabhihitāḥ taddhitābhihitāḥ ca . cikīrṣā gotā iti . atha

GS24pmbhasuu:6182_13: dravyavat bhaviṣyati . kva ca tāvat doṣaḥ syāt . dṛṣṭasya hi

GS24pmbhasuu:6209_1: iti . evam api maghonī atra prāpnoti . maghavanśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_2: vanaḥ na haśaḥ . vanaḥ ra ca iti atra haśantāt na bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_3: bhūt . sahayudhvā brāhmaṇī iti . yadi na haśaḥ iti ucyate śarvarī iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_4: . vihitaviśeṣaṇam haśgrahaṇam . haśantāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . evam api prertvarī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_5: na sidhyati . katham ca atra tugāgamaḥ . chāndasatvāt . ṅībrau api tarhi chāndasatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_6: eva bhaviṣyataḥ . bahulam chandasi ṅībrau vaktavyau . yajvarīḥ iṣaḥ yajvanīḥ iṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_7: . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam pratiṣiddhatvāt . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_8: kartavyam . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_9: . anaḥ bahuvrīheḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe vā upadhālopinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_10: vāvacanam . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe vā upadhālopinaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . anyathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_11: kṛtvā coditam anyathā kṛtvā parihāraḥ . yathā upasaṅkhyānam coditam tathā nityābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_12: ṅībrābhyām bhavitavyam . yathā parihāraḥ tathā vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . yathā upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_13: coditam evam api vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . . na hi atra ṅīp durlabhaḥ . siddhaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6209_14: ṅīp anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti . ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ anyena sati

GS24pmbhasuu:6213_0: 466-468 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . ṅīp anantaraḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . atha idānīm ṅīpi
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_1: pratiṣiddhe ṣaṭsañjñānām ante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmāt na syāt . ataḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_2: . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_3: asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . idam api tatra parigaṇyate . pratyāhārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_4: cāpā siddham . sup iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_5: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . prathamaikavacanāt prabhṛti ā cāpaḥ pakārāt . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_6: pratyāhāragrahaṇam doṣaḥ tu ittve . ittve doṣaḥ bhavati . bahucarmikā . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_7: kāt pūrvasya ātaḥ iti ittvam na prāpnoti . tasmāt na ubhau . tasmāt ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_8: ubhau na bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . striyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6213_9: vartate . striyām yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_0: 468-469 kimartham ubhābhyām iti ucyate . ubhābhyām yogābhyām ḍāp yathā syāt manantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_1: anantāt ca bahuvrīheḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam ubhayam anuvartate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_2: anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . anyatarasyām ḍāp yathā syāt . ḍāpā mukte pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_3: api yathā syāt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iha ḍāp api ucyate pratiṣedhaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_4: . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_5: ṅīp api yathā syāt . siddhaḥ atra ṅīp anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_6: tat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . bāḍham śakyam . katham . iha ḍāp api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_7: pratiṣedhaḥ api ṅīp api . tat sarvam vacanāt bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_8: . akriyamāṇe hi tatra anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ ṅīp ḍāppratiṣedhau bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_9: ḍāppratiṣedhau api anavakāśau . tau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . sāvakāśau ḍāppratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_10: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . suparvā cāruparvā iti . tasmāt tat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_11: . idam tu khalu anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . idam api avaśyam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_12: . kim prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅībrau yathā syātām iti . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6217_13: upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6221_0: 469-470 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . bahavaḥ śvānaḥ asyām rathyāyām bahavaḥ śvānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6221_1: asyām śālāyām iti . bahśūkā bahuyūkā iti bhavitavyam .kā rūpasiddhiḥ . ḍāp ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6221_2: prasāraṇam prasāraṇaparapūrvatvam nadṛtaḥ ca iti kap . kapā tāvat na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6221_3: . kim kāraṇam . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti evam tat vijñāyate . na ca eṣaḥ nadyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6221_4: bahuvrīhiḥ . prasāraṇena api na bhavitavyam . vakṣyati etat . śvādīnām prasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6221_5: nakārāntagrahaṇam anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham iti . parapūrvatvena api na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6221_7: iti . tasmāt bahuśvā bahuyuvā iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_0: 471-477 anupasarjanāt iti kimartham . bahukurucarā mathurā priyakurucarā mathurā
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_1: . na etat asti prayojanam . kurucaraśabdāt prayayaḥ vidhīyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_2: yat bahukurucaraśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_3: prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_4: . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_5: . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . jñāpakam tu pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_6: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_7: jñāpane prayojanam . bhavatī atibhavatī mahatī atimahatī iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_8: bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . uktam etat varṇaḥ api ugit pratyayaḥ api ugit
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_9: prātipadikam api ugit iti . idam tarhi . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_10: asti prayojanam . atra api uktam ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_11: iti . idam tarhi atidhīvarī atipīvarī . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā āpiśalam adhīte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_12: . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā punaḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ . pūrvasūtre apradhānasya upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_13: iti sañjñā kriyate . yāvat brūyāt pradhānāt utpattavyam apradhānāt na iti tāvat anupasarjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_14: iti . kim prayojanam . āpiśalam adhīte iti . āpiśalam adhīte brāhmaṇī āpiśalā brāhmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_15: . aṇantāt iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt iti . atha anupasarjanāt iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_16: na bhavati . aṇantam hi etat anupasarjanam . na anupasarjanagrahaṇena aṇantam viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_17: . aṇantāt anupasarjanāt iti . kim tarhi . aṇ eva viśeṣyate . aṇ yaḥ anupasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_18: iti . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . kuntī
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_19: gāndhārī . siddham tu jāteḥ anupasarjanatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anupasarjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_20: iti ucyate . na ca jātiḥ upasarjanam . etat api na asti prayojanam . striyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_21: vartate . tena aṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . striyām yaḥ aṇ vihitaḥ iti . evam api kāśakṛtsninā
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_22: proktam māmāṃsā kāśakṛtsnīm kāśakṛtsnīm adhīte kāśakṛtsnā brāhmaṇī atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_23: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhetryām abhidheyāyām aṇaḥ īkāreṇa bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca atra adhetryām
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_24: abhidheyāyām aṇ uktaḥ luptaḥ saḥ yaḥ ca śrūyate utpannaḥ tasmāt īkāraḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_25: punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam tadantavidhiḥ yathā syāt . kumbhakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_26: nagarakārī . atra hi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_27: iti avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_28: iti saṅghātāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . kṛdgrahaṇe iti ucyate . na ca etat kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_29: . kṛdakṛdgrahaṇam etat . kṛt api ayam aṇ taddhitaḥ api . evam tarhi īkārāntena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_30: bhaviṣyati . yadi evam labhyeta kṛtam syāt tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_31: hi gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti samāsaḥ eva tāvat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_32: . samāse kṛte avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . avayavāt utpattau kaḥ satyām doṣaḥ . kaumbhakāreyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_33: na sidhyati . avyayavasya vṛddhisvarau syātām . tasmāt anupasarjanādhikāraḥ . anupasarjanādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_34: jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne suparṇyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam . anupasarjanādhikāre jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne suparṇyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_35: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . suparṇī . na vā samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt jātivācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_36: ca śabdasya sāmānyena ṅīṣvidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_37: . samāsaḥ atra anupasarjanam . saḥ ca jātivācakaḥ . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_38: ca jātivācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyena ṅīṣ bhaviṣyati jāteḥ astrīviṣayāt ayopadhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_39: iti . katham kṛtvā coditam katham kṛtvā parihāraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti kṛtvā coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_0: 478-479 ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam . ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_1: kartavyam . kārikeyī hārikeyī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananubandhakagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_2: hi na sānubandhakasya . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_3: iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . tavyagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_4: tavyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . divgrahaṇe divugrahaṇam mā bhūt . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_5: tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya ne iti . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_6: . yadgrahaṇe ṇyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . aṅgrahaṇe caṅgrahaṇam mā bhūt . ajgrahaṇe ṇyajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_7: mā bhūt . tat dve ete paribhāṣe kartavye . na kartavye . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_8: bhavataḥ ete paribhāṣe yat ayam vāmadevāt ḍyaḍḍyau iti yayatau ḍitau karoti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_9: tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ananubandhakaḥ ḍhaśabdaḥ striyām na
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_10: asti iti kṛtvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate . nanu ca ayam asti śilāyāḥ ḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_11: iti . na eṣaḥ striyām vartate . ayam tarhi sabhāyāḥ ḍhaḥ chandasi iti . eṣaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_12: na striyām vartate . kim kāraṇam . tatra sādhuḥ iti vartate . katham strī nāma sabhāyām sādhvī syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6233_0: 479-480 añgrahaṇam anarthakam tadantāt hi ṅīnvidhānam . añgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6233_1: kāraṇam . tadantāt hi ṅīnvidhānam . tadantāt hi añantāt ṅīn vidhīyate . śārṅgaravādyañaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6233_2: ṅīn iti . na ca asti viśeṣaḥ añantāt ṅīnaḥ vā ṅīpaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6233_3: . na vā jātyadhikārāt . na vā anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . jātyadhikārāt . jāteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6233_4: tatra anuvartate . ajātyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . autsī audapānī . tat ca avaśyam jātigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6233_5: anuvartyam . anadhikāre hi puṃyogāt ākhyāyām ṅīnprasaṅgaḥ . ananuvartamāne hi jātigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6234_0: baidasya strī baidī . yadi tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva kartavyam . tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:6234_1: kartavyam . tat api avaśyam kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi tasmin baidasya bhaginī baidī
GS24pmbhasuu:6234_2: paratvāt jātilakṣaṇaḥ ṅīṣ ṅīpam bādheta . ṅīni punaḥ sati paratvāt ṅīn ṅīṣam bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6238: 480-481 khyunaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . khyunaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaṅkaraṇī subhagaṅkaraṇī . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6239: khyunaḥ iti . nañsnañīkakhyuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam . nañsnañīkakhyuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nañ snañ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6242: āḍhyaṅkaraṇī subhagaṅkaraṇī . taruṇa taluna : taruṇī talunī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6246_0: 481 āpatyagrahaṇam kartavyam dvīpāt yañaḥ pratiṣedhārtham . iha mā bhūt dvaipyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6246_1: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate kañkvarapaḥ yañaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6246_2: . katham tarhai kañkvarapaḥ ayañaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6250_0: 482 taddhitavacanam kimartham . taddhitavacanam ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkārārtham . taddhitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6250_1: kriyate ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkāraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6250_2: eva atra īkāraḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt aprātipadikāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6250_3: bhavati evam prātipadikāt iti asya anuvartanasāmārthyāt aṣitaḥ api prātipadikāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6250_4: syāt . asti anyat prātipadikānuvṛttau prayojanam . kim . uttarārtham . ataḥ iñ dākṣiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6254_0: 482-483 sarvatragrahaṇam kimartham . prācām eva syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6254_1: siddham prācām pūrveṇa . idam tarhi prayojanam sarveṣām yathā syāt . āvaṭyāyanī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_0: 482-483-484 lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam . lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_1: kartavyam . śākalyāyanī . yadi punaḥ ayam śakalaśabdaḥ lohitādiṣu paṭhyeta . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_2: śakyam . iha hi śākalyasya chātrāḥ śākalāḥ kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ na syāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_3: tarhi . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . kaṇvaśabdāt śakalaśabdaḥ pūrvaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_4: katāt uttaraḥ iṣyate. kataśabdāt śakalaśabdaḥ uttaraḥ paṭhitavyaḥ . pūrvottarau tadantādī
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_5: . pūrvottarau gaṇau tadantādī draṣṭavyau . ye kaṇvādayaḥ te śakalādayaḥ . ye kataparyantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_6: te śakalaparyantāḥ . kim prayojanam . ṣphāṇau tatra praoyjanam . tatra evam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:6258_7: ṣphāṇau siddhau bhavataḥ . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . katāt uttaraḥ iṣyate . pūrvottarau
GS24pmbhasuu:6262: 484 kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āsurāyaṇī . chaḥ ca . chaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . āsurīyaḥ kalpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_0: 484-486 vayasi acarame iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . vadhūṭī ciraṇṭī iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_1: kasmāt na bhavati . uttānaśayā lohitapādikā dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . na etāni vayovācīni
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_2: . katham tarhi vayaḥ gamyate . sambandhāt . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_3: tatra na bhavati iha api na prāpnoti . kumārī iti . atra api sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_4: . kaḥ asu sambandhaḥ . yaḥ asu puṃsā asamprayogaḥ . sambandhāt eva atra vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_5: . iha punaḥ sambandhasambandhāt . iha tāvat uttānaśayā iti . yadā kartṛtvam viśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_6: bhavati tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . yadi lohitapādikā iti . yadā bahuvrīhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_7: viśeṣitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . yadā dviguarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_8: viśeṣitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt eva vayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_9: gamyate tatra bhavati iha api tari prapnoti . kanyā iti . nipātanāt etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6266_10: . kim nipātanam. kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6270_0: 486 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete . tatra ekaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:6270_1: . parimāṇāntāt taddhitaluki ṅīp bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . parimāṇāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6270_2: eva taddhitaluki ṅīp bhavati na anyataḥ iti . tataḥ vistācitakambalyebhyaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_0: 486-488 ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre . ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre kartavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_1: mā bhūt . mahodhāḥ parjanyaḥ iti . na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . na vā liṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_2: nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . samāsāntādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_3: strīgrahaṇam kartavyam . itarathā hi kabvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi kabvidhiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_4: . kasyām punaḥ avasthāyām kap prāpnoti . prāk ṅīṣutpatteḥ . prāk tāvat na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_5: . kim kāraṇam . na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā . lutkpanne tarhi ṅīṣi prāpnoti . utpanne ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_6: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti evam tat . na ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_7: nadyantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . prāk eva tarhi prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_8: iti . yadi api na ṅīṣ vibhāṣā kap tu vibhāṣā . kapaḥ avakāśaḥ anyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_9: ayavakaḥ avrīhikaḥ . ṅīṣaḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā kap . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ . kuṇḍodhnī
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_10: ghaṭodhnī . kapprasaṅge lubhayam prāpnoti . paratvāt kap syāt . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_11: na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . itarathā hi kabvidhiprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_0: 488-489 dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ . dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_1: mā bhūt . uddāmā vaḍavā iti . tatpuruṣavijñānāt vā siddham . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_2: . tatpuruṣaḥ ca ayam . utkrāntā dāmnaḥ utdāmā . bhavet siddham yadā tatpuruṣaḥ .
