GS24pmbhasuu:6341_2: na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi vibhaktiḥ api vavadhāyikā bhaviṣyati manasākrītī iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:6341_3: sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate . karaṇam pūrvam asmāt krītaśabdāt saḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6341_4: karaṇapūrvaḥ tasmāt karaṇapūrvāt krītaśabdāt anupasarjanāt iti . katham tarhi . karaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6341_5: asmin prātipadike pūrvam tat idam karaṇapūrvam tasmāt karaṇapūrvāt prātipadikāt krītāntāt anupasarjanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6345_0: 512-513 antodātte jātapratiṣedhaḥ . antodātte jātasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dantajātā
GS24pmbhasuu:6345_1: stanajātā . pāṇigṛhītyādīnām viśeṣe . pāṇigṛhītyādīnām viśeṣe iti vaktavyam . pāṇingṛhītī
GS24pmbhasuu:6345_2: iti bhāryā . yasya yathā katham cit pāṇiḥ gṛhyate pāṇigṛhītā sā bhavati . bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:6345_3: taṇi . bahulam taṇi iti vaktavyam . kim idam taṇi iti . sañjñācchandasoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6345_4: . kim prayojanam . prabaddhavilūnādyartham . prabaddhavilūnī prabaddhavilūnā . antodāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6345_6: . bahu . bahukṛtā . nañ . akṛtā . su . sukṛtā . kāla . māsajātā saṃvatsarajātā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6345_7: sukhādi . sukhajātā duḥkhajātā . jātipūrvāt vā . atha vā jātipūrvāt iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_0: 513-513 svāṅgāt ca upasarjanāt iti ucyate . kim svāṅgam nāma . adravam mūrtimat svāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_1: prāṇistham avikārajam atatstham tatra dṛṣṭam ca tasya cet tat tathā yutam . aprāṇinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_2: api svāṅgam . adravam iti kimartham . bahulohitā . na etat asti . bahvacaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_3: pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi bahukaphā . mūrtimat iti kimartham . bahubuddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_4: bahumanāḥ . na etat asti . ataḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi . bahujñānā . prāṇistham
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_5: iti kimartham . ślakṣṇamukhā śālā . avikārajam iti kimartham . bahugaḍuḥ bahupaṭikā
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_6: . na etat asti . iha tāvat bahugaḍuḥ iti ataḥ iti vartate . bahupaṭikā iti bahvacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_7: na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi bahuśophā . atatstham tatra dṛṣṭam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_8: . aprāṇistham prāṇini dṛṣṭam ca svāṅgasañjñam bhavati . dīrghakeśī rathyā iti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_9: cet tat tathā yutam aprāṇinaḥ api svāṅgasañjñam bhavati . dīrghanāsikī arcā tuṅganāsikī arcā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6353_0: 514-516 atha upasarjanagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . śikhā . upasarjanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6353_1: anarthakam bahuvrīhyadhikārāt . upasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhyadhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6353_2: . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bahuvrīheḥ ca antodāttāt iti . bahvajartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6353_3: tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam kartavyam . bahvacaḥ na iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tat bahvajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6353_4: upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . bahvacaḥ upasarjanāt na iti . atha akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6353_5: upasarjanagrahaṇe kasya bahvajgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . bahurvīheḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6353_6: bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit abahvac bahuvrīhiḥ yadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_0: svaḍā svaḍī iti . bahvajartham iti cet svāṅgagrahaṇāt siddham . svāṅgagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_1: . tat bahvajgrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . svāṅgāt bahvacaḥ na iti . evam tarhi antodādāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_2: iti vartate . antodāttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . antodāttārtham iti cet sahādikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_3: siddham . yat ayam sahanañvidyamānapūrvāt ca iti pratṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_4: antodāttāt api bhavati iti . svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham tu . svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_5: tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam kartavyam . śvāṅgāt yathā syāt . svāṅgasamudāyāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_6: . kalyāṇapāṇipādā . atha kriyamāṇe api upasarjanagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_7: . svāṅgam hi etat upasarjanam . na svāṅgasamudāyaḥ svāṅgagrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_8: janapadasamudāyaḥ janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate . kāśikosalīyā iti janapadatadavadhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_9: iti vuñ na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_10: . tena svāṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param yat svāṅgam tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_11: iti . yat ca atra asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param na tadantaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ yadantaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_12: na tat asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param svāṅgam . nanu ca tat pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_13: . na iti āha . pūrvapadaviśeṣaṇam . na svāṅgam asvāṅgam pūrvam padam pūrvapadam asvāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_14: pūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti . yadi evam pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_15: aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . bahuvrīhiḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ktāt iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_16: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asvāṅgāt pūrvapadāt param yat ktāntam tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6354_17: idam tarhi prayojanam . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate upasarjanamātrāt yathā syāt . niṣkeśī
GS24pmbhasuu:6358_0: 517 nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca . nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6358_2: nityam iti vaktavyam . kabarapucchī maṇipucchī viṣapucchī śarapucchī . upamānāt pakṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6358_3: ca . upamānāt pakṣāt ca pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam . ulūkapakṣī śālā ulūkapakṣī senā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_1: . nāsikādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ sahanañvidyamānapūrvebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_2: . nāsikādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ kalyāṇanāsikī kalyāṇanāsikā . sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_3: pratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ samukhā amukhā vidyamānmukhā iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_4: sanāsikā anāsikā vidyamānanāsikā iti . sahanañvidyamānapūrvebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_5: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam vidhiḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_6: ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām iva karpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_7: ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva bahvajlakṣaṇam saṃyogopadhalakṣaṇam ca pratiṣedham bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_8: evam sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇam api bādheta . kā tarhi gatiḥ . iha tāvat nāsikodara
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_9: iti bahvajlakṣaṇaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_10: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bhādante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā bahvajlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_12: ca iti saṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_13: apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā saṃyogalakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_0: 518-519 dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_1: . prāṅmukhī pratyaṅmukḥī . ṅībvidhāne hi anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayān ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ . ṅībvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_2: hi sati anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayān ṅīp prasajyeta . prāggulphā pratyaglalāṭā . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_3: ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti . yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_4: asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti evam api dikpūrvapadāt ṅīpā mukte ṅīṣ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_5: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat yatrotsargāpavādam vibhāṣā tatra apavādena mukte utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_6: na bhavati iti . atha vā ṅīṣaḥ ādeśaḥ ṅīp kariṣyate . tat tarhi ṅīṣaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_7: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . anyataḥ ṅīṣ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_8: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . dikpūrvapadāt iti eṣā pañcamī ṅīṣ iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_9: ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_10: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate.
GS24pmbhasuu:6370: 519-521 jāteḥ iti ucyate . kā jātiḥ nāma . ākṛtigrahaṇā jātiḥ liṅgānām ca na sarvabhāk sakṛtākhyātanirgrāhyā gotram ca caraṇaiḥ saha . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:6371_0: prādurbhāvavināśābhyām sattvasya yugapat guṇaiḥ asarvaliṅgām bahvarthām tām jātim
GS24pmbhasuu:6371_1: kavayaḥ viduḥ . gotram ca caraṇāni ca . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ jātilakṣaṇayoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6371_2: yathā pūrvam jātilakṣaṇam tathā kumārībhāryaḥ iti bhavitavyam . yathā uttaram tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6375_0: 522 atha astrīviṣayāt iti katham idam vijñāyate . samānāyām ākṛtau yat astrīviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6375_1: iti āhosvit kva cit yat astrīviṣayam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate samānāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6375_2: ākṛtau yat astrīviṣayam iti droṇī kuṭī pātrī iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate kva
GS24pmbhasuu:6375_3: cit yat astrīviṣayam iti mālā balākā atra api prāpnoti . astu kva cit yat astrīviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6375_4: iti . katham mālā balākā iti . ajādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6379: 522-523 ayopadhāt iti kimartham . ibhyā kṣatriyā . atyalpam idam ucyate ayopadhāt iti . akopadhāt iti api vaktavyam iha api yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:6380: syāt . caṭakā mūṣikā iti . yadi akopadhāt iti ucyate kākī kokī śukī iti na sidhyati . astu tarhi ayopadhāt iti eva . katham caṭakā mūṣikā iti . ajādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6384_1: puṣpāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . satpuṣpā prākpuṣpā kāṇḍapuṣpā prāntapuṣpā śatapuṣpā
GS24pmbhasuu:6384_3: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sam . samphalā . sam . bhastrā . bhastrāphalā . bhastrā .

GS24pmbhasuu:6384_5: . śvetāt ca iti vaktavyam . śvetaphalā . treḥ ca . treḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6388_1: api yathā syāt . audameyī . itaḥ manuṣyajāteḥ iñaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . itaḥ manuṣyajāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6392_0: 524-525 kimarthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . na ūṅdhātvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6392_1: iti . na ūdhātvoḥ iti ucyamāne yavāgvā yavāgvai iti atra api prasajyeta . atha dīrghoccāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6392_2: kimartham na ūṅ utaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : brahmabandhūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6393_0: dhīvabandhūḥ iti . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6393_1: iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . iha ca brahmabandhūchatram brahmabandhūcchatram ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6393_2: asiddhaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt nityaḥ tuk prasajyeta . iha ca brahmabandhūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6394: dhīvabandhūḥ nadyṛtaḥ kap iti kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate brahmabandhūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6395_0: dhīvabandhūḥ iti gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta iti . ubhayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6395_1: āśraye na antādivat . yat api ucyate brahmabandhūchatram brahmabandhūcchatram ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6395_2: asiddhaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt nityaḥ tuk prasajyeta iti . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6395_3: asiddhaḥ na ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ . yat api ucyate iha ca brahmabandhūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6395_4: dhīvabandhūḥ nadyṛtaḥ kap iti kap prasajyeta iti . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6395_5: evam tat na ca eṣaḥ nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . śeṣalakṣaṇaḥ tarhi kap prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6399_0: 525 ūṅprakaraṇe aprāṇijāteḥ ca arajjvādīnām . ūṅprakaraṇe aprāṇijāteḥ ca arajjvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6399_1: iti vaktavyam . alābūḥ karkandhūḥ . aprāṇijāteḥ iti kimartham . kṛkavākuḥ . arajjvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6400: (P_4,1.70) KA_II,227.21 Ro_III,526 sahitasahhābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . sahitorūḥ sahorūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6404: 526 atyalpam idam ucyate kadrukamaṇḍavlvoḥ iti . kadrukamaṇḍaluguggulumadhujatupatayālūṇām iti vaktavyam : kadrūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6412_0: 526 ṣāt ca yañaḥ cāp . ṣāt ca yañaḥ cāp vaktavyaḥ . śārkarākṣyā pautimāṣyā . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6412_1: ayam api arthaḥ . gaukakṣyaśabdaḥ krauḍyādiṣu paṭhyate . saḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6412_2: . yadi na paṭhyate gaukṣīputraḥ iti samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:6412_3: . gaukṣyāputraḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_0: 527-528 anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_1: iti etasmāt ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ataḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_2: iti etasya avakāśaḥ bahurājñī bahutakṣṇī . ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_3: . vibhāṣā ṅīp . yadā na ṅīp saḥ avakāśaḥ . ṅīpprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . ūdhasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_4: ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_5: . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti atra ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti etat anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_6: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_7: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ cāpaḥ avakāśaḥ udīcām . āvaṭyā . ṣphasya avakāśaḥ anyāni yañantāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_8: . gārgyāyaṇī vātsyāyanī . āvaṭyaśabdāt prācām ubhayam prāpnoti . āvaṭyāyanī . ṣphaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_9: bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . āvaṭyagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_10: . idam api siddham bhavati . śārkarākṣyāyaṇī pautimāṣyāyaṇī . yañgrahaṇena na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_11: . ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva . gaukakṣyaśabdaḥ krauḍyādiṣu paṭhyate . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_12: gaukakṣyāyaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . evam vakṣyāmi . prācām ṣphaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_13: taddhitaḥ sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yatra ṣphaḥ ca anyaḥ ca prāpnoti ṣphaḥ eva tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_14: bhavati iti . tataḥ lohitāidkatantebhyaḥ sarvatra . kva sarvatra . prācām ca udīcām ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_0: 528-530 iha kasmāt na bhavati . dākṣī plākṣī iti . atiśāyikena ayam tamaśabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_1: kriyate . saḥ ca triprabhṛtiṣu vartate . triprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . yadi evam prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_2: cet tamam kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na upottamam guru āmvidhiḥ kena te na syāt prakarṣe yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_3: ayam tamaḥ . prakarṣe cet tamam kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na upottamam guru iti ucyate āmvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_4: kena tava na syāt . avyayaghāt iti prāpnoti . prakarṣe yadi ayam tamaḥ . yadi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_5: tamaḥ prakarṣe vartate . udgatasya prakarṣaḥ ayam . gataśabdaḥ atra lupyate .udgatasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_6: ayam prakarṣaḥ . gataśabdasya atra lopaḥ bhavati . nāvyayārthaprakarṣaḥ asti . dhātvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_7: atra prakṛṣyate . nāvyayasya arthasya prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . dhātvarthasya . udgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_8: apekṣate kim cit . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . anudgatam apekṣya udgataḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_9: bhavati . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . trayāṇām kila dvau udgatau bhavataḥ . catuṣprabhṛtikartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_10: vārāhyāyām na sidhyati . catuṣprabhṛtiṣu ṣyaṅ vaktavyaḥ vārāhyāyām na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_11: vārāhyāyām na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . catuṣprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . bhidyate asya svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_12: tena vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . bhidyate khalu asya svaraḥ tena ātiśāyikena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_13: uttamasya . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na kva cit api lakṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_14: śabdāntaram idam vidhyāt dṛṣṭam abhyantaram triṣu . evam tarhi anyaḥ ayam ātiśāyikena
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_0: 530-538 kim punaḥ ayam aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ āhosvit aṇiñbhyām paraḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_1: . ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam . ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_2: audameghāḥ . dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ . dviḥ ca aṇ vidheyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ audameghāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_3: . audameghyānām saṅghaḥ audameghaḥ . iñaḥ iti aṇ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_4: . ādeśe nalopavacanam . yadi ādeśaḥ nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . auḍulomyā śāralomyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_5: ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . na vā ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_6: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt . lopanimittaḥ ṣyaṅ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_7: akṛte lope ṣyaṅ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gurūpottamayoḥ iti ucyate na ca akṛte lope
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_8: gurūpottamam bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu paraḥ . nanu ca uktam ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_9: dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate yalopavacanam iti adoṣaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_10: . kim kāraṇam . puṃvadbhāvāt yajādau taddhite . yajādau taddhite puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_11: bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_12: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_13: idam uktam ādeśaḥ paraḥ iti ca . kim atra nyāyyam . adeśaḥ iti etat nyāyyam . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_14: etat . evam ca eva hi kṛtvā ācāryeṇa sūtram paṭhitam ṣaṣṭhyā ca nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_15: ataḥ eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nirdoṣaḥ . nanu ca parasmin api sati ye doṣāḥ te parihṛtāḥ . puṃvadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_16: yalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ . sa ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ aḍe bhavati . tatra audamegheyaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_17: . anubandhau tvayā kāryau . yasya ādeśaḥ anubandhau tena kartavyau . ekaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_18: aparaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . yaṅaḥ cāp iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_19: . atha sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena kva arthaḥ . atra eva . kim prayojanam . cāpartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_20: . cāp yathā syāt . tava katham cāp . ṭābvidhiḥ mama . ṭāpā mama siddham . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_21: mama api ṭāpā siddham . na sidhyati . aṇaḥ iti iñaḥ iti ca īkāraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_22: doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate aṇantāt akārāntāt iñantāt ikārāntāt iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_23: . aṇ yaḥ akāraḥ iñ yaḥ ikāraḥ iti . svarārthaḥ tarhi tvayā cāp vaktavyaḥ . ñniti
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_24: iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_25: iti . tava api tarhi ṣyaṅā uktatvāt strītvasya ṭāp na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_26: ete . ukte api hi strītve bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svāṛthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_27: iti . mama api tarhi sānubandhakasya ādeśaḥ itkāryam na iti . tena ñit na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_28: . asthānivattve doṣaḥ te vṛddhiḥ atra na sidhyati . asthānivattve doṣaḥ . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_29: te na prāpnoti . auḍulomyā śāralomyā . na ca idānīm ardhajaratīyam labhyam vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_30: me bhaviṣyati svaraḥ na iti . tat yathā ardham jaratyāḥ kāmayate ardham na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_31: tvayā api atra viśeṣārtham kartavyam syāt viśeṣaṇam . tvayā api atra viśeṣārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_32: anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti . akriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_33: eva viśeṣaḥ atra sānubandhaḥ viśeṣavān . akriyā eva mama viśeṣaḥ sānubandhaḥ tu viśeṣavān
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_34: . pāśyāyām te katham na syāt . pāśyāputraḥ iti atra kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ me syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_35: viśeṣaṇam . ekaḥ mama viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ . tvayā punaḥ dvau kartavyau . atha ekasmin api
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_36: sati kaḥ kariṣyate . kim ca ataḥ . anyasmin sūtrabhedaḥ syāt . yadi etābhyām anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_37: kriyate sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . ṣiti liṅgam prasajyeta . atha ṣit kriyate ṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_38: iti īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ṅiti cekrīyite doṣaḥ . atha ṅit kriyate cekrīyite doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_39: . lolūyāputraḥ lolūyāpatiḥ iti . vyavadhānāt na duṣyati . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_40: doṣaḥ bhavati . yaḥ anantaraḥ na dhātuḥ saḥ . dhātoḥ iti vartate yaḥ ca atra anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6424_41: na asau dhātuḥ . yaḥ dhātuḥ saḥ ananantaraḥ . yaḥ ca dhātuḥ sa asau anantaraḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_0: na cet ubhayataḥ sāmyam ubhayatra prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yaṅā dhātuḥ viśeṣyeta . yaṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_1: viśeṣyeta yadi iha dhātuḥ yaṅ dhātunā vā yadi tulyam etat . yadi eva yaṅā dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_2: viśeṣyate yadi atha api dhātunā yaṅ tulyam etat bhavati . ubhau pradhānam yadi na
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_3: atra doṣaḥ . atha ubhau pradhānam bhavataḥ na atra doṣaḥ bhavati . tathā prasāryeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_4: tu vākpatiḥ te . tathā sati vākpatiḥ vākputraḥ iti atra prasāraṇam prāpnoti . dhātuprakaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_5: iha na sthānam iti niścayaḥ . dhātuprakaraṇasya iha sthānam na asti iti kṛtvā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_6: niścayaḥ kriyate . avaśyam āttvārtham dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . gobhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_7: gobhiḥ naubhyām naubhiḥ . āttvārtham yadi kartavyam tatra eva tat kariṣyate . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_8: yat ejantam tasya ced āttvam iṣyate uddeśaḥ ṛūḍhiśabdānām . tena goḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6425_9: . evam tarhi upadeśe iti ucyate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6429_0: 538-540 kimartham idam ucyate . gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham . gotrāvayavāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6429_1: . agotrārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . gotrāvayavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6429_2: agotrārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam prāpnoti . iha api prāpnoti āhicchatrī kānyakubjī
GS24pmbhasuu:6429_3: . evam tarhi gotrāt eva gotrāvayavāt . gotrāt iti cet vacanānarthakyam . gotrāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6429_4: cet vacanam anarthakam . siddham gotre purveṇa eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . gurūpottamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6429_5: iti ucyate . agurūpottamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:6429_6: avayavatvāt sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām avayavatvāt sarvatra prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_0: aṣṭāśītiḥ sahasrāṇi ūrdhvaretasām ṛṣīṇām babhūvuḥ . tatra agastyāṣṭamaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_1: prajanaḥ abhyupagataḥ . tatrabhavatām yat apatyam tāni gotrāṇi . ataḥ anye gotrāvayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_2: . tatra utpattiḥ prāpnoti . tat ca aniṣṭam . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_3: yebhyaḥ agurūpottamebhyaḥ iṣyate . siddham tu rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_4: etat . katham . rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānāt . rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_5: ke punaḥ rauḍhyādayaḥ . ye krauḍyādayaḥ . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti siddham tu kulākhyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_6: loke gotrābhimatābhyaḥ iti . siddham etat . katham . kulākhyāḥ loke gotrāvayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_7: iti ucyante . atha vā gotrāvayavaḥ kaḥ bhavatum arhati . gotrāt avayutaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6430_8: gotrāt avayutaḥ . yaḥ anantaraḥ . daivadattyā yājñadattyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6434: 541-543 samarthavacanam kimartham . samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6435: upagoḥ apatyam . asamarthāt mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_0: kambalaḥ upagoḥ apatyam devadattasya iti . samarthavacanam anarthakam . na hi asamarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_1: arthābhidhānam . samarthavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . na hi asamarthena arthābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_2: . na hi asamarthāt utpadyamānena pratyayena arthābhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_3: utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha prathamavacanam kimartham . prathamavacanam prakṛtiviśeṣaṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_4: . prathamāt pratyayotpattiḥ yathā syāt . aprathamāt mā bhūt . upagoḥ apatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_5: apatyaśabdāt . prathamavacanam anarthakam . na hi aprathamena arthābhidhānam . prathamavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_6: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . na hi aprathamena arthābhidhānam . na hi aprathamāt utpadyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_7: pratyayena arthābhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_8: vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathāt syāt . upagoḥ apatyam iti . vāvacane ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_9: . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_10: . iha api vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatra nityatvāt pratyayasya . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_11: dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ ca avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvtaḥ ca etat bhavati vākyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_12: vṛttiḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye pratyaye prāpte vāvacanen kim anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_13: śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ bhāvābhāvau iṣyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_14: tasmāt na arthaḥ vāvacanena . atha etat samarthagrahaṇam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_15: ca . kim prayojanam . samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . asamarthāt mā bhūt . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_16: samartham . arthābhidhāne yat samartham . kim punaḥ tat . kṛtavarṇānupūrvīkam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_17: . sautthitiḥ vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti . atha tat vāvacanam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6436_18: . kim prayojanam . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu vākyasya anena sādhutvam anvākhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6440_0: 544-545 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi tatra kaḥ cit dīvyacchabdaḥ paṭhyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6440_1: tarhi . dīvyatiśabdaḥ . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . prāk dīvyateḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6440_2: tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ prāk dīvyateḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . dīvyatiśabde dīvyacchabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6440_3: asti . tasmāt eṣā pañcamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vikṛtanirdeśaḥ kriyate . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6441_0: ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ekadeśavikrṭeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6441_1: upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati . atha vā prākśabdaḥ ayam dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6441_2: . dikśabdaiḥ ca yoge pañcamī bhavati . tatra aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti śatā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_0: 545 atha prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sakṛdvidhānārtham . prāgvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_1: sakṛdvidhānārtham . sakṛdvihitaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ yathā syāt . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_2: mā kārṣam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . adhikārāt api etat siddham . adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_3: pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . adhikārāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_4: cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_5: . ataḥ iñ aṇ ca iti aṇ api prāpnoti . tasmāt prāgvacanam . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_0: 545-547 atha kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane katham idam vijñāyate . prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_1: āhosvit prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate prāk dīvyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_2: yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . atha vijñāyate prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_3: dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_4: iñ aṇam bhādhate . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_5: . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam prādhānyena artham pratinirdiśati . itarathā bahvyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_6: prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante . tataḥ yām kām cit evam nimittatvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_7: astu prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_8: . na vā kva cit vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_9: yat ayam vāvacanam karoti pīlāyāḥ vā udaśvitaḥ anyatarasyām iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_10: na apavādaviṣaye aṇ bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate na arthaḥ prāgvacanena . adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_11: siddham . nanu ca uktam adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_12: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat na vā kva cit vāvacanāt iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam iyān
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_13: avadhiḥ gṛhyate . na prāk ṭhakaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati artheṣu ayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_14: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prakṛtiviśeṣāt upadyamānaḥ iñ aṇam bādhate .

GS24pmbhasuu:6457_1: aṇapavādāt bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṇyādīnām avakāśaḥ . ditiḥ devatā asya daityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6457_2: . athaviśeṣalakṣaṇasya aṇapavādasya avakāśaḥ . duleḥ apatyam dauleyaḥ bāleyaḥ . iha

GS24pmbhasuu:6465: 550-551 kimartham nañsnañau ucyete na nañ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_0: pauṃsnam . puṃs iti sakārāntaḥ nakāraśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . na sidhyati . saṃyogāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_1: lopaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi na eva arthaḥ nañā na api snañā . añ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_2: . saḥ anuvartiṣyate nakāraḥ ca āgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atha nakārāgame sati kim pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_3: kariṣyate āhosvit parādiḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pūrvāntaḥ straiṇāḥ bahuṣu lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_4: . straiṇānām saṅghaḥ saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ prāpnoti . atha parādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_5: pauṃsam saḥ eva doṣaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . astu pūrvāntaḥ . katham straiṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_6: straiṇānām saṅghaḥ iti . ubhayatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca idam laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_7: gotram . īkāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . straiṇī pauṃsī iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_8: bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti nañsnañīkakkhuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_9: iti . ṭilopaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . nugvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . bhavet iha nugvacanāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_10: syāt straiṇam iti . iha tu khalu paūmsam iti nugvacanāt eva prāpnoti . tasmāt nañsnañau vaktavyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_0: 552 atha imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt āhosvit prāk vateḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_1: nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ . nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . strīvat puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ima
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_3: nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim bādheyātām
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_4: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vateḥ prāk iti vakṣyāmi . vateḥ prāk iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_5: bhāve upasaṅkhyānam . vateḥ prāk iti cet bhāve upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_6: straiṇam pumbhāvaḥ pauṃsnam iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_7: ca uktam nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_8: jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_9: karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6472_0: P II.239.2 - 8 R III.553 iha kasmāt na bhavati traividyaḥ pāñcanadaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6472_1: . iha tāvat traividyaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate tisraḥ vidyāḥ adhīte traividyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6472_2: . katham tarhi . tryavayavā vidyā trividyā . trividyām adhīte traividyaḥ iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6472_3: api pāñcanadaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate pañcasu nadīṣu bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6472_4: tarhi . pañcānām nadīnām samāhāraḥ pañcanadam . pañcanade bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6472_5: ṣāṭkulaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate ṣaṭsu kuleṣu bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6472_6: ṣaṇṇām kulam ṣaṭkulam ṣaṭkule bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . ajādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_0: 554-556 dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam . dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_1: . dvigunimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ tasya luk bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pañcakapālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_2: idam khaṇḍam pāñcakapālam iti . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_3: atannimittāt api iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_4: . pancakapālyām saṃskrtaḥ iti api vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_5: kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . tasya nimittam tannimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_6: tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_7: kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt iti kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_8: api tannimittagrahaṇe atra prāpnoti pañcakapālasya idam khaṇḍam iti . atha vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_9: saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yatha na
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_10: doṣaḥ tathā astu . saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_11: . kutaḥ etat . yat ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_12: tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_13: . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . dvigoḥ taddhitasya luk bhavati . kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_14: . yasmin dviguḥ iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_15: vaktavyam arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_16: asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālyām saṃskṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_17: pañcakapālaḥ daśakapālaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_18: aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_19: avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati . evam pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ iti vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_20: iti bhaviṣyati . pañcakapālyām saṃskṛtaḥ iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . traiśabdyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6476_21: iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_0: 556-557 gotre aluk aci iti cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . gotre aluk aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_1: cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā itaretarāśrayatā . alugnimittaḥ ajādiḥ ajādinimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_2: ca aluk . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_3: tu lukaḥ chavidhānam . vipratiṣedhāt tu lukaḥ chaḥ bhaviṣyati . lukaḥ avakāśaḥ gargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_4: vatsāḥ bidāḥ urvāḥ . chasya avakāśaḥ śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ gārgīyaḥ vātsīyaḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_5: prāpnoti . gargāṇām chātrāḥ gārgīyāḥ vātsīyaḥ . chaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_6: eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . bhūmni ca luk prāptaḥ bāhye ca arthe vidhīyate ajādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_7: . bahiraṅgam antaraṅgāt . vipratiṣedhāt ayuktam syāt . bhūmni prāptasya lukaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_8: ajādau taddhite alukam śāsti etat bravīti kūrvan samānakālau aluk luk ca . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_9: bhūmni prāptasya lukaḥ ajādau taddhite alukam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samānakālau
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_10: etau aluglukau iti . yadi vā lukaḥ prasaṅge bhavati aluk chaḥ tathā prasiddhaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_11: . yadi vā lukaḥ prasaṅge bhavati aluk bhavati tathā asya chaḥ prasiddhaḥ asya . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_12: hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . luk vā alukaḥ prasaṅgam pratīkṣate che
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_13: aluk asya tathā . luk vā punaḥ alukaḥ prasaṅgam yadi pratīkṣate tathā asya che aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:6480_14: siddhaḥ bhavati . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_0: 558-562 gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_1: bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_2: māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_3: . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_4: . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_5: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_6: . baidayoḥ bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_7: bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_8: iti bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_9: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_10: dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_11: ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . nanu ca uktam varṇāśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_12: na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_13: bhavanti tathā ca idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_14: vakṣyāmi . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_15: māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_16: bhaviṣyati . punaḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_17: aluk ucyate . na ca etat samarthānām prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_18: artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharavājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_19: bhṛgvaṅgirasikākutsakuśikikā iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_20: . atha vā gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva dvitīyam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_21: upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati na anyasya iti . yat api ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_22: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_23: luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_24: yañantam yat bahuṣu iti bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_25: syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_26: grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram . yadi añantam yad bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_27: iti evam ucyate bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau atra api prāpnoti . aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_28: atra likam bādhiṣyati . aluki ca kṛte punaḥ lukaḥ nimittam na asti iti kṛtvā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_29: luk na bhaviṣyati . uktam vā . kim uktam . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . paramaprakṛteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_30: āpatyaḥ . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ . saḥ ca astriyām . ekagotragrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_31: ca . bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham iti . tatra bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_32: bidaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . baidaḥ baidau . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_33: māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . bidā iti aviravikanyāyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:6488_0: 562-563 yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . yūni luk aci iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:6488_1: pratyayasya ayatheṣṭam prāpnoti . aniṣṭe pratyaye avasthite luk . aniṣṭapratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6488_2: śravaṇam prasjyeta . siddham tu aviśeṣeṇa lugvacanam hali ca pratiṣedhaḥ . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6488_3: etat . katham . aviśeṣeṇa lukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6488_4: bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6488_5: ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ. aci iti na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi . viṣayasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:6488_6: . ajādau viṣaye iti . tatra aci viṣaye luke kṛte yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_0: 563-565 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam sauvīragotrebhyaḥ ṇaṭhakchāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_1: . ṇa . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ phāṇṭāhṛtaḥ . phāṇṭahṛtasya yūnaḥ chātrāḥ phāṇṭāhṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_2: . ṇa . ṭhak . bhāgavitteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ bhāgavittikaḥ . bhāgavittikasya yūnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_3: chātrāḥ bhāgavittāḥ . ṭhak . tailāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ tailāyanīyaḥ . tailāyanīya
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_4: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ tailāyanīyāḥ . iñṇyau sarvatra . iñṇyau sarvatra prayojanam . aupagaveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_5: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ . vṛddhavadatideśe sati iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_6: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyākhyāyate asau atideśaḥ . katham yāni prayojanāni . tāni jñāpakena
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_7: siddhāni . yatkhacchāntāt tarhi iñaḥ prayojanam . yat . śvaśurasya apatyam śvaśuryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_8: . śvaśuryasya apatyam śvāśuriḥ . śvāśureḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śvāśurāḥ . yat . kha . kulasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_9: apatyam kulīnaḥ . kulīnasya apatyam kaulīniḥ . kaulīneḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ kaulīnāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_10: kha . cha . svasuḥ apatyam svasrīyaḥ . svasrīyasya apatyam svāsrīyiḥ . svāsrīyeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_11: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ svāsrīyāḥ . etāni api hi na santi prayojanāni . atra api yūni śvaśuryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_12: kulīnaḥ svasrīyaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . uktam etat aṇiñoḥ luki abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_13: yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam iti . abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti ucyate . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_14: abrāhmaṇagotramātram . abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti na ayam paryudāsaḥ yat anyat brāhmaṇagotramātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_15: iti . kim tarhi prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ brāhmaṇagotramātrāt na iti . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_16: etat evam vijñeyam māyuriḥ kāpotiḥ kāpiñjaliḥ iti evamartham . evam tarhi aṇṇyau
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_17: sarvatra prayojanam . aṇ . glucukāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ glaucukāyanaḥ . glaucukāyanasya

GS24pmbhasuu:6496_0: 565-569 prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ . prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6496_3: vuñ yathā syāt . yadi vṛddhavadatideśaḥ kriyate aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6496_4: iti iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena anutpattiḥ atidiśyeta

GS24pmbhasuu:6496_6: ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_0: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_1: iti . evam iha api yuvā vṛddhavat bhavati vṛddhavat na bhavati iti evam vākyaśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_2: samarthayiṣyāmahe . yatha gotre yuvapratyayaḥ na bhavati evam prāgdīvyatodhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_3: yūni api na bhavati iti . tat vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi yūni
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_4: luk iti etat na kriyate . katham tarhi phakphiñoḥ anyatarasyām iti . phakphiñvartī
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_5: yuvā vā vṛddhavat bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . yadā tarhi na vṛddhavat tadā gārgyāyaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_6: samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_7: gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena arthaḥ atidiśyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_8: . prāgdīvyatodhikāreyūnaḥ vṛddhavat arthaḥ bhavati iti . tat vaktavyam . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_9: etat ucyate atha vā etarhi yūni luk iti etat na kariṣyate . katham tarhi phakphiñoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_10: anyatarasyām iti . phakphiñvartī yuvārthaḥ vā vṛddhavat bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_11: tarhi na vṛddhavat tadā gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_12: gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi rājanyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_13: vuñ manuṣyāt ca jñāpakam laukikam param . yat ayam vuñvidhau rājanyamanuṣyayoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_14: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ laukikam param gotragrahaṇam iti . yuvā ca loke gotram
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_15: iti upacaryate . kiṅgotraḥ asi māṇavakaḥ . gārgyāyaṇaḥ . kiṅgotraḥ asi māṇavakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_16: . vātsyāyanaḥ . yadi etat jñāpyate aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ gotrāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_17: iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . sāmuhikeṣu jñāpakam . yadi sāmuhikeṣu jñāpakam gārgyāyaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_18: kim cit gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_19: . vuñvidhau jñāpakam . vuñvidhau jñāpakam śālaṅkeḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śālaṅkāḥ iñaḥ gotre
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_20: iti aṇ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . katham aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_21: .gotreṇa iñam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . gotre yaḥ iñ vihitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_0: 569-570 tasya idam iti apatye api . tasya idam iti apatye api aṇ siddhaḥ . tasyedaṃviśeṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_1: hi ete apatyam samūhaḥ vikāraḥ tasya nivāsaḥ iti . kim artham tarhi idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_2: bādhanārtham kṛtam bhavet . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . katham punaḥ aśaiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_3: śaiṣikam bādheta . utsargaḥ śeṣaḥ eva asau . yaḥ hi utsargaḥ saḥ api śeṣaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_4: atha etasmin bādhakabādhane sati kim prayojanam . vṛddhāni asya prayojanam . vṛddhāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_5: prayojayanti . bhānoḥ apatyam bhānavaḥ . śyāmagoḥ apatyam śyāmagavaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_6: icchatā api apavādaḥ prāpnuvan śakyaḥ bādhitum . tasyagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . kim idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_7: bhavān adhyāruhya tasyagrahaṇasya eva prayojanam āha na punaḥ sarvasya eva yogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_8: . avaśyam uttarātham arthanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . samarthavibhaktiḥ api tarhi avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_9: uttarārtham pratinirdeṣṭavyā . evam tarhi yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6501_10: hi tasya apatyam ataḥ iñ bhavati iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_0: 571-573 puṃliṅgena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena ca . tena puṃliṅgāt eva utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_1: syāt ekavacanāntāt ca . strīnapuṃsakaliṅgāt dvivacanabahuvacanāntāt ca idam na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_2: . taddhitārthanirdeśe liṅgavacanam apramāṇam tasya avivakṣitatvāt . taddhitārthanirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_3: liṅgavacanam apramāṇam . kim kāraṇam . tasya avivakṣitatvāt . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_4: . katham punaḥ tena eva ca nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_5: bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_6: ca. avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena nirdeśaḥ kartavya iti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_7: . kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam sapalālam satuṣam āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_8: ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān sakaṇṭakān
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_9: saśakalān āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_10: . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena ca. na
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_11: hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . sarvanāmanirdeśe viśeṣāsampratyayaḥ sāmānyanirdeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_12: sarvanāmanirdeśe viśeṣasya asampratyayaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyanirdeśāt . sarvanāmnā
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_13: ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saranāma ca sāmānyavāci . tena sāmānyavācinaḥ eva utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6505_14: syāt . viśeṣavācinaḥ na syāt . sāmānyacodanāḥ tu viśeṣeṣu . sāmānyacodanāḥ tu viśeṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_0: gauḥ anūbadhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_1: kriyante . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_2: . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_3: dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt sāmānyavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_4: utpattau viśeṣavācinaḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . apatyābhidhāne strīpuṃliṅgasya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_5: napuṃsakatvāt . apatyābhidhāne strīpuṃliṅgasya aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . napuṃsakaliṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_6: . apatyam napuṃsakaliṅgam . tena napuṃsakaliṅgasya eva abhidhānam syāt . strīpuṃliṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_7: na syāt . nanu ca idam purastāt eva coditam parihṛtam ca . utpattiḥ tatra codyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_8: . iha punaḥ utpannena abhidhānam codyate . siddham tu prajanasya vivakṣitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_9: siddham etat . katham . prajanasya vivakṣitatvāt . prajanaḥ atra vivakṣitaḥ saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_10: sarvaliṅgaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samānāyām pravṛttau apatyam napuṃsakaliṅgam prajanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_11: sarvaliṅgaḥ . ekārthe śabdānyatvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgānyatvam . ekārthe śabdānyatvāt liṅgānyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_12: dṛśyate . tat yathā puṣyaḥ tārakāḥ nakṣatram . geham kuṭī maṭhaḥ iti . avayavānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_13: ca . avayavānyatvāt ca liṅgānyatvam dṛśyate . tat yathā kuṭī kuṭīraḥ śamī śamīraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6506_14: śuṇḍā śuṇḍāraḥ . avayavānyatvāt kila liṅgānyatvam syāt kim punaḥ yatra śabdānyatvam api .
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_0: 574-590 kimartham idam ucyate . utpādayitāram prati apatyayogāt tasya ca vivakṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_1: ekavacanam gotre . utpādayitā utpādayitā apatyena yujyate . tasya ca vivakṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_2: . utpādayituḥ saḥ ca abhisambandhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . utpādayitāram prati apatyayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_3: tasya ca abhisambandhasya vivakṣitatvāt utpādayituḥ utpādayituḥ apatyābhidhāne anekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_4: pratyayaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekaḥ eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_5: iti ekavacanam gotre . evamartham idam ucyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate utpādayitā utpādayitā
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_6: apatyena yujyate iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . pitāmahasya utsaṅge dārakam āsīnam
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_7: kaḥ cit pṛcchati kasya ayam iti . saḥ āha devadattasya yajñadattasya vā iti . utpādayitāram
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_8: vyapadiśati na ātmānam . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra pratyayāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_9: gotre pratiṣedhaḥ gotre niyatatvāt . tatra pratyayāntāt gotre pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_10: . aupagavasya apatyam iti . kim kāraṇam . gotre niyatatvāt . gotre hi ayam niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_11: kriyate . tena yaḥ ca asau yathājātīyakaḥ ca gotrapratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ ekaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_12: . kaḥ ca prāpnoti . yaḥ pratyayāntāt . paramaprakṛteḥ ca utpattiḥ . paramaprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_13: ca utpattiḥ vaktavyā . ayogāt hi na prāpnoti . etayoḥ ca eva parihāraḥ paṭhiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_14: hi ācāryaḥ yūni ca antarhite aprāptiḥ iti tasya ca yathā tatpratyayāntam . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_15: tat eva vikārāvayavapratyayāntam dvitīyam ca tṛtīyam ca vikāram saṅkrāmati evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_16: api tat eva apatyapratyayāntam dvitīyam ca tṛtīyam ca apatyam saṅkramiṣyati . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_17: siddham aupagavasya apatyam aupagavaḥ yatra saḥ eva anantaraḥ iṣyate saḥ eva gotre
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_18: . idam tu khalu na sidhyati gargasya apatyam gārgyaḥ iti . atra hi anyaḥ anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_19: iṣyate anyaḥ gotre . striyām ca aniyamaḥ . striyām ca yuvatyām niyamaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_20: . aupagavī māṇavakī . niyamāt hi strī paryudasyate ekaḥ gotre gotrāt yūni astriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_21: iti . katarasmin pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . utpādayitari apatyayukte . utpādayitari tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_22: apatyayukte na doṣaḥ . utpādayitari hi apatyayukte na sarvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_23: . tatra niyamaḥ na upapadyate . asati niyame na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarveṣu tarhi apatyayukteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_24: ayam doṣaḥ . sarveṣu hi apatyayukteṣu sarvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_25: upapannaḥ bhavati . sati niyame eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . utpādayitari ca apatyayukte striyā yuvatyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_26: abhidhānam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gotrasañjñā yuvasañām bādhate . gotrāt yūni
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_27: ca astriyām pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . yūni ca antarhite aprāptiḥ . yūni ca antarhite
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_28: niyamasya aprāptiḥ . gārgyāyaṇasya apatyam iti . katarasmin pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . sarveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_29: apatyayukteṣu . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu tāvat na doṣaḥ . sarveṣu hi apatyayukteṣu sarvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_30: utpattyā bhavativyam . tatra niyamaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . sati niyame na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_31: . utpādayitari tarhi apatyayukte ayam doṣaḥ . utpādayitari hi apatyayukte paramaprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_32: anantarāt gotrāt ca ayogāt na prāpnoti . yūnaḥ ca na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gotrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_33: iti niyamāt . santu tarhi katham punaḥ jñāyate sarve apatyayuktāḥ iti . evam hi yājñikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_34: paṭhanti . daśapuruṣānūkam yasya gṛhe śūdrāḥ na vidyeran saḥ somam pibet iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_35: ca sarve apatyayuktāḥ bhavanti tataḥ etat upapannam bhavati . katham yat uktam pitāmahasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_36: utsaṅge dārakam āsīnam kaḥ cit pṛcchati kasya ayam iti . saḥ āha devadattasya yajñadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_37: vā iti . utpādayitāram vyapadiśati na ātmānam iti . utpattiḥ tasya vivakṣitā . sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_38: na idam apatyam . devadattaḥ tu asya utpādayitā iti . atha sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_39: kim anena kriyate ekaḥ gotre iti . sarveṣām apatyayogāt pratyayāntāt gotre pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_40: ekaḥ gotre . sarveṣām apatyayogāt pratyayāntāt gotre pratiṣedhārtham ekaḥ gotre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_41: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . na tu jñāyate kaḥ ekaḥ bhavati yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_42: vā paramaprakṛteḥ yaḥ vā anantarāt iti . niyamānupapattiḥ ca . niyamaḥ ca na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_43: . kim kāraṇam . na hi ekasmin apatye anekapratyayaprāptiḥ . na hi ekasmin apatye
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_44: anekapratyayaḥ prāpnoti . kim tarhi . apatyāntare śabdāntarāt pratyayāntaraprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_45: . apatyāntare apatyāntara śabdāntarāt śabdāntarāt pratyayāntaram pratyayāntaram prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_46: . phakantāt iñ iñantāt phak iti phagiñoḥ dāśatayī pratyayamālā prāpnoti . katarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_47: pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu tāvat na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_48: sarveṣu hi apatyayukteṣu sarvataḥ utpattyā bhavativyam . tatra niyamaḥ upapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_49: bhavati . sati niyame na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6511_0: utpādayitari tarhi apatyayukte ayam doṣaḥ . utpādayitari hi apatyayukte na sarvataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6819_2: vā . gāndhāryādibhyaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . gāndhāraḥ gāndhārayaḥ vāsātaḥ vasātayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_3: śaibaḥ śibayaḥ . rājanyādibhyaḥ vā vuñ . rājanyādibhyaḥ vā vuñ vaktavyaḥ . rājanyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_4: rājanyakaḥ daivayātavaḥ daivayātavakaḥ . bailvavanādibhyaḥ nityam . bailvavanādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_5: nityam iti vaktavyam . bailvavanakaḥ āmbarīṣaputrakaḥ ātmakāmeyakaḥ . tat tarhi bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_6: vaktavyam . na vā abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lubviṣayavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_7: pratyayaḥ . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt . yat abhidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_8: saḥ nivāsaḥ ca viṣayaḥ ca . abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lup viṣayavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_9: pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . etat jñāsyāmi iha nityaḥ vidhiḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_10: vibhāṣā iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . yāvatā yat abhidheyam saḥ nivāsaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6819_11: viṣayaḥ ca . abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lup viṣayavivakṣāyām pratyayaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:6831_0: 651-653 ukthādi iti ucyate . kāni ukthāni . sāmāni . yadi evam sāmagamātre aukthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_1: iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . ukthārtham uktham
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_2: . iha ukthāni adhīte aukthikaḥ yajñam adhīte yājñikaḥ . yaḥ idānīm aukthikyam yājñikam
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_3: ca adhīte katham tatra bhavitavyam . aukthikaḥ yājñikaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_4: . tasyedampratyayāt luk . tasyedampratyayāt luk . tasyedampratyayasya ca . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_5: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . ukthāni adhīte aukthikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_6: adhīte aukthikaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_7: bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_8: bhavati āvikam iti . evam ukthāni adhīte iti vigṛhya aukthikaḥ iti bhaviṣyati . aukthikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_9: adhīte iti vigṛhya vākyam eva. vidyālakṣaṇakalpasūtrāntāt akalpādeḥ ikak smṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_10: vidyā . vāyasavidyakaḥ . vidyā lakṣaṇa golakṣaṇikaḥ āśvalakṣaṇikaḥ . lakṣaṇa . kalpa
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_11: . pārāśarakalpikaḥ pārakalpikaḥ . kalp . sūtra . vārttikasūtrikaḥ sāṅgrahasūtrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_12: . akalpādeḥ iti kimartham . kālpasūtraḥ . vidyā ca anaṅgakṣatradharmatripūrvā . vidyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_13: ca anaṅgakṣatradharmatripūrvā iti vaktavyam . āṅgavidyaḥ kṣātravidyaḥ dhārmavidyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_14: traividyaḥ . ākhyānākhyāyiketihāsapurāṇebhyaḥ ca ṭhak vaktavyaḥ . yāvakrītikaḥ praiyaṅgavikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_15: yāyātikaḥ . ākhyāna . ākhyāyikā . vāsavadattikaḥ saumanottarikaḥ . aitihāsikaḥ paurāṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_16: . sarvasādeḥ dvigoḥ ca laḥ . sarvasādeḥ dvigoḥ ca laḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvavedaḥ sarvatantraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_17: . savārttikaḥ sasaṅgrahaḥ . pañcakalpaḥ dvitantraḥ . anusūḥ lakṣyalakṣaṇe sarvasādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6831_18: dvigoḥ ca laḥ ikan padottarapadāt śataṣaṣṭeḥ ṣikan pathaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6835: 654 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham anubrāhmaṇī anubrāhmaṇinau anubrāhmaṇinaḥ . ininā eva matvarthīyena siddham .

GS24pmbhasuu:6839_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . vasantasahacaritam adhyayanam

GS24pmbhasuu:6847_0: 655-657 kimartham idam ucyate . anyatra abhidheyasya anityatvāt chandobrāhmaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_1: tadviṣayavacanam . anyatra abhidheyam anityam bhavati . pāṇinīyam iti vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_2: pāṇinīyāḥ iti vā . anyatra abhidheyasya anityatvāt chandobrāhmaṇānām api anityatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_3: prāpnoti . iṣyate ca tadviṣayatā eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_4: iti chandobrāhmaṇānām tadviṣayavacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_5: etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yathādhikāram tadviṣayaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra yathādhikāram
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_6: tadviṣayatā prāpnoti . adhīte veda iti vartate . tena adhyetṛveditroḥ eva tadviṣayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_7: syāt . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na syāt . yathā iha bhavati pāṇinīyam mahat suvihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_8: iti evam iha api syāt kaṭham mahat suvihitam iti . siddham tu proktādhikāre tadviṣayavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_9: . siddham etat . katham . proktādhikāre eva tadviṣayatā vaktavyā . tena proktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_10: chandobrāhmaṇāni adhyetṛveditroḥ eva iti . tat tarhi adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_11: . nanu ca iha api kriyate . parārtham etad bhavati tat adhīte tat veda iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_12: tarhi yāvat iha chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam tāvat atra adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_13: tatra api kriyate . parārtham tat bhaviṣyati . purāṇprokteṣu brāhmaṇakalpeṣu śaunakādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6847_14: chandasi iti . iha vā chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam kriyate tatra vā adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_1: . yājñavalkāni brāhmaṇāni . saulabhāni . kim proktādhikāre tadviṣayatā kriyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_2: ataḥ yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha . sarvathā yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_3: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iniḥ vā prokte tadviṣayaḥ . atha vā iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_4: bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyate paiṅgī kalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_5: atra api prāpnoti . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_6: ca kalpe niyamārtham draṣṭavyam . kāśyapakauśikābhyām eva iniḥ kalpe tadviṣayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_7: na anyebhyaḥ iti . evam api chaṇādīnām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . taittirīyāḥ vāratantavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_8: . yadi punaḥ chaṇādayaḥ prokte tadviṣayāḥ bhavanti iti ucyeta . evam api paiṅgī kalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_9: atra api prāpnoti . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham iti eva . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_10: autsargikāṇām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . krauḍāḥ kāṅkatāḥ maudāḥ paippalādāḥ . chaṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_11: ca api autsargikān adhyetṛveditroḥ eva bādheran . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na bādheran
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_12: . tittiriṇā proktāḥ ślokāḥ iti . asti tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam yājñavakyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_13: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat . yājñavakyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tulyakālatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_14: . tatra eva vaktavyam . tadviṣayatā ca na bhavati iti . katham kāśyapinaḥ kauśikinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_15: iti . iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyamāne avaśyam kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_16: kalpe niyamārtham draṣṭavyam . tat eva idānīm vidhyartham bhaviṣyati . katham pārāśariṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6851_17: bhikṣavaḥ śailālinaḥ naṭāḥ . atra api tadviṣayatā ca iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_0: 660-661 kim punaḥ ayam ekaḥ yogaḥ āhosvit nānāyogāḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_1: uttareṣu arthādeśaneṣu deśe tannāmni deśe tannāmni iti asya anuvṛttiḥ kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_2: na hi ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati . katham jñāyate . yat ayam tat adhīte tat veda iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_3: dviḥ tadgrahaṇam karoti . atha nānāyogāḥ oḥ añ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yat eva sarvāntyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_4: arthādeśanam tasya eva viṣaye syāt . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat ekaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_5: . nanu ca uktam uttareṣu arthādeśaneṣu deśe tannāmni deśe tannāmni iti asya anuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_6: kartavyā . na hi ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati iti . ekayoge api anuvṛttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_7: katham jñāyate . yat ayam tat asya asti asmin iti matup iti dviḥ tadgrahaṇam na karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_8: . katham tat adhīte tat veda iti . pramādakṛtam ācāryasya śakyam akartum . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_9: punaḥ santu nānāyogāḥ . nanu ca uktam oḥ añ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yat eva sarvāntyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_10: arthādeśanam tasya eva viṣaye syāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . goyūthavat adhikārāḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6855_11: yathā goyūtham ekadaṇḍapraghaṭṭitam sarvam samam ghoṣam gacchati tadvat adhikārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6859_0: 661 oḥ añvidheḥ nadyām matuP vipratiṣiddham . oḥ añvidheḥ nadyām matup bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6859_1: . oḥ añaḥ avakāśahḥ kannatu kānnavatam . matupaḥ avakāśaḥ udumbarāvatī maśakāvatī
GS24pmbhasuu:6859_2: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . ikṣumatī drumatī . matup bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:6863_0: 661-662 aṅgagrahaṇam kimartham . yathā bahvajgrahaṇam aṅgaviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . bahvacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6863_1: aṅgāt iti . atha akriyamāṇe aṅgagrahaṇe bahvajgrahaṇam kasya viśeṣaṇam syāt . matvantaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6863_2: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha api prasajyeta . mālāvatām ayam nivāsaḥ mālāvatam . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6863_3: ca idānīm abahvac matvantaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha : svavān , śvavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:6867_0: 662 kimartham nadyām matup vidhīyate na tat asya asti asmin iti matup iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6867_1: . nadyām matubvacanam matvarthe aṇvidhānāt . nadyām matubvacanam kriyate matvarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6867_2: aṇvidhānāt . ayam matvarthe aṇ vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam matupam
GS24pmbhasuu:6867_3: bādheta . nirvṛttādyartham ca . nirvṛttādyartham ca nadyām matubvacanam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6868: (P_4,2.87) KA_II,288.7 Ro_III,662 mahiṣāt ca iti vaktavyam . mahiṣmān .
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_0: 662-664 yadi punaḥ ayam kuṭ parādiḥ kriyeta . kuṭi pratyayādeḥ ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_1: . kuṭi sati pratyayādeḥ iti ādeśasya anupapattiḥ . kuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte hrasvatvam . yadi pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_3: hrasvatvam vaktavyam . kuñcakīyāḥ . parādau punaḥ sati ke aṇaḥ iti hrasvatvam siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_4: bhavati . astu tarhi parādiḥ . nanu ca uktam kuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_5: iti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya kuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kuṭ ādiṣṭasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_6: vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sanniyogāt siddham . sanniyogḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_7: . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kuṭ ca . yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_8: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_9: eva astu . nanu ca uktam . pūrvānte hrasvatvam iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_10: nipātanam . kruñcāḥ hrasvatvam ca iti . tat tarhi pūrvānte sati nipātanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_11: . parādau api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat hi tat ke aṇaḥ iti hrasvatvam na tat kādimātre śakhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_12: vijñātum . iha api prasajyeta . nadīkalpaḥ parīvāhaḥ kumārīkāmyati iti . tasmāt ubhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6872_13: etat vaktavyam . kruñcāḥ hrasvatvam ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_0: 664-670 śeṣe iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . apatyādibhyaḥ cāturarthparyantebhyaḥ ye
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_1: anye arthāḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam . śeṣe ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_2: svārthe mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . aṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_3: svārthe kasmāt na bhavanti iti . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . tena svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_4: na bhaviṣyanti . ime api tarhi jātādiṣu artheṣu vidhīyante . tena svārthe na bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_5: . katham punaḥ iha ucyamānāḥ ghādayaḥ jātādiṣu śakyāḥ vijñātum . anuvartiṣyante tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_6: ghādayaḥ . yadi anuvartante ghādayaḥ yā yā parā prakṛtiḥ tasyāḥ tasyāḥ pūrve pūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_7: pratyayāḥ prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi jātādiṣu artheṣu ghādīn apekṣiṣyāmahe . ayuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_8: evam bahunaḥ apekṣā . apekṣamāṇaḥ ayam anantaram yogam apekṣeta . bahunaḥ api apekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_9: bhavati . tat yathā kaṣādiṣu yathāvidhi anuprayogaḥ iti sāmānyakam saviśeṣakam sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_10: apekṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu anuvṛttiḥ . nanu ca uktam yā yā parā prakṛtiḥ tasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_11: tasyāḥ pūrve pūrve pratyayāḥ prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_12: . rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau . grāmāt yakhañau rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau . kattryādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_13: ḍhakañ rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau grāmāt yakhañau iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . śeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_14: ghādīnām apatyādiṣu aprasaṅgārtham . śeṣavacanam kriyate śeṣe ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_15: . apatyādiṣu mā bhūvan iti iti . katham ca prāpnuvanti . tasyedaṃvacanāt prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_16: . tasyedaṃviśeṣāḥ hi ete apatyam samūhaḥ nivāsaḥ vikāraḥ iti . vipratiṣedhāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_17: . aṇādayaḥ kriyantām ghātayaḥ iti aṇādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . na vā paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_18: ghādīnām . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . paratvāt ghādīnām . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_19: param iti ucyate . pūrve ca aṇādayaḥ pare ghādayaḥ . pare aṇādayaḥ kariṣyante . sūtraviparyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6876_20: ca evam kṛtaḥ bhavati . aṇapavādatvāt ca aṇviṣaye ghādiprasaṅgaḥ . aṇapavādatvāt

GS24pmbhasuu:6980_4: alukam śāsti . alugvacanam jñāpakam iti cet avyayāt saptamīprasaṅgaḥ . alugvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6980_5: jñāpakam iti cet avyayāt saptamī prāpnoti . doṣātanam divātanam . astu avyayāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6980_6: luk bhaviṣyati . iha api luk prāpnoti . pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam . aluk atra lukam
GS24pmbhasuu:6980_7: bādhiṣyate . iha api bādheta . doṣātanam divātanam . samānāśrayaḥ luk alukā bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6980_8: . kaḥ ca samānāśrayaḥ . yaḥ pratyayāśrayaḥ . atra ca prāk eva pratyayotpatteḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:6980_9: bhavati . na sidhyati . iha hi sati pratyaye lukā bhavitavyam . sati luki alukā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6980_10: . tatra ca pratyayaḥ eva na asti . kutaḥ luk bhaviṣyati . sā eṣā jñāpakena asatī
GS24pmbhasuu:6980_11: vibhaktiḥ ākṛṣyate . sā yathā iha bādhikā bhavati pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam evam

GS24pmbhasuu:7069_0: 716-717 proktagrahaṇam anarthakam tatra adarśanāt . proktagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_1: kāraṇam . tatra adarśanāt . grāme grāme kāṭhakam kālāpakam ca procyate . tatra adarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_2: . na ca tatra pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . granthe ca darśanāt . yatra ca dṛśyate granthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_3: saḥ . tatra kṛte granthe iti eva siddham . chandortham tarhi idam vaktavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_4: hi chandāṃsi kriyante . nityāni chandāṃsi . chandortham iti cet tulayam . chandortham
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_5: iti cet tulayam etat bhavati . grāme grāme kāṭhakam kālāpakam ca procyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_6: adarśanāt . na ca tatra pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . granthe ca darśanāt . yatra ca dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_7: granthaḥ saḥ . tatra kṛte granthe iti eva siddham . nanu ca uktam na hi chandāṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_8: kriyante . nityāni chandāṃsi iti . yadi api arthaḥ nityaḥ yā tu asau varṇānupūrvī
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_9: sa anityā . tadbhedāt ca etat bhavati . kāṭhakam kālāpakam maudakam paippalādakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_10: iti . na tarhi idānīm idam vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yat tena proktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_11: na ca tena kṛtam . mādhurī vṛttiḥ . yadi tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7069_12: . tat na vaktavyam . tat api avaśyam vaktavyam . yat ten kṛtam na ca tena proktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_1: mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_2: vaiśampāyanāntevāsiṣu pratyakṣakārigrahaṇasya . yat ayam kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_3: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na antevāsyantevāsibhyaḥ bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_4: . vaiśampāyanāntevāsī kaṭhaḥ kaṭhāntevāsī khāḍāyanaḥ . vaiśampāyanāntevāsī kalāpī
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_5: . yadi ca antevāsyantevāsibhyaḥ api syāt kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_6: paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na antevāsyantevāsibhyaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_7: karoti . chandograhaṇam ca itarathā hi atiprasaṅgaḥ . chandograhaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_8: . itarathā hi atiprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt . iha api prasajyeta .

GS24pmbhasuu:7223_6: siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaḥ prāpnoti . ugavādibhyaḥ yat chaḥ ca iti chaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_7: prāpnoti . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam . atha kriymāṇe api prāgvacane katham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_8: vijñāyate . prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ āhosvit prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_9: ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_10: api chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . atha vijñāyate prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_11: . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ yat cham bādhiṣyate . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_12: astu. prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam prādhānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_13: artham pratinirdiśati . itarathā hi bahvyaḥ tatra prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante . tataḥ yām
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_14: kām cit evam prakṛtim avadhitvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ astu prāk krītāt yāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_15: prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam apavādaviṣaye api chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na vā kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_16: vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt . yat ayam kvac vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_17: karoti vibhāṣā havirapūpādibhyaḥ iti tat jñāpayati na apavādaviṣaye chaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_18: iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ prāgvacanena . adhikārāt siddham . nanu ca uktam adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_19: siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat ṇa vā kva cit vāvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_20: iti . atha kimartham iyān avadhiḥ gṛhyate na prāk ṭhañaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7223_21: ācāryaḥ artheṣu ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_0: KA_II.337.2-21 Ro_IV.6-7 yaññyau añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham sanaṅgūpānahau prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_1: . yaññyau bhavataḥ añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam ṣanaṅgūpānahau prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_2: . yataḥ avakāśaḥ śaṅkavyam dāru picavyaḥ kārpāsaḥ . añaḥ avakāśaḥ vārdhram vāratram
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_3: . sanaṅguḥ nāma carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . sanaṅgavyam carma . ñyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_4: avakāśaḥ aupānahyam dāru . añaḥ saḥ eva . upānat nāma carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_5: prāpnoti . aupānahyam carma . ḍhañ ca . ḍhañ ca bhavati añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_6: . ḍhañaḥ avakāśaḥ chādiṣeyam tṛṇam . añaḥ saḥ eva . chadiḥ nām carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_7: ubhayam prāpnoti . chādiṣeyam carma . ḍhañ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . havirapūpādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_8: vibhāṣāyāḥ yat . havirapūpādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . havirapūpādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_9: vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ āmikṣyam āmikṣīyam puroḍāśyam puroḍāśīyam . yataḥ saḥ eva . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_10: ubhayam prāpnoti . caravyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ . yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . annavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_11: ca . annavikārebhyaḥ ca vibhāṣāyāḥ yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . annavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_12: ca vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ suryāḥ surīyāḥ . yataḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . saktavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_13: dhānāḥ iti . yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7225_14: . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_0: KA_II.337.22-338.15 Ro_IV.7-10 ayam nābhiśabdaḥ gavādiṣu paṭhyate. tatra eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_1: nābhi nabham ca iti . tatra codyate . nābheḥ nabhabhāve pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_2: . nābheḥ nabhabhāve pratyayānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyabhāvāt . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_3: abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam na ca nābhisañjñikāyāḥ vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_4: . yat eva hi tanmaṇḍalacakrāṇām maṇḍalacakram tat nabhyam iti ucyate . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_5: śākhādiṣu vacanāt hrasvatvam ca . siddham etat . katham . śākhādiṣu nābhiśabdaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_6: hrasvatvam ca vaktavyam . nābhiḥ iva nabhyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ iha upamārthaḥ . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_7: tat akṣadhāraṇam parivartanam vā . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_0: yat tat añjanopāñjanam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam vaktavyam nābhi nabham ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_1: vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yāni etāni aravanti cakrāṇi tadartham . tatra nābhisañjñikāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_2: vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ asti . yāni ca api anaravanti cakrāṇi tadartham api idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_3: . dṛśyate hi samudāyāt avayavasya pṛthaktvam . tat yathā vārkṣī śākhā iti . guṇāntarayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_4: ca vikāraśabdaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vaibhītakaḥ yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_5: avayavasamudāye vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha yaḥ nabhyārthaḥ vṛkṣaḥ katham tatra bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_6: . nabhyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ nabhyā śiṃśipā iti . nabhyāt tu lugvacanam . nabhyāt tu luk vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7228_7: . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . nabhyārthaḥ nabhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7230_0: KA_II.338.17-21 Ro_IV.10 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham aśītiśatam kambalyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7230_1: iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . aparimāṇavistācitakambalebhyaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7230_2: taddhitaluki iti . idam tarhi prayojanam sañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:7230_3: . kambalīyāḥ ūrṇāḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāse
GS24pmbhasuu:7230_4: prāpte tatra kambalagrahaṇam kriyate parimāṇārtham parimāṇam ca sañjñā eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:7232_0: KA_II.338.23-339.2 Ro_IV.10-11 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7232_1: prāpte katham vā aprāpte . uvarṇāntāt iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . havirapūpādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7232_2: aprāpte . havirapūpādibhyaḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā . prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . caravyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7234: KA_II.339.4-5 Ro_IV.11 yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca . yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca upasaṅkhyānam . rathāya hitā rathyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_0: KA_II.339.7-18 Ro_IV.11-12 vṛṣaśabdaḥ ayam akārāntaḥ gṛhyate . vṛṣanśabdaḥ api nakārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_1: asti . tasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam vṛṣaśabdaḥ ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ vṛṣṇe hitam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_2: vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti eva yathā syāt . tathā brahmanśabdaḥ nakārāntaḥ gṛhyate . brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_3: ca akārāntaḥ asti . tasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam brahmanśabdaḥ ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_4: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam iti eva yathā syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_5: . na vaktavyam . samānārthau etau vṛṣaśabdaḥ vṛṣanśabdaḥ ca brahmanśabdaḥ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_6: ca . ātaḥ ca samānārthau . evam hi āha . kutaḥ nu carasi brahman . kutaḥ nu carasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_7: brāhmaṇa iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_8: bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_9: bhavati āvikam iti . evam iha api vṛṣāya hitam iti vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_10: . vṛṣṇe hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . tathā brahmaṇe hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_11: iti bhaviṣyati . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva bhaviṣyati . traiśabdyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_12: ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_0: KA_II.339.20-340.18 Ro_IV.12-14 bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ pūrvapadārthahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_1: . bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_3: ca pratyayaḥ iṣyate . pitṛbhogāya hite prāpnoti pitre ca eva hite iṣyate . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_4: bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vijñāsyate . bhogīnar iti cet vāvacanam . bhogīnar iti yadi pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_5: vidhīyate vāvacanam kartavyam mātrīyaḥ pitrīyaḥ iti api yathā syāt . rājācāryābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_6: nityam . rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . rājabhogīnaḥ . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_7: . ācāryabhogīnaḥ . kim bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vidhīyate iti ataḥ rājācāryābhyām nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_8: iti vaktavyam . na iti āha . sarvathā rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_9: grāmaṇibhogīnaḥ senānibhogīnaḥ iti uttarapade iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_10: abbhoginaḥ iti apaḥ bhi iti tatvam prāpnoti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_11: astu . nanu ca uktam bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ pūrvapadārthahitatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_12: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam bhogaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā bhogavān
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_13: ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasnāni ca vartante . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_14: tat yathā bhogavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ samyak snānādīḥ kriyāḥ anubhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_15: . tat yaḥ kriyāpadārthakaḥ tasya ayam grahaṇam . yaḥ ca pitṛsthābhyaḥ kriyābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_16: hitaḥ sambandhāt asau pitre api hitaḥ bhavati . yadi sambandhāt astu dravyapadārthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_17: api grahaṇam . yaḥ api hi pitṛdravyāya hitaḥ sambandhāt asau pitre hitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_18: . atha vā bhogaśabdaḥ śarīravācī api drśyate . tat yathā ahiḥ iva bhogaiḥ paryeti
GS24pmbhasuu:7238_19: bāhum iti. ahiḥ iva śarīraiḥ iti gamyate . evam pitṛśarīrāya hitaḥ pitṛbhogīṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_0: KA_II.340.19-341.6 Ro_IV.14-15 khavidhāne pañcajanāt upasaṅkhyānam . khavidhāne pañcajanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pañcajanāya hitaḥ pañcajanīnaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_2: . yaḥ hi pañcānām janāya hitaḥ pañcajanīyaḥ saḥ bhavati . sarvajanāt ṭhañ ca . sarvajanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_3: ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ khaḥ ca . sarvajanāya hitaḥ sārvajanikaḥ sārvajanīnaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_4: iti ca vaktavyam . yaḥ hi sarveṣām janāya hitaḥ sarvajanīyaḥ saḥ . mahājanāt nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_5: . mahājanāt nityam ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . mahājanāya hitaḥ māhājanikaḥ . tatpuruṣe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_6: vaktavyam bahuvrīhau mā bhūt iti . mahān janaḥ asya mahājanaḥ mahājanāya hitaḥ mahājanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_7: . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi iti upādhiḥ kriyate ādyanyāse api upādhiḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_8: . ātmanviśvajane samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . yaḥ his viśveṣām janāya hitaḥ viśvajanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_9: saḥ bhavati . atha matam etat anabhidhānāt ādyanyāse na bhaviṣyati iti iha api na
GS24pmbhasuu:7240_10: arthaḥ upādhigrahaṇena . iha api anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati .
