GS24pmbhasuu:7244: puruṣāt vadhe iti . puruṣāt vadhavikārasamūhatenakṛteṣu iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:7250_0: KA_II.341.15-20 Ro_IV.16 tadartham iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ ṭhañ . tadartham iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7250_1: ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . indramahārtham aindramahiham gāṅgāmahiham kāśeruyajñikam . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7250_2: prayojanena kṛtatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . prayojanena kṛtatvāt . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7250_3: hi indramahārtham indramahaḥ tasya prayojanam bhavati . tatra prayojanam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_0: KA_II.341.22-342.20 Ro_IV.17-19 upadhyartham iti pratyayānupapattiḥ . upadhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_1: iti pratyayasya iha anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . upadhyabhāvāt . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_2: abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca upadhisañjñikāyāḥ vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_3: . yat hi tat rathāṅgam tat aupadheyam iti ucyate . siddham tu kṛdantasya svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_4: añvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kṛdantasya svārthe añ vaktavyaḥ . upadhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_5: upadheyam . upadheyam eva aupadheyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_6: eva astu . nanu ca uktam upadhyartham iti pratyayānupapattiḥ iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_7: ayam upadhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ . upadhīyate upadhiḥ iti . asti bhāvasādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_8: . upadhānam upadhiḥ iti . tat yaḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . evam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_9: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau iti vartate . prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇam nivartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_10: . tat ca avaśyam nivartyam ihārtham uttarātham ca . ihārtham tāvat . bāleyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_11: . uttarārtham ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ . ārṣabhyaḥ vatsaḥ iti . atha tadartham iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_12: utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ . tat asya tat asmin syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_13: tadarthe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt iti . prākāraḥ nagarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_14: syāt iti . yadi tadartham iti anuvartate ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ ṛṣabhārthaḥ ghāsaḥ upānadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_15: tilakalkaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi anuvartate prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_16: nanu ca uktam balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . kim punaḥ bhavān vikāram matvā āha
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_17: balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . yadi tāvat yaḥ prakṛtyupamardena bhavati saḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_18: vaibhītakaḥ yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti na sidhyati . atha matam etat eva guṇāntarayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_19: vikāraḥ iti balyṛṣabhayoḥ api siddham bhavati . guṇantarayuktāḥ hi taṇḍulāḥ bāleyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_20: guṇāntarayuktaḥ ca vatsaḥ ārṣabhaḥ . aupadheyam tu na sidhyati . vacanāt svārthikaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_0: KA_II.342.22-343.6 Ro_IV.19-21 syādgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . prāsādaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_1: prākāraḥ nagarasya iti . atha kriyamāṇe api syādgrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . prāsādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_2: devadattasya syāt . prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti . śakyārthe liṅ iti vaktavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_3: evam śakyam . idānīm eva hi uktam na hi upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_4: iti . evam tarhi itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā bhavati . vivakṣā ca dvayī
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_5: . asti eva prāyoktrī vivakṣā asti laukikī . prayoktā hi mṛdvyā snigdhayā ślakṣṇayā
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_6: jihvayā mṛdūn snigdhān ślakṣṇān śabdān prayuṅkte . laukikī vivakṣā yatra prāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_7: sampratyayaḥ . prāyaḥ iti lokaḥ vyapadiśyate . na ca prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt prākāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_8: nagarasya syāt iti atra utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya sampratyayaḥ syāt . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_9: evam na arthaḥ syādgrahaṇena . na hi prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt prākāraḥ nagarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_10: syāt iti atra utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya sampratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_0: KA_II.343.8-344.10 Ro_IV.22-25 kimartham saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate na saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_1: api parimāṇam eva tatra parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_2: sati yat saṅkhyayāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā saṅkhyā anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_3: parimāṇam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aparimāṇabistācitakambaelbhyaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_4: taddhitaluki iti dvābhyām śatābhyām krītā dviśatā triśatā parimāṇaparyudāsena na
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_5: bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate tat asya parimāṇam saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_6: iti viśeṣaṇam na prakalpate parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā iti . iha ca krītavat parimāṇat
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_7: iti saṅkhyāvihitasya pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate . śatasya vikāraḥ śatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_8: śatikaḥ . sāhasraḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā saṅkhyā anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_9: parimāṇam iti . nyāyasiddham eva etat . bhedamātram saṅkhyā āha . yat ca iṣīkāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_10: yat ca aparimāṇam sarvasya saṅkhyā bhedamātram bravīti . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_11: sarvataḥ mānam iti ca ataḥ parimāṇam iti . prasthasya ca samānākṛteḥ na kutaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_12: viśeṣaḥ gamyate na ca unmānataḥ na parimāṇataḥ na pramāṇataḥ . kim punaḥ unmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_13: kim parimāṇam kim pramāṇam . ūrdhvamānam kila unmānam . ūrdhvam yat mīyate tat unmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_14: . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ . sarvataḥ mānam iti ca ataḥ parimāṇam . kuta etat . pariḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_15: sarvatobhāve vartate . āyāmaḥ tu pramāṇam syāt . āyāmavivakṣāyām pramāṇam iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_16: bhavati . saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ . ātaḥ ca sarvataḥ saṅkhyā bāhyā . bhedabhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_17: bravīti eṣā na eṣā mānam kutaḥ cana . evam ca kṛtvā saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_18: . yat api ucyate tat asya parimāṇam saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu iti viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_19: na prakalpate iti . āha ayam parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā iti . na ca asti saṅkhyā parimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_20: . tatra vacanāt iyatī vivakṣā bhaviṣyati . yad api ucyate krītavat parimāṇat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7256_21: saṅkhyāvihitasya pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti ca tatra vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_0: KA_II.344.11-345.7 Ro_IV.25-27 kim punaḥ ime ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt bhavanti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_1: saha arheṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ . ṭhagādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_2: prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ . arhe ṭhagādayaḥ vidheyāḥ . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_3: . sāharaḥ iti . vasne vasanāt siddham . iha yaḥ śatam arhati śatam tasya vasnaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_4: . tatra saḥ asya aṃśavasnabhṛtayaḥ iti eva siddham . vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_5: māṃsaudanikādiṣu aprāptiḥ . vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_6: . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_7: bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_8: iti na sidhyati . santu tarhi sahārheṇa . ā arhāt cet bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_9: ā arhāt cet bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhojanam arhati . pānam arhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_10: . kim ucyate bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ iti yadā chedādibhyaḥ iti ucyate . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_11: māṃsaudanikādyartham yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat arhati . tataḥ chedādibhyaḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_12: iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7258_13: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt bhojanādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati [R:
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_0: bhaviṣyati] . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ na kariṣyate . katham māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_1: kālāyasūpikaḥ . asmin dīyate asmai iti ca evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_2: prāk arhāt . nanu ca uktam ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_3: etat vasne vacanāt siddham iti . nanu ca uktam vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_4: aprāptiḥ . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_5: bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_6: iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asmin dīyate asmai iti ca evam etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_0: KA_II.345.9-25 Ro_IV. 27-29 asamāse iti kimartham . paramaniṣkeṇa krītam paramanaiṣkikam
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_1: . na etat asti . niṣkaśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat paramaniṣkaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_2: syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_3: prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam jñāpakam pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_4: tadantāpratiṣedhasya . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_5: . pūrvatra tadantvidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_6: . prāk vateḥ ṭhañ iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_7: . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . na ca ṭhañvidhau kā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_8: prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā arhāt agopucchasaṅkhyāparimāṇāt ṭhak
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_9: . paramagopucchena krītam pāramagopucchikam . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_10: . etat api na asti prayojanam . vidhau pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_11: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram tadantavidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_12: jñāpane prayojanam . pāryāṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇam vartayati dvaipārāyaṇikaḥ traipārāyaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_13: . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_14: . prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki . pūrvatra eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7261_15: . khalayavamāṣatilavṛṣabrahmaṇaḥ ca iti . kṛṣṇatilebhyaḥ hitaḥ kṛṣṇatilyaḥ . rājamāṣebhyaḥ hitam rājamāṣyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7263_0: KA_II.346.1-4 Ro_IV.29-30 prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki .
GS24pmbhasuu:7263_1: prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki kartavyam . pāryāṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7263_2: vartayati dvaipārāyaṇikaḥ traipārāyaṇikaḥ . aluki iti kimartham . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7263_3: krītam dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_0: KA_II.346.6-8 Ro_IV.30-31 śatapratiṣedhe anyaśatatve apratiṣedhaḥ . śatapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_1: anyaśatatve pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam. iha mā bhūt . śatena krītam śatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_2: śāṭakaśatam iti . anyaśatatve iti kim . śatakam nidānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_0: KA_II.346.10-18 Ro_IV.31-32 ḍateḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . katibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_1: krītam katikam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tyantāyāḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_2: . tipratiṣedhāt ḍatigrahaṇam iti cet arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ tiśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_3: grahaṇam na ca ḍateḥ tiśabdaḥ arthavān . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_4: hi kevalena pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate . kena tarhi . saprakṛtikena . kva tarhi eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_5: paribhāṣā bhavati . yāni etāni śabdasaṅghātagrahaṇāni . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_6: vaktavyam . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . nanu ca uktam na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:7267_7: . na hi kevalena pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate iti . kevalena api pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_0: KA_II.346.20-347.8 Ro_IV.32-33 kasya ayam iṭ vidhīyate . kanaḥ iti āha . tat kanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_1: grahaṇam kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi kanaḥ grahaṇe pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_2: vijñāyeta . ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat ṭitkaraṇe prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_3: . ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . akārāntaprakaraṇe īkāraḥ na ca eṣaḥ akārāntaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_4: api kutaḥ etat ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ akārāntaprakaraṇe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_5: anakārāntāt api īkāraḥ syāt . tasmāt kaṇaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_6: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_7: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . vatoḥ iti eṣā pañcamī kan iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_8: prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_9: pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7271_0: KA_II.347.10-14 Ro_IV.33-34 asañjñāyām iti kimartham . triṃśatkaḥ viṃśatkaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7271_1: ca atra kan bhavati . saṅkhyāyāḥ kan bhavati iti . atiśadantāyāḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7271_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati atra kan iti yat ayam viṃśatikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7271_3: khaḥ iti pratyayāntanipātanam karoti . viṃśateḥ etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:7271_4: yogāpekṣam jñāpakam . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . viṃśatitriṃśabhyām kan bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7273_0: KA_II.347.16-20 Ro_IV.34 ṭithan ardhāt ca . ṭithan ardhāt ca iti vaktavyam . ardhikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7273_1: ardhikī . kārṣāpaṇāt vā pratiḥ ca . kārṣāpaṇāt ṭiṭhan vaktavyaḥ vā ca pratiḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_0: KA_II.347.22-349.4 Ro_IV.35-37 dvigoḥ luki uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_1: dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam. arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_2: api dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . dvigoḥ nimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_3: luk bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_4: triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_5: atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣasya asampratyaye atannimittāt api vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_6: . dvayoḥ śūrpayoḥ samāhāraḥ dviśūrpī . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_7: eva yathā syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_8: nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_9: tannimittāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_10: iti kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_11: . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam . atha vijñāyate saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_12: nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yatha na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_13: tathā astu . saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_14: etat . yat ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . tat tarhi tannimittagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_15: kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_16: . dvigoḥ taddhitasya luk bhavati . kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . nimittam . yasmin dviguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_17: iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . idam tarhi vaktavyam arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_18: atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_19: dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_20: . traiśaurpikam iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_21: utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_22: utpattiḥ bhavati . evam iha api dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_23: iti bhaviṣyati . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva bhaviṣyati . atha asañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_24: iti kimartham . pāñcalohitikam pāñcakalāpikam . sañjñāpratiṣedhānarthakyam ca tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_25: lopasya . sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_26: . na antareṇa taddhitam taddhitasya ca lukam dviguḥ sañjñā asti . yaḥ tasmāt utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_27: na asu tannimittam syāt . evam tarhi idam syāt . pañcānām lohitānām samāhāraḥ pañcalohitī
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_28: pañcalohityā krītam . atra api pañcalohitam iti eva bhavitavyam . katham . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_29: hi etat arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . uktam saṅkhyātve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_30: tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . uktam saṅkhyātve adhyardhagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_31: . kim uktam . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham luki ca agrahaṇam iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7275_32: iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇam anarthakam . dvigoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7287_2: . akartrekāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena pāṇinā krītam iti . saṅkhyaikavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_3: dvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . pañcabhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_4: krītam pañcakam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ekavacanāntāt iti vakṣyati . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_5: ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . ekavacanāt . ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_6: . śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . dvigoḥ ca . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_7: iha api yathā syāt . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam triśūrpam iti . yadi ekavacanāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_8: iti ucyate mudgaiḥ krītam maudgikam māṣaiḥ krītam māṣikam iti na sidhyati . parimāṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_9: saṅkhyāyāḥ yat ekavacanam tadantāt iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_10: . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe bahu vaktavyam bhavati . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati śūrpābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_11: krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_12: karaṇāt akartrekāntāt iti api na vaktavyam . kartuḥ kartrekāntāt vā kasmāt na bhavati . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7289_0: KA_II.351.8-14 Ro_IV.40-41 saṃyoganipātayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . saṃyogaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:7289_2: vā padmam vā parṇam vā . tasyanimittaprakaraṇe vātapittaśleṣmabhyaḥ śamakopanayoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7289_5: ca . sannipātāt ca iti vaktavyam . sānnipātikam .

GS24pmbhasuu:7293_0: KA_II.351.20-352.2 Ro_IV.41 tad asmin dīyate asmai iti ca . tad asmin dīyate asmai
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_1: iti ca iti vaktavyam . pañca vṛddhiḥ vā āyaḥ vā lābhaḥ vā śulkaḥ vā upadā vā dīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_2: asmai pañcakaḥ . saptakaḥ . aṣṭakaḥ . navakaḥ . daśakaḥ . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_3: kartavyam . na kartavyam . yat hi yasmai dīyate tasmin api tat dīyate . tat asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7295_0: KA_II.352.4-8 Ro_IV.41-42 ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt upasaṅkhyānam . ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7295_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvitīyakaḥ . tṛtīyakaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7295_2: . pūraṇāt iti ucyate . na ca etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat paryavapannam . pūraṇam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:7295_3: arthaḥ . tam artham āha tīyaśabdaḥ . pūraṇam saḥ asau bhavati . pūraṇantāt svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7295_4: bhāge an . saḥ api pūraṇam bhavati eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:7297: KA_II.352.10-11 Ro_IV.42 tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca . tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam . droṇam pacati . drauṇī . drauṇikī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7299_0: KA_II.352.13-15 Ro_IV.42-43 kulijāt ca iti siddhe lukkhagrahaṇānarthakyam pūrvsamin
GS24pmbhasuu:7299_1: trikabhāvāt . kulijāt ca iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ lukkhagrahaṇena . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7299_2: . pūrvasmin trikabhāvāt . pūrvasmin yoge sarvaḥ eṣaḥ trikaḥ nirdiśyate . dvyāḍhakī
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_0: KA_II.352.18-354.6 Ro_IV.43-46 sañjñāyām svārthe . sañjñāyām svārthe pratyayaḥ utpādyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_1: . pañca eva pañcakāḥ śakunayaḥ . trikāḥ śālaṅkāyanāḥ . saptakāḥ brahmavṛkṣāḥ . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_2: parimāṇini . tataḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ parimāṇini iti vaktavyam . pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_3: daśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam . jīvitaparimāṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_4: kartavyam . ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam asya ṣāṣṭikaḥ . sāptatikaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_5: iti anarthakam vacanam kālāt iti siddhatvāt . jīvitaparimāṇe ca iti anarthakam vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_6: . kim kāraṇam . kālāt iti siddhatvāt . kālāt iti eva siddham . iha yasya ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_7: ṣaṣtim asu bhūtaḥ bhavati . tatra tam adhīṣṭaḥ bhṛtaḥ bhūtaḥ bhāvī iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7301_8: . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . iha vacane hi lukprasaṅgaḥ . iha hi kriyamāṇe luk prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_0: dviṣāṣṭikaḥ . triṣāṣṭikaḥ . anena sati luk bhavati . tena sati kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_1: . ā arhāt iti ucyate . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_2: saṅkhyāśabdāḥ ime . ime api kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_3: tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_4: . ramaṇīyam kālam bhūtaḥ . śobhanam kālam bhūtaḥ . atha matam etat . kāle dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_5: śabdaḥ kālaśabdaḥ kālam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti na ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_6: . jīvitaparimāṇe tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vārṣaśatikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_7: . vārṣasahasrikaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi varṣaśataśabdaḥ saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_8: . kim tarhi saṅkhyeye vartate varṣaśataśabdaḥ . evam tarhi anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_9: khāraśatādyartham . anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . khāraśatādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_10: . khāraśatikaḥ rāśiḥ . khārasahastrikaḥ rāśiḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ . iha vacane hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_11: lukprasaṅgaḥ iti . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_12: . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ . param arhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_13: . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kālāt iti eva siddham . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_14: ca uktam na ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi . saṅkhyāśabdāḥ iti . nanu ca uktam ime api
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_15: kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . nanu ca uktam yadi tarhi yaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_16: kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati iti . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7302_17: . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt ramaṇīyādiṣu utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7304: KA_II.354.7-9 Ro_IV.46 stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . stome ḍaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam . pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ . saptadaśaḥ stomaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_0: KA_II.355.2-357.8 Ro_IV.46-56 ime viṃśatyādayaḥ saprakṛtikāḥ sapratyayakāḥ nipātyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_1: . tatra na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ kaḥ pratyayārthaḥ iti . tatra vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_2: iyam prakṛtiḥ ayam pratyayaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ dviśabdāt ayam daśadarthābhidāhinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_3: svārthe śaticpratyayaḥ nipātyate vinbhāvaḥ ca . dvau daśatau viṃśatiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_4: daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_5: . viṃśatigavam iti . kim kāraṇam . dravyam anabhihitam . tasya anabhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_6: prāpnoti . ṣaṣṭhyantam ca samāse pūrvam nipatati . tatra goviṃśatiḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_7: . na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca viṃśatigavam tu na sidhyati . iha ca triṃśatpūlī
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_8: catvāriṃśatpūlī samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . vacanam ca vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_9: . viṃśatiḥ . dvitvāt daśatoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_10: parimāṇini viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_11: . parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . viṃśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_12: ca . ṣaṣṭhī ca vidheyā . gavām viṃśatiḥ . dravyam abhihitam . tasya abhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_13: ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . ekavacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ gāvaḥ . gobhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_14: bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti . anārambhaḥ vā prātipadikavijñānāt yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_15: sahasrādiṣu . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ viṃśatyādīnām nyāyyaḥ . katham sidhyati . prātipadikavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_16: . katham prātipadikavijñānam . viṃśatyādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni yathā sahasrādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_17: . tat yathā sahasram ayutam arbudam iti na ca anugamaḥ kriyate bhavati ca abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_18: . yathā sahasrādiṣu iti ucyate . atha sahasrādiṣu api katham bhavitavyam . sahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_19: gavām . sahasram gāvaḥ . sahasragavam . gosahasram iti . yāvatā atra api sandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_20: na asūyā kartavyā yatra anugamaḥ kriyate . nanu ca uktam viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_21: samāsavacanānupapattiḥ . parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_22: ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāye viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_23: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saṅghaḥ iti vartate . saṅghaḥ samūhaḥ samudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_24: iti anarthāntaram . te ete viṃśatyādayaḥ samudāye santaḥ bhāvavacanāḥ bhavanti bhāvavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_25: santaḥ guṇavacanāḥ bhavanti guṇavacanāḥ santaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_26: . anyeṣu ca guṇavacaneṣu kadā cit guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā śuklaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7306_27: paṭaḥ iti . kadā cit guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_0: paṭasya śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat ucyate viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_1: iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tadā guṇaguṇinoḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvat . parimāṇini
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_2: cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam iti saṃhanane vṛttaḥ saṃhanane vartiṣyate . saṅkhyāsaṃhanane
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_3: vṛttaḥ dravyasaṃhanane vartiṣyate . atha ṣaṣṭhī tadā guṇinā guṇaḥ viśeṣyate . vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_4: ubhayoḥ api . yadi tarhi ime viṃśatyādayaḥ guṇavacanāḥ syuḥ sadharmabhiḥ anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_5: bhavitavyam . anye ca guṇavacanāḥ dravyasya liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_6: . śuklam vastram . śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau . śuklāḥ kambalāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_7: iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_8: . viṃśatyādayaḥ punaḥ na anuvartante . anye api vai guṇavacanāḥ na avaśyam dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_9: liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante . tat yathā . gāvaḥ dhanam . putrā apatyam . indrāgnī devatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_10: . viśvedevāḥ devatā . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyai iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_11: . atha atra ananuvṛttau hetuḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . bāḍham śakyaḥ vaktum . kāmam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7307_12: ucyatām . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:7308: pañca uḍupaśatāni tīrṇāni . pañca phalakaśatāni tīrṇāni . aśvaiḥ yuddham . asibhiḥ yuddham iti . na ca asayaḥ yudhyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_0: asiguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ yudhyante guṇaḥ tu khalu prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . iha tāvat gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_1: dhanam iti dhinoteḥ dhanam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . putrāḥ apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_2: iti apatanāt apatyam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . indrāgnī devatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_3: viśvedevāḥ devatā iti diveḥ aiśvaryakarmaṇaḥ devaḥ . tasmāt svārthe tal . ekaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_4: . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_5: iti dakṣeḥ vṛddhikarmaṇaḥ dakṣiṇā ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_6: ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . viṃśatyādiṣu ca api ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_7: vivakṣitaḥ . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi viṃśatyādiṣu bhāvavacaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7309_8: doṣaḥ . goviṃśatiḥ ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7310_0: atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇalambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:7310_1: kriyante iti . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite
GS24pmbhasuu:7310_2: dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_1: . chedādipathibhyaḥ nityagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vigrahadarśanāt . vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_2: dṛśyate . chedam arhati . panthānam gacchati iti . vikārārtham tarhi idam nityagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_3: kriyate . vikāreṇa vigrahaḥ mā bhūt iti . virāgaviraṅgam ca . panthaḥ ṇa nityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_4: . vikārārtham iti cet akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam . vikārārtham iti cet akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_5: etat . yathā akaṅādibhiḥ vikāraiḥ vigrahaḥ na bhavati evam ābhyām api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_6: . kim punaḥ iha akartavyam nityagrahaṇam kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyam na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_7: . iha akartavyam kriyate . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta sanniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye
GS24pmbhasuu:7312_8: ubhayoḥ api abhāvaḥ . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattābhyām idam kartavyam iti . devadattāpāye

GS24pmbhasuu:7361_6: samāveśaḥ bhavati evam ābhyām api bhaviṣyati . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpapayati na api
GS24pmbhasuu:7361_7: dharmasūtrakārāḥ paṭhanti imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7361_8: tarhi ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7361_9: . na ca etau atra abhyantarau . etau api atra abhyantarau . katham . apavādasadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7361_10: apavādāḥ bhavanti iti . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ apavādasadeśāḥ apavādāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7361_11: . api ca kutaḥ etat etau api atra abhyantarau na punaḥ pūrvau vā syātām parau vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7361_12: . evam tarhi vakṣyati ā ca tvāt iti atra cakārakaraṇasya prayojanam . nañsnañbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_0: KA_II.366.4-368.4 Ro_IV.83-93 tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_1: bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . abhiprāyaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_2: modakeṣu bhojane . ye naḥ bhāvāḥ te naḥ bhāvāḥ putrāḥ putraiḥ ceṣṭante iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_3: tu yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalau . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_4: . katham . yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tasmin guṇe vaktavye
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_5: pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca abhiprāyādīnām bhāvāt dravye devadattaśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_6: . kim punaḥ dravyam ke punaḥ guṇāḥ . śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ guṇāḥ . tataḥ anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_7: dravyam . kim punaḥ anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam āhosvit ananyat . guṇasya ayam bhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_8: dravye śabdaniveśam kurvan khyāpayati anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam iti . ananyat śabdādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_9: dravyam . na hi anyat upalabhyate . paśoḥ khalu api viśasitasya parṇaśate nyastasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_10: na anyat śabdādibhyaḥ upalabhyate . anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam tat tu anumānagamyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_11: . tat yathā oṣadhivanaspatīnām vṛddhihrāsau . jyotiṣām gatiḥ iti . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_12: . iha samāne varṣmaṇi pariṇāhe ca anyat tulāgram bhavati lohasya anyat kārpāsānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_13: . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . tathā kaḥ cit spṛśan eva chinatti kaḥ cit lambamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_14: api na chinatti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . kaḥ cit ekena eva prahāreṇa vyapavargam
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_15: karoti kaḥ cit dvābhyām api an karoti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . atha vā yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_16: guṇāntareṣu api prādurbhāvatsu tattvam na vihanyate tat dravyam . kim punaḥ tattvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_17: . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . tat yathā āmalakādīnām phalānām raktādayaḥ pītādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_18: prāduḥ bhavanti . āmalakam badaram iti eva bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_19: . guṇasandrāvaḥ dravyam iti . yadi tarhi ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe pratyayāḥ utapdyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_0: ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne dviguṇā rajjuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_1: triguṇā rajjuḥ atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_2: eva sameṣu avayaveṣu vartate . tat yathā dviguṇā rajjuḥ triguṇā rajjuḥ iti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_3: dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā guṇavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_4: ca vartante . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā yaḥ yatra apradhānam bhavati saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_5: āha guṇabhūtāḥ vayam atra iti . asti ācāre vartate . tat yathā guṇavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_6: iti ucyate yaḥ samyak ācāram karoti . asti saṃskāre vartate . tat yathā saṃskṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_7: annam guṇavat iti ucyate . atha vā sarvatra eva ayam guṇaśabdaḥ sameṣu avayaveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_8: vartate . tat yathā dviguṇam adhyayanam triguṇam adhyayanam iti ucyate . carcāguṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_9: kramaguṇān ca apekṣya bhavati na saṃhitāguṇān carcāguṇān ca . yadi evam guṇavat annam
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_10: iti guṇaśabdaḥ na upapadyate . na hi annasya sūpādayaḥ guṇāḥ samāḥ bhavanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_11: avaśyam varṣmataḥ parimāṇataḥ eva vā sāmyam bhavati . kim tarhi yuktitaḥ api . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_12: ca yuktitaḥ . yaḥ hi mudgaprasthe lavaṇaprastham prakṣipet na adaḥ yuktam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_13: yadi tāvat adeḥ annam na adaḥ attavyam syāt . atha aniteḥ annam na adaḥ jagdvhā prāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_14: . śuklādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . śuklatvam . śuklatā iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_15: punaḥ kāraṇam śuklādayaḥ eva udāhriyante na punaḥ vṛkṣādayaḥ api . vṛkṣatvam vṛkṣatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_16: iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ubhayavacanāḥ hi ete dravyam ca āhuḥ guṇam ca . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_17: tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . ime api tarhi ubhayavacanāḥ . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_18: guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk bhavati iti . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_19: . ḍitthādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . ḍitthatvam . ḍitthatā . ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_20: iti . atra api kaḥ cit prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca . tena kṛtām kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_21: guṇam vā yaḥ kaḥ cit karoti saḥ ucyate ḍitthatvam te etat ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam te etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_22: evam ḍitthāḥ kurvanti . evam ḍāmbhiṭṭāḥ kurvanti . yaḥ tarhi prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_23: ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca tasya vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_24: kāthañcitkaḥ prayogaḥ evam vṛttiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yat vā sarve bhāvāḥ svena bhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_25: bhavanti saḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ tadabhidhāne . kim ebhiḥ tribhiḥ bhāvagrahaṇaiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_26: . ekena śabdaḥ pratinirdiśyate dvābhyām arthaḥ . yat vā sarve śabdāḥ svena arthena
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_27: bhavanti . saḥ teṣām arthaḥ iti tadabhidhāne vā tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:7365_0: bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . na evam anyatra bhavati . na hi tena raktam rāgāt iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7365_1: śabdena rakte pratyayāḥ utpadyante . śabde asambhavāt arthena rakte pratyayāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7365_2: . tat tarhi anyatarat kartavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7365_3: ca uktam tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7365_4: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt abhiprāyādiṣu utapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_0: KA_II.368.5-369.2 Ro_IV.93-95 tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham tvataloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_1: svarasiddhyartham . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_2: . tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham . tvataloḥ svarasiddhiḥ yathā syāt . tvataloḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_3: bhāvasya vacanam pratiṣedhasya avacanam . brāhmaṇatvam . brāhmṇatā . nañsamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_4: avakāśaḥ pratiṣedhasya vacanam bhāvasya avacanam . abrāhmaṇaḥ . avṛṣalaḥ . ubhayavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_5: ubhayam prāpnoti . abrāhmaṇatvam . abrāhmaṇatā . nañsamāsaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_6: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra tvatalau prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_7: . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_8: . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pratiṣedham apekṣate . nañsamāsaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_9: kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_10: iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ bhāvam apekṣate . pradhānam tadā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_11: ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . nañsamādāt anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_12: bhāvavacanaḥ svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti vakṣyati . tatra vyavasthārtham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_13: vaktavyam . vā chandasi . vā chandasi nañsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nirvīryatām vai yajamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_14: āśāste apaśutām . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya . agotām anapatyatām . bhavet idam yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_15: udāharaṇam . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya iti . idam tu ayuktam apaśutām iti . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_16: asau samāsabhāvam āśāste . kim tarhi . uttarapadābhāvam āśāste . na paśoḥ bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_17: iti . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_19: ca . svarārtham tāvat . aprathimā . amradimā . uttarapadavṛddhyartham . aśauklyam . akārṣṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_0: KA_II.369.4-16 Ro_IV.95-97 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . anukarṣaṇārthaḥ . tvatalau anukṛṣyete
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_1: . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtau tvatalau anuvartiṣyete . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_2: . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam apavādasamāveśārtham . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_3: kriyate apavādasamāveśārtham . imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_4: . na etat asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti evam imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_5: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_6: syātām yataḥ ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti eva yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_7: tābhyaḥ tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yataḥ ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt ye
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_8: arthāḥ tatra tvatalau yathā syātām yatra ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_9: . ā tvāt iti eva ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yatra ca ucyete . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_10: tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā syātām yasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_11: ca prakṛteḥ atasmin viśeṣe anyaḥ pratyayaḥ utpadyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . strīpuṃsābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7369_12: tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7371: KA_II.369.19-370.12 Ro_IV.97-100 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . tvataloḥ iti āha . na etat asi prayojanam . iṣyete nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt tvatalau :
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_0: abrāhmaṇatvam abrāhmaṇatā iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_2: etat asti prayojanam . parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_3: . na ca tatra kā cit nañpūrvā prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_4: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tarhi tadantavidhiḥ asti . patyantapurohitādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_5: yak iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt apatyantāt yak bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_6: nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ nañpūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7372_7: bahuvrīheḥ bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:7374: apṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ apṛthutvam apṛthutā iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ anyapūrvāt tatpuruṣāt bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:7376_0: paramapṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ paramapṛthutvam paramapṛthutā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7376_1: uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ sāpekṣāt bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . nañsamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7376_2: anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7376_3: etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sarve ete taddhitāḥ sāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7376_4: bhavanti iti yat ayam nañaḥ guṇapratiṣedhe sampādyarhahitālamarthāḥ taddhitāḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:7378_0: KA_II.370.14-19 Ro_IV.100-101 vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathā syāt . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7378_1: asti prayojanam . prakṛṭā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7378_2: . tvatalau api yathā syātām . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7378_3: yatnāt tvatalau api bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7378_4: aṇsamāveśārtham . pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam kriyate aṇsamāveśaḥ yathā syāt . pārthavam . prathimā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7380_0: KA_II.370.21-371.2 Ro_IV.101 brāhmaṇādiṣu cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . brāhmaṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7380_1: cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cāturvarṇyam . cāturvaidyam . cāturāśramyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7380_2: . arhataḥ num ca . arhataḥ num ca ṣyañ ca vaktavyaḥ . arhataḥ bhāvaḥ ārhantyam ārhatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7382_0: KA_II.371.4-6 Ro_IV.101-102 kim idam nalope varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7382_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi varṇagrahaṇam steyam . nalope kṛte ayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7382_2: saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . siddhaḥ antyasya lopaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7382_3: iti eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7384: KA_II.371.8-10 Ro_IV.102 aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya . aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam ghalopaḥ ca . śrotriyasya bhāvaḥ śrautram .
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_0: KA_II.372.2-21 Ro_IV.103-105 tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca . tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_1: . tilyam . tailīnam . kimartham idam ucyate na yatā mukte dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_2: khañ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt . dhānyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_3: bhavane kṣetre khañ iti ucyate . na ca umābhaṅge dhānye . cameṣu yat paṭhyate tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_4: dhānyam . na ca ete tatra paṭhyete . tat tarhi khañgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_5: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti . yadi tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_6: anuvartate vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat iti khañ ca iti khañ api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_7: . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ . vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_8: . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ . yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat bhavati . dhānyānām bhavane
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_9: kṣetre khañ bhavati . vibhāṣā tilamāṣomābhaṅgaṇubhyaḥ . bhavanekṣetregrahaṇam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_10: . dhānyānām iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkaplutayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_11: utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_12: vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ . anyasya pratyayasya vacanāt cakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_13: ca anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtasya khañaḥ ḍhagyatau bādhakau bhaviṣyataḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_14: utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā etat jñāpayati anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:7386_15: ca nāma vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi . yatnāt bhavanti . atha

GS24pmbhasuu:7424_2: ca anirjñāte anirjñātam ca bahuṣu . dvyekayoḥ punaḥ nirjñātam . nirjñātatvāt dvyekayoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7426_0: KA_II.379.17-380.4 Ro_IV.121-122 iha kasmāt na bhavati . bahavaḥ avayavāḥ asyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_1: iti . avayave yā saṅkhyā iti ucyate . na ca kā cit saṅkhyā asti yasyāḥ bahuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_2: avayavaḥ syāt . nanu ca iyam asti saṅkhyā iti eva . na eṣā saṅkhyā . sañjñā eṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_3: avayavavidhāne avayavini pratyayaḥ . avayavavidhāne avayavini pratyayaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_4: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pañca avayavāḥ . daśa avayavāḥ iti . atha avayavini iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_5: ucyamāne avayavasvāmini kasmāt na bhavati . pañca paśvavayavāḥ devadattasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_6: avayavaśabdaḥ ayam guṇaśabdaḥ asya iti ca vartate . tena yam prati avayavaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_7: tasmin avayavini pratyayena bhavitavyam . kam ca prati avayavaḥ guṇaḥ . samudāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7426_8: . yadi evam avayavini iti api na vaktavyam . avayaveṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate .

GS24pmbhasuu:7430_0: KA_II.380.12-381.5 Ro_IV.123-125 iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekādaśa māṣāḥ adhikāḥ asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_1: kārṣāpaṇaśate iti . adhike samānajātau . samānajātau adhike iṣyate . atha iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_2: na bhavati . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ adhikāḥ asyām kārṣāpaṇatriṃsati iti . iṣṭam śatasahasrayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_3: . śatasahasrayoḥ adhike iṣyate . atha ekādaśam śatasahasram iti kasya ādhikye bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_4: . yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyaḥ mataḥ mama . yadi tāvat śatāni saṅkhyāyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_5: śatādhikye bhavitavyam . atha sahasrāṇi saṅkhyāyante sahasrādhikye bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_6: ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt anirdeśaḥ . ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_7: ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na hi ekādaśānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_8: śatam adhikaraṇam . siddham tu pañcamīnirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham . pañcamīnirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_9: . pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat asmāt adhikam iti . saḥ tarhi pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_10: . na kartavyaḥ . yadi api tāvat vyāpake vaiṣayike vā adhikaraṇe sambhavaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7430_11: aupaśleṣikam adhikaraṇam vijñāsyate . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ upaśliṣṭāḥ asmin śate ekādaśam śatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_0: KA_II.381.7-16 Ro_IV.125-126 kimartham śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam . śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_1: pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ adhikārtham . śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_2: . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya grahaṇam bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_0: ekatriṃśam śatam . iṣyate ca atra api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_1: iti antagrahaṇam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_2: . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . gotriṃśat adhikarm
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_3: asmin śate iti . viṃśateḥ ca . viṃśateḥ ca antagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_4: syāt . ekaviṃśam śatam . cakārāt saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . goviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_0: KA_II.381.18-382.16 Ro_IV.126-129 nimāne guṇini . nimāne guṇini iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_1: prayojanam . guṇeṣu mā bhūt . bhūyasaḥ . bhūyasaḥ iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_2: . bhūyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ utpattiḥ yathā syāt alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_3: utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti . ekaḥ anyataraḥ . ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_4: . iha mā bhūt . dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . samānānām . samānānām ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_5: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . tat tarhi bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_6: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yat tāvat ucyate . guṇini iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_7: . guṇeṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate . yat uktam bhūyasaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_8: iti . na vaktavyam . alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_9: anabhidhānāt . yat uktam ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_10: . kasmāt na bhavati dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . tantram vibhaktinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_11: . yat api ucyate samānānām ca iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_12: ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . anabhidhānāt . nimeye ca api dṛśyate . nimeye
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_13: ca api pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . dvimayāḥ yavāḥ . trimayāḥ . kim punaḥ iha nimānam kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_14: nimeyam yāvatā ubhayam tyajyate . satyam evam etat . kva cit tu kā cit prasṛtatarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_15: gatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . samāne tyāge dhānyam vikrīṇite yavān vikrīṇīte iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_16: . na kaḥ cit āha kārṣāpaṇam vikrīṇite iti . atha vā yena adhigamyate tat nimānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_0: KA_II.382.18-383.22 Ro_IV.129-133 tasya pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ . tasya pūraṇe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_1: atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prapnoti . pañcānām uṣṭrikāṇām pūraṇaḥ ghaṭaḥ . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_2: tu saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_3: . evam api ghaṭe prāpnoti . saṅkhyeyam hi asau adbhiḥ pūrayati . saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_4: brūmaḥ na saṅkhyeyapūraṇe iti . yasya vā bhāvāt anyasaṅkhyātvam tatra . atha vā yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_5: bhāvāt anyā saṅkhyā pravartate tatra iti vaktavyam . evam api dvitīye adhyāye aṣṭamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_6: iti prāpnoti . sarveṣām hi teṣām bhāvāt saṅkhyā pravartate . caramopajāte pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_7: ca anapagate iti vaktavyam . evam api ekādaśīdvādaśyau sauviṣṭakṛtī . idam dvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_8: idam tṛtīyam . daśa daśamāni iti na sidhyati . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_9: astu . nanu ca uktam tasya pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat siddham saṅkhyāpūraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_10: iti vacanāt iti . tat tarhi saṅkhyāgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_11: . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ guṇasya nimāne mayaṭ iti . evam tarhi na iyam vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_12: upālabhyate . kim tarhi . vṛttisthānam upālabhyate . vṛttiḥ eva atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_13: . kim kāraṇam . pratyayārthābhāvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vacanāt svāṛthikaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_14: . atha vā pūrvasyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ parāpekṣāyāḥ utpattiḥ vaktavyā uttarā ca sāṅkhyā ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_15: vaktavyaḥ . atha vā nyūne ayam kṛtsnaśabdaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_0: caturṣu pañcaśabdaḥ . atha vā sarve eva dvyādayaḥ anyonyam apekṣante . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_1: dvitīye adhyāye aṣṭamaḥ iti prāpnoti . bhavati eva . prakṛtyarthāt bahiḥ sarvā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_2: prāyeṇa lakṣyate . pūraṇe syāt katham vṛttiḥ . vacanāt iti lakṣyatām . tasyāḥ pūrvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_3: tu yā saṅkhyā tasyāḥ [R tasyām ] bhavatu taddhitaḥ . ādeśaḥ ca ottarā saṅkhyā tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_4: nyāyyā bhaviṣyati . nyūne vā kṛtsnaśabdaḥ ayam pūrvasyām uttarām yadi sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_5: ca tayā tasyāḥ tathā nyāyyā bhaviṣyati . anyonyam vā vyapāśritya sarvasmin dvyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_6: yadi pravartante tathā nyāyyā vṛttiḥ bhavati pūraṇe . bahūnām vācikā saṅkhyā pūraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_7: ca ekaḥ iṣyate . anyatvāt ubhayoḥ nyāyyā vārkṣī śākhā nidarśanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_0: KA_II.383.24-384.7 Ro_IV.133-134 maḍādiṣu yasya ādiḥ tannirderdeśaḥ . maḍādiṣu yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_1: ādiḥ kriyate tannirderdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . asya ādiḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . akiryamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_2: hi pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_3: svare doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare hi sati svare doṣaḥ syāt . viṃśatitamaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_4: prasajyeta . viṃśatitamaḥ iti ca iṣyate . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_5: kartavyaḥ . prakṛtam ḍaḍgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tasya pūraṇe ḍaṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_6: . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca arthaḥ . nāntāt iti pañcamī ḍaṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_7: prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati . tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7440_8: na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7442: KA_II.384.9-10 Ro_IV.134 caturaḥ chayatau ādyakṣaralopaḥ ca . caturaḥ chayatau vaktavyau ādyakṣaralopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . turīyam . turyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:7444_1: thaṭ eva syāt thuk eva vā . thaṭthukoḥ pṛthakkaraṇam padāntavidhipratiṣedhāṛtham

GS24pmbhasuu:7446_0: KA_II.384.19-385.13 Ro_IV.135-136 bahukatipayavatūnām liṅgaviśiṣṭāt utpattiḥ . bahukatipayavatūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_1: liṅgaviśiṣṭād utpattiḥ vaktavyā . iha api yathā syāt . bahvīnām pūraṇī bahutithī
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_2: . katipayānām pūraṇī katipayathī . tāvatīnām pūraṇī tāvatithī . bahukatipayavatūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_3: liṅgaviśiṣṭād utpattiḥ siddhā . katham . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_4: bhavati iti . puṃvadvacanam ca . puṃvadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . bahvīnām pūraṇī bahutithī
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_5: . kimartham na bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti siddham . bhasya iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_6: . yajādau ca bham bhavati . na ca atra yajādim paśyāmaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tithukā vyavihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_7: na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . tithuk kriyatām puṃvadbhāvaḥ iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_8: kartavyam . paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . nityaḥ tithuk . kṛte api puṃvadbhāve prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_9: akṛte api prāpnoti . tithuk api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte puṃvadbhāve prāpnoti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_10: akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi tithuk
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_11: . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena tithuk ucyate utpanne pratyayte prakṛtipratyayau
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_12: āśritya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . uktam etat siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_13: ca pratyayavidhau iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_0: KA_II.385.15-20 Ro_IV.136-137 asaṅkhyādeḥ iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . ekaṣaṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_1: . dviṣaṣṭaḥ . asaṅkhyādeḥ iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati ekaṣaṣṭaḥ . dviṣaṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_2: iti . ṣaṣṭiśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ekaṣaṣṭiśabdāt syāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_3: eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_4: tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha tadantavidhiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7451_1: . siddham etat . katham . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam . svam

GS24pmbhasuu:7451_5: svaravarṇānupūrvīdeśakālaniyatatvāt . svaraḥ niyataḥ āmnāye asyavāmaśabdasya . varṇānupūrvī

GS24pmbhasuu:7451_8: na caturdaśāyām iti . padaikadeśasubalopadarśanāt ca . padaikadeśaḥ khalu api āmnāye
GS24pmbhasuu:7451_9: dṛśyate . asyavāmīyam . nanu ca eṣaḥ sublopaḥ syāt . subalopadarśanāt ca . subalopaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7451_11: na upapadyate . asyavāmaśabdaḥ asmin asti iti . na sañjñā sañjñinam vyabhicarati .

GS24pmbhasuu:7481_0: asya asmin iti na yat yasya bhavati tasmin api tat bhavati yat ca yasmin bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7481_1: tat tasya api bhavati . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ . bhavanti hi devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7481_2: gāvaḥ na ca tāḥ tasmin ādhṛtāḥ bhavanti . bhavanti ca parvate vṛkṣāḥ na ca te tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7481_3: bhavanti . atha astigrahaṇam kimartham . sattāyām arthe pratyayaḥ yathā syāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7481_4: etat asti prayojanam . na sattām padārthaḥ vyabhicarati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:7484: gāvaḥ asya āsan . gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:7485: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . bhavati na tu etasmin vākye . yadi etasmin vākye syāt yathā iha asteḥ prayogaḥ na bhavati gomān yavamān iti evam iha api na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_0: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . sati api asteḥ prayoge yathā iha bahuvacanam śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_1: gāvaḥ asya āsan gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ evam iha api syāt . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_2: iti . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_3: . na eṣā gavām sattā kathyate . kim tarhi . gomatsattā eṣā kathyate . asti atra vartamānakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_4: astiḥ . katham tarhi bhūtabhaviṣyatsattā gamyate . dhātusambandhe pratyayāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_5: idam tarhi prayojanam . astiyuktāt yathā syāt . anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_6: asya anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya samīpe iti . atha kriyamāṇe api astrigrahaṇe iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_7: na bhavati . gāvaḥ asya santi anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya santi samīpe iti . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_8: . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati iti . yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_9: astrigrahaṇe asāmarthyāt anantarādiṣu na bhavanti evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_10: . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . kriyamāṇe astrigrahaṇe na antareṇa tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_11: antarādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante . akriyamāṇe punaḥ astrigrahaṇe antareṇa api tṛtīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_0: KA_II.391.24-392.19 Ro_IV.153-156 atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citraguḥ . śabalaguḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7488_3: kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_4: iti . samudāyāt tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . aprātipadikatvāt . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_5: śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā sup supā iti vartamāne anyasya ca anyasya ca samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_6: bhavati . satyam evam etat . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate . yāvati etat parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_7: ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . avayave ca etat parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_8: na samudāye . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . pañca gāvaḥ asya santi pañcaguḥ . daśaguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_9: iti . pratyekam asāmarthyāt samudāyāt aprātipadikatvāt samāsāt samāsena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_10: . na etat sāram . ukte api hi pratyayārthe utpadyate dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_11: dvaimāturaḥ pāñcanāpitiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ dviguḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bahuvrīhiḥ . apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_12: dviguḥ prāpnoti . antaraṅgatvāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kā antaraṅgatā . anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_13: bahuvrīhiḥ vartate viśiṣṭe anyapadārthe taddhitārthe dviguḥ . tasmin ca asya taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_14: astigrahaṇam kriyate . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi bahuvrīhau api astigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_15: kartavyam astiyuktāt yathā syāt anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . atha na santi taddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_16: api na arthaḥ astigrahaṇena . satyam evam etat . kriyate tu idānīm taddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_17: astigrahaṇam . tat vai kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham na upādhyartham . astimān
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_18: iti matup yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . aprātipadikatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_19: . avyayam eṣaḥ astiśabdaḥ . na eṣa asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7488_21: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate . na ca asteḥ astinā
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_22: sāmānādhikaraṇyam . tat etat kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham na upādhyartham .

GS24pmbhasuu:7488_24: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . sati hi tasmin tena eva siddham .
