GS24pmbhasuu:7590_7: . parasmāt edyavi pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani abhidheye . parasmin ahani paredyavi
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_8: . adya iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dyaḥ ca . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_9: ca pratyayaḥ ahani abhidheye . asmin ahani adya . pūrvedyuḥ anyedyuḥ anyataredyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_10: itaredyuḥ aparedyuḥ adharedyuḥ ubhayedyuḥ uttaredyuḥ iti kim nipātyate . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_11: edyusuc . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ edyusuc pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_12: abhidheye . pūrvasmin ahani pūrvedyuḥ . anyasmin ahani anyedyuḥ . anyatarasmin ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_13: anyataredyuḥ . itarasmin ahani itaredyuḥ . aparasmin ahani aparedyuḥ . adharasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_14: ahani adharedyuḥ . ubhayoḥ ahnoḥ ubhayedyuḥ . uttarasmin ahani uttaredyuḥ . dyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7590_15: ca ubhayāt . ubhayaśabdāt dyuḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt manuṣyebhyaḥ ubhayadyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7592: KA_II.408.5 Ro_IV.187 iha kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvasmin deśe vasati iti . na eṣaḥ deśaḥ . deśaviśeṣaṇam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7594_0: KA_II.408.7-22 Ro_IV.188-190 kimartham atasuc kriyate na tasuc eva kriyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7594_1: ayam api arthaḥ . svarārthaḥ cakāraḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_0: dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . uttarataḥ grāmasya . dakṣiṇottaraśabdau akārāntau . tasuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_1: pratyayaḥ . bhavet siddham yadā akārāntau . yatu tu khalu ākārāntau tadā na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_2: . tadā api siddham . katham . puṃvadbhāvena . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tasilādiṣu ā
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_3: kṛtvasucaḥ iti . na sidhyati . bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_4: . nanu ca bho dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ uttaraśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_5: bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ucyate ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā uttarā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_6: dikśabdau . dakṣiṇaḥ uttaraḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_7: syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi . diśaḥ yadā vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_8: tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_9: dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_10: diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati . puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_11: tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_12: iti evamartham . viśeṣaṇārtham tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_13: iti . ṣaṣṭhī tasarthapratyayene iti ucyamāne iha api syāt . tataḥ grāmāt . yataḥ grāmāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7597: KA_II.409.2-4 Ro_IV.191 upari upariṣṭāt iti kim nipātyate . ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca . ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete . upari upariṣtāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7599_0: KA_II.409.6-16 Ro_IV.191 paścāt iti kim nipātyate . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ ātiḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7599_1: pratayayaḥ . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ nipātyate ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . paścāt . dikpūrvapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7599_2: ca . dikpūrvapadasya ca aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . dakṣiṇapaścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7599_3: . uttarapaścāt . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7599_4: paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dakṣiṇapaścārdhaḥ . uttarapaścārdhaḥ . ardhe ca . ardhe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7601: KA_II.409.18-20 Ro_IV.191 apañcamyāḥ iti prāk asaḥ . apañcamyāḥ iti yat ucyate prāk asaḥ tat draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7602: aviśeṣeṇa uttaram apañcamyāḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:7605_0: KA_II.410.2-5 Ro_IV.191 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7605_1: iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7605_2: svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_0: KA_II.410.7-15 Ro_IV.192-193 vidhārthe iti ucyate . kaḥ vidhārthaḥ nāma . vidhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_1: arthaḥ vidhārthaḥ . yadi evam ekā govidhā . ekā hastividhā . atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_2: evam tarhi dhāvidhānam dhātvarthapṛthagbhāve . dhāvidhānam dhātvarthapṛthagbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_3: iti vaktavyam . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_4: pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kārakapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi tat kālye
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_5: bhuṅke sāyam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kālapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi śītam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_6: uṣṇam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . guṇapṛthaktvam etat . kaḥ tarhi dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_7: . kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . yadi evam kriyāprakāre ayam bhavati . vidhayuktagatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_8: ca prakāre bhavanti . evaṃvidham . evaṃyuktam . evaṅgatam . evamprakāram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7609_0: KA_II.410.17-20 Ro_IV.194 sahabhāve dhyamuñ . sahabhāve dhyamuñ vaktavyaḥ . eikadhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7609_1: rāśim kuru . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . adhikaraṇavicāle iti ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:7609_2: ca saḥ eva adhikaraṇavicālaḥ yat ekam anekam kriyate . yat api anekam ekam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7611: KA_II.411.2-3 Ro_IV.194-195 dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍadarśanam . dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍaḥ dṛśyate saḥ ca vidheyaḥ . pathi dvaidhāni . saṃśaye dvaidhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:7613_0: KA_II.411.5-10 Ro_IV.195 pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam . pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7613_1: . vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ . yājñikapāśaḥ . yaḥ hi yāpayitavyaḥ yāpyaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7613_2: . atha vaiyākaraṇaḥ śarīreṇa kṛśaḥ vyākaraṇena ca śobhanaḥ kartavyaḥ vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7613_3: iti . na kartavyaḥ . katham . yasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tadguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7613_4: vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca kārśyasya bhāvāt dravye vaiyākaraṇaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7615_0: KA_II.411.12-15 Ro_IV.195 pūraṇagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . na hi apūraṇaḥ tīyaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7615_1: asti yatra doṣaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti mukhatīyaḥ pārśvatīyaḥ iti . arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7615_2: na anarthakasya iti evam asya na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi pūraṇagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7615_3: . prāk ekādaśabhyaḥ acchandasi iti pūraṇāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_0: KA_II.411.17-412.10 Ro_IV.19196-197 ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_1: ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . ekākinau . ekākinaḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_2: kāraṇam na sidhyati . ekaśabdaḥ ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_3: . siddham tu saṅkhyādeśavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . dvibahvarthāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_4: ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyasya vā . asahāyasya vā ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_5: . asahāyaḥ ekākī . asahāyau ekākinau . asahāyāḥ ekākinaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_6: bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_7: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam ekaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_8: bahavaḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_9: iti arthaḥ . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā . ekāgnayaḥ . ekahalāni . ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_10: jitam iti . tat yaḥ asahāyavācī tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_0: KA_II.413.2-414.14 Ro_IV.197-205 atiśāyane iti ucyate . kim idam atiśāyane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_1: deśyāḥ sūtranibandhāḥ kriyante . yāvat brūyāt prakarṣe atiśaye iti tāvat atiśāyane
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_2: iti . kasya punaḥ prakarṣe pratyayaḥ utpadyate . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ṅyāpprātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_3: prakarṣe . ṅyāpprātipadikam vai śabdaḥ na ca śabdasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_4: asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ . dravyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_5: vai dravyasaya prakarṣe iṣyate . evam tarhi guṇaḥ . evam api guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_6: . dravyam api ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ guṇaḥ api . tatra kutaḥ etat guṇasya prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_7: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ dravyasya prakarṣe iti . kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7619_8: kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:7620_0: adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti . samānaguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7620_1: eṣā spardhā bhavati . adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān anyebhyaḥ praśasyebhyaḥ . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā
GS24pmbhasuu:7620_2: anyebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti kaṇiḥ ayam saukṣmye vartate . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:7620_3: ime kim cit paśyanti . ayam eṣām kāṇatamaḥ iti . adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7620_4: iha mā bhūt . mahān sarṣapaḥ . mahān himavān iti . jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7621: vṛkṣaḥ ayam plakṣaḥ ayam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_0: gotaraḥ . gotarā . aśvataraḥ iti . na eṣaḥ jāteḥ prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_1: . gauḥ ayam śakaṭam vahati . gotararḥ ayam yaḥ śakaṭam vahati sīram ca . gauḥ iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_2: yā samām samām vijāyate . gotarā iyam yā samām samām vijāyate strīvatsā ca . aśvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_3: ayam yaḥ catvāri yojanāni gacchati . aśvataraḥ ayam yaḥ aṣṭau yojanāni gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_4: tathā tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_5: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . yasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_6: asti tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . guṇasya ca eva prakarṣaḥ na dravyasya . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_7: . evam hi dṛśyate loke . iha samāne āyāme vistāre paṭasya anyaḥ arghaḥ bhavati kāśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_8: anyaḥ māthurasya . guṇāntaram khalu api śilpinaḥ utpādayamānāḥ dravyāntareṇa prakṣālayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_9: . anyena śuddham dhautakam kurvanti anyena śaiphālikam anyena mādhyamikam . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_10: ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_11: bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_12: . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_13: syāt . yat api ucyate adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . adūraviprakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_14: eva spardhā bhavati . na hi niṣkadhanaḥ śataniṣkadhanena spardhate . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_15: jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . jananena yā prāpyate sā jātiḥ na ca etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_16: arthasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . yat api ucyate tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_17: sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . sādhanam vai dravyam na ca dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_18: prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . kim punaḥ ekam śauklyam āhosvit nānā . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_19: ekam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati . atha nānā
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_20: samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . asti ekam śauklyam tat tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_21: viśeṣavat . kiṅkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . alpatvamahattvakṛtaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu ekam nirviśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_22: ca . nanu ca uktam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_23: iti . guṇāntareṇa pracchādāt prakarṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu nānā . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_24: ca uktam samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_25: eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7622_26: na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_0: KA_II.414.15-415.17 Ro_IV.205-209 kimantāt punaḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . dvitīyāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_1: atiśayyamānāt . śuklam atiśete śuklataraḥ . kṛṣṇam atiśete kṛṣṇataraḥ . yadi dvitīyāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_2: atiśayyamānāt kālaḥ atiśete kālīm kālitaraḥ iti prāpnoti kālataraḥ iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_3: . tathā kālī atiśete kālam kālataraḥ iti prāpnoti kālitarā iti ca iṣyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_4: gārgyaḥ atiśete gargān gargataraḥ iti prāpnoti gārgyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_5: gargāḥ atiśerate gārgyam gārgyatarāḥ iti prāpnoti gargatarāḥ iti ca iṣyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_6: tarhi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ bhaviṣyati . kālaḥ atiśete kālataraḥ . kālī atiśete
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_7: kālitarā . gārgyaḥ atiśete gārgyataraḥ . gargāḥ atiśerate gargatarāḥ . yadi prathamāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_8: svārthikaḥ kumāritarā kiśoritarā avyatiriktam vayaḥ iti kṛtvā vayasi prathame iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_9: ṅīp prāpnoti . tarapā uktatvāt strīpratyayaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ṭāp api tarhi na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_10: . ukte api hi bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ iti . ṅīp
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_11: api tarhi prāpnoti . evam tarhi guṇaḥ abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_12: . śuklataram . śuklatarā . śuklataraḥ . śuklatarau . śuklatarāḥ iti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7624_13: bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayata liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . śuklam vastram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat gu asya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyā abhidhīyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_2: api liṅgavacanāni na sidhyanti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . evam api dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_3: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca atiśete yaḥ ca atiśayyate ubhau tau tasya āśrayau bhavataḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_4: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . śetiḥ akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ api dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_5: bhavanti . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇam vā bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_6: kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca śetiḥ . atha yadi eva dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_7: atha api guṇaḥ abhidhīyate atha api kriyā kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_8: pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_9: prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ tadā kṛtyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti evam atra lyuṭ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_10: . yadā guṇaḥ abhidhīyate tadā nyāyasiddham eva . yadā lapi kriyā tadā api nyāyasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_11: eva . atha vā atiśāyayati iti atiśāyanam . kaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . guṇāḥ guṇinam prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_12: guṇī vā guṇān prayojayati . kaḥ punaḥ iha śetyarthaḥ . iha yaḥ yatra bhavati śete
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_13: asau tatra . guṇāḥ ca guṇini śerate . śetyarthaḥ kāritārthaḥ vā nirdeśaḥ ayam samīkṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_14: . śetyarthe na asti vaktavyam . kāritārthe bravīmi te . guṇī vā guṇasaṃyogāt guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_15: vā guṇinā yadi abhivyajyeta saṃyogāt kāritārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_0: KA_II.415.18-416.15 Ro_IV.209-211 iha asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi asya api sūkṣmāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_1: vastrāṇi iti paratvāt ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . atiśāyane bahuvrīhau uktam . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_3: ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ iti . iha trīṇi śuklāni vastrāṇi prakarṣāpakarṣayuktāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_4: . tatra pūrvam apekṣya uttare dve tarabante . tatra dvayoḥ tarabantayoḥ ekasmāt prakarṣayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_5: śuklataraśabdāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti śuklaśabdāt eva ca iṣyate . śuklatarasya śuklabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_6: prakṛteḥ pratyayavijñānam . śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_7: . na etat vivadāmahe śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti na asti iti . kim tarhi . śuklataraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_8: api asti . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . tadantāt ca svārthe chandasi darśanam śreṣṭhamāya
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_9: iti . tadantāt ātiśāyikāntāt ca svārthe chandasi ātiśāyikaḥ dṛśyate . devo vaḥ savita
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_10: prarpayatu śreṣṭhamāya karmaṇe . evam tarhi madhyamāt śuklaśabdāt pūrvaparāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_11: utpattiḥ vaktavyā . madhyamaḥ ca śuklaśabdaḥ pūrvam apekṣya prakṛṣṭaḥ param apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_12: nyūnaḥ na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . atha vā utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . vācakena khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_13: api utpattavyam na ca śuklataraśabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . na khalu api bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_14: prakarṣe tarapā bhavitavyam . kena tarhi . tamapā . pūrveṇa spardhamānaḥ ayam labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_15: sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . apekṣya madhyamaḥ pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_16: ādhikyam labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti yathā amātyaḥ sthite nṛpe . astu vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7628_17: api taraḥ tasmāt . na apaśabdaḥ bhaviṣyati . vācakaḥ cet prayoktavyaḥ vācakaḥ cet prayujyatām .
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_0: KA_II.416.17-417.7 Ro_IV.212-215 dvivacane iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_1: dantoṣṭhasya dantāḥ snigdhatarāḥ . pāṇipādasya pādau sukumāratarau . asmākam ca devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_2: ca devadattaḥ abhirūpataraḥ iti . yadi punaḥ dvyarthopapade iti ucyeta . tatra ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_3: api arthaḥ . vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_4: abhirūpatarāḥ iti dvyarthopapade iti eva siddham . na evañjātīyakā dvyarthatā śakyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_5: vijñātum . iha api prasjyeta . śaṅkāśyakānām pāṭaliputrakāṇām ca pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_6: iti . avaśyam khalu api vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam kartavyam yaḥ hi bahūnām vibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_7: tadartham . śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ ca pāṭaliputrakebhyaḥ ca māthurāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_8: tat tarhi dvyarthopapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya dvivacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_9: grahaṇam . kim tarhi anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam . dvayoḥ arthayoḥ vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_10: dvivacanam iti . evam api tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_11: . tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . parut bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_12: paṭuḥ āsīt . paṭutaraḥ ca aiṣamaḥ iti . siddham tu guṇapradhānatvāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_13: . katham . guṇapradhānatvāt . guṇapradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . guṇāntarayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_14: ca anyatvam bhavati . tat yathā tam eva guṇāntarayuktam vaktāraḥ bhavanti anyaḥ bhavān saṃvṛttaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7632_0: KA_II.417.9-12 Ro_IV.215 evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7632_1: . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7632_2: tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti . mā evam vijñāyi . ajādī
GS24pmbhasuu:7632_3: eva guṇavacanāt iti . kim ca syāt na vyañjanādī guṇavacanāt syātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_0: KA_II.417.14-418.4 Ro_IV.215-217 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam . ajādī
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_1: guṇavacanāt eva iti uktvā aguṇavacanānām api ajādyoḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_2: . etat eva jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_3: parataḥ ādeśān śāsti . evam api tayoḥ iti vaktavyam syāt . tayoḥ parataḥ iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_4: punaḥ ayam vidhiḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . vyañjanādī hi na syātām upādhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_5: ca saṅkaraḥ syāt punarvidhānāt ajādyoḥ . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_6: ete anuvarteran vyañjanādī tarhi na syātām . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_7: bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ ādeśān
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_8: śāsti . nanu ca uktam tayoḥ iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam ajādīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_9: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_10: saptamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_11: . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_12: gāva aśvā hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:7634_13: sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_0: KA_II.418.6-25 Ro_IV.217-220 strīliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena ca . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_1: strīliṅgāt eva utpattiḥ syāt ekavacanāntāt ca . punnapuṃsakaliṅgāt dvivacanabahuvacanāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_2: ca na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_3: etat . praśaṃsāyām yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt rūpap bhavati . kasmin arthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_4: svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_5: tiṅprakṛteḥ ambhāvavacanam . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt tiṅprakṛteḥ rūpapaḥ ambhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_6: vaktavyaḥ . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam . pacantirūpam iti . siddham tu kriyāpradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_7: . siddham etat . katham . kriyāpradhānatvāt . kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam ekā ca kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_8: . dravyapradhānam nāma . katham punaḥ jñayate kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam bhavati dravyapradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_9: nāma iti . yat kriyām pṛṣṭaḥ tiṅā ācaṣṭe . kim devadattaḥ karoti . pacati iti . dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_10: pṛṣṭaḥ kṛtā ācaṣṭe . kataraḥ devadattaḥ . yaḥ kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_11: kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidyanti . pacataḥ . pacanti iti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_12: . kim tarhi sādhanāpekṣāṇi . iha api tarhi prāpnuvanti . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_13: . pacantirūpam iti . tiṅā uktatvāt tasya abhisambandhasya na bhaviṣyati . ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_14: api tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati . dvivacanabahuvacanāni api tarhi samayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_15: prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ dvivacanabahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7636_16: apavāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api napuṃsakatvam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . liṅgam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7638_0: KA_II.419.1-6 Ro_IV.221-222 vṛṣalādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . vṛṣalādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7638_1: kartavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ . dasyurūpaḥ . corarūpaḥ iti . siddham tu prakṛtyarthavaiśiṣṭyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7638_2: . siddham etat . katham . prakṛtyarthasya vaiśiṣṭye iti vaktavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7638_3: . api ayam palāṇḍunā surām pibet . corarūpaḥ ayam . api ayam akṣṇoḥ añjanam haret
GS24pmbhasuu:7638_4: . dasyurūpaḥ ayam . api ayam dhāvataḥ lohitam pibet .
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_1: . īṣadasamāptau kriyāpradhānatvāt liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ . paṭukalpaḥ . paṭukalpau
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_2: . paṭukalpāḥ iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ īṣadasamāptiḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_3: prāpnoti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham . siddham etat . katham . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_4: . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat . īṣadasamāptau yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_5: kalpabādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_6: anuvartante . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_7: anupapattiḥ . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_8: tu tatsambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tatsambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_9: īṣadasamāptisambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_10: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam īṣadasamāptaukriyāpradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_11: liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_12: nanu ca uktam prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_13: jñāpayati svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni iti yat ayam ṇacaḥ striyām añ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_14: iti strīgrahaṇam karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate bahuguḍaḥ drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_15: . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na api ativartante . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_16: . paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ iti . na etat asti . nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_17: visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ ca anirjñātaḥ . idam tarhi . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_18: . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . dravyam api anirjñātam . idam tarhi . kṛtakalpam . bhuktakalpam
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_19: . pītakalpam iti . ktāntāt pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_20: kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt . ktāntāt pratyayavidhāneḥ anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_21: . ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt . bhūtakālalakṣaṇaḥ ktaḥ . kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_22: . visamāptivacanāḥ ca kalpādayaḥ . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat bhūtakālaḥ ca syāt asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_23: ca iti . siddham tu āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . āśaṃsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_24: bhūtavat ca iti evam atra ktaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam ca api udāharaṇam paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_25: iti . nanu ca uktam nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_26: ca anirjñātaḥ iti . lokataḥ vyavahāram dṛṣṭvā guṇasya nirjñānam . tat yathā paṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_27: ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ laghunā upāyena athān sādhayati . paṭukalpaḥ ayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_28: ucyati yaḥ na tathā sādhayati . idam ca api udāharaṇam guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_29: prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . nanu ca uktam dravyam api anirjñātam iti . lokataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_0: KA_II.420.19-422.4 Ro_IV.226-229 vibhāṣāgrahaṇam kimartham . vibhāṣā bahuc yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_1: syāt . bahucā mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_2: . tayā vākyam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . kalpādayaḥ api yathā syuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_3: . etat api na asti prayojanam . bahuc ucyate kalpādayaḥ api . tat ubhayam vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_4: bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . akriyamāṇe hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ bahuc kalpādīn
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_5: bādheta . kalpādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . sāvakāśāḥ kalpādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_6: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_7: yathā syāt . prātipadikāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_8: subantāt utpattau satyām prātipadikāt vā . yadi evam iha api na arthaḥ subgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_9: . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac iti . iha api na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_10: prātipadikāt vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_11: bhavati . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti . nanu ca prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_12: api utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham . ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_13: kartavyam subantāt utpattau niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_14: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . tiṅantāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_15: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_16: . bahuci subgrahaṇāt pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānam . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_17: tiṅaḥ vidhiḥ yathā vijñāyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam tiṅgrahaṇam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_18: . kva prakṛtam . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau . tiṅaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi bahuci subgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_19: pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānāt . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate . kim kāraṇam . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_20: vidhānāt . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ ca iti anuvartate . tat iha api prāpnoti . nanu ca tiṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_21: nivarteta . avaśyam uttarārtham anuvartyam avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti pacataki
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_22: jalpataki iti evamartham . yadi subgrahaṇam kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati . bahupaṭavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_23: evam svaraḥ prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ citaḥ saprakṛteḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7760_0: KA_II.443.14-444.11 Ro_IV.273-275 śeṣāt iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_1: samāsāntaḥ ni vidhīyate saḥ śeṣaḥ . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam kriyate . yābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_2: prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ vidhīyate tābhyaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_3: ye pratipadam vidhīyante te tatra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_4: bhavanti sāvakāśāḥ ca samāsāntāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā kap . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_5: . kapaḥ prasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . paratvāt kap prāpnoti . tasmāt śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_6: . kim punaḥ idam śeṣagrahaṇam kabapekṣam yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ kap iti āhosvit samāsāntāpekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_7: yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate kabapekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_8: anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha samāsāntāpekṣam anṛkkam bahvṛkkam sūktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_9: iti na sidhyati . astu kabapekṣam . katham anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti . viśeṣe etat vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_10: . anṛcaḥ māṇave bahvṛcaḥ caraṇaśākhāyām iti . idam tarhi ūdhasaḥ anaṅi strīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_11: coditam . tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti . evam tarhi na eva kabapekṣam śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_12: na api samāsāntāpekṣam . kim tarhi anantaraḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhyadhikāraḥ saḥ apekṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_13: . anantare bahuvrīhyadhikāre yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_14: anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti . vaktavyam eva anṛcaḥ māṇave bahvṛcaḥ caraṇaśākhāyām iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:7764_0: KA_III.1.1-3.23 Ro_IV.279-287 ekācaḥ iti kim ayam bahuvrīhiḥ . ekaḥ ac asmin saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_1: ekāc . ekācaḥ iti . āhosvit tatpuruṣaḥ ayam samānādhikaraṇaḥ . ekaḥ ac ekāc . ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_2: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi bahuvrīhiḥ siddham papāca papāṭha . iyāya . āra iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_3: . atha tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ siddham iyāya . āra iti . papāca papāṭha iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_4: sidhyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_5: ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ ayam . ekavarṇeṣu katham . ekavarṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_6: vyapadeśivadvacanāt . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam . evam ekavarṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_7: dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate . tatra na jñāyate kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_8: ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ iti . vakṣyati liṭi dhātoḥ anabhyāsasya iti . tena dhātoḥ ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_9: iti vijñāyate . yadi dhātoḥ ekācaḥ siddham papāca papāṭha . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_10: iti na sidhyati . dhātoḥ iti na eṣā ekācsamānādhikaraṇā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ ekācaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_11: . kim tarhi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ yaḥ ekāc avayavaḥ iti . avayavayogā eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_12: ṣaṣṭhī iti cet siddham jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti . papāca papāṭha iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_13: . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena dhātoḥ ekāc avayavaḥ bhavati . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_14: iti ucyate . tena yatra eva prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca tatra dvirvacanam syāt . jajāgāra
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_15: puputrīyiṣati iti . papāca papāṭha iti atra na syāt . prathamatve ca . prathamatve
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_16: ca kim . vyapadeśivadvacanāt siddham iti eva . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_17: . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_18: . ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham iti eva . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_19: vā . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_20: . ekājmātrasya dvirvacanārthaḥ . ekājmātrayta dvirvacanam yathā syāt . iyāya papāca
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_21: . tataḥ prathamasya . prathamasya ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_22: . yatra prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca asti tatra prathamasya ekācaḥ dvirvacanam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_23: syāt . aprathamasya mā bhūt . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_24: avayavānām dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt avayavānām dvirvacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_25: . nenijati iti atra nijśabdaḥ api ekāc ijśabdaḥ api ekāc ikāraḥ api ekāc niśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_26: api . tatra nijśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ ca na santi . ijśabdasya dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_27: rūpam na sidhyati doṣāḥ ca na santi . ikārasya dvirvacane rūpam na sidhati doṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_28: ca na santi . niśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ tu santi . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_29: . tatra jusbhāvavacanam . tatra jusbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anenijuḥ . paryaveviṣuḥ . abhyastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_30: jheḥ jusbhāvaḥ bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt . svaraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_31: . svaraḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijati . yat pariveviṣati iti . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_32: bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . adbhāvaḥ ca . adbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_33: ca na sidhyati . nenijati . pariveviṣati iti . abhyastāt iti adbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_34: . numpratiṣedhaḥ ca . numpratiṣedhaḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijat . pariveviṣat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_35: abhyāstāt śatuḥ it numpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt . śāstrahāniḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_36: . śāstrahāniḥ ca bhavati . samudāyaikācaḥ śāstram hīyate . siddham tu tatsamudāyaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_37: śāstrāhāneḥ . siddham etat . katham . tatsamudāyaikāctvāt . kim idam tatsamudāyaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_38: iti . tasya samudāyaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ . ekājbhāvaḥ ekāctvam . tatsamudāyasya ekāctvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7764_40: . kutaḥ . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . nanu ca samudāyaikācaḥ dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_0: śāstram hīyate . na hīyate . kim kāraṇam . avayavātmakatvāt samudāyasya . avayavātmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_1: samudāyaḥ . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāye avayavaḥ . tat yathā vṛkṣaḥ pracalan sahāvayavaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_2: pracalati . tatra bahuvrīhinirdeśe anackasya dvirvacanam anyapadārthatvāt . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_3: bahuvrīhinirdeśe anackasya dvirvacanam prāpnoti . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyapadārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_4: bahuvrīheḥ . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate . tena yat anyat acaḥ tasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_5: syāt . tat yathā citraguḥ ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ santi saḥ ānīyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_6: gāvaḥ . siddham tu tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt pāṇineḥ yathā loke . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_7: . tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya yathā loke . loke śuklavāsasam
GS24pmbhasuu:7765_8: ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . evam iha api .
GS24pmbhasuu:7767_0: KA_III.3.24-5.19 Ro_IV.287-293 atha yasya dvirvacanam ārabhyate kim tasya sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7767_1: bhavati āhosvit dviḥprayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7767_2: samudāyādeśatvāt . sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āṭiṭat . āśiśat . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7767_3: . samudāyādeśatvāt . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7767_4: naṣṭaḥ ṇiḥ bhavati iti ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:7767_5: . dvirvacanam kriyatām ṇilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . nityam

GS24pmbhasuu:7787: aipsan . kim ca syāt . adbhāvaḥ numpratiṣedhaḥ jusbhāvaḥ iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . adbhāve tāvat na doṣaḥ . saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_0: at abhyastāt . tataḥ ātmanepadeṣu . ātmanepadeṣu ca at bhavati . anataḥ iti ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_1: śeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate numpratiṣedhaḥ iti ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_2: . idam iha sampradhāryam . numpratiṣedhaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_3: . paratvāt numpratiṣedhaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api numpratiṣedhe prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_4: api . ekādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . anyasya kṛte numpratiṣedhe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_5: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_6: . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ . vidhiviṣaye numpratiṣedhaḥ vidhiḥ ca numaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_7: prāk tu sarvanāmasthānotpatteḥ ekādeśaḥ . tatra nityatvāt ca antaraṅgatvāt ca ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_8: . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate jusbhāvaḥ iti ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_9: kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . ekādeśe iti ucyate kena ca atra ekādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_10: antinā . na atra antibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_11: jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . śapā vyavahitatvāt . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_12: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti vyavadhānam eva . kim puṇaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_13: nimittavān antiḥ ekādeśam tāvat pratīkṣate na punaḥ tāvati eva nimittam asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_14: antibhāvena bhāvyam . iha api tarhi tāvati eva nimittam asti iti antibhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_15: . anenijuḥ . paryaveviṣuḥ iti . astu . antibhāve kṛte sthānivadbhāvāt jhigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_16: grahaṇāt jusbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā yadi api nimittavān antiḥ ayam tasya jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_17: apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargāḥ abhiniviśante . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_18: paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ pravartate . na tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_19: atra kadā cit api antibhāvaḥ bhavati . apavādam jusbhāvam pratīkṣate . na khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_20: kva cit abhyastānām jheḥ ca ānantaryam . sarvatra vikaraṇaiḥ vyavadhānam . tena anena
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_21: avaśyam vikaraṇanāśaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ kva cit lukā kva cit ślunā kva cit ekādeśena . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_22: yathā ślulukau pratīkṣate evam ekādeśam api pratīkṣate . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_23: sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . sthānivadbhāvam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_24: . vyavadhānāt na bhaviṣyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_25: . pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ . tat etat asati prayojane ubhegrahaṇam sahārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_26: vijñāsyate . katham kṛtvā ekaikasya abhyastasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_27: dṛṣṭā . tat yathā . vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_28: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_29: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_30: yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_31: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇvṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_0: KA_III.11.6-19 Ro_IV.307-309 jakṣityādiṣu saptagrahaṇam vevītyartham . jakṣityādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_1: saptagrahaṇam kartavyam . sapta jakṣityādayaḥ abhyastasañjñakāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_2: . kim prayojanam . vevītyartham . vevīteḥ abhyastasañjñā yathā syāt . vevyate . aparigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_3: vā āgaṇāntatvāt . na vā arthaḥ parigaṇanena . astu āgaṇāntam abhyastasañjñā . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_4: api tarhi prāpnoti . āṅaḥ śāsu . astu . abhyastakāryāṇi kasmāt na bhavanti . bhūyiṣṭhāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_5: parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadī ca ayam . svaraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . yatra api asya ātmanepadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_6: abhyastakāryam svaraḥ tatra api anudāttetaḥ param lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_7: iti anudāttatve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ dhātusvareṇa udāttatve sati abhyastasvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_8: vā . ṣasivaśī chāndasau . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . carkarītam abhyastam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_9: . hnuṅaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . astu . abhyastakāryāṇi kasmāt na bhavanti . bhūyiṣṭhāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_10: parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadī ca ayam . svaraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ahnviṅoḥ iti pratiṣedhavidhānasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_11: svaraḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vā sapta eva ime dhātavaḥ paṭhyante . jakṣ abhyastasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_12: bhavati . ityādayaḥ ca ṣaṭ . jakṣ ityādayaḥ ṣaṭ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_0: KA_III.11.21-12.9 Ro_IV.309-310 tujādiṣu chandaḥpratyayagrahaṇam . tujādiṣu chandaḥpratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_1: kartavyam . chandasi tujādīnām dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . asmin ca asmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_2: pratyaye iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . tutoja śabalān harān . anārambhaḥ vā aparigaṇitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_3: . anārambhaḥ vā chandasi dīrghatvasya nyāyyaḥ . kutaḥ . aparigaṇitatvāt . na hi chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_4: dīrghatvasya parigaṇanam kartum śakyam . kim kāraṇam . anyeṣām ca darśanāt . yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_5: api dīrghatvam na ārabhyate teṣām api chandasi dīrghatvam dṛśyate . tat yathā pūruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_6: . nārakaḥ iti . anekāntatvāt ca . yeṣām ca api ārabhyate teṣām api anekāntaḥ . yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_7: eva ca pratyaye dīrghatvam dṛśyate tasmin eva ca na dṛśyate . māmahānaḥ ukthapātram
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_0: KA_III.12.11-13.5 Ro_IV.310-311 dhātoḥ iti kimartham . īhām cakre . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_1: . liṭi iti ucyate na ca atra liṭam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_2: iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . idam tarhi . sasṛvāṃsaḥ viśṛṇvire . liṭi dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_3: jāgarteḥ vāvacanam . liṭi dvirvacane jāgarteḥ vā iti vaktavyam . yaḥ jāgara tam ṛcaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_4: kāmayante . yaḥ jajāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante . anabhyāsasya iti kim . kṛṣṇaḥ nonāva
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_5: vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam . nonūyateḥ nonāva . abhyāsapratiṣedhānarthakyam ca chandasi vāvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_6: . abhyāsapratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . chandasi vāvacanāt . avaśyam chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_7: vā dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ādityān yāciṣāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_8: yiyāciṣāmahe iti prāpte . devatā no dāti priyāṇi . dadāti priyāṇi . maghavā dātu
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_9: . maghavā dadātu . saḥ naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu . vīravat dadhātu . yāvatā idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_10: chandasi vā dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate dhātugrahaṇena api na arthaḥ . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7794_11: sasṛvāṃsaḥ viśṛṇvire iti . chandasi vāvacanāt . tat etat dhātugrahaṇam sānnyāsikam tiṣṭhatu tāvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_0: KA_III.13.7-16.7 Ro_IV.311-317 kim iyam ṣaṣṭhī āhosvit saptamī . kutaḥ sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_1: samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ṣaṣṭhī sanyaṅantasya dvirvacanena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_2: . atha saptamī sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ pūrvasya dvirvacanam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sanyaṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_3: parataḥ iti cet iṭaḥ dvirvacanam parāditvāt . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ iti cet iṭaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_4: kartavyam . aṭiṭiṣati . aśiśiṣati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . parāditvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_5: iṭ parādiḥ . hanteḥ ca īṭaḥ . hanteḥ ca īṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam . jeghnīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_6: nanu ca yasya api sanyaṅantasya dvirvacanam tasya api sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . īṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_7: sthānivadbhāvāt īṭaḥ dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dvirvacananimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_8: aci sthānivat iti ucyate na ca asau dvirvacananimittam . yasmin api dvirvacanam yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_9: api dvirvacanam sarvaḥ asau dvirvacananimittam . tasmāt īṭaḥ dvirvacanam . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_10: ubhābhyām īṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam . yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ doṣaḥ na tam ekaḥ codyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_11: . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam udāttaviśeṣaṇam cet sanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_12: . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam udāttaviśeṣaṇam cet sanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_13: vaktavyaḥ . bibhitsati . cicchitsati . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_14: iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi sanyaṅantasya . sanyaṅantasya iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_15: aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ . sanyaṅantasya iti cet aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ dvirvacanam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_16: iyakṣamāṇāḥ bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ . yasya api sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ dvirvacanam tena api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_17: avaśyam iḍabhāve yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aśeḥ hi pratipadam iṭ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_18: smipūṅrañjvaśām sani iti . tena eva dvitīyadvirvacanam api na bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_19: na etat aśeḥ rūpam . yajeḥ eṣaḥ chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ . tat yathā tubhya idam agne
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_20: . tubhyam idam agne iti prāpte . ambānām carum . nāmbānām carum iti prāpte . āvyādhinīḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_21: ugaṇāḥ . sugaṇāḥ iti prāpte . iṣkartaram adhvarasya . niṣkartāram iti prāpte . śivā
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_22: udrasya bheṣajī . śivā rudrasya bheṣajī iti prāpte . aśyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_23: punaḥ aśeḥ arthaḥ . aśnotiḥ vyaptikarmā . yajiḥ api aśyarthe vartate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_24: anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_25: . vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ chedane ca api vartate . keśān vapati iti . īḍiḥ studicodanāyācñāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_26: dṛṣṭaḥ īraṇe ca api vartate . agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe . marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_27: . karotiḥ ayam abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe ca api vartate . pṛṣṭham kuru
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_28: . pādau kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api dṛśyate . kaṭe kuru . ghaṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_29: kuru . aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . evam tarhi dīrghakutvaprasāraṇaṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_30: adhikasya dvirvacanāt . dīrghatvam dvirvacanādhikasya na sidhyati . cicīṣati . tuṣṭūṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_31: . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_32: san bhavati . tatra ajantānām sani iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_33: dīrghatvam kriyatām dvirvacanam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_34: dvirvacanam . kṛte api dīrghatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . dīrghatvam api nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_35: . kṛte api dvirvacane prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityam dīrghatvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_36: dvirvacane prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_37: prakṛtipratyayasya ajantatā na asti iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dvirvacanam api
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_38: anityam . anyasya kṛte dīrghatve prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_39: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt dīrghatvam . yat tarhi na akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_40: dvirvacane dīrghatvam tat na sidhyati . juhūṣati iti . kutvam dvirvacanādhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_41: na sidhyati . jighāṃsati . jaṅghanyate . kim kāraṇam . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7796_42: . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ hantiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_0: tatra abhyāsāt hantihakārasya iti kutvam na sidhyati . samprasāraṇam ca dvirvacanādhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_1: na sidhyati . juhūṣati. johūyate . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_2: prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ havayatiḥ bhavati . tatra hvaḥ samprasāraṇam abhyastasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_3: iti samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati hi etat hvaḥ abhyastanimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_4: iti . yāvatā ca idānīm hvaḥ abhyastanimittasya iti ucyate saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_5: yat uktam yat tarhi na akṛte dvirvacane dīrghatvam tat na sidhyati iti . ṣatvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_6: dvirvacanādhikasya na sidhyati . pipakṣati . yiyakṣati . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_7: . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ san bhavati . tatra iṇkubhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_8: uttarasya pratyayasakārasya iti ṣatvam na prāpoti . idam iha sampradhāryam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_9: kriyatām ṣatvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ṣatvam . pūrvatrāsiddhe ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_10: siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastavidhipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_11: ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . saḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . īpsati . īrtsati
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_12: . īpsan . īrtsan . aipsan . airtsan . kim ca syāt . adbhāvaḥ numpratiṣedhaḥ jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_13: iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktāḥ atra parihārāḥ . saṅāśraye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_14: samudāyasya samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ āmiśratvāt . saṅāśraye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_15: kārye samudāyasya samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ . kim kāraṇam . āmiśratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_16: . āmiśrībhūtam idam bhavati . tat yathā . kṣīrodake sampṛkte . āmiśratvāt na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_17: kiyat kṣīram kiyat udakam iti . kasmin avakāśe kṣīram kasmin avakāśe udakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_18: evam iha api āmiśratvāt na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ kasmin avakāśe prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_19: kasmin avakāśe pratyayaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅi jhali iti kutvādīni na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_20: . idam iha sampradhāryam dvirvacanam kriyatām kutvādīni iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_21: paratvāt kutvādīni . pūrvatrāsiddhe kutvādīni siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_22: . evam tarhi pūrvatrāsiddhīyam advirvacane iti vaktavyam. tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_23: . vibhāṣitāḥ prayojayanti . drogdhā drogdhā . droḍhā droḍhā . yāvatā ca idānīm pūrvatrāsiddhīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_24: advirvacane iti ucyate saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam ṣatvam na sidhyati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_25: sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopaḥ aparihṛtaḥ . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ dvirvacane iṭaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_26: vaktavyam . sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane hanteḥ kutvam aparihṛtam . tatra sanyaṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_27: dvirvacanam dviḥprayogaḥ ca iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nirdoṣaḥ . tatra idam aparihṛtam sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_28: iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti . etasya api parihāram vakṣyati ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_29: . katham jeghnīyate . vakṣyati etat yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām ghnī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_0: KA_III.16.9-23 Ro_IV.317-318 dāśvān iti kim nipātyate . dāśeḥ vasau dvitveṭpratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_1: . dāśeḥ vasau dvitveṭpratiṣedhau nipātyete . dāśvaṃsaḥ dāśuṣaḥ sutam . dāśvān . sāhvān
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_2: iti kim nipātyate . saheḥ dīrghatvam ca . kim ca . dvitveṭpratiṣedhau ca . sāhvān
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_3: balāhakaḥ . sāhvān . mīḍhvān iti kim nipātyate . miheḥ ḍhatvam ca . kim ca . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_4: ca pūrvayoḥ . kim ca pūrvayoḥ . dvitveṭpratiṣedhau dīrghatvam ca . mīḍhvaḥ tokaya
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_5: tanayāya mṛḍaya . yathā iyam indra mīḍhvaḥ . mahyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ punaḥ mahyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_6: . mahatiḥ dānakarmā . ataḥ kim . itvam api nipātyam . mahyarthaḥ iti cet miheḥ tadarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_7: siddham . mahyarthaḥ iti cet mihiḥ api mahyarthe vartate . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_8: anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . asti punaḥ anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_9: api kva cit mihiḥ mahyarthe vartate . asti iti āha . miheḥ meghaḥ . meghaḥ ca kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_0: KA_III.17.1-11 Ro_IV.318-319 dvirvacanaprakaraṇe kṛñādīnām ke . dvirvacanaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_1: kṛñādīnām ke upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cakram . ciklidam . caknam iti . kādiṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_2: vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . babhruḥ . yayuḥ iti . caricalipativadīnām aci āk ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_3: abhyāsasya . caricalipativadīnām aci dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam āk ca abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_4: . carācaraḥ . calācalaḥ . patāpataḥ . vadāvadaḥ . hanteḥ ghaḥ ca . hanteḥ ghaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_5: vaktavyaḥ . aci dve bhavataḥ āk ca abhyāsasya . ghanāghanaḥ . pāṭeḥ ṇiluk ca dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_6: ca abhyāsasya ūk ca . pāṭayateḥ ṇiluk ca vaktavyaḥ . aci dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_7: . dīrghaḥ ca abhyāsasya ūk ca āgamaḥ . pāṭupaṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_2: . dvirvacanasya avakāśaḥ . bibhidatuḥ . bibhiduḥ . yaṇādeśasya avakāśaḥ . dadhi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_3: . madhu atra . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cakratuḥ . cakruḥ . ayavāyāvādeśānām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_4: . cayanam . cāyakaḥ . lavanam . lāvakaḥ . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_5: . cicāya . cicayitha . lulāva . lulavitha . āllopasya avakāśaḥ . . godaḥ . kambaladaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_6: . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . yayatuḥ . yayuḥ . tasthatuḥ . tasthuḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7803_9: . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . mitrātvaruṇau taturiḥ . dūre hyadhvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_10: jaguriḥ . dvirvacanam bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_11: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_14: vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanasya avakāśaḥ . bibhidatuḥ . bibhiduḥ . samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_15: avakāśaḥ . iṣṭam . suptam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . ījatuḥ . ījuḥ . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_16: . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya kiti iti bhaviṣyati pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7803_17: liṭi abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām iti . idam tarhi soṣupyate . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ījatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_0: ījuḥ iti . nanu ca uktam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_1: kiti iti bhaviṣyati pūrvasya liṭi abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām iti . na sidhyati . na samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_2: samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . akāreṇa vyavhitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_3: kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_4: vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati . āttvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_5: . glātā . mlātā . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . jagle . mamle .
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_6: dhātvādivikārāṇām avakāśaḥ . namati . siñcati . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_7: prāpnoti . nanāma . siseca . sasnau . rītvasya avakāśaḥ . mātrīyati . pitrīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_8: dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cekrīyate . jehrīyate . ītvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_9: . pīyate . gīyate . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pepīyate . jegīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_10: . ittvottvayoḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam . nipūrtāḥ . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_11: prāpnoti . ātestīryate . nipopūryate . guṇavṛddhyoḥ avakāśaḥ . cetā . gauḥ . dvirvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_12: saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cicāya . cicayitha . lulāva . lulavitha . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_13: asti prayojanam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_14: bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . iyāya . iyayitha . nanu ca uktam na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_15: prayojanam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya guṇavṛddhī bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7804_16: . na sidhyati . antaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrghatvam prāpnoti . vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7805_0: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7805_1: vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam abhyāsasya asavarṇe iti asavarṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7805_2: karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi antareṇa guṇavṛddhī asavarṇaparaḥ abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7805_3: bhavati . na etat asti jñāpakam . artyartham etat syāt . iyṛtaḥ . iyṛthaḥ . [uvoṇa . uvoṇithaḥ (R)
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_0: ] . yat tarhi dīrghaḥ iṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghatvam śāsti . etasya api asti vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_1: . kim . savarṇadīrghabādhanārtham etat syāt . saḥ yathā eva tarhi savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_2: bādhate evam yaṇādeśam api bādheta . evam tarhi yaṇādeśe yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_3: idam asti iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ eḥ anekācaḥ . eḥ ca anekācaḥ iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_4: . tataḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya . eḥ anekācaḥ iti eva . asavarṇagrahaṇam eva tarhi jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_5: . nanu ca uktam artyartham etat syāt iti . na ekam udāharaṇam asavarṇagrahaṇam prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_6: . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt iyaṅ na prāpnoti . atha sati api vipratiṣedhe yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_7: katham eva etat sidhyati . yaḥ anādiṣṭāt acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_8: . ādiṣṭāt ca eṣaḥ acaḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7808_0: KA_III.20.2-22 Ro_IV.323-326 ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe putrapatyoḥ tadādau atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7808_1: . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe putrapatyoḥ tadādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . putrapatyādau samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7809_0: kārīṣagandhyāpatikulam . varṇagrahaṇāt siddham . varṇagrahaṇe etat bhavati yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7809_1: vidhiḥ tadādau iti na ca idam varṇagrahaṇam . varṇagrahaṇe iti cet tadantapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7809_2: . varṇagrahaṇe iti cet tadantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . putrapatyante samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7811_0: kaumudagandhyāparamapatiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yatra hi tadādividhiḥ na asti tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:7811_1: tatra bhavitavyam . siddham tu uttarapadavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . uttarapadavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7811_2: . putrapatyoḥ uttarapadayoḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7811_3: pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti sambandhiśabdau etau . sati pūrvapade uttarapadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7811_4: sati ca uttarapade pūrvapadam iti . na ca atra putrapatī uttarapade . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_0: kārīṣagandhīpatiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadam iti ucyate . na hi atra ṣyaṅ pūrvapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_1: asti . ṣyaṅantam etat pūrvapadam . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_2: bhavati . yadi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti ucyate paramakārīṣagandhīputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7813_0: paramakārīṣagandhīpatiḥ iti na sidhyati . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7813_1: bhavati astrīpratyayena iti . yadi astrīpratyayena iti ucyate atikrāntaḥ kārīṣagandhyām atikārīṣagandhyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_0: atikārīṣagandhyapatiḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . astrīpratyayena anupasarjanena . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_1: hi upasarjanam strīpratyayaḥ bhavati eṣā tatra paribhāṣā pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7817: KA_III.20.23-23.25 Ro_IV.326-330 ṣyaṅante yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ teṣām sarveṣām samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . vārāhiputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_0: tārṇakarṇīputraḥ . tatra apratyayasthasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathāgṛhītasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_1: ādeśavacanāt apratyayasthe siddham . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam apratyayasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_2: na bhaviṣyati . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya vā . atha vā anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_3: kāryam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_4: kriyeta apratyayasthasya vā pratiṣedhaḥ ucyeta . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_5: bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_6: . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . katham vyadheḥ viddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_7: iti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7818_8: asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . sāntamahataḥ dīrghatve . sāntamahataḥ dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:7819_0: yaśāṃsi . pa iti asya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7819_1: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . nopadhāyāḥ iti tatra vartate . evam api anāṃsi,
GS24pmbhasuu:7820: manāṃsi iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāntasaṃyogena nopadhām viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sāntasaṃyogasya nopādhāyāḥ iti . evam api haṃsaśirāṃsi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7821_0: dhvaṃsaśirāṃsai iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . hammateḥ haṃsaḥ . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7821_1: āha hammateḥ haṃsaḥ iti . kim tarhi hanteḥ haṃsaḥ . hanti adhvānam iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7821_2: sarvanāmasthāne iti vartate . sarvanāmasthānaparatayā sāntasaṃyogam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7821_3: . sarvanāmasthānaparasya sāntasaṃyogasya nopādhāyāḥ iti . ankārāntasya allope . ankārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7822_0: takṣṇe iti . ta iti atra api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7822_1: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . anā akāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7822_2: anaḥ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . evam api anasā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7823: anase iti atra api prāpnoti . ankāreṇa aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . ankārāntasya aṅgasya anaḥ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . evam api anastakṣṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_0: anastakṣṇe iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_1: kāryam tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . bhasya iti upasthitam idam bhavati yaci bham
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_2: iti . tatra yajādiparatyā ankāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ anā akāram . yajādiparasya anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_3: yaḥ akāraḥ iti . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau prayojanam . nyamārṭ . aṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_4: api vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_5: . etat api na asti prayojanam . yathāparibhāṣitam ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī iti ikaḥ eva vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_6: bhaviṣyati . evam api mimārjiṣati iti atra prāpnoti . astu . abhyāsanirhrāsena hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_7: bhaviṣyati . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe ca . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe ca prayojanam . viduṣaḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_8: . vidivakārasya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_9: doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7825: vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na bhaviṣyati . yuvādīnām ca . yuvādīnām ca samprasāraṇe prayojanam . yūnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_0: yūne . yakārasya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_1: doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_2: bhaviṣyati . ukāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_3: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_4: tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam atra codayiṣyati . rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam ca . rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_5: ca na kartavyam bhavati . iha kasmāt na bhavati . abibhaḥ bhavān . anantyavikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_6: antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7828: ādityadādividhisaṃyogādilopakutvaḍhatvabhaṣbhāvaṣatvaṇatveṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . ādividhau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . dhātvādeḥ ṣaḥ saḥ . ṇaḥ naḥ . iha eva syāt . netā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7830: siñcati . ādi . tyadādividhi . iha eva syāt . tat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_0: syaḥ iti atra na syāt . tyadādividhi . saṃyogādilopa . iha eva syāt . maṅktā . maṅktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_1: iti atra na syāt . saṃyogādilopa . kutva . iha eva syāt . paktā . paktavyambhaṣbhāva
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_2: . iti atra na syāt . kutva . ḍhatva . iha eva syāt . leḍhā . leḍhavyam iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_3: syāt . ḍhatva . bhaṣbhāva . iha eva syāt . abhutsi . abhutsātām iti atra na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_4: . bhaṣbhāva . ṣatva . iha eva syāt . draṣṭā . draṣṭavyam iti atra na syāt . ṣatva
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_5: . ṇatva . iha eva syāt . māṣāvāpeṇa . māṣāvāpāṇām iti atra na syāt . ṇatva . ete
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_6: doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣā santi
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_7: iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_8: na adhiśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ santi iti yavāḥ na upyante . doṣāḥ khalu api sākalyena
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_9: parigaṇitāḥ prayojanānām udāharaṇamātram . kuta etat . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_10: . tasmāt yāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā pratividheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_11: ca doṣeṣu . idam pratividhīyate . udāttanirdeśāt siddham . yatra eṣā paribhāṣā iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_12: tatra udāttanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_13: bhavati udāttanirdeśe iti . saḥ tarhi udāttanirdeśḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_14: eva antyasadeśaḥ ca anantyasadeśaḥ ca yugapat samavasthitau tatra eṣā paribhāṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_15: . doṣeṣu ca anyatra antyasadeśaḥ anyatra anantyasadeśaḥ . prayojaneṣu punaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_16: eva antyasadeśaḥ ca anantyasadeśaḥ ca . tathājātīyakāni khalu api ācāryeṇa prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_17: paṭhitāni yāni ubhayavanti . idam ekam yathā doṣaḥ tathā rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_18: . tat ca api kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:7834: KA_III.24.2-5 Ro_IV.331 mātac . kārīṣagandhyā mātā asya kārīṣagandhīmātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_0: KA_III.24.8-25.5 Ro_IV.331-333 vayigrahaṇam kimartham na veñ yajādiṣu paṭhyate veñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_1: ca vayiḥ ādeśaḥ kriyate tatra yajādīnām kiti iti eva siddham . tatra etat syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_2: ṅidarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ iti . tat ca na . liṭi ayam ādeśaḥ liṭ ca kit eva . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_3: uttaram paṭhati . vayigrahaṇam veñaḥ pratiṣedhāt . vayigrahaṇam kriyate veñaḥ pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_4: . veñaḥ liṭi pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ vayeḥ mā bhūt iti . yathā eva hi veñgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_5: vidhiḥ prārthyate evam pratiṣedhaḥ api prāpnoti . na vā yakārapratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_6: apratiṣedhasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam liṭi vayaḥ yaḥ iti vayeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_7: yakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpati ācāryaḥ na veñgrahaṇāt samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_8: bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . piti abhyāsārtham etat syāt . vayeḥ pitsu vacaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_9: abhyāsasya yakārasya samprasāraṇam mā bhūt iti . nanu ca veñgrahaṇāt vayeḥ pitsu
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_10: api vacaneṣu abhyāsayakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ . na sidhyati . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_11: kāraṇam . kiti iti tatra anuvartate . evam api vayeḥ pitsu api vacaneṣu abhyāsayakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7839_12: samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . halādiśeṣeṇa bādhyate . na atra halādiśeṣaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7892_1: samprasāraṇam akāralopaḥ ca nipātyate . indraḥ ca viṣṇo yat apaspṛdhethām . apāspṛdhethām
GS24pmbhasuu:7892_2: iti bhāṣāyām . śrātāḥ śritam iti kim nipātyate . śrīṇāteḥ kte śrābhāvaśribhāvau nipātyete
GS24pmbhasuu:7892_3: . kva punaḥ śrābhāvaḥ kva vā śribhāvaḥ . some śrābhāvaḥ anyatra śribhāvaḥ . na tarhi
