GS24pmbhasuu:7896_0: KA_III.31.4-32.14 Ro_IV.345-347 kimartham idam ucyate . vacispaviyajādīnām grahādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7896_1: ca samprasāraṇam uktam . tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarveṣām samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7896_2: ca parasya yathā syāt na pūrvasya tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti na samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7896_3: samprasāraṇam . kim anye api evam vidhayaḥ bhavanti . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi . supi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7896_4: iti . ghaṭābhyām . akāramātrasya dīrghatvam kasmāt na bhavati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7896_5: . iyam atra paribhāṣā upatiṣṭhate . alaḥ antyasya iti . nanu ca idānīm etayā paribhāṣayā iha (R: iha api)
GS24pmbhasuu:7897_0: śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha . na hi vacispaviyajādīnām grahādīnām ca antyaḥ yaṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:7897_1: asti . evam tarhi anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti antyasasdeśaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7897_2: yaṇ tasya kāryam bhaviṣyati . na etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ santi prayojanāni . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7897_3: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti yat ayam pyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7897_4: pībhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . pībhāvavacane etat prayojanam āpīnaḥ andhuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7898_0: āpīnam ūdhaḥ etat rūpam yathā syāt iti . yadi ca atra sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7898_1: syāt pībhāvavacanam anarthakam syāt . samprasāraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇaparapūrvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:7898_2: ca dvayoḥ ikārayoḥ ekādeśe siddham rūpam syāt āpīnaḥ andhuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_0: āpīnam ūdhaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_1: . tataḥ ayam pyāyaḥ pībhāvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . siddhe hi vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_2: jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati na ca pyāyaḥ samprasāraṇena sidhyati . samprasāraṇe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_3: antyasya prasajyeta . evam api jñāpakam eva . katham . pyāyaḥ iti na eṣā sthānaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_4: . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī . pyāyaḥ yaḥ yaṇ iti . tat etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_5: sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti yat ayam pyāyaḥ pībhāvam śāsti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_6: anaikāntikam etat . etāvat jñāpyate na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_7: tatra kutaḥ etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti . ucyamāne api etasmin kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_8: etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti . ekayogakṣaṇam khalu api samprasāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_9: tat yadi tāvat param abhinirvṛttam pūrvam api abhinirvṛttam eva . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_10: pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum na abhinirvṛttasya . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_11: mā bhukthāḥ iti kim tena kṛtam syāt . atha api pūrvam anabhinirvṛttam param api anabhinirvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_12: eva . tatra nimittasaṃśrayaḥ anupapannaḥ na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_13: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate ucyamāne api etasmin kutaḥ etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_14: iti . iha iṅgitena ceṣṭitena nimiṣitena mahatā vā sūtraprabandhena ācāryāṇām abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_15: gamyate . etat eva jñāpayati parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti yat ayam na samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_16: samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yat api ucyate ekayogalakṣaṇam khalu api samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_17: . tat yadi tāvat param abhinirvṛttam pūrvam api abhinirvṛttam eva . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_18: pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum iti . astu ubhayoḥ abhinirvṛttiḥ . na vayam pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_19: pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . samprasāraṇāśrayam yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_20: . tataḥ pūrvatve pratiṣiddhe yaṇādeśena siddham . yat api ucyate atha api pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_21: anabhinirvṛttam param api anabhinirvṛttam eva . tatra nimittasaṃśrayaḥ anupapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_22: iti . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā indrārthā sthūṇā indraḥ iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_23: iha api samprasāraṇārtham samprasāraṇam . tat yat prasāraṇārtham prasāraṇam tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7901_0: KA_III.32.15-33.8 Ro_IV.347-349 atha samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāraṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7901_1: kimartham . prasāraṇaprakaraṇe punaḥ prasāraṇagrahaṇam ataḥ anyatra prasāraṇapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7903_0: etat prayojanam . videśastham api yat samprasāraṇam tasya api pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7903_1: . vyathaḥ liṭi . vivyathe . na etat asti prayojanam . halādiśeṣāpavādaḥ atra samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_0: yūne . ucyamāne api etasmin na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ukāreṇa vyavadhānāt . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_1: kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_2: vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam ca . samānāṅgagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_3: . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam samānāṅge iti vaktavyam . tatra upoṣuṣi doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_4: upoṣuṣi doṣaḥ bhavati . na vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ tasmin prāptipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_5: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ tasmin dvitīyā yā
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_6: prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . atra ca vasiḥ kvasau aṅgam kvasantam punaḥ vibhaktau .
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_7: atha vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate . yāvat brūyāt prasaktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_8: anabhinirvṛttasya pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum iti . atra ca yadā vaseḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_9: tadā kvasoḥ yadā ca kvasoḥ abhinirvṛttam tadā vaseḥ bhavati . atha vā yasya aṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_10: prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate . yāvat brūyāt asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_11: iti . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya vasausamprasāraṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7906_0: KA_III.33.9-17 Ro_IV.349-350 ṛci treḥ uttarapadādilopaḥ chandasi . ṛci treḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7906_1: vaktavyam . uttarapadādilopaḥ chandasi vaktavyaḥ . tṛcam sūktam . tṛcam sāma . chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7906_2: iti kim . tryṛcāni . rayeḥ matau bahulam . rayeḥ matau samprasāraṇam bahulam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7906_3: . ā revān etu naḥ viśaḥ . na ca bhavati . rayiman puṣṭivardhanaḥ . kakṣyāyāḥ sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7906_4: . kakṣyāyāḥ sañjñāyām matau samprasāraṇam vaktavyam . kakṣīvantam yaḥ āśijaḥ . kaṇvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7906_5: kakṣīvān . sañjñāyām iti kim . kaṣyāvān hastī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7908_0: KA_III.33.19-34.2 Ro_IV.350 vaścāsyagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . anyatarasyām kiti veñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7908_1: na samprasāraṇam bhavati iti eva siddham . katham . samprasāraṇe kṛte uvaṅādeśe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7911: ūvuḥ . vayeḥ api nityam yakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ samprasāraṇasya ūyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7912: ūyuḥ . traiśabyam ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati . yadi evam vavau,
GS24pmbhasuu:7913: vavitha iti na sidhyati . lyapi ca iti anena cakāreṇa liṭ api anukṛṣyate . tasmin nitye prasāraṇapratiṣedhe prāpte iyam kiti vibhāṣā ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7916: ec yaḥ upadeśe iti āhosvit ejantantam yat upadeśe iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:7917: ec yaḥ upadeśe iti ḍhaukitā traukitā iti atra api prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_0: ejantantam yat upadeśe iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . nanu ca ejantantam yat upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_1: api vijñāyamāne atra api prāpnoti . etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ejantam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_2: upadeśe . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_3: na doṣaḥ bhavati . aśiti iti ucyate na ca atra aśitam paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_4: eva atra aśit . na kakāre bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_5: . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_6: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:7919_0: abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7919_1: . evam iha api aśiti iti śitpratiṣedhāt anyasmin aśiti śitsadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7919_2: . kim ca anyat śitsadṛśam . pratyayaḥ . iha tarhi : glai : glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_0: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . nanu ca ejantantam yat upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_1: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . santu . āyādiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ejgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_2: grahaṇāt punaḥ āttvam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_3: āyādiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ejgrahaṇena grahaṇāt āttvam bhaviṣyati . na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_4: . analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ alvidhiḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi ejantantam yat upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:7925: hūtavān iti atra api prāpnoti . bhavatu eva atra āttvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_0: āttvam kriyatām pūrvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt pūrvatvam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_1: idam iha sampradhāryam . āttvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_2: paratvāt āttvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api āttve prāpnoti akṛte api . āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_3: api nityam . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam āttvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_4: samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . tena bādhyate . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_5: lakṣaṇantareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva āttvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_6: nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_7: āttve kṛte samprasāraṇam samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ āttvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_8: . atha api katham cit āttvam anityam syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . upadeśagrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_9: kariṣyate . yadi na kriyate cetā stotā iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_10: jñāpayati na paranimittakasya āttvam bhavati iti yat ayam krīṅjīṇām ṇau āttvam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_11: . na etat asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt . krīṅjīṇām ṇau eva iti . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_12: mīnātiminotidīṅām lyapi ca iti atra ejgrahaṇam anuvartayati . iha tarhi glai glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7929_0: śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:7929_1: āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti yat ayam aśiti iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yadi hi bādheran
GS24pmbhasuu:7929_2: śiti api bādheran . atha vā punaḥ astu ec yaḥ upadeśe iti . nanu ca uktam glai glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7932_0: śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti iti . atra api śitpratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7932_1: na āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7932_2: kartavyam . jagle mamle . aśiti iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7933_0: . śakāraḥ it yasya saḥ ayam śit . na śit aśit . aśiti iti . katham tarhi . śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7933_1: it śit . na śit śit aśit . aśiti iti . yadi evam stanandhayaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7935: KA_III.35.20-37.5 Ro_IV.355-358 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7936: yat anyat śitaḥ iti āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7937: śiti na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7938_0: glāyanti mlayanti . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . śidaśitoḥ ekādeśaḥ ādivat syāt . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7938_1: anyat śitaḥ iti kṛtvā āttvam prāpnoti . pratyayavidhiḥ . pratyayavidhiḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7938_2: . suglaḥ sumlaḥ . ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ na prāpnoti . aniṣṭasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7938_3: śravaṇam prasajyeta . abhyāsarūpam ca . abhyāsarūpam ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:7939: jagle mamle . ivarṇābhyāsatā prāpnoti . ayavāyāvām pratiṣedhaḥ ca . ayavāyāvām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : glai : glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_0: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . astu tarhi prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ śiti na iti . śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_1: pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ upasaṅkhyānam rarīdhvam trādhvam śiśīte . śiti pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_2: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam . luk . trādhvam naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_3: devā nijuraḥ vṛkasya . śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat divaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_4: naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam iti . na etat rai iti asya rūpam . kasya tarhi . rāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_5: dānakarmaṇaḥ . śiśīte śṛṅge iti na etat śyateḥ rūpam . kasya tarhi . śīṅaḥ . śyatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_6: vai gamyate . kaḥ punaḥ śyateḥ arthaḥ . śyatiḥ niśāne vartate . śīṅ api śyatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_7: vartate . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_8: bhavanti iti . tat yathā . vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ chedane ca api vartate . keśān
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_9: vapati iti . īḍiḥ studicodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ īraṇe ca api vartate . agniḥ vai itaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_10: vṛṣṭim īṭṭe . marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti . karotiḥ ayam abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_11: ca api vartate . pṛṣṭham kuru . pādau kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_12: api dṛśyate . kaṭe kuru . ghaṭe kuru . aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_13: sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ . śiti iti ucyate na ca atra śitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_14: . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . trādhvam iti luṅi eṣaḥ vyatyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_15: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . nanu ca uktam aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_16: ādivattvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_17: vyavadhānam . yat api pratyayavidhiḥ iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ejantebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7944_18: ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ iti yat ayam hvāvāmaḥ ca iti aṇam kabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7945: pratyākhyāyate saḥ yogaḥ . atha api kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . liṭi iti anuvartate . dvilakārakaḥ ca ayam nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7946_0: liṭi lakārādau iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7946_1: iti . yat api uktam ayavāyāvām pratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . śiti pratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7948: KA_III.37.6-16 Ro_IV.358-359 prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ . prātipadikānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . gobhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_0: naubhiḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na prātipadikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_1: āttvam bhavati iti yat ayam rāyaḥ halaḥ iti āttvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_2: . niyamārtham etat syāt . rāyaḥ hali eva iti . yat tarhi ā otaḥ amśasoḥ iti āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_3: śāsti . etasya api asti vacane prayojanam . ami vṛddhibādhanārtham etat syāt śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_4: pratiṣedhārtham ca . tasmāt prātipadikānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_5: dhātvadhikārāt prātipadikasyāprāptiḥ . dhātvadhikārāt prātipadikasya āttvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_6: . dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . liṭi dhātoḥ anabhyāsasya iti . atha api nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_7: evam api adoṣaḥ . upadeśe iti ucyate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7953_0: KA_III.37.18-22 Ro_IV.359 āttve ṇau līyateḥ upasaṅkhyānam pralambhanaśālīnīkaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7953_1: . āttve ṇau līyateḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pralambhane ca arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7953_2: śālīnīkaraṇe ca nityam āttvam yathā syāt . pralambhane tāvat . jaṭābhiḥ ālāpayate
GS24pmbhasuu:7953_3: . śmaśrubhiḥ ālāpayate . śālīnīkaraṇe . śyenaḥ vārtikam ullāpayate . rathī rathinam upalapayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7955_0: KA_III.38.2-8 Ro_IV.360-361 sidhyateḥ ajñānārthasya . sidhyateḥ ajñānārthasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7955_1: vaktavyam . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . apāralaukike iti ucyamāne aniṣṭam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7955_2: . annam sādhayati brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dāsyāmi iti . asti punaḥ ayam sidhyatiḥ kva cit anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7955_3: vartate . asti iti āha . tapaḥ tāpasam sedhayati . jñānam asya prakāśayati . svāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7955_4: eva enam karmāṇi sedhayanti . jñānam asya prakāśayanti iti arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_0: KA_III.38.10-39.12 Ro_IV.361-363 mīnātyādīnām āttve upadeśavacanam pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_1: . mīnātyādīnām āttve upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām āttvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pratyayavidhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām āttve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_3: iṣṭaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ yathā syāt . ke punaḥ pratyayāḥ upadeśivadbhāvam prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_4: . kāḥ . kāḥ tāvat na prayojayanti . kim kāraṇam . ecaḥ iti ucyate na ca keṣu ec asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_5: . ṇaghañyujvidhayaḥ tarhi prayojayanti . ṇa . avadāyaḥ . ātaḥ iti ṇaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_6: . ghañ . avadāyaḥ vartate . ātaḥ iti ghañ siddhaḥ bhavati . kim ca bho ātaḥ iti bhañ
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_7: ucyate . na khalu api ātaḥ iti ucyate ātaḥ tu vijñāyate . katham . aviśeṣeṇa ghañ
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_8: utsargaḥ . tasya ivarṇāntāt uvarṇāntāt ca ajapau apavādau . tatra upadeśāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_9: āttve kṛte apavādasya nimittam na asti iti kṛtvā utsargeṇa ghañ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_10: evam ca kṛtvā na ca ātaḥ iti ucyate ātaḥ tu vijñāyate . yuc . īṣadavadānam svavadānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_11: . ātaḥ iti yuc siddhaḥ bhavati . idam vipratiṣiddham ecaḥ upadeśaḥ iti . yadi ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_12: na upadeśe atha upadeśe na ecaḥ . ecaḥ ca upadeśe ca iti vipratiṣiddham . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_13: vipratiṣiddham . āha ayam ecaḥ upadeśe iti . yadi ecaḥ na upadeśe atha upadeśa na
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_14: ecaḥ . te vayam viṣayam vijñāsyāmaḥ . ejviṣaye iti . tat tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_15: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āt ecaḥ upadeśe iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_16: prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam viṣayaviśeṣaṇena ca iha arthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_17: bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_18: sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_19: iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati ṭat yathā . śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_20: tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante . yat api ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_21: khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_22: ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt . śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_23: abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yatha gauḥ śuklaḥ aśvaḥ ca .

GS24pmbhasuu:7969_1: . ahinā enam bhāyayati . hetubhaye iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . etat api hi hetubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7969_2: . hetubhaye iti na evam vijñāyate . hetoḥ bhayam hetubhayam . hetubhaye iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7969_3: tarhi . hetuḥ eva bhayam hetubhayam . hetubhaye iti . yadi saḥ eva hetuḥ bhayam bhavati iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:7971_1: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . sanaḥ prabhṛti ā mahiṅaḥ ṅakārāt . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7974: devadṛgbhiḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyayavijñānāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7976_0: KA_III.40.10-15 Ro_IV.365-366 śīrṣan chandasi prakṛtyantaram . śīrṣan chandasi prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:7976_1: draṣṭavyam . kim prayojanam . kim prayojanam . ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . ādeśaḥ mā vijñāyi
GS24pmbhasuu:7976_2: . prakṛtyantaram yathā vijñāyeta . kim ca syāt . askārāntasya chandasi śravaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:7976_3: syāt . śiraḥ me śīryaśaḥ mukham (R: śīryate mukhe )
GS24pmbhasuu:7977: . idam te śiraḥ bhinadmi iti . tat vai atharvaṇaḥ śiraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7979_0: KA_III.40.17-41.16 Ro_IV.366-368 ye ca taddhite śirasaḥ ādeśārtham . ye ca taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:7979_1: iti atra śirasaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam .ādeśārtham . ādeśaḥ yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7979_2: . prakṛtyantaram mā vijñāyi . kim ca syāt . yakārādau taddhite askārāntasya śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7979_3: prasajyeta . śīrṣaṇyaḥ hi mukhyaḥ bhavati . śīrṣaṇyaḥ kharaḥ . vā keśeṣu . vā keśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7980: śirasyāḥ . aci śīrṣaḥ . aci parataḥ śirasaḥ śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hāstiśīrṣiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_0: pailuśīrṣiḥ . chandasi ca . chandasi ca śirasaḥ śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dve śīrṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_1: . iha hāstiśīrṣyā pailuśīrṣyā iti śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_2: . astu . naḥ taddhite iti ṭilopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_3: iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ ye aci taddhite iti ucyeta . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_4: bhavati . iñi śīrṣanbhāve kṛte ṭilopena siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi sthūlaśirasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_5: idam sthaulaśīrṣam iti anaṇi iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_6: . na cet evam śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pākṣikaḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_7: . katarasmin pakṣe . ṣyaṅvidhau dvaitam bhavati . aṇiñoḥ vā ādeśaḥ ṣyaṅ aṇiñbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_8: vā paraḥ iti . tat yadā tāvad aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi aṇiñbhyām paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_9: na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati aṇiñbhyām vyavahitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_0: KA_III.41.19-42.6 Ro_IV.368-369 śasprabhṛtiṣu iti ucyate . aśasprabhṛtiṣu api dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_1: . śalā doṣaṇī . kakut doṣaṇī . yācate mahādevaḥ . padādiṣu māṃspṛtsnūnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_2: . padādiṣu māṃspṛtsnūnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māṃs . yat nīkṣaṇam māṃspacanyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_3: . māṃsapacanyāḥ iti prāpte . māṃs . pṛt. pṛtsu martyam . pṛtanāsu martyam iti prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_4: . pṛt . snu . na te divaḥ na pṛthivyaḥ adhi snuṣu . adhi sānuṣu iti prāpte . nas
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_5: nāsikāyāḥ yattaskṣudreṣu . yattaskṣudreṣu parataḥ nāsikāyāḥ nasbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_6: yat . nasyam . yat . tas . nastaḥ . tas. kṣudra . naḥkṣudraḥ . avarṇanagarayoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7984_7: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7985: nāsikyam nagaram . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ iti . parimukhādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . nāsikyam nagaram iti . saṅkāśādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7987: KA_III.42.8-43.10 Ro_IV.369-371 dhātugrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt : ṣoḍan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7989: ṣoḍikaḥ . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7990: peṣṭā peṣṭum . na etat asti prayojanam . astu atra satvam . satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya iti ṣatvam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:7991: laṣitā laṣitum . idam ca api udārharaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:7992_0: peṣṭā peṣṭum . nanu ca uktam astu atra satvam . satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7992_1: iti ṣatvam bhaviṣyati iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi pekṣyati iti ṣatvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7992_2: ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si iti katvam na syāt . sādeśe subdhātuṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatīnām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7995: ṣvaṣkate . subdhātūnām tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ dhātugrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati ṣoḍan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_0: ṣoḍikaḥ iti . upadeśe iti vartate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . ṣṭhiveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_1: api dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ . yadi ṭhakāraḥ teṣṭhīvyate iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_2: thakāraḥ . yadi thakāraḥ ṭuṣṭhyūṣati ṭeṣṭhīvyatie iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_3: imau ṣṭhivū . akasya dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ aparasya thakāraḥ . yasya thakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_4: tasya satvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi dvau imau dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_5: bhavati . pūrvasya satve kṛte pareṇa sannipāte ṣṭutvam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_6: . iha hi śvaliṭ ṣṭhīvati madhuliṭ ṣvaṣkate ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvāt ḍaḥ si dhuṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_7: dhuṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi yakārādī dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim yakāraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_8: śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ . atha kimartham ṣakāram upadiśya tasya sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_9: ādeśaḥ kriyate na sakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_10: ayam ṣakāram upadiśya sakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṣatvam nirvartayati ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_11: iti . itarathā hi yeṣām ṣatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam kartavyam syāt . ke punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_12: ṣopadeśāḥ dhātavaḥ . paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ . yadi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_13: pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:7997_14: . katham . ajdantyaparāḥ sādayaḥ ṣopadeśāḥ smiṅsvadisvidisvañjisvapayaḥ ca sṛpisṛjistṛstyāsekṛsṛvarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_0: KA_III.43.12-18 Ro_IV.372 atha kimartham ṇakāram upadiśya tasya nakāraḥ ādeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_1: na nakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham . aviśeṣeṇa ayam ṇakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_2: upadiśya nakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṇatvam nirvartayati upasargāt asamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_3: api ṇopadeśasya iti . itarathā hi yeṣām ṇatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_4: syāt . ke punaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ dhātavaḥ . paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_5: . yadi antareṇa pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_6: cit śakyate vaktum . katham . sarve nādayaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ nṛtinandinardinakkināṭināthṛnādhṛnṝvarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_0: KA_III.43.20-44.7 Ro_IV.372-374 vyoḥ lope kvau upasaṅkhyānam . vyoḥ lope kvau upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_1: kartavyam iha api yathā syāt . kaṇḍūyateḥ apratyayaḥ kaṇḍūḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_2: na sidhyati . vali iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca ayam kvip eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_3: valādiḥ bhavati . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_4: . kviblopaḥ kriyatām yalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kviblopaḥ nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_5: ca . nityaḥ khalu api kviblopaḥ . kṛte api yalope prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_6: paratvāt ca kviblopaḥ . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_7: pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam . yadi vā kāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_8: cit varṇāśrayāṇi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_9: vakṣyāmi . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali . tataḥ veḥ . vyantayoḥ ca vyoḥ lopaḥ bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8001_10: apṛktasya . apṛktasya ca lopaḥ bhavati . veḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8003: KA_III.44.8-45.2 Ro_IV.374-375 valopāprasiddhiḥ ūḍbhāvavacanāt . valopasya aprasiddhiḥ . āsremāṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8004_0: jīradānuḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . ūḍbhāvavacanāt . cchvoḥ śūṭ anunāsike ca iti ūṭh prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8004_1: . atiprasaṅgaḥ vraścādiṣu . vraścādiṣu ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . vraścanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8006_0: vraṇaḥ iti . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham . upadeśasāmarthyāt vraścādiṣu lopaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8006_1: . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham iti cet samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu sāmarthyam . upadeśasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8006_2: siddham iti cet asti anyat upadeśavacane prayojanam . samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu kṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8008_0: vivraściṣati iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8008_2: lopaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . anārambhaḥ vā . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ valopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8009: jīradānuḥ iti . āsremāṇam jīradānuḥ iti varṇalopāt . āsremāṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8010: jīradānuḥ iti chāndasāt varṇalopāt siddham . yathā saṃsphānaḥ gayasphānaḥ . tat yathā saṃsphayanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8014: KA_III.45.4-20 Ro_IV.375-376 darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8015_0: jāgṛviḥ . kim ucyate darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti yadā apṛktasya iti ucyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8015_1: . bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kriyamāṇam api codayanti . tat vā kartavyam darvijāgṛvyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8015_2: vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ anunāsikaparatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8015_3: veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8015_4: kasmāt na bhavati . anunāsikaparatvāt . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8015_5: atra anunāsikaparaḥ viśabdaḥ . śuddhaparaḥ ca atra viśabdaḥ . yadi anunāsikaparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8017: atra na prāpnoti . na hi etasmāt viśabdāt anunāsikam param paśyāmaḥ . anunāsikaparatvāt iti na evam vijñāyate . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8018: anunāsikaparatvāt iti . katham tarhi . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmin saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8020_0: atra prāpnoti . asiddhaḥ atra anunāsikaḥ . evam api dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8020_1: . ivi divi dhivi . dhātvantasya ca arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavataḥ viśabdasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8020_2: . na dhātvantaḥ arthavān . vasya vā anunāsikatvāt siddham . atha vā vakārasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8020_3: idam anunāsikasya grahaṇam . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8022_0: KA_III.46.2-47.12 Ro_IV.377-380 yadi punaḥ ayam apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8022_1: . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8022_2: . halantāt apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ yathā pacan iti . halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8022_3: apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ . rājā takṣā . saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8022_4: nalopaḥ na prāpnoti yathā pacan iti . tat yathā pacan,
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_0: yajan iti atra saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ na bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_1: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddhaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ nalope iti yat ayam na ṅisambuddhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_2: iti sambuddhau pratiṣedham śāsti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti pacan,
GS24pmbhasuu:8024: yajan . tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam bhavati . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yaḥ sambuddhau anantaraḥ . vasvādiṣu datvam saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt . vasvādiṣu datvam na sidhyati . ukhāsrat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8025: parṇadvhat . kim kāraṇam . saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt . saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān . yathā kūṭataṭ iti . tat yathā kūṭataṭ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_0: kāṣṭhataṭ iti atra saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān bhavati . nanu ca datve
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_1: kṛte na bhaviṣyati . asiddham datvam . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . siddhakāṇḍe paṭhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_2: vasvādiṣu datvam sau dīrghatve iti . tatra sau dīrghatvagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . vasvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_3: datvam iti eva . evam api apadāntatvāt na prāpnoti . atha sau api padam bhavati rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_4: takṣā nalope kṛte vibhakteḥ śravaṇam prāpnoti . sā eṣā ubhayataspāśā rajjuḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_5: . rāttalopaḥ niyamavacanāt . rāt tasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . abibhaḥ bhavān . ajāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_6: bhavān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . niyamavacanāt . rāt sasya iti etasmāt niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_7: na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . rāt sasya iti atra takāraḥ api nirdiśyate . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_8: kīrtayateḥ apratyayaḥ kīḥ iti prāpnoti . kīrt iti ca iṣyate . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:8026_9: . roḥ uttvam ca . roḥ uttvam ca vaktavyam . abhinaḥ atra,
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_0: acchinaḥ atra . saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt ataḥ ati iti uttrvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_1: na vā saṃyogāntalopasya uttve siddhatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . saṃyogāntalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_2: uttve siddhatvāt . saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati . yathā harivaḥ medinam
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_3: iti . tat yathā harivaḥ medinam tvā iti atra saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_4: . saḥ eva darhi doṣaḥ sā eṣā ubhayataspāśā . tasmāt aśakyaḥ apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_5: vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8029: KA_III.47.14-48.27 Ro_IV.380-383 sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . he katarat,
GS24pmbhasuu:8030_0: he katamat . kim ucyate ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti yadā apṛktasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8030_1: anuvartate . apṛktādhikārasya nivṛttatvāt . nivṛttaḥ apṛktādhikāraḥ . kim ḍatarādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8030_2: pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi iti apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na iti āha . tat ca amartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8030_3: . saḥ ca avaśyam apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyaḥ . kimartham . amartham . amaḥ lopaḥ yathā syāt . he kuṇḍa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_0: he pīṭha . nivṛtte api apṛktādhikāre amaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na hi lopaḥ sarvāpahārī
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_1: . mā bhūt sarvasya lopaḥ . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya lope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_2: dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt he kuṇḍa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8032_0: he pīṭha iti . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyate . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8032_1: atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti akārasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . akāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:8032_2: ca sati makāre ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatve he kuṇḍām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_0: he pīṭhām iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . evam tarhi halaḥ lopaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_1: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . halṅyābbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_2: dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_3: arthaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . eṅ hrasvāt iti eṣā pañcamī hal iti asyāḥ prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_4: prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam api prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_5: kṛte he pīṭhā iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . ami pūrvatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_6: . ami iti ucyate na ca atra amam paśyāmaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_7: . atha vā idam iha sampradhāryam . sambuddhilopaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_8: kartavyam . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ . evam api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt sambuddhilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_9: na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ bhaviṣyati . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_10: . na ubhayataḥ āśrayaḥ kariṣyate . katham . na evam vijñāyate . hrasvāt uttarasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_11: sambuddheḥ lopaḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . hrasvāt uttarasya halaḥ lopaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_12: saḥ cet sambuddheḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_13: . kim uktam . siddham anunāsikopadhatvāt iti . evam api dalopaḥ sādhīyaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_14: . dukkaraṇāt vā . atha vā duk ḍatarādīnām iti vakṣyāmi . ḍitkaraṇāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_15: ḍit ayam śabdaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ tarhi ḍakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_16: nyāse eva . dviḍakāraḥ nirdeśaḥ adḍ ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti . evam api lopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_17: vihitaviśeṣaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam . yasmāt hrasvāt sambuddhiḥ vihitā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8035: KA_III.49.1-10 Ro_IV.383-384 apṛktasambuddhilopābhyām luk . apṛktasambuddhilopābhyām luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . apṛktalopasya avakāśaḥ gomān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8037: jatu . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tat brāhmaṇakulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8038: yat brāhmaṇakulam . sambuddhilopasya avakāśaḥ he agne,
GS24pmbhasuu:8039: he vāyo . lukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . he trapu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_0: he jatu . luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_1: lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt yathā anaḍuhyate iti . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_2: kāraṇam . lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt . lopalukoḥ hi luk avadhāryate . luk lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_3: . yathā anaḍuhyate iti . tat yathā anaḍvān iva ācarati anaḍuhyate iti atra lopalukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8042: KA_III.49.12-19 Ro_IV.384 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8043: ta tā piṇḍānām iti . pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . na sidhyati . numā vyavahitatvāt pūrvasavarṇaḥ na prāpnoti . chandasi napuṃsakasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ madhoḥ gṛhṇāti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_0: mahoḥ tṛptā iva āsate iti evamartham . tatra pūṃvadbhāvena numaḥ nivṛttiḥ . numi
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_1: nivṛtte pūrvasavarṇena siddham . bhavet siddham agne trī te vajinā trī ṣadhasthā
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_2: iti . idam tu na sidhyati ta tā piṇḍānām iti . idam api siddham . katham . sāptamike
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_3: pūrvasavarṇe kṛte punaḥ ṣāṣṭhikaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api jasi guṇaḥ prāpnoti . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_4: etat . jasādiṣu chandovāvacanam prāk ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8046_0: KA_III.49.21-51.6 Ro_IV.385-386 tuki pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8046_1: ca . tuki pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca na sidhyati . ārāśastri chatram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8049_0: daśāratni chatram . tuke kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8049_1: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ tuk .
GS24pmbhasuu:8049_2: antaraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . idam tarhi grāmaṇiputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8050_0: senāniputraḥ iti hrasvatve kṛte tuk prāpnoti . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8050_1: ca aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt eva . atha vā parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8050_2: . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8050_3: . apacchāyāt . vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti etvam prasajyeta . vilopavacanam ca . veḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8051: somasut . apṛktasya iti veḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . apṛktagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi na kriyate darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8053_0: atra api prāpnoti . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam śuddhaparaḥ ca atra viśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8053_1: . evam api satukkasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na
GS24pmbhasuu:8053_2: bhaviṣyati . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . parītat . satukkasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8053_3: valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ . abhakte svaraḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8053_4: tarhi svare doṣaḥ bhavati . dadhi chādayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8054_0: madhu chādayati . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca tuk eva atiṅ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8054_1: tukaḥ parasya nighātaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8054_2: . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyukte ivayukte vā anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8054_3: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam
GS24pmbhasuu:8054_4: eva ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api atiṅ iti tiṅpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8054_5: anyasmāt atiṅaḥ tiṅsadṛśāt kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca anyat atiṅ tiṅsadṛśam . padam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8056_0: KA_III.51.8-11 Ro_IV.387-388 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . adhikaraṇam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:8056_1: triprakāram vyāpakam aupaśleṣikam vaiṣayikam iti . śabdasya ca śabdena kaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8056_2: abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ upaśleṣāt . ikaḥ yaṇ aci . aci upaśliṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8056_3: iti . tatra antareṇa saṃhitāgrahaṇam saṃhitāyām eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8058_0: KA_III.51.13-17 Ro_IV.388 atha kimartham āṅmāṅoḥ sānubandhakayoḥ nirdeśaḥ . āṅmāṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8058_2: nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅaḥ gatikarmapravacanīyasampratyayārthaḥ māṅaḥ pratiṣedhasampratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8059: āc chāyā . pramā chandaḥ , pramāc chandaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8061: KA_III.51.20-22 Ro_IV.389 dīrghāt padāntāt vā viśvajanādīnām chandasi . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti atra viśvajanādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . viśvajanasya chatram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8062: viśvajanasya cchatram . na chāyām kuravaḥ aparām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8065: KA_III.52.2-53.6 Ro_IV.389-391 iggrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . agnicit atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_0: somasut atra . na etat asti prayojanam . jaśtvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . jaśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_1: na siddham yaṇam atra paśya . asiddham atra jaśtvam . tasya asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_2: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_3: tasya prāpnoti . pacati iti . evam tarhi dīrghasya yaṇ . dīrghasya yaṇ ādeśam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_4: . tat dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_5: . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_6: . aci iti eṣā saptamī dīrghāt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:8066_7: pūrvasya iti . bhavet siddham kumārī atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8067: brahmabandhvartham iti . idam tu na sidhyati . dadhi atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8068_0: madhu atra iti . hrasvaḥ iti prtavṛttam . hrasvagrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8068_1: . kva prakṛtam . hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk iti . yadi tat anuvartate dīrghāt padāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8068_2: vā iti hrasvāt api padāntāt vikalpena prāpnoti . sambandhavṛttyā . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8068_3: . hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . saṃhitāyām hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . che ca hrasvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8068_4: piti kṛti tuk . āṅmāṅoḥ ca hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . dīrghāt padāntāt vā hrasvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8068_5: piti kṛti tuk . tataḥ ikaḥ yaṇ aci . hrasvyasya iti vartate . piti kṛti tuk iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8071: lāvakaḥ . ayādayaḥ atra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . iha tarhi prāpnoti khaṭvā indraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8074_0: mālā elakā . guṇavṛddhibādhyaḥ . guṇavṛddhī atra bādhike bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8074_1: prayojanam . ikaḥ aci yaṇ eva syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8074_2: anyat prāpnoti . śākalam . sinnityasamāsayoḥ śākalapratiṣedham codayiṣyati . sa na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8076: KA_III.53.7-54.4 Ro_IV.391-393 yaṇādeśaḥ plutapūrvasya ca . yaṇādeśaḥ plutapūrvasya ca iti vaktavyam . agnā3i* indram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_0: paṭā3v āśā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ plutavikārau ca imau
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_1: . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_2: plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_3: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_4: dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham . dīrghatvam śākalam ca mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_5: prayojanam . ārabhyate plutapūrvasya yaṇādeśaḥ tayoḥ yvau aci saṃhitāyām iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_6: dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham bhaviṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . nanu ca tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8083_7: api ucyamāne idam na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam idam vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau
GS24pmbhasuu:8085_0: bho3i iha bho3y iha iti . yad tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva vaktavyam . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8085_1: na vaktavyam . tat api avaśyam svarārtham vaktavyam . anena hi sati udāttasvaritayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8085_2: yaṇaḥ iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . tena punaḥ sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8085_3: tarhi tasya nibandhanam asti tat eva vaktavyam . idam na vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8085_4: idam api avaśyam vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau aplutavikārau tadartham . bho3i indram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8087: bho3i iha bho3y iha iti . chāndasam etat dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . yat tarhi na chāndasam bho3y indram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8088_0: bho3y iha iti sāma gāyati . eṣaḥ api chandasi dṛṣṭasya anuprayogaḥ kriyate . jaśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8088_1: na siddham yaṇam atra paśya . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ . dīrghasya yaṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:8088_2: . hrasvaḥ iti prtavṛttam . sambandhavṛttyā . guṇavṛddhibādhyaḥ . nitye ca yaḥ śākalabhāksamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:8088_3: tadartham etad bhagavān cakāra . sāmarthyayogāt na hi kim cit asmin paśyāmi śāstre
GS24pmbhasuu:8090_0: KA_III.54.6-16 Ro_IV.393-394 vāntādeśe sthāninirdeśaḥ . vāntādeśe sthāninirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8090_1: kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8090_2: . na kartavyaḥ . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . ecaḥ yi pratyaye ayādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8090_3: iti eva siddham . yadi vāntagrahaṇam na kriyate ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8091: jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . kṣijyoḥ eva iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt anyatra api prāpnoti . kṣeyam pāpam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8092: jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate . kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ tayoḥ ca śakyārthe eva iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti . lavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8095: avaśyapāvyam . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . kathañjātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . ekāraḥ . evam api rāyam icchati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8097: atra api prāpnoti . rāyiḥ chāndasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8099_0: KA_III.54.17-22 Ro_IV. 394 goḥ yūtau chandasi . goḥ yūtau chandasi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8099_1: kartavyam . a naḥ mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam . goyūtim iti eva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8099_2: . adhvaparimāṇe ca . adhvaparimāṇe ca goḥ yūtau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gavyūtim
GS24pmbhasuu:8099_3: adhvānam gataḥ . goyūtim iti eva anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:8101_0: KA_III.54.24-55.2 Ro_IV.394 evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ . na etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8101_1: . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:8101_2: bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . dhātoḥ tannimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8101_3: eva iti . mā evam vijñāyi . dhātoḥ eva tannimittasya iti . kim ca syāt . adhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8104: KA_III.55.4-5 Ro_IV.395 tat iti anena kim pratinirdiśyate . saḥ eva krīṇātyarthaḥ . iha mā bhūt . kreyam naḥ dhānyam . na ca asti krayyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_0: KA_III.55.7-17 Ro_IV.395-396 bhayyādiprakaraṇe hradayyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam . bhayyādiprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_1: hradayyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . hradayyāḥ āpaḥ . av śarasya ca . śarasya ca hradasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_2: ca ataḥ av vaktayaḥ . hradavyāḥ āpaḥ . śaravyāḥ vai tejanam . śaravyasya paśūn abhighātakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_3: syāt . śaruvṛttāt vā siddham . śaruvṛttāt vā siddham punaḥ siddham etat . ṛñjatī
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_4: śaruḥ iti api dṛśyate . ṛñjatī śaruḥ iti api śaruśabdapravṛttiḥ dṛśyate . śaruhastaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_5: iti ca loke . śaruhastaḥ iti ca loke śarahastam upācaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_0: KA_III.56.2-57.6 Ro_IV.396-398 ekavacanam kimartham . ekavacanam pṛthak ādeśapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_1: . ekavacanam kriyate ekaḥ ādeśaḥ yathā syāt . pṛthak ādeśaḥ mā bhūt iti . na vā dravyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_2: karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛtteḥ . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_3: . dravyavat karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛtteḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_4: yathā dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . anayoḥ pūlayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_5: kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti . na ca ucyate ekam iti ekam ca asau
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_6: karoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_7: . tat ca ekavākyabhāvāt . ekavākyabhāvāt dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_8: bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_9: ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_10: iti . yat tāvat ucyate ekavākyabhāvāt iti tat na . arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_11: ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca arthāt prakaraṇāt vā . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_12: dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_13: ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . katham yat tat uktam vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_14: ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_15: ram anyatarasyām iti . iha tāvat jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca iti . stām
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_16: dvau ūṭhau . na asti doṣaḥ . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . iha bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_17: ram anyatarasyām iti . vakṣyati hi etat . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ lopaḥ āgamaḥ ram vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_18: iti . yat ucyate arthāt prakaraṇāt vā iti tat na . kim kāraṇam . ekavākyabhāvāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_19: loke dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt . aṅga hi bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_20: grāmyam pāṃsulapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu anayoḥ pūlayoḥ kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_21: mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti . ekam eva asau kariṣyati . katham yat uktam vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_22: api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_23: ca daḥ . ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . iha tāvat radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_24: iti dve vākye . katham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8108_25: pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . iha ubhau sābhyāsasya iti ubhaugrahaṇasāmarthyāt dvau ādeśau bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_0: KA_III.57.7-58.17 Ro_IV.399-402 tatra avayave śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ yathā loke ṭatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_1: avayave śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ prāpnoti yathā loke . tat yathā loke . vasante brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_2: agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_3: . tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti sakṛt upanīya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_4: punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ adbhiḥ aśabdābhiḥ upaspṛśet
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_5: iti sakṛt upaspṛśya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_6: iha api khaṭvendre kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā mālendrādiṣu na syāt . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_7: dharmopadeśane anavayavavijñānāt yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_8: dharmopadeśanam idam śāstram . dharmopadeśane ca asmin śāstre anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_9: sampratīyate yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_0: brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_1: ca na pīyate . yadi ca avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam ca brāhmaṇam ahatvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_2: ekām ca surām apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_3: iti pūrvavayomātram pratyutthīyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_4: pūrvavayasam pratyutthāya anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā vede khalu api . vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_5: brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam vasante vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_6: ijyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt sakṛt iṣṭvā punaḥ ijyā na pravarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_7: . ubhayathā iha loke dṛśyate . avayavena api śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ anavayavena api
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_8: . katham punaḥ idam ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . iha tāvat vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_9: brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti . agnyādhānam yajñamukhaprtipattyartham . sakṛt ādhāya
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_10: kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ pratipannam yajñam iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_11: atra avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_12: . upanayanam saṃskārārtham . sakṛt ca asau upanītaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ bhavati . ataḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_13: api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ adbhiḥ aśabdābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_14: upaspṛśet iti . upasparśanam śaucārtham . sakṛt ca asau upaspṛśya śuciḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_15: ataḥ atra api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . iha idānīm brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_16: . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇavadhe surāpāne ca mahān doṣaḥ uktaḥ . saḥ brāhmaṇavadhamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_17: surāpānamātre ca prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_18: pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ iti . pūrvavayasaḥ apratyutthāne doṣaḥ uktaḥ pratyutthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_19: ca guṇaḥ . katham . ūrdhvam prāṇāḥ hi utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavire āyati . pratyutthānābhābhivādābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_20: punaḥ tān pratipadyate iti . saḥ ca prūrvavayomātre prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra api anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_21: śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_22: iti ijyāyāḥ kim cit prayojanam uktam . kim . svarge loke apsarasaḥ enam jāyāḥ bhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_23: upaśerate iti . tat ca dvitīyasyāḥ tṛtīyasyāḥ ca ijyāyāḥ bhavitum arhati . ataḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_24: api anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā śabdasya api jñāne prayoge prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_25: uktam . kim . ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_26: bhavati iti . yadi ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke
GS24pmbhasuu:8111_27: kāmadhuk bhavati kimartham dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca prayujyate . na vai kāmānām tṛptiḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_0: KA_III.58.18-59.8 Ro_IV.402-403 atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . pūrvaparagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_1: parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_2: . parasya ādeśaḥ mā bhūt . āt guṇaḥ iti . katham ca prāpnoti . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_3: parasya . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_4: apaḥ īt iti . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham tu . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham ca pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_5: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā pakalpeta . anirdiṣṭe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_6: hi pūrvaparagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya aprasiddhiḥ syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_7: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āt iti eṣā pañcamī aci iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_8: iti uttarasya iti . tathā ca aci iti eṣā saptamī āt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_9: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8113_10: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ubhe yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:8114: saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ iti . saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_0: KA_III.59.10-60.6 Ro_IV. 404-406 kimartham idam ucyate . antādivadvacanam āmiśrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_1: ādeśavacanāt . antādivat iti ucyate āmiśrasya ādeśavacanāt . āmiśrasya ayam ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_2: ucyate . saḥ na eva pūrvagrahaṇena gṛhyate na api paragrahaṇena . tat yathā kṣīrodake
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_3: sampṛkte āmiśratvāt na eva kṣīragrahaṇena gṛhyate na api udakagrahaṇena . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_4: ca grahaṇam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti antādivacvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_5: evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yasya antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_6: tannirdeśaḥ . tatra yasya antādivadbhāvaḥ iṣyate tannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . asya antavat
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_7: bhavati asya ādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam . siddham tu pūrvaparādhikārāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_8: etat . katham . pūrvaparādhikārāt . pūrvaparayoḥ iti vartate . pūrvasya kāryam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_9: antavat bhavati . parasya kāryam prati ādivat bhavati . atha yatra ubhayam āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_10: kim tatra pūrvasya antavat bhavati āhosvit parasya ādivat bhavati . ubhayataḥ āśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_11: na antādivat . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . laukikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_12: ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ . tat yathā loke yaḥ dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati saḥ tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_13: paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tu tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu ca kārye
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_14: bhavataḥ tatra yadi asau avirodhāṛthī bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8116_15: kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti . yaugapadyāsambhavāt . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_0: KA_III.60.7-63.7 Ro_IV.406-411 atha antavattve kāni prayojanāni . antavattve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_1: bahvacpūrvapadāt ṭhajvidhāne . antavattve bahvacpūrvapadāt ṭhajvidhāne prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_2: . dvādaśānyikaḥ . pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ekādeśaḥ pūrvapadasaya antavat bhavati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_3: śakyeta kartum bahucpūrvapadāt ṭhac bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_4: ekādeśe bahvacpūrvapadam bhavati . tarayodaśānyikaḥ . pratyayaikādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_5: . pratyayaikādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau prayojanam . madhu pibanti . śidaśitoḥ ekādeśaḥ śitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_6: antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum śiti iti pibādeśaḥ . kva tarhi syāt . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8118_7: ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . pibati . vaibhaktasya ṇatve . vaibhaktasya ṇatve prayojanam . kṣīrapeṇa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8119_0: surāpeṇa . uttarapadavibhaktyoḥ ekādeśaḥ uttarapadasya antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8119_1: kartum ekājuttarapade ṇaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kṣīrapāṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8120: surāpāṇam . adasaḥ īttvottve . adasaḥ īttvottve prayojanam . amī atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8123_0: amū āsāte . adasvibhaktyoḥ ekādeśaḥ adasaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum adasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8123_1: aseḥ dāt u daḥ maḥ etaḥ īt bahuvacane iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . amībhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8125: hāryā . tidatiroḥ ekādeśaḥ titaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum tit svaritam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8126_0: hāryaḥ . svaritatvam vipratiṣedhāt . svaritatvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8126_1: . paratvāt svaritatvam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8126_2: nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api svaritatve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . anyathāsvarasya

GS24pmbhasuu:8135_0: prāśitā . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ ca avaśyam vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_1: āśrayayitavyaḥ . ekādeśe hi a prasiddhiḥ uttarapadasya aparatvāt . yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_2: astu atra ekādeśaḥ ekādeśe kṛte kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati iti kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_3: tasya na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadasya aparatvāt . na hi idānīm ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_4: kṛte uttarapadam param bhavati . nanu ca antādivadbhāvena param . ubhayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8136: āśraye na antādivat . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ca ekādeśāt . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ca ekādeśāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . uttarapadavṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ pūrvatraigartakaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_0: aparaiṣukāmaśaḥ . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ekādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_1: antaraṅgabalīyastvāt . ekādeśaḥ tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgasya balīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_2: . antaraṅgam balīyaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra vṛddhividhānam . tatra vṛddhiḥ vidheyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_3: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvottarapadayoḥ tāvat kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_4: na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_5: jñāpakam . indre dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya īti ca iti lopena hriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_6: . tataḥ anackaḥ indraḥ sampannaḥ . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vṛddheḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_7: pūrvapadottarapadyoḥ tāvatkāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti tataḥ na indrasya parasya

GS24pmbhasuu:8166_2: na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet tat na

GS24pmbhasuu:8173_0: apace chatram . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_1: . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kutaḥ . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_2: . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_3: ekādeśaḥ . yadi padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi ,

GS24pmbhasuu:8177: atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . katham susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi ,

GS24pmbhasuu:8178_1: ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati

GS24pmbhasuu:8179_0: parivīṣu iti atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti . tulyajātīyakasya jñāpakam . kim ca tuljyajātīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8179_1: . yaḥ kupvoḥ . yadi evam veñaḥ apratyaye parataḥ uḥ iti prāpnoti ut iti ca iṣyate

GS24pmbhasuu:8179_3: ca padāntasya iti . katham tarhi . parasya ca padādeḥ pūrvasya ca padāntasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8181: KA_III.66.25-68.3 Ro_IV.418-420 guṇagrahaṇam kimartham na āt ekaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena . āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena idānīm bhaviṣyati . khaṭvendraḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:8184_1: . aidautau api tarhi prapnutaḥ . aidautau na eci tau uktau . aidautau na bhaviṣyataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8198_3: ca aprāpte eṅi pararūpam iyam vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate . āṅi pararūpe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:8198_4: ca . athavā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti iyam vṛddhiḥ eṅi pararūpam

GS24pmbhasuu:8341_0: plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat pūrvasmin yoge dīrghagrahaṇam tat uttaratra nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_1: . evam api idam iha pūrvasavarṇagrahaṇam kriyate . tena ami api pūrvasavarṇaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8342_0: plakṣam . dvimātraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8342_1: savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate kutaḥ vyavasthā . āntaryataḥ . yadi evam agnī vāyū trimātraḥ prāpnoti vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8343_0: plakṣam dvimātraḥ . tasmāt savarṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8343_1: anuvartate . tasmin anuvartamāne ami pūrvaḥ iti api vaktavyam . atha kimartham pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:8343_2: ucyate na iha eka eva ucyeta . prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ ami ca iti . yadi prathamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8343_3: pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ami ca iti ucyate tana ami api dīrghaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8344_0: plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghagrahaṇam nivartayiṣyate . evam api pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8344_1: prasajyeta . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8344_2: yoge vipratiṣiddham . yadi pūrvaḥ na dīrghaḥ atha dīrghaḥ na pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ dīrghaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8349_2: pararūpam svarasandhiṣu . ādguṇayaṇādeśau utsargau . tayoḥ apavādāḥ vṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvasavarṇādeśāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8349_6: . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8352_0: etān gāḥ caturaḥ balivardān paśya] iti . astu tarhi ekayogaḥ eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_1: ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ijgrahaṇam tu jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_2: pararūpābhāvasya . yat ayam na āt ici iti ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_3: na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ijgrahaṇasya idam prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_0: plakṣān . yadi ca jaśśasoḥ pararūpam syāt ijgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_1: ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . tataḥ ijgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_2: jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . dīrghāt jasi ca ici ca iti . yadi uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_3: etat syāt atra eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam kurvīta . iha api tarhi kriyamāṇam yadi uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_4: na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi yadi uttarārtham etat syāt na eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_5: kurvīta na api jasgrahaṇam . etāvat ayam brūyāt . dīrghāt śasi pūrvasavarṇaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_6: iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dīrghāt śasi eva na anyatra iti . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_7: laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe yat ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_8: pararūpam bhavati iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogavibhāgaḥ . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_9: anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ami api yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_10: kariṣyate . ami . ami yat uktam tat na bhavati iti . tataḥ pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_11: ami iti . yat api ucyate nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt iti . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_12: arhati tasmāt iti anena anantaram yogam pratinirdeṣṭum . evam kila pratinirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_13: . tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt iti . tat ca na . evam pratinirdiśyate . tasmāt akaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_14: savarṇāt iti . atha vā tasmāt prathamyoḥ dīrghāt iti . atha vā punaḥ astu ami ekayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_15: . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_16: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_17: pararūpam bādhiṣyate ami pūrvatvam na bādhiṣyate . yadi etat asti madhye apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_18: purastāt apavādāḥ iti na arthaḥ ekena api yogavibhāgena . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_19: vidhīn bādhante iti evam pararūpam savarṇadīrghatvam bādhiṣyate prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_20: na bādhiṣyate . atha vā saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_21: supi ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi bahuvacane . bahuvacane ca ataḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati . ekāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_22: ca bhavati bahuvacane jhali iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . vṛṣāṇām ,

GS24pmbhasuu:8450_6: kriyate karotiḥ ca kakārādiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca lpunaḥ ātideśikaḥ karotiḥ akakārādiḥ . pākṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_7: ayam doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe . suḍvidhau dvaitam bhavati . aviśeṣeṇa vā vihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_8: suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham syāt viśeṣeṇa vā vidhiḥ iti . dvirvacanavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_9: ca api dvaitam bhavati . sthāne dvirvacanam syāt dviḥ prayogaḥ vā dvirvacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_10: . tat yadā dviḥ prayogaḥ dvirvacanam aviśeṣeṇa vihitasya ca suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_11: deśaprakḷptyartham tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi sthāne dvirvacanam tadā yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_12: vihitasya suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham atha api viśeṣavidhiḥ na tadā

GS24pmbhasuu:8450_14: pañcamī . kā tarhi . tṛtīyā . samparibhyām upasṛṣṭasya iti . vyavahitaḥ ca api upasṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_15: bhavati . upadeśivadvacanam ca . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .

GS24pmbhasuu:8451_0: sañcaskaruḥ . caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhārtham ca . samaciskarat . liṭi guṇārthena tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8451_1: na arthaḥ . vakṣyati etat saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhāgrahaṇam kṛñartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8451_2: . caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhena api na arthaḥ . padam iti iyam bhagavataḥ kṛtrimā sañjñā

GS24pmbhasuu:8451_5: . na etat sāram . pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa . sādhanam hi

GS24pmbhasuu:8451_7: viśeṣaḥ śakyam kartūm . satyam evam etat . yaḥ tu asau dhātūpasargayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8451_8: tam abhyantaram kṛtvā dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8451_9: yaḥ hi manyate pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa iti tasya āsyate guruṇā iti

GS24pmbhasuu:8507_0: KA_III.101.6-12 Ro_IV.494 kimartham kṛṣateḥ vikṛtasya grahaṇam kriyate na kṛṣātvataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8510: dhāyaḥ iti yukā vyavadhānam . evam api vihitaviṣeṣanam ākāragrahaṇam vijñāyeta . ākārāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . matubgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_0: KA_III.101.14-102.2 Ro_IV.494-495 anudāttasya iti kimartham . prāsaṅgam vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_1: . udāttalope svaritodāttayoḥ abhāvāt anudāttagrahaṇānarthakyam . udāttalope svaritodāttayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_2: abhāvāt anudāttagrahaṇam anarthakam . ha hi kaḥ cit udāttaḥ udātte svarite vā lupyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_3: . sarvaḥ anudātte eva . nan ca ayam udāttaḥ svarite lupyate . prāsaṅgam vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_4: iti . eṣaḥ api nighāte kṛte anudātte eva lupyate . idam iha sampradhāryam . nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_5: kriyatām lopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi ayam adya nighātasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_6: sarvasvarāṇām apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ bhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_7: abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_8: . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit thāthādisvaraḥ bhavati . apavādam nighātam pratīkṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_9: . tatra nighātaḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodāttaḥ anudāttaḥ lupyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:8523_1: uktam dhātoḥ antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_2: . anudātte ca grahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva . abhyastānām ādiḥ anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_3: ca iti . bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . pibau nipātanāt . pibau ādyudāttanipātanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_4: . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . san ca nit kartavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_5: . avaśyam sanaḥ viśeṣaṇārthaḥ nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . sanyaṅoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8526_1: arthaḥ na ādiśyate anirdiṣṭārthāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti antataḥ svārthe bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:8527_1: . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . atha vā dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ saśabdāntasya dve bhavataḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:8538_0: KA_III.104.9-22 Ro_IV.500-501 jasaḥ iti kimartham . tisṛkā . tisṛbhyaḥ jasgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_1: anyatra abhāvāt . tisṛbhyaḥ jasgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anyatra abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_2: . na hi anyat tisṛśabdāt antodāttatvam prayojayati anyat ataḥ jasaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_3: . bahuvacanaviṣayaḥ eva tisṛśabdaḥ . tena ekavacanadvivacane na staḥ . śasi bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_4: udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tatra ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_5: halādiḥ jhali upottamam iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . tatra antareṇa jasaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_6: jasaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam tisṛkā iti . nitsvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_7: bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte anyasvare tisṛsvaraḥ ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_8: suppitau iti etam svaram bādhate evam nitsvaram api bādheta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_9: na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte anudāttau suppitau iti etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_10: tisṛsvaraḥ ārabhyate . nitsvaraḥ punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_11: pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam tisṛsvaraḥ anudāttau suppitau iti svaram bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8538_12: nitsvaram na bādhiṣyate . upasamastārtham eke jasaḥ grahaṇam icchanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_0: KA_III.105.2-106.7 Ro_IV.502-504 śasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . catasraḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_1: . caturaḥ śasi striyām apratiṣedhaḥ ādyudāttanipātanāt . caturaḥ śasi striyām apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_2: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . śasi svaraḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ādyudāttanipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_3: . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ śasi svarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_4: . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva nipātanasvaraḥ śasi svaram bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_5: evam vibhaktisvaram api bādheta catasṛṇam iti . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca halādigrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_6: . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca siddhaḥ . kutaḥ . halādigrahaṇāt . yat ayam ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_7: halādiḥ iti halādigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na nipātanasvaraḥ vibhaktisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_8: bādhate iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ādyudāttanipātane hi halādigrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_9: . ādyudāttanipātane hi sati halādigrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . na hi anyat halādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_10: prayojayati anyat ataḥ catasṛśabdāt . ṣaṭsañjñāḥ tāvat na prayojayanti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_11: . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . jaśśasī ca atra lupyete
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_12: . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . triśabdaḥ ca api na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_13: . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_14: vacanāt jasi na bhaviṣyati . śasi bhavitavyam ekādeśe udāttena udāttaḥ iti . anyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_15: sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tisṛśabdaḥ ca api na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_16: . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_17: . śasi bhavitavyam udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_18: . catuḥśabdaḥ tisṛśabdaḥ ca api na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_19: . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_20: . śasi bhavitavyam caturaḥ śasi iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_21: catasṛśabdāt ekasmāt śas asarvanāmasthānam ajādiḥ vibhaktiḥ asti . yadi ca atra nipātanasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_22: syāt halādigrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . na eva vā punaḥ atra śasisvaraḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_23: kim kāraṇam . yaṇādeśe kṛte śasaḥ pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā . avaśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_24: tarhi prāpnoti . ṛkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yaṇādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam

GS24pmbhasuu:8541_26: prati na sthānivat bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ asti pratiṣedhaḥ . uktam etat pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_0: KA_III.106.9-18 Ro_IV.504-505 sau iti kim idam prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_1: saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_2: . katham jñāyate . yat ayam na gośvansāvavarṇa iti gośunoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_3: kṛtvā jñāpakam . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam syāt gośunoḥ pratiṣedhavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_4: anarthakam syāt . nanu ca arthasiddhiḥ eva eṣā . anugṛhītāḥ smaḥ yaiḥ asmābhiḥ prathamaikavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_5: āsthāya gośunoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . bhavet pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_6: doṣāḥ tu bhavanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . svinā khinā . antodāttatvam na prāpnoti . svinkhinau
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_7: na staḥ . uktam etat ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām ca na tau smṛtau . svavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8544: khavān iti eva bhavitavyam . iha tarhi yādbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8545: yābhiḥ iti na sidhyati . tasmāt saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_0: KA_III.106.19-25 Ro_IV.505-506 sau ekācaḥ udāttatve tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . sau ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_1: udāttatve tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvayā mayā . siddham tu yasmāt tṛtīyādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_2: tasya abhāvāt sau . siddham etat . katham . yasmāt atra tṛtīyādiḥ vibhaktiḥ na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_3: sau asti . yadi api etat sau na asti prakṛtiḥ tu asya sau asti . prakṛteḥ ca anekāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_4: . yadi api tasya prakṛtiḥ asti sau anekāc tu sā bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:8555_1: ādadhīta . dīrghāt iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati aṣṭasu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8555_3: ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva dīrghāt bādhate evam hrasvāt api bādheta . na dīrghāt ṣaṭsvaraḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8555_6: jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_7: . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . ākārāntasya nuḍartham . ākārāntasya nuḍ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_8: bhavati . aṣṭānām iti . nanu ca nityam ātvam . etat eva jñāpayati vibhāṣā ātvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_9: yat ayam dīrghagrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi aṣṭanaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
