GS24pmbhasuu:8559_2: nakārāntārtham . nakārāntāt api yathā syāt . vākpatnī citpatnī . halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8559_3: ca samudāyādeśatvāt . halpūrvagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāṛaṇam . samudāyādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8559_4: . samudāyaḥ atra ādeśaḥ . svaritatve ca avacanāt . svaritatve ca halpūrvagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8559_5: avacanāt manyāmahe halpūrvagrahaṇam anarthakam iti . yat tāvat ucyate udāttayaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8559_6: halgrahaṇam nakārāntārtham iti kriyate nyāse eva . dvinakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . udāttayaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8559_7: halpūrvāt na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti . yat api ucyate halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam ca samudāyādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8559_8: iti . ayam asti kevalaḥ ādeśaḥ . bahutitavā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8561_0: KA_III.108.18-21 Ro_IV.510 matubudāttatve regrahaṇam . matubudāttatve regrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8561_1: kartavyam . ā revān etu naḥ viśaḥ . tripratiṣedhaḥ ca . treḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8563: KA_III.109.2-21 Ro_IV.510-512 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kiśorīṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8564: kumārīṇām . hrasvāt iti vartate . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . agnīnām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8565_0: vāyūnām . kim kāraṇam . dīrghatve kṛte hrasvābhāvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8565_1: kriyatām svaraḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . evam tarhi nāmsvare
GS24pmbhasuu:8565_2: matau hrasvagrahaṇam . nāmsvare matau hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam . matau hrasvāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8565_3: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . āha ayam hrasvāntāt na ca nāmi hrasvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8566: hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . sāmpratikābhāve bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate ayam ca asti sāmpratikaḥ : tisṛṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_0: catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_1: . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_2: . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ nām udāttaḥ bhavati . tataḥ halādiḥ . halādiḥ ca vibhaktiḥ udāttā
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_3: bhavati ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ iti . idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_4: atra api nṛ ca anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_5: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . jhalgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_6: tatra anuvartate . iha mā bhūt . nrā nre . udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_7: atra svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi nari . na ekam udāharam hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_8: prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt nām iti eva brūyāt . tatra vacanāt bhūtapūrvagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_9: vijñāsyate . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate . nām svarau
GS24pmbhasuu:8567_10: matau hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . katham tarhi . nāmsvare matau hrasvāt iti vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8569_0: KA_III.109.23-110.11 Ro_IV.512-513 sau iti kim prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8569_1: saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . purastāt eṣaḥ nirṇayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8569_2: saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam iti . iha api tat eva bhavitum arhati . yadi saptamībahuvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8570: yābhyām brāhmaṇābhyām atra na prāpnoti . vidhiḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi etat bhavati yat sau rūpam . idam tarhi tebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8571_0: yebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ . vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ tu na prāpnoti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8571_1: punaḥ kim cit sati iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_0: tābhyaḥ brāhmaṇībhyaḥ iti vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca . asti tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_1: prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam tena iti svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_2: puṃsi na sidhyati . na ca avaśyam puṃsi eva striyām puṃsi napuṃsake ca . tena brāhmaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_3: tayā brāhmaṇyā tena kuṇḍena iti . saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇe api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_4: ubhābhyām eva pratiṣedhe yattatadoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam . na gośvansāvavarṇarāḍaṅkruṅkṛdbhyaḥ yattadoḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8574: KA_III.13-24 Ro_IV.514-515 titi pratyayagrahaṇam . titi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ . kirati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8575_0: girati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8575_1: . yadi dakāraḥ āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8575_2: na iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yadi bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti ucyate adasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_0: amūbhyām iti atra na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ukāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_1: bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam iti yat ayam divaḥ ut iti ukāram taparam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_2: . evamartham eva tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam atra mā bhūt iti . na eṣaḥ takāharaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_3: . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . yadi dakāraḥ na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi taparaḥ tatkālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_4: iti dakāraḥ api cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . yadi evam cartvasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_5: iti uttvam prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā asaṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8579_0: KA_III.111.3-16 Ro_IV.515-517 adupadeśāt iti kim idam vijñāyate . akāraḥ yaḥ upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8579_1: iti āhosvit akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate akāraḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8580_0: hathaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8580_1: bhavati . nanu ca akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti vijñāyamāne api atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8580_2: etat api hi vyapadeśivadbhāvena akārāntam bhavati upadeśe . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8580_3: . yadi tarhi akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti vijñāyate mā hi dhukṣātām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_0: mā hi dhuṣāthām atra api prāpnoti . astu . anudāttatve kṛte lope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_1: siddham . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . adnudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_2: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam adya lasārvadhādukānudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_3: pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_4: apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_5: abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_6: lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam pratīkṣate . tatra ānudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_7: atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodātte
GS24pmbhasuu:8583_0: KA_III.111.17-23 Ro_IV.517 tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatve saptamīnirdeśaḥ abhyastasijarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8583_1: . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatve saptamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . lasārvadhātuke iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8583_2: . kim prayojanam . abhyastasijarthaḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati lasārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:8583_3: . sijantasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati lasārvadhātuke . lasārvadhātukam iti ucyamāne tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8583_4: eva ādyudāttatvam syāt . yadi saptamīnirdeśaḥ kriyate tāsyādīnām eva anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8583_5: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tāsiyādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī lasārvadhātuke iti saptamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8583_6: ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8585: KA_III.111.24-113.8 Ro_IV.518-520 citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam vipratiṣedhena . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya avakāśaḥ calanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8586: copanaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ . āste śete . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āsīnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_0: śayānaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_1: . kim kāraṇam . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_2: ādeḥ anudāttatvam antasya udāttatvam . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_3: . kim tarhi. asambhavaḥ api . nanu ca atra api asti sambhavaḥ . ādeḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_4: antasya udāttatvam iti . asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . na eṣaḥ asti sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_5: . vakṣyati etat svaravidhau saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . mukaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8588_0: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8588_1: na prāpnoti . nanu ca ayam muk adupadeśabhaktaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8588_2: sidhyati . aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8588_3: muk adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum . atha ayam adbhaktaḥ syāt gṛhyeta ayam adupadeśagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8588_4: . bāḍham gṛhyeta . adbhaktaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . tat katham . vakṣyati etasya parihāram
GS24pmbhasuu:8588_5: . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . idbhiḥ ca vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8589: paṭhataḥ . itaḥ ca anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . yadi anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . attaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_0: juhutaḥ iti . adupadeśāt iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . tatra adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_1: apratiṣedhaḥ sthānyādeśābhāvāt . tatra adiprabhṛtibhyaḥ juhotyādibhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_2: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sthānyādeśābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_3: . na eva atra sthāninam na eva ādeśam paśyāmaḥ . anudāttaṅidgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_4: yat ayam anudāttaṅidgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na luptavikaraṇebhyaḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_5: bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . śnanartham etat syāt . vindāte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8591: khindāte . yat tarhi ṅidgrahaṇam karoti . na hi śnamvikaraṇaḥ ṅit bhavati . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8594_0: punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8594_1: sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8594_2: pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8598: KA_III.113.10-12 Ro_IV.520-521 sicaḥ ādyudāttatve aniṭaḥ pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . sicaḥ ādyudāttatve aniṭaḥ pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . mā hi karṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8599: mā hi kārṣam . aniṭaḥ iti kimartham . mā hi laviṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8601_0: KA_III.113.14-17 Ro_IV.521 svapādīnām vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ vipratiṣedhena . svapādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:8601_1: vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svapādīnām vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8602: dadhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . jagrati . abhyastasvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:8604_0: KA_III.113.19-22 Ro_IV.521 anudātte ca iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ lopayaṇādeśārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8604_1: anudātte ca iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . avidyamānodātte iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8604_2: prayojanam . lopayaṇādeśārtham . lopayaṇādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8606: KA_III.114.2-3 Ro_IV.522 sarvasvaraḥ anackasya . sarvasvaraḥ anackasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt sarvake .
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_0: KA_III.114.6-115.2 Ro_IV.522-525 bhyādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_1: dadhāti . na etat asti prayojanam . abhyastasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . antataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_2: ubhayam syāt . anavakāśāḥ khalu api vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca abhyastasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_3: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . mimīte . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . pratyayāt pūrvasya udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_4: yathā syāt . āṭaḥ pūrvasya mā bhūt iti . bibhayāni . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_5: vā pūrvasya udāttatve sati āṭaḥ vā . api ca pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_6: idam tarhi prayojanam . pratyayāt pūrvasya udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ eva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_7: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_8: siddhe sati yat pratyayagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau saṅghātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_9: kāryī bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_10: vipratiṣedhena iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati . atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham na
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_11: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_12: yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau saptamyaḥ tadantasaptamyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_13: bhavanti iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . upottamam riti ridantasya . caṅi anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_14: caṅantasya . yadi etat jñāpyate caturaḥ śasi iti śasantasya api prāpnoti . śasgrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_15: na bhaviṣyati . itarathā hi tatra eva ayam brūyāt ūḍidampadādyappumraidyubhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_16: ca iti . atha pidgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . jāgrati. na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_17: . bhavati eva atra pūrveṇa . idam tarhi prayojanam daridrati . ākāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_18: na bhaviṣyati . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvād vyavadhānam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_19: pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svarasandhim prati na sthānivat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_0: KA_III.115.4-21 Ro_IV.525-526 yaki rapare upasaṅkhyānam . yaki rapare upasaṅkhyānamkartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_1: . stīryate svayam eva . upadeśavacanāt siddham . upadeśe iti vaktavyam . upadeśavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_2: janādīnām . upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati . jayate svayam eva . jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_3: svayam eva . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ajantānām kartṛyaki
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_4: vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . cīyate svayam eva . ciyate svayam eva . jayate svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_5: . jāyate svayam eva . tataḥ upadeśe . upadeśe ca ajantānām kartṛyaki vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_6: bhavati . stīryate svayam eva . stīryate svayam eva . tat tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_7: . na hi antareṇa upadeśagrahaṇam yogāṅgam jāyate . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_8: . kva prakṛtam . tāsyanudāttenṅidadupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam ahnviṅoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_9: . nanu ca uktam upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_10: na evam vijñāyate upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_11: janādīnām api āttve upadeśavacanam kartavyam . tat tarhi tatra upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8610_12: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:8612_0: KA_III.115.23-116.1 Ro_IV.526 seḍgrahaṇam kimartham na thali iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8612_1: . iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta papaktha . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8612_2: . acaḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam yayātha iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_0: KA_III.116.3-21 Ro_IV.527-528 kimartham idam ucyate na ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_1: siddham . ñniti iti ucyate na ca atra ñnitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_2: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . aṅgādhikāroktasya saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_3: aṅgasya iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati upamānasya ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam anubandhalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_4: svare pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhasya . upamānasya ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakārtham kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_5: . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anubandhalakṣaṇe svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_6: bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . gargaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8620: ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt iti . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:8622: taddhitasya kitaḥ iti antodāttatvam na bhavati . yadi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti ucyate pathipriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8624: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ jñāpayati svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarpiḥ āgaccha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8625: sapta āgacchata iti : āmantritasya ca iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . iha ca : ma hi datām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8627: ādiḥ sicaḥ anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ saptamīnirdiṣṭe svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarvastomaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8629: sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti eva . katham pathipriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8631: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne luki lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8633: KA_III.116.23-117.12 Ro_IV.529-530 niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dattābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8634: guptābhyām . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ atra dīrghaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8635_0: antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . antareṇa pratiṣedham antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8635_1: ca etām paribhāṣām siddham . katham . na evam vijñāyate na cet ākārāntā niṣṭhā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8635_2: . katham tarhi . na cet ākārāt parā niṣṭhā iti . yadi evam nirdeśaḥ ca eva na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8635_3: . na hi eṣā ākārāt parā pañcamī yuktā . iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8636: rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na cet avarṇāt parā niṣṭhā iti . bhavet nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ . iha tu prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8637: rāddhaḥ iti . iha ca na prāpnoti . yataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8638: rataḥ . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam akāragrahaṇam . na cet akārārāntāt vihitā niṣṭhā iti . evam api dattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8639: atra na prāpnoti iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8640: rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi kāryiviśeṣaṇam akāragrahaṇam . na cet ākārāraḥ kāryī bhavati . evam api adya aṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8642: atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8645_0: KA_III.117.14-19 Ro_IV.530 kim nipātyate . āśite kartari nipātanam upadhādīrhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8645_1: ādyudāttatvam ca . āśitaḥ iti ktaḥ kartari nipātyate upadhādīrhatvam . āśitavān āśitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8645_2: . ādyudāttatvam ca nipātyate . ādyudāttatvam anipātyam . adhikārāt siddham . upadhādīrhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8645_3: anipātyam . āṅpūrvasya prayogaḥ . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8645_4: anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8647: KA_III.117.22-118.3 Ro_IV.531 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām upamānam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8648_0: niṣṭhā ca dvyac anāt iti nitye prāpte ārambhaḥ tata prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8648_1: aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . veṇuḥ iva veṇuḥ . riktaḥ nāma kaḥ cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:8650_0: KA_III.118.5-8 Ro_IV. 531 upottamagrahaṇam kimarthan na riti pūrvam iti eva ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8650_1: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . matoḥ pūrvam āt sañjñāyām striyām iti atra pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8650_2: na kartavyam bhavati . evam tarhi upottamagrahaṇam uttarārtham . caṅi anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8650_3: upottamam iti eva . iha mā bhūt . mā hi sma dadhat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8652: KA_III.118.11-15 Ro_IV.532 kimartham idam ucyate na vatyāḥ iti eva ucyate . vatyāḥ iti iyati ucyamāne rājavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8653_0: atra api prasajyeta . atha avatyāḥ iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8653_1: nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na eṣaḥ avatīśabdaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . anvatīśabdaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8653_2: eva tarhi nalopasya asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ evam vatvasya api asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8655: KA_III.118.17-119.14 Ro_IV.532-534 coḥ ataddhite . cusvaraḥ ataddhite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dādhīcaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_0: mādhūcaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pratyayasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_1: bhaviṣyati . sthānāntaraprāptaḥ cusvaraḥ . pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ anudāttau suppitau
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_2: iti . anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ . udāttanivṛttisvarasya cusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_3: . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_4: atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_5: . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_6: tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti dadhīcaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na tṛtīyādilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8656_7: pratiṣedham ṣiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_0: plakṣavān atra na prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_1: . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti . yadi tat anuvartate vetasvān iti atra prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_2: anuvartate ḍmatup ca eṣaḥ . yadi tari matubgrahaṇe ḍmatupaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati vetasvān
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_3: iti atra vatvam na prāpnoti . sāmānyagrahaṇam vatve iha punaḥ viśiṣṭasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_4: . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ na asti dadhīcī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_5: api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta kumārī iti . satiśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_6: khalu api cusvaraḥ . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra asya etat rūpam . ajādau asarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8657_7: abhinirvṛtte akāralope nakāralope ca . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate coḥ ataddhite iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8659: KA_III.119.16-120.24 Ro_IV.534-537 samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : rājadṛṣat,
GS24pmbhasuu:8660_0: brāhmaṇasamit . halsvaraprāptau vā vyañjanam avidyamānavat . atha vā halsvaraprāptau
GS24pmbhasuu:8660_1: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kimartham idam ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8660_2: ucyate na halsvaraprāptau avidyamānavat iti eva ucyate svaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:8660_3: bhavati iti vā . dvirbaddham subaddham bhavati iti . yadi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8661_0: udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti svaritatvam na prāpnoti . udāttāt ca svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8661_1: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8661_2: prayojanāni . prayojanam lidādyudāttāntodāttvidhayaḥ . liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8661_3: bhavati iti iha eva syāt : bhaurikividham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8663: jihīrṣakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti iha eva syāt : ahicumbukāyaniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_0: kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt . dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt ūrṇoti . pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_1: iti atra na syāt . idam tāvat yat ucyate halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_2: bhavati iti katham hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . tat ca api bruvatā udāttāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_3: svaravidhau iti vaktavyam . tathā anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_4: vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_5: iti ucyeta . atha svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti ucyamāne anudāttādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_6: antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat kim siddham bhavati vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_7: siddham . katham . svaravidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8667: svarasya vidhiḥ svaravidhiḥ iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . udaśvitvān ghoṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8668_0: vidyutvān balāhakaḥ iti . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:8668_1: tarhi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8668_2: hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . uccaiḥ udāttaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_0: nīcaiḥ anudāttaḥ iti atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam nivṛttam . tasmin nivṛtte halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_1: api svaraprāptiḥ bhavati . yat api ucyate udāttāt ca svaravidhau iti vaktavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_2: . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya anudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_3: . avidyamānodāttam anudāttam . tasya svaritaḥ iti . yat api ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_4: vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddham tat bhavati vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_5: vyañjanāntāt ca iti yat ayam na uttarapade anudāttādau iti uktvā apṛthivīrudralkpūṣamanthiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_6: iti pratiṣedham śāsti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8669_7: jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā yat ayam yataḥ anāvaḥ iti nāvaḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_0: KA_III.121.2-123.3 Ro_IV.538-542 kimartham idam ucyate . bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_1: sukṛt . sukṛt ācāryaḥ samāsāntodāttatve prāpte bahuvrīhisvaram apavādam śāsti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_2: etat asti prayojanam . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . nañsubhyām iti etat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_3: bhaviṣyati . nañsubhyām eva bahuvrīheḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati na anyasya iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_4: api kutat etat pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ parasya iti . parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_5: śitiśāsanāt . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . śiteḥ eva na anyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_6: iti . yat tāvat ucyate nañsubhyām niyamārtham iti kṣepe vidhiḥ nañaḥ asiddhaḥ . udarāśveṣuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_7: kṣepe iti etasmin prāpte tataḥ etat ucyate . yat api ucyate parasya śitiśāsanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8671_8: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . parasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8672_0: atra api prāpnoti . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . antodāttatvam cavāpriye siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8672_1: kutaḥ . sambhavāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8672_2: yat ubhayam syāt . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8672_3: dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8672_4: bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8672_5: bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau prkṛtyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:8672_6: bhavati iti . kim ca prakṛtam . udāttaḥ iti ca vartate . evam api kāryapriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_0: atra na prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . atha vā svaritagrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_1: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tit svaritam iti . bahuvrīhau ṛte siddham . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_2: api bahuvrīhigrahaṇam siddham . tatpuruṣe kasmāt na bhavati . tatpuruṣe tulyārthatṛtīyāsaptamyupamānāvyayadvitīyākṛtyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_3: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvigau tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . igante dvigau
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_4: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvandve tarhi prāpnoti . rājanyabahuvacanadvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_5: andhakavṛṣṇiṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . avyayībhāve tarhi prāpnoti . paripratyupāpāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_6: varjyamānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_7: niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati eteṣām eva tatpuruṣādiṣu iti na punaḥ evam niyamaḥ syāt eteṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_8: tatpuruṣādiṣu eva iti . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_9: . eteṣām tarhi bahuvrīheḥ ca paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_10: na prakalpate . yat ayam dvitribhyām pāddanmūrdhasu bahuvrīhau diṣṭivitasyoḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_11: siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati iti . udātte
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_12: jñāpakam tu etat . udātte etat jñāpakam syāt . svaritena samāviśet . svaritena samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_13: prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_14: . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . parasya śitiśāsanāt . kṣepe vidhiḥ nañaḥ asiddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_15: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_16: ṛte siddham . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ na prakalpate
GS24pmbhasuu:8674_17: . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . svaritena samāviśet .
GS24pmbhasuu:8676_0: KA_III.123.5-21 Ro_IV.542-543 tatpuruṣe vibhaktiprakṛtisvaratve karmadhāraye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8676_1: . tatpuruṣe vibhaktiprakṛtisvaratve karmadhāraye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paramam
GS24pmbhasuu:8677_0: parame kārake paramakārake . siddham tu lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8677_1: grahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8677_2: pratipadam yaḥ dvitīyātṛtīyāsaptamīsamāsaḥ tasya grahaṇam lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . avyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:8677_3: parigaṇanam kartavyam . avyaye nañkunipātānām . avyaye nañkunipātānām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8681: pītvāsthirakaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . snātvākālakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8682_0: pītvāsthirakaḥ . ubhayam na vaktavyam . nipātanāt siddham . nipātanāt etat siddham

GS24pmbhasuu:8848_1: lopaḥ udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . idam iha sampradhāryam . antodāttatvam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:8848_2: lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam

GS24pmbhasuu:8870_0: vaiyākaraṇī ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā evam api na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena . vacanāt bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:8874_0: divispṛk . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā saptamī draṣṭavyā . hṛdayam spṛśati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8874_1: hṛdispṛk . divam śprśati iti divispṛk . haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam . haladantādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:8874_2: goḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gaviṣthiraḥ . na kartavyam . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8874_3: . luk kriyatām avādeśaḥ iti avādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . avādeśe kṛte halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8874_4: iti eva siddham . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8874_5: lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhūmyām pāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8875_0: bhūmipāśaḥ . akaḥ ataḥ iti vā sandhyakṣarārtham . evam tarhi aviśeṣeṇa saptamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8875_1: alukam uktvā akaḥ ataḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . akaḥ ataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8875_2: eva bhavati na anyataḥ iti . tena sandhyakṣarāṇām siddham bhavati . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:8875_3: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8875_4: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . gaviṣṭhiraśabdaḥ vidādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8875_5: paṭhyate . asakṛt khalu api nipātanam kriyate . gaviyudhibhyā sthiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_0: KA_III.144.19-145.13 Ro_IV.589-591 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_1: ca prāpte katham ca aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām iti vartate tataḥ prāpte . atha nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_2: tataḥ aprāpte . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_3: . kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . avikaṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_4: uraṇaḥ dātavyaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ . astu tarhi aprāpte . aprāpte samāsavidhānam . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_5: aprāpte samāsaḥ vidheyaḥ . prāpte punaḥ sati sañjñāyām iti eva samāsaḥ siddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_6: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati atra samāsaḥ iti yat ayam kāranāmni saptamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_7: alukam śāsti . yadi api tāvat jñāpakāt samāsaḥ syāt svaraḥ tu na sidhyati . yat hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_8: tat saptamīpūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_9: eva iti evam tat . na eva atra anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . kim tarhi saptamīhāriṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_10: dharmye aharaṇe iti anena atra svareṇa bhavitavyam .kim ca bhoḥ sañjñāḥ api loke
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_11: kriyante na lokaḥ sañjñāsu pramāṇam . loke ca kāranāma sañjñā . nanu ca uktam kāranāmni
GS24pmbhasuu:8877_12: vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8878_0: tataḥ halādau . halādau ca kāranāmni saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati . idam idānīm kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8878_1: . niyamārtham . halādau eva kāranāmni na anyatra . kva mā bhūt . avikaṭe uraṇaḥ dātavyaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8879: (P_6,3.11) KA_III.145.15-16 Ro_IV.591 gurau antāt ca . gurau antāt ca iti vaktavyam . anteguruḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8881: KA_III.145.18-146.2 Ro_IV.591-592 svāṅgagrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate siddham hastebandhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8883: cakrabandhaḥ iti na sidhyati . atha nivṛttam siddham cakrebhandaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8885_0: hastabandhaḥ iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8885_1: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvatra eva atra uttarapadādhikare tatpuruṣed kṛti bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:8885_2: iti prāpte na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8885_3: vibhāṣā ārabhyate . evam api na jñāyate kasmin viṣaye vibhāṣā kasmin viṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8885_4: iti . ghañantasya idam bandhaśabdasya grahaṇam pratiṣedhe punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam . ghañante
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_0: KA_III.146.4-16 Ro_IV.592-594 tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam akarmadhāraye . tatpuruṣe kṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_1: bahulam iti atra akarmadhāraye iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . parame kārake paramakārake
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_2: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulavacanāt na bhaviṣyati . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_3: lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate na tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam iti eva siddham . lugaluganukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_4: bahulavacanasya akṛtsnatvāt . lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate akṛtsnam bahulavacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_5: . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena kṛtam akṛtam tat . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_6: kṛtsnam ca kārakam ca sādhakam ca nirvartakam ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_7: . kimartham tarhi lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_8: vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu lakṣaṇam prapañcaḥ ca . kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_9: prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati . avaśyam khalu asmābhiḥ idam vaktavyam bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_10: anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti . sarvavedapāṛiṣadam hi idam śāstram . tatra

GS24pmbhasuu:8901_4: eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ sthāne aṇ eva śiṣyate . kim tarhi aṇ ca anaṇ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8903: KA_III.147.18-148.18 Ro_IV.596-597 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_0: ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti āhosvit dvandve ṛkārasya iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_1: ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam . ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_2: kartavyam . pitāputrau . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . ṛkārāntānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_3: dvandve na jñāyate kasya ānaṅā bhavitavyam iti . astu tarhi dvande ṛkārasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_4: aviśeṣeṇa pitṛpitāmahādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa pitṛpitāmahādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_5: bhavati . pitṛpitāmahau iti . astu tarhi ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_6: ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . putragrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_7: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . putre anyatarasyām iti . yadi tat anuvartate vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_8: svasṛpatyoḥ putre ca iti putre api vibhāṣā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_9: anuvartiṣyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_10: putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . vibhāṣā svasṛpatyoḥ putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_11: ākrośe . ānaṅ ṛtaḥ dvandve . putragrahaṇam anuvartate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_12: . yat api ucyate kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . kāryī ca nirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_13: iti vartate . ṅit ca ayam kriyate . saḥ antareṇa api kāryinirdeśam ṛkārāntasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_14: bhaviṣyati . putre tarhi kāryī anirdiṣṭaḥ . putre ca kāryī nirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . ṛkāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_15: api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_16: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . putre iti eṣā saptamī ṛtaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:8904_17: prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8906: KA_III.148.20-149.2 Ro_IV.597 devatādvandve ubhayatra vāyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . devatādvandve ubhayatra vāyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāyvagnī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8907: agnivāyū . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brahmaprajāpatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8909_0: skandviśākhau . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . dvandve iti vartamāne

GS24pmbhasuu:8909_2: . kaḥ ca lokavedayoḥ dvandvaḥ . vede ye sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ na ca ete sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:8915_1: ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam āhosvit kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8915_2: vijñāyate samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam iti garbhibhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8917: prasūtabhāraḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam iti droṇībhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8919: pātrībhāryaḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam iti . katham garbhibhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8921_0: prasūtabhāraḥ iti . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . atha kimartham ūṅaḥ pṛthak pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8921_1: ucyate na yatra eva anyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tatra eva ayam ucyeta . na kopadhāyāḥ iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8921_2: tataḥ ūṅaḥ ca iti ucyeta . tatra api ayam arthaḥ dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8921_3: . na evam śakyam . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ puṃvat karmadhāraye pratiṣiddhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8922: kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā iti evam iha api syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_0: brahmabandhūḥ vṛndārikā brahmabandūvṛndārikā iti . atha pṛthak pratiṣedhe api ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_1: yāvatā saḥ pratiṣiddhārthaḥ ārambhaḥ kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . pṛthakpratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_2: . atha vā anūṅ iti tatra anuvartiṣyate . atha vā na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_3: tarhi paryudāsaḥ ayam yat anyat anūṅ iti . saḥ ca pratiṣedhāṛthaḥ ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_0: KA_III.150.17-153.20 Ro_IV.601-609 kim punaḥ idam puṃvadbhāve strīgrhaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_1: āhosvit strīśabdgrahaṇam āhosvit stryarthagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . puṃvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_2: strīgrahaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam cet tatra puṃvat iti uttarapade tatpratiṣedhavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_3: . puṃvadbhāve strīgrahaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam cet tatra puṃvat iti uttarapade tatpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_4: ayam vijñāyeta . kasya . strīpratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ . kim ucyate strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_5: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na punaḥ anyat api kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_6: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya atidiśyeta . anārambhāt puṃsi . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_7: kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_8: atidiśyeta . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum anyat ataḥ strīpratyayapratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_9: katham punaḥ puṃvat iti anena strīpratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_10: ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā . uśīnaravat madreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_11: yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_12: puṃvat bhavati puṃvat na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe . yathā puṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_13: strīpratyayaḥ na bhavati evam samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8925_14: iti . prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ . prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ vaktavyā . enī bhāryā asya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_0: śyetabhāryaḥ . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_1: strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena naśabdaḥ na śrūyeta . striyām iti ucyamānaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_2: . sthānivatprasaṅgaḥ ca . sthānivabhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . paṭvībhārā asya paṭubhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_3: . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . tasya sthānivabhāvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_4: prāpnoti . kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate na prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_5: sthānivabhāvaḥ api coditaḥ syāt . purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam sthānivatprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_6: ca iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam idam dṛṣṭam prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_7: iti . tat api paṭhitam . na ca idānīm ācāryāḥ sūtrāṇi kṛtvā nivartayanti . vataṇḍyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_8: puṃvadvacanam . vataṇḍyādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ vataṇḍyādayaḥ . lugalugastrīviṣayadvistrīpratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_9: . luk . gārgyaḥ vṛndārikā gargavṛndārikā . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_10: nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_11: . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . luk . aluk . vataṇḍī vṛndārikā vātaṇḍyavṛndārikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_12: puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_13: . tasya anivṛttatvāt luk striyām vataṇḍāt iti yakārasya luk prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8927_14: ayam īkāre eva luk ucyeta . tat īkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_0: striyām . īkāravidhau vai apratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kriyate vataṇḍa iti . śārṅgaravādau
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_1: sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ vai sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_2: ca luk prāpnoti . aluk . astrīviṣaya . kauṇḍīvṛsī vṛndārikā kauṇḍīvṛsyavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_3: . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_4: . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ śrūyeta . astriyām iti hi ñyaḥ vidhīyate . astrīviṣaya
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_5: . dvistrīpratyaya . gārgyāyaṇī vṛndārikā gārgyavṛndārikā . atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_6: . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅaḥ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_7: iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ na asau uttarapade yaḥ ca uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_8: na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ iti . astu tarhi strīśabdagrahaṇam . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8929_9: iti cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ iti cet sarvasya strīśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8930_0: aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ . kālikāvṛndārikāḥ . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8930_1: prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām tanukeśyaḥ striyaḥ . tanukeśīvṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_0: kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_1: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_2: bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ . katham ca nāma na upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_3: yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ ca . hyarthe ca ayam caḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_4: paṭhitaḥ . sarvaḥ hi śabdaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskāt paraḥ śakyaḥ kartum . astu tarhi arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_5: . arthātideśe vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ . arthātideśe vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_6: paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham puṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam khidghādikeṣu iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_7: vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . dvikāryayogaḥ hi nāma vipratiṣedhaḥ na ca atra ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_8: dvikāryayuktaḥ . śabdasya hrasvatvam arthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . kim ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_9: aviśeṣāt iti . sarvasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_0: aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ . kālikāvṛndārikāḥ . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_1: prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām tanukeśyaḥ striyaḥ . tanukeśīvṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_2: . kṣemavṛddhivṛndārikāḥ prāpnuvanti . haṃsasya varaṭā . kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_3: rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_4: viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ bhavati iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_5: ca nāma na upādīyate yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_6: bhavati . na hi arthen paurvāparyam asti . ayam tāvat adoṣaḥ yat ucyate arthātideśe
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_7: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ iti . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_8: . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asambhavaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ abhinirvartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_9: hrasvatvasya nimittam vihanti . hrasvatvam abhinirvartamānam puṃvadbhāvam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_10: . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_11: iti . tasmāt astu saḥ eva madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ . nanu ca uktam strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8932_12: iti cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samāsanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_0: bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ yasmin saḥ ayam bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ iti . yadi evam luk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_1: . nipātanāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā aluk prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_2: anūṅ iti anyena strīpratyayagrahaṇam śakyam vijñātum . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_3: tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_4: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_5: . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api anūṅ iti ūṅpratiṣedhāt anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_6: ūṅsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . kim ca anyat anūṅ ūṅsadṛśam . strīpratyayaḥ . evam api iḍabiḍ vṛndārikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8941: atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8943: KA_III.153.21-28 Ro_IV.609-610 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . paṭvīmṛdvyau bhārye asya paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_0: āhosvit paṭumṛdubhāryaḥ iti . paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ iti bhavitavyam . puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_1: na bhavati . bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . nanu ca bhoḥ paṭuśabdaḥ mṛduśabdaḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_2: bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_3: . samānāyām ākṛtau api etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_4: tarhi bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade kṛtaḥ tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_5: ca akṛtaḥ na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade .
GS24pmbhasuu:8946_0: KA_III.154.1-4 Ro_IV.610 pūraṇyām pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam . pūraṇyām pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8946_1: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . kalyāṇī pañcamī asya pakṣasya kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8946_2: iti . atha iha katham bhavitavyam kalyāṇī pañcamī āsām rātrīṇām iti . kalyāṇīpañcamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8946_3: rātrayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . rātrayaḥ atra pradhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8948_0: KA_III.154.6-155.24 Ro_IV.610-614 iha ke cit tasilādayaḥ ā kṛtvasucaḥ paṭhyante yeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8948_1: puṃvadbhāvaḥ na iṣyate ke cit ca anyatra paṭhyante yeṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ iṣyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8948_2: kim nyāyyam . parigaṇanam kartavyam . tasilādī tratasau . tratasau tasilādī draṣṭavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:8948_3: . tasyām śālāyām vasati . tatra vasati . tasyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8953: yataḥ . taratamapau . taratamapau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyatarā darśanīyatamā . caraḍjātīyarau . caraḍjātīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . paṭucarī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8954: paṭujātīyā . kalpabdeśīyarau . kalpabdeśīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyakalpā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8955: darśanīyadeśīyā . rūpappāśapau . rūpappāśapau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyarūpā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8956: darśanīyapāśā . thamthālau . thamthālau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . kayā ākṛtyā katham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8957: yayā yathā . dārhilau . dārhilau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . tasyām velāyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8959: tarhi . tilthyanau . tilthyanau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . vṛkī vṛkatiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8960_0: ajathyā yūthiḥ . śasi bahvalpārthasya . śasi bahvalpārthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8960_1: . bahvībhyaḥ dehi . bahuśaḥ dehi . alpaśaḥ . tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya . tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8961: paṭutā . guṇavacanasya iti kimartham . kaṭhyāḥ bhāvaḥ kaṭhītvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8962: kaṭhītā . bhasya aḍhe taddhite . bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam . aḍhe iti kimartham . śyaineyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8966: atra na prāpnoti . iha ca prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8968: sāpatnaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ anapatye iti ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha hi na syāt . gārgyāyaṇyāḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . astu tarhi aḍhe iti eva . katham kauṇḍinyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8969: sāpatnaḥ iti . kauṇḍinye nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti . sāpatnaśabdaḥ prakṛtayataram . [R 613:
GS24pmbhasuu:8970: sāpatnaḥ prakṛtyantatatvāt . sāpatnaśabdaḥ prakṛtayataram asti .] katham agnāyī devatā asya sthālīpākasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8971_0: āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti . astu tarhi anapatye iti . katham gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . gārgāgneyau
GS24pmbhasuu:8971_1: na saṃvadete . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . ṭhakchasoḥ ca . ṭhakchasoḥ ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8973_0: bhavadīyāḥ . ṭhaggrahaṇam kimartham na ike kṛte ajādau iti . na evam śakyam . ajādilakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8973_1: hi māthitikādivat prasaṅgaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasajyeta . tat yatha
GS24pmbhasuu:8973_2: mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8975_0: KA_III.156.2-6 Ro_IV.614 maningrahaṇam kimartham . māningrahaṇam astryartham asamānādhikaraṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8975_1: ca . māningrahaṇam kriyate astryartham asamānādhikaraṇārtham ca . astryartham tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8975_2: . darśanīyām manyate devadattaḥ yajñadattām darśanīyamānī ayam asyāḥ . asamānādhikaraṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8975_3: . darśanīyām manyate devadattā yajñadattām darśanīyamāninī iyam asyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8977: KA_III.156.8-17 Ro_IV.615-616 kim idam evamādi anukramaṇam ādyasya yogasya viṣaye āhosvit puṃvadbhāvamātrasya . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ādyasya yogasya viṣaye mādhyamkīyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8979_0: atra na prāpnoti . vidhīḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:8979_1: iti ucyate . na hi etat bhavati bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ . idam tarhi vilepikāyāḥ dharmyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8979_2: vailepikam . vidhiḥ ca siddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca na prāpnoti . atha puṃvabhāvamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8980_0: jātilakṣaṇaḥ puṃvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi na kopadhāyāḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8980_1: puṃvabhāvamātrasya uttaram evamādi anukramaṇam ādyasya yogasya viṣaye . na kopadhapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8980_2: taddhitavugrahaṇam . na kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇam kartavyam . taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8980_3: yaḥ kakāraḥ voḥ ca yaḥ kakāraḥ tasya grahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pākabhāryaḥ , bhekabhāryaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8982: KA_III.156.19-157.2 Ro_IV.616 svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini . svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . dīrghamukhamānī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8983: ślakṣṇamukhamāninī . yadi amānini iti ucyate dīrghamukhamāninī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8984: ślakṣṇamukhamānininī iti na sidhyati . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_0: KA_III.157.4-14 Ro_IV.616-617 kimartham idam ucyate . puṃvat karmadhāraye pratiṣiddhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_1: . pratiṣiddhāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . na kopadhāyāḥ iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_2: . kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā kārakajātīyā kārakadeśīyā . sañjñāpūraṇayoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_3: iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . dattā vṛndārikā dattavṛndārikā dattajātīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_4: dattadeśīyā . pañcamī vṛndārikā pañcamavṛndārikā pañcamajātīyā pañcamadeśīyā . vṛddhinimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_5: iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . sraughnī vṛndārikā sraughnavṛndārikā sraughnajātīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_6: sraughnadeśīyā . svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . ślakṣṇamukhī
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_7: vṛndārikā ślakṣṇamukhavṛndārikā ślakṣṇamukhajātīyā ślakṣṇamukhadeśīyā . jāteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_8: iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . kaṭhī vṛndārikā kaṭhavṛndārikā kaṭhajātīyā kaṭhadeśīyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8988: KA_III.157.15-24 Ro_IV.617-618 kukkuṭyādīnām aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadvacanam . kukkuṭyādīnām aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kukkuṭyāḥ aṇḍam kukkuṭāṇḍam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8990_0: kākyāḥ śāvaḥ kākaśāvaḥ . na vā astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8990_1: kāraṇam astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt . na atra strīpūrvapadam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8990_2: . astrīpūrvapadam . ubhayoḥ aṇḍam ubhayoḥ padam ubhayoḥ śāvaḥ . yadi api tāvat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8990_3: etat śakyate vaktum iha tu katham . mṛgyāḥ kṣīram mṛghakṣīram iti . atra api na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8990_4: astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt iti eva . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8990_5: api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8990_6: vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8992: KA_III.158.1-18 Ro_IV.618-619 agneḥ īttvāt varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena . agneḥ īttvāt varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . agneḥ īttvasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_0: āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_1: yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_2: . katham . agneḥ īttvam varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_3: . kim tarhi . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_4: . agneḥ īttvam abhinirvartamanam varuṇasya vṛddhim bādhate . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ abhinirvartamanā
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_5: agneḥ īttvam bādhate . eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . pūṃvadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_6: hrasvatvam khidghādiṣu . pūṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena khidghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8997: mṛdubhāryaḥ . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9001: hariṇimmanyā . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9007: paṭvitamā . ke hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9011_0: mṛdvikā . hrasvatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm hrasvatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9011_1: puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛt gatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9013: KA_III.158.21-159.9 Ro_IV.620-621 ṅīgrahaṇam kimartham . anekācaḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne khaṭvātarā mālātarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9014: atra api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti vartate . evam api dattātarā guptātarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9015: atra api prāpnoti . ītaḥ iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9016: senāṇītaraḥ atra api prāpnoti . striyām iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9017: senāṇītarā atra api prāpnoti . striyāḥ striyām iti vartate . śeṣaprakḷptyartham tarhi ṅīgrahaṇam kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9018: nadyāḥ śeṣasya anyatarasyām iti . kaḥ śeṣaḥ . āṅīca yā nadī ṅyantam ca yat ekāc . antareṇa api ṅīgrahaṇam kḷptaḥ śeṣaḥ . katham . ītaḥ iti vartate . anīt ca yā nadī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9019_0: īdantam ca yat ekāc . śeṣagrahaṇam ca api śakyam akartum . katham . aviśeṣeṇa ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9019_1: nadyāḥ anyatarasyām hrasvatvam utsargaḥ . tasya anekācaḥ nityam hrasvatvam apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9019_2: . tasmin nitye prāpte ugitaḥ vibhāṣā ārabhyate . yadi evam lakṣmitarā tantritarā
GS24pmbhasuu:9019_3: iti na sidhyati . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etad saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:9019_4: . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti . ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9021: KA_III.160.2-161.5 Ro_IV.622-627 iha kasmāt na bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_0: amahān mahān sampannaḥ mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ iti . anyaprakṛtiḥ tu amahān mahatprakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_1: mahān mahati eva . anyaḥ mahān . anyaḥ mahān bhūtaprakṛtau vartate . mahān mahati
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_2: eva . tasmāt āttvam na syāt . tasmāt āttvam na bhaviṣyati . puṃvattvam tu katham
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_3: bhavet atra . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti . amahatī mahatī sampannā mahadbhūtā
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_4: brāhmaṇī . evam tarhi amahati mahān hi vṛttaḥ tadvācī ca atra bhūtaśabdaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_5: amahati hi mahacchabdaḥ vartate tadvācī ca atra bhūtaśabdaḥ prayujyate . kiṃvācī
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_6: . mahadvācī . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvat . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvadbhāvaḥ . yadi evam āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_7: api prāpnoti . mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ . nivartyam āttvam tu manyante . āttvam api
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_8: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ tu mahataḥ pratipadam samāsaḥ uktaḥ tadāśrayam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_9: āttvam kartavyam manyante na lakṣaṇena lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_10: pratipadoktasya eva iti pratipadam yaḥ samāsaḥ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam . lakṣaṇoktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_11: ca ayam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . mahān bāhuḥ asya mahābāhuḥ iti . śeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_12: tu yaḥ asau pratyārambhāt kṛtaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tasmāt sidhyati tasmin . yasmāt śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_13: bahuvrīhiḥ iti siddhe anekam anyapadārthe iti āha tena pratipadam bhavati . pradhānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_14: vā yataḥ vṛttiḥ . atha vā gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye kāryasampratyayaḥ . tat yathā gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9022_15: anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve
GS24pmbhasuu:9023: gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyāttve .
GS24pmbhasuu:9025_0: KA_III.161.6-15 Ro_IV.627-628 mahadāttve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam puṃvadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9025_1: ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham . mahadāttve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9025_2: puṃvadbhāvaḥ ca asamānādhikaraṇārthaḥ kartavyaḥ . mahatyāḥ ghāsaḥ mahāghāsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9027_0: mahatyāḥ viśiṣṭaḥ mahāviśiṣṭaḥ . aṣṭanaḥ kapāle haviṣi . aṣṭanaḥ kapāle haviṣi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9027_1: kartavyam . aṣṭākapālam carum nirvapet . haviṣi iti kimartham . aṣṭakapālam brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9027_2: . gavi ca yukte . gavi ca yukte upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṣṭāgavena śakaṭena . yukte
GS24pmbhasuu:9029: KA_III.161.17-18 Ro_IV.629 prāk śatāt iti vaktavyam iha mā bhūt . dviśatam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9033: KA_III.161.20-162.3 Ro_IV.629 sarveṣāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām vibhāṣā yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9034_0: dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca treḥ ca . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam dvyaṣṭangrahaṇamanuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9034_1: . yadi tat anuvartate treḥ trayaḥ dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca iti dvyaṣṭanoḥ api dtrayaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9034_2: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya
GS24pmbhasuu:9034_3: gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate . dvyaṣṭanaḥ saṅkhyayām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9034_4: treḥ trayaḥ . tataḥ vibhāṣā catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām iti . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam tat apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:9036_0: KA_III.162.5-17 Ro_IV.629-631 yaṇgrahaṇam idam pratyayagrahaṇam . tatra pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9036_1: yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti yadaṇante prāpnoti . yadaṇgrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9036_2: lekhagrahaṇāt . yadaṇgrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9036_3: ayam lekhagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yadaṇante bhavati iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_0: atyalpam idam ucyate . sarvatra eva uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_1: draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt eva . kim prayojanam . kumārī gauritarā . ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_2: nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi etat jñāpyate khiti anavyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_3: iti khiti eva anantarasya anavyayasya hrasvatvam prāpnoti . khiti anantaraḥ hrasvabhāvī
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_4: na asti iti kṛtvā khidante bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ayam asti stanandhayaḥ iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_5: api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_6: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:9037_7: anantarasya na bhavati iti yat ayam anavyayasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na hi khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:9040_0: padopahatārtham] . padādeśe antodāttanipātanam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . padopahatārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9040_1: . pādena upahatam padopahatam . tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti prakṛtisvaratve pūrvapadāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9040_2: yathā syāt . upadeśivadvacanam ca svarasiddhyartham . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9040_3: . kim prayojanam . svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām antodāttanipātane kṛte samāsasvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9042: KA_III.163.6-7 Ro_IV.632 padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam . padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pādābhyām carati padikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9043: (P_6,3.56) KA_III.163.9 Ro_IV.632 niṣke ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . panniṣkeṇa pādaniṣkeṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:9045: KA_III.163.11-12 Ro_IV.632 sañjñāyām uttarapadasya iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . lohitodaḥ , kṣīrodaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_0: KA_III.163.14-164.2 Ro_IV.633 ekahalādau iti kimartham . udakasthānam . ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_1: api etasmin atra prapnoti . etat api ekahalādi . kim kāraṇam . ekaikavarṇavartitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_2: vācaḥ uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau varṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_3: yugapat uccārayati . tat yathā gauḥ iti ukte yāvat gakāre vāk vartate tāvat na aukāre
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_4: na visarjanīye . yāvat auakāre na tāvat gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat visarjanīye
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_5: na tāvat gakāre na aukāre . uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . uccaritaḥ varṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_6: pradhvastaḥ ca . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya sahāyaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9047_7: ekahalādau iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca ekahalādiḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:9048: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ ekahalādiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yatra ekam halam uccārya ac ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9050: KA_III.164.4-19 Ro_IV.634-635 ikaḥ hrasvatvam uttarapadamātre . ikaḥ hrasvatvam uttarapadamātre vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9051_0: alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . sarvānte hi lokavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9051_1: . lokavijñānāt hi yat eva sarvāntam padam tasmin pūrvapadasya hrasvatvam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9051_2: vā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . alābūḥ ca karkandhūḥ ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9055_0: alābukarkandhudṛnbhūnām phalam alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . yadi evam dṛnbhvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9055_1: pūrvanipātaḥ prāpnoti . rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . atha vā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9057_0: alābūḥ ca karkandhudṛnbhuphalam ca alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . evam api phalena
GS24pmbhasuu:9057_1: akṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavati . pratyekam phalaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . iyaṅuvaṅavyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9057_2: . iyaṅuvaṅbhāinām avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śrīkulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9060: kuḍyībhūtam vṛṣalakulam . abhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrukuṃsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9061: bhrukuṭiḥ . aparaḥ āha : akāraḥ bhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrakuṃsaḥ , bhrakuṭiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9063: KA_III.164.21 Ro_IV.635-636 taddhite kim udāharaṇam . ekatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9064: ekatā . na etat asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tāsilādiṣu ā kṛtvasucaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekasyāḥ āgatam ekarūpyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9065: ekamayam . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_0: ekatā . nanu ca uktam puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . uktam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_1: tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya iti . atha uttarapade kim udāharaṇam . ekaśāṭī . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_2: . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_3: . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekasyāḥ kṣīram ekaṣīram . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekaśāṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_4: . nanu ca uktam puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . na kopadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_5: iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9068: KA_III.165.9-166.3 Ro_IV.636-637 khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ anajantatvāt . khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ . kālimmanyā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_0: hariṇimmanyā . kim kāraṇam . anajantatvāt . mumi kṛte anajantatvāt hrasvatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_1: prāpnoti . siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . hrasvāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_2: mum bhavati iti vaktavyam . sanniyogāt vā . atha vā sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_3: yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . mum ca . kim ca. yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_4: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . hrasvatvam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_5: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ anajantatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_6: parihṛtam etat siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt iti . tat tarhi hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_7: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ikaḥ hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_8: gālavasya iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_9: iti eṣā saptamī hrasvaḥ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_10: pūrvasya iti . atha vā khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . khiti hrasvabhāvī na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_11: iti kṛtvā bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate . ajantam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā kāryakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_12: sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_13: idam bhavati acaḥ iti . tatra vacanāt anajantasya api bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9069_14: vacanāt prāpnoti . vāṅmanyaḥ iti . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api khaṭvammanyaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:9098: KA_III.168.22-169.8 Ro_IV.642-643 kimartham nañaḥ sānubandhakasya grahaṇam kriyate na nasya iti eva ucyeta . nasya iti ucyamāne karṇaputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9099: varṇaputraḥ iti atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api praśnaputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9100: viśnaputraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api vāmanaputraḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:9103_0: KA_III.169.10-16 Ro_IV.644 kimartham tasmāt iti ucyate na nuṭ aci iti eva ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:9103_1: . nuṭ aci iti ucyamāne nañaḥ eva nuṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9103_2: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . tadoḥ saḥ sau anantyayoḥ iti tadoḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam

GS24pmbhasuu:9106_1: prāpnoti . evam tarhi aduṭ kariṣyate . aduṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . ānunāsikyam hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:9106_2: syāt . yat hi tat yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ va iti padāntasya iti evam tat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9106_3: punaḥ kāraṇam padāntasya iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt . budhnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9108_0: badhnāti . evam tarhi anuṭ kariṣyate . anuṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . vibhāṣayā ānunāsikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9108_1: . tena idam eva rūpam syāt ekānnaviṃśatiḥ . idam na syāt . ekānnaviṃśatiḥ iti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:9108_2: tarhi aduk eva . nanu ca uktam ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9108_3: doṣaḥ . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9108_4: bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9108_5: saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidhiḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . pararūpam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9108_6: prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya punaḥ nimittam eva .

GS24pmbhasuu:9118_0: sahakṛtvapriyaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . bahuvrīhau yat uttarapadam iti evam vijñāsyate

GS24pmbhasuu:9118_2: evam vijñāsyate . bahuvrīhau ca yat upasarjanam bahuvrīhim prati ca yat upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9118_3: . saḥ tarhi bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha kaḥ cit pradhānānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9118_4: eva samāsaḥ kaḥ cit upasarjanānām eva kaḥ cit pradhānopasarjanānām . tat yaḥ upasarjanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9118_5: eva samāsaḥ tat upasarjanam . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ ghāṭaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:9150_15: . nūnam ayam anyān api jānāti . evam eṣā śiṣṭajñānārthā aṣṭādhyāyī .

GS24pmbhasuu:9153_0: dakṣiṇatāram . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam valabhāvaḥ ca uttarapadasya iñi . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9153_1: vaktavyam valabhāvaḥ ca uttarapadasya iñi vaktavyaḥ . vāgvādasya apatyam vāḍvaliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9153_2: . ṣaṣaḥ utvam datṛdaśasu uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca . ṣaṣaḥ utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_0: ṣoḍaśa . dhāsu vā . dhāsu vā iti vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca vaktavyam . ṣoḍhā
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_1: ṣaḍḍhā kuru . atha kimartham bahuvacananirdeśaḥ kriyate na punaḥ dhāyām iti eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_2: . nānādhikaraṇavācī yaḥ dhāśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_3: ṣaṭ dadhāti iti ṣaḍdhā iti . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_4: utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ca ṣṭutvam . dūḍāśaḥ ,
