GS24pmbhasuu:9157_1: jāye svo rohāva . pīvopavasanādīnām chandasi lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pīvopavasanānām payopavasanānām śriyā idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9159_0: KA_III.175.9-14 Ro_IV. 656 pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham na tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9159_1: iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . na hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam . iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9160: haraṇīyam . na evam vijñāyate ḍhroḥ lopaḥ ḍhralopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9161: ḍhralope iti . katham tarhi . ḍhroḥ lopaḥ asmin saḥ ayam ḍhralopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9162_0: ḍhralope iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ pūrvagrahaṇena . bhavati hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:9162_1: . idam tarhi prayojanam . uttarapade iti vartate . tena ānantaryamātre yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9164: KA_III.175.16-176.4 Ro_IV.656-657 varṇagrahaṇam kimartham na sahivahoḥ ot asya iti eva ucyeta . vṛddhau api kṛtāyām yathā syāt . udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9166: udavoḍha iti . atha avarṇagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . ūḍhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_0: ūḍhavān iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhavatu atra ottvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_1: bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām pūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_2: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ottvam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . evam tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_3: iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_4: ottvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api ottve prāpnoti akṛte api . ottvam api nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_5: . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam ottvam . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_6: prāpnoti . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_7: anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva ottvasya nimittam vihanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_8: pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt ottvam . ottve kṛte samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9167_9: samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . tatra kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ ottvam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9168: (P_6,3.121) KA_III.176.6 Ro_IV.658 apīlvādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . rucivaham , cāruvaham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9170: KA_III.176.8-13 Ro_IV.658 amnuṣyādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prasevaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9172: prasāraḥ . sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime . sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime iti vaktavyam . iha eva yathā syāt . prāsādaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9173: prākāraḥ . iha mā bhūt . eṣaḥ asya prasādaḥ . eṣaḥ asya prakāraḥ . prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā . prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā dīrghatvam vaktavyam . prativeśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9177: KA_III.176.15-20 Ro_IV.658-659 katham idam vijñāyate . dā iti etasmin takārādau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9178: āhosvit dā iti etasmin takārānte iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate takārādau iti nīttā vittā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9179_0: atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate takārānte iti sudattam pratidattam atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9179_1: . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat takārādau iti . katham nīttā vittā . cartve
GS24pmbhasuu:9179_2: kṛte bhaviṣyati . asiddham cartvam . tasya asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . āśrayāt siddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9179_3: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu takārānte iti . katham sudattam pratidattam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9181_0: KA_III.177.5-10 Ro_IV.659 iha anye ācāryāḥ cau pratyaṅgasya pratiṣedham āhuḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9181_1: iha api sādhyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na pratyaṅgam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9181_2: iti yat ayam cau dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9183_0: KA_III.177.2-3 Ro_IV.659-660 ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9183_1: ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ikaḥ hrasvasya avakāśaḥ . grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9184: senānikulam . samprasāraṇadīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam . yadā na hrasvatvam saḥ avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . kārīṣagandhīputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9185_0: kaumudagandhīputraḥ . samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:9185_1: dīrghatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt hrasvatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9185_2: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_0: KA_III.178.2-10 Ro_IV.661-662 ā kutaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_1: aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_2: kartavyam . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_3: . astu tarhi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_4: aṅgādhikāraḥ vavraśca vakārasya samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_5: punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati uḥ adatvasya sthānivadbhāvān na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_6: iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . saḥ ca idānīm aparihāraḥ bhavati yat tat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_7: aṅgānyatvāt ca siddham iti . astu tarhi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9187_8: . nanu ca uktam guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9189: KA_III.178.11-179.10 Ro_IV.662-665 kim punaḥ iyam sthānṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9190_0: aṅgasya sthāne iti . evam bhavitum arhati . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9190_1: ca adhikāraḥ . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya ca adhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9190_2: . aṅgāt iti api vaktavyam . anucyamāne hi ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati iti ataḥ iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:9190_3: aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktikatvāt ataḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:9190_4: viśeṣayitum . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . akārāt parasya bhismātrasya ais-bhāvaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_0: odanabhissaṭā iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprasiddhiḥ . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_1: sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ iti śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_2: ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti goheḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_3: parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñābhāvāt . siddham etat . katham . parasparam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_4: aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe bhavataḥ . aṅgasañjñām prati pratyayasañjñā pratyayasañjñām prati
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_5: aṅgasañjñā . kim ataḥ yat parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe bhavataḥ . sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_6: ca . sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ ca ayam kṛtaḥ bhavati . aṅgasya yaḥ bhis-śabdaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_7: . kim ca aṅgasya bhis-śabdaḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_8: ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . evam api avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ bhavanti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_9: api sambandhe eva . evam api sthānam aviśeṣitam bhavati . sthānam api sambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_10: eva . evam api na jñāyate kva sthānaṣaṣṭhī kva viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī iti . yatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:9191_11: anyayogam na apekṣate sā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . yatra hi anyayogam apekṣate sā viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9193_0: KA_III.179.11-180.23 Ro_IV.665-669 kāni punaḥ aṅgādhikārasya prayojanani . aṅgādhikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9193_1: prayojanam samprasāraṇadīrghatve . halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati . hūtaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9197: durutam . nāmsanoḥ ca . nāmsanoḥ ca dīrghatve prayojanam . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati . agnīnām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9198: vāyūnām . aṅgasya iti kimartham . krimiṇām paśya . pāmanām paśya . sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . cicīṣati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9199: tuṣṭūṣati . aṅgasya iti kimartham . dadhi sanoti . madhu sanoti . liṅi etve . liṅi etve prayojanam . gleyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9201: nirvāyāt . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve prayojanam . vṛkṣaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9203: odanabhissaṭā . luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau . luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau prayojanam . akārṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9206: bhruvau bhruvaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . śryartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9207: bhrvartham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ prayojanam . sāmaḥ ākam . yuṣmākam asmākam . aṅgasya iti kimartham . yuṣmatsāma ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9208: asmatsāma . tātaṅ prayojanam . jīvatāt bhavān . aṅgasya iti kimartham . paca hi tāvat tvam . jalpa tu tāvat tvam . āmi nuṭ prayojanam . kumārīṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9211: ām iti āha . āne muk prayojanam . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9212: yajamānaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . prāṇaḥ . ke hrasvaḥ prayojanam . kiśorikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9213: kumārikā . aṅgasya iti kimartham . kumārī kāyati kumārīkaḥ . yi dīrghaḥ prayojanam . cīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9217_0: abbhakṣaḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni . katham . arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9217_1: siddham . arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām etāni siddhāni . kva cit arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9217_2: na anarthakasya iti evam bhaviṣyati kva cit pratyayāpratyayoḥ grahaṇe pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9217_3: eva grahaṇam bhavati iti . atha vā pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhyeṣye . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9217_4: pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhīṣe prākarot ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9219_0: upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau prāpnutaḥ . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9219_1: tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9219_2: vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati iti evam upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau na bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9221: KA_III.180.25-181.10 Ro_IV.669-670 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_0: tṛtīyaḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya aprāptiḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_1: . aṇaḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ aṇaḥ iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_2: ikaḥ kāśe iti anena iggrahaṇena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . iggrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_3: ca aṇviśeṣaṇatvāt . aṇviśeṣaṇam iggrahaṇam . aṇaḥ ikaḥ iti . yadi tarhi aṇviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_4: iggrahaṇam cau dīrghaḥ bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti : avācā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9223: avāce . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṇgrahaṇam anuvartate iggrahaṇam nivṛttam . evam api kartṝcā kartṝce ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9224: atra na prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam . kasmāt na bhavati tṛtīyaḥ . nipātanāt . kim nipātanam . dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthaturyāṇi anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9226_0: KA_III.181.12-182.4 Ro_IV.670-673 kimartham āmaḥ sanakārasya grahaṇam kriyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:9226_1: āmi dīrghaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kena idānim sanakārake bhaviṣyati . nuṭ ayam āmbhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9227_0: nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:9227_1: dīrghatve na nuṭ syāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nuṭ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9227_2: atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . nityam dīrghatvam . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:9227_3: api . nityatvāt dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi āha ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9227_4: hrasvāntāt nuṭ iti na ca hrasvāntaḥ asti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanāt yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9227_5: tat na asti . na idam vacanāt labhyam . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9228_0: catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iha tāvat catasṛṇām iti ṣaṭcaturbhyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9228_1: iti evam bhaviṣyati . tisṛṇām iti trigrahaṇam api tatra prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:9228_2: prakṛtam . treḥ trayaḥ iti . idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . na ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:9228_3: udāharaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam prayojayati . tatra vacanāt bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9228_4: . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . uttarāṛtham tarhi sanakāragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9228_5: nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām . nopadhāyāḥ nāmi yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : carmaṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9229: varmaṇām iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . vacanāt yatra tat na asti . nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_0: KA_III.182.7-183.18 Ro_IV.673-677 hanaḥ kvau upadhādīrghatvaprasaṅgaḥ . hanaḥ kvau
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_1: upadhālakṣaṇam dīrghatvam prāpnoti . anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti iti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_2: vaktavyaḥ . vṛtrahaṇau vṛtrahaṇaḥ iti . niyamavacanāt siddham . inhanpūṣāryamṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_3: śau sau ca iti etasmāt niyamavacanāt dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati . niyamavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_4: iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamavacanāt anyatra aniyamaḥ . niyamavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_5: iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamavacanāt anyatra niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_6: anyatra . vṛtrahaṇi bhrūṇahani . evam tarhi dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha inprabhṛtīnām tam
GS24pmbhasuu:9231_7: viniyamya suṭi iti suvidvān . dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha inprabhṛtīnām tam sarvanāmasthāne viniyamya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_0: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne dīrghaḥ bhavati . kimartham idam . niyamāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_1: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne eva na anyatra . śau niyamam punaḥ eva vidadhyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_2: . tataḥ śau . śau eva sarvanāmasthāne na anyatra . tataḥ sau . sau eva sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_3: na anyatra . bhrūṇahani iti tathā asya na duṣyet . tathā asya bhrūṇahani iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_4: bhavati . śāsti nivartya suṭi iti aviśeṣe śau niyamam kuru vā api asamīkṣya . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_5: vā nivṛtte sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe aviśeṣeṇa śau niyamam vakṣyāmi . inhanpūṣāryamṇām

GS24pmbhasuu:9283_3: paśya iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte aci iti ākāralopādīni yathā syuḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9283_4: kāraṇam na sidhyanti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt asiddhatvāt ca . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9283_5: eva hi vasusamprasāraṇam asiddham ca . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ paśuṣaḥ na vājān cākhāyitā
GS24pmbhasuu:9283_6: cākhāyitum . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ siddham vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . paśuṣaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:9283_7: vājān . paśuṣaḥ iti ātttvasya asiddhatvāt ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9283_8: . cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti āttvasya asiddhatvāt yasya halaḥ iti yalopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9283_9: . samānāśrayavacanāt siddham . samānāśrayam asiddham bhavati vyāśrayam ca etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_0: pupuvuṣaḥ paśya iti . vasau ākāralopādīni vasantasya vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . paśuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_1: iti viṭi āttvam viḍantasya vibhaktau ākāralopaḥ . cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti yaṅi āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_2: yaṅantasya ca ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_3: gaṃsyate . atragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . nanu ca anyat atragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_4: . kim uktam . atragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham . iha papuṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9291_0: dvau hetū vypadiṣṭau bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam asiddhatvam ca iti . tatra bhavaet asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9291_1: pratyuktam bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam tu na eva pratyuktam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ bahiraṅgam antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:9291_2: iti ca pratidvandvibhāvinau etau arthau . katham . sati antaraṅge bahiraṅgam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:9291_3: ca bahiraṅge antaraṅgam . na ca atra antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samavasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9291_4: asti . na anabhinirvṛtte bahiraṅge antaraṅgam prāpnoti . tatra nimittam eva bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:9291_5: antaraṅgasya . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe lyapi . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:9292_0: pratamayya gataḥ . prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9292_1: . pragadayya gataḥ . hrasvayalopāllopānām asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9292_2: na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . ṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:9292_3: ete vidhayaḥ ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ siddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9293: babhūvuḥ : vukaḥ asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ prāpnoti . upadidīye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9295: yuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti . vukaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . vukam na vakṣyāmi . evam vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:9296_0: bhuvaḥ luṅliṭoḥ ūt upadhāyāḥ iti . atra uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9296_1: . evam api kutaḥ nu khalu etat uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9296_2: na punaḥ sāmpratikī yā upadhā tasyāḥ syāt bhakārasya . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . oḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9296_3: . tena uvarṇasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham babhūvatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_0: babhūva babhūvitha iti . kim kāraṇam . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ uvarṇābhāvāt . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_1: guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt . katham kittvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_2: indhibhavatibhyām ca iti . tat vai vayam kittvam pratyācakṣmahe vukā . iha tu kittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_3: vuk pratyākhyāyate . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . vugvacanam eva nyāyyam . sati api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_4: kittve syātām eva atra guṇavṛddhī . kim kāraṇam . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_5: na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . evam tarhi na arthaḥ vukā na api kittvena . stām atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_6: guṇavṛddhī . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ avāvoḥ ca kṛtayoḥ yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9298_7: . katham . oḥ iti atra avarṇam api pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9299_0: . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapau kīlālapāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9299_1: evam tarhi vyoḥ iti vartate . tena uvarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . oḥ vyoḥ iti . iha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:9299_2: oḥ iti anuvartate . vyoḥ iti nivṛttam . yuṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyam . yuḍvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9299_3: na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat yuḍvacane prayojanam . kim . dvayoḥ yakārayoḥ śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9299_4: yathā syāt . na vyañjanaparasya anekasya ekasya vā yakārasya śravaṇam prati viśeṣaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9301_0: KA_III.192.9-193.19 Ro_IV.701-705 kim punaḥ prāk bhāt asiddhatvam āhosvit saha tena
GS24pmbhasuu:9301_1: . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ . āṅā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅ ca punaḥ sandeham janayati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:9302: ā pāṭaliputrāt vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9303: kim prāk pāṭaliputrāt saha tena iti . evam iha api sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_0: prāk bhāt saha tena iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_1: upasaṅkhyānam . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_2: śunaḥ paśya . śunā śune . samprasāraṇe kṛte allopaḥ anaḥ iti prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_3: saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na saṃyogāt vamantāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_4: . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na astri atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_5: viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_6: nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_7: . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_8: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_9: . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na vayam lakṣaṇasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_10: yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_11: vibhaktisvaraḥ na asti . bahuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_12: pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasjyeta kumārī iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_13: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati iti yat ayam śvanśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_14: gaurādiṣu paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham hi syāt ṅīpā eva . maghonaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_15: paśya . maghonā maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_16: saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_17: tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . vakṣyati etat maghavan-śabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_18: iti . bhūguṇaḥ . bhūyān . bhūbhāve kṛte oḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha tena
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_19: asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_20: api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . dīrghoccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . asti dīrghoccāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_21: prayojanam . kim . bhūmā iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . bahoḥ nañvat
GS24pmbhasuu:9304_22: uttarapadabhūmni iti . atha vā punaḥ astu saha tena iti . ā bhāt iti cet susamprasāraṇayalopaprasthādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:9308_0: pupuvuṣaḥ iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte aci iti ākāralopādīni na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9308_1: doṣaḥ . uktam etat samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . vasau ākāralopādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:9308_2: vasantasya vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . yalopaḥ . saurī balākā . yaḥ asau aṇi akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9308_3: lupyate tasya asiddhatvāt īti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ eva parihāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9308_4: samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . aṇi akāralopaḥ aṇantasya īti lopaḥ . prasthādiṣu . preyān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9309_0: stheyān . prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9309_1: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9311_0: KA_III.193.21-194.8 Ro_IV.705-707 atha kimartham śnamaḥ saśakārasya grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9311_1: na nāt nalopaḥ iti eva ucyeta . nāt nalopaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne nanditā nandakaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9311_2: atra api prasajyeta . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi nāt nalopaḥ aniditām . tataḥ halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9311_3: upadhāyāḥ kṅiti . aniditām iti . na evam śakyam . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9312_0: hinasti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam nanditā nandakaḥ iti prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9312_1: tarhi kṅiti iti vartate . evam api hinasti iti atra na prāpnoti . na eṣā parasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:9312_2: . kā tarhi . satsaptamī . kṅiti sati . evam tarhi naśabdaḥ eva atra kṅittvena viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9312_3: kṅit cet naśabdaḥ bhavati iti . evam api yajñānām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9313_0: yatnānām iti atra na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:9313_1: . dīrghatvam kriyatām nalopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9313_2: saśakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api saśakāragrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati viśnānām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9314: praśnānām iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9316_0: KA_III.194.10-195.4 Ro_IV.707-709 aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9316_1: upasaṅkhyānam . aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9318_0: vikampitaḥ . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nibarhayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9318_1: nibarhakaḥ . aci iti kimartham . nibṛṃhyate . aniṭi iti kimartham . nibṛṃhitā nibṛṃhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:9318_2: . tat tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9318_3: . aci iti lopaḥ ucyate . anajādau api dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:9319: nibṛhyate . aniṭi iti ucyate . iṭau api dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:9320: nibarhitum . ajādau iti ucyate . ajādau api na dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:9321_0: nibṛṃhayati nibṛṃhakaḥ . rañjeḥ ṇau mṛgamaraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . rajayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9321_1: mṛgān . mṛgamaraṇe iti kimartham . rañjayati vastrāṇi . ghinuṇi ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9321_2: kartavyam . rāgī . ghinuṇi nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . tyajaraja iti . aśakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9321_3: dhātunirdeśe nipātanam tantram āśrayitum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9323_0: daṃṣṭrā . na etat dhātunipātanam . kim tarhi . pratyayāntasya etat rūpam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9323_1: ca asya pratyaye lopaḥ bhavati . daṃśasañjasvañjām śapi iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu
GS24pmbhasuu:9325: rajaḥ iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu kittvāt siddham . kitaḥ eva ete auṇādikāḥ . tat yathā rucakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_0: KA_III.195.8-196.2 Ro_IV.709-711 śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau . śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āśīḥ iti . kim punaḥ idam niyamārtham āhosvit vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_2: . katham ca niyamārtham syāt katham vā vidhyartham . yadi tāvat śāsimātrasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_3: tataḥ niyamārtham . athi hi yasmāt śāsaḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam tataḥ vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_4: . yadi api śāsimātrasya grahaṇam evam api vidhyartham eva . katham . aṅhaloḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_5: ucyate na ca atra halādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kvip eva halādiḥ . kvipaḥ lope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_6: halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām aṅhaloḥ itttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_7: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅhaloḥ itttvam . nityaḥ kviblopaḥ . kṛte api aṅhaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_8: itttve prāpnoti akṛte api . nityatvāt kviblope kṛte halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_9: tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam . yadi vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_10: kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā ca idam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9328_11: . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ . tataḥ kvau . kvau ca śāsaḥ it bhavati . āryaśīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9329: mitraśīḥ . tataḥ āṅaḥ . āṅpūrvāt ca kvau śāsaḥ it bhavati . āśīḥ iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . āṅpūrvāt śāsaḥ kvau eva . kva mā bhūt . āśāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9330_0: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa śāsaḥ it bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9330_1: iti uktvā tataḥ aṅi iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aṅi eva ajādau na

GS24pmbhasuu:9331: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam na ca etasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ . katham āśīḥ iti . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . kṣiyāśīḥpraiṣeṣu tiṅ ākāṅkṣam iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:9338: KA_III.196.14-22 Ro_IV.712-713 atha kim ayam samuccayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9341: sani jhalādau iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti . sisaniṣati jijaniṣate cikhaniṣati . atha sanviśeṣaṇam jhalgrahaṇam jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_0: jātavān iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat samuccayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_1: nanu ca uktam sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtam jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_2: anuvartate . tena sanam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau iti . atha vā punaḥ astu sanviśeṣaṇam . katham jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9343_0: jātavān iti . prakṛtam jhali kṅiti iti anuvartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9343_1: . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . janasanakhanām anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:9343_2: . tataḥ sani . sani ca janasanakhanām anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_0: KA_III.197.1-198.12 Ro_IV.713-716 sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_1: sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_2: anye tanotyādayaḥ . āttvasya avakāśaḥ anye janādayaḥ . sanoteḥ anunāsikasya ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_3: prāpnoti . sātaḥ sātavān iti . āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_4: . na hi sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya anye tanotyādayaḥ avakāśaḥ . sanoteḥ yaḥ tanotyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_5: pāṭhaḥ saḥ anavakāśaḥ . na khalu api āttvasya anye janādayaḥ avakāśaḥ . sanoteḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_6: āttve grahaṇam tat anavakāśam . tasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_7: tarhi tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ tāvat sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_8: . tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ iti . āttve api grahaṇam sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sani ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_9: ye vibhāṣā ca . ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_10: . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ pūrvatra asiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_11: iti . ekasya nāma abhāve vipratiṣedhaḥ na syāt kim punaḥ yatra ubhayam na asti .

GS24pmbhasuu:9478: piyanti iti atra prāpnoti . oḥ iti vartate . evam api suvanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9479: ruvanti iti atra prāpnoti . anekācaḥ iti vartate . evam api asuvan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_0: aruvan iti atra prāpnoti . etat api aṭaḥ asiddhatvāt ekāc bhavati . evam api prorṇuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_1: iti atra prāpnoti . asaṃyogapūrvasya iti vartate . yaṅlugartham tarhi huśnugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_2: kartavyam . yaṅlugantam anekāc asaṃyogapūrvam uvarṇāntam asti . tadartham idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_3: nadam yoyuvatīnām . vṛṣabham roruvatīnām . yaṅlugartham iti cet ārdhadhātukatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_4: siddham . yaṅlugartham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . ārdhadhātukatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_5: katham ārdhadhātukatvam . ubhayathā chandasi iti vacanāt . anye api hi dhātupratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_6: ubhayathā chandasi dṛśyante . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat huśnugrahaṇam karoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_7: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yaṅluk bhāṣāyām bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bebhidīti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9481: cecchidīti etat siddham bhavati bhāṣāyām api .
GS24pmbhasuu:9483_0: KA_III.211.16-212.8 Ro_IV.753-754 atha kimartham guheḥ vikṛtasya grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9483_1: na punaḥ guhaḥ iti eva ucyeta . gohigrahaṇam viṣayārtham . gohigrahaṇam kriyate viṣayārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9483_2: . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . yatra asya etat rūpam tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : nijuguhatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_0: nijuguhuḥ iti . ayādeśapratiṣedhārtham ca . ayādeśapratiṣedhārtham ca vikṛtagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_1: kriyate . hrasvādeśe hi ayādeśaprasaṅgaḥ ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . hrasvādeśe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_2: ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta . pragūhya gataḥ . kim kāraṇam . ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_3: ūttvam . tasya asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta . viṣayārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_4: tāvat na arthaḥ gohigrahaṇena . praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . u-ūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9485: ūt iti . tatra hrasvasya avakāśaḥ : nijuguhatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9488_0: nigūhakaḥ . paratvāt guṇe kṛte āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayādeśapratiṣedhārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:9488_1: api na arthaḥ . samānāśrayavacanāt siddham . samānāśrayam asiddham bhavati vyāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9488_2: ca etat . katham . ṇau ūttvam ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9490_0: KA_III.212.10-15 Ro_IV.754 atha kimartham duṣeḥ vikṛtasya grahaṇam kriyate na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9490_1: duṣaḥ iti eva ucyeta . doṣigrahaṇam ca . kim . ayādeśapratiṣedhārtham hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:9490_2: hi ayādeśaprasaṅgaḥ ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . hrasvādeśe hi sati ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:9490_3: . pradūṣya gataḥ . kim kāraṇam . ūttvasya asiddhatvāt . asiddham ūttvam . tasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9490_4: lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ prasajyeta . atra api samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9492: KA_III.212.17-213.4 Ro_IV.754-755 ciṇṇamuloḥ ṇijvyavetānām yaṅlope ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śamayantam prayojitavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_0: śaṃśāmam śaṃśāmam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ciṇṇamulpare ṇau mitām aṅgānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_1: dīrghaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra ciṇṇamulparaḥ na tasmin mit aṅgam yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_2: ca mit aṅgam na asau ciṇṇamulparaḥ iti . lope kṛte ciṇṇamulparaḥ bhavati . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_3: na ciṇṇamulparaḥ . nanu ca pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_4: na sthānivat iti . evam api asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ciṇṇamuloḥ ṇijvyavetānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_5: yaṅlope ca antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . kim idam antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_6: brūyāt samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti eva vyāśrayam ca etat . katham . ṇeḥ ṇau lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_7: ṇau ciṇṇamulpare mitām aṅgānām dīrghatvam ucyate . tasmāt na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9501: KA_III.213.6-9 Ro_IV.756 adviprabhṛtyupasargasya iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9502_0: samupābhicchādaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yatra triprabhṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9502_1: santi dvau api tatra staḥ . tatra advyupasargasya iti eva siddham . na vai eṣaḥ loke
GS24pmbhasuu:9502_2: sampratyayaḥ . na hi dviputraḥ ānīyatām iti ukte triputraḥ ānīyate . tasmāt adviprabhṛtyupasargasya iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9504_0: KA_III.213.11-13 Ro_IV.756-757 halgrahaṇam anarthakam anyatra api darśanāt . halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9504_1: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anyatra api darśanāt . anyatra api lopaḥ dṛśyate . agniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_0: KA_III.213.15-214.7 Ro_IV.757-758 iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rudihi svapihi . jhalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_1: iti dhitvam prāpnoti . heḥ dhitve haladhikārāt iṭaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . heḥ dhitve haladhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_2: iṭaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . dhitvam kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_3: . haladhikārāt . prakṛtam halgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ghasibhasoḥ hali
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_4: iti . tat vai saptamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . tat vai tatra pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_5: . tatra pratyākhyātam sat yayā vibhaktyā nirdiśyamānam arthavattayā nirdiṣṭam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_6: anuvartiṣyate . atha vā hujhalbhayaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī hali iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_7: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . atha vā nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_8: . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati . iṭā vyavahitatvāt . yadi evam chindhaki
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_9: bhindhaki iti atra dhitvam na prāpnoti . dhitve kṛte akac bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_10: . dhitvam kriyatām akac iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dhitvam . nityaḥ akac .
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_11: kṛte api dhitve prāpnoti akṛte api . akac api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte dhitve prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_12: anyasya akṛte śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9506_13: paratvāt dhitve kṛte akac bhaviṣyati . atha vā hakārasya eva aśaktijena ikāreṇa grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9508: KA_III.214.9-25 Ro_IV.759-760 ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt : akāritarām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_0: ahāritarām iti . ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt . ciṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_1: luki tagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt . saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_2: luk kasmāt na bhavati . apratyayatvāt . pratyayasya lukślulupaḥ bhavanti iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_3: na ca saṅghātaḥ pratyayaḥ . talope tarhi kṛte parasya prāpnoti . talopasya ca asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_4: . asiddhaḥ talopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . kāryakṛtatvāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_5: kṛtaḥ ciṇaḥ luk iti kṛtvā punaḥ na bhaviṣyati luk . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_6: ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_7: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam yat tasya eva punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na syāt . yat tu tadāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_8: prāpnoti na tat śakyam bādhitum . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_9: yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam vasante vasante ijyate . tasmāt pūrvoktau eva parihārau
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_10: . atha vā kṅiti iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . gamahanajanakhanaghasām lopaḥ kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_11: anaṅi iti . tat vai saptamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . ciṇaḥ luk iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9509_12: eṣā pañcamī kṅiti iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_0: KA_III.215.2-11 Ro_IV.760-761 katham idam vijñāyate . ukārāt pratyayāt iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_1: ukārāntāt pratyayāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate ukārāt pratyayāt iti siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_2: tanu kuru . cinu sunu iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate ukārāntāt pratyayāt iti siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_3: cinu sunu iti . tanu kuru na sidhyati . tathā asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena iha eva paryudāsaḥ syāt : takṣṇuhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9512_0: akṣṇuhi . āpnuhi śaknuhi iti atra na syāt . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:9512_1: ukārāt pratyayāt iti . katham cinu sunu iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9512_2: punaḥ astu ukārāntāt pratyayāt iti . katham tanu kuru iti . vyapdeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9512_3: . yat api ucyate tathā asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena iha eva paryudāsaḥ syāt : takṣṇuhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9513: akṣṇuhi . āpnuhi śaknuhi iti atra na syāt iti . na asmābhiḥ asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena ukārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ukāraḥ . ukāraḥ yaḥ asaṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9515_0: KA_III.215.12-17 Ro_IV.760-762 utaḥ ca pratyayāt chandovāvacanam . utaḥ ca pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9515_1: iti atra chandasi vā iti vaktavyam . ava sthira tanuhi yātujunām . dhinuhi yajñam
GS24pmbhasuu:9515_2: dhinuhi yajñapatim . tena mā bhāginam kṛṇuhi . uttarārtham ca . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9516: vāvacanam kartavyam iti . lopaḥ ca asya anyaratasyām mvoḥ iti atra anyaratasyāṅgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9518: KA_III.215.19-217.5 Ro_IV.762-765 sārvadhātuke iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt : sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_0: kariṣyati kariṣyataḥ . kṛñaḥ uttve ukārāntanirdeśāt syāntasya apratiṣedhaḥ . kṛñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_1: uttve ukārāntanirdeśāt syāntasya apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_2: . uttvam kasmāt na bhavati . ukārāntanirdeśāt . aśakyaḥ karotau ukārāntanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_3: tantram āśrayitum . iha samparibhyām bhūṣaṇasamavāyayoḥ krotau iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9521_0: saṃskaroti . saṃskartā saṃsakrtum iti atra na syāt . na brūmaḥ asmāt ukārāntanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9521_1: yaḥ ayam karoti iti . kim tarhi . ukāraprakaraṇāt ukārāntam aṅgam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9521_2: . utaḥ iti vartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9522_0: sañcaskaruḥ iti . utaḥ iti vartate . uttarārtham tarhi sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9522_1: . śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti . śnam sārvadhātuke eva . asteḥ api ārdhadhātuke bhūbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:9522_2: bhavitavyam . uttarārtham eva tarhi . śnābhyastayoḥ ātaḥ iti . śnā sārvadhātuke eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9522_3: . abhyastam api ākārāntam ārdhadhātuke na asti . nanu ca idam asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:9523_0: apsu yāyāvaraḥ pravapeta piṇḍān iti . na etat ākārāntam . yakārāntam etat . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9523_1: eva tarhi . ī hali aghoḥ iti . tatra api śnābhyastayoḥ iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9523_2: eva tarhi . id daridrasya iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_0: daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . ataḥ api uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_1: . bhiyaḥ anyatarasyām . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham eva . jahāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_2: ca . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham . ā ca hau . hau iti ucyate . abhyastasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_3: iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham . lopaḥ yi . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_4: . ghavsoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca iti . hau iti ucyate . tat eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_5: . śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam śnam sārvadhātuke eva . asteḥ api ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_6: bhūbhāvena bhavitavyam iti . anuprayoge tu bhuvā astyabādhanam smaranti kartuḥ vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_7: manīṣiṇaḥ . anuprayoge tu bhuvā asteḥ abādhanam iṣyate : īhām āsa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_0: īhām āsuḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra lopaḥ syāt . lope dvirvacanāsiddhiḥ . lope
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_1: kṛte anackatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . sthānivadbhādāt bhaviṣyati . sthānivat iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_2: kṛte bhavet dvitve . kṛte dvitve lopaḥ prāpnoti . asti tarhi parasya lopaḥ . abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_3: yaḥ akāraḥ tasya dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na evam sidhyati kasmāt pratyaṅgatvāt bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_4: hi pararūpam . na evam sidhyati . kasmāt . pratyaṅgatvāt pararūpam prāpnoti . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_5: ca kṛte lopaḥ . pararūpe ca kṛte lopaḥ prāpnoti . dīrghatvam bādhakam bhavet tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_6: . ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam bādhakam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:9526_7: bhūtapūrvamātre api yathā syāt : kuru iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9528: KA_III.217.7-8 Ro_IV. 765-766 atha atra taparakaraṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt : āstām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9529: āsan . na etat asti prayojanam . āṭaḥ asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9531_0: KA_III.217.10-18 Ro_IV.766 daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ . daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:9531_1: lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9531_2: prayojanam . daridrāti iti daridraḥ . ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9531_3: . na daridrāyake lopaḥ daridrāṇe ca na iṣyate . didaridrāsasti iti eke didaridriṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:9531_4: iti vā . vā adyatanyām . adyatanyām vā iti vaktavyam . adaridrīt , adaridrāsīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9533: KA_III.217.20-218.20 Ro_IV.767-768 ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvavacanam liṭi . ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvam liṭi vaktavyam . nematuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9537_0: sehire . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anādeśādeḥ iti lpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9537_1: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . liṭā atra ādeśādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . liṭi yaḥ ādeśādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9537_2: tadādeḥ na iti . asti anyat liḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9538_0: paktā paktum . na etat asti prayojanam . kṅiti iti vartate . evam api pakvaḥ pakvavān
GS24pmbhasuu:9538_1: iti atra prāpnoti . abhyāsalopasanniyogena ettvam ucyate na ca atra abhyāsalopasam
GS24pmbhasuu:9538_2: paśyāmaḥ . evam api pāpacyate atra prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9538_3: . na aprāpte abhyāsavikāre ettam arabhyate . tat yatha anyān abhyāsavikārān bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:9538_4: evam dīrghatvam api bādheta . satyam evam etat . abhyāsavikāreṣu tu jyeṣṭhamadhyamakanīyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9538_5: prakārāḥ bhavanti . tatra hrasvahalādiśeṣau utsargau . tayoḥ dīrghatvam apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9538_6: ettvam ca . apavādavipratiṣedhāt dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi babhaṇatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_0: babhaṇuḥ iti abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt ettvam prāpnoti . phalibhajigrahaṇam tu jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_1: abhyāsādeśasiddhatvasya . yat ayam phalibhajyoḥ grahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_2: siddhaḥ abhyāsādeśaḥ ettve iti . yadi evam prathamatṛtīyādīnām ādeśāditvāt ettvābhāvaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:9677_4: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na taddhite tatvam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane

GS24pmbhasuu:9688_15: ṣiṭṭitau karoti . na vā ṣitkaraṇam ṅīṣvidhānārtham . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti

GS24pmbhasuu:9688_20: . vipratiṣedhāt tu ṭāpaḥ balīyastvam bhaviṣyati . ṭāpaḥ avakāśaḥ khaṭvā mālā . ṅīpaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:9697_0: 9-10 tat etat ananyārtham jhalgrahaṇam kartavyam numpratiṣedhaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9697_1: na vaktavyam . upariṣṭāt jhalgrahaṇam kriyate tat purastāt apakrakṣyate . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:9697_2: sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9697_3: adhātoḥ . yujeḥ asamāse . tataḥ napuṃsakasya . napuṃsakasya num bhavati . jhalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9697_4: iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . tataḥ acaḥ . ajantasya ca napuṃsakaliṅgasya num bhavati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9697_5: api tāvat etat ugitkāryam parihṛtam idam aparam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_0: śātanitarā pātanitarā . ugitaḥ nadyāḥ ghādiṣu hrasvaḥ bhavati iti anyatarasyām hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_1: prasajyeta nityam ca iṣyate . ugitaḥ yā nadī evam etat vijñāyate . ugitaḥ eṣā nadī
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_2: . ugitaḥ yā parā . atra ca eva doṣaḥ bhavati ugitaḥ hi eṣā parā nadī aiṣumatitarāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_3: ca prāpnoti . ugitaḥ parā yā vihitā . ugitaḥ eṣā vihitā . ugitaḥ iti evam yā vihitā
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_4: . evam api bhogavatitarāyām doṣaḥ bhavati . bhogavatitarā bhogavatītarā . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_5: ugitaḥ yā nadī ugitaḥ yā vihitā iti evam etat vijñāsyate . evam vijñāyamāne śātanitarāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_6: doṣaḥ eva . siddham tu yuvoḥ anunāsikatvāt siddham etat . katham . yakāravakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9698_7: eva idam anunāsikayoḥ grahaṇam . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_1: vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_2: svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādiṣu iṣṭaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt iti . śileyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_3: taittirīyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi upadeśivadbhāve pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_4: kṛte āntaryataḥ ādeśāḥ asvarakāṇām asvarakāḥ syuḥ . na vā kva cit citkaraṇāt upadeśivadvacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_5: na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . kva cit citkaraṇāt . yat ayam kva cit ghādīn citaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_6: karoti agrāt yat ghacchau ca tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_7: iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . citkaraṇe etat prayojanam citaḥ iti antodāttatvam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_8: syāt iti . yadi ca upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti tataḥ citkaraṇam arthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_9: bhavati . tatra uṇādipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra uṇādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śaṅkhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_10: śāṇḍhaḥ iti . dhātoḥ vā īyaṅvacanāt . atha vā yat ayam ṛteḥ īyaṅ iti dhātoḥ īyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_11: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na dhātupratyayānām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_12: syuḥ ṛteḥ chaṅ iti eva brūyāt . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_13: ca ṛteḥ chaṅā sidhyati . chaṅi sati valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prasajyeta . iṭi kṛte anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_14: ādeśaḥ na syāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_15: . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ ādeśaḥ . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_16: na hi kṛte iṭi prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ādeśaḥ . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_17: antaraṅgatā . idānīm eva hi uktam āyanādiṣu upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_18: . tat etat ṛteḥ īyaṅvacanam jñāpakam eva na dhātupratyayānām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9702_19: iti . prātipadikavijñānāt ca pāṇineḥ siddham prātipadikavijñānāt ca bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_0: 13.4-15.5 jhādeśe dhātvantapratiṣedhaḥ jhādeśe dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_1: . ujjhitā ujjhitum iti . pratyayādhikārāt siddham . pratyayagrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_2: . kva prakṛtam . āyaneyīnīyiyaḥ phaḍakhachaghām pratyayādīnām iti . pratyayādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_3: siddham iti cet anādeḥ ādeśavacanam . pratyayādhikārāt siddham iti cet anādeḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_4: vaktavyaḥ . api naḥ śvaḥ vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai . evam tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_5: anuvartate ādigrahaṇam nivṛttam . katham punaḥ samāsanirdiṣṭānām ekadeśaḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_6: ekadeśaḥ vā nivartate . asamāsanirdeśāt siddham . asamāsanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_7: ādīnām iti . saḥ tarhi asamāsanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_8: . katham . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . pratyaya ādīnām iti . tatra śayāntai iti anakārāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_9: aṅgasya ādbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra etasmin pratyayagrahaṇe anuvartamāne ādigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_10: nivṛtte śayāntai iti anakārāntatvāt aṅgasya ādbhāvaḥ prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_11: . siddham anānantaryāt anakārāntena adbhāvanivṛttiḥ . siddham etat . katham . anānantaryāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_12: anakārāntena adbhāvaḥ na bhaviṣyati . katham kṛtvā coditam katham kṛtvā parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_13: . anakārāntagrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam iti kṛtvā coditam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_14: parihāraḥ . yadi anakārāntagrahaṇam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam śerate atra na prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_15: ruṭi sanniyogavacanāt siddham . tatra ruṭi sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_16: codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . ruṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_17: . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . adbhāvaḥ . saḥ tarhi cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_18: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . śīṅaḥ . śīṅaḥ uttarasya jhasya at bhavati . tataḥ ruṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_19: ruṭ ca bhavati śīṅaḥ iti . evam api paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . evam tarhi acśabdasya ruṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_20: vakṣyāmi . tat acśabdagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_21: prakṛtam . at abhyastāt iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9706_22: . śīṅaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī at iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhī prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9710_0: 15.7-17.6 ruṭi dṛśiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ . ruṭi dṛśiguṇaḥ prāpnoti . adṛśran asya ketavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9710_1: iti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . parasmin iti kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9710_2: . evam api adṛśram asya ketavaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9710_3: . pūrvānte śīṅaḥ guṇavidhiḥ pūrvānte śīṅaḥ guṇaḥ vidheyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_0: śerate . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ruṭi dṛśiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_1: iti . pūrvānte api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . ayam dṛśiguṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_2: saḥ yathā eva kṅiti ca iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam anupadhāyāḥ api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_3: . tasmāt ubhābhyām dṛśeḥ akpratyayāntaram vaktavyam pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_4: dṛśeyam iti evam artham . jhādeśāt āṭ leṭi jhādeśāt āṭ leṭi bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_5: . jhādeśasya avakāśaḥ . lunate lunatām alunata . āṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . patāti didyut .
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_6: udadhim cyāvayāti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . api naḥ śvaḥ vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_7: śayāntai . āṭ leṭi bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_8: . na vā nityatvāt āṭaḥ . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nityatvāt āṭaḥ . nitaḥ āḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_9: . saḥ katham nityaḥ . yadi anakārāntagrahaṇam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam . atha hi pratyayaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_10: jhādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt ca . antaraṅgaḥ khalu api āḍāgamaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_11: antaraṅgaḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . atha hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_12: ubhayam samānāśrayam . yadi eva anakārāntagrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam atha api lādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_13: dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartate ubhayathā api pūrvavipratiṣedhena na arthaḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9711_14: bahulam chandasi iti evam atra śapaḥ luk na bhaviṣyati . tatra anataḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9715_0: 17.11-17 idam bahulam chandasi iti dviḥ kriyate . ekam śakyam akartum . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9715_1: yadi tāvat pūrvam kriyate param na kariṣyate . ataḥ bhisaḥ ais iti atra bahulam chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:9715_2: iti etat anuvartiṣyate . atha param kriyate pūrvam na kariṣyate . bahulam chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:9715_3: iti atra ruṭ api anuvartiṣyate . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:9716_0: ubhe bahulagrahaṇe ekam chandograhaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . idam asti . vetteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9716_1: vibhāṣā . tataḥ chandasi . chandasi ca vibhāṣā . tataḥ ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9720_0: 18.2-9 iha vṛkṣaiḥ plakṣaiḥ iti paratvāt ettvam prāpnoti . aisbhāvaḥ idānīm kva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9720_1: . kṛte ettve bhautapūrvyāt . kṛte ettve bhūtapūrvamakārāntam iti ais bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9720_2: ais tu nityaḥ tathā sati . evam sati nityaḥ aisbhāvaḥ kṛte api ettve prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:9720_3: api prāpnoti . nityatvāt aistve kṛte vihatanimittatvāt ettvam na bhaviṣyati . ettvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9720_4: bhisi paratvāt cet ataḥ ais kva bhaviṣyati . kṛte ettve bhautapūrvyāt ais tu nityaḥ tathā sati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9724: 18.11-13 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete . ubhau śakyau avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi . idamadasoḥ kāt iti . tanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . idamadasoḥ kāt eva na anyataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9728: 18.15-20.3 kimartham inādeśaḥ ucyate na nādeśaḥ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_0: vṛkṣeṇa plakṣeṇa . ettve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . katham . idam asti . bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_1: jhali et osi ca . tataḥ āṅi ca . āṅi ca parataḥ ataḥ ettvam bhavati . vṛkṣeṇa plakṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_2: . tataḥ āpaḥ sambuddhau ca . āpaḥ āṅi ca osi ca iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi anena
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_3: iti idrūpalopaḥ prasajyeta . jhali lopaḥ kariṣyate . na śakyaḥ jhali lopaḥ kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_4: . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . ayā viṣṭā iti . evam tarhi anlopāpavādaḥ vijñāsyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_5: . evam vakṣyāmi . an ne ca api ca iti . tat nakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_6: . kriyate nyāse eva . lupanirdiṣṭaḥ nakāraḥ . yadi evam na upadhāyāḥ iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_7: prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9729_8: āt ucyate na at eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ vṛkṣāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9730_0: plakṣāt . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe pararūpam iti pararūpatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9730_1: prāpnoti . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9730_2: bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9730_3: anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:9730_4: prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9734_0: 20.5-10 kim idam caturthyekavacanasya grahaṇam āhosvit saptamyekavacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9734_1: . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . caturthyekavacanasya grahaṇam . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9734_2: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . iha api tarhi caturthyekavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9734_3: grahaṇam syāt . ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ . evam tarhi vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9734_4: na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti iha caturthyekavacanays agrahaṇam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_0: 21.2-15 aśaḥ ekādiṣṭāt smāyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam aśaḥ ekādiṣṭāt smāyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_1: kartavyam . atha u atra asmai . atha u atra asmāt . atha u atra asmin iti . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_2: kṛte ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekādeśaḥ tāvat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_3: na punaḥ smāyādayaḥ . na paratvāt smāyādibhiḥ bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_4: kāraṇam . nityatvāt ekādeśaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛteṣu api smāyādiṣu prāpnoti akṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_5: api . nityatvāt ekādeśe kṛte ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . kim ucyate aśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_6: iti na iha api kartavyam . atra asmai . atra asmāt . atra asmin iti . ekādeśe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_7: ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛteṣu smāyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_8: halādiḥ vibhaktiḥ asti halādau cet rūpalopaḥ na ca akṛtae idrūpalope ekādeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_9: . tat ānupūryā siddham . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_10: . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9742: 21.18-21 kimartham śībhāvaḥ śibhāvaḥ ca ucyate na śibhāvaḥ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9743_0: te ye ke . ādguṇena siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi trapuṇī jatunī dīrghaśravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9743_1: na syāt . evam tarhi śībhavaḥ eva ucyatām . na evam śakyam . iha hi kuṇḍāni vanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9743_2: iti hrasvasya śravaṇam na syāt . tasmāt śībhāvaḥ śibhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9748_0: iti ucyamāne prathamādvivacanasya eva syāt . atha api auṭ iti ucyate evam api dvitīyādvivacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9748_1: eva syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . ṅitkāryam tu prāpnoti . khaṭve
GS24pmbhasuu:9748_2: māle . yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya
GS24pmbhasuu:9748_3: saḥ ayam ṅit ṅiti iti . katham tarhi . ṅaḥ eva it ṅit ṅiti iti . evam sati varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9748_4: idam bhavati varṇagrahaṇeṣu ca etat bhavati yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9748_5: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha vā varṇagrahaṇam idam bhavati na ca etat varṇagrahaṇeṣu bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9749_0: ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti . atha vā pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ayam pūrvasūtreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9749_1: ca ye anubandhāḥ na taiḥ iha itkāryāṇi kriyante . aukāraḥ ayam śīvidhau ṅit gṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9749_2: ṅit ca asmākam na asti kaḥ ayam prakāraḥ . sāmānyārthaḥ tasya ca āsañjane asmin ṅitkāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:9749_3: te śyām prasaktam saḥ doṣaḥ . ṅittve vidyāt varṇanirdeśamātram varṇe yat syāt tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9749_4: ca vidyāt tadādau . varṇaḥ ca ayam tena ṅittve api adoṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ ayam pūrvasūtreṇa vā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_0: 23.8-25.13 auśaghau . auśaghau iti vaktavyam . kim idam aghau iti . anuttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_1: iti . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . aṣṭaputraḥ aṣṭabhāryaḥ iti . astu luk tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_2: . astu atra auśtvam luk bhaviṣyati . ṣaḍbhyaḥ api evam prasajyate . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_3: prāpnoti . aṣṭau tiṣṭhanti . aṣṭau paśya iti . apavādaḥ . apavādatvāt atra auśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_4: lukam bādhiṣyate . iha api tarhi bādheta . aṣṭaputraḥ aṣṭabhāryaḥ . yasya viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_5: . yasya lukaḥ viṣaye auśtvam tasya apavādaḥ . yaḥ vā tasmāt anantaraḥ . atha vā anantarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_6: lukaḥ bādhakam bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_7: vā iti . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati auśtvam . aṣṭa tiṣṭhanti . aṣṭa paśya iti . ātvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_8: yatra tu tatra auśtvam . yatra eva ātvam tatra eva auśtvena bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_9: . tathā hi asya grahaḥ kṛtaḥ . tathā hi asya ātvabhūtasya grahaṇam kriyate . aṣṭābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_10: iti . nanu ca nityam ātvam . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhāṣātvam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9753_11: ātvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti . aṣṭābhyaḥ iti . itarathā hi aṣṭanaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9757_0: 26.2-28.6 svamoḥ luk tyadādibhyaḥ ca svamoḥ luk tyadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9757_1: api yathā syāt . tat brāhmaṇakulam iti . kṛte hi atve na luk bhavet . atve kṛte luk
GS24pmbhasuu:9758_0: atvam kriyatām luk iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt atvam . nityaḥ luk . kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:9758_1: atve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ luk na hi kṛte atve prāpnoti . ataḥ am iti ambhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:9758_2: bhavitavyam . tasmāt tyadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . idam vicāryate :
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_0: śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam vā syāt arthagrahaṇam vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_1: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_2: pratiṣedhaḥ . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_3: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bahutrapuḥ bahutrapū bahutrapavaḥ iti . astu tarhi arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_4: . yadi arthagrahaṇam priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena iti anaṅ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi śabdagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_5: eva . nanu ca uktam śiśīlugnumbidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_6: iti . siddham tu prakṛtārthaviśeṣaṇatvāt . siddham etat . katham . prakṛtasya arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_7: viśeṣyate . kim ca prakṛtam . aṅgam . aṅgasya śiśīlugnumaḥ bhavanti napuṃsake vartamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_8: . katham priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena . asthyādiṣu śabdagrahaṇam . asthyādiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_9: śabdagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_10: arthagrahaṇena bhavitavyam na hi napuṃsakam nāma śabdaḥ asti . kim tarhi ucyate asthyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_11: śabdagrahaṇam iti . atra api arthagrahaṇam eva . atra etāvān sandehaḥ kva prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_12: arthaḥ viśeṣyate kva gṛhyamāṇasya iti . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu prakṛtasya arthaḥ viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9763: 28.8-29.5 adbhāve pūrvasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ . adbhāve pūrvasavarṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . katarat tiṣṭhati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_0: katarat paśya . siddham anunāsikopadhatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anunāsikopadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_1: acśabdaḥ kariṣyate . dukkaraṇāt vā . atha vā dugḍatarādīnām iti vakṣyati . ḍitkaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_2: vā . atha vā ḍid acchabdaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ tarhi ḍakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_3: . kriyate nyāse eva . dviḍakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . adḍḍatarādibhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9768: 29.7-30.8 itarāt chandasi pratiṣedhaḥ ekatarāt sarvatra . itarāt chandasi pratiṣedhaḥ ekatarāt sarvatra iti vaktavyam . ekataram tiṣṭhati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9769_0: ekataram paśya . napuṃsakādeśebhyaḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9769_1: napuṃsakādeśebhyaḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . napuṃsakādeśānām avakāśaḥ . trapu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9771: trapūṇi . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśānām avakāśaḥ . tvam brāhmaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9775: yūyām brāhmaṇāḥ vayam brāhmaṇāḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tvam brāhmaṇakulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9780_0: vayam brāhmaṇakulāni . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9780_1: idānīm yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśeṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt śiśīlugnumvidhayaḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9780_2: na bhavanti . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9784_0: 30.10-31.14 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . sarvādeśārthaḥ . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā

GS24pmbhasuu:9785_7: . ādeśaḥ eṣā vibhaktiḥ . katham . sarve sarvapadādeśā dākṣīputrasya pāṇineḥ ekadeśavikāre

GS24pmbhasuu:9792_0: 32.2-33.8 prathamayoḥ iti ucyate kayoḥ idam prathamayoḥ grahaṇam kim vibhaktyoḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_1: pratyayayoḥ . vibhaktyoḥ iti āha . katham jñāyate . anyatra api hi prathamayoḥ grahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_2: vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate na pratyayayoḥ . kva anyatra . prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_3: iti . asti kāraṇam yena tatra vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate . kim kāraṇam . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_4: tatra vartate na ca ajādī prathamau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate ajādī yau prathamau
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_5: ajādīnām vā yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_6: pratinirdiśati tajjñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti . iha api ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_7: jñāpayati vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti yat ayam śasaḥ na iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_8: pratiṣedhaḥ . natvam etat vidhīyate . siddham atra natvam tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:9792_9: iti . yatra tena na sidhyati tadartham . kva ca tena na sidhyati . striyām napuṃsake
GS24pmbhasuu:9795: asmān brāhmaṇakulāni paśya iti . yat tarhi yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe dvitīyāyām ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9799_0: 33.10-34.6 kim ayam bhyamśabdaḥ āhosvit abhyamśabdaḥ . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9799_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tāvat bhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca antyasya etvam prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:9799_2: abhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca ṭilopaḥ udāttnivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9799_3: astu . astu tāvat abhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca antyasya . nanu ca uktam ettvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9799_4: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgavṛtte punaḥ vṛttau avidhiḥ niṣṭhitasya iti na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9799_5: . atha vā punaḥ astu abhamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca ṭilopaḥ . nanu ca uktam udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9799_6: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ uktam etat ādau siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_0: 34.8-38.4 kimartham āmaḥ sasakārasya grahaṇam kriyate na āmaḥ ākam iti eva ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_1: . kena idānīm sasakārasya bhaviṣyati . āmaḥ suṭ ayam bhaktaḥ āmgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_2: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sāmgrahaṇam yathāgṛhītasya ādeśavacanāt . sāmgrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_3: . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam sasakārasya na prāpnoti . iṣyate ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_4: iti tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti sāmaḥ ākam . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_5: na vā dviparyantānām akāravacanāt āmi sakārābhāvaḥ . na vā etat prayojanam asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_6: kim kāraṇam . dviparyantānām akāravacanāt . dviparyantānām hi tyadādīnam atvam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_7: tena āmi sakāraḥ na bhaviṣyati . suṭpratiṣedhaḥ tu ādeśe lopavijñānāt . suṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_8: tu vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ādeśe lopavijñānāt . yaḥ saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ādeśe saḥ vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_9: . na vā ṭilopavacanāt ādeśe ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . na vā suṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_10: kim kāraṇam . ṭilopavacanāt . ādeśe yaḥ saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ṭilopaḥ saḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_11: prayojanam . ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . ṭāp mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi ṭilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_12: na vā liṅgābhāvāt ṭilopavacanānarthakyam . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . liṅgābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_13: . aliṅge yuṣmadasmadī . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_14: . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ striyām puṃsi napuṃsake vā . asti kāraṇam yena
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_15: etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt . aṅga
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_16: hi bhavān tam uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_17: . na hi śabdanimittakena nāma arthena bhavitavyam . kim tarhi artha nimittakena nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:9803_18: śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām :
GS24pmbhasuu:9804_0: artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9804_1: evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9804_2: na gamyate iti iha api tasya viśeṣaḥ na gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:9805_0: dṛṣat samit iti . tasmāt suṭpratiṣedhaḥ tasmāt suṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ sasakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9805_1: vā kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api sasakāragrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra suṭ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9810: tasthau iti trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat prāpnuvanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_0: dvirvacanam ekādeśaḥ autvam iti . tat yadi sarvataḥ autvam labhyeta kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_1: atha api dvirvacanam labhyeta evam api kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_2: . atra hi paratvāt ekādeśaḥ dvirvacanam bādhate . paratvāt autvam . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_3: autvam bādheta . kam punaḥ bhavān autvasya avakāśam matvā āha nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_4: . anavakāśam autvam ekādeśam bādhiṣyate . autve kṛte dvirvacanam ekādeśaḥ iti yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_5: api paratvāt ekādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9815_0: 40.2-41.1 videḥ vasoḥ kittvam . videḥ vasoḥ kittvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9815_1: vasugrahaṇeṣu liḍādeśasya api grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ananubandhakagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9815_2: hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti evam liḍādeśasya na prāpnoti . sānubandhakaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9815_3: saḥ kriyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam saḥ sānubandhakaḥ kriyate . ayam ṝkārāntānām liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:9815_4: guṅaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣayaḥ ārabhyate saḥ punaḥ kitkaraṇāt bādhyate . ātistīrvān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9816: nipupūrvān iti . saḥ tarhi asya evamarthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9821_0: 41-47 lyabādeśe upadeśivadvacanam . lyabādeśe upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9821_1: lyap bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . anādiṣṭārtham . akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu lyap
GS24pmbhasuu:9821_2: yathā syāt . ke punaḥ ādeśāḥ upadeśivadvacanam prayojayanti . hitvadattvāttvetvettvadīrghatvaśūḍitaḥ . hitvam . hitvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9830_0: pradīvya . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ādeśāḥ tāvat bhavanti na punaḥ lyap . na paratvāt lyapā
GS24pmbhasuu:9830_1: bhavitavyam . santi ca eva atra ke cit pare ādeśāḥ api ca bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9830_2: bahiraṅgaḥ lyap . antaraṅgāḥ ādeśāḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9830_3: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9830_4: lyap bādhate iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyapti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9830_5: karoti . snātvākālakādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ snātvākālakādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . snātvākālakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_0: bhuktvāsuhitakaḥ iti . tadantanirdeśāt siddham . tadantanirdeśāt siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_1: . ktvāntasya lyapā bhavitavyam na ca etat ktvāntam . samāsanipātanāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_2: avaśyam atra samāsārtham nipātanam kartavyam tena eva yatnena lyap api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_3: . anañaḥ vā parasya . atha vā anañaḥ parasya lyapā bhavitavyam na ca atra anañam
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_4: paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca dhātuḥ eva anañ . na dhātoḥ parasya bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_5: . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam iva yuktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_6: anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_7: yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte grāhmaṇasadṛśam puruṣam ānayati na asau loṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_8: ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api anañ iti nañpratiṣedhāt anyasmāt anañau nañsadṛśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_9: kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca anyat anañ nañsadṛśam . padam iti āha . atha vā pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_10: yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti evam dhātuḥ api ktvāgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9832_11: . nanu ca iyam api paribhāṣā asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:9833: kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti sā api iha upatiṣṭhate . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9834: prakṛtya prahṛtya . kva tarhi syāt . paramakṛtvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_0: uttamakṛtvā . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na sidhyati . gatikārakapūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_1: eva iṣyate . kutaḥ na khalu etat dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_2: pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_3: iti ca iyam iha paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_4: iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_5: iyam iha paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_6: ayam anañ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ayam hi nañ na gatiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_7: ca kārakam tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat nañpūrvasya syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ iyam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_8: paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe iti tataḥ anañ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_9: pratiṣedham śāsti . kim nañaḥ pratiṣedhena na gatiḥ na ca kārakam yāvatā nañi pūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:9835_10: tu lyabbhāvaḥ na bhaviṣyati . pratiṣedhāt tu jānīmaḥ tatpūrvam na iha gṛhyate pratyaygrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9839: 47-49 supām ca supaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . yuktā mātā āsīt bhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ dakṣiṇāyām iti prāpte . tiṅām ca tiṅaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . caṣālam ye ,

GS24pmbhasuu:9841_0: lohite carman . na etat asti . pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . idam tarhi . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9841_1: sthavīyasaḥ āvasan uta sapta sākam . nanu ca etat api pūrvasavarṇena eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9841_2: . na sidhyati . yadi atra pūrvasavarṇaḥ syāt tyadādyatvam prasajyeta . idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:9842_0: lohite carman . nanu ca uktam pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9842_1: yadi atra pūrvasavarṇaḥ syāt āntaryataḥ dakāraḥ prasajyeta . astu . saṃyogāntalopena
GS24pmbhasuu:9842_2: siddham . iyāḍiyājīkārāṇām upasaṅkhyānam . iyāḍiyājīkārāṇām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9843: sugātuyā . ḍiyāc . īkāra . dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam . āṅayājayārām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āṅ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9844: pra bāhavā . ayāc . svapnayā sacase janam . ayāc . ayār . saḥ naḥ sindhum iva nāvayā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_0: 49.4-50.3 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_1: hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_2: paṭhati . amaḥ maś na makārasya . makārasya makāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_3: tatra antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . vacanāt anyabādhanam . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_4: makārasya makāravacane prayojanam . ye anye makārādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_5: . tat yathā . maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti makārasya makāravacanasāmarthyāt anusvārādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_6: bādhyante . evam tarhi dvimakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . dvimakāraḥ īṭ apṛkte . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_7: dvimakārakaḥ apṛktāśrayaḥ īṭ na prāpnoti . vadhīm vṛtram marutaḥ indriyeṇa . yakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_8: na duṣyati . kim yakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ . amaḥ maś na makārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9848_9: vacanāt anyabādhanam dvimakāraḥ īṭ apṛkte yakārādau na duṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9854: āt jaseḥ asuk iti asuki kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi jasi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_0: brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ . savarṇadīghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_1: iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_2: vidhiḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_3: . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_4: na asau bādhyate . pararūpam ca prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_5: punaḥ nimittam eva . atha vā asuṭ kariṣyate . evam api ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_6: asuṭi kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_7: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam asya na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_8: bhavati . asuṭā vyavahitatvāt . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_9: astu . nanu ca uktam ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ asuki kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_10: śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam . śībhāvaḥ kriyatām

GS24pmbhasuu:9936_4: na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca

GS24pmbhasuu:9940_7: aviśeṣeṇa kāṣṭhatakṃṣi iti bhavitavyam . atha bahūrjau eva kāṣṭhataṅkṣi iti bhavitavyam

GS24pmbhasuu:9941_4: napuṃsakam yadantam ca napuṃsakam na asau acaḥ uttaraḥ . na etat asti . jhaljātiḥ
