GS24pmbhasuu:10018_0: ī strī striyām iti . īkāre tannimittaḥ saḥ . īkāre cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . tannimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_1: saḥ . tṛjvadbhāvanimittaḥ saḥ īkāraḥ . na akṛte tṛjvadbhāve īkāraḥ prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_2: kāraṇam . ṛnnebhyaḥ ṅīp iti ucyate īkāre ca tṛjvadbhāvaḥ . tat idam itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_3: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi gaurādiṣu pāṭhāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_4: bhaviṣyati . gaurādiṣu na paṭhyate . na hi kim cit tunantam gaurādiṣu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_5: evam tarhi etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati atra īkāraḥ iti yat ayam īkāre tṛjvadbhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_6: śāsti . tena eva bhāvanam cet syāt aniṣṭaḥ api prasajyate . yadi api na asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_7: ṅīpaḥ vā ṅīṣaḥ vā ṅīn api tu prāpnoti . iha ca na prāpnoti . pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_8: krītaiḥ rathaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhiḥ rathaiḥ iti . evam tarhi na ca aparam nimittam sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:10018_9: ca pratyayalakṣaṇena . na ca aparam nimittam āśrīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:10019: asmin parataḥ kroṣṭuḥ tṛjvat bhavati iti . kim tarhi aṅgasya kroṣṭuḥ tṛjvat bhavati . aṅgasañjñā ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10024: tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyate . āhosvit rūpātideśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_0: tṛcaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_1: cet yathā ciṇi tadvat . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ cet yathā ciṇi tadvat prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_2: katham ca ciṇi . uktam aṅgasya iti tu prakaraṇāt āṇgaśāstrātideśāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_3: āṅgam yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . evam iha api anaṅguṇadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_4: anatidiṣṭam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra raparavacanam . tatra raparatvam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_5: tat vaktavyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇe atidiṣṭe raparatvam api atidiṣṭam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_6: katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . ṛtaḥ ṅisarvanāmasthānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_7: guṅaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . evam tarhi ayam anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_8: doṣaḥ jāyate . āhatya tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyeta anāhatya vā iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_9: . yadi āhatya dīrghatvam atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha anāhatya
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_10: anaṅguṇaraparatvāni atidiṣṭāni dīrghatvam anatidiṣṭam . astu āhatya . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_11: dīrghatvam atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni anatidiṣṭāni iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_12: atidiṣṭe anaṅguṇaraparatvāni api atidiṣṭāni bhavanti . katham . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_13: na ca akṛteṣu eteṣu dīrghabhāvini upadhā bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat eteṣu vidhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_14: kṛteṣu yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ kroṣṭoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_15: tasmin kṛte avādeśe ca yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na ekam udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_16: yogārambham prayojayati iti . tatra tṛjvadvacanasāmarthyāt eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu yā
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_17: upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā kim naḥ etena āhatya anāhatya vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_18: . āhatya anāhatya ca tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyate . atha vā punaḥ astu rūpātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_19: . atha etasmin rūpātideśe sati kim prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_20: kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_21: ekaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_22: anatidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni . ubhayathā ca svaraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_23: na hi svaraḥ rūpavān . astu prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_24: ṛkāraḥ atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_25: ṛkāre atidiṣṭe svāśrayāḥ atra ete vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . yat api ucyate ubhayathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_26: ca svaraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ na hi svaraḥ rūpavān iti sacakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt svaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_27: . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_28: . sarvasya tunantasya tṛśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu rūpātideśāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_29: etat . katham . rūpātideśāt . rūpātideśaḥ ayam . nanu ca evam eva kṛtvā codyate rūpātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_30: iti cet sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ iti . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadāditadantavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_31: . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_32: grahaṇam bhavati iti evam tunantasya tṛjantaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_33: eva tṛjantam prāpnoti . idam api prāpnoti paktā iti . āntaratamyāt ca siddham . kroṣṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_34: yat antaratamam tat bhaviṣyati . kim punaḥ tat . kruśeḥ yaḥ tṛc vihitaḥ tadantam
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_35: . tṛjvadvacanam anarthakam tṛjviṣaye tṛcaḥ mṛgavācitvāt . tṛjviṣaye etat tṛjantam
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_36: mṛgavāci . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . tunaḥ sarvanāmasthāne nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_37: yathā syāt . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham iti cet siddham yathā anyatra api . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_38: iti cet tat antareṇa vacanam siddham yathā anyatra api aviśeṣavihitāḥ śabdāḥ niyataviṣayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025_39: dṛśyante . kva anyatra . tat yathā . gharatiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ ghṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10027: gharmaḥ iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . raśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ rāśiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10029: raśanā iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . luśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ loṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10030_0: iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam vibhāṣā vakṣyāmi iti . vibhāṣā tṛtīyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10030_1: aci iti . vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:10030_2: kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ eva tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu tṛjantam
GS24pmbhasuu:10034: 91-92 guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num pūrvavipratiṣiddham . guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . tatra guṇasya avakāśaḥ . agnaye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10037: jatune . vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . sakhāyai . sakhāyaḥ . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni iti . auttvasya avakāśaḥ . agnau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10038: vāyau . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . trapuṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10039_0: jatuni iti . tṛjvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ . kroṣṭunā . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10039_1: . kṛśakṛoṣṭune arṇyāya . hitakroṣṭune vṛṣalakulāya . num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10039_2: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10039_3: param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10039_4: nuṭ pūrvavipratiṣedhena vaktavyaḥ . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . trapūṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10042: jatūnām . aci rādeśasya avakāśaḥ . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tisṛṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_0: kroṣṭunā . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kroṣṭūnām . nuṭ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_1: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:10045_0: catasṛṇām iti . katham tarhi sidhyati . nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt . nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10045_1: vaktavyaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ rādeśaḥ . saḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10045_2: eva guṇapūrvasavarṇau bādhate eva nuṭam api bādheta . tasmāt nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10045_3: . tasmāt nuḍviṣaye rādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10045_4: jñāpayati na rādeśaḥ nuṭam bādhate iti yat ayam na tisṛcatasṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10050: 92.12-13 ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā . ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā iti vaktavyam . anaḍuhī , anaḍvāhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:10054: 93.4-8 ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ittvottvayoḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10061: nipārakaḥ . guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ayuktaḥ ayam vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam guṇasya ittvottayoḥ ca . katham . nityaḥ guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10065: 94.3-95.9 sici vṛddhau okārapratiṣedhaḥ . sici vṛddhau okārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10067_0: udavoḍha iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10067_1: . ottvam kriyatām vṛddhiḥ iti . vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . okārāt vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10067_2: vipratiṣedhena iti cet ottvābhāvaḥ . okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet ottvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10068_0: udavoḍham . udavoḍha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam tatra varṇagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10068_1: vṛddhau api kṛtāyām ottvam yathā syāt . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham yathā prasāraṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10068_2: dvirvacanam . atha vā punaḥprasaṅgāt atra vṛddhau kṛtāyām ottvam bhaviṣyati . sauḍhāmitrau
GS24pmbhasuu:10068_3: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam ottvam . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10072_0: 95.10-96.3 antagrahaṇam kimartham na ataḥ rlaḥ iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10072_1: bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:10073_0: vasanāntaḥ . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā . udakāntam gataḥ . udakasamīpam gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10073_1: iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . aṅgāntau
GS24pmbhasuu:10073_2: yau rephalakārau tayoḥ samīpe yaḥ akāraḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . aśvallīt , avabhrīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10077_0: 96.5-101.2 halgrahaṇam kimartham . samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ca halantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10077_1: ca acaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ajgrahaṇāt eva atra samuccayaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10077_2: . vadivrajyoḥ ca acaḥ ca iti . asti anyat ajgrahaṇe prayojanam vadivrajiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10077_3: yathā vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ecaḥ iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt vadivrajyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10077_4: ataḥ iti evam brūyāt . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . ataḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10077_5: prayojanam halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . kasya punaḥ ajantasya prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10078: ajihīrṣīt . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārasya tarhi prāpnoti . ayāsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10079: avāsīt . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā vṛddhau asatyām vā . sandhyakṣarasya tarhi prāpnoti . na vai sandhyakṣaram antyam asti . nanu ca idam asti ḍhalope kṛte udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10081_0: udavoḍha iti . asiddhaḥ ḍhalopaḥ tasya asiddhatvāt na etat antyam bhavati . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10081_1: uttaram paṭhati . halgrahaṇam iṭi pratiṣedhārtham . halgrahaṇam kriyate iṭi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10081_2: . na iṭi iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati saḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . alāvīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_0: apāvīt . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_1: . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . anantaram yat vṛddhividhānam tat pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_2: etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . tat ca anantyārtham . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_3: ca anantaram vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham vijñāyate . katham punaḥ anantaram vṛddhividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_4: anantyārtham śakyam vijñātum . antyasya vacanānarthakyāt . antyasya vṛddhividhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_5: prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā anantaram vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham vijñāyate . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_6: vibhāṣārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā vṛddhim vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_7: sā halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . acikīrṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_0: ajihīrṣīt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham iti cet siddham vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_1: iti cet tat antareṇa api halgrahaṇam siddham . katham . vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_2: vṛddheḥ lopaḥ balīyān bhavati iti . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_3: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_4: akṛtāyām api . anityaḥ lopaḥ na hi kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti . paratvāt sagiḍbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_5: bhavitavyam . na atra sagiṭau prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekācaḥ tau vali iti vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_6: ekācaḥ sagiṭau ucyete atha vā vali iti tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_7: tau valī iti vā . dardrāteḥ mā bhūt iti . daridrāteḥ na sagiḍbhyām bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_8: uktam etat daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . yaḥ ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_9: pratyayavidhau siddhaḥ siddhaḥ asau sagiḍvidhau . evamartham eva tarhi ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_10: anuvartyam atra sagiṭau mā bhūtām iti . saḥ eṣaḥ nityaḥ lopaḥ vṛddhim bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_11: . kam punaḥ bhavān vṛddheḥ avakāśam matvā āha nityaḥ lopaḥ iti . anavakāśā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10083_12: lopam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśā vṛddhiḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ : akaṇīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10084_0: akāṇīt . katham punaḥ sati antye anantyasya vṛddhiḥ syāt . bhavet yaḥ atā aṅgam viśeṣayet
GS24pmbhasuu:10084_1: tasya anantyasya na syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅgena akāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . tatra anantyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10084_2: vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ antyasya lopaḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10084_3: . atha vā ārabhyate pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ ṇyallopau iyaṅyaṇguṇavṛddhidīrghatvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10084_4: pūrvavipratiṣiddham . sā tarhi eṣā anantyārthā vṛddhiḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10084_5: mā bhūt . apipaṭhiṣīt . etat api na asti prayojanam . katham . halādeḥ iti na eṣā bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:10085: hal ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam halādiḥ halādeḥ iti . kā tarhi . karmadhārayāt pañcamī . hal
GS24pmbhasuu:10086_0: ādiḥ halādiḥ halādeḥ parasya iti . yadi karmadhārayāt pañcamī acakāsīt atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10086_1: . sicā anantaryam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . halādeḥ parasya sici anantarasya iti . yadi sicā
GS24pmbhasuu:10087_0: akāṇīt atra na prāpnoti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi vacanāt prāpnoti . acakāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:10087_1: . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na avyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10087_2: . varṇena ekena . saṅgātena punaḥ vyavadhānam bhavati na ca bhavati . yadi sicā ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:10087_3: viśeṣyate astu bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī . kasmāt na bhavati . apipaṭhiṣīt . vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10087_4: . evam tarhi atidūram eva idam halgrahaṇam anusṛtam . halgrahaṇam anantyārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_0: 101.4-102.7 kimartham jāgarteḥ vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . sici vṛddhiḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_1: . na etat asti prayojanam . jāgarteḥ guṇaḥ ucyate vṛddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_2: saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . guṇe tarhi kṛte raparatve ca halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_3: . na iṭi iti tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . iyam tarhi pratiṣedhottarakālā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_4: ārabhyate ataḥ rlāntasya iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:10092_0: kakṣyayā kakṣyā nimātavyā . sici vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti guṇāḥ ca . guṇaḥ bhavati . guṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10092_1: kṛte raparatve ca halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na iṭi iti ca tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10092_2: bhavati . pratiṣedhottarakālam ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na
GS24pmbhasuu:10092_3: ca kim cit . ataḥ rlāntasya iti ca vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na ca kim cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_0: 103-105 kimartham purastāt pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate na vidhyuttarakālaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_1: . tat yathā anyatra api vidhyuttarakālāḥ pratiṣedhāḥ bhavanti . kva anyatra . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_2: karmavyatihāre na gatihiṃsārthebhyaḥ iti . devatādvandve ca na indrasya parasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_3: tatra ayam api arthaḥ dviḥ iḍgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati prakṛtam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_4: na evam śakyam . iḍartham sārvadhātukagrahaṇam liṅaḥ salope sannihitam tat vicchidyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_5: . yadi punaḥ na vṛdbhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ iti atra eva ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vidhyuttarakālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_6: ca eva pratiṣedhaḥ kṛataḥ bhavati dviḥ ca iḍgrahaṇam na kartavyam iḍartham ca sārvadhātukagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_7: liṅaḥ salope sannihitam bhavati . tatra ayam api arthaḥ dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_8: iti etasmāt niyamāt iṭ prasajyeta . kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_9: pratiṣedhārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratiṣedhārthaḥ yaḥ etasmāt yogāt iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:10096_10: pariprāpyate niyamāt saḥ na sidhyati : peciva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10100_0: iti eteṣām grahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati studruśrusruvām pratiṣedhārtham vṛṅvṛñoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10100_1: jñāpakārtham . evam api sāmānyavihitasya eva iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta viśeṣavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10100_2: ca ayam thali iti . purastāt punaḥ pratiṣedhe sati anārabhyāpavādaḥ ayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10100_3: tena yāvān iṇ nāma tasya sarvasya eva pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:10100_4: eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ tat na kriyate iti purastāt api pratiṣedhe sati tat na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10100_5: . katham . idam asti na iṭ vaśi kṛti iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . ārdhadhātukasya valādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10100_6: iti . iṭ iti anuvartate na iti nivṛttam .

GS24pmbhasuu:10105_1: niyamāt atra iṭ bhaviṣyati . na atra tena pariprāpaṇam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10105_2: pratiṣedhasya saḥ pratyārambhaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . ubhayoḥ saḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10105_4: vṛṅvṛñau udāttau tayoḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca . tataḥ kim . tulyajātīye
GS24pmbhasuu:10105_5: asati yathā eva prakṛtilakṣaṇasya niyāmakaḥ bhavati evam pratyayalakṣaṇasya api niyāmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10105_6: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . rudivaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_0: rudimaḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_1: . yat etat anukrāntam etat ārdhadhātukasya draṣṭavyam . tataḥ iṭ valādeḥ iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_2: etāvat draṣṭavyam yadi kim cit tatra anyat api ārdhadhātukagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_3: asti . atha na kim cit iha vā kṛdgrahaṇam kriyeta tatra vā ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_4: nu atra viśeṣaḥ . na iṭ varam anādau kṛti . varam anādau kṛti iṭpratiṣedham prayojayati . īśitā ,

GS24pmbhasuu:10125_2: . uttarārtham . śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedham vakṣyati saḥ jāgarteḥ mā bhūt . jāgaritaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:10126_1: pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra guṇe kṛte raparatve ca kṛte anugantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10126_2: iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca upadeśādhikārāt prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10128_0: ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve ca anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10128_1: doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛte iṭpratiṣedhe ittvottve prāpnutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10128_2: kim kāraṇam . na ktvā seṭ iti kittvapratiṣedhāt . idam tarhi . ātistīrṣati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10129: nipupūrṣati . ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve cxa anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam śryukaḥ kiti iti . iṭ sani vā iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . āstīrṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_0: nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ . ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve ca anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_1: prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . iṭ sani vā iti sani vibhāṣā yasya vibhāṣā iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_2: bhaviṣyati . ihārtham eva tarhi vadhyartham ekājgrahaṇam kartavyam . vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_3: mā bhūt iti . vadhiṣīṣṭa iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe api vā ekājgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_4: vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . vadhiṣīṣṭa iti . kim kāraṇam . vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_5: sannipāte ekāctvāt prakṛteḥ ca anudāttatvāt . sannipāte ca eva hi vadhiḥ ekāc śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_6: prakṛtiḥ ca asya anudāttā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam evam vijñāyate upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10130_7: śrūyamāṇāt iti . yaṅlopārtham . yaṅlope mā bhūt iti . bebhiditā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10133_0: cecchiditum . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam anudāttaviśeṣaṇam cet kṛñādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10133_1: liṭi niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10133_2: anudāttaviśeṣaṇam cet kṛñādibhyaḥ liṭi niyamasya anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprāptatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10133_3: pratiṣedhasya . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10133_4: na prāpnoti . asati iṭpratiṣedhe niyamaḥ na upapadyate . asati niyame kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10133_5: tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iṭ vaktavyaḥ . pecima ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10134: śekima . sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ . sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bibhitsati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10135_0: cicchitsati . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10135_1: na prāpnoti . iha ca nīttaḥ tatve kṛte anackatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:10135_2: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛte iṭpratiṣedhe tatvam prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:10135_7: thali ca seṭi kṅiti ca seṭi iti . yat api ucyate sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ iti . ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10135_8: siddham . ubhayam upadeśagrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . upadeśe anudāttāt upadeśe ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10135_9: iti . yaṅlope ca tadantadvirvacanāt . sanyaṅantasya sthāne dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_0: tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ bhavati yaḥ saḥ ekājupadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_1: anudāttaḥ . atha api dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam evam api na doṣaḥ . na hi asya bhidyupadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_2: upadeśaḥ . atha api bhidyupadeśe upadeśaḥ evam api na doṣaḥ . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_3: na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_4: eva . na sidhyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvavidhiḥ . evam tarhi

GS24pmbhasuu:10169_3: iti raḥ ṛtaḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti rabhāvaḥ na syāt . iha ca parivraḍhayya gataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10169_4: lyapi laghupūrvasya iti ayādeśaḥ na syāt . iha ca pārivṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:10173_0: 121.7-11 kimartham aviśabdane iti ucyate na viśabdane curādiṇicā bhavitavyam . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:10173_1: tarhi siddhe sati yat ayam aviśabdane iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ viśabdane ghuṣeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10173_2: vibhāṣā ṇic bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . mahīpālavacaḥ śrutvā jughuṣuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_0: 122.2-123.10 kim idam adhyayanābhidhāyikāyām niṣṭhāyām nipātanam kriyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_1: adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi adhyayanābhidhāyikāyām niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_2: nipātanam kriyate siddham vṛttaḥ guṇaḥ vṛttam pārāyaṇam vṛttam guṇasya vṛttam pārāyaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_3: iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_4: . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti api vai vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_5: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . vṛtiḥ ayam akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ ca api ṇyantāḥ sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_6: bhavanti . akarmkaḥ ca atra vṛtiḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate akarmakaḥ atra vṛtiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_7: . akarmakāṇām bhāve ktaḥ bhavati iti evam atra bhāve ktaḥ bhavati . tatra uditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_8: ktvi vibhāṣā yasya vibhāṣā iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha ṇigrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_9: . vṛttanipātane ṇigrahaṇam aṇyantasya avadhāraṇapratiṣedhārtham . vṛttanipātane ṇigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_10: kriyate aṇyantasya avadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_11: na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . ṇyadhikāt vṛteḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ vidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_12: . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_13: . kutaḥ nu khalu etat adhikārthe ārambhe sati ṇyadhikasya bhaviṣyati na punaḥ sanadhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_14: vā syāt yaṅadhikasya vā iti . tasmāt ṇigrahaṇam kartavyam . atha kimartham nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10177_15: kriyate . nipātanam ṇilpeḍguṇapratiṣedhārtham . nipātanam kriyate ṇilpārtham iḍguṇapratiṣedhārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10181_0: 124.2-12 dāntaśāntayoḥ kim nipātyate . dāntaśāntayoḥ upadhādīrghatvam ca . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10181_1: . ṇilopeṭpratiṣedhau ca . upadhādīrghatvam anipātyam . vṛddhyā siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10181_2: . mitām hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvena bhavitavyam . evam tarhi anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:10181_3: iti evam atra dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10181_4: . ṇilope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10181_5: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . atha spaṣṭacchannayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10181_6: kim nipātyate . spaṣṭacchannayoḥ upadhāhrasvatvam ca . kim ca . ṇilopeṭpratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:10185_0: 124.14-22 ghuṣisvanoḥ vāvacanam iṭpratiṣedhāt vipratiṣedhena . ghuṣisvanoḥ vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10185_1: iṭpratiṣedhāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ghuṣeḥ iṭpratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ asampūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10186: ghuṣṭaḥ mārgaḥ . vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ sampūrvāt viśabdanam . saṅghuṣṭam vākyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10187: saṅghuṣitam vākyam . sampūrvāt aviśabdane ubhayam prāpnoti . saṅghuṣṭā rajjuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10188_0: saṅghuṣitā rajjuḥ . vāvacanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10188_1: anāṅpūrvāt mano'bhidhānam . svāntam manaḥ . vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ aṅpūrvāt amano'bhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10189: āsvanitaḥ devadattaḥ . āṅpūrvāt mano'bhidhāne ubhayam prāpnoti . āsvāntam manaḥ . āsvanitam manaḥ . vāvacanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10193: 125.2-6 hṛṣeḥ lomakeśakartṛkasya iti vaktavyam . hṛṣṭāni lomāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10200: hṛṣitam keśaiḥ . vismitapratīghātayoḥ iti vaktavyam . hṛṣṭaḥ devadattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10206: 125.8-9 apacitaḥ iti kim nipātyate . cāyaḥ cibhāvaḥ nipātyate . apacitaḥ . ktini nityam iti vaktavyam . apacitiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_1: vijñāyeta . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iti . atha akriyamāṇe ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_2: valādigrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . aṅgasya iti vartate . aṅgaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_3: . aṅgasya valādeḥ āditaḥ iṭ prasajyeta āḍāḍvat . tat yathā āḍāṭau aṅgasya āditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_4: bhavataḥ tadvat . kriyamāṇe api ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe aniṣṭam śakyam vijñātum . valādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_5: ārdhadhātukasya yat aṅgam iti . akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam . aṅgasya yaḥ valādiḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_6: ca aṅgasya valādiḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_7: . pratyaye . yāvatā kriyamāṇe ca aniṣṭam vijñāyate akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam tatra akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_8: eva iṣṭam vijñāsyāmaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . āste,
GS24pmbhasuu:10211: śete . etat api na asti prayojanam . rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke iti etanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . rudādibhyaḥ eva sārvadhātukaḥ iṭ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti . evam api vṛkṣatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10212_0: vṛkṣatā atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10212_1: . nanu dhātoḥ eva ayam vihitaḥ . na ca ayam dhātoḥ iti evam vihitaḥ . kva punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10212_2: prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti . tat vai ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:10212_3: vihitaḥ śakyate viśeṣayitum . atha idānīm ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca api vihitaḥ śakyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10216: 127.2-130.4 snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prasnavitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10221_0: prakramitavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa snukramoḥ iḍāgamam
GS24pmbhasuu:10221_1: uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10221_2: pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe ca tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_0: prakraṃsyante . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_1: . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . evam tarhi ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhim prati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_2: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyapavargaḥ . tatparaparasīyuṭoḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_3: . siddham tu snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_4: . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya na iṭ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi snoḥ ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_5: samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti ucyate prasnavitā iva ācarati prasnavitrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_6: atra na prāpnoti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam atra ātmanepadam . kramoḥ ca . kramoḥ ca ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_7: samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . atha kimartham krameḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_8: kriyate na snukramibhyām iti eva ucyeta . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10224_9: vakṣyatgi tat krameḥ eva syāt snoḥ mā bhūt . vyatiprasnavitārau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10225: vyatiprasnativāraḥ . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_0: upakrantā . tat tarhi idam bahu vaktavyam . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_1: na bhavati iti vaktavyam . krameḥ ca iti vaktavyam . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_2: kṛti iti vaktavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam snukramoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_3: anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . snukramī eva ātmanepadanimittatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_4: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . na cet snukramī ātmanepadasya nimitte iti . katham punaḥ dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_5: nāma ātmanepadasya nimittam syāt . dhātuḥ eva nimittam . āha hi bhagavān anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_6: ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . yatra tarhi dhātuḥ na āśrīyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_7: iti . atra api dhātuḥ eva āśrīyate . bhāvakarmavṛttāt dhātoḥ iti . katham prakramitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10226_8: . sati ātmanepade nimittaśabdaḥ vartate . katham prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10227: upakrantā . tasmāt asati api . katham prakramitavyam . tasmāt sati eva . katham prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10228: upakrantā . vaktavyam eva etat kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti iti . atha vā kṛti iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10232_0: 131.5-135.9 graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam . graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10232_1: iṭaḥ dīrghaḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10232_2: ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti . evam api kartavyam eva . agrahaṇe hi asampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10232_3: ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt . akriyamāṇe hi iḍgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10232_4: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . kriyamāṇe ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:10232_5: iḍgrahaṇe . ciṇvadiṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ciṅvaditaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10232_6: . yaṅlope ca . yaṅlope ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jarīgṛhitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10234_0: jarīgṛhitavyam . yadi punaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñāyeta . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:10234_1: vipratiṣiddham . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet vipratiṣiddham bhavati . yadi iṭ na dīrghaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10234_2: atha dīrghaḥ na iṭ . iṭ dīrghaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10234_3: dīrghatvābhāvaḥ . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne dīrghatvasya abhāvaḥ . vuvūrṣate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10236_0: vavarīṣate . atra api iṭ dīrghaḥ iti anuvartiṣyate . yat tarhi videśastham pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:10236_1: punarvidhānam tat na sidhyati . jṝvraścyoḥ ktvi . śryukaḥ kiti iti anena pratiṣiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10237_0: jarītvā . īṭaḥ vidhiḥ iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yathāprāptaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:10237_1: tarhi iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati jarītvā na ktvā seṭ iti kittvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10237_2: na prāpnoti . iha ca agrhīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sijlopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca agrahīt
GS24pmbhasuu:10237_3: na iṭi iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . hmyantānām iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10237_4: . atra api na iṭ iti eva anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam adhākṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:10238_0: agrahīḍhvam vibhāṣā iṭaḥ iti mūrdhanyaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:10238_1: iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati iti . bhavati cet pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10238_2: dīrghābhāvaḥ iti eva . tasmāt aśakyaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10238_3: iṭaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ārdhadhātukasya iti vartate . grahaḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10238_4: ārdhadhātukasya dīrghatvam vakṣyāmi . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . grahaṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10239: grahaṇīyam . valādeḥ iti vartate . evam api grahītā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_0: grahītum atra na prāpnoti . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . evam api grāhakaḥ atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_1: . kim ca iṭpratīghātena khalu api dīrghatvam ucyamānam iṭam bādhate . tasmāt iṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_2: grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_3: iṭ valādeḥ iti . nanu ca uktam evam api kartavyam eva agrahaṇe hi asampratyayaḥ ṣaṣṭhyanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_4: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . grhaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī iṭ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_5: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam ciṇvadiṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_6: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . katham . prakṛtasya iṭaḥ idam dīrghatvam na ca ciṇvadiṭ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_7: . yaṅlope katham . yaṅlope ca uktam iṭi sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yadi eva prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10240_8: iṭaḥ dīrghatvam atha api iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñāyeta . yaṅlope ca uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_0: 136.2-139.5 atha vā iti vartamāne punaḥ vāvacanam kimartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_1: liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_2: sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate . suvateḥ mā bhūt . atha kimartham dhūñaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_3: grahaṇam kriyate . dhuvateḥ mā bhūt iti . kim punaḥ iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_4: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi svaratiḥ udāttaḥ tataḥ prāpte . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_5: anudāttaḥ tataḥ aprāpte . svaratiḥ udāttaḥ . svaratiḥ udāttaḥ paṭhyate . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_6: tarhi vāvacanam . vāvacanam nivṛttyartham . vāvacanam kriyate nivṛttyartham . anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_7: hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . anudātte hi sati kiti vibhāṣā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_8: . svṛtvā . pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . pratiṣidhya kila ayam punaḥ vidhīyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_9: yathā eva ekājlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhate evam śryukaḥ kiti iti etam api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_10: . yadi tarhi udāttaḥ svaratiḥ paṭhiṣyati vipratiṣedham svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_11: vipratiṣedhena iti saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . saḥ vidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_12: pratiṣedhaḥ vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_13: iva kārpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva ekājlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_14: bādhate evam imam api bādhiṣyate . atha vā yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_15: na ca aprāpte valādilakṣaṇe iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate syalakṣaṇe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_16: ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā valādilakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_17: iṭam bādhiṣyate syalakṣaṇam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu anudāttaḥ . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_18: uktam anudātte hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_19: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte ekājlakṣaṇe pratiṣedhe iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_20: vibhāṣā ārabhyate śryukaḥ kiti iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā śryukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_21: kiti iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ udāttārthaḥ ca yebhyaḥ ca anudāttebhyaḥ iṭ prāpyate tadbādhanārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_22: ca . atha vā śryukaḥ kiti iti iha anuvartiṣyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:10244_23: na iyam vibhāṣā uglakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya viṣaye bhavati iti yat ayam sanīvantardhabhrasjadambhuśrisvṛyūrṇubharajñapisanām
GS24pmbhasuu:10248_0: 139.7-12 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10248_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhā atra vibhaṣā pūrveṇa eva tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10248_2: nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . na atra pūrveṇa vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10248_3: vibhāṣā iti pratiṣedhāt . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt vibhaṣā labhyeta punaḥ iḍgrahaṇāt iṭ eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10252: 140.1-3 iṣeḥ takāre śyanpratyayāt pratiṣedhaḥ . iṣeḥ takāre śyanpratyayāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt . preṣitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10257: 140.5-7 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kriyate nityārtham . nityārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10261: 140.9-141.2 gameḥ iṭ parasmaipadeṣu cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . gameḥ iṭ parasmaipadeṣu cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . jigamiṣitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10263_0: jigamiṣitavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa gameḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10263_1: iḍāgamam uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10263_2: kim uktam . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10263_3: iha api ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10263_4: . taparapare tāvat . saṅjigaṃsiṣyate . sīyuṭi . saṅgaṃsīṣṭa . ekādeśe . saṅgaṃsyante
GS24pmbhasuu:10263_5: . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . siddham tu gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10263_6: iṭpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadastheṇa na bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10267: 141.3-142.9 vṛtādipratiṣedhe ca . kim . kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : vivṛtsitā vivṛtsitum ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10268_0: vivṛtsitavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa vṛtādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10268_1: iṭpratiṣedham uktvā ātmanepadaparaḥ iṭ bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadapare iḍvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:10268_3: iṭ vaktavyaḥ . taparapare tāvat . vivartiṣiṣyate . sīyuṭi . vartiṣīṣṭa . ekādeśe . vartiṣyante ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10269_0: vardhiṣyante . siddham tu vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iḍvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10269_1: etat . katham . vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapdasthasya iṭ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10269_2: . catustāsikḷpigrahaṇānarthakyam ca . caturgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . sarvebhyaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:10269_3: vṛtādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iṣyate . tāsigrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . nivṛttatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10269_4: sakārasya . nivṛttam sakārādau iti . tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm akriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:10269_5: api na arthaḥ eṣaḥ api hi vṛtādiḥ pañcamaḥ . bhavet kḷpigrahaṇam na kartavyam tāsgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10269_6: tu kartavyam . yat hi tat sakārādau iti na tat śakyam nivartayitum tṛci api hi prasajyeta . vartitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10270_0: vardhitā . tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm kriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇam api kartavyam anyebhyaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:10270_1: vṛtādibhyaḥ tāsau mā bhūt iti . bhavet tāsgrahaṇam kartavyam kḷpigrahaṇam tu na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:10270_2: kartavyam . anyebhyaḥ api vṛtādibhyaḥ tāsau kasmāt na bhavati . parasmaipadeṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10270_3: vartate kḷpeḥ eva ca tāsparasmaipadaparaḥ na anyebhyaḥ vṛtādibhyaḥ . yadi evam tāsgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:10270_4: api na arthaḥ . tṛci kasmāt na bhavati . parasmaipadeṣu iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_0: 143.2-144.5 tāsau atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ pratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ akāravattvāt . tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_1: atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . jaghasitha . kim kāraṇam . akāravattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_2: . saḥ api hi akāravān . siddham tu halādigrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . halādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_3: kartavyam . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam . aṭhyaśī prayojayataḥ . āthyaśī tāvat na prayojayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_4: . kim kāraṇam . tāsau aniṭaḥ iti ucyate seṭau ca imau tāsau . añjvaśū tarhi prayojayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_5: . añjvaśū ca api na prayojayataḥ . kim kāraṇam . tāsau nityāniṭaḥ iti ucyate vibhāṣiteṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_6: ca etau . adiḥ tarhi prayojayati . āditha . kriyamāṇe api vai halādigrahaṇe atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_7: prāpnoti . jaghasitha . eṣaḥ api halādiḥ . tasya ca abhāvāt tāsau . tāsau aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_8: iti ucyate na ca ghasiḥ tāsau asti . nanu ca yaḥ tāsau na asti aniṭ api asau tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_9: bhavati . na evam vijñāyate yaḥ tāsau aniṭ iti . katham tarhi . yaḥ tāsau asti aniṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_10: ca iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saptamyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:10274_11: api vai vatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . mathurāyām iva mathurāvat . pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat
GS24pmbhasuu:10278_0: 145.2-146.3 kimartham idam ucyate na acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ nityam iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10278_1: . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . ṛtaḥ eva bhāradvājasya na anyataḥ bhāradvājasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10279_0: vavitha iti . ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:10279_1: ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10279_2: . guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anajantatvāt pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . asati niyame kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10279_3: doṣaḥ . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iṭ vaktavyaḥ . pecitha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10280_0: śekitha iti . yadiḥ punaḥ ayam bhāradvājaḥ purastāt apakṛṣyeta . acaḥ tāsvat thali
GS24pmbhasuu:10280_1: aniṭaḥ nityam bhāradvājasya . upadeśe atvataḥ bhāradvājasya . tataḥ ṛtaḥ . bhāradvājasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10280_2: iti nivṛttam . sidhyate evam ayam tu bhāradvājaḥ svasmāt matāt pracyāvitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10280_3: . evam tarhi yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10280_4: nityam upadeśe . tataḥ atvataḥ . atvataḥ ca upadeśe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10284: 146.5-7 vṛgrahaṇam kimartham na kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti eva siddham . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . nigamaḥ eva yathā syāt . kva mā bhūt . vavaritha .
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_0: 147 kimartham idam ucyate . vasvekājādghasāṃvacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_1: ārambhaḥ . vasau ekājāt ghasām eva . kva mā bhūt . bibhidvān . kim ucyate niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_2: iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api syāt . pratiṣedhaḥ api hi atra prāpnoti na iṭ vaśi kṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_3: iti . kṛt ca eva hi ayam vaśādiḥ ca . evam tarhi kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_4: etasmāt niyamāt atra iṭ bhaviṣyati . na atra tena pariprāpaṇam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_5: . prakṛtilakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya saḥ pratyārambhaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_6: . ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ . katham jñāyate . vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇāt . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_7: . imau vṛṅvṛñau udāttau tayoḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . paśyati tu
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_8: ācāryaḥ ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ iti tataḥ vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇam karoti . na khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_9: kaḥ cit ubhayavān pratiṣedhaḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca . tulyajātīye asati
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_10: yathā eva prakṛtilakṣaṇasaya niyāmakaḥ bhavati evam pratyayalakṣaṇasya api niyāmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_11: bhaviṣyati . atha yāvatā vasau ekājbhyaḥ iṭā bhavitavyam kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ niyamārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_12: vā sati vidhyarthe vā . na khalu kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ . āhopuruṣikāmātram tu bhavān āha
GS24pmbhasuu:10288_13: vidhyartham iti . vayam tu brūmaḥ niyamārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10292: 148-149 atha ekājgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . bibhidvān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_0: cicchidvān iti . kriyamāṇe api vā ekājgrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi ekāc .
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_1: evam tarhi kṛte dvirvacane yaḥ ekāc . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_2: gaṃsyate . ekājgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . na hi kaḥ cit akṛte cirvacane enakāc asti yadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_3: ekājgrahaṇam kriyate . nanu ca ayam asti jāgartiḥ . gāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_4: ākāragrahaṇam karoti na hi kaḥ cit akṛte dvirvacane ākārāntaḥ anekāc asti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_5: ca ayam asti daridrātiḥ . na daridrāteḥ iṭā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_6: daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . yaḥ ca idānīm pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_7: siddhaḥ siddhaḥ asau iḍvidhau . evam api bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyeta . ākārāntaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_8: bhūtapūrvaḥ iti . ekājgrahaṇam eva tarhi jñāpakam . nanu ca uktam jāgartyartham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10293_9: syāt . na ekam udāharaṇam ekājgrahaṇam prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_0: 150-151 atha ghasigrahaṇam kimartha na ekāc iti eva siddham . ghasigrahaṇam anackatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_1: . ghasigrahaṇam kriyate lope kṛte anackatvāt iṭ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_2: . iṭ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_3: api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api lope prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_4: iṭ na hi kṛte lope prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anackatvāt . evam tarhi dvirvacane kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_5: abhyāse yaḥ akāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ iṭ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . dvitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_6: lopasya paratvāt . dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_7: . lope kṛte anackatvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . ghasigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_8: doṣaḥ bhavati . katham . vacanāt iṭ bhaviṣyati . iṭi kṛte dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10297_9: iti yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10302: dadṛśivān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . dṛśeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10307: 151.8-12 svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye vipratiṣedhena . svaratilakṣaṇāt vāvacanāt ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svaratilakṣaṇasya vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ . svartā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10308: svaritā . ṛtaḥ sye iti asya avakāśaḥ . kariṣyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10310: asvariṣyat . ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10318: avāsīt . na etat asti . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā . idam tarhi . ayaṃsiṣṭām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10327: avāsiṣuḥ . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ayaṃsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_0: avāsīt . nanu ca uktam na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā iti . ayam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_1: viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra iṭ na syāt vṛddhiḥ prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_2: siddhaḥ bhavati . mā bhūt evam hmyantānām iti evam bhaviṣyati . atra api na iṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_3: anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam adhākṣīt iti evamartham . ākārāntāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_4: ca api padapūrvāḥ ekavacane udāharaṇam . mā hi yāsīt . yadi atra iṭ na syāt anudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_5: īṭaḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati uktam etat arthavat tu sicaḥ citkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_6: hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam iti tatra ekādeśaḥ udāttena udāttaḥ iti udāttatvam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10335: 152.13-153.4 kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ na iśīḍajanām sdhve iti eva ucyeta . īśaḥ dhve mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:10336: īśidhve iti . īḍajanoḥ tarhi se mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva . īḍiṣe ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10337_0: janiṣe iti . īśaḥ tarhi sve mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva . īśiṣva iti . se tarhi yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10337_1: svaśabdaḥ tatra yathā syāt kriyāsamabhihāre yaḥ svaśabdaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10337_2: api iṣyate . saḥ bhavān īśiṣva iti eva ayam īṣṭe iti . ātaḥ ca iṣyate evam hi āha
GS24pmbhasuu:10337_3: siddham tu loṇmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya kriyāsamabhihāre dvirvacanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10341: 154.1-6 kim sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi akārāt paraḥ yāśabdaḥ ārdhadhātukam asti . nanu ca ayam asti . cikīrṣyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10342: jihīrṣyāt . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim tarhi asmin yoge udāharaṇam . pacet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10343: yajet . atra api ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva ayādeśaḥ dīrghatvam bādhate evam lopam api bādheta . tasmāt sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10347: 155.2-156.15 muki svare doṣaḥ . muki sati svare doṣaḥ bhavati . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10348_0: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . nanu ca ayam muk adupadeśabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10348_1: adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na sidhyati . aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10348_2: aṅgam saḥ ayam saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10348_3: kariṣyate . abhakte ca . kim . svare doṣaḥ bhavati . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10349_0: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10349_1: . parādau dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi parādiḥ kriyate ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10349_2: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tiṅi iti evam tat . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10349_3: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam muki svare doṣaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat adupadeśabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10349_4: adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10349_5: aṅgam saḥ ayam saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum iti . atha ayam

GS24pmbhasuu:10574_1: antyopadhalakṣaṇāyāḥ vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . krauṣṭuḥ jāgataḥ iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:10574_2: ca acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānā
GS24pmbhasuu:10574_3: anyasya bādhikā syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10574_4: yat ubhayam syāt . lokavijñānāt siddham . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10574_5: yathā . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadhi dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10574_6: takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:10574_7: vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na aprāpte dadhidāne takradānam ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10574_8: tat prāpte ārabhyamāṇam bādhakam bhaviṣyati . iha punaḥ aprāptāyām antyopadhalakṣaṇāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10575: sauśrutaḥ iti . puṣkarasadgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā yat ayam anuśatikādiṣu puṣkarasacśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ acāmādivṛddhau antyopadhalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10579: 189.3-192.2 devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam . devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam kartavyam . devikādyādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . dāvikākulāḥ śālayaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:10580_1: vā . anyatra hi tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati tadantasya vā na ca idam tat na api tadantam
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_2: . ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham . ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate devikādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_3: aṅgānām acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . ñṇiti aṅgasya acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_4: bhavati saḥ cet devikādīnām ādjyac bhavati iti . āntaratamyanivartakatvāt vā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_5: vā na anena anantaratamā vṛddhiḥ nirvartyate . kim tarhi antaratamā anena nivartyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_6: . siddhā atra vṛddhiḥ taddhiteṣu acām ādeḥ iti eva tatra anena antaratamā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_7: nivartyate . parihārāntaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam katham ca idam parihārāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_8: syāt . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam adyajviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10580_9: devikādayaḥ iti . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ syuḥ iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_0: sudevikāyām bhavaḥ saudevikaḥ iti . atha atra api ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_1: parihārāntaram na bhavati . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_2: kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_3: . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhiḥ āt aic devikādīnām ākāraḥ iti . idhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_4: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam anyatra tadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_5: tadantagrahaṇāt vā iti . parihṛtam etat ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti . nyagrodhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_6: ca kevalagrahaṇāt . nyagrodhe ca kevalagrahaṇāt manyāmahe ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_7: iti . tasya hi kevalagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt nyāgrodhamūlāḥ śālayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_8: iti . yadi ca ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ tataḥ kevalagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_9: tat etat katham kṛtvā jñāpakam bhavati . yadi nyagrodhaśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_10: bhavati . atha hi nyagrohati iti nyagrodhaḥ tataḥ niyamārtham padāntaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_11: na jñāpakam bhavati . vahīnarasya idvacanam . vahīnarasya ittvam vaktavyam . vahīnarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_12: apatyam vaihīnariḥ . kuṇaravāḍavaḥ tu āha . na eṣaḥ vahīnaraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . vihīnaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10581_13: eṣaḥ . vihīnaḥ naraḥ kāmabhogābhyām vihīnaraḥ . vihīnarasya apatyam vaihīnariḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:10596_0: 195.13-197.2 atha parasya avṛddhiḥ iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_1: śauvam māṃsam ṭilope kṛte aijāgamaḥ na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_2: paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti . yatha icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_3: tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate . katha śauvam māṃsam . ānupūrvyā siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_4: . na atra akṛte aijāgame ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_5: bhavitavyam . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_6: nanu ca uktam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_7: pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati svādhyāyaśabdam dvārādiṣu paṭhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_8: . evam kil paṭhyeta svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ iti . tat ca na . suṣṭhu vā adhyayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_9: svādhyāyaḥ śobhanam vā adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ . atha api svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10596_10: evam api na doṣaḥ . acām ādeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_0: 197.4-198.5 ayam śvanśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat tadādeḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_1: . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . na eva tadādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_2: asti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratiṣedhe śvādigrahaṇam jñāpakam anyatra śvangrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_3: tadādigrahaṇasya śauvahānādyartham . pratiṣedhe śvādigrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_4: . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra śvangrahaṇe tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_5: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . śauvahānādyartham . śauvahānam nāma nagaram . śauvādaṃṣṭraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_6: maṇiḥ iti . ikārādigrahaṇam ca śvāgaṇikādyartham . ikārādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_7: kim prayojanam . śvāgaṇikādyartham . śvagaṇena carati śvāgaṇikaḥ . tadantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10600_8: anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . tadantasya ca anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śvābhastreḥ svam śvābhastram .

GS24pmbhasuu:10730_0: aghnan . astu tarhi hakāraviśeṣaṇam . hakārasya iti cet ñṇiti aprāptiḥ . hakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10730_1: iti cet ñṇiti aprāptiḥ . ghātayati ghātakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nakāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10730_2: na prāpnoti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . hananam icchati hananīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10730_3: hananīyateḥ ṇvul hananīyakaḥ iti . sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10731: ghnantu . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_0: hantum . nakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt alope na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat nakāragrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_1: prayojanam . kim . śrūyamāṇaviśeṣaṇam . yatra nakāraḥ śrūyate tatra yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_2: iha mā bhūt . hataḥ hathaḥ iti . siddham tu upadhālope iti vacanāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_3: . katham . upadhālope ca iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_4: eva astu . nanu ca uktam hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_5: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu hakāraviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam hakārasya iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_6: ñṇiti aprāptiḥ iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam iha api vacanāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_7: hananīyakaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_8: . na ca kva cit dhātvavayavena avyavadhānam etena punaḥ saṅghātena vyavadhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_9: na ca bhavati . yat api ucyate sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_10: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_11: doṣaḥ . ānantaryam iha āśrīyate hakārasya nakāraḥ iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_12: ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam anānantaryam kva cit ca na sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_13: . lope sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam alope na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10732_14: yatra kutaḥ cit eva ānantaryam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10736_0: 217.15-218.8 abhyāsāt kutvam asupaḥ . abhyāsāt kutvam asupaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha

GS24pmbhasuu:10736_2: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . hanteḥ abhyāsāt iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10736_3: . hanteḥ eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . evam tarhi hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10736_4: aṅgasya yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ aṅgasya abhyāsaḥ . hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10736_5: aṅgasya eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . evam tarhi yasmin hantiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10736_6: aṅgam tasmin yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate . yasmin ca atra hantiḥ aṅgam na tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:10736_7: abhyāsaḥ yasmin ca abhyāsaḥ na tasmin hantiḥ aṅgam bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:10740_1: . heḥ caṅi pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aṅgānyatvāt . ṇyantam etat aṅgam

GS24pmbhasuu:10749_2: kasmāt na bhavati . niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvavacanāt . niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:10749_3: seṭaḥ ca ete niṣṭhāyām . yadi niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvam ucyate katham śokaḥ samudraḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10761: 222.10-14 [bhojyam abhyavahārhye] . bhojyam abhyavahārye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . bhojyaḥ sūpaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:10762_1: tena drave na prāpnoti . na avaśyam bhakṣiḥ kharaviśade eva vartate . kim tarhi anyatra

GS24pmbhasuu:10771_0: 223.6-224.1 [otaḥ śiti] . otaḥ śiti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . uttaratra śidgrahaṇābhāvāya
GS24pmbhasuu:10771_1: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ ṣṭhivuklamvācamām śiti iti śidgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:10771_3: śyani iti śyangrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atra api astu śiti iti eva . yadi śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:10771_4: iti ucyate anu tvā indraḥ bhramatu madatu atra api prāpnoti . śamādibhiḥ atra śitam
GS24pmbhasuu:10771_5: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . śamādīnām yaḥ śit iti . kaḥ ca śamādīnām śit . śamādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10797_3: mideḥ guṇaḥ jusi ca iti . katham tarhi . mideḥ guṇaḥ u jusi iti . kim idam u jusi

GS24pmbhasuu:10802_0: jāgarakaḥ iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10802_1: vaktavyaḥ . ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt anyatra guṇabhūtasya vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10802_2: . yat ayam aciṇṇaloḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na guṇābhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10802_3: vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti . kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :

GS24pmbhasuu:10804_1: . prasajyapratiṣedhe jusiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ajāgaruḥ . uttame ca ṇali . prasajyapratiṣedhe

GS24pmbhasuu:10804_4: pratiṣedhaḥ . jusi pūrveṇa guṇavidhānam . jusi pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate jusi ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10804_5: . ṇali ca . kim . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt iti eva . ṇali ca pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate

GS24pmbhasuu:10804_7: vau aguṇatvam . ataḥ anyatra vidhāne vau aguṇatvam . na vā paryudāsasāmarthyāt .

GS24pmbhasuu:10804_11: syāt . jāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . katham punaḥ veḥ paryudāsaḥ ucyamānaḥ vasvarthaḥ śakyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10804_13: siddham . vasvartham iti cet na . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātukatvāt siddham . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:10804_14: sārvadhātukasañjñā . chāndasaḥ kvasuḥ . liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10804_15: . tatra sārvadhātukam apin ṅit iti ṅittvāt paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā vakārasya

GS24pmbhasuu:11063_1: . kharpūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante kharaḥ lupyante iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ucicchiṣati

GS24pmbhasuu:11063_5: prāpnoti tasmāt kharpūrvagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ettvatuggrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_6: kariṣyate . abhyāsajaśtvacartvam siddham iti eva . ādiśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ tu . ādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_7: tu prāpnoti . tiṣṭhāsati . nanu ca anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_8: ucyamānam anyasya bādhakam syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_9: ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . yadi ādiśeṣaḥ api bhavati śarpūrvavacanam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_10: kimartham syāt . śarpūrvavacanam kimartham iti cet khayām lopapratiṣedhārtham . śarpūrvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_11: kimartham iti cet khayām lopaḥ mā bhūt iti . vyapakarṣavijñānāt siddham . vyapakarṣavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_12: siddham etat . kim idam vyapakarṣavijñānāt iti . apavādavijñānāt . apavādatvāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_13: anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam katham anyasya ucyamānam anyasya bādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_14: syāt iti . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi tat na ucyeta kim iha syāt . halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_15: . halādiśeṣaḥ cet na aprāpte halādiśeṣe idam ucyate tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_16: api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_17: syāt iti sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_18: takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam bādhakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_19: . evam iha api sati api sambhave anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:11079_1: chandaḥ arteḥ śluḥ labhyaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe yat artigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11079_2: ācāryaḥ bhāṣāyām śluḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . iyarti iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11083: 270.5-272.2 aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam . aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghatvam prāpnoti . ḍoḍhaukyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11084_0: totraukyate iti . nanu ca hrasvatve kṛte dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11084_1: kim kāraṇam . hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam . hrasvatvam kriyatām dīrghatvam iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11084_2: atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvena bhavitavyam . na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11084_3: utsargābādhakatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11084_4: utsargābādhakatvāt . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādāḥ utsargān na bādhante iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:11084_5: kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam sanvadbhāvasya dīrghatvam . acīkarat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_0: ajīharat . sanvadbhāvam apavādatvāt dīrghatvam na bādhate . mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_1: ittvasya . mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam apavādatvāt ittvam na bādhate . gaṇeḥ ītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_2: halādiśeṣasya . gaṇeḥ ītvam apavādatvāt halādiśeṣam na bādhate . idam ayuktam vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_3: . kim atra ayuktam . aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_4: tataḥ ucyate na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt iti . tasyāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_5: paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni nāma ucyante prayojanam sanvadbhāvasya dīrghatvam mānprabhṛtīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_6: dīrghatvam ittvasya gaṇeḥ ītvam halādiśeṣasya iti ca . na ca sanvadbhāvam apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_7: dīrghatvam bādhate . kim tarhi paratvāt . na khalu api mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_8: apavādatvāt dīrghatvam bādhate . kim tarhi antaraṅgatvāt . na khalu api gaṇeḥ īttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_9: apavādatvāt halādiśeṣam bādhate . kim tarhi anavakāśatvāt . evam tarhi iyam paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_10: kartavyā abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhakāḥ na bādhante iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_11: . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam akitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11090: raṃramyate . akitaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati yaṃyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11091_0: raṃramyate iti . nuki kṛte anajantatvāt . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . akidvacanam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11091_1: kidantasya alaḥ antyanivṛttyartham . akidvacanam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11091_2: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra kidantasya abhyāsasya alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11091_3: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prayojanam hrasvatvāttvettvaguṇeṣu . hrasvatvam . avacacchatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_0: cocchuṣyate . tuki kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . vipratiṣedhāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_1: . na etāni santi prayojanāni . vipratiṣedhena api etāni siddhāni . tuk kriyatām ete
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_2: vidhayaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ iti . tadantāgrahaṇāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_3: . atha vā na evam vijñāyate abhyāsasya ajantasya ṛkārāntasya akārāntasya igantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_4: iti . katham tarhi . abhyāse yaḥ ac abhyāse yaḥ ṛkāraḥ abhyāse yaḥ akāraḥ abhyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_5: yaḥ ic iti . evam ca kṛtvā dīrghatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_6: sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim apavādaḥ nuk dīrghatvasya iti . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_7: sati yat akitaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_8: abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhakāḥ na bādhante iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aicoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11095_9: yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam iti uktam saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11100: raṃramyate iti rūpāsiddhiḥ . nuki sati yaṃyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11101: raṃramyate iti rūpam na sidhyati . anusvārāgamavacanāt siddham . anusvārāgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ . evam api idam eva rūpam syāt yaṃyyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11102: idam na syāt yaṃyamyate . padāntavat ca . padāntāt ca iti vaktavyam . vā padāntasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11106: 274.12-14 rīk ṛtvataḥ saṃyogārtham . rīk ṛtvataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . saṃyogārtham . saṃyogāntāḥ prayojayanti . varīvṛścyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11113: marmṛjyamānāsaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . marmṛjyate , marmṛjyamānāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11117_0: 275.6-12 kim idam ṛkāragrahaṇam aṅgaviśeṣaṇam . ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:11117_1: abhyāsaviśeṣaṇam . ṛkārāntasya abhyāsasya iti . aṅgaviśeṣaṇam iti āha . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11117_2: . yat ayam taparakaraṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kaḥ cit abhyāse dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11117_3: asti yadartham taparakaraṇam kriyeta . atha aṅgaviśeṣaṇe ṛkāragrahaṇe sati taparakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11117_4: kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . cākīrti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11119: cākirati . kiratim carkarītāntam pacati iti atra yaḥ nayet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11120: prāptijñam tam aham manye prārabdhaḥ tena saṅgrahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11124: 276.1-278.3 iha kasmāt na bhavati . ajajāgarat . laghuni caṅpare iti ucyate vyavahitam ca atra laghu caṅparam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . acīkarat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_0: ajīharat . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . ajajāgarat . yena na avyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_1: tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na avyavadhānam . varṇena . etena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_2: saṅghātena vyavadhānam bhavati na bhavati ca . evam api acikṣaṇat atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_3: . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakānām ittvam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_4: atsmṛdṝtvaraprathamradastṝspaśām iti ittvabādhanārtham attvam śāsti . sanvadbhāvadīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_5: ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam . sanvadbhāvadīrghatve ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_0: avīvadat vīṇām parivādakena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_1: . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_2: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . evam api anaglopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_3: pratiṣedham prāpnoti . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_4: idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_5: vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api . lopaḥ api anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_6: . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām anyasya śabdāntasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_7: anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_8: na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . mīmādīnām tu lopaprasaṅgaḥ . mīmādīnām tu lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_9: . amīmapat . siddham tu rūpātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . rūpātideśaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_10: sani yādṛśam abhyāsarūpam tat sanvadbhāvena atidiśyate na ca mīmādīnām sani abhyāsarūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_11: asti . aṅgānyatvāt vā siddham . atha vā ṇyantam etat aṅgam anyat . lope kṛte na aṅgānyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_12: . sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgam anyat . katham ajijñapat . atra sani api ṇyantasya eva upādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11127_13: āpjñapyṛdhām īt iti . atra aṅgānyatvābhāvāt abhyāsalopaḥ syāt . tasmāt pūrvaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_1: kriyate alontyanivṛttyartham . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_2: mā bhūt iti . kva punaḥ alontyanivṛttyarthena arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . nityavīpsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_3: iti . nityavīpsayoḥ iti ucyate na ca antyasya dvirvacanena nityatā vīpsā vā gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_4: . iha tarhi pareḥ varjane iti antyasya api dvirvacanena varjyamānatā gamyeta . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_5: ca . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham ca sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_6: . anirdeśe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe sarvagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_7: syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya . kva punaḥ iha ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārthena arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_8: yāvatā sarvatra eva ṣaṣṭhī uccāryate . parervarjane prasamupodaḥpādapūraṇe uparyadhyadhasaḥsāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_9: vākyāderāmantritasya iti . iha na kā cit ṣaṣṭhī nityavīpsayoḥ iti . nanu ca eṣā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_10: ṣaṣṭhī . na eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . kim tarhi . arthanirdeśaḥ eṣaḥ . nitye ca arthe vīpsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_11: ca iti . alontyanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_12: . nityavīpsayoḥ dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_13: jñāpayati na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_14: iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . dviśabdaḥ ayam ekāc tasya ekāctvāt tasyaparamāmreḍitam
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_15: anudāttamca iti etat na asti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_16: tataḥ tasya paramāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti āha . yadi tarhi na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_17: ke tarhi idānīm dve bhavataḥ . dviśabdena yat ucyate . kim punaḥ tat . dviśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_18: ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ . saṅkhyeye dve bhaviṣyataḥ . ke
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_19: punaḥ te . pade vākye mātre vā . tat yadā tāvat pade vākye vā tadā anekāltvāt sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_20: siddhaḥ . yadā mātre api tadā anekālśitsarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_21: tarhi ardhamātre tadā sarvādeśaḥ na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ca ardhamātre dviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_22: ucyete . kim kāraṇam . iha vyākareṇe yaḥ sarvālpīyān svaravyavahāraḥ saḥ mātrayā
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_23: bhavati na ardhamātrayā vyavahāraḥ asti . tena ardhamātre na bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_24: kutaḥ etat pade dve bhaviṣyataḥ iti na punaḥ vākye syātām mātre vā . nityavīpsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_25: dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate na ca vākyadvirvacanena mātrādvirvacanena vā nityatā vīpsā
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_26: vā gamyate . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham eva tarhi sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam . na vā padādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_27: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . padādhikārāt . padasya iti prakṛtya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_28: vakṣyāmi . tat ca samāsataddhitavākyanivṛttyartham . tat ca avaśyam padagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_29: kartavyam samāsanivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham ca . samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_30: tāvat . saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadam . taddhitanivṛttyartham . dvipadikā tripadikā . māṣaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_31: kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ . vākyanivṛttyartham . grāme grāme pānīyam . māṣam māṣam dehi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_32: kriyamāṇe api vai padagrahaṇe samāsanivṛttyartham iti katham idam vijñāyate . samasasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_33: nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit samāse nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_34: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi viñāyate samāsasya nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_35: siddham saptaparṇaḥ saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti saptaparṇābhyām saptaparṇebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_36: atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate samāse nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti saptaparṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_37: saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tathā taddhitanivṛttyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_38: katham idam vijñāyate . taddhitasya nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_39: taddhite nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_40: nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti siddham dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ dvipadikābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_41: tripadikābhyām māṣaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate taddhite nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_42: taddhitanivṛttyartham iti dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tathā vākyanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11131_43: iti katham idam vijñāyate . vākyasya nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_0: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate vākyasya nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_1: yadi vākyam vīpsāyuktam bhavitavyam eva dvirvacanena . atha api avayavaḥ bhavatu
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_2: eva . tat etat kriyamāṇe api padagrahaṇe ālūnaviśīrṇam bhavati . kim cit saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_3: kim cit asaṅgṛhītam . sagatigrahaṇam ca . sagatigrahaṇam ca kartavyam . prapacati
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_4: prapacati . prakaroti prakaroti iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi sagatikam
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_5: padam bhavati . samāsanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . samāsena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_6: vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . kim ca bhoḥ samāsaḥ vīpsāyām iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_7: khalu vīpsāyām iti ucyate gamyate tu saḥ arthaḥ . tatra uktaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_8: dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca samāsena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_9: . tat yathā . ekaikavicitāḥ anyonyasahāyāḥ iti . atha vā yat atra vīpsāyuktam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_10: adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi parvaṇi sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_11: aṣṭau padāni asya iti . taddhitanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . taddhitena
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_12: ukatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . taddhitaḥ khalu api vīpsāyām iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_13: . yatra ca taddhitena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā . ekaikaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_14: dadāti iti . vākyanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . padadvirvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_15: uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ vākyadvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca padadvirvacanena anuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_16: vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā . prapacati prapacati . prakaroti prakaroti
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_17: . uttarārtham tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam . tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_18: vakṣyati tat padadvirvacane yathā syāt vākyadvirvacanemā bhūt . mahyam grahīṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_19: mahyam grahīṣyati . mām abhivyāhariṣyati mām abhvyāhariṣyati . katham ca atra dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_20: . chāndasatvāt . svaraḥ api tarhi chāndasatvāt eva na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_21: tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam . padasya padāt iti vakṣyati tat padagrahaṇam na kartavyam

GS24pmbhasuu:11291_2: . ā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ yāhi . yadyogāt gatiḥ . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_3: bhavataḥ na ca āṅaḥ mandraśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi yāhiśabdam prati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_4: yadyogāt gatiḥ iti cet pratyayodāttatve aprasiddhiḥ . yadyogāt gatiḥ iti cet pratyayodāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_5: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . yatprakaroti . tasmāt tiṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . yadi tiṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_6: kriyate āmante na prāpnoti . prapacatitarām . prajalpatitarām . asati punaḥ tiṅgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_7: kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam tasmāt atiśaye tarap utpadyate tarabantāt svārthe ām tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_8: yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti bhavati etam saṅghātam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_9: kriyāyogaḥ . tasmāt na arthaḥ tiṅgrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati . a mandraiḥ indra
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_10: haribhiḥ yāhi mayuraromabhiḥ . yadyogāt gatiḥ iti . nanu ca uktam yadyogāt gatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11291_11: iti cet pratyayodāttatve aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadkriyāyuktāḥ iti na

GS24pmbhasuu:11316_3: asiddhāḥ syūḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalojhali hrasvādaṅgāt saṃyogāntasyalopaḥ iti

GS24pmbhasuu:11316_5: iti etāḥ paribhāṣāḥ na prakalperan . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi api idam tatra asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11316_6: tat tu iha siddham . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11316_7: . jhalojhali . hrasvādaṅgāt . saṃyogāntasyalopaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati tasminnitinirdiṣṭepūrvasya
