GS24pmbhasuu:11324_7: suparvāṇaḥ . ṇatve kṛte nopadhāyāḥ iti dīrghatvam na prapnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11328_0: 358 subvidhim prati nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . bhavet iha rājabhiḥ takṣabhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11328_1: iti nalope kṛte ataḥ iti aisbhāvaḥ na syāt . iha tu khalu rājabhyām takṣabhyām rājasu
GS24pmbhasuu:11328_2: takṣasu iti nalope kṛte dīrghatvaittve prāpnutaḥ. na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . subvidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_0: 359-361 atha sañjñāvidhau kim udāharaṇam . pañca sapta . pañca sapta iti atra nalope
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_1: kṛte ṣṇāntāṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . sañjñāgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_2: ca tannimittatvāt lopasya . sañjñāgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_3: lopasya . na akṛtāyām ṣaṭsañjñāyām jaśśasoḥ luk na ca akṛte luki padasañjñā na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_4: akṛtāyām padasañjñāyām nalopaḥ prāpnoti . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_5: tarhi prayojanam pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ iti ṣaṭtricaturbhyohalādiḥ jhalyupottamam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_6: eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . svare avadhāraṇāt ca . svare avadhāraṇāt ca sañjñāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_7: anarthakam . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate svaravidhim prati iti . tugvidhau kim udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_8: . vṛtrahabhyām vṛtrahabhiḥ . nalope kṛte hrasvasyapitikṛtituk iti tuk prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_9: asiddhatvāt na bhavati . tugvidhau ca uktam . kim uktam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_10: animittam tadvighātasya iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛti iti vakṣyāmi . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:11334_11: bhūt . brahmahacchatram bhrūṇahacchāyā . na eṣaḥ sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11338_0: 361-362 iha ne yat kāryam prāpnoti tat prati mubhāvaḥ na asiddhaḥ iti ucyate nābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11338_1: ca eva tāvat na prāpnoti . evam tarhi na mu ṭādeśe . na mu ṭādeśe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11338_2: kim idam ṭādeśaḥ iti . ṭāyāḥ ādeśaḥ ṭādeśaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ṭāyāḥ ādeśe iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11338_3: ṭāyām ādeśe aprasiddhiḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . amunā iti atra mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11338_4: atodīrghoyañi supica iti dīrghatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_0: ṭāyām ādeśaḥ ṭādeśaḥ iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_1: . nanu ca uktam ne yat kāryam prāpnoti tasmin mubhāvaḥ na asiddhaḥ iti ucyate nābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_2: ca eva tāvat na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha iṅgitena ceṣṭitena nimiṣitena
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_3: mahatā vā sūtranibandhena ācāryāṇām abhiprāyaḥ lakṣyate . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_4: atra nābhāvaḥ iti yat ayam ne parataḥ asiddhatvapratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā dvigatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_5: api hetavaḥ bhavanti . tat yathā . āmrāḥ ca siktāḥ pitaraḥ ca prīṇitāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_6: tathā vākyāni api dvigatāni dṛśyante . śvetaḥ dhāvati . alambusānām yātā iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_7: vā vṛddhakumārīvākyavat idam draṣṭavyam . tat yathā . vṛddhakumārī indreṇa uktā varam
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_8: vṛṇīṣva iti sā varam avṛṇīta putrāḥ me bahukṣīraghṛtam odanam kāṃsyapātryām bhuñjīran
GS24pmbhasuu:11340_9: iti . na ca tāvat asyāḥ patiḥ bhavati kutaḥ putrāḥ kutaḥ gāvaḥ kutaḥ dhānyam . tatrs

GS24pmbhasuu:11658_7: antaraṅgasya . animittam bahiraṅgam antaraṅgasya . kim kāraṇam . asiddhatvāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11658_8: asiddhatvam yāvatā pūrvatra asiddham iti asiddhā paribhāṣā . asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11658_9: antaraṅge . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:11658_10: idam bhavati asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti . evam eṣā siddhā paribhāṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11658_11: . kutaḥ nu khalu etat dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ pūrvatra asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11658_12: iti ca asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti ca pūrvatrāsiddham iti etām upamṛdya asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11658_13: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti etayā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ asiddham bahiraṅgam

GS24pmbhasuu:11689_11: . pūrvānte punaḥ sati sātpadādyoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . tasmāt santu

GS24pmbhasuu:11693_3: . stoḥ ścunā sannipāte na ṇakāraḥ bhavati . tataḥ ścuḥ . ścuḥ ca bhavati stoḥ ścunā sannipāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_0: 444-446 ṅamuṭi padādigrahaṇam . ṅamuṭi padādigrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . daṇḍinā
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_1: śakaṭinā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . padāt iti vartate . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_2: paramadaṇḍinā paramacchattriṇā iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat uttarapadatve
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_3: ca apadādividhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api padāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_4: vaktavyam . yat hi tat prakṛtam prāk supi kutsanāt iti evam tat . evam tarhi ṅamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_5: eva ayam ṅamuṭ kriyate . katham . padasya iti vartate ṅamaḥ iti ca na eṣā pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_6: . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . padāntasya ṅamaḥ ṅamuṭ bhavati hrasvāt uttarasya aci
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_7: iti . yadi ṅamaḥ eva ṅamuṭ kriyate kurvannāste kṛṣannāste raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_8: iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . padāntasya iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_9: na eṣaḥ padāntaḥ . padāntabhaktaḥ padāntagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . evam api na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_10: . kim kāraṇam . uktam etat na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt iti . evam tarhi pade
GS24pmbhasuu:11697_11: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . uñi ca pade iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11701_0: 446 kimartham mayaḥ uttarasya uñaḥ vaḥ vā iti ucyate na ikaḥ yaṇaci iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11701_1: . na sidhyati . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11701_2: eva ucyeta ikaḥ yaṇaci mayaḥ uñaḥ vā iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kimvāvapanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11701_3: mahat . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ prasajyeta . vatve punaḥ sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11706_0: plakṣaḥ iti . saṃhitāyām iti vartate . evam api atra prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11706_1: sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā iti ucyate . saḥ yathā eva pareṇa paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ evam pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11706_2: api . evam tarhi anavakāśā avasānasañjñā saṃhitāsañjñām bādhiṣyate . atha vā saṃhitāsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_0: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ . yadi eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_1: anavakāśā avasānasañjñā saṃhitāsañjñām bādhate atha api saṃhitāsañjñāyām prakarṣagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_2: vijñāyate ubhayathā doṣaḥ bhavati . iṣyante itaḥ uttaram avasāne saṃhitākāryāṇi tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_3: na sidhyanti . aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_4: na sarvasya visarjanīyasya satvam bhavati iti yat ayam kharavasānayorvisjanīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_5: āha . itarathā kharavasānayoḥ saḥ bhavati iti eva brūyāt . tat ca laghu bhavati visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_6: saḥ iti etat ca na vaktavyaṃ bhavati . avaśyam śarparevisarjanīyaḥ iti atra prakṛtinirdeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_7: visarjanīyagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha idānīm etat api rasānnidhyārtham purastāt apakrakṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_8: kharavasānayoḥ saḥ iti atra eva evam api kupvoḥ XkkaXppau ca iti evamādinā anukramaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_9: vyavacchinnam bhobhagoaghoapūrvasyayo'śi iti atra rugrahaṇam kartavyam syāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_10: api ekam visarjanīyagrahaṇam vyājaḥ bhavati . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_11: sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na sarvasya visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_12: satvam bhavati iti . evam api anaikāntikam jñāpakam . etāvat jñāpyate na sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_13: vijanīyasya satvam bhavati iti tatra kutaḥ etat iha bhaviṣyati vṛkṣaḥ tatra plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_14: tatra iti iha na bhaviṣyati vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_15: na asya visarjanīyasya satvam bhavati iti yat ayam śarpare visarjanīyaḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_16: atha vā hali iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . hali sarveṣām iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_17: mayaḥ uñaḥ vaḥ vā hali ca iti hali api vatvam prāpnoti . śamu naḥ . śamu yoḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:11707_18: . evam tarhi visarjanīyasyasaḥ iti atra khari iti anuvartiṣyate . atha vā sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11711: 450 vāśarprakaraṇe kharpare lopaḥ . vāśarprakaraṇe kharpare lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vṛkṣāḥ sthātāraḥ . vṛkṣāḥ sthātāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_0: 450-453 sasya kupvoḥ visarjanīyajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyāḥ . sasya kupvoḥ visarjanīyajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_1: vaktavyāḥ . visarjanīyādeśe hi śarparayoḥ eva ādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . visarjanīyādeśe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_2: sati śarparayoḥ eva kupvoḥ hkkahppau syātām . adbhiḥ psātam . vāsaḥ kṣaumam . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_3: na bhaviṣyataḥ . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . puruṣaḥ tsarukaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_4: . na vaktavyam . yat etat visarjanīyasya saḥ iti atra visarjanīyagrahaṇam etat uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_5: anuvartiṣyate tasmin ca śarpare visarjanīyaḥ asiddhaḥ . na asiddhaḥ . katham . adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_6: nāma triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_7: suprajvalitaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_8: anukṛṣyate tadvat . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_9: upatiṣṭhate . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_10: hi yat etat visarjanīyasyasaḥ iti atra visarjanīyagrahaṇam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_11: sat anyat sampadyate tasmin ca śarpare visarjanīyaḥ siddhaḥ . evam ca krtvā śarparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_12: eva kupvoḥ hkkahppau syātām . adbhiḥ psātam . vāsaḥ kṣaumam iti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_13: kariṣyate . śarpare visarjanīyaḥ . vā śari . tataḥ kupvoḥ . kupvoḥ ca śarparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_14: visarjanīyasya visarjanīyaḥ bhavati iti . kimartham idam . kupvoḥ hkkahppau vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_15: tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ hkkahppau bhavataḥ kupvoḥ iti eva . śarparayoḥ iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_16: . atha vā śarparevisarjanīyaḥ iti etat kupvoḥ hkkahppau ca iti atra anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_0: 453-454 saḥ apadādau anavyayasya . saḥ apadādau anavyayasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_1: bhūt . prātaḥkalpam punaḥkalpam . roḥ kāmye niyamārtham . roḥ kāmye iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_2: . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . roḥ eva kāmye na anyasya . payaskāmyati . kva mā
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_3: bhūt . gīḥkāmyati pūḥkāmyati . upadhmānīyasya ca satvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_4: . ayam ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate tasya satve kṛte jaśbhāve ca abhyudgaḥ samudgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_5: iti etat rūpam yathā syāt . yadi upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate ubjijiṣati iti upadhmānīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_6: dvirvacanam prāpnoti . dakāropadhe punaḥ sati nandrāḥsaṃyogādayaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11719_7: siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi dakāropadhaḥ paṭhyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11720_0: ubjitā ubjitum iti . asiddhe bhaḥ udjeḥ . idam asti stoḥścunāścuḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:11720_1: . bhaḥ udjeḥ . udjeḥ ca ścunā sannipāte bhaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11720_2: na vaktavyam . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . bhujanyubjaupāṇyupatāpayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11720_3: iti . iha api prāpnoti . abhyudgaḥ samudgaḥ . akutvaviṣaye nipātanam . atha vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:11720_4: etat ubjeḥ rūpam . kim tarhi gameḥ dvyupasargāt ḍaḥ vidhīyate . abhyudgataḥ abhyudgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11724_0: 454-456 kim aviśeṣeṇa satvam uktvā tataḥ iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:11724_1: iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya eva ṣatvam vidhīyate . kim ca ataḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11724_2: satvam uktvā iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate niṣkṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_0: niṣpītam iti atra satvasya asiddhatvāt ṣatvam na prāpnoti . atha iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_1: eva ṣatvam vidhīyate satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_2: satvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam namaspurasorgatyoḥ iti atra sakāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_3: . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe ṣatvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_4: ṣatvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam idudupadhasya ca apratyasya iti atra ṣakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_5: kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_6: anuvartate satvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam tirasaḥ anyatarasyām iti atra sakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_7: kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe ṣatvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_8: anuvartate ṣatvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam dvistriścaturitikṛtvo'rthe isusoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_9: sāmarthye nityaṃsamāse anuttarapadasthasya iti ṣakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_10: ca kriyamāṇe satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate satvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_12: sakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat aviśeṣeṇa satvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11725_13: uktvā iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate . nanu ca uktam niṣkṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_0: niṣpītam iti atra satvasya asiddhatvāt ṣatvam na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_1: jñāpayati na yoge yogaḥ asiddhaḥ . kim tarhi prakaraṇe prakaraṇam asiddham iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_2: ayam upasargāt asamāse api ṇopadeśasya iti asamāsepigrahaṇam karoti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_3: astu iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya ṣatvam vidhīyate . nanu ca uktam satvam api anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_4: utāho na kim ca ataḥ yadi anuvartate satvam api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_5: anuvartiṣyate . saḥ apadādau . iṇaḥṣaḥ . namaspurasoḥ gatyoḥ sakāraḥ iṇaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_6: ṣakāraḥ . idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya ṣakāraḥ namaspurasoḥ gatyoḥ sakāraḥ . tirasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_7: anyatarasyām sakāraḥ idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya ṣakāraḥ . dvistriścaturitikṛtvo'rthe
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_8: isusoḥsāmarthye nityamsamāse'nuttarapadasthasya iti ṣakāraḥ tirasaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_0: 456-457 idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya iti cet pummuhusoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . idudupadhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_1: ca apratyayasya iti cet pummuhusoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . puṃskāmā muhuḥkāmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_2: . vṛddhibhūtānām ṣatvam vaktavyam . dauṣkulyam naiṣpuruṣyam . plutānām tādau ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_3: plutānām tādau ca kupvoḥ ca iti vaktavyam . sarpi3ṣṭara . barhī3ṣṭara ni3ṣkula du3ṣpuruṣa
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_4: . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahirangalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11734_0: 457-458 iha kasmāt na bhavati . pituḥ karoti . mātuḥ karoti . apratyayavisarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11734_1: iti ṣatvam prasajyeta . apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ucyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11734_2: ayam . lupyate atra pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ rātsasya iti . evam tarhi . bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11734_3: jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputraśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:11734_4: paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_0: 458-460 dvistriścaturgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . pañcakṛtvaḥ karoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_1: kṛtvorthagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . catuṣkapālaḥ catuṣkaṇṭakaḥ iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_2: asti . astu etena vibhāṣā pūrveṇa nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pūrveṇa iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_3: vibhāṣā ārabhyate sā yathā eva iha bādhikā bhavati catuḥ karoti catuṣkaroti iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_4: catuṣkapāle api bādhikā syāt . na atra pūrveṇa ṣatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . apratyayavisarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_5: iti ucyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam . lupyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ rātsasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_6: . tasmāt kṛtvorthagrahaṇam kartavyam . dvistriścaturgrahaṇam śakyamavaktum . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_7: na bhavati pañcakṛtvaḥ karoti iti . idudupadhasya iti vartate . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_8: akriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇena visarjanīyaḥ viśeṣyeta . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_9: kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt dviṣkaroti dviḥ karoti . iha na syāt catuṣkaroti catuḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_10: iti . dvistriścaturgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇe dvistriścaturaḥ viśeṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_11: . dvistriścaturṇām kṛtro'rthe vartamānānām yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_12: prayojanam . padasya iti vartate tat kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyaḥ . padasya kṛtvo'rthe
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_13: vartamānasya yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . kṛtvasujarthe ṣatvam bravīti . kasmāt catuṣkapāle
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_14: mā . ṣatvam vibhāṣayā bhūt . nanu siddham tatra pūrveṇa . siddhe hi ayam vidhatte
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_15: caturaḥ ṣatvam tadā api krtvo'rthe . lupte kṛtvo'rthīye rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_16: . evam sati tu idānīm dviḥ triḥ catuḥ iti anena kim kāryam . anyaḥ hi na idudupadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_17: kṛtvo'rthe kaḥ cit api asti . akriyamāṇe grahaṇe visarjanīyaḥ tadā viśeṣyeta . caturaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_18: na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi . tasmin tu gṛhyamāṇe yuktam caturaḥ viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11738_19: bhavati . prakṛtam padam tadantam tasya api viśeṣaṇam nyāyyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11742_0: 460-462 anuttarapadasthasya iti kimartham . paramasarpiḥkuṇḍikā . atha idānīm anena
GS24pmbhasuu:11742_1: mukte pūrveṇa ṣatvam vibhāṣā kasmāt na bhavati isusoḥ sāmarthye iti . nānāpadārthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11742_2: vartamānayoḥ khyāyate yadā yogaḥ . tasmin ṣatvam kāryam tat yuktam tat ca me na iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11742_3: . vyapekṣāsāmarthye pūrvayogaḥ na ca atra vyapekṣāsāmarthyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11742_4: vyapekṣāsāmarthyam āśrīyate na punaḥ ekārthībhāvaḥ yathā anyatra . aikārthye sāmarthye
GS24pmbhasuu:11742_5: vākye ṣatvam na me prasajyeta . aikārthye sāmarthye sati vākye ṣatvam na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_0: sarpiṣ karoti . sarpiḥ karoti iti . tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_1: . atha cet kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhike na eva me bhavet prāptiḥ . yadi kṛdantam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_2: tataḥ adhikasya ṣatvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_3: grahaṇam bhavati iti . vākye api tarhi na prāpnoti . paramasarpiṣkaroti paramasarpiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_4: karoti iti . vākye ca me vibhāṣā pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta . yat ayam anuttarapadasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_5: iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati vākye vibhāṣā iti . atha cet
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_6: saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ vibhāṣā iyam . atha avyutpannam prātipadikam tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_7: nitye ṣatve prāpte iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate . siddham ca me samāse . ṣatvam . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_8: tarhi idam ucyate . pratiṣedhārthaḥ tu yatnaḥ ayam . anuttarapadasthasya iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_9: vakṣyāmi iti . nānāpadārthayoḥ vartamānayoḥ khyāyate yadā yogaḥ . tasmin ṣatvam kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_10: tat yuktam tat ca me na iha . aikārthye sāmarthye vākye ṣatvam na me prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_11: tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante . atha cet kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhike
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_12: na eva me bhavet prāptiḥ . vākye ca me vibhāṣā pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta . atha cet
GS24pmbhasuu:11743_13: saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ vibhāṣā iyam . siddham ca me samāse pratiṣedhārthaḥ tu yatnaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11747_0: 463 atha mūrdhanyagrahaṇam kimartham na apadāntasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:11747_1: tatra ayam api arthaḥ ṣakāragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati prakṛtam anuvartate . kva

GS24pmbhasuu:11769_1: iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:11769_2: cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bisam bisam . musalam musalam . samānādhikaraṇānām

GS24pmbhasuu:11771_1: hi prasajyeta sarīsṛpyate iti . tasmāt tatra dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11771_2: kariṣyati hariṣyati pratyayaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11771_3: yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . iha tarhi akārṣīt pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11771_4: iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : joṣiṣat ,

GS24pmbhasuu:11773_3: kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . katham . astu tāvat avayavaṣaṣṭhī . nanu ca uktam ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11773_4: iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam

GS24pmbhasuu:11819_6: ṣīdhvami ananantaratvāt iṭaḥ vibhāṣābhāvaḥ laviṣīḍhvam laviṣīdhvam iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11819_7: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam . kim . luluviḍhve luluvidhve iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11819_8: . yat etasmin yoge ṣīdhvaṅgrahaṇam tat anavakāśam tasya anavakāśatvāt vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11819_9: . yat api ucyate iṇgrahaṇasya ca aviśeṣaṇatvāt ṣyādimātre ḍhatvaprasaṅgaḥ iti aṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11819_10: iti vakṣyāmi . nanu ca uktam aṅgagrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ iti . pūrvasmin yoge yat aṅgagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11819_11: tat uttaratra nivṛttam . atha vā pūrvasmin yoge iṇgrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam uttaratra dhakāraviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11823_0: 478-479 agneḥ dīrghāt somasya . agneḥ dīrghāt somasya iti vaktavyam . agnīṣomau .
GS24pmbhasuu:11823_1: itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi aniṣṭam prasajyeta . agnisomau māṇavakau
GS24pmbhasuu:11823_2: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye sampratiprattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11823_3: . tat yathā . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11823_4: tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati . gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11823_5: evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyātve .
GS24pmbhasuu:11827_0: 480 sāntābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . mātuḥṣvasā mātuḥsvasā . pituḥṣvasā
GS24pmbhasuu:11827_1: pituḥsvaseti . mātuḥ pituḥ iti sāntagrahaṇānarthakyam ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11827_2: . mātuḥ pituḥ iti sāntagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11827_3: . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti sāntasya api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11831: 480-481 astigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . anusṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11832_0: visṛtam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yadkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:11832_1: bhavataḥ na ca etam sakāram prati kriyāyogaḥ . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti abhiṣanti
GS24pmbhasuu:11832_2: viṣanti iti na hi astiḥ kriyāvacanaḥ . kaḥ punaḥ āha na astiḥ kriyāvacanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11832_3: kriyāvacanaḥ astiḥ . ātaḥ ca kriyāvacanaḥ vyatyanuṣate kartarikarmavyatihāre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11832_4: anena ātmanepadam bhavati . karmavyatihāraḥ ca kaḥ . kriyāvyatihāraḥ . prāduḥśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11832_5: tarhi mā bhūt . prāduḥśabdaḥ ca niyataviṣayaḥ kṛbhvastiyoge eva vartate . upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11832_6: tarhi syateḥ mā bhūt iti . iṣyate upasargāt syateḥ ṣatvam . ātaś ca iṣyate . evam hi āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:11833_1: tarhi syateḥ mā bhūt iti . prāduḥśabdaḥ ca niyataviṣayaḥ kṛbhvastiyoge eva vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11833_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:11834: anusūteḥ apratyayaḥ anusūḥ anusvaḥ apatyam ānuseyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11838_0: 481-483 kimartham svapeḥ supibhūtasya grahaṇam kriyate . supeḥ ṣatvam svapeḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:11838_1: . supeḥ ṣatvam ucyate tat svapeḥ mā bhūt iti . susvapnaḥ visvapnak iti . visuṣvāpa
GS24pmbhasuu:11838_2: iti kena na . visuṣvāpa iti atra kasmāt na bhavati . halādiśeṣāt na supiḥ . halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:11838_3: kṛte na eṣaḥ supiḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . halādiśeṣaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11838_4: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt halādiśeṣaḥ . iṣṭam pūrvam prasāraṇam . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11838_5: halādiśeṣāt pūrvam samprasāraṇam . ātaḥ ca iṣyate . evam hi āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_0: abhyāsasamprasāraṇam halādiśeṣāt vipratiṣedhena iti . evam tarhi sthādiṣu abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_1: iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . sthādīnām niyamaḥ na atra prāk sitāt uttaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_2: supiḥ . prāk sitasaṃśabdanāt saḥ niyamaḥ uttaraḥ ca supiḥ paṭhyate . evam tarhi arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_3: na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . anarthake viṣuṣupuḥ . yadi arthavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_4: grahaṇam viṣuṣupuḥ iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . supibhūtaḥ dviḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_5: . supibhutasya dvirvacanam . supeḥ ṣatvam svapeḥ mā bhūt . visuṣvāpa iti kena na
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_6: . halādiśeṣāt na supiḥ . iṣṭam pūrvam prasāraṇam . sthādīnām niyamaḥ na atra prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:11839_7: sitāt uttaraḥ supiḥ . anarthake viṣuṣupuḥ supibhūtaḥ dviḥ ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11843_0: 483-484 kapiṣṭhalaḥ gotraprakṛtau . kapiṣṭhalaḥ gotraprakṛtau iti vaktavyam . gotre
GS24pmbhasuu:11843_1: iti ucyamāne iha eva syāt . kāpiṣṭhaliḥ . iha na syāt . kapiṣṭhalaḥ kāpiṣṭhalāyanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11843_2: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate kapiṣṭhalaḥ iti gotre nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11843_3: iti . katham tarhi . gotre yaḥ kapiṣṭhalaśabdaḥ tasya ṣatvam nipātyate yatra vā tatra vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11847: 484 sthaḥ iti kim idam dhātugrahaṇam āhosvit rūpagrahaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi dhātugrahaṇam gosthānam iti atra prāpnoti . atha rūpagrahaṇam savyeṣṭhāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11849_0: savyeṣṭhā sārathiḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11849_1: . katham gosthānam iti . savanādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11851: savyeṣṭhā sārathiḥ iti . sthaḥ sthāsthinsthṝṇām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11852: (P_8,3.98) KA_III,448.10-11 Ro_V,485 avihitalakṣaṇaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ suṣāmādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11856: 485 hrasvāt tādau tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ . hrasvāt tādau tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhindyustarām chindyustarām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11860_0: 485 stutastomayoḥ chandasi anarthakam vacanam pūrvapadāt iti siddhatvāt . stutastomayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11860_1: chandasi vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadāt iti siddhatvāt . pūrvapadāt iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_0: 485-486 sanoteḥ anaḥ iti ca . kim . vacanam anarthakam iti eva . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_1: iti siddhatvāt . niyamārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . sanoteḥ anakārasya eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_2: syāt . iha mā bhūt . gosanim iti . sanoteḥ anaḥ iti niyamārtham iti cet savanādikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_3: siddham . sanoteḥ anaḥ iti niyamārtham iti cet savanādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . sanartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_4: tu . sanartham tu idam vaktavyam . sisaniṣati . etat api na asti prayojanam . stautiṇyorevaṣaṇyabhyāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_5: iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . ṇyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . sisānayiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_6: . katham punaḥ aṇyantasya pratiṣedhe ṇyantaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt . aṇyantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11864_7: pratiṣedhavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā ṇyante vijñāsyate . atha vā ayam asti aṇyantaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11869_0: 486 kimartham savādiṣu aśvasaniśabdaḥ paṭhyate . pūrvapadāt iti ṣatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11869_1: tadbādhanārtham . na etat asti prayojanam . iṇantāt iti tatra anuvartate aniṇantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11869_2: ca ayam . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat savanādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11869_3: aśvasaniśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aniṇantāt api ṣatvam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11869_4: etasya jñāpane prayojanam . jalāṣāham māṣaḥ iti etat siddham bhavati . atha vā ekadeśavikṛtārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11873_0: 486-487 upasargāt iti yā prāptiḥ bhavitavyam tasyāḥ pratiṣedhena utāho na . na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11873_1: . kim kāraṇam . upasargāt ṣatvam pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate tat yathā eva padādilakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11873_2: pratiṣedham bādhate evam sicaḥ yaṅi iti etam api bādhate . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11873_3: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte padādilakṣaṇe pratiṣedhe upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11873_4: ṣatvam ārabhyate sicaḥ yaṅi iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11873_5: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam upasargāt ṣatvam padādilakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:11873_6: bādhiṣyate sicaḥ yaṅi iti etam na bādhiṣyate . tasmāt abhisesicyate iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11877: 487 kimartham sahiḥ soḍhabhūtaḥ gṛhyate . yatra asya etat rūpam tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . pariṣahate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11881_0: 487 stambhusivusahām caṅi upasargāt . stambhusivusahām caṅi upasargāt iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11881_1: . kim prayojanam . upasargāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . abhyāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11881_2: yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti . paryasīṣahat .
GS24pmbhasuu:11885_0: 487 sani kim udāharaṇam . susūṣati . na etat asti prayojanam . stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:11885_1: iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . abhisusūṣati . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11885_2: prayojanam . sthādiṣvabhyāsenacābhyāsasya iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:11890: 487 sadaḥ liṭi pratiṣedhe svañjeḥ upasaṅkhyanam . sadaḥ liṭi pratiṣedhe svañjeḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pariṣasvaje .
GS24pmbhasuu:11894: 488-490 raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇam . raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade ṛkārāt ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt : mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_0: pitṝṇām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_1: ṇatvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_2: gṛhyante . ekadeśe nuḍādiṣu ca uktam . kim uktam . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_3: ṛkāragrahaṇam iti . tasmāt gṛhyante . evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ananantaratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_4: . yat tat rephāt param bhakteḥ tena vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . aḍvyavāye iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_5: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . varṇaikadeśāḥ ke varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_6: . ye vyapavṛktāḥ api varṇāḥ bhavanti . yat ca atra rephāt param bhakteḥ na tat kva
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_7: cit api vyapavṛktam dṛśyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_8: samānapade . tataḥ vyavāye . vyavāye ca raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ aṭkupvāṅnumbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_9: iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . etaiḥ eva akṣarasamāmnāyikaiḥ vyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_10: na anyaiḥ iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ṛkārāt ṇatvam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_11: kṣubhnādiṣu nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati . na etat asti jñāpakam . vṛddhyartham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_12: . nārnamaniḥ iti . yat tarhi tatra eva tṛpnotiśabdam paṭhati . yat ca api nṛnamanaśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_13: paṭhati . nanu ca uktam vṛddhyartham etat syāt iti . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_14: ṇatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11895_15: . ṛtaḥ naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati . tataḥ chandasi avagrahāt ṛtaḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_0: 490-491 aḍvyavāye ṇatve anyavyavāye pratiṣedhaḥ . aḍvyavāye ṇatve anyavyavāye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_1: vaktavyaḥ . ādarśena akṣadarśena . na vā anyena vyapetatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_2: kāraṇam . anyena vyapetatvāt . anyena atra vyavāyaḥ . yadi api atra anyena vyavāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_3: aṭā api tu vyavāyaḥ asti tatra asti aḍvyavāye iti prāpnoti . aṭā eva vyavāye bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_4: . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . aḍgrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_5: . yadi hi yatra aṭā ca anyena ca vyavāyaḥ tatra syāt aḍgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_6: vyavāye naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti eva brūyāt . asti anyat aḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_7: . yaḥ anirdiṣṭaiḥ eva vyavāyaḥ tatra mā bhūt . kṛtsnam mṛtsnā iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11899_8: syāt śarvyavāye na iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_0: 491 tatsamudāye ṇatvāprasiddhiḥ yathā anyatra . tatsamudāye vyavāyasamudāye ṇatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_1: aprasiddhiḥ . arkeṇa argheṇa . yathā anyatra api vyavāyasamudāye kāryam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_2: . kva anyatra . numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye'pi niṃsse niṃssva iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_3: anyatra api vyavāyasamudāye kāryam na bhavati . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_4: iti . tat yathā . guṇavṛddhisañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_5: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_6: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . yadi evam ekena vyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_7: na prāpnoti . kiriṇā ririṇā iti . ubhayathā api vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:11903_8: . gargaiḥ saha na bhoktavyam iti pratyekam ca na sambhujyate samuditaiḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_0: 491-492 kuvyavāye hādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . kuvyavāye hādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vakavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_1: . kim prayojanam . prayojanam vṛtraghnaḥ srughnaḥ prāghāni iti . hanteratpūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_2: iti atpūrvagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . numvyavāye ṇatve anusvārābhāve pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_3: . numvyavāye ṇatve anusvārābhāve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prenvanam prenvanīyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_4: anāgame ca ṇatvam . anāgame ca ṇatvam vaktavyam . tṛmpaṇīyam . anusvāravyavāyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_5: tu siddham . anusvāravyavāye naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . tadanusvāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_6: kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . nakāre anusvāraḥ parasavarṇībhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_7: nirdiśyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . prenvanam prenvanīyam . anusvāraviśeṣaṇam numgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_8: . numaḥ yaḥ anusvāraḥ iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . tṛmpaṇam tṛmpaṇīyam . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_9: tarhi ayogavāhānām aviśeṣeṇa upadeśaḥ coditaḥ tatra anusvāre kṛte aḍvyavāye iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11907_10: siddham . yadi evam na arthaḥ numgrahaṇena . anusvāre kṛte aḍvyavāye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11911_0: 493 pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām uttarapadagrahaṇam . pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām uttarapadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11911_2: pūrvapadasthasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt . khārapāyaṇaḥ karaṇapriyaḥ .. tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11911_3: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti sambandhiśabdau etau . sati
GS24pmbhasuu:11911_4: pūrvapade uttarapadam bhavati sati ca uttarapade pūrvapadam bhavati . tatra sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11911_5: etat gantavyam yat prati pūrvapadam iti etat bhavati tatsthasya niyamaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11911_6: ca prati etat bhavati . uttarapadam prati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_0: 493-494 sañjñāyām niyamavacane gapratiṣedhāt niyamapratiṣedhaḥ . sañjñāyām niyamavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_1: gapratiṣedhāt niyamasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyate agaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_2: nityam ṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra pūrveṇa sañjñāyām ca asañjñāyām ca nityam ṇatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_3: . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām . tataḥ agaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_4: . gāntāt pūrvapadāt yā ca yāvatī ṇatvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_5: vā yathā sarvanāmasañjñāyām . na vā arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . ṇatvam kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_6: . yathā sarvanāmasañjñāyām . uktam ca sarvanāmasañjñāyām sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_7: ṇatvābhāvaḥ iti . yathā punaḥ tatra nipātanam kriyate sarvādīni sarvanāmāni iti iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_8: idānīm kim nipātanam . iha api nipātanam asti . kim . aṇṛgayanādibhyaḥ iti . na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_9: vā punaḥ atra pūrveṇa ṇatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . samānapade iti ucyate na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_10: etat samānapadam . samāse kṛte samānapadam . samānam eva yat nityam na ca etat nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_11: samānapadam eva . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . samānagrahaṇasāmarthyāt.
GS24pmbhasuu:11915_12: yadi hi yat samānam ca asamānam ca tatra syāt samanagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11919: 494 dvyakṣaratryakṣarebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadāruvanam . irikādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . irikāvanam timiravanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11923_0: 494-495 adantāt adantasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dīrghāhnī śarat iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11923_1: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na eṣā ahanśabdāt ṣaṣṭhī . kā tarhi . ahnaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11923_2: prathamā pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ca . atha vā yuvādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11927: 495 āhitopasthitayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . ikṣuvāhaṇam śaravāhaṇam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:11928: vāhanam vāhyāt iti vaktavyam . yadā hi gargāṇām vāhanam apaviddham tiṣṭhati tadā mā bhūt . gargavāhanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11932: 495 vāprakaraṇe girinadyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . vāprakaraṇe girinadyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . giriṇadī girinadī . cakraṇitambā cakranitambā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11936_1: ṇatve samāsāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . asamāsāntapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11936_2: asamāsāntasya mā bhūt . gargabhaginī dakṣabhaginī iti . na vā bhavati gargabhagiṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:11936_3: iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam gargāṇām bhagaḥ gargabhagaḥ gargabhagaḥ asyāḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11936_4: iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati gargāṇām bhaginī gargabhaginī iti tadā na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11936_5: . tadā mā bhūt iti . yadi samāsāntagrahaṇam kriyate māṣavāpiṇī vṛīhivāpiṇī atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:11936_6: prāpnoti . liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇe ca uktam . kim uktam . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11940: 496 tatra yuvādipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra yuvādīnām pratiṣedaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āryayūnā kṣatriyayūnā prapakvāni paripakvāni dīrghāhnī śarat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11944_0: 496-497 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . māṣakumbhavāpeṇa vrīhikumbhavāpeṇa iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11944_1: nityam ṇatvena bhavitavyam āhosvit vibhāṣayā . yadā tāvat etat vākyam bhavati kumbhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11944_2: vāpaḥ kumbhavāpaḥ māṣāṇām kumbhavāpaḥ māṣakumbhavāpa iti tadā nityam ṇatvena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11944_3: . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati māṣāṇām kumbhaḥ māṣakumbhaḥ māṣakumbhasya vāpaḥ māṣakumbhavāpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_0: 497-498 asamāsagrahaṇam kimartham . samāse iti vartate asamāse api yathā syāt . praṇamati
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_1: pariṇamati . kva punaḥ samāsagrahaṇam prakṛtam . pūrvapadātsañjñāyāmagaḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_2: punaḥ tena samāsagrahaṇam śakyam vijñātum . pūrvapadagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . samāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_3: etat bhavati pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti . atha apigrahaṇam kimartham . samāse api
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_4: yathā syāt . praṇāmakaḥ pariṇāmakaḥ . yadi tarhi samāse ca asamāse ca iṣyate na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_5: asamāsepigrahaṇena . nivṛttam pūrvapadāt iti . aviśeṣeṇa upasargāt ṇatvam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_6: . samāse niyamāt na prāpnoti . asiddham upasargāt ṇatvam tasya asiddhatvāt niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_7: na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat asamāse apigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_8: ācāryaḥ na yoge yogaḥ asiddhaḥ . kim tarhi prakaraṇe prakaraṇam asiddham iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_9: etasya jñapane prayojanam . yat tat uktam niṣkṛtam niṣpītam iti atra satvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_10: ṣatvam na prāpnoti iti saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_0: 498 ṇopadeśam prati upasargābhāvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_1: tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca ṇopadeśam prati kriyāyogaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_2: āha ayam upasargāt asamāse api ṇopadeśasya iti na ca ṇopadeśam prati upasargaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_3: tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet padalope pratiṣedhaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_4: iti cet padalope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pragatāḥ nāyakāḥ asmāt grāmāt pranāyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_5: grāmaḥ iti . siddham tu yam prati upasargaḥ tatsthasya iti vacanāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_6: . katham . yam prati upasargaḥ tatsthasya ṇaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_7: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ṇopadeśam prati upasargābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_8: anirdeśaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ṇopadeśaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate ṇaḥ upadeśaḥ ṇopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11952_9: ṇopadeśasya iti . katham tarhi . ṇaḥ upadeśaḥ asya saḥ ayam ṇopadeśaḥ ṇopadeśasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11956_0: 499 hinumīnāgrahaṇe vikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam . hinumīnāgrahaṇe vikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11956_1: kartavyam . prahiṇoti pramīṇīte . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11956_2: . prahiṇutaḥ pramīṇāti . siddham acaḥ sthānivattvāt . siddham etat . katham . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11956_3: sthānivattvāt . sthānivadbhāvāt atra ṇatvam bhaviṣyati . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11956_4: pūrvatrāseddhe na sthānivat iti . doṣāḥ eva ete tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ tasya doṣaḥ saṃyogādilopalatvaṇatveṣu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_0: 499 loṭ iti kimartham . prahimāni kulāni . pravapāni māṃsāni . āni loḍgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_1: arthavadgrahaṇāt . āni loḍgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . arthavadgrahaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_2: arthavataḥ āniśabdasya grahaṇam na eṣaḥ arthavān . anupasargāt vā . atha vā yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_3: tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca etam āniśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_4: api tarhi na prāpnoti . prayāṇi pariyāṇi iti . atra api na āniśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_5: . āniśabdam prati atra kriyāyogaḥ . katham . yatkriyayuktāḥ iti na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_6: yasya kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11960_7: tarhi . yā kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11964_0: 500 neḥ gadādiṣu aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . neḥ gadādiṣu aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11964_1: . praṇyagadat pariṇyagadat . āṅā ca iti vaktavyam . praṇyāgadat . nanu ca ayam aṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:11964_2: gadādibhaktaḥ gadādigrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na sidhyati . aṅgasya aṭ ucyate vikaraṇāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:11964_3: ca aṅgam saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ gadādigrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi aḍvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:11964_4: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . aṭkupvāṅnumvyavāye api iti . tat vai kāryiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11964_5: nimittaviśeṣaṇena ca iha arthaḥ . tatra api nimittaviśeṣaṇam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:11968_0: 500-501 antagrahaṇam kimartham . aniteḥ antagrahaṇam sambuddhyartham . aniteḥ antagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11968_1: kriyate sambuddhyartham . he prāṇ . apraraḥ āha . aniteḥ antaḥ padāntasya . aniteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11968_2: antagrahaṇam kriyate padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti tadbādhanārtham . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11968_3: vā tasmāt anantaraḥ . atha vā ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:11969_0: vastrāntaḥ vasanāntaḥ iti . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā . udakāntam gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11969_1: udakasamīpam gataḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya grahaṇam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11969_2: . aniteḥ samīpe yaḥ rephaḥ tasmāt nasya yathā syāt . prāṇiti . iha mā bhūt . paryaniti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11971: KA_III,460.1-3 Ro_V,501 sābhyāsasya dvayoḥ iṣṭam . sābhyāsasya dvayoḥ ṇatvam iṣyate . prāṇiṇiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11975: 501 atpūrvasya iti kimartham . praghnanti parighnanti . hanteḥ atpūrvasya vacane uktam . kim uktam . kuvyavāye hādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11979_0: 502 katham idam vijñayate . okārāt paraḥ otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:11979_1: okāraḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11979_2: vijñayate okārāt paraḥ otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ iti pra naḥ muñcatam atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:11979_3: prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate okāraḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11979_4: iti pra ṇaḥ vaniḥ devakṛtā atra na prāpnoti . ubhayathā ca prakrame doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11980: pra naḥ muñcatam . pra* u naḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11981: pra u naḥ . bhāvini api oti na iṣyate . bhāvini api okāre ṇatvam na iṣyate . evam tarhi upasargāt bahulam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11985: 503 kṛtsthasya ṇatve nirviṇṇasya upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtsthasya ṇatve nirviṇṇasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nirviṇṇaḥ aham anena vāsena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11989_0: 503 ṇervibhāṣāyām sādhanavyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . ṇervibhāṣāyām sādhanavyavāye upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11989_1: kartavyam . prāpyamāṇam prāpyamānam . tadvidhānāt siddham . vihitaviśeṣaṇam ṇigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11989_2: . ṇyantāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . aḍadhikārāt vā . atha vā aḍvyavāye iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_0: 503-504 kimartham idam ucyate na kṛtyacaḥ iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_1: . ijādeḥ eva ca sanumkāt na anyasmāt sanumkāt iti . kva mā bhūt . pramaṅkanam parimaṅkanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_2: . sanumaḥ ṇatve avadhāraṇāprasiddhiḥ vidheyabhāvāt . sanumaḥ ṇatve avadhāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_3: aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . vidheyabhāvāt . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_4: na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . ṇyantāt vibhāṣā prāptā tatra nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_5: ṇatvam vidheyam . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_6: na niyamaḥ . siddham tu pratiṣedhādhikāre sanumgrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_7: pratiṣedhādhikāre sanumgrahaṇāt . pratiṣedhādhikāre sanumgrahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_8: bhābhūpūkamigamipyāyivepisanumām iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . preṅgaṇam preṅgaṇīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_9: . kṛtsthasya ca ṇatve ijādeḥ sanumaḥ grahaṇam . kṛtsthasya ca ṇatve ijādeḥ sanumaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_10: grahaṇam kartavyam . sidhyati sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_11: ca uktam sanumaḥ ṇatve avadhāraṇāprasiddhiḥ vidheyabhāvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_12: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . halaścejupadhāt iti . tat vai tatra ādiviśeṣaṇam antaviśeṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_13: ca iha arthaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate tatra ādiviśeṣaṇam iti . ijupadhāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_14: atra na arthaḥ antaviśeṣaṇena . tatra ādiviśeṣaṇam sat iha antaviśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_15: . katham . ijādeḥ iti ucyate tatra na arthaḥ ādiviśeṣaṇena . atha vā ijādeḥ sanumaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11993_16: iti atra ṇervibhāṣā iti etat anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11997_0: 505 bhādiṣu pūñgrahaṇam . bhādiṣu pūñgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . prapavaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11997_1: somasya iti . ṇyantasya ca upasaṅkhyanam . ṇyantasya ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11997_2: kim pūñaḥ eva . na iti āha . aviśeṣeṇa . prabhāpanam paribhāpanam .

GS24pmbhasuu:12001_1: . niṣpānam duṣpānam . iha mā bhūt . sasarpiṣkeṇa sayajuṣkeṇa . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12001_2: . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate padasya antaḥ padāntaḥ padāntāt iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12005_0: 505 naśeḥ aśaḥ . naśeḥ aśaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . pranaṅkṣyati parinaṅkṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:12009_1: śuṣkagomayeṇa iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate padena

GS24pmbhasuu:12031_1: . yadi yaṇaḥ iti pañcamī mayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī ulkkā valmmīkam iti udaharaṇam . atha mayaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12031_3: . śaraḥ khayaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim udāharaṇam . yadi śaraḥ iti pañcamī khayaḥ iti
